tat | śa̱m-yoḥ | su̱mnam | ī̱ma̱he̱ |
yaḥ | śu̱kraḥ-i̍va | sūrya̍ḥ | hira̍ṇyam-iva | roca̍te |
śreṣṭha̍ḥ | de̱vānā̍m | vasu̍ḥ |
śam | na̱ḥ | ka̱ra̱ti̱ | arva̍te | su̱-gam | me̱ṣāya̍ | me̱ṣye̍ |
nṛ-bhya̍ḥ | nāri̍-bhyaḥ | gave̍ |
a̱sme iti̍ | so̱ma̱ | śriya̍m | adhi̍ | ni | dhe̱hi̱ | śa̱tasya̍ | nṛ̱ṇām |
mahi̍ | śrava̍ḥ | tu̱vi̱-nṛ̱mṇam |
mā | na̱ḥ | so̱ma̱-pa̱ri̱bādha̍ḥ | mā | arā̍tayaḥ | ju̱hu̱ra̱nta̱ |
ā | na̱ḥ | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ | vāje̍ | bha̱ja̱ |
yāḥ | te̱ | pra̱-jāḥ | a̱mṛta̍sya | para̍smin | dhāma̍n | ṛ̱tasya̍ |
mū̱rdhā | nābhā̍ | so̱ma̱ | ve̱na̱ḥ | ā̱-bhūṣa̍ntīḥ | so̱ma̱ | ve̱da̱ḥ |
agne̍ | viva̍svat | u̱ṣasa̍ḥ | ci̱tram | rādha̍ḥ | a̱ma̱rtya̱ |
ā | dā̱śuṣe̍ | jā̱ta̱-ve̱da̱ḥ | va̱ha̱ | tvam | a̱dya | de̱vān | u̱ṣa̱ḥ-budha̍ḥ |
juṣṭa̍ḥ | hi | dū̱taḥ | asi̍ | ha̱vya̱-vāha̍naḥ | agne̍ | ra̱thīḥ | a̱dhva̱rāṇā̍m |
sa̱-jūḥ | a̱śvi-bhyā̍m | u̱ṣasā̍ | su̱-vīrya̍m | a̱sme iti̍ | dhe̱hi̱ | śrava̍ḥ | bṛ̱hat |
a̱dya | dū̱tam | vṛ̱ṇī̱ma̱he̱ | vasu̍m | a̱gnim | pu̱ru̱-pri̱yam |
dhū̱ma-ke̍tum | bhāḥ-ṛ̍jīkam | vi-u̍ṣṭiṣu | ya̱jñānā̍m | a̱dhva̱ra̱-śriya̍m |
śreṣṭha̍m | yavi̍ṣṭham | ati̍thim | su-ā̍hutam | juṣṭa̍m | janā̍ya | dā̱śuṣe̍ |
de̱vān | accha̍ | yāta̍ve | jā̱ta-ve̍dasam | a̱gnim | ī̱ḻe̱ | vi-u̍ṣṭiṣu |
sta̱vi̱ṣyāmi̍ | tvām | a̱ham | viśva̍sya | a̱mṛ̱ta̱ | bho̱ja̱na̱ |
agne̍ | trā̱tāra̍m | a̱mṛta̍m | mi̱ye̱dhya̱ | yaji̍ṣṭham | ha̱vya̱-vā̱ha̱na̱ |
su̱-śaṁsa̍ḥ | bo̱dhi̱ | gṛ̱ṇa̱te | ya̱vi̱ṣṭhya̱ | madhu̍-jihvaḥ | su-ā̍hutaḥ |
praska̍ṇvasya | pra̱-ti̱ran | āyu̍ḥ | jī̱vase̍ | na̱ma̱sya | daivya̍m | jana̍m |
hotā̍ram | vi̱śva-ve̍dasam | sam | hi | tvā̱ | viśa̍ḥ | i̱ndhate̍ |
saḥ | ā | va̱ha̱ | pu̱ru̱-hū̱ta̱ | pra-ce̍tasaḥ | agne̍ | de̱vān | i̱ha | dra̱vat |
sa̱vi̱tāra̍m | u̱ṣasa̍m | a̱śvinā̍ | bhaga̍m | a̱gnim | vi-u̍ṣṭiṣu | kṣapa̍ḥ |
kaṇvā̍saḥ | tvā̱ | su̱ta-so̍māsaḥ | i̱ndha̱te̱ | ha̱vya̱-vāha̍m | su̱-a̱dhva̱ra̱ |
pati̍ḥ | hi | a̱dhva̱rāṇā̍m | agne̍ | dū̱taḥ | vi̱śām | asi̍ |
u̱ṣa̱ḥ-budha̍ḥ | ā | va̱ha̱ | soma̍-pītaye | de̱vān | a̱dya | sva̱ḥ-dṛśa̍ḥ |
agne̍ | pūrvā̍ḥ | anu̍ | u̱ṣasa̍ḥ | vi̱bhā̱va̱so̱ iti̍ vibhā-vaso | dī̱detha̍ | vi̱śva-da̍rśataḥ |
asi̍ | grāme̍ṣu | a̱vi̱tā | pu̱raḥ-hi̍taḥ | asi̍ | ya̱jñeṣu̍ | mānu̍ṣaḥ |
ni | tvā̱ | ya̱jñasya̍ | sādha̍nam | agne̍ | hotā̍ram | ṛ̱tvija̍m |
ma̱nu̱ṣvat | de̱va̱ | dhī̱ma̱hi̱ | pra-ce̍tasam | jī̱ram | dū̱tam | ama̍rtyam |
yat | de̱vānā̍m | mi̱tra̱-ma̱ha̱ḥ | pu̱raḥ-hi̍taḥ | anta̍raḥ | yāsi̍ | dū̱tya̍m |
sindho̍ḥ-iva | pra-sva̍nitāsaḥ | ū̱rmaya̍ḥ | a̱gneḥ | bhrā̱ja̱nte̱ | a̱rcaya̍ḥ |
śru̱dhi | śru̱t-ka̱rṇa̱ | vahni̍-bhiḥ | de̱vaiḥ | a̱gne̱ | sa̱yāva̍-bhiḥ |
ā | sī̱da̱ntu̱ | ba̱rhiṣi̍ | mi̱traḥ | a̱rya̱mā | prā̱ta̱ḥ-yāvā̍naḥ | a̱dhva̱ram |
śṛ̱ṇvantu̍ | stoma̍m | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | su̱-dāna̍vaḥ | a̱gni̱-ji̱hvāḥ | ṛ̱ta̱-vṛdha̍ḥ |
piba̍tu | soma̍m | varu̍ṇaḥ | dhṛ̱ta-vra̍taḥ | a̱śvi-bhyā̍m | u̱ṣasā̍ | sa̱-jūḥ |
tvam | a̱gne̱ | vasū̍n | i̱ha | ru̱drān | ā̱di̱tyān | u̱ta |
yaja̍ | su̱-a̱dhva̱ram | jana̍m | manu̍-jātam | ghṛ̱ta̱-pruṣa̍m |
śru̱ṣṭī̱-vāna̍ḥ | hi | dā̱śuṣe̍ | de̱vāḥ | a̱gne̱ | vice̍tasaḥ |
tān | ro̱hi̱t-a̱śva̱ | gi̱rva̱ṇa̱ḥ | traya̍ḥ-triṁśatam | ā | va̱ha̱ |
pri̱ya̱me̱dha̱-vat | a̱tri̱-vat | jāta̍-vedaḥ | vi̱rū̱pa̱-vat |
a̱ṅgi̱ra̱svat | ma̱hi̱-vra̱ta̱ | praska̍ṇvasya | śru̱dhi̱ | hava̍m |
mahi̍-keravaḥ | ū̱taye̍ | pri̱ya-me̍dhāḥ | a̱hū̱ṣa̱ta̱ |
rāja̍ntam | a̱dhva̱rāṇā̍m | a̱gnim | śu̱kreṇa̍ | śo̱ciṣā̍ |
ghṛta̍-āhavana | sa̱ntya̱ | i̱māḥ | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | su | śru̱dhi̱ | gira̍ḥ |
yābhi̍ḥ | kaṇva̍sya | sū̱nava̍ḥ | hava̍nte | ava̍se | tvā̱ |
tvām | ci̱tra̱śra̱va̱ḥ-ta̱ma̱ | hava̍nte | vi̱kṣu | ja̱ntava̍ḥ |
śo̱ciḥ-ke̍śam | pu̱ru̱-pri̱ya̱ | agne̍ | ha̱vyāya̍ | voḻha̍ve |
ni | tvā̱ | hotā̍ram | ṛ̱tvija̍m | da̱dhi̱re | va̱su̱vit-ta̍mam |
śrut-ka̍rṇam | sa̱pratha̍ḥ-tamam | viprā̍ḥ | a̱gne̱ | divi̍ṣṭiṣu |
ā | tvā̱ | viprā̍ḥ | a̱cu̱cya̱vu̱ḥ | su̱ta-so̍māḥ | a̱bhi | praya̍ḥ |
bṛ̱hat | bhāḥ | bibhra̍taḥ | ha̱viḥ | agne̍ | martā̍ya | dā̱śuṣe̍ |
prā̱ta̱ḥ-yāvna̍ḥ | sa̱ha̱ḥ-kṛ̱ta̱ | so̱ma̱-peyā̍ya | sa̱ntya̱ |
i̱ha | a̱dya | daivya̍m | jana̍m | ba̱rhiḥ | ā | sā̱da̱ya̱ | va̱so̱ iti̍ |
a̱rvāñca̍m | daivya̍m | jana̍m | agne̍ | yakṣva̍ | sahū̍ti-bhiḥ |
a̱yam | soma̍ḥ | su̱-dā̱na̱va̱ḥ | tam | pā̱ta̱ | ti̱raḥ-a̍hnyam |
e̱ṣo iti̍ | u̱ṣāḥ | apū̍rvyā | vi | u̱ccha̱ti̱ | pri̱yā | di̱vaḥ |
stu̱ṣe | vā̱m | a̱śvi̱nā̱ | bṛ̱hat |
yā | da̱srā | sindhu̍-mātarā | ma̱no̱tarā̍ | ra̱yī̱ṇām |
dhi̱yā | de̱vā | va̱su̱-vidā̍ |
va̱cyante̍ | vā̱m | ka̱ku̱hāsa̍ḥ | jū̱rṇāyā̍m | adhi̍ | vi̱ṣṭapi̍ |
yat | vā̱m | ratha̍ḥ | vi-bhi̍ḥ | patā̍t |
ha̱viṣā̍ | jā̱raḥ | a̱pām | pipa̍rti | papu̍riḥ | na̱rā̱ |
pi̱tā | kuṭa̍sya | ca̱rṣa̱ṇiḥ |
ā̱-dā̱raḥ | vā̱m | ma̱tī̱nām | nāsa̍tyā | ma̱ta̱-va̱ca̱sā̱ |
pā̱tam | soma̍sya | dhṛ̱ṣṇu̱-yā |
yā | na̱ḥ | pīpa̍rat | a̱śvi̱nā̱ | jyoti̍ṣmatī | tama̍ḥ | ti̱raḥ |
tām | a̱sme iti̍ | rā̱sā̱thā̱m | iṣa̍m |
ā | na̱ḥ | nā̱vā | ma̱tī̱nām | yā̱tam | pā̱rāya̍ | ganta̍ve |
yu̱ñjāthā̍m | a̱śvi̱nā̱ | ratha̍m |
a̱ritra̍m | vā̱m | di̱vaḥ | pṛ̱thu | tī̱rthe | sindhū̍nām | ratha̍ḥ |
dhi̱yā | yu̱yu̱jre̱ | inda̍vaḥ |
di̱vaḥ | ka̱ṇvā̱sa̱ḥ | inda̍vaḥ | vasu̍ | sindhū̍nām | pa̱de |
svam | va̱vrim | kuha̍ | dhi̱tsa̱tha̱ḥ |
abhū̍t | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | bhāḥ | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | a̱ṁśave̍ | hira̍ṇyam | prati̍ | sūrya̍ḥ |
vi | a̱khya̱t | ji̱hvayā̍ | asi̍taḥ |
abhū̍t | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | pā̱ram | eta̍ve | panthā̍ḥ | ṛ̱tasya̍ | sā̱dhu̱-yā |
ada̍rśi | vi | sru̱tiḥ | di̱vaḥ |
tat-ta̍t | it | a̱śvino̍ḥ | ava̍ḥ | ja̱ri̱tā | prati̍ | bhū̱ṣa̱ti̱ |
made̍ | soma̍sya | pipra̍toḥ |
va̱va̱sā̱nā | vi̱vasva̍ti | soma̍sya | pī̱tyā | gi̱rā |
ma̱nu̱ṣvat | śa̱mbhū̱ iti̍ śam-bhū | ā | ga̱ta̱m |
yu̱voḥ | u̱ṣāḥ | anu̍ | śriya̍m | pari̍-jmanoḥ | u̱pa̱-āca̍rat |
ṛ̱tā | va̱na̱tha̱ḥ | a̱ktu-bhi̍ḥ |
u̱bhā | pi̱ba̱ta̱m | a̱śvi̱nā̱ | u̱bhā | na̱ḥ | śarma̍ | ya̱ccha̱ta̱m |
a̱vi̱dri̱yābhi̍ḥ | ū̱tibhi̍ḥ |
a̱yam | vā̱m | madhu̍mat-tamaḥ | su̱taḥ | soma̍ḥ | ṛ̱ta̱-vṛ̱dhā̱ |
tam | a̱śvi̱nā̱ | pi̱ba̱ta̱m | ti̱raḥ-a̍hnyam | dha̱ttam | ratnā̍ni | dā̱śuṣe̍ |
tri̱-va̱ndhu̱reṇa̍ | tri̱-vṛtā̍ | su̱-peśa̍sā | rathe̍na | ā | yā̱ta̱m | a̱śvi̱nā̱ |
kaṇvā̍saḥ | vā̱m | brahma̍ | kṛ̱ṇva̱nti̱ | a̱dhva̱re | teṣā̍m | su | śṛ̱ṇu̱ta̱m | hava̍m |
aśvi̍nā | madhu̍mat-tamam | pā̱tam | soma̍m | ṛ̱ta̱-vṛ̱dhā̱ |
atha̍ | a̱dya | da̱srā̱ | vasu̍ | bibhra̍tā | rathe̍ | dā̱śvāṁsa̍m | upa̍ | ga̱ccha̱ta̱m |
tri̱-sa̱dha̱sthe | ba̱rhiṣi̍ | vi̱śva̱-ve̱da̱sā̱ | madhvā̍ | ya̱jñam | mi̱mi̱kṣa̱ta̱m |
kaṇvā̍saḥ | vām | su̱ta-so̍māḥ | a̱bhi-dya̍vaḥ | yu̱vām | ha̱va̱nte̱ | a̱śvi̱nā̱ |
yābhi̍ḥ | kaṇva̍m | a̱bhiṣṭi̍-bhiḥ | pra | āva̍tam | yu̱vam | a̱śvi̱nā̱ |
tābhi̍ḥ | su | a̱smān | a̱va̱ta̱m | śu̱bha̱ḥ | pa̱tī̱ iti̍ | pā̱tam | soma̍m | ṛ̱ta̱-vṛ̱dhā̱ |
su̱-dāse̍ | da̱srā̱ | vasu̍ | bibhra̍tā | rathe̍ | pṛkṣa̍ḥ | va̱ha̱ta̱m | a̱śvi̱nā̱ |
ra̱yim | sa̱mu̱drāt | u̱ta | vā̱ | di̱vaḥ | pari̍ | a̱sme iti̍ | dha̱tta̱m | pu̱ru̱-spṛha̍m |
yat | nā̱sa̱tyā̱ | pa̱rā̱-vati̍ | yat | vā̱ | sthaḥ | adhi̍ | tu̱rvaśe̍ |
ata̍ḥ | rathe̍na | su̱-vṛtā̍ | na̱ḥ | ā | ga̱ta̱m | sā̱kam | sūrya̍sya | ra̱śmi-bhi̍ḥ |
a̱rvāñcā̍ | vā̱m | sapta̍yaḥ | a̱dhva̱ra̱-śriya̍ḥ | vaha̍ntu | sava̍nā | it | upa̍ |
iṣa̍m | pṛ̱ñcantā̍ | su̱-kṛte̍ | su̱-dāna̍ve | ā | ba̱rhiḥ | sī̱da̱ta̱m | na̱rā̱ |
tena̍ | nā̱sa̱tyā̱ | ā | ga̱ta̱m | rathe̍na | sūrya̍-tvacā |
yena̍ | śaśva̍t | ū̱hathu̍ḥ | dā̱śuṣe̍ | vasu̍ | madhva̍ḥ | soma̍sya | pī̱taye̍ |
u̱kthebhi̍ḥ | a̱rvāk | ava̍se | pu̱ru̱vasū̱ iti̍ pu̱ru̱-vasū̍ | a̱rkaiḥ | ca̱ | ni | hva̱yā̱ma̱he̱ |
śaśva̍t | kaṇvā̍nām | sada̍si | pri̱ye | hi | ka̱m | soma̍m | pa̱pathu̍ḥ | a̱śvi̱nā̱ |
sa̱ha | vā̱mena̍ | na̱ḥ | u̱ṣa̱ḥ | vi | u̱ccha̱ | du̱hi̱ta̱ḥ | di̱va̱ḥ |
sa̱ha | dyu̱mnena̍ | bṛ̱ha̱tā | vi̱bhā̱-va̱ri̱ | rā̱yā | de̱vi̱ | dāsva̍tī |
aśva̍-vatīḥ | go-ma̍tīḥ | vi̱śva̱-su̱vida̍ḥ | bhūri̍ | cya̱va̱nta̱ | vasta̍ve |
ut | ī̱ra̱ya̱ | prati̍ | mā̱ | sū̱nṛtā̍ḥ | u̱ṣa̱ḥ | coda̍ | rādha̍ḥ | ma̱ghonā̍m |
u̱vāsa̍ | u̱ṣāḥ | u̱cchāt | ca̱ | nu | de̱vī | jī̱rā | rathā̍nām |
ye | a̱syā̱ḥ | ā̱-cara̍ṇeṣu | da̱dhri̱re | sa̱mu̱dre | na | śra̱va̱syava̍ḥ |
uṣa̍ḥ | ye | te̱ | pra | yāme̍ṣu | yu̱ñjate̍ | mana̍ḥ | dā̱nāya̍ | sū̱raya̍ḥ |
atra̍ | aha̍ | tat | kaṇva̍ḥ | e̱ṣā̱m | kaṇva̍-tamaḥ | nāma̍ | gṛ̱ṇā̱ti̱ | nṛ̱ṇām |
ā | gha̱ | yoṣā̍-iva | sū̱narī̍ | u̱ṣāḥ | yā̱ti̱ | pra̱-bhu̱ñja̱tī |
ja̱raya̍ntī | vṛja̍nam | pa̱t-vat | ī̱ya̱te̱ | ut | pā̱ta̱ya̱ti̱ | pa̱kṣiṇa̍ḥ |
vi | yā | sṛ̱jati̍ | sama̍nam | vi | a̱rthina̍ḥ | pa̱dam | na | ve̱ti̱ | oda̍tī |
vaya̱ḥ | naki̍ḥ | te̱ | pa̱pti̱vāṁsa̍ḥ | ā̱sa̱te̱ | vi-u̍ṣṭau | vā̱ji̱nī̱-va̱ti̱ |
e̱ṣā | a̱yu̱kta̱ | pa̱rā̱-vata̍ḥ | sūrya̍sya | u̱t-aya̍nāt | adhi̍ |
śa̱tam | rathe̍bhiḥ | su̱-bhagā̍ | u̱ṣāḥ | i̱yam | vi | yā̱ti̱ | a̱bhi | mānu̍ṣān |
viśva̍m | a̱syā̱ḥ | na̱nā̱ma̱ | cakṣa̍se | jaga̍t | jyoti̍ḥ | kṛ̱ṇo̱ti̱ | sū̱narī̍ |
apa̍ | dveṣa̍ḥ | ma̱ghonī̍ | du̱hi̱tā | di̱vaḥ | u̱ṣāḥ | u̱ccha̱t | apa̍ | sridha̍ḥ |
uṣa̍ḥ | ā | bhā̱hi̱ | bhā̱nunā̍ | ca̱ndreṇa̍ | du̱hi̱ta̱ḥ | di̱va̱ḥ |
ā̱-vaha̍ntī | bhūri̍ | a̱smabhya̍m | saubha̍gam | vi̱-u̱cchantī̍ | divi̍ṣṭiṣu |
viśva̍sya | hi | prāṇa̍nam | jīva̍nam | tve iti̍ | vi | yat | u̱cchasi̍ | sū̱na̱ri̱ |
sā | na̱ḥ | rathe̍na | bṛ̱ha̱tā | vi̱bhā̱-va̱ri̱ | śru̱dhi | ci̱tra̱-ma̱ghe̱ | hava̍m |
uṣa̍ḥ | vāja̍m | hi | vaṁsva̍ | yaḥ | ci̱traḥ | mānu̍ṣe | jane̍ |
tena̍ | ā | va̱ha̱ | su̱-kṛta̍ḥ | a̱dhva̱rān | upa̍ | ye | tvā̱ | gṛ̱ṇanti̍ | vahna̍yaḥ |
viśvā̍n | de̱vān | ā | va̱ha̱ | soma̍-pītaye | a̱ntari̍kṣāt | u̱ṣa̱ḥ | tvam |
sā | a̱smāsu̍ | dhā̱ḥ | go-ma̍t | aśva̍-vat | u̱kthya̍m | uṣa̍ḥ | vāja̍m | su̱-vīrya̍m |
yasyā̍ḥ | ruśa̍ntaḥ | a̱rcaya̍ḥ | prati̍ | bha̱drāḥ | adṛ̍kṣata |
sā | na̱ḥ | ra̱yim | vi̱śva-vā̍ram | su̱-peśa̍sam | u̱ṣāḥ | da̱dā̱tu̱ | sugmya̍m |
ye | ci̱t | hi | tvām | ṛṣa̍yaḥ | pūrve̍ | ū̱taye̍ | ju̱hū̱re | ava̍se | ma̱hi̱ |
sā | na̱ḥ | stomā̍n | a̱bhi | gṛ̱ṇī̱hi̱ | rādha̍sā | uṣa̍ḥ | śu̱kreṇa̍ | śo̱ciṣā̍ |
uṣa̍ḥ | yat | a̱dya | bhā̱nunā̍ | vi | dvārau̍ | ṛ̱ṇava̍ḥ | di̱vaḥ |
pra | na̱ḥ | ya̱ccha̱tā̱t | a̱vṛ̱kam | pṛ̱thu | cha̱rdiḥ | pra | de̱vi̱ | go-ma̍tīḥ | iṣa̍ḥ |
sam | na̱ḥ | rā̱yā | bṛ̱ha̱tā | vi̱śva-pe̍śasā | mi̱mi̱kṣva | sam | iḻā̍bhiḥ | ā |
sam | dyu̱mnena̍ | vi̱śva̱-turā̍ | u̱ṣa̱ḥ | ma̱hi̱ | sam | vājai̍ḥ | vā̱ji̱nī̱-va̱ti̱ |
uṣa̍ḥ | bha̱drebhi̍ḥ | ā | ga̱hi̱ | di̱vaḥ | ci̱t | ro̱ca̱nāt | adhi̍ |
vaha̍ntu | a̱ru̱ṇa-psa̍vaḥ | upa̍ | tvā̱ | so̱mina̍ḥ | gṛ̱ham |
su̱-peśa̍sam | su̱-kham | ratha̍m | yam | a̱dhi̱-asthā̍ḥ | u̱ṣa̱ḥ | tvam |
tena̍ | su̱-śrava̍sam | jana̍m | pra | a̱va̱ | a̱dya | du̱hi̱ta̱ḥ | di̱va̱ḥ |
vaya̍ḥ | ci̱t | te̱ | pa̱ta̱triṇa̍ḥ | dvi̱-pat | catu̍ḥ-pat | a̱rju̱ni̱ |
uṣa̍ḥ | pra | ā̱ra̱n | ṛ̱tūn | anu̍ | di̱vaḥ | ante̍bhyaḥ | pari̍ |
vi̱-u̱cchantī̍ | hi | ra̱śmi-bhi̍ḥ | viśva̍m | ā̱-bhāsi̍ | ro̱ca̱nam |
tām | tvām | u̱ṣa̱ḥ | va̱su̱-yava̍ḥ | gī̱ḥ-bhiḥ | kaṇvā̍ḥ | a̱hū̱ṣa̱ta̱ |
ut | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | tyam | jā̱ta-ve̍dasam | de̱vam | va̱ha̱nti̱ | ke̱tava̍ḥ |
dṛ̱śe | viśvā̍ya | sūrya̍m |
apa̍ | tye | tā̱yava̍ḥ | ya̱thā̱ | nakṣa̍trā | ya̱nti̱ | a̱ktu-bhi̍ḥ |
sūrā̍ya | vi̱śva-ca̍kṣase |
adṛ̍śram | a̱sya̱ | ke̱tava̍ḥ | vi | ra̱śmaya̍ḥ | janā̍n | anu̍ |
bhrāja̍ntaḥ | a̱gnaya̍ḥ | ya̱thā̱ |
ta̱raṇi̍ḥ | vi̱śva-da̍rśataḥ | jyo̱ti̱ḥ-kṛt | a̱si̱ | sū̱rya̱ |
viśva̍m | ā | bhā̱si̱ | ro̱ca̱nam |
pra̱tyaṅ | de̱vānā̍m | viśa̍ḥ | pra̱tyaṅ | ut | e̱ṣi̱ | mānu̍ṣān |
pra̱tyaṅ | viśva̍m | sva̍ḥ | dṛ̱śe |
yena̍ | pā̱va̱ka̱ | cakṣa̍sā | bhu̱ra̱ṇyanta̍m | janā̍n | anu̍ |
tvam | va̱ru̱ṇa̱ | paśya̍si |
vi | dyām | e̱ṣi̱ | raja̍ḥ | pṛ̱thu | ahā̍ | mimā̍naḥ | a̱ktu-bhi̍ḥ |
paśya̍n | janmā̍ni | sū̱rya̱ |
sa̱pta | tvā̱ | ha̱rita̍ḥ | rathe̍ | vaha̍nti | de̱va̱ | sū̱rya̱ |
śo̱ciḥ-ke̍śam | vi̱-ca̱kṣa̱ṇa̱ |
ayu̍kta | sa̱pta | śu̱ndhyuva̍ḥ | sūra̍ḥ | ratha̍sya | na̱ptya̍ḥ |
tābhi̍ḥ | yā̱ti̱ | svayu̍kti-bhiḥ |
ut | va̱yam | tama̍saḥ | pari̍ | jyoti̍ḥ | paśya̍ntaḥ | ut-ta̍ram |
de̱vam | de̱va̱-trā | sūrya̍m | aga̍nma | jyoti̍ḥ | u̱t-ta̱mam |
u̱t-yan | a̱dya | mi̱tra̱-ma̱ha̱ḥ | ā̱-roha̍n | ut-ta̍rām | diva̍m |
hṛ̱t-ro̱gam | mama̍ | sū̱rya̱ | ha̱ri̱māṇa̍m | ca̱ | nā̱śa̱ya̱ |
śuke̍ṣu | me̱ | ha̱ri̱māṇa̍m | ro̱pa̱ṇākā̍su | da̱dhma̱si̱ |
atho̱ iti̍ | hā̱ri̱dra̱veṣu̍ | me̱ | ha̱ri̱māṇa̱m | ni | da̱dhma̱si̱ |
ut | a̱gā̱t | a̱yam | ā̱di̱tyaḥ | viśve̍na | saha̍sā | sa̱ha |
dvi̱ṣanta̍m | mahya̍m | ra̱ndhaya̍n | mo iti̍ | a̱ham | dvi̱ṣa̱te | ra̱dha̱m |
a̱bhi | tyam | me̱ṣam | pu̱ru̱-hū̱tam | ṛ̱gmiya̍m | indra̍m | gī̱ḥ-bhiḥ | ma̱da̱ta̱ | vasva̍ḥ | a̱rṇa̱vam |
yasya̍ | dyāva̍ḥ | na | vi̱-cara̍nti | mānu̍ṣā | bhu̱je | maṁhi̍ṣṭham | a̱bhi | vipra̍m | a̱rca̱ta̱ |
a̱bhi | ī̱m | a̱va̱nva̱n | su̱-a̱bhi̱ṣṭim | ū̱taya̍ḥ | a̱nta̱ri̱kṣa̱-prām | tavi̍ṣībhiḥ | ā-vṛ̍tam |
indra̍m | dakṣā̍saḥ | ṛ̱bhava̍ḥ | ma̱da̱-cyuta̍m | śa̱ta-kra̍tum | java̍nī | sū̱nṛtā̍ | ā | a̱ru̱ha̱t |
tvam | go̱tram | aṅgi̍raḥ-bhyaḥ | a̱vṛ̱ṇo̱ḥ | apa̍ | u̱ta | atra̍ye | śa̱ta-du̍reṣu | gā̱tu̱-vit |
sa̱sena̍ | ci̱t | vi̱-ma̱dāya̍ | a̱va̱ha̱ḥ | vasu̍ | ā̱jau | adri̍m | va̱va̱sā̱nasya̍ | na̱rtaya̍n |
tvam | a̱pām | a̱pi̱-dhānā̍ | a̱vṛ̱ṇo̱ḥ | apa̍ | adhā̍rayaḥ | parva̍te | dānu̍-mat | vasu̍ |
vṛ̱tram | yat | i̱ndra̱ | śava̍sā | ava̍dhīḥ | ahi̍m | āt | it | sūrya̍m | di̱vi | ā | a̱ro̱ha̱ya̱ḥ | dṛ̱śe |
tvam | mā̱yābhi̍ḥ | apa̍ | mā̱yina̍ḥ | a̱dha̱ma̱ḥ | sva̱dhābhi̍ḥ | ye | adhi̍ | śuptau̍ | aju̍hvata |
tvam | pipro̍ḥ | nṛ̱-ma̱na̱ḥ | pra | a̱ru̱ja̱ḥ | pura̍ḥ | pra | ṛ̱jiścā̍nam | da̱syu̱-hatye̍ṣu | ā̱vi̱tha̱ |
tvam | kutsa̍m | śu̱ṣṇa̱-hatye̍ṣu | ā̱vi̱tha̱ | ara̍ndhayaḥ | a̱ti̱thi̱-gvāya̍ | śamba̍ram |
ma̱hānta̍m | ci̱t | a̱rbu̱dam | ni | kra̱mī̱ḥ | pa̱dā | sa̱nāt | e̱va | da̱syu̱-hatyā̍ya | ja̱jñi̱ṣe̱ |
tve iti̍ | viśvā̍ | tavi̍ṣī | sa̱dhrya̍k | hi̱tā | tava̍ | rādha̍ḥ | so̱ma̱-pī̱thāya̍ | ha̱rṣa̱te̱ |
tava̍ | vajra̍ḥ | ci̱ki̱te̱ | bā̱hvoḥ | hi̱taḥ | vṛ̱śca | śatro̍ḥ | ava̍ | viśvā̍ni | vṛṣṇyā̍ |
vi | jā̱nī̱hi̱ | āryā̍n | ye | ca̱ | dasya̍vaḥ | ba̱rhiṣma̍te | ra̱ndha̱ya̱ | śāsa̍t | a̱vra̱tān |
śākī̍ | bha̱va̱ | yaja̍mānasya | co̱di̱tā | viśvā̍ | it | tā | te̱ | sa̱dha̱-māde̍ṣu | cā̱ka̱na̱ |
anu̍-vratāya | ra̱ndhaya̍n | apa̍-vratān | ā̱-bhūbhi̍ḥ | indra̍ḥ | śna̱thaya̍n | anā̍bhuvaḥ |
vṛ̱ddhasya̍ | ci̱t | vardha̍taḥ | dyām | ina̍kṣataḥ | stavā̍naḥ | va̱mraḥ | vi | ja̱ghā̱na̱ | sa̱m-diha̍ḥ |
takṣa̍t | yat | te̱ | u̱śanā̍ | saha̍sā | saha̍ḥ | vi | roda̍sī̱ iti̍ | ma̱jmanā̍ | bā̱dha̱te̱ | śava̍ḥ |
ā | tvā̱ | vāta̍sya | nṛ̱-ma̱na̱ḥ | ma̱na̱ḥ-yuja̍ḥ | ā | pūrya̍māṇam | a̱va̱ha̱n | a̱bhi | śrava̍ḥ |
mandi̍ṣṭa | yat | u̱śane̍ | kā̱vye | sacā̍ | indra̍ḥ | va̱ṅkū iti̍ | va̱ṅku̱-tarā̍ | adhi̍ | ti̱ṣṭha̱ti̱ |
u̱graḥ | ya̱yim | niḥ | a̱paḥ | srota̍sā | a̱sṛ̱ja̱t | vi | śuṣṇa̍sya | dṛ̱ṁhi̱tāḥ | ai̱ra̱ya̱t | pura̍ḥ |
ā | sma̱ | ratha̍m | vṛ̱ṣa̱-pāne̍ṣu | ti̱ṣṭha̱si̱ | śā̱ryā̱tasya̍ | pra-bhṛ̍tāḥ | yeṣu̍ | manda̍se |
indra̍ | yathā̍ | su̱ta-so̍meṣu | cā̱kana̍ḥ | a̱na̱rvāṇa̍m | śloka̍m | ā | ro̱ha̱se̱ | di̱vi |
ada̍dāḥ | arbhā̍m | ma̱ha̱te | va̱ca̱syave̍ | ka̱kṣīva̍te | vṛ̱ca̱yām | i̱ndra̱ | su̱nva̱te |
menā̍ | a̱bha̱va̱ḥ | vṛ̱ṣa̱ṇa̱śvasya̍ | su̱kra̱to̱ iti̍ su-krato | viśvā̍ | it | tā | te̱ | sava̍neṣu | pra̱-vācyā̍ |
indra̍ḥ | a̱śrā̱yi̱ | su̱-dhya̍ḥ | ni̱re̱ke | pa̱jreṣu̍ | stoma̍ḥ | durya̍ḥ | na | yūpa̍ḥ |
a̱śva̱-yuḥ | ga̱vyuḥ | ra̱tha̱-yuḥ | va̱su̱-yuḥ | indra̍ḥ | it | rā̱yaḥ | kṣa̱ya̱ti̱ | pra̱-ya̱ntā |
i̱dam | nama̍ḥ | vṛ̱ṣa̱bhāya̍ | sva̱-rāje̍ | sa̱tya-śu̍ṣmāya | ta̱vase̍ | a̱vā̱ci̱ |
a̱smin | i̱ndra̱ | vṛ̱jane̍ | sarva̍-vīrāḥ | smat | sū̱ri-bhi̍ḥ | tava̍ | śarma̍n | syā̱ma̱ |
tyam | su | me̱ṣam | ma̱ha̱ya̱ | sva̱ḥ-vida̍m | śa̱tam | yasya̍ | su̱-bhva̍ḥ | sā̱kam | īra̍te |
atya̍m | na | vāja̍m | ha̱va̱na̱-syada̍m | ratha̍m | ā | indra̍m | va̱vṛ̱tyā̱m | ava̍se | su̱vṛ̱kti-bhi̍ḥ |
saḥ | parva̍taḥ | na | dha̱ruṇe̍ṣu | acyu̍taḥ | sa̱hasra̍m-ūtiḥ | tavi̍ṣīṣu | va̱vṛ̱dhe̱ |
indra̍ḥ | yat | vṛ̱tram | ava̍dhīt | na̱dī̱-vṛta̍m | u̱bjan | arṇā̍ṁsi | jarhṛ̍ṣāṇaḥ | andha̍sā |
saḥ | hi | dva̱raḥ | dva̱riṣu̍ | va̱vraḥ | ūdha̍ni | ca̱ndra-bu̍dhnaḥ | mada̍-vṛddhaḥ | ma̱nī̱ṣi-bhi̍ḥ |
indra̍m | tam | a̱hve̱ | su̱-a̱pa̱syayā̍ | dhi̱yā | maṁhi̍ṣṭha-rātim | saḥ | hi | papri̍ḥ | andha̍saḥ |
ā | yam | pṛ̱ṇanti̍ | di̱vi | sadma̍-barhiṣaḥ | sa̱mu̱dram | na | su̱-bhva̍ḥ | svāḥ | a̱bhiṣṭa̍yaḥ |
tam | vṛ̱tra̱-hatye̍ | anu̍ | ta̱sthu̱ḥ | ū̱taya̍ḥ | śuṣmā̍ḥ | indra̍m | a̱vā̱tāḥ | ahru̍ta-psavaḥ |
a̱bhi | sva-vṛ̍ṣṭim | made̍ | a̱sya̱ | yudhya̍taḥ | ra̱ghvīḥ-i̍va | pra̱va̱ṇe | sa̱sru̱ḥ | ū̱taya̍ḥ |
indra̍ḥ | yat | va̱jrī | dhṛ̱ṣamā̍ṇaḥ | andha̍sā | bhi̱nat | va̱lasya̍ | pa̱ri̱dhīn-i̍va | tri̱taḥ |
pari̍ | ī̱m | ghṛ̱ṇā | ca̱ra̱ti̱ | ti̱tvi̱ṣe | śava̍ḥ | a̱paḥ | vṛ̱tvī | raja̍saḥ | bu̱dhnam | ā | a̱śa̱ya̱t |
vṛ̱trasya̍ | yat | pra̱va̱ṇe | du̱ḥ-gṛbhi̍śvanaḥ | ni̱-ja̱ghantha̍ | hanvo̍ḥ | i̱ndra̱ | ta̱nya̱tum |
hra̱dam | na | hi | tvā̱ | ni̱-ṛ̱ṣanti̍ | ū̱rmaya̍ḥ | brahmā̍ṇi | i̱ndra̱ | tava̍ | yāni̍ | vardha̍nā |
tvaṣṭā̍ | ci̱t | te̱ | yujya̍m | va̱vṛ̱dhe̱ | śava̍ḥ | ta̱takṣa̍ | vajra̍m | a̱bhibhū̍ti-ojasam |
ja̱gha̱nvān | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | hari̍-bhiḥ | sa̱ṁbhṛ̱ta̱kra̱to̱ iti̍ saṁbhṛta-krato | indra̍ | vṛ̱tram | manu̍ṣe | gā̱tu̱-yan | a̱paḥ |
aya̍cchathāḥ | bā̱hvoḥ | vajra̍m | ā̱ya̱sam | adhā̍rayaḥ | di̱vi | ā | sūrya̍m | dṛ̱śe |
bṛ̱hat | sva-ca̍ndram | ama̍-vat | yat | u̱kthya̍m | akṛ̍ṇvata | bhi̱yasā̍ | roha̍ṇam | di̱vaḥ |
yat | mānu̍ṣa-pradhanāḥ | indra̍m | ū̱taya̍ḥ | sva̍ḥ | nṛ̱-sāca̍ḥ | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | ama̍dan | anu̍ |
dyauḥ | ci̱t | a̱sya̱ | ama̍-vān | ahe̍ḥ | sva̱nāt | ayo̍yavīt | bhi̱yasā̍ | vajra̍ḥ | i̱ndra̱ | te̱ |
vṛ̱trasya̍ | yat | ba̱dba̱dhā̱nasya̍ | ro̱da̱sī̱ iti̍ | made̍ | su̱tasya̍ | śava̍sā | abhi̍nat | śira̍ḥ |
yat | it | nu | i̱ndra̱ | pṛ̱thi̱vī | daśa̍-bhujiḥ | ahā̍ni | viśvā̍ | ta̱tana̍nta | kṛ̱ṣṭaya̍ḥ |
atra̍ | aha̍ | te̱ | ma̱gha̱-va̱n | vi-śru̍tam | saha̍ḥ | dyām | anu̍ | śava̍sā | ba̱rhaṇā̍ | bhu̱va̱t |
tvam | a̱sya | pā̱re | raja̍saḥ | vi-o̍manaḥ | svabhū̍ti-ojāḥ | ava̍se | dhṛ̱ṣa̱t-ma̱na̱ḥ |
ca̱kṛ̱ṣe | bhūmi̍m | pra̱ti̱-māna̍m | oja̍saḥ | a̱paḥ | sva1̱̍riti̱ sva̍ḥ | pa̱ri̱-bhūḥ | e̱ṣi̱ | ā | diva̍m |
tvam | bhu̱va̱ḥ | pra̱ti̱-māna̍m | pṛ̱thi̱vyāḥ | ṛ̱ṣva-vī̍rasya | bṛ̱ha̱taḥ | pati̍ḥ | bhū̱ḥ |
viśva̍m | ā | a̱prā̱ḥ | a̱ntari̍kṣam | ma̱hi̱-tvā | sa̱tyam | a̱ddhā | naki̍ḥ | a̱nyaḥ | tvā-vā̍n |
na | yasya̍ | dyāvā̍pṛthi̱vī iti̍ | anu̍ | vyaca̍ḥ | na | sindha̍vaḥ | raja̍saḥ | anta̍m | ā̱na̱śuḥ |
na | u̱ta | sva-vṛ̍ṣṭim | made̍ | a̱sya̱ | yudhya̍taḥ | eka̍ḥ | a̱nyat | ca̱kṛ̱ṣe̱ | viśva̍m | ā̱nu̱ṣak |
ārca̍n | atra̍ | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | sasmi̍n | ā̱jau | viśve̍ | de̱vāsa̍ḥ | a̱ma̱da̱n | anu̍ | tvā̱ |
vṛ̱trasya̍ | yat | bhṛ̱ṣṭi̱-matā̍ | va̱dhena̍ | ni | tvam | i̱ndra̱ | prati̍ | ā̱nam | ja̱ghantha̍ |
ni | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | su | vāca̍m | pra | ma̱he | bha̱rā̱ma̱he̱ | gira̍ḥ | indrā̍ya | sada̍ne | vi̱vasva̍taḥ |
nu | ci̱t | hi | ratna̍m | sa̱sa̱tām-i̍va | avi̍dat | na | du̱ḥ-stu̱tiḥ | dra̱vi̱ṇa̱ḥ-deṣu̍ | śa̱sya̱te̱ |
du̱raḥ | aśva̍sya | du̱raḥ | i̱ndra̱ | goḥ | a̱si̱ | du̱raḥ | yava̍sya | vasu̍naḥ | i̱naḥ | pati̍ḥ |
śi̱kṣā̱-na̱raḥ | pra̱-diva̍ḥ | akā̍ma-karśanaḥ | sakhā̍ | sakhi̍-bhyaḥ | tam | i̱dam | gṛ̱ṇī̱ma̱si̱ |
śacī̍-vaḥ | i̱ndra̱ | pu̱ru̱-kṛ̱t | dyu̱ma̱t-ta̱ma̱ | tava̍ | it | i̱dam | a̱bhita̍ḥ | ce̱ki̱te̱ | vasu̍ |
ata̍ḥ | sa̱m-gṛbhya̍ | a̱bhi̱-bhū̱te̱ | ā | bha̱ra̱ | mā | tvā̱-ya̱taḥ | ja̱ri̱tuḥ | kāma̍m | ū̱na̱yī̱ḥ |
e̱bhiḥ | dyu-bhi̍ḥ | su̱-manā̍ḥ | e̱bhiḥ | indu̍-bhiḥ | ni̱ḥ-u̱ndhā̱naḥ | ama̍tim | gobhi̍ḥ | a̱śvinā̍ |
indre̍ṇa | dasyu̍m | da̱raya̍ntaḥ | indu̍-bhiḥ | yu̱ta-dve̍ṣasaḥ | sam | i̱ṣā | ra̱bhe̱ma̱hi̱ |
sam | i̱ndra̱ | rā̱yā | sam | i̱ṣā | ra̱bhe̱ma̱hi̱ | sam | vāje̍bhiḥ | pu̱ru̱-ca̱ndraiḥ | a̱bhidyu̍-bhiḥ |
sam | de̱vyā | pra-ma̍tyā | vī̱ra-śu̍ṣmayā | go-a̍grayā | aśva̍-vatyā | ra̱bhe̱ma̱hi̱ |
te | tvā̱ | madā̍ḥ | a̱ma̱da̱n | tāni̍ | vṛṣṇyā̍ | te | somā̍saḥ | vṛ̱tra̱-hatye̍ṣu | sa̱t-pa̱te̱ |
yat | kā̱rave̍ | daśa̍ | vṛ̱trāṇi̍ | a̱pra̱ti | ba̱rhiṣma̍te | ni | sa̱hasrā̍ṇi | ba̱rhaya̍ḥ |
yu̱dhā | yudha̍m | upa̍ | gha̱ | it | e̱ṣi̱ | dhṛ̱śṇu̱-yā | pu̱rā | pura̍m | sam | i̱dam | ha̱ṁsi̱ | oja̍sā |
namyā̍ | yat | i̱ndra̱ | sakhyā̍ | pa̱rā̱-vati̍ | ni̱-ba̱rhaya̍ḥ | namu̍cim | nāma̍ | mā̱yina̍m |
tvam | kara̍ñjam | u̱ta | pa̱rṇaya̍m | va̱dhī̱ḥ | teji̍ṣṭhayā | a̱ti̱thi̱-gvasya̍ | va̱rta̱nī |
tvam | śa̱tā | vaṅgṛ̍dasya | a̱bhi̱na̱t | pura̍ḥ | a̱na̱nu̱-daḥ | pari̍-sūtāḥ | ṛ̱jiśva̍nā |
tvam | e̱tān | ja̱na̱-rājña̍ḥ | dviḥ | daśa̍ | a̱ba̱ndhunā̍ | su̱-śrava̍sā | u̱pa̱-ja̱gmuṣa̍ḥ |
ṣa̱ṣṭim | sa̱hasrā̍ | na̱va̱tim | nava̍ | śru̱taḥ | ni | ca̱kreṇa̍ | rathyā̍ | du̱ḥ-padā̍ | a̱vṛ̱ṇa̱k |
tvam | ā̱vi̱tha̱ | su̱-śrava̍sam | tava̍ | ū̱ti-bhi̍ḥ | tava̍ | trāma̍-bhiḥ | i̱ndra̱ | tūrva̍yāṇam |
tvam | a̱smai̱ | kutsa̍m | a̱ti̱thi̱-gvam | ā̱yum | ma̱he | rājñe̍ | yūne̍ | a̱ra̱ndha̱nā̱ya̱ḥ |
ye | u̱t-ṛci̍ | i̱ndra̱ | de̱va-go̍pāḥ | sakhā̍yaḥ | te̱ | śi̱va-ta̍māḥ | asā̍ma |
tvām | sto̱ṣā̱ma̱ | tvayā̍ | su̱-vīrā̍ḥ | drāghī̍yaḥ | āyu̍ḥ | pra̱-ta̱ram | dadhā̍nāḥ |
mā | na̱ḥ | a̱smin | ma̱gha̱-va̱n | pṛ̱t-su | aṁha̍si | na̱hi | te̱ | anta̍ḥ | śava̍saḥ | pa̱ri̱-naśe̍ |
akra̍ndayaḥ | na̱dya̍ḥ | roru̍vat | vanā̍ | ka̱thā | na | kṣo̱ṇīḥ | bhi̱yasā̍ | sam | ā̱ra̱ta̱ |
arca̍ | śa̱krāya̍ | śā̱kine̍ | śacī̍-vate | śṛ̱ṇvanta̍m | indra̍m | ma̱haya̍n | a̱bhi | stu̱hi̱ |
yaḥ | dhṛ̱ṣṇunā̍ | śava̍sā | roda̍sī̱ iti̍ | u̱bhe iti̍ | vṛṣā̍ | vṛ̱ṣa̱-tvā | vṛ̱ṣa̱bhaḥ | ni̱-ṛ̱ñjate̍ |
arca̍ | di̱ve | bṛ̱ha̱te | śū̱ṣya̍m | vaca̍ḥ | sva-kṣa̍tram | yasya̍ | dhṛ̱ṣa̱taḥ | dhṛ̱ṣat | mana̍ḥ |
bṛ̱hat-śra̍vāḥ | asu̍raḥ | ba̱rhaṇā̍ | kṛ̱taḥ | pu̱raḥ | hari̍-bhyām | vṛ̱ṣa̱bhaḥ | ratha̍ḥ | hi | saḥ |
tvam | di̱vaḥ | bṛ̱ha̱taḥ | sānu̍ | ko̱pa̱ya̱ḥ | ava̍ | tmanā̍ | dhṛ̱ṣa̱tā | śamba̍ram | bhi̱na̱t |
yat | mā̱yina̍ḥ | vra̱ndina̍ḥ | ma̱ndinā̍ | dhṛ̱ṣat | śi̱tām | gabha̍stim | a̱śani̍m | pṛ̱ta̱nyasi̍ |
ni | yat | vṛ̱ṇakṣi̍ | śva̱sa̱nasya̍ | mū̱rdhani̍ | śuṣṇa̍sya | ci̱t | vra̱ndina̍ḥ | roru̍vat | vanā̍ |
prā̱cīne̍na | mana̍sā | ba̱rhaṇā̍-vatā | yat | a̱dya | ci̱t | kṛ̱ṇava̍ḥ | kaḥ | tvā̱ | pari̍ |
tvam | ā̱vi̱tha̱ | narya̍m | tu̱rvaśa̍m | yadu̍m | tvam | tu̱rvīti̍m | va̱yya̍m | śa̱ta̱kra̱to̱ iti̍ śata-krato |
tvam | ratha̍m | eta̍śam | kṛtvye̍ | dhane̍ | tvam | pura̍ḥ | na̱va̱tim | da̱mbha̱ya̱ḥ | nava̍ |
saḥ | gha̱ | rājā̍ | sat-pa̍tiḥ | śū̱śu̱va̱t | jana̍ḥ | rā̱ta-ha̍vyaḥ | prati̍ | yaḥ | śāsa̍m | inva̍ti |
u̱kthā | vā̱ | yaḥ | a̱bhi̱-gṛ̱ṇāti̍ | rādha̍sā | dānu̍ḥ | a̱smai̱ | upa̍rā | pi̱nva̱te̱ | di̱vaḥ |
asa̍mam | kṣa̱tram | asa̍mā | ma̱nī̱ṣā | pra | so̱ma̱-pāḥ | apa̍sā | sa̱ntu̱ | neme̍ |
ye | te̱ | i̱ndra̱ | da̱duṣa̍ḥ | va̱rdhaya̍nti | mahi̍ | kṣa̱tram | sthavi̍ram | vṛṣṇya̍m | ca̱ |
tubhya̍ | it | e̱te | ba̱hu̱lāḥ | adri̍-dugdhāḥ | ca̱mū̱-sada̍ḥ | ca̱ma̱sāḥ | i̱ndra̱-pānā̍ḥ |
vi | a̱śnu̱hi̱ | ta̱rpaya̍ | kāma̍m | e̱ṣā̱m | atha̍ | mana̍ḥ | va̱su̱-deyā̍ya | kṛ̱ṣva̱ |
a̱pām | a̱ti̱ṣṭha̱t | dha̱ruṇa̍-hvaram | tama̍ḥ | a̱ntaḥ | vṛ̱trasya̍ | ja̱ṭhare̍ṣu | parva̍taḥ |
a̱bhi | ī̱m | indra̍ḥ | na̱dya̍ḥ | va̱vriṇā̍ | hi̱tāḥ | viśvā̍ḥ | a̱nu̱-sthāḥ | pra̱va̱ṇeṣu̍ | ji̱ghna̱te̱ |
saḥ | śe-vṛ̍dham | adhi̍ | dhā̱ḥ | dyu̱mnam | a̱sme iti̍ | mahi̍ | kṣa̱tram | ja̱nā̱ṣāṭ | i̱ndra̱ | tavya̍m |
rakṣa̍ | ca̱ | na̱ḥ | ma̱ghona̍ḥ | pā̱hi | sū̱rīn | rā̱ye | ca̱ | na̱ḥ | su̱-a̱pa̱tyai | i̱ṣe | dhā̱ḥ |
di̱vaḥ | ci̱t | a̱sya̱ | va̱ri̱mā | vi | pa̱pra̱the̱ | indra̍m | na | ma̱hnā | pṛ̱thi̱vī | ca̱na | prati̍ |
bhī̱maḥ | tuvi̍ṣmān | ca̱rṣa̱ṇi-bhya̍ḥ | ā̱-ta̱paḥ | śiśī̍te | vajra̍m | teja̍se | na | vaṁsa̍gaḥ |
saḥ | a̱rṇa̱vaḥ | na | na̱dya̍ḥ | sa̱mu̱driya̍ḥ | prati̍ | gṛ̱bhṇā̱ti̱ | vi-śri̍tāḥ | varī̍ma-bhiḥ |
indra̍ḥ | soma̍sya | pī̱taye̍ | vṛ̱ṣa̱-ya̱te̱ | sa̱nāt | saḥ | yu̱dhmaḥ | oja̍sā | pa̱na̱sya̱te̱ |
tvam | tam | i̱ndra̱ | parva̍tam | na | bhoja̍se | ma̱haḥ | nṛ̱mṇasya̍ | dharma̍ṇām | i̱ra̱jya̱si̱ |
pra | vī̱rye̍ṇa | de̱vatā̍ | ati̍ | ce̱ki̱te̱ | viśva̍smai | u̱graḥ | karma̍ṇe | pu̱raḥ-hi̍taḥ |
saḥ | it | vane̍ | na̱ma̱syu-bhi̍ḥ | va̱ca̱sya̱te̱ | cāru̍ | jane̍ṣu | pra̱-bru̱vā̱ṇaḥ | i̱ndri̱yam |
vṛṣā̍ | chandu̍ḥ | bha̱va̱ti̱ | ha̱rya̱taḥ | vṛṣā̍ | kṣeme̍ṇa | dhenā̍m | ma̱ghav-ā̍ | yat | inva̍ti |
saḥ | it | ma̱hāni̍ | sa̱m-i̱thāni̍ | ma̱jmanā̍ | kṛ̱ṇoti̍ | yu̱dhmaḥ | oja̍sā | jane̍bhyaḥ |
adha̍ | ca̱na | śrat | da̱dha̱ti̱ | tviṣi̍-mate | indrā̍ya | vajra̍m | ni̱-ghani̍ghnate | va̱dham |
saḥ | hi | śra̱va̱syuḥ | sada̍nāni | kṛ̱trimā̍ | kṣma̱yā | vṛ̱dhā̱naḥ | oja̍sā | vi̱-nā̱śaya̍n |
jyotī̍ṁṣi | kṛ̱ṇvan | a̱vṛ̱kāṇi̍ | yajya̍ve | ava̍ | su̱-kratu̍ḥ | sarta̱vai | a̱paḥ | sṛ̱ja̱t |
dā̱nāya̍ | mana̍ḥ | so̱ma̱-pā̱va̱n | a̱stu̱ | te̱ | a̱rvāñcā̍ | harī̱ iti̍ | va̱nda̱na̱-śru̱t | ā | kṛ̱dhi̱ |
yami̍ṣṭhāsaḥ | sāra̍thayaḥ | ye | i̱ndra | te̱ | na | tvā̱ | ketā̍ḥ | ā | da̱bhnu̱va̱nti̱ | bhūrṇa̍yaḥ |
apra̍-kṣitam | vasu̍ | bi̱bha̱rṣi̱ | hasta̍yoḥ | aṣā̍ḻham | saha̍ḥ | ta̱nvi̍ | śru̱taḥ | da̱dhe̱ |
ā-vṛ̍tāsaḥ | a̱va̱tāsa̍ḥ | na | ka̱rtṛ-bhi̍ḥ | ta̱nūṣu̍ | te̱ | krata̍vaḥ | i̱ndra̱ | bhūra̍yaḥ |
e̱ṣaḥ | pra | pū̱rvīḥ | ava̍ | tasya̍ | ca̱mriṣa̍ḥ | atya̍ḥ | na | yoṣā̍m | ut | a̱ya̱ṁsta̱ | bhu̱rvaṇi̍ḥ |
dakṣa̍m | ma̱he | pā̱ya̱ya̱te̱ | hi̱ra̱ṇyaya̍m | ratha̍m | ā̱-vṛtya̍ | hari̍-yogam | ṛbhva̍sam |
tam | gū̱rtaya̍ḥ | ne̱ma̱n-iṣa̍ḥ | parī̍ṇasaḥ | sa̱mu̱dram | na | sa̱m-cara̍ṇe | sa̱ni̱ṣyava̍ḥ |
pati̍m | dakṣa̍sya | vi̱datha̍sya | nu | saha̍ḥ | gi̱rim | na | ve̱nāḥ | adhi̍ | ro̱ha̱ | teja̍sā |
saḥ | tu̱rvaṇi̍ḥ | ma̱hān | a̱re̱ṇu | pauṁsye̍ | gi̱reḥ | bhṛ̱ṣṭiḥ | na | bhrā̱ja̱te̱ | tu̱jā | śava̍ḥ |
yena̍ | śuṣṇa̍m | mā̱yina̍m | ā̱ya̱saḥ | made̍ | du̱dhraḥ | ā̱bhūṣu̍ | ra̱maya̍t | ni | dāma̍ni |
de̱vī | yadi̍ | tavi̍ṣī | tvā-vṛ̍dhā | ū̱taye̍ | indra̍m | sisa̍kti | u̱ṣasa̍m | na | sūrya̍ḥ |
yaḥ | dhṛ̱ṣṇunā̍ | śava̍sā | bādha̍te | tama̍ḥ | iya̍rti | re̱ṇum | bṛ̱hat | a̱rha̱ri̱-svani̍ḥ |
vi | yat | ti̱raḥ | dha̱ruṇa̍m | acyu̍tam | raja̍ḥ | ati̍sthipaḥ | di̱vaḥ | ātā̍su | ba̱rhaṇā̍ |
sva̍ḥ-mīḻhe | yat | made̍ | i̱ndra̱ | harṣyā̍ | aha̍n | vṛ̱tram | niḥ | a̱pām | au̱bja̱ḥ | a̱rṇa̱vam |
tvam | di̱vaḥ | dha̱ruṇa̍m | dhi̱ṣe̱ | oja̍sā | pṛ̱thi̱vyāḥ | i̱ndra̱ | sada̍neṣu | māhi̍naḥ |
tvam | su̱tasya̍ | made̍ | a̱ri̱ṇā̱ḥ | a̱paḥ | vi | vṛ̱trasya̍ | sa̱mayā̍ | pā̱ṣyā̍ | a̱ru̱ja̱ḥ |
pra | maṁhi̍ṣṭhāya | bṛ̱ha̱te | bṛ̱hat-ra̍ye | sa̱tya-śu̍ṣmāya | ta̱vase̍ | ma̱tim | bha̱re̱ |
a̱pām-i̍va | pra̱va̱ṇe | yasya̍ | du̱ḥ-dhara̍m | rādha̍ḥ | vi̱śva-ā̍yu | śava̍se | apa̍-vṛtam |
adha̍ | te̱ | viśva̍m | anu̍ | ha̱ | a̱sa̱t | i̱ṣṭaye̍ | āpa̍ḥ | ni̱mnā-i̍va | sava̍nā | ha̱viṣma̍taḥ |
yat | parva̍te | na | sa̱m-aśī̍ta | ha̱rya̱taḥ | indra̍sya | vajra̍ḥ | śnathi̍tā | hi̱ra̱ṇyaya̍ḥ |
a̱smai | bhī̱māya̍ | nama̍sā | sam | a̱dhva̱re | uṣa̍ḥ | na | śu̱bhre̱ | ā | bha̱ra̱ | panī̍yase |
yasya̍ | dhāma̍ | śrava̍se | nāma̍ | i̱ndri̱yam | jyoti̍ḥ | akā̍ri | ha̱rita̍ḥ | na | aya̍se |
i̱me | te̱ | i̱ndra̱ | te | va̱yam | pu̱ru̱-stu̱ta̱ | ye | tvā̱ | ā̱-rabhya̍ | carā̍masi | pra̱bhu̱va̱so̱ iti̍ prabhu-vaso |
na̱hi | tvat | a̱nyaḥ | gi̱rva̱ṇa̱ḥ | gira̍ḥ | sagha̍t | kṣo̱ṇīḥ-i̍va | prati̍ | na̱ḥ | ha̱rya̱ | tat | vaca̍ḥ |
bhūri̍ | te̱ | i̱ndra̱ | vī̱rya̍m | tava̍ | sma̱si̱ | a̱sya | sto̱tuḥ | ma̱gha-va̱n | kāma̍m | ā | pṛ̱ṇa̱ |
anu̍ | te̱ | dyauḥ | bṛ̱ha̱tī | vī̱rya̍m | ma̱me̱ | i̱yam | ca̱ | te̱ | pṛ̱thi̱vī | ne̱me̱ | oja̍se |
tvam | tam | i̱ndra̱ | parva̍tam | ma̱hām | u̱rum | vajre̍ṇa | va̱jri̱n | pa̱rva̱-śaḥ | ca̱ka̱rti̱tha̱ |
ava̍ | a̱sṛ̱ja̱ḥ | ni-vṛ̍tāḥ | sarta̱vai | a̱paḥ | sa̱trā | viśva̍m | da̱dhi̱ṣe̱ | keva̍lam | saha̍ḥ |
nu | ci̱t | sa̱ha̱ḥ-jāḥ | a̱mṛta̍ḥ | ni | tu̱nda̱te̱ | hotā̍ | yat | dū̱taḥ | abha̍vat | vi̱vasva̍taḥ |
vi | sādhi̍ṣṭhebhiḥ | pa̱thi-bhi̍ḥ | raja̍ḥ | ma̱me̱ | ā | de̱va-tā̍tā | ha̱viṣā̍ | vi̱vā̱sa̱ti̱ |
ā | svam | adma̍ | yu̱vamā̍naḥ | a̱jara̍ḥ | tṛ̱ṣu | a̱vi̱ṣyan | a̱ta̱seṣu̍ | ti̱ṣṭha̱ti̱ |
atya̍ḥ | na | pṛ̱ṣṭham | pru̱ṣi̱tasya̍ | ro̱ca̱te̱ | di̱vaḥ | na | sānu̍ | sta̱naya̍n | a̱ci̱kra̱da̱t |
krā̱ṇā | ru̱drebhi̍ḥ | vasu̍-bhiḥ | pu̱raḥ-hi̍taḥ | hotā̍ | ni-sa̍ttaḥ | ra̱yi̱ṣāṭ | ama̍rtyaḥ |
ratha̍ḥ | na | vi̱kṣu | ṛ̱ñja̱sā̱naḥ | ā̱yuṣu̍ | vi | ā̱nu̱ṣak | vāryā̍ | de̱vaḥ | ṛ̱ṇva̱ti̱ |
vi | vāta̍-jūtaḥ | a̱ta̱seṣu̍ | ti̱ṣṭha̱te̱ | vṛthā̍ | ju̱hūbhi̍ḥ | sṛṇyā̍ | tu̱vi̱-svaṇi̍ḥ |
tṛ̱ṣu | yat | a̱gne̱ | va̱nina̍ḥ | vṛ̱ṣa̱-yase̍ | kṛ̱ṣṇam | te̱ | ema̍ | ruśa̍t-ūrme | a̱ja̱ra̱ |
tapu̍ḥ-jambhaḥ | vane̍ | ā | vāta̍-coditaḥ | yū̱the | na | sā̱hvān | ava̍ | vā̱ti̱ | vaṁsa̍gaḥ |
a̱bhi̱-vraja̍n | akṣi̍tam | pāja̍sā | raja̍ḥ | sthā̱tuḥ | ca̱ratha̍m | bha̱ya̱te̱ | pa̱ta̱triṇa̍ḥ |
da̱dhuḥ | tvā̱ | bhṛga̍vaḥ | mānu̍ṣeṣu | ā | ra̱yim | na | cāru̍m | su̱-hava̍m | jane̍bhyaḥ |
hotā̍ram | a̱gne̱ | ati̍thim | vare̍ṇyam | mi̱tram | na | śeva̍m | di̱vyāya̍ | janma̍ne |
hotā̍ram | sa̱pta | ju̱hva̍ḥ | yaji̍ṣṭham | yam | vā̱ghata̍ḥ | vṛ̱ṇate̍ | a̱dhva̱reṣu̍ |
a̱gnim | viśve̍ṣām | a̱ra̱tim | vasū̍nām | sa̱pa̱ryāmi̍ | praya̍sā | yāmi̍ | ratna̍m |
acchi̍drā | sū̱no̱ iti̍ | sa̱ha̱sa̱ḥ | na̱ḥ | a̱dya | sto̱tṛ-bhya̍ḥ | mi̱tra̱-ma̱ha̱ḥ | śarma̍ | ya̱ccha̱ |
agne̍ | gṛ̱ṇanta̍m | aṁha̍saḥ | u̱ru̱ṣya̱ | ūrja̍ḥ | na̱pā̱t | pū̱ḥ-bhiḥ | āya̍sībhiḥ |
bhava̍ | varū̍tham | gṛ̱ṇa̱te | vi̱bhā̱-va̱ḥ | bhava̍ | ma̱gha̱-va̱n | ma̱ghava̍t-bhyaḥ | śarma̍ |
u̱ru̱ṣya | a̱gne̱ | aṁha̍saḥ | gṛ̱ṇanta̍m | prā̱taḥ | ma̱kṣu | dhi̱yā-va̍suḥ | ja̱ga̱myā̱t |
va̱yāḥ | it | a̱gne̱ | a̱gnaya̍ḥ | te̱ | a̱nye | tve iti̍ | viśve̍ | a̱mṛtā̍ḥ | mā̱da̱ya̱nte̱ |
vaiśvā̍nara | nābhi̍ḥ | a̱si̱ | kṣi̱tī̱nām | sthūṇā̍-iva | janā̍n | u̱pa̱-mit | ya̱ya̱ntha̱ |
mū̱rdhā | di̱vaḥ | nābhi̍ḥ | a̱gniḥ | pṛ̱thi̱vyāḥ | atha̍ | a̱bha̱va̱t | a̱ra̱tiḥ | roda̍syoḥ |
tam | tvā̱ | de̱vāsa̍ḥ | a̱ja̱na̱ya̱nta̱ | de̱vam | vaiśvā̍nara | jyoti̍ḥ | it | āryā̍ya |
ā | sūrye̍ | na | ra̱śmaya̍ḥ | dhru̱vāsa̍ḥ | vai̱śvā̱na̱re | da̱dhi̱re̱ | a̱gnā | vasū̍ni |
yā | parva̍teṣu | oṣa̍dhīṣu | a̱p-su | yā | mānu̍ṣeṣu | asi̍ | tasya̍ | rājā̍ |
bṛ̱ha̱tī i̱veti̍ bṛha̱tī-i̍va | sū̱nave̍ | roda̍sī̱ iti̍ | gira̍ḥ | hotā̍ | ma̱nu̱ṣya̍ḥ | na | dakṣa̍ḥ |
sva̍ḥ-vate | sa̱tya-śu̍ṣmāya | pū̱rvīḥ | vai̱śvā̱na̱rāya̍ | nṛ-ta̍māya | ya̱hvīḥ |
di̱vaḥ | ci̱t | te̱ | bṛ̱ha̱taḥ | jā̱ta̱-ve̱da̱ḥ | vaiśvā̍nara | pra | ri̱ri̱ce̱ | ma̱hi̱-tvam |
rājā̍ | kṛ̱ṣṭī̱nām | a̱si̱ | mānu̍ṣīṇām | yu̱dhā | de̱vebhya̍ḥ | vari̍vaḥ | ca̱ka̱rtha̱ |
pra | nu | ma̱hi̱-tvam | vṛ̱ṣa̱bhasya̍ | vo̱ca̱m | yam | pū̱rava̍ḥ | vṛ̱tra̱-hana̍m | saca̍nte |
vai̱śvā̱na̱raḥ | dasyu̍m | a̱gniḥ | ja̱gha̱nvān | adhū̍not | kāṣṭhā̍ḥ | ava̍ | śamba̍ram | bhe̱t |
vai̱śvā̱na̱raḥ | ma̱hi̱mnā | vi̱śva-kṛ̍ṣṭiḥ | bha̱rat-vā̍jeṣu | ya̱ja̱taḥ | vi̱bhā-vā̍ |
śā̱ta̱-va̱ne̱ye | śa̱tinī̍bhiḥ | a̱gniḥ | pu̱ru̱-nī̱the | ja̱ra̱te̱ | sū̱nṛtā̍-vān |
vahni̍m | ya̱śasa̍m | vi̱datha̍sya | ke̱tum | su̱pra̱-a̱vya̍m | dū̱tam | sa̱dyaḥ-a̍rtham |
dvi̱-janmā̍nam | ra̱yim-i̍va | pra̱-śa̱stam | rā̱tim | bha̱ra̱t | bhṛga̍ve | mā̱ta̱riśvā̍ |
a̱sya | śāsu̍ḥ | u̱bhayā̍saḥ | sa̱ca̱nte̱ | ha̱viṣma̍ntaḥ | u̱śija̍ḥ | ye | ca̱ | martā̍ḥ |
di̱vaḥ | ci̱t | pūrva̍ḥ | ni | a̱sā̱di̱ | hotā̍ | ā̱-pṛcchya̍ḥ | vi̱śpati̍ḥ | vi̱kṣu | ve̱dhāḥ |
tam | navya̍sī | hṛ̱daḥ | ā | jāya̍mānam | a̱smat | su̱-kī̱rtiḥ | madhu̍-jihvam | a̱śyā̱ḥ |
yam | ṛ̱tvija̍ḥ | vṛ̱jane̍ | mānu̍ṣāsaḥ | praya̍svantaḥ | ā̱yava̍ḥ | jīja̍nanta |
u̱śik | pā̱va̱kaḥ | vasu̍ḥ | mānu̍ṣeṣu | vare̍ṇyaḥ | hotā̍ | a̱dhā̱yi̱ | vi̱kṣu |
damū̍nāḥ | gṛ̱ha-pa̍tiḥ | dame̍ | ā | a̱gniḥ | bhu̱va̱t | ra̱yi̱-pati̍ḥ | ra̱yī̱ṇām |
tam | tvā̱ | va̱yam | pati̍m | a̱gne̱ | ra̱yī̱ṇām | pra | śa̱ṁsā̱ma̱ḥ | ma̱ti-bhi̍ḥ | gota̍māsaḥ |
ā̱śum | na | vā̱ja̱m-bha̱ram | ma̱rjaya̍ntaḥ | prā̱taḥ | ma̱kṣu | dhi̱yā-va̍suḥ | ja̱ga̱myā̱t |
a̱smai | it | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | pra | ta̱vase̍ | tu̱rāya̍ | praya̍ḥ | na | ha̱rmi̱ | stoma̍m | māhi̍nāya |
ṛcī̍ṣamāya | adhri̍-gave | oha̍m | indrā̍ya | brahmā̍ṇi | rā̱ta-ta̍mā |
a̱smai | it | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | praya̍ḥ-iva | pra | ya̱ṁsi̱ | bharā̍mi | ā̱ṅgū̱ṣam | bādhe̍ | su̱-vṛ̱kti |
indrā̍ya | hṛ̱dā | mana̍sā | ma̱nī̱ṣā | pra̱tnāya̍ | patye̍ | dhiya̍ḥ | ma̱rja̱ya̱nta̱ |
a̱smai | it | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | tyam | u̱pa̱-mam | sva̱ḥ-sām | bharā̍mi | ā̱ṅgū̱ṣam | ā̱sye̍na |
maṁhi̍ṣṭham | accho̍kti-bhiḥ | ma̱tī̱nām | su̱vṛ̱kti-bhi̍ḥ | sū̱rim | va̱vṛ̱dhadhyai̍ |
a̱smai | it | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | stoma̍m | sam | hi̱no̱mi̱ | ratha̍m | na | taṣṭā̍-iva | tat-si̍nāya |
gira̍ḥ | ca̱ | girvā̍hase | su̱-vṛ̱kti | indrā̍ya | vi̱śva̱m-i̱nvam | medhi̍rāya |
a̱smai | it | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | sapti̍m-iva | śra̱va̱syā | indrā̍ya | a̱rkam | ju̱hvā̍ | sam | a̱ñje̱ |
vī̱ram | dā̱na-o̍kasam | va̱ndadhyai̍ | pu̱rām | gū̱rta-śra̍vasam | da̱rmāṇa̍m |
a̱smai | it | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | tvaṣṭā̍ | ta̱kṣa̱t | vajra̍m | svapa̍ḥ-tamam | sva̱rya̍m | raṇā̍ya |
vṛ̱trasya̍ | ci̱t | vi̱dat | yena̍ | marma̍ | tu̱jan | īśā̍naḥ | tu̱ja̱tā | ki̱ye̱dhāḥ |
a̱sya | it | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | mā̱tuḥ | sava̍neṣu | sa̱dyaḥ | ma̱haḥ | pi̱tum | pa̱pi̱-vān | cāru̍ | annā̍ |
mu̱ṣā̱yat | viṣṇu̍ḥ | pa̱ca̱tam | sahī̍yān | vidhya̍t | va̱rā̱ham | ti̱raḥ | adri̍m | astā̍ |
a̱smai | it | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | gnāḥ | ci̱t | de̱va-pa̍tnīḥ | indrā̍ya | a̱rkam | a̱hi̱-hatye̍ | ū̱vu̱rityū̍vuḥ |
pari̍ | dyāvā̍pṛthi̱vī iti̍ | ja̱bhre̱ | u̱rvī iti̍ | na | a̱sya̱ | te iti̍ | ma̱hi̱māna̍m | pari̍ | sta̱ iti̍ staḥ |
a̱sya | it | e̱va | pra | ri̱ri̱ce̱ | ma̱hi̱-tvam | di̱vaḥ | pṛ̱thi̱vyāḥ | pari̍ | a̱ntari̍kṣāt |
sva̱-rāṭ | indra̍ḥ | dame̍ | ā | vi̱śva-gū̍rtaḥ | su̱-a̱riḥ | ama̍traḥ | va̱va̱kṣe̱ | raṇā̍ya |
a̱sya | it | e̱va | śava̍sā | śu̱ṣanta̍m | vi | vṛ̱śca̱t | vajre̍ṇa | vṛ̱tram | indra̍ḥ |
gāḥ | na | vrā̱ṇāḥ | a̱vanī̍ḥ | a̱mu̱ñca̱t | a̱bhi | śrava̍ḥ | dā̱vane̍ | sa-ce̍tāḥ |
a̱sya | it | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | tve̱ṣasā̍ | ra̱nta̱ | sindha̍vaḥ | pari̍ | yat | vajre̍ṇa | sī̱m | aya̍cchat |
ī̱śā̱na̱-kṛt | dā̱śuṣe̍ | da̱śa̱syan | tu̱rvīta̍ye | gā̱dham | tu̱rvaṇi̍ḥ | ka̱riti̍ kaḥ |
a̱smai | it | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | pra | bha̱ra̱ | tūtu̍jānaḥ | vṛ̱trāya̍ | vajra̍m | īśā̍naḥ | ki̱ye̱dhāḥ |
goḥ | na | parva̍ | vi | ra̱da̱ | ti̱ra̱ścā̍ | iṣya̍n | arṇā̍ṁsi | a̱pām | ca̱radhyai̍ |
a̱sya | it | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | pra | brū̱hi̱ | pū̱rvyāṇi̍ | tu̱rasya̍ | karmā̍ṇi | navya̍ḥ | u̱kthaiḥ |
yu̱dhe | yat | i̱ṣṇā̱naḥ | āyu̍dhāni | ṛ̱ghā̱yamā̍ṇaḥ | ni̱-ri̱ṇāti̍ | śatrū̍n |
a̱sya | it | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | bhi̱yā | gi̱raya̍ḥ | ca̱ | dṛ̱ḻhāḥ | dyāvā̍ | ca̱ | bhūma̍ | ja̱nuṣa̍ḥ | tu̱je̱te̱ iti̍ |
upo̱ iti̍ | ve̱nasya̍ | jogu̍vānaḥ | o̱ṇim | sa̱dyaḥ | bhu̱va̱t | vī̱ryā̍ya | no̱dhāḥ |
a̱smai | it | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | tyat | anu̍ | dā̱yi̱ | e̱ṣā̱m | eka̍ḥ | yat | va̱vne | bhūre̍ḥ | īśā̍naḥ |
pra | eta̍śam | sūrye̍ | pa̱spṛ̱dhā̱nam | sauva̍śvye | susvi̍m | ā̱va̱t | indra̍ḥ |
e̱va | te̱ | hā̱ri̱-yo̱ja̱na̱ | su̱-vṛ̱kti | indra̍ | brahmā̍ṇi | gota̍māsaḥ | a̱kra̱n |
ā | e̱ṣu̱ | vi̱śva-pe̍śasam | dhiya̍m | dhā̱ḥ | prā̱taḥ | ma̱kṣu | dhi̱yā-va̍suḥ | ja̱ga̱myā̱t |
pra | ma̱nma̱he̱ | śa̱va̱sā̱nāya̍ | śū̱ṣam | ā̱ṅgū̱ṣam | girva̍ṇase | a̱ṅgi̱ra̱svat |
su̱vṛ̱kti-bhi̍ḥ | stu̱va̱te | ṛ̱gmi̱yāya̍ | arcā̍ma | a̱rkam | nare̍ | vi-śru̍tāya |
pra | va̱ḥ | ma̱he | mahi̍ | nama̍ḥ | bha̱ra̱dhva̱m | ā̱ṅgū̱ṣya̍m | śa̱va̱sā̱nāya̍ | sāma̍ |
yena̍ | na̱ḥ | pūrve̍ | pi̱tara̍ḥ | pa̱da̱-jñāḥ | arca̍ntaḥ | aṅgi̍rasaḥ | gāḥ | avi̍ndan |
indra̍sya | aṅgi̍rasām | ca̱ | i̱ṣṭau | vi̱dat | sa̱ramā̍ | tana̍yāya | dhā̱sim |
bṛha̱spati̍ḥ | bhi̱nat | adri̍m | vi̱dat | gāḥ | sam | u̱sriyā̍bhiḥ | vā̱va̱śa̱nta̱ | nara̍ḥ |
saḥ | su̱-stubhā̍ | saḥ | stu̱bhā | sa̱pta | viprai̍ḥ | sva̱reṇa̍ | adri̍m | sva̱rya̍ḥ | nava̍-gvaiḥ |
sa̱ra̱ṇyu-bhi̍ḥ | pha̱li̱-gam | i̱ndra̱ | śa̱kra̱ | va̱lam | rave̍ṇa | da̱ra̱ya̱ḥ | daśa̍-gvaiḥ |
gṛ̱ṇā̱naḥ | aṅgi̍raḥ-bhiḥ | da̱sma̱ | vi | va̱ḥ | u̱ṣasā̍ | sūrye̍ṇa | gobhi̍ḥ | andha̍ḥ |
vi | bhūmyā̍ḥ | a̱pra̱tha̱ya̱ḥ | i̱ndra̱ | sānu̍ | di̱vaḥ | raja̍ḥ | upa̍ram | a̱sta̱bhā̱ya̱ḥ |
tat | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | praya̍kṣa-tamam | a̱sya̱ | karma̍ | da̱smasya̍ | cāru̍-tamam | a̱sti̱ | daṁsa̍ḥ |
u̱pa̱-hva̱re | yat | upa̍rāḥ | api̍nvat | madhu̍-arṇasaḥ | na̱dya̍ḥ | cata̍sraḥ |
dvi̱tā | vi | va̱vre̱ | sa̱-najā̍ | sanī̍ḻe̱ iti̱ sa-nī̍ḻe | a̱yāsya̍ḥ | stava̍mānebhiḥ | a̱rkaiḥ |
bhaga̍ḥ | na | mene̱ iti̍ | pa̱ra̱me | vi-o̍man | adhā̍rayat | roda̍sī̱ iti̍ | su̱-daṁsā̍ḥ |
sa̱nāt | diva̍m | pari̍ | bhūma̍ | virū̍pe̱ iti̱ vi-rū̍pe | pu̱na̱ḥ-bhuvā̍ | yu̱va̱tī iti̍ | svebhi̍ḥ | evai̍ḥ |
kṛ̱ṣṇebhi̍ḥ | a̱ktā | u̱ṣāḥ | ruśa̍t-bhiḥ | vapu̍ḥ-bhiḥ | ā | ca̱ra̱ta̱ḥ | a̱nyā-a̍nyā |
sane̍mi | sa̱khyam | su̱-a̱pa̱syamā̍naḥ | sū̱nuḥ | dā̱dhā̱ra̱ | śava̍sā | su̱-daṁsā̍ḥ |
ā̱māsu̍ | ci̱t | da̱dhi̱ṣe̱ | pa̱kvam | a̱ntariti̍ | paya̍ḥ | kṛ̱ṣṇāsu̍ | ruśa̍t | rohi̍ṇīṣu |
sa̱nāt | sa-nī̍ḻāḥ | a̱vanī̍ḥ | a̱vā̱tāḥ | vra̱tā | ra̱kṣa̱nte̱ | a̱mṛtā̍ḥ | saha̍ḥ-bhiḥ |
pu̱ru | sa̱hasrā̍ | jana̍yaḥ | na | patnī̍ḥ | du̱va̱syanti̍ | svasā̍raḥ | ahra̍yāṇam |
sa̱nā̱-yuva̍ḥ | nama̍sā | navya̍ḥ | a̱rkaiḥ | va̱su̱-yava̍ḥ | ma̱taya̍ḥ | da̱sma̱ | da̱dru̱ḥ |
pati̍m | na | patnī̍ḥ | u̱śa̱tīḥ | u̱śanta̍m | spṛ̱śanti̍ | tvā̱ | śa̱va̱sā̱-va̱n | ma̱nī̱ṣāḥ |
sa̱nāt | e̱va | tava̍ | rāya̍ḥ | gabha̍stau | na | kṣīya̍nte | na | upa̍ | da̱sya̱nti̱ | da̱sma̱ |
dyu̱-mān | a̱si̱ | kratu̍-mān | i̱ndra̱ | dhīra̍ḥ | śikṣa̍ | śa̱cī̱-va̱ḥ | tava̍ | na̱ḥ | śacī̍bhiḥ |
sa̱nā̱-ya̱te | gota̍maḥ | i̱ndra̱ | navya̍m | ata̍kṣat | brahma̍ | ha̱ri̱-yoja̍nāya |
su̱-nī̱thāya̍ | na̱ḥ | śa̱va̱sā̱na̱ | no̱dhāḥ | prā̱taḥ | ma̱kṣu | dhi̱yā-va̍suḥ | ja̱ga̱myā̱t |
tvam | ma̱hān | i̱ndra̱ | yaḥ | ha̱ | śuṣmai̍ḥ | dyāvā̍ | ja̱jñā̱naḥ | pṛ̱thi̱vī iti̍ | ame̍ | dhā̱ḥ |
yat | ha̱ | te̱ | viśvā̍ | gi̱raya̍ḥ | ci̱t | abhvā̍ | bhi̱yā | dṛ̱ḻhāsa̍ḥ | ki̱raṇā̍ḥ | na | aija̍n |
ā | yat | harī̱ iti̍ | i̱ndra̱ | vi-vra̍tā | veḥ | ā | te̱ | vajra̍m | ja̱ri̱tā | bā̱hvoḥ | dhā̱t |
yena̍ | a̱vi̱ha̱rya̱ta̱kra̱to̱ itya̍viharyata-krato | a̱mitrā̍n | pura̍ḥ | i̱ṣṇāsi̍ | pu̱ru̱-hū̱ta̱ | pū̱rvīḥ |
tvam | sa̱tyaḥ | i̱ndra̱ | dhṛ̱ṣṇuḥ | e̱tān | tvam | ṛ̱bhu̱kṣāḥ | narya̍ḥ | tvam | ṣāṭ |
tvam | śuṣṇa̍m | vṛ̱jane̍ | pṛ̱kṣe | ā̱ṇau | yūne̍ | kutsā̍ya | dyu̱-mate̍ | sacā̍ | a̱ha̱n |
tvam | ha̱ | tyat | i̱ndra̱ | co̱dī̱ḥ | sakhā̍ | vṛ̱tram | yat | va̱jri̱n | vṛ̱ṣa̱-ka̱rma̱n | u̱bhnāḥ |
yat | ha̱ | śū̱ra̱ | vṛ̱ṣa̱-ma̱na̱ḥ | pa̱rā̱caiḥ | vi | dasyū̍n | yonau̍ | akṛ̍taḥ | vṛ̱thā̱ṣāṭ |
tvam | ha̱ | tyat | i̱ndra̱ | ari̍ṣaṇyan | dṛ̱ḻhasya̍ | ci̱t | martā̍nām | aju̍ṣṭau |
vi | a̱smat | ā | kāṣṭhā̍ḥ | arva̍te | va̱ḥ | gha̱nā-i̍va | va̱jri̱n | śna̱thi̱hi̱ | a̱mitrā̍n |
tvām | ha̱ | tyat | i̱ndra̱ | arṇa̍-sātau | sva̍ḥ-mīḻhe | nara̍ḥ | ā̱jā | ha̱va̱nte̱ |
tava̍ | sva̱dhā̱-va̱ḥ | i̱yam | ā | sa̱-ma̱rye | ū̱tiḥ | vāje̍ṣu | a̱ta̱sāyyā̍ | bhū̱t |
tvam | ha̱ | tyat | i̱ndra̱ | sa̱pta | yudhya̍n | pura̍ḥ | va̱jri̱n | pu̱ru̱-kutsā̍ya | da̱rda̱riti̍ dardaḥ |
ba̱rhiḥ | na | yat | su̱-dāse̍ | vṛthā̍ | vark | a̱ṁhoḥ | rā̱ja̱n | vari̍vaḥ | pū̱rave̍ | ka̱ḥ |
tvam | tyām | na̱ḥ | i̱ndra̱ | de̱va̱ | ci̱trām | iṣa̍m | āpa̍ḥ | na | pī̱pa̱ya̱ḥ | pari̍-jman |
yayā̍ | śū̱ra̱ | prati̍ | a̱smabhya̍m | yaṁsi̍ | tmana̍m | ūrja̍m | na | vi̱śvadha̍ | kṣara̍dhyai |
akā̍ri | te̱ | i̱ndra̱ | gota̍mebhiḥ | brahmā̍ṇi | ā-u̍ktā | nama̍sā | hari̍-bhyām |
su̱-peśa̍sam | vāja̍m | ā | bha̱ra̱ | na̱ḥ | prā̱taḥ | ma̱kṣu | dhi̱yā-va̍suḥ | ja̱ga̱myā̱t |
vṛṣṇe̍ | śardhā̍ya | su-ma̍khāya | ve̱dhase̍ | nodha̍ḥ | su̱-vṛ̱ktim | pra | bha̱ra̱ | ma̱rut-bhya̍ḥ |
a̱paḥ | na | dhīra̍ḥ | mana̍sā | su̱-hastya̍ḥ | gira̍ḥ | sam | a̱ñje̱ | vi̱dathe̍ṣu | ā̱-bhuva̍ḥ |
te | ja̱jñi̱re̱ | di̱vaḥ | ṛ̱ṣvāsa̍ḥ | u̱kṣaṇa̍ḥ | ru̱drasya̍ | maryā̍ḥ | asu̍rāḥ | a̱re̱pasa̍ḥ |
pā̱va̱kāsa̍ḥ | śuca̍yaḥ | sūryā̍ḥ-iva | satvā̍naḥ | na | dra̱psina̍ḥ | gho̱ra-va̍rpasaḥ |
yuvā̍naḥ | ru̱drāḥ | a̱jarā̍ḥ | a̱bho̱k-hana̍ḥ | va̱va̱kṣuḥ | adhri̍-gāvaḥ | parva̍tāḥ-iva |
dṛ̱ḻhā | ci̱t | viśvā̍ | bhuva̍nāni | pārthi̍vā | pra | cya̱va̱ya̱nti̱ | di̱vyāni̍ | ma̱jmanā̍ |
ci̱traiḥ | a̱ñji-bhi̍ḥ | vapu̍ṣe | vi | a̱ñja̱te̱ | vakṣa̍ḥ-su | ru̱kmān | adhi̍ | ye̱ti̱re̱ | śu̱bhe |
aṁse̍ṣu | e̱ṣā̱m | ni | mi̱mṛ̱kṣu̱ḥ | ṛ̱ṣṭaya̍ḥ | sā̱kam | ja̱jñi̱re̱ | sva̱dhayā̍ | di̱vaḥ | nara̍ḥ |
ī̱śā̱na̱-kṛta̍ḥ | dhuna̍yaḥ | ri̱śāda̍saḥ | vātā̍n | vi̱-dyuta̍ḥ | tavi̍ṣībhiḥ | a̱kra̱ta̱ |
du̱hanti̍ | ūdha̍ḥ | di̱vyāni̍ | dhūta̍yaḥ | bhūmi̍m | pi̱nva̱nti̱ | paya̍sā | pari̍-jrayaḥ |
pinva̍nti | a̱paḥ | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | su̱-dāna̍vaḥ | paya̍ḥ | ghṛ̱ta-va̍t | vi̱dathe̍ṣu | ā̱-bhuva̍ḥ |
atya̍m | na | mi̱he | vi | na̱ya̱nti̱ | vā̱jina̍m | utsa̍m | du̱ha̱nti̱ | sta̱naya̍ntam | akṣi̍tam |
ma̱hi̱ṣāsa̍ḥ | mā̱yina̍ḥ | ci̱tra-bhā̍navaḥ | gi̱raya̍ḥ | na | sva-ta̍vasaḥ | ra̱ghu̱-syada̍ḥ |
mṛ̱gāḥ-i̍va | ha̱stina̍ḥ | khā̱da̱tha̱ | vanā̍ | yat | āru̍ṇīṣu | tavi̍ṣīḥ | ayu̍gdhvam |
si̱ṁhāḥ-i̍va | nā̱na̱da̱ti̱ | pra-ce̍tasaḥ | pi̱śāḥ-i̍va | su̱-piśa̍ḥ | vi̱śva-ve̍dasaḥ |
kṣapa̍ḥ | jinva̍ntaḥ | pṛṣa̍tībhiḥ | ṛ̱ṣṭi-bhi̍ḥ | sam | it | sa̱-bādha̱ḥ | śava̍sā | ahi̍-manyavaḥ |
roda̍sī̱ iti̍ | ā | va̱da̱ta̱ | ga̱ṇa̱-śri̱ya̱ḥ | nṛ-sā̍caḥ | śūrā̍ḥ | śava̍sā | ahi̍-manyavaḥ |
ā | va̱ndhure̍ṣu | a̱mati̍ḥ | na | da̱rśa̱tā | vi̱-dyut | na | ta̱sthau̱ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | rathe̍ṣu | va̱ḥ |
vi̱śva-ve̍dasaḥ | ra̱yi-bhi̍ḥ | sam-o̍kasaḥ | sam-mi̍ślāsaḥ | tavi̍ṣībhiḥ | vi̱-ra̱pśina̍ḥ |
astā̍raḥ | iṣu̍m | da̱dhi̱re̱ | gabha̍styoḥ | a̱na̱nta-śu̍ṣmāḥ | vṛṣa̍-khādayaḥ | nara̍ḥ |
hi̱ra̱ṇyaye̍bhiḥ | pa̱vi-bhi̍ḥ | pa̱ya̱ḥ-vṛdha̍ḥ | ut | ji̱ghna̱nte̱ | ā̱-pa̱thya̍ḥ | na | parva̍tān |
ma̱khāḥ | a̱yāsa̍ḥ | sva̱-sṛta̍ḥ | dhru̱va̱-cyuta̍ḥ | du̱dhra̱-kṛta̍ḥ | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | bhrāja̍t-ṛṣṭayaḥ |
ghṛṣu̍m | pā̱va̱kam | va̱nina̍m | vi-ca̍rṣaṇim | ru̱drasya̍ | sū̱num | ha̱vasā̍ | gṛ̱ṇī̱ma̱si̱ |
ra̱ja̱ḥ-tura̍m | ta̱vasa̍m | māru̍tam | ga̱ṇam | ṛ̱jī̱ṣiṇa̍m | vṛṣa̍ṇam | sa̱śca̱ta̱ | śri̱ye |
pra | nu | saḥ | marta̍ḥ | śava̍sā | janā̍n | ati̍ | ta̱sthau | va̱ḥ | ū̱tī | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | yam | āva̍ta |
arva̍t-bhiḥ | vāja̍m | bha̱ra̱te̱ | dhanā̍ | nṛ-bhi̍ḥ | ā̱-pṛcchya̍m | kratu̍m | ā | kṣe̱ti̱ | puṣya̍ti |
ca̱rkṛtya̍m | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | pṛ̱t-su | du̱stara̍m | dyu̱-manta̍m | śuṣma̍m | ma̱ghava̍t-su | dha̱tta̱na̱ |
dha̱na̱-spṛta̍m | u̱kthya̍m | vi̱śva-ca̍rṣaṇim | to̱kam | pu̱ṣye̱ma̱ | tana̍yam | śa̱tam | himā̍ḥ |
nu | sthi̱ram | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | vī̱ra-va̍ntam | ṛ̱ti̱-saha̍m | ra̱yim | a̱smāsu̍ | dha̱tta̱ |
sa̱ha̱sriṇa̍m | śa̱tina̍m | śū̱śu̱-vāṁsa̍m | prā̱taḥ | ma̱kṣu | dhi̱yā-va̍suḥ | ja̱ga̱myā̱t |
pa̱śvā | na | tā̱yum | guhā̍ | cata̍ntam | nama̍ḥ | yu̱jā̱nam | nama̍ḥ | vaha̍ntam |
sa̱-joṣā̍ḥ | dhīrā̍ḥ | pa̱daiḥ | anu̍ | gma̱n | upa̍ | tvā̱ | sī̱da̱n | viśve̍ | yaja̍trāḥ |
ṛ̱tasya̍ | de̱vāḥ | anu̍ | vra̱tā | gu̱ḥ | bhuva̍t | pari̍ṣṭiḥ | dyauḥ | na | bhūma̍ |
vardha̍nti | ī̱m | āpa̍ḥ | pa̱nvā | su-śi̍śvim | ṛ̱tasya̍ | yonā̍ | garbhe̍ | su-jā̍tam |
pu̱ṣṭiḥ | na | ra̱ṇvā | kṣi̱tiḥ | na | pṛ̱thvī | gi̱riḥ | na | bhujma̍ | kṣoda̍ḥ | na | śa̱m-bhu |
atya̍ḥ | na | ajma̍n | sarga̍-prataktaḥ | sindhu̍ḥ | na | kṣoda̍ḥ | kaḥ | i̱m | va̱rā̱te̱ |
jā̱miḥ | sindhū̍nām | bhrātā̍-iva | svasrā̍m | ibhyā̍n | na | rājā̍ | vanā̍ni | a̱tti̱ |
yat | vāta̍-jūtaḥ | vanā̍ | vi | asthā̍t | a̱gniḥ | ha̱ | dā̱ti̱ | roma̍ | pṛ̱thi̱vyāḥ |
śvasi̍ti | a̱p-su | ha̱ṁsaḥ | na | sīda̍n | kratvā̍ | ceti̍ṣṭhaḥ | vi̱śām | u̱ṣa̱ḥ-bhut |
soma̍ḥ | na | ve̱dhāḥ | ṛ̱ta-pra̍jātaḥ | pa̱śuḥ | na | śiśvā̍ | vi̱-bhuḥ | dū̱re-bhā̍ḥ |
ra̱yiḥ | na | ci̱trā | sūra̍ḥ | na | sa̱m-dṛk | āyu̍ḥ | na | prā̱ṇaḥ | nitya̍ḥ | na | sū̱nuḥ |
takvā̍ | na | bhūrṇi̍ḥ | vanā̍ | si̱sa̱kti̱ | paya̍ḥ | na | dhe̱nuḥ | śuci̍ḥ | vi̱bhā-vā̍ |
dā̱dhāra̍ | kṣema̍m | oka̍ḥ | na | ra̱ṇvaḥ | yava̍ḥ | na | pa̱kvaḥ | jetā̍ | janā̍nām |
ṛṣi̍ḥ | na | stubhvā̍ | vi̱kṣu | pra̱-śa̱staḥ | vā̱jī | na | prī̱taḥ | vaya̍ḥ | da̱dhā̱ti̱ |
du̱roka̍-śociḥ | kratu̍ḥ | na | nitya̍ḥ | jā̱yā-i̍va | yonau̍ | ara̍m | viśva̍smai |
ci̱traḥ | yat | abhrā̍ṭ | śve̱taḥ | na | vi̱kṣu | ratha̍ḥ | na | ru̱kmī | tve̱ṣaḥ | sa̱mat-su̍ |
senā̍-iva | sṛ̱ṣṭā | ama̍m | da̱dhā̱ti̱ | astu̍ḥ | na | di̱dyut | tve̱ṣa-pra̍tīkā |
ya̱maḥ | ha̱ | jā̱taḥ | ya̱maḥ | jani̍-tvam | jā̱raḥ | ka̱nīnā̍m | pati̍ḥ | janī̍nām |
tam | va̱ḥ | ca̱rāthā̍ | va̱yam | va̱sa̱tyā | asta̍m | na | gāva̍ḥ | nakṣa̍nte | i̱ddham |
sindhu̍ḥ | na | kṣoda̍ḥ | pra | nīcī̍ḥ | ai̱no̱t | nava̍nta | gāva̍ḥ | sva̍ḥ | dṛśī̍ke |
vane̍ṣu | jā̱yuḥ | marte̍ṣu | mi̱traḥ | vṛ̱ṇī̱te̱ | śru̱ṣṭim | rājā̍-iva | a̱ju̱ryam |
kṣema̍ḥ | na | sā̱dhuḥ | kratu̍ḥ | na | bha̱draḥ | bhuva̍t | su̱-ā̱dhīḥ | hotā̍ | ha̱vya̱-vāṭ |
haste̍ | dadhā̍naḥ | nṛ̱mṇā | viśvā̍ni | ame̍ | de̱vān | dhā̱t | guhā̍ | ni̱-sīda̍n |
vi̱danti̍ | ī̱m | atra̍ | nara̍ḥ | dhi̱ya̱m-dhāḥ | hṛ̱dā | yat | ta̱ṣṭān | mantrā̍n | aśa̍ṁsan |
a̱jaḥ | na | kṣām | dā̱dhāra̍ | pṛ̱thi̱vīm | ta̱stambha̍ | dyām | mantre̍bhiḥ | sa̱tyaiḥ |
pri̱yā | pa̱dāni̍ | pa̱śvaḥ | ni | pā̱hi̱ | vi̱śva-ā̍yuḥ | a̱gne̱ | gu̱hā | guha̍m | gā̱ḥ |
yaḥ | ī̱m | ci̱keta̍ | guhā̍ | bhava̍ntam | ā | yaḥ | sa̱sāda̍ | dhārā̍m | ṛ̱tasya̍ |
vi | ye | cṛ̱tanti̍ | ṛ̱tā | sapa̍ntaḥ | āt | it | vasū̍ni | pra | va̱vā̱ca̱ | a̱smai̱ |
vi | yaḥ | vī̱rut-su̍ | rodha̍t | ma̱hi̱-tvā | u̱ta | pra̱-jāḥ | u̱ta | pra̱-sūṣu̍ | a̱ntariti̍ |
citti̍ḥ | a̱pām | dame̍ | vi̱śva-ā̍yuḥ | sadma̍-iva | dhīrā̍ḥ | sa̱m-māya̍ | ca̱kru̱ḥ |
śrī̱ṇan | upa̍ | sthā̱t | diva̍m | bhu̱ra̱ṇyuḥ | sthā̱tuḥ | ca̱ratha̍m | a̱ktūn | vi | ū̱rṇo̱t |
pari̍ | yat | e̱ṣā̱m | eka̍ḥ | viśve̍ṣām | bhuva̍t | de̱vaḥ | de̱vānā̍m | ma̱hi̱-tvā |
āt | it | te̱ | viśve̍ | kratu̍m | ju̱ṣa̱nta̱ | śuṣkā̍t | yat | de̱va̱ | jī̱vaḥ | jani̍ṣṭhāḥ |
bhaja̍nta | viśve̍ | de̱va̱-tvam | nāma̍ | ṛ̱tam | sapa̍ntaḥ | a̱mṛta̍m | evai̍ḥ |
ṛ̱tasya̍ | preṣā̍ḥ | ṛ̱tasya̍ | dhī̱tiḥ | vi̱śva-ā̍yuḥ | viśve̍ | apā̍ṁsi | ca̱kru̱ḥ |
yaḥ | tubhya̍m | dāśā̍t | yaḥ | vā̱ | te̱ | śikṣā̍t | tasmai̍ | ci̱ki̱tvān | ra̱yim | da̱ya̱sva̱ |
hotā̍ | ni-sa̍ttaḥ | mano̍ḥ | apa̍tye | saḥ | ci̱t | nu | ā̱sā̱m | pati̍ḥ | ra̱yī̱ṇām |
i̱cchanta̍ | reta̍ḥ | mi̱thaḥ | ta̱nūṣu̍ | sam | jā̱na̱ta̱ | svaiḥ | dakṣai̍ḥ | amū̍rāḥ |
pi̱tuḥ | na | pu̱trāḥ | kratu̍m | ju̱ṣa̱nta̱ | śroṣa̍n | ye | a̱sya̱ | śāsa̍m | tu̱rāsa̍ḥ |
vi | rāya̍ḥ | au̱rṇo̱t | dura̍ḥ | pu̱ru̱-kṣuḥ | pi̱peśa̍ | nāka̍m | stṛ-bhi̍ḥ | damū̍nāḥ |
śu̱kraḥ | śu̱śu̱kvān | u̱ṣaḥ | na | jā̱raḥ | pa̱prā | sa̱mī̱cī iti̍ sa̱m-ī̱cī | di̱vaḥ | na | jyoti̍ḥ |
pari̍ | pra-jā̍taḥ | kratvā̍ | ba̱bhū̱tha̱ | bhuva̍ḥ | de̱vānā̍m | pi̱tā | pu̱traḥ | san |
ve̱dhāḥ | adṛ̍ptaḥ | a̱gniḥ | vi̱-jā̱nan | ūdha̍ḥ | na | gonā̍m | svādma̍ | pi̱tū̱nām |
jane̍ | na | śeva̍ḥ | ā̱-hūrya̍ḥ | san | madhye̍ | ni-sa̍ttaḥ | ra̱ṇvaḥ | du̱ro̱ṇe |
pu̱traḥ | na | jā̱taḥ | ra̱ṇvaḥ | du̱ro̱ṇe | vā̱jī | na | prī̱taḥ | viśa̍ḥ | vi | tā̱rī̱t |
viśa̍ḥ | yat | ahve̍ | nṛ-bhi̍ḥ | sa-nī̍ḻāḥ | a̱gniḥ | de̱va̱-tvā | viśvā̍ni | a̱śyā̱ḥ |
naki̍ḥ | te̱ | e̱tā | vra̱tā | mi̱na̱nti̱ | nṛ-bhya̍ḥ | yat | e̱bhyaḥ | śru̱ṣṭim | ca̱kartha̍ |
tat | tu | te̱ | daṁsa̍ḥ | yat | aha̍n | sa̱mā̱naiḥ | nṛ-bhi̍ḥ | yat | yu̱ktaḥ | vi̱veḥ | rapā̍ṁsi |
u̱ṣaḥ | na | jā̱raḥ | vi̱bhā-vā̍ | u̱sraḥ | sañjñā̍ta-rūpaḥ | cike̍tat | a̱smai̱ |
tmanā̍ | vaha̍ntaḥ | dura̍ḥ | vi | ṛ̱ṇva̱n | nava̍nta | viśve̍ | sva̍ḥ | dṛśī̍ke |
va̱nema̍ | pū̱rvīḥ | a̱ryaḥ | ma̱nī̱ṣā | a̱gniḥ | su̱-śoka̍ḥ | viśvā̍ni | a̱śyā̱ḥ |
ā | daivyā̍ni | vra̱tā | ci̱ki̱tvān | ā | mānu̍ṣasya | jana̍sya | janma̍ |
garbha̍ḥ | yaḥ | a̱pām | garbha̍ḥ | vanā̍nām | garbha̍ḥ | ca̱ | sthā̱tām | garbha̍ḥ | ca̱rathā̍m |
adrau̍ | ci̱t | a̱smai̱ | a̱ntaḥ | du̱ro̱ṇe | vi̱śām | na | viśva̍ḥ | a̱mṛta̍ḥ | su̱-ā̱dhīḥ |
saḥ | hi | kṣa̱pā-vā̍n | a̱gniḥ | ra̱yī̱ṇām | dāśa̍t | yaḥ | a̱smai̱ | ara̍m | su̱-u̱ktaiḥ |
e̱tā | ci̱ki̱tva̱ḥ | bhūma̱ | ni | pā̱hi̱ | de̱vānā̍m | janma̍ | martā̍n | ca̱ | vi̱dvān |
vardhā̍n | yam | pū̱rvīḥ | kṣa̱paḥ | vi-rū̍pāḥ | sthā̱tuḥ | ca̱ | ratha̍m | ṛ̱ta-pra̍vītam |
arā̍dhi | hotā̍ | sva̍ḥ | ni-sa̍ttaḥ | kṛ̱ṇvan | viśvā̍ni | apā̍ṁsi | sa̱tyā |
goṣu̍ | pra-śa̍stim | vane̍ṣu | dhi̱ṣe̱ | bhara̍nta | viśve̍ | ba̱lim | sva̍ḥ | na̱ḥ |
vi | tvā̱ | nara̍ḥ | pu̱ru̱-trā | sa̱pa̱rya̱n | pi̱tuḥ | na | jivre̍ḥ | vi | veda̍ḥ | bha̱ra̱nta̱ |
sā̱dhuḥ | na | gṛ̱dhnuḥ | astā̍-iva | śūra̍ḥ | yātā̍-iva | bhī̱maḥ | tve̱ṣaḥ | sa̱mat-su̍ |
upa̍ | pra | ji̱nva̱n | u̱śa̱tīḥ | u̱śanta̍m | pati̍m | na | nitya̍m | jana̍yaḥ | sa-nī̍ḻāḥ |
svasā̍raḥ | śyāvī̍m | aru̍ṣīm | a̱ju̱ṣra̱n | ci̱tram | u̱cchantī̍m | u̱ṣasa̍m | na | gāva̍ḥ |
vī̱ḻu | ci̱t | dṛ̱ḻhā | pi̱tara̍ḥ | na̱ḥ | u̱kthaiḥ | adri̍m | ru̱ja̱n | aṅgi̍rasaḥ | rave̍ṇa |
ca̱kruḥ | di̱vaḥ | bṛ̱ha̱taḥ | gā̱tum | a̱sme iti̍ | aha̱riti̍ | sva̍ḥ | vi̱vi̱du̱ḥ | ke̱tum | u̱srāḥ |
dadha̍n | ṛ̱tam | dha̱naya̍n | a̱sya̱ | dhī̱tim | āt | it | a̱ryaḥ | da̱dhi̱ṣva̍ḥ | vi-bhṛ̍trāḥ |
atṛ̍ṣyantīḥ | a̱pasa̍ḥ | ya̱nti̱ | accha̍ | de̱vān | janma̍ | praya̍sā | va̱rdhaya̍ntīḥ |
mathī̍t | yat | ī̱m | vi-bhṛ̍taḥ | mā̱ta̱riśvā̍ | gṛ̱he-gṛ̍he | śye̱taḥ | jenya̍ḥ | bhūt |
āt | ī̱m | rājñe̍ | na | sahī̍yase | sacā̍ | san | ā | dū̱tya̍m | bhṛga̍vāṇaḥ | vi̱vā̱ya̱ |
ma̱he | yat | pi̱tre | ī̱m | rasa̍m | di̱ve | kaḥ | ava̍ | tsa̱ra̱t | pṛ̱śa̱nya̍ḥ | ci̱ki̱tvān |
sṛ̱jat | astā̍ | dhṛ̱ṣa̱tā | di̱dyum | a̱smai̱ | svāyā̍m | de̱vaḥ | du̱hi̱tari̍ | tviṣi̍m | dhā̱t |
sve | ā | yaḥ | tubhya̍m | dame̍ | ā | vi̱-bhāti̍ | nama̍ḥ | vā̱ | dāśā̍t | u̱śa̱taḥ | anu̍ | dyūn |
vardho̱ iti̍ | a̱gne̱ | vaya̍ḥ | a̱sya̱ | dvi̱-barhā̍ḥ | yāsa̍t | rā̱yā | sa̱-ratha̍m | yam | ju̱nāsi̍ |
a̱gnim | viśvā̍ḥ | a̱bhi | pṛkṣa̍ḥ | sa̱ca̱nte̱ | sa̱mu̱dram | na | sra̱vata̍ḥ | sa̱pta | ya̱hvīḥ |
na | jā̱mi-bhi̍ḥ | vi | ci̱ki̱te̱ | vaya̍ḥ | na̱ḥ | vi̱dāḥ | de̱veṣu̍ | pra-ma̍tim | ci̱ki̱tvān |
ā | yat | i̱ṣe | nṛ̱-pati̍m | teja̍ḥ | āna̍ṭ | śuci̍ | reta̍ḥ | ni-si̍ktam | dyauḥ | a̱bhīke̍ |
a̱gniḥ | śardha̍m | a̱na̱va̱dyam | yuvā̍nam | su̱-ā̱dhya̍m | ja̱na̱ya̱t | sū̱daya̍t | ca̱ |
mana̍ḥ | na | yaḥ | adhva̍naḥ | sa̱dyaḥ | eti̍ | eka̍ḥ | sa̱trā | sūra̍ḥ | vasva̍ḥ | ī̱śe̱ |
rājā̍nā | mi̱trāvaru̍ṇā | su̱pā̱ṇī iti̍ su̱-pā̱ṇī | goṣu̍ | pri̱yam | a̱mṛta̍m | rakṣa̍māṇā |
mā | na̱ḥ | a̱gne̱ | sa̱khyā | pitryā̍ṇi | pra | ma̱rṣi̱ṣṭhā̱ḥ | a̱bhi | vi̱duḥ | ka̱viḥ | san |
nabha̍ḥ | na | rū̱pam | ja̱ri̱mā | mi̱nā̱ti̱ | pu̱rā | tasyā̍ḥ | a̱bhi-śa̍steḥ | adhi̍ | i̱hi̱ |
ni | kāvyā̍ | ve̱dhasa̍ḥ | śaśva̍taḥ | ka̱ḥ | haste̍ | dadhā̍naḥ | naryā̍ | pu̱rūṇi̍ |
a̱gniḥ | bhu̱va̱t | ra̱yi̱-pati̍ḥ | ra̱yī̱ṇām | sa̱trā | ca̱krā̱ṇaḥ | a̱mṛtā̍ni | viśvā̍ |
a̱sme iti̍ | va̱tsam | pari̍ | santa̍m | na | vi̱nda̱n | i̱cchanta̍ḥ | viśve̍ | a̱mṛtā̍ḥ | amū̍rāḥ |
śra̱ma̱-yuva̍ḥ | pa̱da̱-vya̍ḥ | dhi̱ya̱m-dhāḥ | ta̱sthuḥ | pa̱de | pa̱ra̱me | cāru̍ | a̱gneḥ |
ti̱sraḥ | yat | a̱gne̱ | śa̱rada̍ḥ | tvām | it | śuci̍m | ghṛ̱tena̍ | śuca̍yaḥ | sa̱pa̱ryān |
nāmā̍ni | ci̱t | da̱dhi̱re̱ | ya̱jñiyā̍ni | asū̍dayanta | ta̱nva̍ḥ | su-jā̍tāḥ |
ā | roda̍sī̱ iti̍ | bṛ̱ha̱tī iti̍ | vevi̍dānā̍ḥ | pra | ru̱driyā̍ | ja̱bhri̱re̱ | ya̱jñiyā̍saḥ |
vi̱dat | marta̍ḥ | ne̱ma-dhi̍tā | ci̱ki̱tvān | a̱gnim | pa̱de | pa̱ra̱me | ta̱sthi̱-vāṁsa̍m |
sa̱m-jā̱nā̱nāḥ | upa̍ | sī̱da̱n | a̱bhi̱-jñu | patnī̍-vantaḥ | na̱ma̱sya̍m | na̱ma̱sya̱nniti̍ namasyan |
ri̱ri̱kvāṁsa̍ḥ | ta̱nva̍ḥ | kṛ̱ṇva̱ta̱ | svāḥ | sakhā̍ | sakhyu̍ḥ | ni̱-miṣi̍ | rakṣa̍māṇāḥ |
triḥ | sa̱pta | yat | guhyā̍ni | tve iti̍ | it | pa̱dā | a̱vi̱da̱n | ni-hi̍tā | ya̱jñiyā̍saḥ |
tebhi̍ḥ | ra̱kṣa̱nte̱ | a̱mṛta̍m | sa̱-joṣā̍ḥ | pa̱śūn | ca̱ | sthā̱tṝn | ca̱ratha̍m | ca̱ | pā̱hi̱ |
vi̱dvān | a̱gne̱ | va̱yunā̍ni | kṣi̱tī̱nām | vi | ā̱nu̱ṣak | śu̱rudha̍ḥ | jī̱vase̍ | dhā̱ḥ |
a̱nta̱ḥ-vi̱dvān | adhva̍naḥ | de̱va̱-yānā̍n | ata̍ndraḥ | dū̱taḥ | a̱bha̱va̱ḥ | ha̱vi̱ḥ-vāṭ |
su̱-ā̱dhya̍ḥ | di̱vaḥ | ā | sa̱pta | ya̱hvīḥ | rā̱yaḥ | dura̍ḥ | vi | ṛ̱ta̱-jñāḥ | a̱jā̱na̱n |
vi̱dat | gavya̍m | sa̱ramā̍ | dṛ̱ḻham | ū̱rvam | yena̍ | nu | ka̱m | mānu̍ṣī | bhoja̍te | viṭ |
ā | ye | viśvā̍ | su̱-a̱pa̱tyāni̍ | ta̱sthuḥ | kṛ̱ṇvā̱nāsa̍ḥ | a̱mṛ̱ta̱-tvāya̍ | gā̱tum |
ma̱hnā | ma̱hat-bhi̍ḥ | pṛ̱thi̱vī | vi | ta̱sthe̱ | mā̱tā | pu̱traiḥ | adi̍tiḥ | dhāya̍se | veriti̱ veḥ |
adhi̍ | śriya̍m | ni | da̱dhu̱ḥ | cāru̍m | a̱smi̱n | di̱vaḥ | yat | a̱kṣī iti̍ | a̱mṛtā̍ḥ | akṛ̍ṇvan |
adha̍ | kṣa̱ra̱nti̱ | sindha̍vaḥ | na | sṛ̱ṣṭāḥ | pra | nīcī̍ḥ | a̱gne̱ | aru̍ṣīḥ | a̱jā̱na̱n |
ra̱yiḥ | na | yaḥ | pi̱tṛ̱-vi̱ttaḥ | va̱ya̱ḥ-dhāḥ | su̱-pranī̍tiḥ | ci̱ki̱tuṣa̍ḥ | na | śāsu̍ḥ |
syo̱na̱-śīḥ | ati̍thiḥ | na | prī̱ṇā̱naḥ | hotā̍-iva | sadma̍ | vi̱dha̱taḥ | vi | tā̱rī̱t |
de̱vaḥ | na | yaḥ | sa̱vi̱tā | sa̱tya-ma̍nmā | kratvā̍ | ni̱-pāti̍ | vṛ̱janā̍ni | viśvā̍ |
pu̱ru̱-pra̱śa̱staḥ | a̱mati̍ḥ | na | sa̱tyaḥ | ā̱tmā-i̍va | śeva̍ḥ | di̱dhi̱ṣāyya̍ḥ | bhū̱t |
de̱vaḥ | na | yaḥ | pṛ̱thi̱vīm | vi̱śva-dhā̍yāḥ | u̱pa̱-kṣeti̍ | hi̱ta-mi̍traḥ | na | rājā̍ |
pu̱ra̱ḥ-sada̍ḥ | śa̱rma̱-sada̍ḥ | na | vī̱rāḥ | a̱na̱va̱dyā | pati̍juṣṭā-iva | nārī̍ |
tam | tvā̱ | nara̍ḥ | dame̍ | ā | nitya̍m | i̱ddham | agne̍ | saca̍nta | kṣi̱tiṣu̍ | dhru̱vāsu̍ |
adhi̍ | dyu̱mnam | ni | da̱dhu̱ḥ | bhūri̍ | a̱smi̱n | bhava̍ | vi̱śva-ā̍yuḥ | dha̱ruṇa̍ḥ | ra̱yī̱ṇām |
vi | pṛkṣa̍ḥ | a̱gne̱ | ma̱gha-vā̍naḥ | a̱śyu̱ḥ | vi | sū̱raya̍ḥ | dada̍taḥ | viśva̍m | āyu̍ḥ |
sa̱nema̍ | vāja̍m | sa̱m-i̱theṣu̍ | a̱ryaḥ | bhā̱gam | de̱veṣu̍ | śrava̍se | dadhā̍nāḥ |
ṛ̱tasya̍ | hi | dhe̱nava̍ḥ | vā̱va̱śā̱nāḥ | smat-ū̍dhnīḥ | pī̱paya̍nta | dyu-bha̍ktāḥ |
pa̱rā̱-vata̍ḥ | su̱-ma̱tim | bhikṣa̍māṇāḥ | vi | sindha̍vaḥ | sa̱mayā̍ | sa̱sru̱ḥ | adri̍m |
tve iti̍ | a̱gne̱ | su̱-ma̱tim | bhikṣa̍māṇāḥ | di̱vi | śrava̍ḥ | da̱dhi̱re̱ | ya̱jñiyā̍saḥ |
naktā̍ | ca̱ | ca̱kruḥ | u̱ṣasā̍ | virū̍pe̱ iti̱ vi-rū̍pe | kṛ̱ṣṇam | ca̱ | varṇa̍m | a̱ru̱ṇam | ca̱ | sam | dhu̱riti̍ dhuḥ |
yān | rā̱ye | martā̍n | susū̍daḥ | a̱gne̱ | te | syā̱ma̱ | ma̱gha-vā̍naḥ | va̱yam | ca̱ |
chā̱yā-i̍va | viśva̍m | bhuva̍nam | si̱sa̱kṣi̱ | ā̱pa̱pri̱-vān | roda̍sī̱ iti̍ | a̱ntari̍kṣam |
arva̍t-bhiḥ | a̱gne̱ | arva̍taḥ | nṛ-bhi̍ḥ | nṝn | vī̱raiḥ | vī̱rān | va̱nu̱yā̱ma̱ | tvā-ū̍tāḥ |
ī̱śā̱nāsa̍ḥ | pi̱tṛ̱-vi̱ttasya̍ | rā̱yaḥ | vi | sū̱raya̍ḥ | śa̱ta-hi̍māḥ | na̱ḥ | a̱śyu̱ḥ |
e̱tā | te̱ | a̱gne̱ | u̱cathā̍ni | ve̱dha̱ḥ | juṣṭā̍ni | sa̱ntu̱ | mana̍se | hṛ̱de | ca̱ |
śa̱kema̍ | rā̱yaḥ | su̱-dhura̍ḥ | yama̍m | te̱ | adhi̍ | śrava̍ḥ | de̱va-bha̍ktam | dadhā̍nāḥ |
u̱pa̱-pra̱yanta̍ḥ | a̱dhva̱ram | mantra̍m | vo̱ce̱ma̱ | a̱gnaye̍ |
ā̱re | a̱sme iti̍ | ca̱ | śṛ̱ṇva̱te |
yaḥ | snīhi̍tīṣu | pū̱rvyaḥ | sa̱m-ja̱gmā̱nāsu̍ | kṛ̱ṣṭiṣu̍ |
ara̍kṣat | dā̱śuṣe̍ | gaya̍m |
u̱ta | bru̱va̱ntu̱ | ja̱ntava̍ḥ | ut | a̱gniḥ | vṛ̱tra̱-hā | a̱ja̱ni̱ |
dha̱na̱m-ja̱yaḥ | raṇe̍-raṇe |
yasya̍ | dū̱taḥ | asi̍ | kṣaye̍ | veṣi̍ | ha̱vyāni̍ | vī̱taye̍ |
da̱smat | kṛ̱ṇoṣi̍ | a̱dhva̱ram |
tam | it | su̱-ha̱vyam | a̱ṅgi̱ra̱ḥ | su̱-de̱vam | sa̱ha̱sa̱ḥ | ya̱ho̱ iti̍ |
janā̍ḥ | ā̱hu̱ḥ | su̱-ba̱rhiṣa̍m |
ā | ca̱ | vahā̍si | tān | i̱ha | de̱vān | upa̍ | pra-śa̍staye |
ha̱vyā | su̱-ca̱ndra̱ | vī̱taye̍ |
na | yoḥ | u̱pa̱bdiḥ | aśvya̍ḥ | śṛ̱ṇve | ratha̍sya | kat | ca̱na |
yat | a̱gne̱ | yāsi̍ | dū̱tya̍m |
tvā-ū̍taḥ | vā̱jī | ahra̍yaḥ | a̱bhi | pūrva̍smāt | apa̍raḥ |
pra | dā̱śvān | a̱gne̱ | a̱sthā̱t |
u̱ta | dyu̱-mat | su̱-vīrya̍m | bṛ̱hat | a̱gne̱ | vi̱vā̱sa̱si̱ |
de̱vebhya̍ḥ | de̱va̱ | dā̱śuṣe̍ |
ju̱ṣasva̍ | sa̱pratha̍ḥ-tamam | vaca̍ḥ | de̱vapsa̍raḥ-tamam |
ha̱vyā | juhvā̍naḥ | ā̱sani̍ |
atha̍ | te̱ | a̱ṅgi̱ra̱ḥ-ta̱ma̱ | agne̍ | ve̱dha̱ḥ-ta̱ma̱ | pri̱yam |
vo̱cema̍ | brahma̍ | sā̱na̱si |
kaḥ | te̱ | jā̱miḥ | janā̍nām | agne̍ | kaḥ | dā̱śu-a̍dhvaraḥ |
kaḥ | ha̱ | kasmi̍n | a̱si̱ | śri̱taḥ |
tvam | jā̱miḥ | janā̍nām | agne̍ | mi̱traḥ | a̱si̱ | pri̱yaḥ |
sakhā̍ | sakhi̍-bhyaḥ | īḍya̍ḥ |
yaja̍ | na̱ḥ | mi̱trāvaru̍ṇā | yaja̍ | de̱vān | ṛ̱tam | bṛ̱hat |
agne̍ | yakṣi̍ | svam | dama̍m |
kā | te̱ | upa̍-itiḥ | mana̍saḥ | varā̍ya | bhuva̍t | a̱gne̱ | śam-ta̍mā | kā | ma̱nī̱ṣā |
kaḥ | vā̱ | ya̱jñaiḥ | pari̍ | dakṣa̍m | te̱ | ā̱pa̱ | kena̍ | vā̱ | te̱ | mana̍sā | dā̱śe̱ma̱ |
ā | i̱hi̱ | a̱gne̱ | i̱ha | hotā̍ | ni | sī̱da̱ | ada̍bdhaḥ | su | pu̱ra̱ḥ-e̱tā | bha̱va̱ | na̱ḥ |
ava̍tām | tvā̱ | roda̍sī̱ iti̍ | vi̱śva̱mi̱nve iti̍ vi̱śva̱m-i̱nve | yaja̍ | ma̱he | sau̱ma̱na̱sāya̍ | de̱vān |
pra | su | viśvā̍n | ra̱kṣasa̍ḥ | dhakṣi̍ | a̱gne̱ | bhava̍ | ya̱jñānā̍m | a̱bhi̱śa̱sti̱-pāvā̍ |
atha̍ | ā | va̱ha̱ | soma̍-patim | hari̍-bhyām | ā̱ti̱thyam | a̱smai̱ | ca̱kṛ̱ma̱ | su̱-dāvne̍ |
pra̱jā-va̍tā | vaca̍sā | vahni̍ḥ | ā̱sā | ā | ca̱ | hu̱ve | ni | ca̱ | sa̱tsi̱ | i̱ha | de̱vaiḥ |
veṣi̍ | ho̱tram | u̱ta | po̱tram | ya̱ja̱tra̱ | bo̱dhi | pra̱-ya̱nta̱ḥ | ja̱ni̱ta̱ḥ | vasū̍nām |
yathā̍ | vipra̍sya | manu̍ṣaḥ | ha̱viḥ-bhi̍ḥ | de̱vān | aya̍jaḥ | ka̱vi-bhi̍ḥ | ka̱viḥ | san |
e̱va | ho̱ta̱riti̍ | sa̱tya̱-ta̱ra̱ | tvam | a̱dya | agne̍ | ma̱ndrayā̍ | ju̱hvā̍ | ya̱ja̱sva̱ |
ka̱thā | dā̱śe̱ma̱ | a̱gnaye̍ | kā | a̱smai̱ | de̱va-ju̍ṣṭā | u̱cya̱te̱ | bhā̱mine̍ | gīḥ |
yaḥ | martye̍ṣu | a̱mṛta̍ḥ | ṛ̱ta-vā̍ | hotā̍ | yaji̍ṣṭhaḥ | it | kṛ̱ṇoti̍ | de̱vān |
yaḥ | a̱dhva̱reṣu̍ | śam-ta̍maḥ | ṛ̱ta-vā̍ | hotā̍ | tam | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | nama̍ḥ-bhiḥ | ā | kṛ̱ṇu̱dhva̱m |
a̱gniḥ | yat | veḥ | martā̍ya | de̱vān | saḥ | ca̱ | bodhā̍ti | mana̍sā | ya̱jā̱ti̱ |
saḥ | hi | kratu̍ḥ | saḥ | marya̍ḥ | saḥ | sā̱dhuḥ | mi̱traḥ | na | bhū̱t | adbhu̍tasya | ra̱thīḥ |
tam | medhe̍ṣu | pra̱tha̱mam | de̱va̱-yant̍īḥ | viśa̍ḥ | upa̍ | bru̱va̱te̱ | da̱smam | ārī̍ḥ |
saḥ | na̱ḥ | nṛ̱ṇām | nṛ-ta̍maḥ | ri̱śādā̍ḥ | a̱gniḥ | gira̍ḥ | ava̍sā | ve̱tu̱ | dhī̱tim |
tanā̍ | ca̱ | ye | ma̱gha-vā̍naḥ | śavi̍ṣṭhāḥ | vāja̍-prasūtāḥ | i̱ṣaya̍nta | manma̍ |
e̱va | a̱gniḥ | gota̍mebhiḥ | ṛ̱ta-vā̍ | vipre̍bhiḥ | a̱sto̱ṣṭa̱ | jā̱ta-ve̍dāḥ |
saḥ | e̱ṣu̱ | dyu̱mnam | pī̱pa̱ya̱t | saḥ | vāja̍m | saḥ | pu̱ṣṭim | yā̱ti̱ | joṣa̍m | ā | ci̱ki̱tvān |
a̱bhi | tvā̱ | gota̍māḥ | gi̱rā | jāta̍-vedaḥ | vi-ca̍rṣaṇe |
dyu̱mnaiḥ | a̱bhi | pra | no̱nu̱ma̱ḥ |
tam | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | tvā̱ | gota̍maḥ | gi̱rā | rā̱yaḥ-kā̍maḥ | du̱va̱sya̱ti̱ |
dyu̱mnaiḥ | a̱bhi | pra | no̱nu̱ma̱ḥ |
tam | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | tvā̱ | vā̱ja̱-sāta̍mam | a̱ṅgi̱ra̱svat | ha̱vā̱ma̱he̱ |
dyu̱mnaiḥ | a̱bhi | pra | no̱nu̱ma̱ḥ |
tam | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | tvā̱ | vṛ̱tra̱han-ta̍mam | yaḥ | dasyū̍n | a̱va̱-dhū̱nu̱ṣe |
dyu̱mnaiḥ | a̱bhi | pra | no̱nu̱ma̱ḥ |
avo̍cāma | rahū̍gaṇāḥ | a̱gnaye̍ | madhu̍-mat | vaca̍ḥ |
dyu̱mnaiḥ | a̱bhi | pra | no̱nu̱ma̱ḥ |
hira̍ṇya-keśaḥ | raja̍saḥ | vi̱-sā̱re | ahi̍ḥ | dhuni̍ḥ | vāta̍ḥ-iva | dhrajī̍mān |
śuci̍-bhrājāḥ | u̱ṣasa̍ḥ | nave̍dāḥ | yaśa̍svatīḥ | a̱pa̱syuva̍ḥ | na | sa̱tyāḥ |
ā | te̱ | su̱-pa̱rṇāḥ | a̱mi̱na̱nta̱ | evai̍ḥ | kṛ̱ṣṇaḥ | no̱nā̱va̱ | vṛ̱ṣa̱bhaḥ | yadi̍ | i̱dam |
śi̱vābhi̍ḥ | na | smaya̍mānābhiḥ | ā | a̱gā̱t | pata̍nti | miha̍ḥ | sta̱naya̍nti | a̱bhrā |
yat | ī̱m | ṛ̱tasya̍ | paya̍sā | piyā̍naḥ | naya̍n | ṛ̱tasya̍ | pa̱thi-bhi̍ḥ | raji̍ṣṭhaiḥ |
a̱rya̱mā | mi̱traḥ | varu̍ṇaḥ | pari̍-jmā | tvaca̍m | pṛ̱ñca̱nti̱ | upa̍rasya | yonau̍ |
agne̍ | vāja̍sya | go-ma̍taḥ | īśā̍naḥ | sa̱ha̱sa̱ḥ | ya̱ho̱ iti̍ |
a̱sme iti̍ | dhe̱hi̱ | jā̱ta̱-ve̱da̱ḥ | mahi̍ | śrava̍ḥ |
saḥ | i̱dhā̱naḥ | vasu̍ḥ | ka̱viḥ | a̱gniḥ | ī̱ḻenya̍ḥ | gi̱rā |
re̱vat | a̱smabhya̍m | pu̱ru̱-a̱ṇī̱ka̱ | dī̱di̱hi̱ |
kṣa̱paḥ | rā̱ja̱n | u̱ta | tmanā̍ | agne̍ | vasto̍ḥ | u̱ta | u̱ṣasa̍ḥ |
saḥ | ti̱gma̱-ja̱mbha̱ | ra̱kṣasa̍ḥ | da̱ha̱ | prati̍ |
ava̍ | na̱ḥ | a̱gne̱ | ū̱ti-bhi̍ḥ | gā̱ya̱trasya̍ | pra-bha̍rmaṇi |
viśvā̍su | dhī̱ṣu | va̱ndya̱ |
ā | na̱ḥ | a̱gne̱ | ra̱yim | bha̱ra̱ | sa̱trā̱-saha̍m | vare̍ṇyam |
viśvā̍su | pṛ̱t-su | du̱stara̍m |
ā | na̱ḥ | a̱gne̱ | su̱-ce̱tunā̍ | ra̱yim | vi̱śvāyu̍-poṣasam |
mā̱rḍī̱kam | dhe̱hi̱ | jī̱vase̍ |
pra | pū̱tāḥ | ti̱gma-śo̍ciṣe | vāca̍ḥ | go̱ta̱ma̱ | a̱gnaye̍ |
bhara̍sva | su̱mna̱-yuḥ | gira̍ḥ |
yaḥ | na̱ḥ | a̱gne̱ | a̱bhi̱-dāsa̍ti | anti̍ | dū̱re | pa̱dī̱ṣṭa | saḥ |
a̱smāka̍m | it | vṛ̱dhe | bha̱va̱ |
sa̱ha̱sra̱-a̱kṣaḥ | vi-ca̍rṣaṇiḥ | a̱gniḥ | rakṣā̍ṁsi | se̱dha̱ti̱ |
hotā̍ | gṛ̱ṇī̱te̱ | u̱kthya̍ḥ |
i̱tthā | hi | some̍ | it | made̍ | bra̱hmā | ca̱kāra̍ | vardha̍nam |
śavi̍ṣṭha | va̱jri̱n | oja̍sā | pṛ̱thi̱vyāḥ | niḥ | śa̱śā̱ḥ | ahi̍m | arca̍n | anu̍ | sva̱-rājya̍m |
saḥ | tvā̱ | a̱ma̱da̱t | vṛṣā̍ | mada̍ḥ | soma̍ḥ | śye̱na-ā̍bhṛtaḥ | su̱taḥ |
yena̍ | vṛ̱tram | niḥ | a̱t-bhyaḥ | ja̱ghantha̍ | va̱jri̱n | oja̍sā | arca̍n | anu̍ | sva̱-rājya̍m |
pra | i̱hi̱ | a̱bhi | i̱hi̱ | dhṛ̱ṣṇu̱hi | na | te̱ | vajra̍ḥ | ni | ya̱ṁsa̱te̱ |
indra̍ | nṛ̱mṇam | hi | te̱ | śava̍ḥ | hana̍ḥ | vṛ̱tram | jayā̍ḥ | a̱paḥ | arca̍n | anu̍ | sva̱-rājya̍m |
niḥ | i̱ndra̱ | bhūmyā̍ḥ | adhi̍ | vṛ̱tram | ja̱gha̱ntha̱ | niḥ | di̱vaḥ |
sṛ̱ja | ma̱rutva̍tīḥ | ava̍ | jī̱va-dha̍nyāḥ | i̱māḥ | a̱paḥ | arca̍n | anu̍ | sva̱-rājya̍m |
indra̍ḥ | vṛ̱trasya̍ | dodha̍taḥ | sānu̍m | vajre̍ṇa | hī̱ḻi̱taḥ |
a̱bhi̱-kramya̍ | ava̍ | ji̱ghna̱te̱ | a̱paḥ | sarmā̍ya | co̱daya̍n | arca̍n | anu̍ | sva̱-rājya̍m |
adhi̍ | sānau̍ | ni | ji̱ghna̱te̱ | vajre̍ṇa | śa̱ta-pa̍rvaṇā |
ma̱ndā̱naḥ | indra̍ḥ | andha̍saḥ | sakhi̍-bhyaḥ | gā̱tum | i̱ccha̱ti̱ | arca̍n | anu̍ | sva̱-rājya̍m |
indra̍ | tubhya̍m | it | a̱dri̱-va̱ḥ | anu̍ttam | va̱jri̱n | vī̱rya̍m |
yat | ha̱ | tyam | mā̱yina̍m | mṛ̱gam | tam | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | tvam | mā̱yayā̍ | a̱va̱dhī̱ḥ | arca̍n | anu̍ | sva̱-rājya̍m |
vi | te̱ | vajrā̍saḥ | a̱sthi̱ra̱n | na̱va̱tim | nā̱vyā̍ḥ | anu̍ |
ma̱hat | te̱ | i̱ndra̱ | vī̱rya̍m | bā̱hvoḥ | te̱ | bala̍m | hi̱tam | arca̍n | anu̍ | sva̱-rājya̍m |
sa̱hasra̍m | sā̱kam | a̱rca̱ta̱ | pari̍ | sto̱bha̱ta̱ | vi̱ṁśa̱tiḥ |
śa̱tā | e̱na̱m | anu̍ | a̱no̱na̱vu̱ḥ | indrā̍ya | brahma̍ | ut-ya̍tam | arca̍n | anu̍ | sva̱-rājya̍m |
indra̍ḥ | vṛ̱trasya̍ | tavi̍ṣīm | niḥ | a̱ha̱n | saha̍sā | saha̍ḥ |
ma̱hat | tat | a̱sya̱ | pauṁsya̍m | vṛ̱tram | ja̱gha̱nvān | a̱sṛ̱ja̱t | arca̍n | anu̍ | sva̱-rājya̍m |
i̱me iti̍ | ci̱t | tava̍ | ma̱nyave̍ | vepe̍te̱ iti̍ | bhi̱yasā̍ | ma̱hī iti̍ |
yat | i̱ndra̱ | va̱jri̱n | oja̍sā | vṛ̱tram | ma̱rutvā̍n | ava̍dhīḥ | arca̍n | anu̍ | sva̱-rājya̍m |
na | vepa̍sā | na | ta̱nya̱tā | indra̍m | vṛ̱traḥ | vi | bī̱bha̱ya̱t |
a̱bhi | e̱na̱m | vajra̍ḥ | ā̱ya̱saḥ | sa̱hasra̍-bhṛṣṭiḥ | ā̱yā̱ta̱ | arca̍n | anu̍ | sva̱-rājya̍m |
yat | vṛ̱tram | tava̍ | ca̱ | a̱śani̍m | vajre̍ṇa | sa̱m-ayo̍dhayaḥ |
ahi̍m | i̱ndra̱ | jighā̍ṁsataḥ | di̱vi | te̱ | ba̱dba̱dhe̱ | śava̍ḥ | arca̍n | anu̍ | sva̱-rājya̍m |
a̱bhi̱-sta̱ne | te̱ | a̱dri̱-va̱ḥ | yat | sthāḥ | jaga̍t | ca̱ | re̱ja̱te̱ |
tvaṣṭā̍ | ci̱t | tava̍ | ma̱nyave̍ | indra̍ | ve̱vi̱jyate̍ | bhi̱yā | arca̍n | anu̍ | sva̱-rājya̍m |
na̱hi | nu | yāt | a̱dhi̱-i̱masi̍ | indra̍m | kaḥ | vī̱ryā̍ | pa̱raḥ |
tasmi̍n | nṛ̱mṇam | u̱ta | kratu̍m | de̱vāḥ | ojā̍ṁsi | sam | da̱dhu̱ḥ | arca̍n | anu̍ | sva̱-rājya̍m |
yām | atha̍rvā | manu̍ḥ | pi̱tā | da̱dhyaṅ | dhiya̍m | atna̍ta |
tasmi̍n | brahmā̍ṇi | pū̱rva-thā̍ | indre̍ | u̱kthā | sam | a̱gma̱ta̱ | arca̍n | anu̍ | sva̱-rājya̍m |
indra̍ḥ | madā̍ya | va̱vṛ̱dhe̱ | śava̍se | vṛ̱tra̱-hā | nṛ-bhi̍ḥ |
tam | it | ma̱hat-su̍ | ā̱jiṣu̍ | u̱ta | ī̱m | arbhe̍ | ha̱vā̱ma̱he̱ | saḥ | vāje̍ṣu | pra | na̱ḥ | a̱vi̱ṣa̱t |
asi̍ | hi | vī̱ra̱ | senya̍ḥ | asi̍ | bhūri̍ | pa̱rā̱-da̱diḥ |
asi̍ | da̱bhrasya̍ | ci̱t | vṛ̱dhaḥ | yaja̍mānāya | śi̱kṣa̱si̱ | su̱nva̱te | bhūri̍ | te̱ | vasu̍ |
yat | u̱t-īra̍te | ā̱jaya̍ḥ | dhṛ̱ṣṇave̍ | dhī̱ya̱te̱ | dhanā̍ |
yu̱kṣva | ma̱da̱-cyutā̍ | harī̱ iti̍ | kam | hana̍ḥ | kam | vasau̍ | da̱dha̱ḥ | a̱smān | i̱ndra̱ | vasau̍ | da̱dha̱ḥ |
kratvā̍ | ma̱hān | a̱nu̱-sva̱dham | bhī̱maḥ | ā | va̱vṛ̱dhe̱ | śava̍ḥ |
śri̱ye | ṛ̱ṣvaḥ | u̱pā̱kayo̍ḥ | ni | śi̱prī | hari̍-vān | da̱dhe̱ | hasta̍yoḥ | vajra̍m | ā̱ya̱sam |
ā | pa̱prau̱ | pārthi̍vam | raja̍ḥ | ba̱dba̱dhe | ro̱ca̱nā | di̱vi |
na | tvā-vā̍n | i̱ndra̱ | kaḥ | ca̱na | na | jā̱taḥ | na | ja̱ni̱ṣya̱te̱ | ati̍ | viśva̍m | va̱va̱kṣi̱tha̱ |
yaḥ | a̱ryaḥ | ma̱rta̱-bhoja̍nam | pa̱rā̱-dadā̍ti | dā̱śuṣe̍ |
indra̍ḥ | a̱smabhya̍m | śi̱kṣa̱tu̱ | vi | bha̱ja̱ | bhūri̍ | te̱ | vasu̍ | bha̱kṣī̱ya | tava̍ | rādha̍saḥ |
made̍-made | hi | na̱ḥ | da̱diḥ | yū̱thā | gavā̍m | ṛ̱ju̱-kratu̍ḥ |
sam | gṛ̱bhā̱ya̱ | pu̱ru | śa̱tā | u̱bha̱yā̱ha̱styā | vasu̍ | śi̱śī̱hi | rā̱yaḥ | ā | bha̱ra̱ |
mā̱daya̍sva | su̱te | sacā̍ | śava̍se | śū̱ra̱ | rādha̍se |
vi̱dma | hi | tvā̱ | pu̱ru̱-vasu̍m | upa̍ | kāmā̍n | sa̱sṛ̱jmahe̍ | atha̍ | na̱ḥ | a̱vi̱tā | bha̱va̱ |
e̱te | te̱ | i̱ndra̱ | ja̱ntava̍ḥ | viśva̍m | pu̱ṣya̱nti̱ | vārya̍m |
a̱ntaḥ | hi | khyaḥ | janā̍nām | a̱ryaḥ | veda̍ḥ | adā̍śuṣām | teṣā̍m | na̱ḥ | veda̍ḥ | ā | bha̱ra̱ |
upo̱ iti̍ | su | śṛ̱ṇu̱hi | gira̍ḥ | magha̍-van | mā | ata̍thāḥ-iva |
ya̱dā | na̱ḥ | sū̱nṛtā̍-vataḥ | kara̍ḥ | āt | a̱rthayā̍se | it | yoja̍ | nu | i̱ndra̱ | te̱ | harī̱ iti̍ |
akṣa̍n | amī̍madanta | hi | ava̍ | pri̱yāḥ | a̱dhū̱ṣa̱ta̱ |
asto̍ṣata | sva-bhā̍navaḥ | viprā̍ḥ | navi̍ṣṭhayā | ma̱tī | yoja̍ | nu | i̱ndra̱ | te̱ | harī̱ iti̍ |
su̱-sa̱ndṛśa̍m | tvā̱ | va̱yam | magha̍-van | va̱ndi̱ṣī̱mahi̍ |
pra | nū̱nam | pū̱rṇa-va̍ndhuraḥ | stu̱taḥ | yā̱hi̱ | vaśā̍n | anu̍ | yoja̍ | nu | i̱ndra̱ | te̱ | harī̱ iti̍ |
saḥ | gha̱ | tam | vṛṣa̍ṇam | ratha̍m | adhi̍ | ti̱ṣṭhā̱ti̱ | go̱-vida̍m |
yaḥ | pātra̍m | hā̱ri̱-yo̱ja̱nam | pū̱rṇam | i̱ndra̱ | cike̍tati | yoja̍ | nu | i̱ndra̱ | te̱ | harī̱ iti̍ |
yu̱ktaḥ | te̱ | a̱stu̱ | dakṣi̍ṇaḥ | u̱ta | sa̱vyaḥ | śa̱ta̱kra̱to̱ iti̍ śata-krato |
tena̍ | jā̱yām | upa̍ | pri̱yām | ma̱ndā̱naḥ | yā̱hi̱ | andha̍saḥ | yoja̍ | nu | i̱ndra̱ | te̱ | harī̱ iti̍ |
yu̱najmi̍ | te̱ | brahma̍ṇā | ke̱śinā̍ | harī̱ iti̍ | upa̍ | pra | yā̱hi̱ | da̱dhi̱ṣe | gabha̍styoḥ |
ut | tvā̱ | su̱tāsa̍ḥ | ra̱bha̱sāḥ | a̱ma̱ndi̱ṣu̱ḥ | pū̱ṣa̱ṇ-vān | va̱jri̱n | sam | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | patnyā̍ | a̱ma̱da̱ḥ |
aśva̍-vati | pra̱tha̱maḥ | goṣu̍ | ga̱cca̱ti̱ | su̱pra̱-ā̱vīḥ | i̱ndra̱ | martya̍ḥ | tava̍ | ū̱ti-bhi̍ḥ |
tam | it | pṛ̱ṇa̱kṣi̱ | vasu̍nā | bhavī̍yasā | sindhu̍m | āpa̍ḥ | yathā̍ | a̱bhita̍ḥ | vi-ce̍tasaḥ |
āpa̍ḥ | na | de̱vīḥ | upa̍ | ya̱nti̱ | ho̱triya̍m | a̱vaḥ | pa̱śya̱nti̱ | vi-ta̍tam | yathā̍ | raja̍ḥ |
prā̱caiḥ | de̱vāsa̍ḥ | pra | na̱ya̱nti̱ | de̱va̱-yum | bra̱hma̱-priya̍m | jo̱ṣa̱ya̱nte̱ | va̱rāḥ-i̍va |
adhi̍ | dvayo̍ḥ | a̱da̱dhā̱ḥ | u̱kthya̍m | vaca̍ḥ | ya̱ta-sru̍cā | mi̱thu̱nā | yā | sa̱pa̱ryata̍ḥ |
asa̍m-yattaḥ | vra̱te | te̱ | kṣe̱ti̱ | puṣya̍ti | bha̱drā | śa̱ktiḥ | yaja̍mānāya | su̱nva̱te |
āt | aṅgi̍rāḥ | pra̱tha̱mam | da̱dhi̱re̱ | vaya̍ḥ | i̱ddha-a̍gnayaḥ | śamyā̍ | ye | su̱-kṛ̱tyayā̍ |
sarva̍m | pa̱ṇeḥ | sam | a̱vi̱nda̱nta̱ | bhoja̍nam | aśva̍-vantam | go-ma̍ntam | ā | pa̱śum | nara̍ḥ |
ya̱jñaiḥ | atha̍rvā | pra̱tha̱maḥ | pa̱thaḥ | ta̱te̱ | tata̍ḥ | sūrya̍ḥ | vra̱ta̱-pāḥ | ve̱naḥ | ā | a̱ja̱ni̱ |
ā | gāḥ | ā̱ja̱t | u̱śanā̍ | kā̱vyaḥ | sacā̍ | ya̱masya̍ | jā̱tam | a̱mṛta̍m | ya̱jā̱ma̱he̱ |
ba̱rhiḥ | vā̱ | yat | su̱-a̱pa̱tyāya̍ | vṛ̱jyate̍ | a̱rkaḥ | vā̱ | śloka̍m | ā̱-ghoṣa̍te | di̱vi |
grāvā̍ | yatra̍ | vada̍ti | kā̱ruḥ | u̱kthya̍ḥ | tasya̍ | it | indra̍ḥ | a̱bhi̱-pi̱tveṣu̍ | ra̱ṇya̱ti̱ |
asā̍vi | soma̍ḥ | i̱ndra̱ | te̱ | śavi̍ṣṭha | dhṛ̱ṣṇo̱ iti̍ | ā | ga̱hi̱ |
ā | tvā̱ | pṛ̱ṇa̱ktu̱ | i̱ndri̱yam | raja̍ḥ | sūrya̍ḥ | na | ra̱śmi-bhi̍ḥ |
indra̍m | it | harī̱ iti̍ | va̱ha̱ta̱ḥ | apra̍tidhṛṣṭa-śavasam |
ṛṣī̍ṇām | ca̱ | stu̱tīḥ | upa̍ | ya̱jñam | ca̱ | mānu̍ṣāṇām |
ā | ti̱ṣṭha̱ | vṛ̱tra̱-ha̱n | ratha̍m | yu̱ktā | te̱ | brahma̍ṇā | harī̱ iti̍ |
a̱rvā̱cīna̍m | su | te̱ | mana̍ḥ | grāvā̍ | kṛ̱ṇo̱tu̱ | va̱gnunā̍ |
i̱mam | i̱ndra̱ | su̱tam | pi̱ba̱ | jyeṣṭha̍m | ama̍rtyam | mada̍m |
śu̱krasya̍ | tvā̱ | a̱bhi | a̱kṣa̱ra̱n | dhārā̍ḥ | ṛ̱tasya̍ | sada̍ne |
indrā̍ya | nū̱nam | a̱rca̱ta̱ | u̱kthāni̍ | ca̱ | bra̱vī̱ta̱na̱ |
su̱tāḥ | a̱ma̱tsu̱ḥ | inda̍vaḥ | jyeṣṭha̍m | na̱ma̱sya̱ta̱ | saha̍ḥ |
naki̍ḥ | tvat | ra̱thi-ta̍raḥ | harī̱ iti̍ | yat | i̱ndra̱ | yaccha̍se |
naki̍ḥ | tvā̱ | anu̍ | ma̱jmanā̍ | naki̍ḥ | su̱-aśva̍ḥ | ā̱na̱śe̱ |
yaḥ | eka̍ḥ | it | vi̱-daya̍te | vasu̍ | martā̍ya | dā̱śuṣe̍ |
īśā̍naḥ | apra̍ti-skutaḥ | indra̍ḥ | a̱ṅga |
ka̱dā | marta̍m | a̱rā̱dhasa̍m | pa̱dā | kṣumpa̍m-iva | sphu̱ra̱t |
ka̱dā | na̱ḥ | śu̱śra̱va̱t | gira̍ḥ | indra̍ḥ | a̱ṅga |
yaḥ | ci̱t | hi | tvā̱ | ba̱hu-bhya̍ḥ | ā | su̱ta-vā̍n | ā̱-vivā̍sati |
u̱gram | tat | pa̱tya̱te̱ | śava̍ḥ | indra̍ḥ | a̱ṅga |
svā̱doḥ | i̱tthā | vi̱ṣu̱-vata̍ḥ | madhva̍ḥ | pi̱ba̱nti̱ | gau̱rya̍ḥ |
yāḥ | indre̍ṇa | sa̱-yāva̍rīḥ | vṛṣṇā̍ | mada̍nti | śo̱bhase̍ | vasvī̍ḥ | anu̍ | sva̱-rājya̍m |
tāḥ | a̱sya̱ | pṛ̱śa̱na̱-yuva̍ḥ | soma̍m | śrī̱ṇa̱nti̱ | pṛśna̍yaḥ |
pri̱yāḥ | indra̍sya | dhe̱nava̍ḥ | vajra̍m | hi̱nva̱nti̱ | sāya̍kam | vasvī̍ḥ | anu̍ | sva̱-rājya̍m |
tāḥ | a̱sya̱ | nama̍sā | saha̍ḥ | sa̱pa̱ryanti̍ | pra-ce̍tasaḥ |
vra̱tāni̍ | a̱sya̱ | sa̱ści̱re̱ | pu̱rūṇi̍ | pū̱rva-ci̍ttaye | vasvī̍ḥ | anu̍ | sva̱-rājya̍m |
indra̍ḥ | da̱dhī̱caḥ | a̱stha-bhi̍ḥ | vṛ̱trāṇi̍ | apra̍ti-skutaḥ |
ja̱ghāna̍ | na̱va̱tīḥ | nava̍ |
i̱cchan | aśva̍sya | yat | śira̍ḥ | parva̍teṣu | apa̍-śritam |
tat | vi̱da̱t | śa̱rya̱ṇā-va̍ti |
atra̍ | aha̍ | goḥ | a̱ma̱nva̱ta̱ | nāma̍ | tvaṣṭu̍ḥ | a̱pī̱cya̍m |
i̱tthā | ca̱ndrama̍saḥ | gṛ̱he |
kaḥ | a̱dya | yu̱ṅkte̱ | dhu̱ri | gāḥ | ṛ̱tasya̍ | śimī̍-vataḥ | bhā̱mina̍ḥ | du̱ḥ-hṛ̱ṇā̱yūn |
ā̱san-i̍ṣūn | hṛ̱tsu̱-asa̍ḥ | ma̱ya̱ḥ-bhūn | yaḥ | e̱ṣā̱m | bhṛ̱tyām | ṛ̱ṇadha̍t | saḥ | jī̱vā̱t |
kaḥ | ī̱ṣa̱te̱ | tu̱jyate̍ | kaḥ | bi̱bhā̱ya̱ | kaḥ | ma̱ṁsa̱te̱ | santa̍m | indra̍m | kaḥ | anti̍ |
kaḥ | to̱kāya̍ | kaḥ | ibhā̍ya | u̱ta | rā̱ye | adhi̍ | bra̱va̱t | ta̱nve̍ | kaḥ | janā̍ya |
kaḥ | a̱gnim | ī̱ṭṭe̱ | ha̱viṣā̍ | ghṛ̱tena̍ | sru̱cā | ya̱jā̱tai̱ | ṛ̱tu-bhi̍ḥ | dhru̱vebhi̍ḥ |
kasmai̍ | de̱vāḥ | ā | va̱hā̱n | ā̱śu | homa̍ | kaḥ | ma̱ṁsa̱te̱ | vī̱ti-ho̍traḥ | su̱-de̱vaḥ |
tvam | a̱ṅga | pra | śa̱ṁsi̱ṣa̱ḥ | de̱vaḥ | śa̱vi̱ṣṭha̱ | martya̍m |
na | tvat | a̱nyaḥ | ma̱gha̱-va̱n | a̱sti̱ | ma̱rḍi̱tā | indra̍ | bravī̍mi | te̱ | vaca̍ḥ |
mā | te̱ | rādhā̍ṁsi | mā | te̱ | ū̱taya̍ḥ | va̱so̱ iti̍ | a̱smān | kadā̍ | ca̱na | da̱bha̱n |
viśvā̍ | ca̱ | na̱ḥ | u̱pa̱-mi̱mī̱hi | mā̱nu̱ṣa̱ | vasū̍ni | ca̱rṣa̱ṇi-bhya̍ḥ | ā |
pra | ye | śumbha̍nte | jana̍yaḥ | na | sapta̍yaḥ | yāma̍n | ru̱drasya̍ | sū̱nava̍ḥ | su̱-daṁsa̍saḥ |
roda̍sī̱ iti̍ | hi | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | ca̱kri̱re | vṛ̱dhe | mada̍nti | vī̱rāḥ | vi̱dathe̍ṣu | ghṛṣva̍yaḥ |
te | u̱kṣi̱tāsa̍ḥ | ma̱hi̱māna̍m | ā̱śa̱ta̱ | di̱vi | ru̱drāsa̍ḥ | adhi̍ | ca̱kri̱re̱ | sada̍ḥ |
arca̍ntaḥ | a̱rkam | ja̱naya̍ntaḥ | i̱ndri̱yam | adhi̍ | śriya̍ḥ | da̱dhi̱re̱ | pṛśni̍-mātaraḥ |
go-mā̍taraḥ | yat | śu̱bhaya̍nte | a̱ñji-bhi̍ḥ | ta̱nūṣu̍ | śu̱bhrāḥ | da̱dhi̱re̱ | vi̱rukma̍taḥ |
bādha̍nte | viśva̍m | a̱bhi̱-mā̱tina̍m | apa̍ | vartmā̍ni | e̱ṣā̱m | anu̍ | rī̱ya̱te̱ | ghṛ̱tam |
vi | ye | bhrāja̍nte | su-ma̍khāsaḥ | ṛ̱ṣṭi-bhi̍ḥ | pra̱-cya̱vaya̍ntaḥ | acyu̍tā | ci̱t | oja̍sā |
ma̱na̱ḥ-juva̍ḥ | yat | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | rathe̍ṣu | ā | vṛṣa̍-vrātāsaḥ | pṛṣa̍tīḥ | ayu̍gdhvam |
pra | yat | rathe̍ṣu | pṛṣa̍tīḥ | ayu̍gdhvam | vāje̍ | adri̍m | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | ra̱ṁhaya̍ntaḥ |
u̱ta | a̱ru̱ṣasya̍ | vi | sya̱nti̱ | dhārā̍ḥ | carma̍-iva | u̱da-bhi̍ḥ | vi | u̱nda̱nti̱ | bhūma̍ |
ā | va̱ḥ | va̱ha̱ntu̱ | sapta̍yaḥ | ra̱ghu̱-syada̍ḥ | ra̱ghu̱-patvā̍naḥ | pra | ji̱gā̱ta̱ | bā̱hu-bhi̍ḥ |
sīda̍ta | ā | ba̱rhiḥ | u̱ru | va̱ḥ | sada̍ḥ | kṛ̱tam | mā̱daya̍dhvam | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | madhva̍ḥ | andha̍saḥ |
te | a̱va̱rdha̱nta̱ | sva-ta̍vasaḥ | ma̱hi̱-tva̱nā | ā | nāka̍m | ta̱sthuḥ | u̱ru | ca̱kri̱re̱ | sada̍ḥ |
viṣṇu̍ḥ | yat | ha̱ | āva̍t | vṛṣa̍ṇam | ma̱da̱-cyuta̍m | vaya̍ḥ | na | sī̱da̱n | adhi̍ | ba̱rhiṣi̍ | pri̱ye |
śūrā̍ḥ-iva | it | yuyu̍dhayaḥ | na | jagma̍yaḥ | śra̱va̱syava̍ḥ | na | pṛta̍nāsu | ye̱ti̱re̱ |
bhaya̍nte | viśvā̍ | bhuva̍nā | ma̱rut-bhya̍ḥ | rājā̍naḥ-iva | tve̱ṣa-sa̍ṁdṛśaḥ | nara̍ḥ |
tvaṣṭā̍ | yat | vajra̍m | su-kṛ̍tam | hi̱ra̱ṇyaya̍m | sa̱hasra̍-bhṛṣṭim | su̱-apā̍ḥ | ava̍rtayat |
dha̱tte | indra̍ḥ | nari̍ | apā̍ṁsi | karta̍ve | aha̍n | vṛ̱tram | niḥ | a̱pām | au̱bja̱t | a̱rṇa̱vam |
ū̱rdhvam | nu̱nu̱dre̱ | a̱va̱tam | te | oja̍sā | da̱dṛ̱hā̱ṇam | ci̱t | bi̱bhi̱du̱ḥ | vi | parva̍tam |
dhama̍ntaḥ | vā̱ṇam | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | su̱-dāna̍vaḥ | made̍ | soma̍sya | raṇyā̍ni | ca̱kri̱re̱ |
ji̱hmam | nu̱nu̱dre̱ | a̱va̱tam | tayā̍ | di̱śā | asi̍ñcan | utsa̍m | gota̍māya | tṛ̱ṣṇa-je̍ |
ā | ga̱ccha̱nti̱ | ī̱m | ava̍sā | ci̱tra-bhā̍navaḥ | kāma̍m | vipra̍sya | ta̱rpa̱ya̱nta̱ | dhāma̍-bhiḥ |
yā | va̱ḥ | śarma̍ | śa̱śa̱mā̱nāya̍ | santi̍ | tri̱-dhātū̍ni | dā̱śuṣe̍ | ya̱ccha̱ta̱ | adhi̍ |
a̱smabhya̍m | tāni̍ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | vi | ya̱nta̱ | ra̱yim | na̱ḥ | dha̱tta̱ | vṛ̱ṣa̱ṇa̱ḥ | su̱-vīra̍m |
maru̍taḥ | yasya̍ | hi | kṣaye̍ | pā̱tha | di̱vaḥ | vi̱-ma̱ha̱sa̱ḥ |
saḥ | su̱-go̱pāta̍maḥ | jana̍ḥ |
ya̱jñaiḥ | vā̱ | ya̱jña̱-vā̱ha̱sa̱ḥ | vipra̍sya | vā̱ | ma̱tī̱nām |
maru̍taḥ | śṛ̱ṇu̱ta | hava̍m |
u̱ta | vā̱ | yasya̍ | vā̱jina̍ḥ | anu̍ | vipra̍m | ata̍kṣata |
saḥ | gantā̍ | go-ma̍ti | vra̱je |
a̱sya | vī̱rasya̍ | ba̱rhiṣi̍ | su̱taḥ | soma̍ḥ | divi̍ṣṭiṣu |
u̱ktham | mada̍ḥ | ca̱ | śa̱sya̱te̱ |
a̱sya | śro̱ṣa̱ntu̱ | ā | bhuva̍ḥ | viśvā̍ḥ | yaḥ | ca̱rṣa̱ṇīḥ | a̱bhi |
sūra̍m | ci̱t | sa̱sruṣī̍ḥ | iṣa̍ḥ |
pū̱rvībhi̍ḥ | hi | da̱dā̱śi̱ma | śa̱rat-bhi̍ḥ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | va̱yam |
ava̍ḥ-bhiḥ | ca̱rṣa̱ṇī̱nām |
su̱-bhaga̍ḥ | saḥ | pra̱-ya̱jya̱va̱ḥ | maru̍taḥ | a̱stu̱ | martya̍ḥ |
yasya̍ | prayā̍ṁsi | parṣa̍tha |
śa̱śa̱mā̱nasya̍ | vā̱ | na̱ra̱ḥ | sveda̍sya | sa̱tya̱-śa̱va̱sa̱ḥ |
vi̱da | kāma̍sya | vena̍taḥ |
yū̱yam | tat | sa̱tya̱-śa̱va̱sa̱ḥ | ā̱viḥ | ka̱rta̱ | ma̱hi̱-tva̱nā |
vidhya̍ta | vi̱-dyutā̍ | rakṣa̍ḥ |
gūha̍ta | guhya̍m | tama̍ḥ | vi | yā̱ta̱ | viśva̍m | a̱triṇa̍m |
jyoti̍ḥ | ka̱rta̱ | yat | u̱śmasi̍ |
pra-tva̍kṣasaḥ | pra-ta̍vasaḥ | vi̱-ra̱pśina̍ḥ | anā̍natāḥ | avi̍thurāḥ | ṛ̱jī̱ṣiṇa̍ḥ |
juṣṭa̍-tamāsaḥ | nṛ-ta̍māsaḥ | a̱ñji-bhi̍ḥ | vi | ā̱na̱jre̱ | ke | ci̱t | u̱srā-i̍va | stṛ-bhi̍ḥ |
u̱pa̱-hva̱reṣu̍ | yat | aci̍dhvam | ya̱yim | vaya̍ḥ-iva | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | kena̍ | ci̱t | pa̱thā |
ścota̍nti | kośā̍ḥ | upa̍ | va̱ḥ | rathe̍ṣu | ā | ghṛ̱tam | u̱kṣa̱ta̱ | madhu̍-varṇam | arca̍te |
pra | e̱ṣā̱m | ajme̍ṣu | vi̱thu̱rā-i̍va | re̱ja̱te̱ | bhūmi̍ḥ | yāme̍ṣu | yat | ha̱ | yu̱ñjate̍ | śu̱bhe |
te | krī̱ḻaya̍ḥ | dhuna̍yaḥ | bhrāja̍t-ṛṣṭayaḥ | sva̱yam | ma̱hi̱-tvam | pa̱na̱ya̱nta̱ | dhūta̍yaḥ |
saḥ | hi | sva̱-sṛt | pṛṣa̍t-aśvaḥ | yuvā̍ | ga̱ṇaḥ | a̱yā | ī̱śā̱naḥ | tavi̍ṣībhiḥ | ā-vṛ̍taḥ |
asi̍ | sa̱tyaḥ | ṛ̱ṇa̱-yāvā̍ | ane̍dyaḥ | a̱syāḥ | dhi̱yaḥ | pra̱-a̱vi̱tā | atha̍ | vṛṣā̍ | ga̱ṇaḥ |
pi̱tuḥ | pra̱tnasya̍ | janma̍nā | va̱dā̱ma̱si̱ | soma̍sya | ji̱hvā | pra | ji̱gā̱ti̱ | cakṣa̍sā |
yat | ī̱m | indra̍m | śami̍ | ṛkvā̍ṇaḥ | āśa̍ta | āt | it | nāmā̍ni | ya̱jñiyā̍ni | da̱dhi̱re̱ |
śri̱yase̍ | kam | bhā̱nu-bhi̍ḥ | sam | mi̱mi̱kṣi̱re̱ | te | ra̱śmi-bhi̍ḥ | te | ṛkva̍-bhiḥ | su̱-khā̱daya̍ḥ |
te | vāśī̍-mantaḥ | i̱ṣmiṇa̍ḥ | abhī̍ravaḥ | vi̱dre | pri̱yasya̍ | māru̍tasya | dhāmna̍ḥ |
ā | vi̱dyunma̍t-bhiḥ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | su̱-a̱rkaiḥ | rathe̍bhiḥ | yā̱ta̱ | ṛ̱ṣṭi̱mat-bhi̍ḥ | aśva̍-parṇaiḥ |
ā | varṣi̍ṣṭhayā | na̱ḥ | i̱ṣā | vaya̍ḥ | na | pa̱pta̱ta̱ | su̱-mā̱yā̱ḥ |
te | a̱ru̱ṇebhi̍ḥ | vara̍m | ā | pi̱śaṅgai̍ḥ | śu̱bhe | kam | yā̱nti̱ | ra̱tha̱tūḥ-bhi̍ḥ | aśvai̍ḥ |
ru̱kmaḥ | na | ci̱traḥ | svadhi̍ti-vān | pa̱vyā | ratha̍sya | ja̱ṅgha̱na̱nta̱ | bhūma̍ |
śri̱ye | kam | va̱ḥ | adhi̍ | ta̱nūṣu̍ | vāśī̍ḥ | me̱dhā | vanā̍ | na | kṛ̱ṇa̱va̱nte̱ | ū̱rdhvā |
yu̱ṣmabhya̍m | kam | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | su̱-jā̱tā̱ḥ | tu̱vi̱-dyu̱mnāsa̍ḥ | dha̱na̱ya̱nte̱ | adri̍m |
ahā̍ni | gṛdhrā̍ḥ | pari̍ | ā | va̱ḥ | ā | a̱gu̱ḥ | i̱mām | dhiya̍m | vā̱rkā̱ryām | ca̱ | de̱vīm |
brahma̍ | kṛ̱ṇvanta̍ḥ | gota̍māsaḥ | a̱rkaiḥ | ū̱rdhvam | nu̱nu̱dre̱ | u̱tsa̱-dhim | piba̍dhyai |
e̱tat | tyat | na | yoja̍nam | a̱ce̱ti̱ | sa̱svaḥ | ha̱ | yat | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | gota̍maḥ | va̱ḥ |
paśya̍n | hira̍ṇya-cakrān | aya̍ḥ-daṁṣṭrān | vi̱-dhāva̍taḥ | va̱rāhū̍n |
e̱ṣā | syā | va̱ḥ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | a̱nu̱-bha̱rtrī | prati̍ | sto̱bha̱ti̱ | vā̱ghata̍ḥ | na | vāṇī̍ |
asto̍bhayat | vṛthā̍ | ā̱sā̱m | anu̍ | sva̱dhām | gabha̍styoḥ |
ā | na̱ḥ | bha̱drāḥ | krata̍vaḥ | ya̱ntu̱ | vi̱śvata̍ḥ | ada̍bdhāsaḥ | apa̍ri-itāsaḥ | u̱t-bhida̍ḥ |
de̱vāḥ | na̱ḥ | yathā̍ | sada̍m | it | vṛ̱dhe | asa̍n | apra̍-āyuvaḥ | ra̱kṣi̱tāra̍ḥ | di̱ve-di̍ve |
de̱vānā̍m | bha̱drā | su̱-ma̱tiḥ | ṛ̱ju̱-ya̱tām | de̱vānā̍m | rā̱tiḥ | a̱bhi | na̱ḥ | ni | va̱rta̱tā̱m |
de̱vānā̍m | sa̱khyam | upa̍ | se̱di̱ma̱ | va̱yam | de̱vāḥ | na̱ḥ | āyu̍ḥ | pra | ti̱ra̱ntu̱ | jī̱vase̍ |
tān | pūrva̍yā | ni̱-vidā̍ | hū̱ma̱he̱ | va̱yam | bhaga̍m | mi̱tram | adi̍tim | dakṣa̍m | a̱sridha̍m |
a̱rya̱maṇa̍m | varu̍ṇam | soma̍m | a̱śvinā̍ | sara̍svatī | na̱ḥ | su̱-bhagā̍ | maya̍ḥ | ka̱ra̱t |
tat | na̱ḥ | vāta̍ḥ | ma̱ya̱ḥ-bhu | vā̱tu̱ | bhe̱ṣa̱jam | tat | mā̱tā | pṛ̱thi̱vī | tat | pi̱tā | dyauḥ |
tat | grāvā̍ṇaḥ | so̱ma̱-suta̍ḥ | ma̱ya̱ḥ-bhuva̍ḥ | tat | a̱śvi̱nā̱ | śṛ̱ṇu̱ta̱m | dhi̱ṣṇyā̱ | yu̱vam |
tam | īśā̍nam | jaga̍taḥ | ta̱sthuṣa̍ḥ | pati̍m | dhi̱ya̱m-ji̱nvam | ava̍se | hū̱ma̱he̱ | va̱yam |
pū̱ṣā | na̱ḥ | yathā̍ | veda̍sām | asa̍t | vṛ̱dhe | ra̱kṣi̱tā | pā̱yuḥ | ada̍bdhaḥ | sva̱staye̍ |
sva̱sti | na̱ḥ | indra̍ḥ | vṛ̱ddha-śra̍vāḥ | sva̱sti | na̱ḥ | pū̱ṣā | vi̱śva-ve̍dāḥ |
sva̱sti | na̱ḥ | tārkṣya̍ḥ | ari̍ṣṭa-nemiḥ | sva̱sti | na̱ḥ | bṛha̱spati̍ḥ | da̱dhā̱tu̱ |
pṛṣa̍t-aśvāḥ | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | pṛśni̍-mātaraḥ | śu̱bha̱m-yāvā̍naḥ | vi̱dathe̍ṣu | jagma̍yaḥ |
a̱gni̱-ji̱hvāḥ | mana̍vaḥ | sūra̍-cakṣasaḥ | viśve̍ | na̱ḥ | de̱vāḥ | ava̍sā | ā | ga̱ma̱n | i̱ha |
bha̱dram | karṇe̍bhiḥ | śṛ̱ṇu̱yā̱ma̱ | de̱vā̱ḥ | bha̱dram | pa̱śye̱ma̱ | a̱kṣa-bhi̍ḥ | ya̱ja̱trā̱ḥ |
sthi̱raiḥ | aṅgai̍ḥ | tu̱stu̱-vāṁsa̍ḥ | ta̱nūbhi̍ḥ | vi | a̱śe̱ma̱ | de̱va-hi̍tam | yat | āyu̍ḥ |
śa̱tam | it | nu | śa̱rada̍ḥ | anti̍ | de̱vā̱ḥ | yatra̍ | na̱ḥ | ca̱kra | ja̱rasa̍m | ta̱nūnā̍m |
pu̱trāsa̍ḥ | yatra̍ | pi̱tara̍ḥ | bhava̍nti | mā | na̱ḥ | ma̱dhyā | ri̱ri̱ṣa̱ta̱ | āyu̍ḥ | ganto̍ḥ |
adi̍tiḥ | dyauḥ | adi̍tiḥ | a̱ntari̍kṣam | adi̍tiḥ | mā̱tā | saḥ | pi̱tā | saḥ | pu̱traḥ |
viśve̍ | de̱vāḥ | adi̍tiḥ | pañca̍ | janā̍ḥ | adi̍tiḥ | jā̱tam | adi̍tiḥ | jani̍-tvam |
ṛ̱ju̱-nī̱tī | na̱ḥ | varu̍ṇaḥ | mi̱traḥ | na̱ya̱tu̱ | vi̱dvān |
a̱rya̱mā | de̱vaiḥ | sa̱-joṣā̍ḥ |
te | hi | vasva̍ḥ | vasa̍vānāḥ | te | apra̍-mūrāḥ | maha̍ḥ-bhiḥ |
vra̱tā | ra̱kṣa̱nte̱ | vi̱śvāhā̍ |
te | a̱smabhya̍m | śarma̍ | ya̱ṁsa̱n | a̱mṛtā̍ḥ | martye̍bhyaḥ |
bādha̍mānāḥ | apa̍ | dviṣa̍ḥ |
vi | na̱ḥ | pa̱thaḥ | su̱vi̱tāya̍ | ci̱yantu̍ | indra̍ḥ | ma̱ruta̍ḥ |
pū̱ṣā | bhaga̍ḥ | vandyā̍saḥ |
u̱ta | na̱ḥ | dhiya̍ḥ | go-a̍grāḥ | pūṣa̍n | viṣṇo̱ iti̍ | eva̍-yāvaḥ |
karta̍ | na̱ḥ | sva̱sti̱-mata̍ḥ |
madhu̍ | vātā̍ḥ | ṛ̱ta̱-ya̱te | madhu̍ | kṣa̱ra̱nti̱ | sindha̍vaḥ |

śam | na̱ḥ | mi̱traḥ | śam | varu̍ṇa̱ḥ | śam | na̱ḥ | bha̱va̱tu̱ | a̱rya̱mā |

tvam | so̱ma̱ | pra | ci̱ki̱ta̱ḥ | ma̱nī̱ṣā | tvam | raji̍ṣṭham | anu̍ | ne̱ṣi̱ | panthā̍m |
tava̍ | pra-nī̍tī | pi̱tara̍ḥ | na̱ḥ | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ | de̱veṣu̍ | ratna̍m | a̱bha̱ja̱nta̱ | dhīrā̍ḥ |
tvam | so̱ma̱ | kratu̍-bhiḥ | su̱-kratu̍ḥ | bhū̱ḥ | tvam | dakṣai̍ḥ | su̱-dakṣa̍ḥ | vi̱śva-ve̍dāḥ |
tvam | vṛṣā̍ | vṛ̱ṣa̱-tvebhi̍ḥ | ma̱hi̱-tvā | dyu̱mnebhi̍ḥ | dyu̱mnī | a̱bha̱va̱ḥ | nṛ̱-cakṣā̍ḥ |

śuci̍ḥ | tvam | a̱si̱ | pri̱yaḥ | na | mi̱traḥ | da̱kṣāyya̍ḥ | a̱rya̱mā-i̍va | a̱si̱ | so̱ma̱ |
yā | te̱ | dhāmā̍ni | di̱vi | yā | pṛ̱thi̱vyām | yā | parva̍teṣu | oṣa̍dhīṣu | a̱p-su |

na | ri̱ṣye̱t | tvā-va̍taḥ | sakhā̍ |

soma̍ | gī̱ḥ-bhiḥ | tvā̱ | va̱yam | va̱rdhayā̍maḥ | va̱ca̱ḥ-vida̍ḥ |
su̱-mṛ̱ḻī̱kaḥ | na̱ḥ | ā | vi̱śa̱ |
ga̱ya̱-sphāna̍ḥ | a̱mī̱va̱-hā | va̱su̱-vit | pu̱ṣṭi̱-vardha̍naḥ |
su̱-mi̱traḥ | so̱ma̱ | na̱ḥ | bha̱va̱ |
soma̍ | ra̱ra̱ndhi | na̱ḥ | hṛ̱di | gāva̍ḥ | na | yava̍seṣu | ā |
marya̍ḥ-iva | sve | o̱kye̍ |
yaḥ | so̱ma̱ | sa̱khye | tava̍ | ra̱raṇa̍t | de̱va̱ | martya̍ḥ |
tam | dakṣa̍ḥ | sa̱ca̱te̱ | ka̱viḥ |
u̱ru̱ṣya | na̱ḥ | a̱bhi-śa̍steḥ | soma̍ | ni | pā̱hi̱ | aṁha̍saḥ |
sakhā̍ | su̱-śeva̍ḥ | e̱dhi̱ | na̱ḥ |
ā | pyā̱ya̱sva̱ | sam | e̱tu̱ | te̱ | vi̱śvata̍ḥ | so̱ma̱ | vṛṣṇya̍m |
bhava̍ | vāja̍sya | sa̱m-ga̱the |
ā | pyā̱ya̱sva̱ | ma̱di̱n-ta̱ma̱ | soma̍ | viśve̍bhiḥ | a̱ṁśu-bhi̍ḥ |
bhava̍ | na̱ḥ | su̱śrava̍ḥ-tamaḥ | sakhā̍ | vṛ̱dhe |
sam | te̱ | payā̍ṁsi | sam | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | ya̱ntu̱ | vājā̍ḥ | sam | vṛṣṇyā̍ni | a̱bhi̱mā̱ti̱-saha̍ḥ |
ā̱-pyāya̍mānaḥ | a̱mṛtā̍ya | so̱ma̱ | di̱vi | śravā̍ṁsi | u̱t-ta̱māni̍ | dhi̱ṣva̱ |
yā | te̱ | dhāmā̍ni | ha̱viṣā̍ | yaja̍nti | tā | te̱ | viśvā̍ | pa̱ri̱-bhūḥ | a̱stu̱ | ya̱jñam |
ga̱ya̱-sphāna̍ḥ | pra̱-tara̍ṇaḥ | su̱-vīra̍ḥ | avī̍ra-hā | pra | ca̱ra̱ | so̱ma̱ | duryā̍n |
soma̍ḥ | dhe̱num | soma̍ḥ | arva̍ntam | ā̱śum | soma̍ḥ | vī̱ram | ka̱rma̱ṇya̍m | da̱dā̱ti̱ |
sa̱da̱nya̍m | vi̱da̱thya̍m | sa̱bheya̍m | pi̱tṛ̱-śrava̍ṇam | yaḥ | dadā̍śat | a̱smai̱ |
