a̱bhi | na̱ḥ | a̱gne̱ | u̱ktham | it | ju̱gu̱ryā̱ḥ | dyāvā̱kṣāmā̍ | sindha̍vaḥ | ca̱ | sva-gū̍rtāḥ |
gavya̍m | yavya̍m | yanta̍ḥ | dī̱rghā | ahā̍ | iṣa̍m | vara̍m | a̱ru̱ṇya̍ḥ | va̱ra̱nta̱ |
baṭ | i̱tthā | tat | vapu̍ṣe | dhā̱yi̱ | da̱rśa̱tam | de̱vasya̍ | bharga̍ḥ | saha̍saḥ | yata̍ḥ | jani̍ |
yat | ī̱m | upa̍ | hvara̍te | sādha̍te | ma̱tiḥ | ṛ̱tasya̍ | dhenā̍ḥ | a̱na̱ya̱nta̱ | sa̱-sruta̍ḥ |
pṛ̱kṣaḥ | vapu̍ḥ | pi̱tu̱-mān | nitya̍ḥ | ā | śa̱ye̱ | dvi̱tīya̍m | ā | sa̱pta-śi̍vāsu | mā̱tṛṣu̍ |

pra | yat | pi̱tuḥ | pa̱ra̱māt | nī̱yate̍ | pari̍ | ā | pṛ̱kṣudha̍ḥ | vī̱rudha̍ḥ | dam-su̍ | ro̱ha̱ti̱ |
u̱bhā | yat | a̱sya̱ | ja̱nuṣa̍m | yat | inva̍taḥ | āt | it | yavi̍ṣṭhaḥ | a̱bha̱va̱t | ghṛ̱ṇā | śuci̍ḥ |
āt | it | mā̱tṝḥ | ā | a̱vi̱śa̱t | yāsu̍ | ā | śuci̍ḥ | ahi̍ṁsyamānaḥ | u̱rvi̱yā | vi | va̱vṛ̱dhe̱ |
anu̍ | yat | pūrvā̍ḥ | aru̍hat | sa̱nā̱-juva̍ḥ | ni | navya̍sīṣu | ava̍rāsu | dhā̱va̱te̱ |
āt | it | hotā̍ram | vṛ̱ṇa̱te̱ | divi̍ṣṭiṣu | bhaga̍m-iva | pa̱pṛ̱cā̱nāsa̍ḥ | ṛ̱ñja̱te̱ |
de̱vān | yat | kratvā̍ | ma̱jmanā̍ | pu̱ru̱-stu̱taḥ | marta̍m | śaṁsa̍m | vi̱śvadhā̍ | veti̍ | dhāya̍se |
vi | yat | asthā̍t | ya̱ja̱taḥ | vāta̍-coditaḥ | hvā̱raḥ | na | vakvā̍ | ja̱raṇā̍ḥ | anā̍kṛtaḥ |

ratha̍ḥ | na | yā̱taḥ | śikva̍-bhiḥ | kṛ̱taḥ | dyām | aṅge̍bhiḥ | a̱ru̱ṣebhi̍ḥ | ī̱ya̱te̱ |
āt | a̱sya̱ | te | kṛ̱ṣṇāsa̍ḥ | dha̱kṣi̱ | sū̱raya̍ḥ | śūra̍sya-iva | tve̱ṣathā̍t | ī̱ṣa̱te̱ | vaya̍ḥ |
tvayā̍ | hi | a̱gne̱ | varu̍ṇaḥ | dhṛ̱ta-vra̍taḥ | mi̱traḥ | śā̱śa̱dre | a̱rya̱mā | su̱-dāna̍vaḥ |
yat | sī̱m | anu̍ | kratu̍nā | vi̱śva-thā̍ | vi̱-bhuḥ | a̱rān | na | ne̱miḥ | pa̱ri̱-bhūḥ | ajā̍yathāḥ |
tvam | a̱gne̱ | śa̱śa̱mā̱nāya̍ | su̱nva̱te | ratna̍m | ya̱vi̱ṣṭha̱ | de̱va-tā̍tim | i̱nva̱si̱ |
tvam | tvā̱ | nu | navya̍m | sa̱ha̱sa̱ḥ | yu̱va̱n | va̱yam | bhaga̍m | na | kā̱re | ma̱hi̱-ra̱tna̱ | dhī̱ma̱hi̱ |
a̱sme iti̍ | ra̱yim | na | su̱-artha̍m | damū̍nasam | bhaga̍n | dakṣa̍m | na | pa̱pṛ̱cā̱si̱ | dha̱rṇa̱sim |
ra̱śmīn-i̍va | yaḥ | yama̍ti | janma̍nī̱ iti̍ | u̱bhe iti̍ | de̱vānā̍m | śaṁsa̍m | ṛ̱te | ā | ca̱ | su̱-kratu̍ḥ |
u̱ta | na̱ḥ | su̱-dyotmā̍ | jī̱ra-a̍śvaḥ | hotā̍ | ma̱ndraḥ | śṛ̱ṇa̱va̱t | ca̱ndra-ra̍thaḥ |
saḥ | na̱ḥ | ne̱ṣa̱t | neṣa̍-tamaiḥ | amū̍raḥ | a̱gniḥ | vā̱mam | su̱-vi̱tam | vasya̍ḥ | accha̍ |
astā̍vi | a̱gniḥ | śimī̍vat-bhiḥ | a̱rkaiḥ | sām-rā̍jyāya | pra̱-ta̱ram | dadhā̍naḥ |
a̱mī iti̍ | ca̱ | ye | ma̱gha-vā̍naḥ | va̱yam | ca̱ | miha̍m | na | sūra̍ḥ | ati̍ | niḥ | ta̱ta̱nyu̱ḥ |
sam-i̍ddhaḥ | a̱gne̱ | ā | va̱ha̱ | de̱vān | a̱dya | ya̱ta-sru̍ce |
tantu̍m | ta̱nu̱ṣva̱ | pū̱rvyam | su̱ta-so̍māya | dā̱śuṣe̍ |
ghṛ̱ta-va̍ntam | upa̍ | mā̱si̱ | madhu̍-mantam | ta̱nū̱-na̱pā̱t |
ya̱jñam | vipra̍sya | mā-va̍taḥ | śa̱śa̱mā̱nasya̍ | dā̱śuṣa̍ḥ |
śuci̍ḥ | pā̱va̱kaḥ | adbhu̍taḥ | madhvā̍ | ya̱jñam | mi̱mi̱kṣa̱ti̱ |
narā̱śaṁsa̍ḥ | triḥ | ā | di̱vaḥ | de̱vaḥ | de̱veṣu̍ | ya̱jñiya̍ḥ |
ī̱ḻi̱taḥ | a̱gne̱ | ā | va̱ha̱ | indra̍m | ci̱tram | i̱ha | pri̱yam |
i̱yam | hi | tvā̱ | ma̱tiḥ | mama̍ | accha̍ | su̱-ji̱hva̱ | va̱cyate̍ |
stṛ̱ṇā̱nāsa̍ḥ | ya̱ta-sru̍caḥ | ba̱rhiḥ | ya̱jñe | su̱-a̱dhva̱re |
vṛ̱ñje | de̱vavya̍caḥ-tamam | indrā̍ya | śarma̍ | sa̱-pratha̍ḥ |
vi | śra̱ya̱ntā̱m | ṛ̱ta̱-vṛdha̍ḥ | pra̱-yai | de̱vebhya̍ḥ | ma̱hīḥ |
pā̱va̱kāsa̍ḥ | pu̱ru̱-spṛha̍ḥ | dvāra̍ḥ | de̱vīḥ | a̱sa̱ścata̍ḥ |
ā | bhanda̍māne̱ iti̍ | upā̍ke̱ iti̍ | nakto̱ṣasā̍ | su̱-peśa̍sā |
ya̱hvī iti̍ | ṛ̱tasya̍ | mā̱tarā̍ | sīda̍tām | ba̱rhiḥ | ā | su̱-mat |
ma̱ndra-ji̍hvā | ju̱gu̱rvaṇī̱ iti̍ | hotā̍rā | daivyā̍ | ka̱vī iti̍ |
ya̱jñam | na̱ḥ | ya̱kṣa̱tā̱m | i̱mam | si̱dhram | a̱dya | di̱vi̱-spṛśa̍m |
śuci̍ḥ | de̱veṣu̍ | arpi̍tā | hotrā̍ | ma̱rut-su̍ | bhāra̍tī |
iḻā̍ | sara̍svatī | ma̱hī | ba̱rhiḥ | sī̱da̱ntu̱ | ya̱jñiyā̍ḥ |
tat | na̱ḥ | tu̱rīpa̍m | adbhu̍tam | pu̱ru | vā̱ | ara̍m | pu̱ru | tmanā̍ |
tvaṣṭā̍ | poṣā̍ya | vi | sya̱tu̱ | rā̱ye | nābhā̍ | na̱ḥ | a̱sma̱-yuḥ |
a̱va̱-sṛ̱jan | upa̍ | tmanā̍ | de̱vān | ya̱kṣi̱ | va̱na̱spa̱te̱ |
a̱gniḥ | ha̱vyā | su̱sū̱da̱ti̱ | de̱vaḥ | de̱veṣu̍ | medhi̍raḥ |
pū̱ṣa̱ṇ-vate̍ | ma̱rutva̍te | vi̱śva-de̍vāya | vā̱yave̍ |
svāhā̍ | gā̱ya̱tra-ve̍pase | ha̱vyam | indrā̍ya | ka̱rta̱na̱ |
svāhā̍-kṛtāni | ā | ga̱hi̱ | upa̍ | ha̱vyāni̍ | vī̱taye̍ |
indra̍ | ā | ga̱hi̱ | śru̱dhi | hava̍m | tvām | ha̱va̱nte̱ | a̱dhva̱re |
pra | tavya̍sīm | navya̍sīm | dhī̱tim | a̱gnaye̍ | vā̱caḥ | ma̱tim | saha̍saḥ | sū̱nave̍ | bha̱re̱ |
a̱pām | napā̍t | yaḥ | vasu̍-bhiḥ | sa̱ha | pri̱yaḥ | hotā̍ | pṛ̱thi̱vyām | ni | asī̍dat | ṛ̱tviya̍ḥ |
saḥ | jāya̍mānaḥ | pa̱ra̱me | vi-o̍mani | ā̱viḥ | a̱gniḥ | a̱bha̱va̱t | mā̱ta̱riśva̍ne |
a̱sya | kratvā̍ | sa̱m-i̱dhā̱nasya̍ | ma̱jmanā̍ | pra | dyāvā̍ | śo̱ciḥ | pṛ̱thi̱vī iti̍ | a̱ro̱ca̱ya̱t |
a̱sya | tve̱ṣāḥ | a̱jarā̍ḥ | a̱sya | bhā̱nava̍ḥ | su̱-sa̱ṁdṛśa̍ḥ | su̱-pratī̍kasya | su̱-dyuta̍ḥ |
bhā-tva̍kṣasaḥ | ati̍ | a̱ktuḥ | na | sindha̍vaḥ | a̱gneḥ | re̱ja̱nte̱ | asa̍santaḥ | a̱jarā̍ḥ |
yam | ā̱-ī̱ri̱re | bhṛga̍vaḥ | vi̱śva-ve̍dasam | nābhā̍ | pṛ̱thi̱vyāḥ | bhuva̍nasya | ma̱jmanā̍ |
a̱gnim | tam | gī̱ḥ-bhiḥ | hi̱nu̱hi̱ | sve | ā | dame̍ | yaḥ | eka̍ḥ | vasva̍ḥ | varu̍ṇaḥ | na | rāja̍ti |
na | yaḥ | varā̍ya | ma̱rutā̍m-iva | sva̱naḥ | senā̍-iva | sṛ̱ṣṭā | di̱vyā | yathā̍ | a̱śani̍ḥ |
a̱gniḥ | jambhai̍ḥ | ti̱gi̱taiḥ | a̱tti̱ | bharva̍ti | yo̱dhaḥ | na | śatrū̍n | saḥ | vanā̍ | ni | ṛ̱ñja̱te̱ |
ku̱vit | na̱ḥ | a̱gniḥ | u̱catha̍sya | vīḥ | asa̍t | vasu̍ḥ | ku̱vit | vasu̍-bhiḥ | kāma̍m | ā̱-vara̍t |
co̱daḥ | ku̱vit | tu̱tu̱jyāt | sā̱taye̍ | dhiya̍ḥ | śuci̍-pratīkam | tam | a̱yā | dhi̱yā | gṛ̱ṇe̱ |
ghṛ̱ta-pra̍tīkam | va̱ḥ | ṛ̱tasya̍ | dhū̱ḥ-sada̍m | a̱gnim | mi̱tram | na | sa̱m-i̱dhā̱naḥ | ṛ̱ñja̱te̱ |
indhā̍naḥ | a̱kraḥ | vi̱dathe̍ṣu | dīdya̍t | śu̱kra-va̍rṇām | ut | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | na̱ḥ | ya̱ṁsa̱te̱ | dhiya̍m |
apra̍-yucchan | apra̍yucchat-bhiḥ | a̱gne̱ | śi̱vebhi̍ḥ | na̱ḥ | pā̱yu-bhi̍ḥ | pā̱hi̱ | śa̱gmaiḥ |
ada̍bdhebhiḥ | adṛ̍pitebhiḥ | i̱ṣṭe̱ | ani̍miṣat-bhiḥ | pari̍ | pā̱hi̱ | na̱ḥ | jāḥ |
eti̍ | pra | hotā̍ | vra̱tam | a̱sya̱ | mā̱yayā̍ | ū̱rdhvām | dadhā̍naḥ | śuci̍-peśasam | dhiya̍m |
a̱bhi | sruca̍ḥ | kra̱ma̱te̱ | da̱kṣi̱ṇā̱-ā̱vṛta̍ḥ | yāḥ | a̱sya̱ | dhāma̍ | pra̱tha̱mam | ha̱ | niṁsa̍te |
a̱bhi | ī̱m | ṛ̱tasya̍ | do̱hanā̍ḥ | a̱nū̱ṣa̱ta̱ | yonau̍ | de̱vasya̍ | sada̍ne | pari̍-vṛtāḥ |
a̱pām | u̱pa-sthe̍ | vi-bhṛ̍taḥ | yat | ā | ava̍sat | adha̍ | sva̱dhāḥ | a̱dha̱ya̱t | yābhi̍ḥ | īya̍te |
yuyū̍ṣataḥ | sa-va̍yasā | tat | it | vapu̍ḥ | sa̱mā̱nam | artha̍m | vi̱-tari̍tratā | mi̱thaḥ |
āt | īm | bhaga̍ḥ | na | havya̍ḥ | sam | a̱smat | ā | voḻhu̍ḥ | na | ra̱śmīn | sam | a̱ya̱ṁsta̱ | sāra̍thiḥ |
yam | ī̱m | dvā | sa-va̍yasā | sa̱pa̱ryata̍ḥ | sa̱mā̱ne | yonā̍ | mi̱thu̱nā | sam-o̍kasā |
divā̍ | na | nakta̍m | pa̱li̱taḥ | yuvā̍ | a̱ja̱ni̱ | pu̱ru | cara̍n | a̱jara̍ḥ | mānu̍ṣā | yu̱gā |
tam | ī̱m | hi̱nva̱nti̱ | dhī̱taya̍ḥ | daśa̍ | vriśa̍ḥ | de̱vam | martā̍saḥ | ū̱taye̍ | ha̱vā̱ma̱he̱ |
dhano̍ḥ | adhi̍ | pra̱-vata̍ḥ | ā | saḥ | ṛ̱ṇva̱ti̱ | a̱bhi̱vraja̍t-bhiḥ | va̱yunā̍ | nava̍ | a̱dhi̱ta̱ |
tvam | hi | a̱gne̱ | di̱vyasya̍ | rāja̍si | tvam | pārthi̍vasya | pa̱śu̱pāḥ-i̍va | tmanā̍ |
enī̱ iti̍ | te̱ | e̱te iti̍ | bṛ̱ha̱tī iti̍ | a̱bhi̱-śriyā̍ | hi̱ra̱ṇyayī̱ iti̍ | vakva̍rī̱ iti̍ | ba̱rhiḥ | ā̱śā̱te̱ iti̍ |
agne̍ | ju̱ṣasva̍ | prati̍ | ha̱rya̱ | tat | vaca̍ḥ | mandra̍ | svadhā̍-vaḥ | ṛta̍-jāta | sukra̍to̱ iti̱ su-kra̍to |
yaḥ | vi̱śvata̍ḥ | pra̱tyaṅ | asi̍ | da̱rśa̱taḥ | ra̱ṇvaḥ | sam-dṛ̍ṣṭau | pi̱tu̱mān-i̍va | kṣaya̍ḥ |
tam | pṛ̱ccha̱ta̱ | saḥ | ja̱gā̱ma̱ | saḥ | ve̱da̱ | saḥ | ci̱ki̱tvān | ī̱ya̱te̱ | saḥ | nu | ī̱ya̱te̱ |
tasmi̍n | sa̱nti̱ | pra̱-śiṣa̍ḥ | tasmi̍n | i̱ṣṭaya̍ḥ | saḥ | vāja̍sya | śava̍saḥ | śu̱ṣmiṇa̍ḥ | pati̍ḥ |
tam | it | pṛ̱ccha̱nti̱ | na | si̱maḥ | vi | pṛ̱ccha̱ti̱ | svena̍-iva | dhīra̍ḥ | mana̍sā | yat | agra̍bhīt |
na | mṛ̱ṣya̱te̱ | pra̱tha̱mam | na | apa̍ram | vaca̍ḥ | a̱sya | kratvā̍ | sa̱ca̱te̱ | apra̍-dṛpitaḥ |
tam | it | ga̱ccha̱nti̱ | ju̱hva̍ḥ | tam | arva̍tīḥ | viśvā̍ni | eka̍ḥ | śṛ̱ṇa̱va̱t | vacā̍ṁsi | me̱ |
pu̱ru̱-prai̱ṣaḥ | tatu̍riḥ | ya̱jña̱-sādha̍naḥ | acchi̍dra-ūtiḥ | śiśu̍ḥ | ā | a̱da̱tta̱ | sam | rabha̍ḥ |
u̱pa̱-sthāya̍m | ca̱ra̱ti̱ | yat | sa̱m-āra̍ta | sa̱dyaḥ | jā̱taḥ | ta̱tsā̱ra̱ | yujye̍bhiḥ |
a̱bhi | śvā̱ntam | mṛ̱śa̱te̱ | nā̱ndye̍ | mu̱de | yat | ī̱m | gaccha̍nti | u̱śa̱tīḥ | a̱pi̱-sthi̱tam |
saḥ | ī̱m | mṛ̱gaḥ | apya̍ḥ | va̱na̱rguḥ | upa̍ | tva̱ci | u̱pa̱-masyā̍m | ni | dhā̱yi̱ |
vi | a̱bra̱vī̱t | va̱yunā̍ | martye̍bhyaḥ | a̱gniḥ | vi̱dvān | ṛ̱ta̱-cit | hi | sa̱tyaḥ |
tri̱-mū̱rdhāna̍m | sa̱pta-ra̍śmim | gṛ̱ṇī̱ṣe̱ | anū̍nam | a̱gnim | pi̱troḥ | u̱pa-sthe̍ |
ni̱-sa̱ttam | a̱sya̱ | cara̍taḥ | dhru̱vasya̍ | viśvā̍ | di̱vaḥ | ro̱ca̱nā | ā̱pa̱pri̱-vāṁsa̍m |
u̱kṣā | ma̱hān | a̱bhi | va̱va̱kṣe̱ | e̱ne̱ iti̍ | a̱jara̍ḥ | ta̱sthau̱ | i̱taḥ-ū̍tiḥ | ṛ̱ṣvaḥ |
u̱rvyāḥ | pa̱daḥ | ni | da̱dhā̱ti̱ | sānau̍ | ri̱hanti̍ | ūdha̍ḥ | a̱ru̱ṣāsa̍ḥ | a̱sya̱ |
sa̱mā̱nam | va̱tsam | a̱bhi | sa̱ṁcara̍ntī̱ iti̍ sa̱m-cara̍ntī | viṣva̍k | dhe̱nū iti̍ | vi | ca̱ra̱ta̱ḥ | su̱meke̱ iti̍ su̱-meke̍ |
a̱na̱pa̱-vṛ̱jyān | adhva̍naḥ | mimā̍ne̱ iti̍ | viśvā̍n | ketā̍n | adhi̍ | ma̱haḥ | dadhā̍ne̱ iti̍ |
dhīrā̍saḥ | pa̱dam | ka̱vaya̍ḥ | na̱ya̱nti̱ | nānā̍ | hṛ̱dā | rakṣa̍māṇāḥ | a̱ju̱ryam |
sisā̍santaḥ | pari̍ | a̱pa̱śya̱nta̱ | sindhu̍m | ā̱viḥ | e̱bhya̱ḥ | a̱bha̱va̱t | sūrya̍ḥ | nṝn |
di̱dṛ̱kṣeṇya̍ḥ | pari̍ | kāṣṭhā̍su | jenya̍ḥ | ī̱ḻenya̍ḥ | ma̱haḥ | arbhā̍ya | jī̱vase̍ |
pu̱ru̱-trā | yat | abha̍vat | sūḥ | aha̍ | e̱bhya̱ḥ | garbhe̍bhyaḥ | ma̱gha-vā̍ | vi̱śva-da̍rśataḥ |
ka̱thā | te̱ | a̱gne̱ | śu̱caya̍ntaḥ | ā̱yoḥ | da̱dā̱śuḥ | vāje̍bhiḥ | ā̱śu̱ṣā̱ṇāḥ |
u̱bhe iti̍ | yat | to̱ke iti̍ | tana̍ye | dadhā̍nāḥ | ṛ̱tasya̍ | sāma̍n | ra̱ṇaya̍nta | de̱vāḥ |
bodha̍ | me̱ | a̱sya | vaca̍saḥ | ya̱vi̱ṣṭha̱ | maṁhi̍ṣṭhasya | pra-bhṛ̍tasya | sva̱dhā̱-va̱ḥ |
pīya̍ti | tva̱ḥ | anu̍ | tva̱ḥ | gṛ̱ṇā̱ti̱ | va̱ndāru̍ḥ | te̱ | ta̱nva̍m | va̱nde̱ | a̱gne̱ |
ye | pā̱yava̍ḥ | mā̱ma̱te̱yam | te̱ | a̱gne̱ | paśya̍ntaḥ | a̱ndham | du̱ḥ-i̱tāt | ara̍kṣan |
ra̱rakṣa̍ | tān | su̱-kṛta̍ḥ | vi̱śva-ve̍dāḥ | dipsa̍ntaḥ | it | ri̱pava̍ḥ | na | aha̍ | de̱bhu̱ḥ |
yaḥ | na̱ḥ | a̱gne̱ | ara̍ri-vān | a̱gha̱-yuḥ | a̱rā̱ti̱-vā | ma̱rcaya̍ti | dva̱yena̍ |
mantra̍ḥ | gu̱ruḥ | puna̍ḥ | a̱stu̱ | saḥ | a̱smai̱ | anu̍ | mṛ̱kṣī̱ṣṭa̱ | ta̱nva̍m | du̱ḥ-u̱ktaiḥ |
u̱ta | vā̱ | yaḥ | sa̱ha̱sya̱ | pra̱-vi̱dvān | marta̍ḥ | marta̍m | ma̱rcaya̍ti | dva̱yena̍ |
ata̍ḥ | pā̱hi̱ | sta̱va̱mā̱na̱ | stu̱vanta̍m | agne̍ | māki̍ḥ | na̱ḥ | du̱ḥ-i̱tāya̍ | dhā̱yī̱ḥ |
mathī̍t | yat | ī̱m | vi̱ṣṭaḥ | mā̱ta̱riśvā̍ | hotā̍ram | vi̱śva-a̍psum | vi̱śva-de̍vyam |
ni | yam | da̱dhuḥ | ma̱nu̱ṣyā̍su | vi̱kṣu | sva̍ḥ | na | ci̱tram | vapu̍ṣe | vi̱bhā-va̍m |
da̱dā̱nam | it | na | da̱da̱bha̱nta̱ | manma̍ | a̱gniḥ | varū̍tham | mama̍ | tasya̍ | cā̱ka̱n |
ju̱ṣanta̍ | viśvā̍ni | a̱sya̱ | karma̍ | upa̍-stutim | bhara̍māṇasya | kā̱roḥ |
nitye̍ | ci̱t | nu | yam | sada̍ne | ja̱gṛ̱bhre | praśa̍sti-bhiḥ | da̱dhi̱re | ya̱jñiyā̍saḥ |
pra | su | na̱ya̱nta̱ | gṛ̱bhaya̍ntaḥ | i̱ṣṭau | aśvā̍saḥ | na | ra̱thya̍ḥ | ra̱ra̱hā̱ṇāḥ |
pu̱rūṇi̍ | da̱smaḥ | ni | ri̱ṇā̱ti̱ | jambhai̍ḥ | āt | ro̱ca̱te̱ | vane̍ | ā | vi̱bhā-vā̍ |
āt | a̱sya̱ | vāta̍ḥ | anu̍ | vā̱ti̱ | śo̱ciḥ | astu̍ḥ | na | śaryā̍m | a̱sa̱nām | anu̍ | dyūn |
na | yam | ri̱pava̍ḥ | na | ri̱ṣa̱ṇyava̍ḥ | garbhe̍ | santa̍m | re̱ṣa̱ṇāḥ | re̱ṣaya̍nti |
a̱ndhāḥ | a̱pa̱śyāḥ | na | da̱bha̱n | a̱bhi̱-khyā | nityā̍saḥ | ī̱m | pre̱tāra̍ḥ | a̱ra̱kṣa̱n |
ma̱haḥ | saḥ | rā̱yaḥ | ā | ī̱ṣa̱te̱ | pati̍ḥ | dan | i̱naḥ | i̱nasya̍ | vasu̍naḥ | pa̱de | ā |
upa̍ | dhraja̍ntam | adra̍yaḥ | vi̱dhan | it |
saḥ | yaḥ | vṛṣā̍ | na̱rām | na | roda̍syoḥ | śrava̍ḥ-bhiḥ | asti̍ | jī̱vapī̍ta-sargaḥ |
pra | yaḥ | sa̱srā̱ṇaḥ | śi̱śrī̱ta | yonau̍ |
ā | yaḥ | pura̍m | nārmi̍ṇīm | adī̍det | atya̍ḥ | ka̱viḥ | na̱bha̱nya̍ḥ | na | ārvā̍ |
sūra̍ḥ | na | ru̱ru̱kvān | śa̱ta-ā̍tmā |
a̱bhi | dvi̱-janmā̍ | trī | ro̱ca̱nāni̍ | viśvā̍ | rajā̍ṁsi | śu̱śu̱cā̱naḥ | a̱sthā̱t |
hotā̍ | yaji̍ṣṭhaḥ | a̱pām | sa̱dha-sthe̍ |
a̱yam | saḥ | hotā̍ | yaḥ | dvi̱-janmā̍ | viśvā̍ | da̱dhe | vāryā̍ṇi | śra̱va̱syā |
marta̍ḥ | yaḥ | a̱smai̱ | su̱-tuka̍ḥ | da̱dāśa̍ |
pu̱ru | tvā̱ | dā̱śvān | vo̱ce̱ | a̱riḥ | a̱gne̱ | tava̍ | svi̱t | ā |
to̱dasya̍-iva | śa̱ra̱ṇe | ā | ma̱hasya̍ |
vi | a̱ni̱nasya̍ | dha̱nina̍ḥ | pra̱-ho̱ṣe | ci̱t | ara̍ruṣaḥ |
ka̱dā | ca̱na | pra̱-jiga̍taḥ | ade̍va-yoḥ |
saḥ | ca̱ndraḥ | vi̱pra̱ | martya̍ḥ | ma̱haḥ | vrādha̍n-tamaḥ | di̱vi |
pra-pra̍ | it | te̱ | a̱gne̱ | va̱nuṣa̍ḥ | syā̱ma̱ |
mi̱tram | na | yam | śimyā̍ | goṣu̍ | ga̱vyava̍ḥ | su̱-ā̱dhya̍ḥ | vi̱dathe̍ | a̱p-su | jīja̍nan |
are̍jetām | roda̍sī̱ iti̍ | pāja̍sā | gi̱rā | prati̍ | pri̱yam | ya̱ja̱tam | ja̱nuṣā̍m | ava̍ḥ |
yat | ha̱ | tyat | vā̱m | pu̱ru̱-mī̱ḻhasya̍ | so̱mina̍ḥ | pra | mi̱trāsa̍ḥ | na | da̱dhi̱re | su̱-ā̱bhuva̍ḥ |
adha̍ | kratu̍m | vi̱da̱ta̱m | gā̱tum | arca̍te | u̱ta | śru̱ta̱m | vṛ̱ṣa̱ṇā̱ | pa̱stya̍-vataḥ |
ā | vā̱m | bhū̱ṣa̱n | kṣi̱taya̍ḥ | janma̍ | roda̍syoḥ | pra̱-vācya̍m | vṛ̱ṣa̱ṇā̱ | dakṣa̍se | ma̱he |
yat | ī̱m | ṛ̱tāya̍ | bhara̍thaḥ | yat | arva̍te | pra | hotra̍yā | śimyā̍ | vī̱tha̱ḥ | a̱dhva̱ram |
pra | sā | kṣi̱tiḥ | a̱su̱rā̱ | yā | mahi̍ | pri̱yā | ṛta̍-vānau | ṛ̱tam | ā | gho̱ṣa̱tha̱ḥ | bṛ̱hat |
yu̱vam | di̱vaḥ | bṛ̱ha̱taḥ | dakṣa̍m | ā̱-bhuva̍m | gām | na | dhu̱ri | upa̍ | yu̱ñjā̱the̱ iti̍ | a̱paḥ |
ma̱hī iti̍ | atra̍ | ma̱hi̱nā | vāra̍m | ṛ̱ṇva̱tha̱ḥ | a̱re̱ṇava̍ḥ | tuja̍ḥ | ā | sadma̍n | dhe̱nava̍ḥ |
svara̍nti | tāḥ | u̱pa̱ra-tā̍ti | sūrya̍m | ā | ni̱-mruca̍ḥ | u̱ṣasa̍ḥ | ta̱kva̱vīḥ-i̍va |
ā | vā̱m | ṛ̱tāya̍ | ke̱śinī̍ḥ | a̱nū̱ṣa̱ta̱ | mitra̍ | yatra̍ | varu̍ṇa | gā̱tum | arca̍thaḥ |
ava̍ | tmanā̍ | sṛ̱jata̍m | pinva̍tam | dhiya̍ḥ | yu̱vam | vipra̍sya | manma̍nām | i̱ra̱jya̱tha̱ḥ |
yaḥ | vā̱m | ya̱jñaiḥ | śa̱śa̱mā̱naḥ | ha̱ | dāśa̍ti | ka̱viḥ | hotā̍ | yaja̍ti | ma̱nma̱-sādha̍naḥ |
upa̍ | aha̍ | tam | gaccha̍thaḥ | vī̱thaḥ | a̱dhva̱ram | accha̍ | gira̍ḥ | su̱-ma̱tim | ga̱nta̱m | a̱sma̱yū itya̍sma̱-yū |
yu̱vām | ya̱jñaiḥ | pra̱tha̱mā | gobhi̍ḥ | a̱ñja̱te̱ | ṛta̍-vānā | mana̍saḥ | na | pra-yu̍ktiṣu |
bhara̍nti | vā̱m | manma̍nā | sa̱m-yatā̍ | gira̍ḥ | adṛ̍pyatā | mana̍sā | re̱vat | ā̱śā̱the̱ iti̍ |
re̱vat | vaya̍ḥ | da̱dhā̱the̱ iti̍ | re̱vat | ā̱śā̱the̱ iti̍ | narā̍ | mā̱yābhi̍ḥ | i̱taḥ-ū̍ti | māhi̍nam |
na | vā̱m | dyāva̍ḥ | aha̍-bhiḥ | na | u̱ta | sindha̍vaḥ | na | de̱va̱-tvam | pa̱ṇaya̍ḥ | na | ā̱na̱śu̱ḥ | ma̱gham |
yu̱vam | vastrā̍ṇi | pī̱va̱sā | va̱sā̱the̱ iti̍ | yu̱voḥ | acchi̍drāḥ | manta̍vaḥ | ha̱ | sargā̍ḥ |
ava̍ | a̱ti̱ra̱ta̱m | anṛ̍tāni | viśvā̍ | ṛ̱tena̍ | mi̱trā̱va̱ru̱ṇā̱ | sa̱ce̱the̱ iti̍ |
e̱tat | ca̱na | tva̱ḥ | vi | ci̱ke̱ta̱t | e̱ṣā̱m | sa̱tyaḥ | mantra̍ḥ | ka̱vi̱-śa̱staḥ | ṛghā̍vān |
tri̱ḥ-aśri̍m | ha̱nti̱ | catu̍ḥ-aśriḥ | u̱graḥ | de̱va̱-nida̍ḥ | ha̱ | pra̱tha̱māḥ | a̱jū̱rya̱n |
a̱pāt | e̱ti̱ | pra̱tha̱mā | pa̱t-vatī̍nām | kaḥ | tat | vā̱m | mi̱trā̱va̱ru̱ṇā̱ | ā | ci̱ke̱ta̱ |
garbha̍ḥ | bhā̱ram | bha̱ra̱ti̱ | ā | ci̱t | a̱sya̱ | ṛ̱tam | pipa̍rti | anṛ̍tam | ni | tā̱rīt |
pra̱-yanta̍m | it | pari̍ | jā̱ram | ka̱nīnā̍m | paśyā̍masi | na | u̱pa̱-ni̱padya̍mānam |
ana̍va-pṛgṇā | vi-ta̍tā | vasā̍nam | pri̱yam | mi̱trasya̍ | varu̍ṇasya | dhāma̍ |
a̱na̱śvaḥ | jā̱taḥ | a̱na̱bhī̱śuḥ | arvā̍ | kani̍kradat | pa̱ta̱ya̱t | ū̱rdhva-sā̍nuḥ |
a̱citta̍m | brahma̍ | ju̱ju̱ṣu̱ḥ | yuvā̍naḥ | pra | mi̱tre | dhāma̍ | varu̍ṇe | gṛ̱ṇanta̍ḥ |
ā | dhe̱nava̍ḥ | mā̱ma̱te̱yam | ava̍ntīḥ | bra̱hma̱-priya̍m | pī̱pa̱ya̱n | sasmi̍n | ūdha̍n |
pi̱tvaḥ | bhi̱kṣe̱ta̱ | va̱yunā̍ni | vi̱dvān | ā̱sā | ā̱-vivā̍san | adi̍tim | u̱ru̱ṣye̱t |
ā | vā̱m | mi̱trā̱va̱ru̱ṇā̱ | ha̱vya-ju̍ṣṭim | nama̍sā | de̱vau̱ | ava̍sā | va̱vṛ̱tyā̱m |
a̱smāka̍m | brahma̍ | pṛta̍nāsu | sa̱hyā̱ḥ | a̱smāka̍m | vṛ̱ṣṭiḥ | di̱vyā | su̱-pā̱rā |
yajā̍mahe | vā̱m | ma̱haḥ | sa̱-joṣā̍ḥ | ha̱vyebhi̍ḥ | mi̱trā̱va̱ru̱ṇā̱ | nama̍ḥ-bhiḥ |
ghṛ̱taiḥ | ghṛ̱ta̱snū̱ iti̍ ghṛta-snū | adha̍ | yat | vā̱m | a̱sme iti̍ | a̱dhva̱ryava̍ḥ | na | dhī̱ti-bhi̍ḥ | bhara̍nti |
pra-stu̍tiḥ | vā̱m | dhāma̍ | na | pra-yu̍ktiḥ | ayā̍mi | mi̱trā̱va̱ru̱ṇā̱ | su̱-vṛ̱ktiḥ |
a̱nakti̍ | yat | vā̱m | vi̱dathe̍ṣu | hotā̍ | su̱mnam | vā̱m | sū̱riḥ | vṛ̱ṣa̱ṇau̱ | iya̍kṣan |
pī̱pāya̍ | dhe̱nuḥ | adi̍tiḥ | ṛ̱tāya̍ | janā̍ya | mi̱trā̱va̱ru̱ṇā̱ | ha̱vi̱ḥ-de |
hi̱noti̍ | yat | vā̱m | vi̱dathe̍ | sa̱pa̱ryan | saḥ | rā̱ta-ha̍vyaḥ | mānu̍ṣaḥ | na | hotā̍ |
u̱ta | vā̱m | vi̱kṣu | madyā̍su | andha̍ḥ | gāva̍ḥ | āpa̍ḥ | ca̱ | pī̱pa̱ya̱nta̱ | de̱vīḥ |
u̱to iti̍ | na̱ḥ | a̱sya | pū̱rvyaḥ | pati̍ḥ | dan | vī̱tam | pā̱tam | paya̍saḥ | u̱sriyā̍yāḥ |
viṣṇo̍ḥ | nu | ka̱m | vī̱ryā̍ṇi | pra | vo̱ca̱m | yaḥ | pārthi̍vāni | vi̱-ma̱me | rajā̍ṁsi |
yaḥ | aska̍bhāyat | ut-ta̍ram | sa̱dha-stha̍m | vi̱-ca̱kra̱mā̱ṇaḥ | tre̱dhā | ū̱ru̱-gā̱yaḥ |
pra | tat | viṣṇu̍ḥ | sta̱va̱te̱ | vī̱rye̍ṇa | mṛ̱gaḥ | na | bhī̱maḥ | ku̱ca̱raḥ | gi̱ri̱-sthāḥ |
yasya̍ | u̱ruṣu̍ | tri̱ṣu | vi̱-krama̍ṇeṣu | a̱dhi̱-kṣi̱yanti̍ | bhuva̍nāni | viśvā̍ |
pra | viṣṇa̍ve | śū̱ṣam | e̱tu̱ | manma̍ | gi̱ri̱-kṣite̍ | u̱ru̱-gā̱yāya̍ | vṛṣṇe̍ |
yaḥ | i̱dam | dī̱rgham | pra-ya̍tam | sa̱dha-stha̍m | eka̍ḥ | vi̱-ma̱me | tri̱-bhiḥ | it | pa̱de-bhi̍ḥ |
yasya̍ | trī | pū̱rṇā | madhu̍nā | pa̱dāni̍ | akṣī̍yamāṇā | sva̱dhayā̍ | mada̍nti |
yaḥ | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | tri̱-dhātu̍ | pṛ̱thi̱vīm | u̱ta | dyām | eka̍ḥ | dā̱dhāra̍ | bhuva̍nāni | viśvā̍ |
tat | a̱sya̱ | pri̱yam | a̱bhi | pātha̍ḥ | a̱śyā̱m | nara̍ḥ | yatra̍ | de̱va̱-yava̍ḥ | mada̍nti |
u̱ru̱-kra̱masya̍ | saḥ | hi | bandhu̍ḥ | i̱tthā | viṣṇo̍ḥ | pa̱de | pa̱ra̱me | madhva̍ḥ | utsa̍ḥ |
tā | vā̱m | vāstū̍ni | u̱śma̱si̱ | gama̍dhyai | yatra̍ | gāva̍ḥ | bhūri̍-śṛṅgāḥ | a̱yāsa̍ḥ |
atra̍ | aha̍ | tat | u̱ru̱-gā̱yasya̍ | vṛṣṇa̍ḥ | pa̱ra̱mam | pa̱dam | ava̍ | bhā̱ti̱ | bhūri̍ |
pra | va̱ḥ | pānta̍m | andha̍saḥ | dhi̱yā̱-ya̱te | ma̱he | śūrā̍ya | viṣṇa̍ve | ca̱ | a̱rca̱ta̱ |
yā | sānu̍ni | parva̍tānām | adā̍bhyā | ma̱haḥ | ta̱sthatu̍ḥ | arva̍tā-iva | sā̱dhunā̍ |
tve̱ṣam | i̱tthā | sa̱m-ara̍ṇam | śimī̍-vatoḥ | indrā̍viṣṇū̱ iti̍ | su̱ta̱-pāḥ | vā̱m | u̱ru̱ṣya̱ti̱ |
yā | martyā̍ya | pra̱ti̱-dhī̱yamā̍nam | it | kṛ̱śāno̍ḥ | astu̍ḥ | a̱sa̱nām | u̱ru̱ṣyatha̍ḥ |
tāḥ | ī̱m | va̱rdha̱nti̱ | mahi̍ | a̱sya̱ | pauṁsya̍m | ni | mā̱tarā̍ | na̱ya̱ti̱ | reta̍se | bhu̱je |
dadhā̍ti | pu̱traḥ | ava̍ram | para̍m | pi̱tuḥ | nāma̍ | tṛ̱tīya̍m | adhi̍ | ro̱ca̱ne | di̱vaḥ |
tat-ta̍t | it | a̱sya̱ | pauṁsya̍m | gṛ̱ṇī̱ma̱si̱ | i̱nasya̍ | trā̱tuḥ | a̱vṛ̱kasya̍ | mī̱ḻhuṣa̍ḥ |
yaḥ | pārthi̍vāni | tri̱-bhiḥ | it | vigā̍ma-bhiḥ | u̱ru | krami̍ṣṭa | u̱ru̱-gā̱yāya̍ | jī̱vase̍ |
dve iti̍ | it | a̱sya̱ | krama̍ṇe̱ iti̍ | sva̱ḥ-dṛśa̍ḥ | a̱bhi̱-khyāya̍ | martya̍ḥ | bhu̱ra̱ṇya̱ti̱ |
tṛ̱tīya̍m | a̱sya̱ | naki̍ḥ | ā | da̱dha̱rṣa̱ti̱ | vaya̍ḥ | ca̱na | pa̱taya̍ntaḥ | pa̱ta̱triṇa̍ḥ |
ca̱tuḥ-bhi̍ḥ | sā̱kam | na̱va̱tim | ca̱ | nāma̍-bhiḥ | ca̱kram | na | vṛ̱ttam | vyatī̍n | a̱vī̱vi̱pa̱t |
bṛ̱hat-śa̍rīraḥ | vi̱-mimā̍naḥ | ṛkva̍-bhiḥ | yuvā̍ | aku̍māraḥ | prati̍ | e̱ti̱ | ā̱-ha̱vam |
bhava̍ | mi̱traḥ | na | śevya̍ḥ | ghṛ̱ta-ā̍sutiḥ | vibhū̍ta-dyumnaḥ | e̱va̱-yāḥ | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | sa̱-prathā̍ḥ |
adha̍ | te̱ | vi̱ṣṇo̱ iti̍ | vi̱duṣā̍ | ci̱t | ardhya̍ḥ | stoma̍ḥ | ya̱jñaḥ | ca̱ | rādhya̍ḥ | ha̱viṣma̍tā |
yaḥ | pū̱rvyāya̍ | ve̱dhase̍ | navī̍yase | su̱mat-jā̍naye | viṣṇa̍ve | dadā̍śati |
yaḥ | jā̱tam | a̱sya̱ | ma̱ha̱taḥ | mahi̍ | brava̍t | saḥ | it | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | śrava̍ḥ-bhiḥ | yujya̍m | ci̱t | a̱bhi | a̱sa̱t |
tam | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | sto̱tā̱ra̱ḥ | pū̱rvyam | yathā̍ | vi̱da | ṛ̱tasya̍ | garbha̍m | ja̱nuṣā̍ | pi̱pa̱rta̱na̱ |
ā | a̱sya̱ | jā̱nanta̍ḥ | nāma̍ | ci̱t | vi̱va̱kta̱na̱ | ma̱haḥ | te̱ | vi̱ṣṇo̱ iti̍ | su̱-ma̱tim | bha̱jā̱ma̱he̱ |
tam | a̱sya̱ | rājā̍ | varu̍ṇaḥ | tam | a̱śvinā̍ | kratu̍m | sa̱ca̱nta̱ | māru̍tasya | ve̱dhasa̍ḥ |
dā̱dhāra̍ | dakṣa̍m | u̱t-ta̱mam | a̱ha̱ḥ-vida̍m | va̱rjam | ca̱ | viṣṇu̍ḥ | sakhi̍-vān | a̱pa̱-ū̱rṇu̱te |
ā | yaḥ | vi̱vāya̍ | sa̱cathā̍ya | daivya̍ḥ | indrā̍ya | viṣṇu̍ḥ | su̱-kṛte̍ | su̱kṛt-ta̍raḥ |
ve̱dhāḥ | a̱ji̱nva̱t | tri̱-sa̱dha̱sthaḥ | ārya̍m | ṛ̱tasya̍ | bhā̱ge | yaja̍mānam | ā | a̱bha̱ja̱t |
abo̍dhi | a̱gniḥ | jmaḥ | ut | e̱ti̱ | sūrya̍ḥ | vi | u̱ṣāḥ | ca̱ndrā | ma̱hī | ā̱va̱ḥ | a̱rciṣā̍ |
ayu̍kṣātām | a̱śvinā̍ | yāta̍ve | ratha̍m | pra | a̱sā̱vī̱t | de̱vaḥ | sa̱vi̱tā | jaga̍t | pṛtha̍k |
yat | yu̱ñjāthe̱ iti̍ | vṛṣa̍ṇam | a̱śvi̱nā̱ | ratha̍m | ghṛ̱tena̍ | na̱ḥ | madhu̍nā | kṣa̱tram | u̱kṣa̱ta̱m |
a̱smāka̍m | brahma̍ | pṛta̍nāsu | ji̱nva̱ta̱m | va̱yam | dhanā̍ | śūra̍-sātā | bha̱je̱ma̱hi̱ |
a̱rvāṅ | tri̱-ca̱kraḥ | ma̱dhu̱-vāha̍naḥ | ratha̍ḥ | jī̱ra-a̍śvaḥ | a̱śvino̍ḥ | yā̱tu̱ | su-stu̍taḥ |
tri̱-va̱ndhu̱raḥ | ma̱gha-vā̍ | vi̱śva-sau̍bhagaḥ | śam | na̱ḥ | ā | va̱kṣa̱t | dvi̱-pade̍ | catu̍ḥ-pade |
ā | na̱ḥ | ūrja̍m | va̱ha̱ta̱m | a̱śvi̱nā̱ | yu̱vam | madhu̍-matyā | na̱ḥ | kaśa̍yā | mi̱mi̱kṣa̱ta̱m |
pra | āyu̍ḥ | tāri̍ṣṭam | niḥ | rapā̍ṁsi | mṛ̱kṣa̱ta̱m | sedha̍tam | dveṣa̍ḥ | bhava̍tam | sa̱cā̱-bhuvā̍ |
yu̱vam | ha̱ | garbha̍m | jaga̍tīṣu | dha̱ttha̱ḥ | yu̱vam | viśve̍ṣu | bhuva̍neṣu | a̱ntariti̍ |
yu̱vam | a̱gnim | ca̱ | vṛ̱ṣa̱ṇau̱ | a̱paḥ | ca̱ | vana̱spatī̍n | a̱śvi̱nau̱ | aira̍yethām |
yu̱vam | ha̱ | stha̱ḥ | bhi̱ṣajā̍ | bhe̱ṣa̱jebhi̍ḥ | atho̱ iti̍ | ha̱ | stha̱ḥ | ra̱thyā̍ | rathye̍bhi̱riti̱ rathye̍bhiḥ |
atho̱ iti̍ | ha̱ | kṣa̱tram | adhi̍ | dha̱ttha̱ | u̱grā̱ | yaḥ | vā̱m | ha̱viṣmā̍n | mana̍sā | da̱dāśa̍ |
vasū̱ iti̍ | ru̱drā | pu̱ru̱mantū̱ iti̍ pu̱ru̱-mantū̍ | vṛ̱dhantā̍ | da̱śa̱syata̍m | na̱ḥ | vṛ̱ṣa̱ṇau̱ | a̱bhiṣṭau̍ |
dasrā̍ | ha̱ | yat | rekṇa̍ḥ | au̱ca̱thyaḥ | vā̱m | pra | yat | sa̱srāthe̱ iti̍ | aka̍vābhiḥ | ū̱tī |
kaḥ | vā̱m | dā̱śa̱t | su̱-ma̱taye̍ | ci̱t | a̱syai | vasū̱ iti̍ | yat | dhethe̱ iti̍ | nama̍sā | pa̱de | goḥ |
ji̱gṛ̱tam | a̱sme iti̍ | re̱vatī̍ḥ | pura̍m-dhīḥ | kā̱ma̱preṇa̍-iva | mana̍sā | cara̍ntā |
yu̱ktaḥ | ha̱ | yat | vā̱m | tau̱gryāya̍ | pe̱ruḥ | vi | madhye̍ | arṇa̍saḥ | dhāyi̍ | pa̱jraḥ |
upa̍ | vā̱m | ava̍ḥ | śa̱ra̱ṇam | ga̱me̱ya̱m | śūra̍ḥ | na | ajma̍ | pa̱taya̍t-bhiḥ | evai̍ḥ |
upa̍-stutiḥ | au̱ca̱thyam | u̱ru̱ṣye̱t | mā | mām | i̱me iti̍ | pa̱ta̱triṇī̱ iti̍ | vi | du̱gdhā̱m |
mā | mām | edha̍ḥ | daśa̍-tayaḥ | ci̱taḥ | dhā̱k | pra | yat | vā̱m | ba̱ddhaḥ | tmani̍ | khāda̍ti | kṣām |
na | mā̱ | ga̱ra̱n | na̱dya̍ḥ | mā̱tṛ-ta̍māḥ | dā̱sāḥ | yat | ī̱m | su-sa̍mubdham | a̱va̱-adhu̍ḥ |
śira̍ḥ | yat | a̱sya̱ | trai̱ta̱naḥ | vi̱-takṣa̍t | sva̱yam | dā̱saḥ | ura̍ḥ | aṁsau̍ | api̍ | gdheti̍ gdha |
dī̱rgha-ta̍māḥ | mā̱ma̱te̱yaḥ | ju̱ju̱rvān | da̱śa̱me | yu̱ge |
a̱pām | artha̍m | ya̱tīnā̍m | bra̱hmā | bha̱va̱ti̱ | sāra̍thiḥ |
pra | dyāvā̍ | ya̱jñaiḥ | pṛ̱thi̱vī iti̍ | ṛ̱ta̱-vṛdhā̍ | ma̱hī iti̍ | stu̱ṣe̱ | vi̱dathe̍ṣu | pra-ce̍tasā |
de̱vebhi̍ḥ | ye iti̍ | de̱va-pu̍tre̱ iti̍ de̱va-pu̍tre | su̱-daṁsa̍sā | i̱tthā | dhi̱yā | vāryā̍ṇi | pra̱-bhūṣa̍taḥ |
u̱ta | ma̱nye̱ | pi̱tuḥ | a̱druha̍ḥ | mana̍ḥ | mā̱tuḥ | mahi̍ | sva-ta̍vaḥ | tat | havī̍ma-bhiḥ |
su̱-reta̍sā | pi̱tarā̍ | bhūma̍ | ca̱kra̱tu̱ḥ | u̱ru | pra̱-jāyā̍ḥ | a̱mṛta̍m | varī̍ma-bhiḥ |
te | sū̱nava̍ḥ | su̱-apa̍saḥ | su̱-daṁsa̍saḥ | ma̱hī iti̍ | ja̱jñu̱ḥ | mā̱tarā̍ | pū̱rva-ci̍ttaye |
sthā̱tuḥ | ca̱ | sa̱tyam | jaga̍taḥ | ca̱ | dharma̍ṇi | pu̱trasya̍ | pā̱tha̱ḥ | pa̱dam | adva̍yāvinaḥ |
te | mā̱yina̍ḥ | ma̱mi̱re̱ | su̱-prace̍tasaḥ | jā̱mī iti̍ | sayo̍nī̱ iti̱ sa-yo̍nī | mi̱thu̱nā | sam-o̍kasā |
navya̍m-navyam | tantu̍m | ā | ta̱nva̱te | di̱vi | sa̱mu̱dre | a̱ntariti̍ | ka̱vaya̍ḥ | su̱-dī̱taya̍ḥ |
tat | rādha̍ḥ | a̱dya | sa̱vi̱tuḥ | vare̍ṇyam | va̱yam | de̱vasya̍ | pra̱-sa̱ve | ma̱nā̱ma̱he̱ |
a̱smabhya̍m | dyā̱vā̱pṛ̱thi̱vī̱ iti̍ | su̱-ce̱tunā̍ | ra̱yim | dha̱tta̱m | vasu̍-mantam | śa̱ta̱-gvina̍m |
te iti̍ | hi | dyāvā̍pṛthi̱vī iti̍ | vi̱śva-śa̍mbhuvā | ṛ̱tava̍rī̱ ityṛ̱ta-va̍rī | raja̍saḥ | dhā̱ra̱yatka̍vī̱ iti̍ dhā̱ra̱yat-ka̍vī |
su̱janma̍nī̱ iti̍ su̱-janma̍nī | dhi̱ṣaṇe̱ iti̍ | a̱ntaḥ | ī̱ya̱te̱ | de̱vaḥ | de̱vī iti̍ | dharma̍ṇā | sūrya̍ḥ | śuci̍ḥ |
u̱ru̱-vyaca̍sā | ma̱hinī̱ iti̍ | a̱sa̱ścatā̍ | pi̱tā | mā̱tā | ca̱ | bhuva̍nāni | ra̱kṣa̱ta̱ḥ |
su̱dhṛṣṭa̍me̱ iti̍ su̱-dhṛṣṭa̍me | va̱pu̱ṣye̱3̱̍ iti̍ | na | roda̍sī̱ iti̍ | pi̱tā | yat | sī̱m | a̱bhi | rū̱paiḥ | avā̍sayat |
saḥ | vahni̍ḥ | pu̱traḥ | pi̱troḥ | pa̱vitra̍-vān | pu̱nāti̍ | dhīra̍ḥ | bhuva̍nāni | mā̱yayā̍ |
dhe̱num | ca̱ | pṛśni̍m | vṛ̱ṣa̱bham | su̱-reta̍sam | vi̱śvāhā̍ | śu̱kram | paya̍ḥ | a̱sya̱ | dhu̱kṣa̱ta̱ |
a̱yam | de̱vānā̍m | a̱pasā̍m | a̱paḥ-ta̍maḥ | yaḥ | ja̱jāna̍ | roda̍sī̱ iti̍ | vi̱śva-śa̍mbhuvā |
vi | yaḥ | ma̱me | raja̍sī̱ iti̍ | su̱kra̱tu̱-yayā̍ | a̱jare̍bhiḥ | skambha̍nebhiḥ | sam | ā̱nṛ̱ce̱ |
te iti̍ | na̱ḥ | gṛ̱ṇā̱ne iti̍ | ma̱hi̱nī̱ iti̍ | mahi̍ | śrava̍ḥ | kṣa̱tram | dyā̱vā̱pṛ̱thi̱vī̱ iti̍ | dhā̱sa̱tha̱ḥ | bṛ̱hat |
yena̍ | a̱bhi | kṛ̱ṣṭīḥ | ta̱tanā̍ma | vi̱śvahā̍ | pa̱nāyya̍m | oja̍ḥ | a̱sme iti̍ | sam | i̱nva̱ta̱m |
kim | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | śreṣṭha̍ḥ | kim | yavi̍ṣṭhaḥ | na̱ḥ | ā | a̱ja̱ga̱n | kim | ī̱ya̱te̱ | dū̱tya̍m | kat | yat | ū̱ci̱ma |
na | ni̱ndi̱ma̱ | ca̱ma̱sam | yaḥ | ma̱hā̱-ku̱laḥ | agne̍ | bhrā̱ta̱ḥ | druṇa̍ḥ | it | bhū̱tim | ū̱di̱ma̱ |
eka̍m | ca̱ma̱sam | ca̱tura̍ḥ | kṛ̱ṇo̱ta̱na̱ | tat | va̱ḥ | de̱vāḥ | a̱bru̱va̱n | tat | va̱ḥ | ā | a̱ga̱ma̱m |
saudha̍nvanāḥ | yadi̍ | e̱va | ka̱ri̱ṣyatha̍ | sā̱kam | de̱vaiḥ | ya̱jñiyā̍saḥ | bha̱vi̱ṣya̱tha̱ |
a̱gnim | dū̱tam | prati̍ | yat | abra̍vītana | aśva̍ḥ | kartva̍ḥ | ratha̍ḥ | u̱ta | i̱ha | kartva̍ḥ |
dhe̱nuḥ | kartvā̍ | yu̱va̱śā | kartvā̍ | dvā | tāni̍ | bhrā̱ta̱ḥ | anu̍ | va̱ḥ | kṛ̱tvī | ā | i̱ma̱si̱ |
ca̱kṛ̱-vāṁsa̍ḥ | ṛ̱bha̱va̱ḥ | tat | a̱pṛ̱ccha̱ta̱ | kva̍ | it | a̱bhū̱t | yaḥ | syaḥ | dū̱taḥ | na̱ḥ | ā | aja̍gan |
ya̱dā | a̱va̱-akhya̍t | ca̱ma̱sān | ca̱tura̍ḥ | kṛ̱tān | āt | it | tvaṣṭā̍ | gnāsu̍ | a̱ntaḥ | ni | ā̱na̱je̱ |
hanā̍ma | e̱nā̱n | iti̍ | tvaṣṭā̍ | yat | abra̍vīt | ca̱ma̱sam | ye | de̱va̱-pāna̍m | ani̍ndiṣuḥ |
a̱nyā | nāmā̍ni | kṛ̱ṇva̱te̱ | su̱te | sacā̍ | a̱nyaiḥ | e̱nā̱n | ka̱nyā̍ | nāma̍-bhiḥ | spa̱ra̱t |
indra̍ḥ | harī̍ | yu̱yu̱je | a̱śvinā̍ | ratha̍m | bṛha̱spati̍ḥ | vi̱śva-rū̍pām | upa̍ | ā̱ja̱ta̱ |
ṛ̱bhuḥ | vi-bhvā̍ | vāja̍ḥ | de̱vān | a̱ga̱ccha̱ta̱ | su̱-apa̍saḥ | ya̱jñiya̍m | bhā̱gam | ai̱ta̱na̱ |
niḥ | carma̍ṇaḥ | gām | a̱ri̱ṇī̱ta̱ | dhī̱ti-bhi̍ḥ | yā | jara̍ntā | yu̱va̱śā | tā | a̱kṛ̱ṇo̱ta̱na̱ |
saudha̍nvanāḥ | aśvā̍t | aśva̍m | a̱ta̱kṣa̱ta̱ | yu̱ktvā | ratha̍m | upa̍ | de̱vān | a̱yā̱ta̱na̱ |
i̱dam | u̱da̱kam | pi̱ba̱ta̱ | iti̍ | a̱bra̱vī̱ta̱na̱ | i̱dam | vā̱ | gha̱ | pi̱ba̱ta̱ | mu̱ñja̱-neja̍nam |
saudha̍nvanāḥ | yadi̍ | tat | na-i̍va | harya̍tha | tṛ̱tīye̍ | gha̱ | sava̍ne | mā̱da̱yā̱dhvai̱ |
āpa̍ḥ | bhūyi̍ṣṭhāḥ | iti̍ | eka̍ḥ | a̱bra̱vī̱t | a̱gniḥ | bhūyi̍ṣṭhaḥ | iti̍ | a̱nyaḥ | a̱bra̱vī̱t |
va̱dha̱ḥ-yantī̍m | ba̱hu-bhya̍ḥ | pra | eka̍ḥ | a̱bra̱vī̱t | ṛ̱tā | vada̍ntaḥ | ca̱ma̱sān | a̱pi̱ṁśa̱ta̱ |
śro̱ṇām | eka̍ḥ | u̱da̱kam | gām | ava̍ | a̱ja̱ti̱ | mā̱ṁsam | eka̍ḥ | pi̱ṁśa̱ti̱ | sū̱nayā̍ | ā-bhṛ̍tam |
ā | ni̱-mruca̍ḥ | śakṛ̍t | eka̍ḥ | apa̍ | a̱bha̱ra̱t | kim | svi̱t | pu̱trebhya̍ḥ | pi̱tarau̍ | upa̍ | ā̱va̱tu̱ḥ |
u̱dvat-su̍ | a̱smai̱ | a̱kṛ̱ṇo̱ta̱na̱ | tṛṇa̍m | ni̱vat-su̍ | a̱paḥ | su̱-a̱pa̱syayā̍ | na̱ra̱ḥ |
ago̍hyasya | yat | asa̍stana | gṛ̱he | tat | a̱dya | i̱dam | ṛ̱bha̱va̱ḥ | na | anu̍ | ga̱ccha̱tha̱ |
sa̱m-mīlya̍ | yat | bhuva̍nā | pa̱ri̱-asa̍rpata | kva̍ | svi̱t | tā̱tyā | pi̱tarā̍ | va̱ḥ | ā̱sa̱tu̱ḥ |
aśa̍pata | yaḥ | ka̱rasna̍m | va̱ḥ | ā̱-da̱de | yaḥ | pra | abra̍vīt | pro iti̍ | tasmai̍ | a̱bra̱vī̱ta̱na̱ |
su̱su̱pvāṁsa̍ḥ | ṛ̱bha̱va̱ḥ | tat | a̱pṛ̱ccha̱ta̱ | ago̍hya | kaḥ | i̱dam | na̱ḥ | a̱bū̱bu̱dha̱t |
śvāna̍m | ba̱staḥ | bo̱dha̱yi̱tāra̍m | a̱bra̱vī̱t | sa̱ṁva̱tsa̱re | i̱dam | a̱dya | vi | a̱khya̱ta̱ |
di̱vā | yā̱nti̱ | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | bhūmyā̍ | a̱gniḥ | a̱yam | vāta̍ḥ | a̱ntari̍kṣeṇa | yā̱ti̱ |
a̱t-bhiḥ | yā̱ti̱ | varu̍ṇaḥ | sa̱mu̱draiḥ | yu̱ṣmān | i̱cchanta̍ḥ | śa̱va̱sa̱ḥ | na̱pā̱ta̱ḥ |
mā | na̱ḥ | mi̱traḥ | varu̍ṇaḥ | a̱rya̱mā | ā̱yuḥ | indra̍ḥ | ṛ̱bhu̱kṣāḥ | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | pari̍ | khya̱n |
yat | vā̱jina̍ḥ | de̱va-jā̍tasya | sapte̍ḥ | pra̱-va̱kṣyāma̍ḥ | vi̱dathe̍ | vī̱ryā̍ṇi |
yat | ni̱ḥ-nijā̍ | rekṇa̍sā | prāvṛ̍tasya | rā̱tim | gṛ̱bhī̱tām | mu̱kha̱taḥ | naya̍nti |
su-prā̍ṅ | a̱jaḥ | memya̍t | vi̱śva-rū̍paḥ | i̱ndrā̱pū̱ṣṇoḥ | pri̱yam | api̍ | e̱ti̱ | pātha̍ḥ |
e̱ṣaḥ | chāga̍ḥ | pu̱raḥ | aśve̍na | vā̱jinā̍ | pū̱ṣṇaḥ | bhā̱gaḥ | nī̱ya̱te̱ | vi̱śva-de̍vyaḥ |
a̱bhi̱-priya̍m | yat | pu̱ro̱ḻāśa̍m | arva̍tā | tvaṣṭā̍ | it | e̱na̱m | sau̱śra̱va̱sāya̍ | ji̱nva̱ti̱ |
yat | ha̱vi̱ṣya̍m | ṛ̱tu̱-śaḥ | de̱va̱-yāna̍m | triḥ | mānu̍ṣāḥ | pari̍ | aśva̍m | naya̍nti |
atra̍ | pū̱ṣṇaḥ | pra̱tha̱maḥ | bhā̱gaḥ | e̱ti̱ | ya̱jñam | de̱vebhya̍ḥ | pra̱ti̱-ve̱daya̍n | a̱jaḥ |
hotā̍ | a̱dhva̱ryuḥ | ā-va̍yāḥ | a̱gni̱m-i̱ndhaḥ | grā̱va̱-grā̱bhaḥ | u̱ta | śaṁstā̍ | su-vi̍praḥ |
tena̍ | ya̱jñena̍ | su-a̍raṁkṛtena | su-i̍ṣṭena | va̱kṣaṇā̍ḥ | ā | pṛ̱ṇa̱dhva̱m |
yū̱pa̱-vra̱skāḥ | u̱ta | ye | yū̱pa̱-vā̱hāḥ | ca̱ṣāla̍m | ye | a̱śva̱-yū̱pāya̍ | takṣa̍ti |
ye | ca̱ | arva̍te | paca̍nam | sa̱m-bhara̍nti | u̱to iti̍ | teṣā̍m | a̱bhi-gū̍rtiḥ | na̱ḥ | i̱nva̱tu̱ |
upa̍ | pra | a̱gā̱t | su̱-mat | me̱ | a̱dhā̱yi̱ | manma̍ | de̱vānā̍m | āśā̍ḥ | upa̍ | vī̱ta-pṛ̍ṣṭhaḥ |
anu̍ | e̱na̱m | viprā̍ḥ | ṛṣa̍yaḥ | ma̱da̱nti̱ | de̱vānā̍m | pu̱ṣṭe | ca̱kṛ̱ma̱ | su̱-bandhu̍m |
yat | vā̱jina̍ḥ | dāma̍ | sa̱m-dāna̍m | arva̍taḥ | yā | śī̱rṣa̱ṇyā̍ | ra̱śa̱nā | rajju̍ḥ | a̱sya̱ |
yat | vā̱ | gha̱ | a̱sya̱ | pra-bhṛ̍tam | ā̱sye̍ | tṛṇa̍m | sarvā̍ | tā | te̱ | api̍ | de̱veṣu̍ | a̱stu̱ |
yat | aśva̍sya | kra̱viṣa̍ḥ | makṣi̍kā | āśa̍ | yat | vā̱ | svarau̍ | sva-dhi̍tau | ri̱ptam | asti̍ |
yat | hasta̍yoḥ | śa̱mi̱tuḥ | yat | na̱kheṣu̍ | sarvā̍ | tā | te̱ | api̍ | de̱veṣu̍ | a̱stu̱ |
yat | ūva̍dhyam | u̱dara̍sya | a̱pa̱-vāti̍ | yaḥ | ā̱masya̍ | kra̱viṣa̍ḥ | ga̱ndhaḥ | asti̍ |
su̱-kṛ̱tā | tat | śa̱mi̱tāra̍ḥ | kṛ̱ṇva̱ntu̱ | u̱ta | medha̍m | śṛ̱ta̱-pāka̍m | pa̱ca̱ntu̱ |
yat | te̱ | gātrā̍t | a̱gninā̍ | pa̱cyamā̍nāt | a̱bhi | śūla̍m | ni-ha̍tasya | a̱va̱-dhāva̍ti |
mā | tat | bhūmyā̍m | ā | śri̱ṣa̱t | mā | tṛṇe̍ṣu | de̱vebhya̍ḥ | tat | u̱śat-bhya̍ḥ | rā̱tam | a̱stu̱ |
ye | vā̱jina̍m | pa̱ri̱-paśya̍nti | pa̱kvam | ye | ī̱m | ā̱huḥ | su̱ra̱bhiḥ | niḥ | ha̱ra̱ | iti̍ |
ye | ca̱ | arva̍taḥ | mā̱ṁsa̱-bhi̱kṣām | u̱pa̱-āsa̍te | u̱to iti̍ | teṣā̍m | a̱bhi-gū̍rtiḥ | na̱ḥ | i̱nva̱tu̱ |
yat | ni̱-īkṣa̍ṇam | mā̱ṁspaca̍nyāḥ | u̱khāyā̍ḥ | yā | pātrā̍ṇi | yū̱ṣṇaḥ | ā̱-seca̍nāni |
ū̱ṣma̱ṇyā̍ | a̱pi̱-dhānā̍ | ca̱rū̱ṇām | a̱ṅkāḥ | sū̱nāḥ | pari̍ | bhū̱ṣa̱nti̱ | aśva̍m |
ni̱-krama̍ṇam | ni̱-sada̍nam | vi̱-varta̍nam | yat | ca̱ | paḍbī̍śam | arva̍taḥ |
yat | ca̱ | pa̱pau | yat | ca̱ | ghā̱sim | ja̱ghāsa̍ | sarvā̍ | tā | te̱ | api̍ | de̱veṣu̍ | a̱stu̱ |
mā | tvā̱ | a̱gniḥ | dhva̱na̱yī̱t | dhū̱ma-ga̍ndhiḥ | mā | u̱khā | bhrāja̍ntī | a̱bhi | vi̱kta̱ | jaghri̍ḥ |
i̱ṣṭam | vī̱tam | a̱bhi-gū̍rtam | vaṣa̍ṭ-kṛtam | tam | de̱vāsa̍ḥ | prati̍ | gṛ̱bhṇa̱nti̱ | aśva̍m |
yat | aśvā̍ya | vāsa̍ḥ | u̱pa̱-stṛ̱ṇanti̍ | a̱dhī̱vā̱sam | yā | hira̍ṇyāni | a̱smai̱ |
sa̱m-dāna̍m | arva̍ntam | paḍbī̍śam | pri̱yā | de̱veṣu̍ | ā | ya̱ma̱ya̱nti̱ |
yat | te̱ | sā̱de | maha̍sā | śūkṛ̍tasya | pārṣṇyā̍ | vā̱ | kaśa̍yā | vā̱ | tu̱toda̍ |
sru̱cā-i̍va | tā | ha̱viṣa̍ḥ | a̱dhva̱reṣu̍ | sarvā̍ | tā | te̱ | brahma̍ṇā | sū̱da̱yā̱mi̱ |
catu̍ḥ-triṁśat | vā̱jina̍ḥ | de̱va-ba̍ndhoḥ | vaṅkrī̍ḥ | aśva̍sya | sva-dhi̍tiḥ | sam | e̱ti̱ |
acchi̍drā | gātrā̍ | va̱yunā̍ | kṛ̱ṇo̱ta̱ | paru̍ḥ-paruḥ | a̱nu̱-ghuṣya̍ | vi | śa̱sta̱ |
eka̍ḥ | tvaṣṭu̍ḥ | aśva̍sya | vi̱-śa̱stā | dvā | ya̱ntārā̍ | bha̱va̱ta̱ḥ | tathā̍ | ṛ̱tuḥ |
yā | te̱ | gātrā̍ṇām | ṛ̱tu̱-thā | kṛ̱ṇomi̍ | tā-tā̍ | piṇḍā̍nām | pra | ju̱ho̱mi̱ | a̱gnau |
mā | tvā̱ | ta̱pa̱t | pri̱yaḥ | ā̱tmā | a̱pi̱-yanta̍m | mā | sva-dhi̍tiḥ | ta̱nva̍ḥ | ā | ti̱sthi̱pa̱t | te̱ |
mā | te̱ | gṛ̱dhnuḥ | a̱vi̱-śa̱stā | a̱ti̱-hāya̍ | chi̱drā | gātrā̍ṇi | a̱sinā̍ | mithu̍ | ka̱riti̍ kaḥ |
na | vai | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | e̱tat | mri̱ya̱se̱ | na | ri̱ṣya̱si̱ | de̱vān | it | e̱ṣi̱ | pa̱thi-bhi̍ḥ | su̱-gebhi̍ḥ |
harī̱ iti̍ | te̱ | yuñjā̍ | pṛṣa̍tī̱ iti̍ | a̱bhū̱tā̱m | upa̍ | a̱sthā̱t | vā̱jī | dhu̱ri | rāsa̍bhasya |
su̱-gavya̍m | na̱ḥ | vā̱jī | su̱-aśvya̍m | pu̱ṁsaḥ | pu̱trān | u̱ta | vi̱śva̱-puṣa̍m | ra̱yim |
a̱nā̱gā̱ḥ-tvam | na̱ḥ | adi̍tiḥ | kṛ̱ṇo̱tu̱ | kṣa̱tram | na̱ḥ | aśva̍ḥ | va̱na̱tā̱m | ha̱viṣmā̍n |
yat | akra̍ndaḥ | pra̱tha̱mam | jāya̍mānaḥ | u̱t-yan | sa̱mu̱drāt | u̱ta | vā̱ | purī̍ṣāt |
śye̱nasya̍ | pa̱kṣā | ha̱ri̱ṇasya̍ | bā̱hū iti̍ | u̱pa̱-stutya̍m | mahi̍ | jā̱tam | te̱ | a̱rva̱n |
ya̱mena̍ | da̱ttam | tri̱taḥ | e̱na̱m | a̱yu̱na̱k | indra̍ḥ | e̱na̱m | pra̱tha̱maḥ | adhi̍ | a̱ti̱ṣṭha̱t |
ga̱ndha̱rvaḥ | a̱sya̱ | ra̱śa̱nām | a̱gṛ̱bhṇā̱t | sūrā̍t | aśva̍m | va̱sa̱va̱ḥ | niḥ | a̱ta̱ṣṭa̱ |
asi̍ | ya̱maḥ | asi̍ | ā̱di̱tyaḥ | a̱rva̱n | asi̍ | tri̱taḥ | guhye̍na | vra̱tena̍ |
asi̍ | some̍na | sa̱mayā̍ | vi-pṛ̍ktaḥ | ā̱huḥ | te̱ | trīṇi̍ | di̱vi | bandha̍nāni |
trīṇi̍ | te̱ | ā̱hu̱ḥ | di̱vi | bandha̍nāni | trīṇi̍ | a̱p-su | trīṇi̍ | a̱ntariti̍ | sa̱mu̱dre |
u̱ta-i̍va | me̱ | varu̍ṇaḥ | cha̱ntsi̱ | a̱rva̱n | yatra̍ | te̱ | ā̱huḥ | pa̱ra̱mam | ja̱nitra̍m |
i̱mā | te̱ | vā̱ji̱n | a̱va̱-mārja̍nāni | i̱mā | śa̱phānā̍m | sa̱ni̱tuḥ | ni̱-dhānā̍ |
atra̍ | te̱ | bha̱drāḥ | ra̱śa̱nāḥ | a̱pa̱śya̱m | ṛ̱tasya̍ | yāḥ | a̱bhi̱-rakṣa̍nti | go̱pāḥ |
ā̱tmāna̍m | te̱ | mana̍sā | ā̱rāt | a̱jā̱nā̱m | a̱vaḥ | di̱vā | pa̱taya̍ntam | pa̱ta̱ṅgam |
śira̍ḥ | a̱pa̱śya̱m | pa̱thi-bhi̍ḥ | su̱-gebhi̍ḥ | a̱re̱ṇu-bhi̍ḥ | jeha̍mānam | pa̱ta̱tri |
atra̍ | te̱ | rū̱pam | u̱t-ta̱mam | a̱pa̱śya̱m | jigī̍ṣamāṇam | i̱ṣaḥ | ā | pa̱de | goḥ |
ya̱dā | te̱ | marta̍ḥ | anu̍ | bhoga̍m | āna̍ṭ | āt | it | grasi̍ṣṭhaḥ | oṣa̍dhīḥ | a̱jī̱ga̱riti̍ |
anu̍ | tvā̱ | ratha̍ḥ | anu̍ | marya̍ḥ | a̱rva̱n | anu̍ | gāva̍ḥ | anu̍ | bhaga̍ḥ | ka̱nīnā̍m |
anu̍ | vrātā̍saḥ | tava̍ | sa̱khyam | ī̱yu̱ḥ | anu̍ | de̱vāḥ | ma̱mi̱re̱ | vī̱rya̍m | te̱ |
hira̍ṇya-śṛṅgaḥ | aya̍ḥ | a̱sya̱ | pādā̍ḥ | mana̍ḥ-javāḥ | ava̍raḥ | indra̍ḥ | ā̱sī̱t |
de̱vāḥ | it | a̱sya̱ | ha̱vi̱ḥ-adya̍m | ā̱ya̱n | yaḥ | arva̍ntam | pra̱tha̱maḥ | a̱dhi̱-ati̍ṣṭhat |
ī̱rma-a̍ntāsaḥ | sili̍ka-madhyamāsaḥ | sam | śūra̍ṇāsaḥ | di̱vyāsa̍ḥ | atyā̍ḥ |
ha̱ṁsāḥ-i̍va | śre̱ṇi̱-śaḥ | ya̱ta̱nte̱ | yat | ākṣi̍ṣuḥ | di̱vyam | ajma̍m | aśvā̍ḥ |
tava̍ | śarī̍ram | pa̱ta̱yi̱ṣṇu | a̱rva̱n | tava̍ | ci̱ttam | vāta̍ḥ-iva | dhrajī̍mān |
tava̍ | śṛṅgā̍ṇi | vi-sthi̍tā | pu̱ru̱-trā | ara̍ṇyeṣu | jarbhu̍rāṇā | ca̱ra̱nti̱ |
upa̍ | pra | a̱gā̱t | śasa̍nam | vā̱jī | arvā̍ | de̱va̱drīcā̍ | mana̍sā | dīdhyā̍naḥ |
a̱jaḥ | pu̱raḥ | nī̱ya̱te̱ | nābhi̍ḥ | a̱sya̱ | anu̍ | pa̱ścāt | ka̱vaya̍ḥ | ya̱nti̱ | re̱bhāḥ |
upa̍ | pra | a̱gā̱t | pa̱ra̱mam | yat | sa̱dha-stha̍m | arvā̍n | accha̍ | pi̱tara̍m | mā̱tara̍m | ca̱ |
a̱dya | de̱vān | juṣṭa̍-tamaḥ | hi | ga̱myāḥ | atha̍ | ā | śā̱ste̱ | dā̱śuṣe̍ | vāryā̍ṇi |
a̱sya | vā̱masya̍ | pa̱li̱tasya̍ | hotu̍ḥ | tasya̍ | bhrātā̍ | ma̱dhya̱maḥ | a̱sti̱ | aśna̍ḥ |
tṛ̱tīya̍ḥ | bhrātā̍ | ghṛ̱ta-pṛ̍ṣṭhaḥ | a̱sya̱ | atra̍ | a̱pa̱śya̱m | vi̱śpati̍m | sa̱pta-pu̍tram |
sa̱pta | yu̱ñja̱nti̱ | ratha̍m | eka̍-cakram | eka̍ḥ | aśva̍ḥ | va̱ha̱ti̱ | sa̱pta-nā̍mā |
tri̱-nābhi̍ | ca̱kram | a̱jara̍m | a̱na̱rvam | yatra̍ | i̱mā | viśvā̍ | bhuva̍nā | adhi̍ | ta̱sthuḥ |
i̱mam | ratha̍m | adhi̍ | ye | sa̱pta | ta̱sthuḥ | sa̱pta-ca̍kram | sa̱pta | va̱ha̱nti̱ | aśvā̍ḥ |
sa̱pta | svasā̍raḥ | a̱bhi | sam | na̱va̱nte̱ | yatra̍ | gavā̍m | ni-hi̍tā | sa̱pta | nāma̍ |
kaḥ | da̱da̱rśa̱ | pra̱tha̱mam | jāya̍mānam | a̱stha̱n-vanta̍m | yat | a̱na̱sthā | bibha̍rti |
bhūmyā̍ḥ | asu̍ḥ | asṛ̍k | ā̱tmā | kva̍ | svi̱t | kaḥ | vi̱dvāṁsa̍m | upa̍ | gā̱t | praṣṭu̍m | e̱tat |
pāka̍ḥ | pṛ̱cchā̱mi̱ | mana̍sā | avi̍-jānan | de̱vānā̍m | e̱nā | ni-hi̍tā | pa̱dāni̍ |
va̱tse | ba̱ṣkaye̍ | adhi̍ | sa̱pta | tantū̍n | vi | ta̱tni̱re̱ | ka̱vaya̍ḥ | ota̱vai | ū̱m̐ iti̍ |
aci̍kitvān | ci̱ki̱tuṣa̍ḥ | ci̱t | atra̍ | ka̱vīn | pṛ̱cchā̱mi̱ | vi̱dmane̍ | na | vi̱dvān |
vi | yaḥ | ta̱stambha̍ | ṣaṭ | i̱mā | rajā̍ṁsi | a̱jasya̍ | rū̱pe | kim | api̍ | svi̱t | eka̍m |
i̱ha | bra̱vī̱tu̱ | yaḥ | ī̱m | a̱ṅga | veda̍ | a̱sya | vā̱masya̍ | ni-hi̍tam | pa̱dam | veriti̱ veḥ |
śī̱rṣṇaḥ | kṣī̱ram | du̱hra̱te̱ | gāva̍ḥ | a̱sya̱ | va̱vrim | vasā̍nāḥ | u̱da̱kam | pa̱dā | a̱pu̱ḥ |
mā̱tā | pi̱tara̍m | ṛ̱te | ā | ba̱bhā̱ja̱ | dhī̱tī | agre̍ | mana̍sā | sam | hi | ja̱gme |
sā | bī̱bha̱tsuḥ | garbha̍-rasā | ni-vi̍ddhā | nama̍svantaḥ | it | u̱pa̱-vā̱kam | ī̱yu̱ḥ |
yu̱ktā | mā̱tā | ā̱sī̱t | dhu̱ri | dakṣi̍ṇāyāḥ | ati̍ṣṭhat | garbha̍ḥ | vṛ̱ja̱nīṣu̍ | a̱ntariti̍ |
amī̍met | va̱tsaḥ | anu̍ | gām | a̱pa̱śya̱t | vi̱śva̱-rū̱pya̍m | tri̱ṣu | yoja̍neṣu |
ti̱sraḥ | mā̱tṝḥ | trīn | pi̱tṝn | bibhra̍t | eka̍ḥ | ū̱rdhvaḥ | ta̱sthau̱ | na | ī̱m | ava̍ | gla̱pa̱ya̱nti̱ |
ma̱ntraya̍nte | di̱vaḥ | a̱muṣya̍ | pṛ̱ṣṭhe | vi̱śva̱-vida̍m | vāca̍m | avi̍śva-minvām |
dvāda̍śa-aram | na̱hi | tat | jarā̍ya | varva̍rti | ca̱kram | pari̍ | dyām | ṛ̱tasya̍ |
ā | pu̱trāḥ | a̱gne̱ | mi̱thu̱nāsa̍ḥ | atra̍ | sa̱pta | śa̱tāni̍ | vi̱ṁśa̱tiḥ | ca̱ | ta̱sthu̱ḥ |
pañca̍-pādam | pi̱tara̍m | dvāda̍śa-ākṛtim | di̱vaḥ | ā̱hu̱ḥ | pare̍ | ardhe̍ | pu̱rī̱ṣiṇa̍m |
atha̍ | i̱me | a̱nye | upa̍re | vi̱-ca̱kṣa̱ṇam | sa̱pta-ca̍kre | ṣaṭ-a̍re | ā̱hu̱ḥ | arpi̍tam |
pañca̍-are | ca̱kre | pa̱ri̱-varta̍māne | tasmi̍n | ā | ta̱sthu̱ḥ | bhuva̍nāni | viśvā̍ |
tasya̍ | na | akṣa̍ḥ | ta̱pya̱te̱ | bhūri̍-bhāraḥ | sa̱nāt | e̱va | na | śī̱rya̱te̱ | sa-nā̍bhiḥ |
sa-ne̍mi | ca̱kram | a̱jara̍m | vi | va̱vṛ̱te̱ | u̱ttā̱nāyā̍m | daśa̍ | yu̱ktāḥ | va̱ha̱nti̱ |
sūrya̍sya | cakṣu̍ḥ | raja̍sā | e̱ti̱ | ā-vṛ̍tam | tasmi̍n | ārpi̍tā | bhuva̍nāni | viśvā̍ |
sā̱ka̱m-jānā̍m | sa̱ptatha̍m | ā̱hu̱ḥ | e̱ka̱-jam | ṣaṭ | it | ya̱māḥ | ṛṣa̍yaḥ | de̱va̱-jāḥ | iti̍ |
teṣā̍m | i̱ṣṭāni̍ | vi-hi̍tāni | dhā̱ma̱-śaḥ | sthā̱tre | re̱ja̱nte̱ | vi-kṛ̍tāni | rū̱pa̱-śaḥ |
striya̍ḥ | sa̱tīḥ | tān | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | me̱ | pu̱ṁsaḥ | ā̱hu̱ḥ | paśya̍t | a̱kṣa̱ṇ-vān | na | vi | ce̱ta̱t | a̱ndhaḥ |
ka̱viḥ | yaḥ | pu̱traḥ | saḥ | ī̱m | ā | ci̱ke̱ta̱ | yaḥ | tā | vi̱-jā̱nāt | saḥ | pi̱tuḥ | pi̱tā | a̱sa̱t |
a̱vaḥ | pare̍ṇa | pa̱raḥ | e̱nā | ava̍reṇa | pa̱dā | va̱tsam | bibhra̍tī | gauḥ | ut | a̱sthā̱t |
sā | ka̱drīcī̍ | kam | svi̱t | ardha̍m | parā̍ | a̱gā̱t | kva̍ | svi̱t | sū̱te̱ | na̱hi | yū̱the | a̱ntariti̍ |
a̱vaḥ | pare̍ṇa | pi̱tara̍m | yaḥ | a̱sya̱ | a̱nu̱-veda̍ | pa̱raḥ | e̱nā | ava̍reṇa |
ka̱vi̱-yamā̍naḥ | kaḥ | i̱ha | pra | vo̱ca̱t | de̱vam | mana̍ḥ | kuta̍ḥ | adhi̍ | pra-jā̍tam |
ye | a̱rvāñca̍ḥ | tān | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | parā̍caḥ | ā̱hu̱ḥ | ye | parā̍ñcaḥ | tān | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | a̱rvāca̍ḥ | ā̱hu̱ḥ |
indra̍ḥ | ca̱ | yā | ca̱krathu̍ḥ | so̱ma̱ | tāni̍ | dhu̱rā | na | yu̱ktāḥ | raja̍saḥ | va̱ha̱nti̱ |
dvā | su̱-pa̱rṇā | sa̱-yujā̍ | sakhā̍yā | sa̱ma̱nam | vṛ̱kṣam | pari̍ | sa̱sva̱jā̱te̱ iti̍ |
tayo̍ḥ | a̱nyaḥ | pippa̍lam | svā̱du | atti̍ | ana̍śnan | a̱nyaḥ | a̱bhi | cā̱ka̱śī̱ti̱ |
yatra̍ | su̱-pa̱rṇāḥ | a̱mṛta̍sya | bhā̱gam | ani̍-meṣam | vi̱dathā̍ | a̱bhi̱-svara̍nti |
i̱naḥ | viśva̍sya | bhuva̍nasya | go̱pāḥ | saḥ | mā̱ | dhīra̍ḥ | pāka̍m | atra̍ | ā | vi̱ve̱śa̱ |
yasmi̍n | vṛ̱kṣe | ma̱dhu̱-ada̍ḥ | su̱-pa̱rṇāḥ | ni̱-vi̱śante̍ | suva̍te | ca̱ | adhi̍ | viśve̍ |
tasya̍ | it | ā̱hu̱ḥ | pippa̍lam | svā̱du | agre̍ | tat | na | ut | na̱śa̱t | yaḥ | pi̱tara̍m | na | veda̍ |
yat | gā̱ya̱tre | adhi̍ | gā̱ya̱tram | ā-hi̍tam | traistu̍bhāt | vā̱ | traistu̍bham | ni̱ḥ-ata̍kṣata |
yat | vā̱ | jaga̍t | jaga̍ti | ā-hi̍tam | pa̱dam | ye | it | tat | vi̱duḥ | te | a̱mṛ̱ta̱-tvam | ā̱na̱śu̱ḥ |
gā̱ya̱treṇa̍ | prati̍ | mi̱mī̱te̱ | a̱rkam | a̱rkeṇa̍ | sāma̍ | traistu̍bhena | vā̱kam |
vā̱kena̍ | vā̱kam | dvi̱-padā̍ | catu̍ḥ-padā | a̱kṣare̍ṇa | mi̱ma̱te̱ | sa̱pta | vāṇī̍ḥ |
jaga̍tā | sindhu̍m | di̱vi | a̱sta̱bhā̱ya̱t | ra̱tha̱m-ta̱re | sūrya̍m | pari̍ | a̱pa̱śya̱t |
gā̱ya̱trasya̍ | sa̱m-idha̍ḥ | ti̱sraḥ | ā̱hu̱ḥ | tata̍ḥ | ma̱hrā | pra | ri̱ri̱ce̱ | ma̱hi̱-tvā |
upa̍ | hva̱ye̱ | su̱-dughā̍m | dhe̱num | e̱tām | su̱-hasta̍ḥ | go̱-dhuk | u̱ta | do̱ha̱t | e̱nā̱m |
śreṣṭha̍m | sa̱vam | sa̱vi̱tā | sā̱vi̱ṣa̱t | na̱ḥ | a̱bhi-i̍ddhaḥ | gha̱rmaḥ | tat | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | su | pra | vo̱ca̱m |
hi̱ṅ-kṛ̱ṇva̱tī | va̱su̱-patnī̍ | vasū̍nām | va̱tsam | i̱cchantī̍ | mana̍sā | a̱bhi | ā | a̱gā̱t |
du̱hām | a̱śvi-bhyā̍m | paya̍ḥ | a̱ghnyā | i̱yam | sā | va̱rdha̱tā̱m | ma̱ha̱te | saubha̍gāya |
gauḥ | a̱mī̱me̱t | anu̍ | va̱tsam | mi̱ṣanta̍m | mū̱rdhāna̍m | hiṅ | a̱kṛ̱ṇo̱t | māta̱vai | ū̱m̐ iti̍ |
sṛkvā̍ṇam | gha̱rmam | a̱bhi | vā̱va̱śā̱nā | mimā̍ti | mā̱yum | paya̍te | paya̍ḥ-bhiḥ |
a̱yam | saḥ | śi̱ṅkte̱ | yena̍ | gauḥ | a̱bhi-vṛ̍tā | mimā̍ti | mā̱yum | dhva̱sanau̍ | adhi̍ | śri̱tā |
sā | ci̱tti-bhi̍ḥ | ni | hi | ca̱kāra̍ | martya̍m | vi̱-dyut | bhava̍ntī | prati̍ | va̱vrim | au̱ha̱ta̱ |
a̱nat | śa̱ye̱ | tu̱ra-gā̍tu | jī̱vam | eja̍t | dhru̱vam | madhye̍ | ā | pa̱styā̍nām |
jī̱vaḥ | mṛ̱tasya̍ | ca̱ra̱ti̱ | sva̱dhābhi̍ḥ | ama̍rtyaḥ | martye̍na | sa-yo̍niḥ |
apa̍śyam | go̱pām | ani̍-padyamānam | ā | ca̱ | parā̍ | ca̱ | pa̱thi-bhi̍ḥ | cara̍ntam |
saḥ | sa̱dhrīcī̍ḥ | saḥ | viṣū̍cīḥ | vasā̍naḥ | ā | va̱rī̱va̱rti̱ | bhuva̍neṣu | a̱ntariti̍ |
yaḥ | ī̱m | ca̱kāra̍ | na | saḥ | a̱sya | ve̱da̱ | yaḥ | ī̱m | da̱darśa̍ | hiru̍k | it | nu | tasmā̍t |
saḥ | mā̱tuḥ | yonā̍ | pari̍-vītaḥ | a̱ntaḥ | ba̱hu̱-pra̱jāḥ | niḥ-ṛ̍tim | ā | vi̱ve̱śa̱ |
dyauḥ | me̱ | pi̱tā | ja̱ni̱tā | nābhi̍ḥ | atra̍ | bandhu̍ḥ | me̱ | mā̱tā | pṛ̱thi̱vī | ma̱hī | i̱yam |
u̱ttā̱nayo̍ḥ | ca̱mvo̍ḥ | yoni̍ḥ | a̱ntaḥ | atra̍ | pi̱tā | du̱hi̱tuḥ | garbha̍m | ā | a̱dhā̱t |
pṛ̱cchāmi̍ | tvā̱ | para̍m | anta̍m | pṛ̱thi̱vyāḥ | pṛ̱cchāmi̍ | yatra̍ | bhuva̍nasya | nābhi̍ḥ |
pṛ̱cchāmi̍ | tvā̱ | vṛṣṇa̍ḥ | aśva̍sya | reta̍ḥ | pṛ̱cchāmi̍ | vā̱caḥ | pa̱ra̱mam | vi-o̍ma |
i̱yam | vedi̍ḥ | para̍ḥ | anta̍ḥ | pṛ̱thi̱vyāḥ | a̱yam | ya̱jñaḥ | bhuva̍nasya | nābhi̍ḥ |
a̱yam | soma̍ḥ | vṛṣṇa̍ḥ | aśva̍sya | reta̍ḥ | bra̱hmā | a̱yam | vā̱caḥ | pa̱ra̱mam | vi-o̍ma |
sa̱pta | a̱rdha̱-ga̱rbhāḥ | bhuva̍nasya | reta̍ḥ | viṣṇo̍ḥ | ti̱ṣṭha̱nti̱ | pra̱-diśā̍ | vi-dha̍rmaṇi |
te | dhī̱ti-bhi̍ḥ | mana̍sā | te | vi̱pa̱ḥ-cita̍ḥ | pa̱ri̱-bhuva̍ḥ | pari̍ | bha̱va̱nti̱ | vi̱śvata̍ḥ |
na | vi | jā̱nā̱mi̱ | yat-i̍va | i̱dam | asmi̍ | ni̱ṇyaḥ | sam-na̍ddhaḥ | mana̍sā | ca̱rā̱mi̱ |
ya̱dā | mā̱ | ā | aga̍n | pra̱tha̱ma̱-jāḥ | ṛ̱tasya̍ | āt | it | vā̱caḥ | a̱śnu̱ve̱ | bhā̱gam | a̱syāḥ |
apā̍ṅ | prāṅ | e̱ti̱ | sva̱dhayā̍ | gṛ̱bhī̱taḥ | ama̍rtyaḥ | martye̍na | sa-yo̍niḥ |
tā | śaśva̍ntā | vi̱ṣū̱cīnā̍ | vi̱-yantā̍ | ni | a̱nyam | ci̱kyuḥ | na | ni | ci̱kyu̱ḥ | a̱nyam |
ṛ̱caḥ | a̱kṣare̍ | pa̱ra̱me | vi-o̍man | yasmi̍n | de̱vāḥ | adhi̍ | viśve̍ | ni̱-se̱duḥ |
yaḥ | tat | na | veda̍ | kim | ṛ̱cā | ka̱ri̱ṣya̱ti̱ | ye | it | tat | vi̱duḥ | te | i̱me | sam | ā̱sa̱te̱ |
su̱ya̱va̱sa̱-at | bhaga̍-vatī | hi | bhū̱yāḥ | atho̱ iti̍ | va̱yam | bhaga̍-vantaḥ | syā̱ma̱ |
a̱ddhi | tṛṇa̍m | a̱ghnye̱ | vi̱śva̱-dānī̍m | piba̍ | śu̱ddham | u̱da̱kam | ā̱-cara̍ntī |
gau̱rīḥ | mi̱mā̱ya̱ | sa̱li̱lāni̍ | takṣa̍tī | eka̍-padī | dvi̱-padī̍ | sā | catu̍ḥ-padī |
a̱ṣṭā-pa̍dī | nava̍-padī | ba̱bhū̱vuṣī̍ | sa̱hasra̍-akṣarā | pa̱ra̱me | vi-o̍man |
tasyā̍ḥ | sa̱mu̱drāḥ | adhi̍ | vi | kṣa̱ra̱nti̱ | tena̍ | jī̱va̱nti̱ | pra̱-diśa̍ḥ | cata̍sraḥ |
tata̍ḥ | kṣa̱ra̱ti̱ | a̱kṣara̍m | tat | viśva̍m | upa̍ | jī̱va̱ti̱ |
śa̱ka̱-maya̍m | dhū̱mam | ā̱rāt | a̱pa̱śya̱m | vi̱ṣu̱-vatā̍ | pa̱raḥ | e̱nā | ava̍reṇa |
u̱kṣāṇa̍m | pṛśni̍m | a̱pa̱ca̱nta̱ | vī̱rāḥ | tāni̍ | dharmā̍ṇi | pra̱tha̱māni̍ | ā̱sa̱n |
traya̍ḥ | ke̱śina̍ḥ | ṛ̱tu̱-thā | vi | ca̱kṣa̱te̱ | sa̱ṁva̱tsa̱re | va̱pa̱te̱ | eka̍ḥ | e̱ṣā̱m |
viśva̍m | eka̍ḥ | a̱bhi | ca̱ṣṭe̱ | śacī̍bhiḥ | dhrāji̍ḥ | eka̍sya | da̱dṛ̱śe̱ | na | rū̱pam |
ca̱tvāri̍ | vāk | pari̍-mitā | pa̱dāni̍ | tāni̍ | vi̱du̱ḥ | brā̱hma̱ṇāḥ | ye | ma̱nī̱ṣiṇa̍ḥ |
guhā̍ | trīṇi̍ | ni-hi̍tā | na | i̱ṅga̱ya̱nti̱ | tu̱rīya̍m | vā̱caḥ | ma̱nu̱ṣyā̍ḥ | va̱da̱nti̱ |
indra̍m | mi̱tram | varu̍ṇam | a̱gnim | ā̱hu̱ḥ | atho̱ iti̍ | di̱vyaḥ | saḥ | su̱-pa̱rṇaḥ | ga̱rutmā̍n |
eka̍m | sat | viprā̍ḥ | ba̱hu̱dhā | va̱da̱nti̱ | a̱gnim | ya̱mam | mā̱ta̱riśvā̍nam | ā̱hu̱ḥ |
kṛ̱ṣṇam | ni̱-yāna̍m | hara̍yaḥ | su̱-pa̱rṇāḥ | a̱paḥ | vasā̍nāḥ | diva̍m | ut | pa̱ta̱nti̱ |
te | ā | a̱va̱vṛ̱tra̱n | sada̍nāt | ṛ̱tasya̍ | āt | it | ghṛ̱tena̍ | pṛ̱thi̱vī | vi | u̱dya̱te̱ |
dvāda̍śa | pra̱-dhaya̍ḥ | ca̱kram | eka̍m | trīṇi̍ | nabhyā̍ni | kaḥ | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | tat | ci̱ke̱ta̱ |
tasmi̍n | sā̱kam | tri̱-śa̱tāḥ | na | śa̱ṅkava̍ḥ | a̱rpi̱tāḥ | ṣa̱ṣṭiḥ | na | ca̱lā̱ca̱lāsa̍ḥ |
yaḥ | te̱ | stana̍ḥ | śa̱śa̱yaḥ | yaḥ | ma̱ya̱ḥ-bhūḥ | yena̍ | viśvā̍ | puṣya̍si | vāryā̍ṇi |
yaḥ | ra̱tna̱-dhāḥ | va̱su̱-vit | yaḥ | su̱-datra̍ḥ | sara̍svati | tam | i̱ha | dhāta̍ve | ka̱riti̍ kaḥ |
ya̱jñena̍ | ya̱jñam | a̱ya̱ja̱nta̱ | de̱vāḥ | tāni̍ | dharmā̍ṇi | pra̱tha̱māni̍ | ā̱sa̱n |
te | ha̱ | nāka̍m | ma̱hi̱māna̍ḥ | sa̱ca̱nta̱ | yatra̍ | pūrve̍ | sā̱dhyāḥ | santi̍ | de̱vāḥ |
sa̱mā̱nam | e̱tat | u̱da̱kam | ut | ca̱ | eti̍ | ava̍ | ca̱ | aha̍-bhiḥ |
bhūmi̍m | pa̱rjanyā̍ḥ | jinva̍nti | diva̍m | ji̱nva̱nti̱ | a̱gnaya̍ḥ |
di̱vyam | su̱-pa̱rṇam | vā̱ya̱sam | bṛ̱hanta̍m | a̱pām | garbha̍m | da̱rśa̱tam | oṣa̍dhīnām |
a̱bhī̱pa̱taḥ | vṛ̱ṣṭi-bhi̍ḥ | ta̱rpaya̍ntam | sara̍svantam | ava̍se | jo̱ha̱vī̱mi̱ |
kayā̍ | śu̱bhā | sa-va̍yasaḥ | sa-nī̍ḻāḥ | sa̱mā̱nyā | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | sam | mi̱mi̱kṣu̱ḥ |
kayā̍ | ma̱tī | kuta̍ḥ | ā-i̍tāsaḥ | e̱te | arca̍nti | śuṣma̍m | vṛṣa̍ṇaḥ | va̱su̱-yā |
kasya̍ | brahmā̍ṇi | ju̱ju̱ṣu̱ḥ | yuvā̍naḥ | kaḥ | a̱dhva̱re | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | ā | va̱va̱rta̱ |
śye̱nān-i̍va | dhraja̍taḥ | a̱ntari̍kṣe | kena̍ | ma̱hā | mana̍sā | rī̱ra̱mā̱ma̱ |
kuta̍ḥ | tvam | i̱ndra̱ | māhi̍naḥ | san | eka̍ḥ | yā̱si̱ | sa̱t-pa̱te̱ | kim | te̱ | i̱tthā |
sam | pṛ̱ccha̱se̱ | sa̱m-a̱rā̱ṇaḥ | śu̱bhā̱naiḥ | vo̱ceḥ | tat | na̱ḥ | ha̱ri̱-va̱ḥ | yat | te̱ | a̱sme iti̍ |
brahmā̍ṇi | me̱ | ma̱taya̍ḥ | śam | su̱tāsa̍ḥ | śuṣma̍ḥ | i̱ya̱rti̱ | pra-bhṛ̍taḥ | me̱ | adri̍ḥ |
ā | śā̱sa̱te̱ | prati̍ | ha̱rya̱nti̱ | u̱kthā | i̱mā | harī̱ iti̍ | va̱ha̱ta̱ḥ | tā | na̱ḥ | accha̍ |
ata̍ḥ | va̱yam | a̱nta̱mebhi̍ḥ | yu̱jā̱nāḥ | sva-kṣa̍trebhiḥ | ta̱nva̍ḥ | śumbha̍mānāḥ |
maha̍ḥ-bhiḥ | etā̍n | upa̍ | yu̱jma̱he̱ | nu | indra̍ | sva̱dhām | anu̍ | hi | na̱ḥ | ba̱bhūtha̍ |
kva̍ | syā | va̱ḥ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | sva̱dhā | ā̱sī̱t | yat | mām | eka̍m | sa̱m-adha̍tta | a̱hi̱-hatye̍ |
a̱ham | hi | u̱graḥ | ta̱vi̱ṣaḥ | tuvi̍ṣmān | viśva̍sya | śatro̍ḥ | ana̍mam | va̱dha̱-snaiḥ |
bhūri̍ | ca̱ka̱rtha̱ | yujye̍bhiḥ | a̱sme iti̍ | sa̱mā̱nebhi̍ḥ | vṛ̱ṣa̱bha̱ | pauṁsye̍bhiḥ |
bhūrī̍ṇi | hi | kṛ̱ṇavā̍ma | śa̱vi̱ṣṭha̱ | indra̍ | kratvā̍ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | yat | vaśā̍ma |
vadhī̍m | vṛ̱tram | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | i̱ndri̱yeṇa̍ | svena̍ | bhāme̍na | ta̱vi̱ṣaḥ | ba̱bhū̱vān |
a̱ham | e̱tāḥ | mana̍ve | vi̱śva-ca̍ndrāḥ | su̱-gāḥ | a̱paḥ | ca̱ka̱ra̱ | vajra̍-bāhuḥ |
anu̍ttam | ā | te̱ | ma̱gha̱-va̱n | naki̍ḥ | nu | na | tvā-vā̍n | a̱sti̱ | de̱vatā̍ | vidā̍naḥ |
na | jāya̍mānaḥ | naśa̍te | na | jā̱taḥ | yāni̍ | ka̱ri̱ṣyā | kṛ̱ṇu̱hi | pra̱-vṛ̱ddha̱ |
eka̍sya | ci̱t | me̱ | vi̱-bhu | a̱stu̱ | oja̍ḥ | yā | nu | da̱dhṛ̱ṣvān | kṛ̱ṇavai̍ | ma̱nī̱ṣā |
a̱ham | hi | u̱graḥ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | vidā̍naḥ | yāni̍ | cyava̍m | indra̍ḥ | it | ī̱śe̱ | e̱ṣā̱m |
ama̍ndat | mā̱ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | stoma̍ḥ | atra̍ | yat | me̱ | na̱ra̱ḥ | śrutya̍m | brahma̍ | ca̱kra |
indrā̍ya | vṛṣṇe̍ | su-ma̍khāya | mahya̍m | sakhye̍ | sakhā̍yaḥ | ta̱nve̍ | ta̱nūbhi̍ḥ |
e̱va | it | e̱te | prati̍ | mā̱ | roca̍mānāḥ | ane̍dyaḥ | śrava̍ḥ | ā | iṣa̍ḥ | dadhā̍nāḥ |
sa̱m-cakṣya̍ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | ca̱ndra-va̍rṇāḥ | acchā̍nta | me̱ | cha̱dayā̍tha | ca̱ | nū̱nam |
kaḥ | nu | atra̍ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | ma̱ma̱he̱ | va̱ḥ | pra | yā̱ta̱na̱ | sakhī̱n | accha̍ | sa̱khā̱ya̱ḥ |
manmā̍ni | ci̱trā̱ḥ | a̱pi̱-vā̱taya̍ntaḥ | e̱ṣām | bhū̱ta̱ | nave̍dāḥ | me̱ | ṛ̱tānā̍m |
ā | yat | du̱va̱syāt | du̱vase̍ | na | kā̱ruḥ | a̱smān | ca̱kre | mā̱nyasya̍ | me̱dhā |
o iti̍ | su | va̱rtta̱ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | vipra̍m | accha̍ | i̱mā | brahmā̍ṇi | ja̱ri̱tā | va̱ḥ | a̱rca̱t |
e̱ṣaḥ | va̱ḥ | stoma̍ḥ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | i̱yam | gīḥ | mā̱ndā̱ryasya̍ | mā̱nyasya̍ | kā̱roḥ |
ā | i̱ṣā | yā̱sī̱ṣṭa̱ | ta̱nve̍ | va̱yām | vi̱dyāma̍ | i̱ṣam | vṛ̱jana̍m | jī̱ra-dā̍num |
tat | nu | vo̱cā̱ma̱ | ra̱bha̱sāya̍ | janma̍ne | pūrva̍m | ma̱hi̱tvam | vṛ̱ṣa̱bhasya̍ | ke̱tave̍ |
ai̱dhā-i̍va | yāma̍n | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | tu̱vi̱-sva̱ṇa̱ḥ | yu̱dhā-i̍va | śa̱krā̱ḥ | ta̱vi̱ṣāṇi̍ | ka̱rta̱na̱ |
nitya̍m | na | sū̱num | madhu̍ | bibhra̍taḥ | upa̍ | krīḻa̍nti | krī̱ḻāḥ | vi̱dathe̍ṣu | ghṛṣva̍yaḥ |
nakṣa̍nti | ru̱drāḥ | ava̍sā | na̱ma̱svina̍m | na | ma̱rdha̱nti̱ | sva-ta̍vasaḥ | ha̱vi̱ḥ-kṛta̍m |
yasmai̍ | ūmā̍saḥ | a̱mṛtā̍ḥ | arā̍sata | rā̱yaḥ | poṣa̍m | ca̱ | ha̱viṣā̍ | da̱dā̱śuṣe̍ |
u̱kṣanti̍ | a̱smai̱ | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | hi̱tāḥ-i̍va | pu̱ru | rajā̍ṁsi | paya̍sā | ma̱ya̱ḥ-bhuva̍ḥ |
ā | ye | rajā̍ṁsi | tavi̍ṣībhiḥ | avya̍ta | pra | va̱ḥ | evā̍saḥ | sva-ya̍tāsaḥ | a̱dhra̱ja̱n |
bhaya̍nte | viśvā̍ | bhuva̍nāni | ha̱rmyā | ci̱traḥ | va̱ḥ | yāma̍ḥ | pra-ya̍tāsu | ṛ̱ṣṭiṣu̍ |
yat | tve̱ṣa-yā̍māḥ | na̱daya̍nta | parva̍tān | di̱vaḥ | vā̱ | pṛ̱ṣṭham | naryā̍ḥ | acu̍cyavuḥ |
viśva̍ḥ | va̱ḥ | ajma̍n | bha̱ya̱te̱ | vana̱spati̍ḥ | ra̱thi̱yantī̍-iva | pra | ji̱hī̱te̱ | oṣa̍dhiḥ |
yū̱yam | na̱ḥ | u̱grā̱ḥ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | su̱-ce̱tunā̍ | ari̍ṣṭa-grāmāḥ | su̱-ma̱tim | pi̱pa̱rta̱na̱ |
yatra̍ | va̱ḥ | di̱dyut | rada̍ti | krivi̍ḥ-datī | ri̱ṇāti̍ | pa̱śvaḥ | sudhi̍tā-iva | ba̱rhaṇā̍ |
pra | ska̱mbha-de̍ṣṇāḥ | a̱na̱va̱bhra-rā̍dhasaḥ | a̱lā̱tṛ̱ṇāsa̍ḥ | vi̱dathe̍ṣu | su-stu̍tāḥ |
arca̍nti | a̱rkam | ma̱di̱rasya̍ | pī̱taye̍ | vi̱duḥ | vī̱rasya̍ | pra̱tha̱māni̍ | pauṁsyā̍ |
śa̱tabhu̍ji-bhiḥ | tam | a̱bhi-hru̍teḥ | a̱ghāt | pū̱ḥ-bhiḥ | ra̱kṣa̱ta̱ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | yam | āva̍ta |
jana̍m | yam | u̱grā̱ḥ | ta̱va̱sa̱ḥ | vi̱-ra̱pśi̱na̱ḥ | pā̱thana̍ | śaṁsā̍t | tana̍yasya | pu̱ṣṭiṣu̍ |
viśvā̍ni | bha̱drā | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | rathe̍ṣu | va̱ḥ | mi̱tha̱spṛdhyā̍-iva | ta̱vi̱ṣāṇi̍ | ā-hi̍tā |
aṁse̍ṣu | ā | va̱ḥ | pra-pa̍theṣu | khā̱daya̍ḥ | akṣa̍ḥ | va̱ḥ | ca̱krā | sa̱mayā̍ | vi | va̱vṛ̱te̱ |
bhūrī̍ṇi | bha̱drā | narye̍ṣu | bā̱huṣu̍ | vakṣa̍ḥ-su | ru̱kmāḥ | ra̱bha̱sāsa̍ḥ | a̱ñjaya̍ḥ |
aṁse̍ṣu | etā̍ḥ | pa̱viṣu̍ | kṣu̱rāḥ | adhi̍ | vaya̍ḥ | na | pa̱kṣān | vi | anu̍ | śriya̍ḥ | dhi̱re̱ |
ma̱hānta̍ḥ | ma̱hnā | vi̱-bhva̍ḥ | vi-bhū̍tayaḥ | dū̱re̱-dṛśa̍ḥ | ye | di̱vyāḥ-i̍va | stṛ-bhi̍ḥ |
ma̱ndrāḥ | su̱-ji̱hvāḥ | svari̍tāraḥ | ā̱sa-bhi̍ḥ | sam-mi̍ślāḥ | indre̍ | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | pa̱ri̱-stubha̍ḥ |
tat | va̱ḥ | su̱-jā̱tā̱ḥ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | ma̱hi̱-tva̱nam | dī̱rgham | va̱ḥ | dā̱tram | adi̍teḥ-iva | vra̱tam |
indra̍ḥ | ca̱na | tyaja̍sā | vi | hru̱ṇā̱ti̱ | tat | janā̍ya | yasmai̍ | su̱-kṛte̍ | arā̍dhvam |
tat | va̱ḥ | jā̱mi̱-tvam | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | pare̍ | yu̱ge | pu̱ru | yat | śaṁsa̍m | a̱mṛ̱tā̱sa̱ḥ | āva̍ta |
a̱yā | dhi̱yā | mana̍ve | śru̱ṣṭim | āvya̍ | sā̱kam | nara̍ḥ | da̱ṁsanai̍ḥ | ā | ci̱ki̱tri̱re̱ |
yena̍ | dī̱rgham | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | śū̱śavā̍ma | yu̱ṣmāke̍na | parī̍ṇasā | tu̱rā̱sa̱ḥ |
ā | yat | ta̱tana̍m | vṛ̱jane̍ | janā̍saḥ | e̱bhiḥ | ya̱jñebhi̍ḥ | tat | a̱bhi | iṣṭi̍m | a̱śyā̱m |
e̱ṣaḥ | va̱ḥ | stoma̍ḥ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | i̱yam | gīḥ | mā̱ndā̱ryasya̍ | mā̱nyasya̍ | kā̱roḥ |
ā | i̱ṣā | yā̱sī̱ṣṭa̱ | ta̱nve̍ | va̱yām | vi̱dyāma̍ | i̱ṣam | vṛ̱jana̍m | jī̱ra-dā̍num |
sa̱hasra̍m | te̱ | i̱ndra̱ | ū̱taya̍ḥ | na̱ḥ | sa̱hasra̍m | iṣa̍ḥ | ha̱ri̱-va̱ḥ | gū̱rta-ta̍māḥ |
sa̱hasra̍m | rāya̍ḥ | mā̱da̱yadhyai̍ | sa̱ha̱sriṇa̍ḥ | upa̍ | na̱ḥ | ya̱ntu̱ | vājā̍ḥ |
ā | na̱ḥ | ava̍ḥ-bhiḥ | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | yā̱ntu̱ | accha̍ | jyeṣṭhe̍bhiḥ | vā̱ | bṛ̱hat-di̍vaiḥ | su̱-mā̱yāḥ |
adha̍ | yat | e̱ṣā̱m | ni̱-yuta̍ḥ | pa̱ra̱māḥ | sa̱mu̱drasya̍ | ci̱t | dha̱naya̍nta | pā̱re |
mi̱myakṣa̍ | yeṣu̍ | su-dhi̍tā | ghṛ̱tācī̍ | hira̍ṇya-nirnik | upa̍rā | na | ṛ̱ṣṭiḥ |
guhā̍ | cara̍ntī | manu̍ṣaḥ | na | yoṣā̍ | sa̱bhā-va̍tī | vi̱da̱thyā̍-iva | sam | vāk |
parā̍ | śu̱bhrāḥ | a̱yāsa̍ḥ | ya̱vyā | sā̱dhā̱ra̱ṇyā-i̍va | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | mi̱mi̱kṣu̱ḥ |
na | ro̱da̱sī iti̍ | apa̍ | nu̱da̱nta̱ | gho̱rāḥ | ju̱ṣanta̍ | vṛdha̍m | sa̱khyāya̍ | de̱vāḥ |
joṣa̍t | yat | ī̱m | a̱su̱ryā̍ | sa̱cadhyai̍ | visi̍ta-stukā | ro̱da̱sī | nṛ̱-manā̍ḥ |
ā | sū̱ryā-i̍va | vi̱dha̱taḥ | ratha̍m | gā̱t | tve̱ṣa-pra̍tīkā | nabha̍saḥ | na | i̱tyā |
ā | a̱sthā̱pa̱ya̱nta̱ | yu̱va̱tim | yuvā̍naḥ | śu̱bhe | ni-mi̍ślām | vi̱dathe̍ṣu | pa̱jrām |
a̱rkaḥ | yat | va̱ḥ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | ha̱viṣmā̍n | gāya̍t | gā̱tham | su̱ta-so̍maḥ | du̱va̱syan |
pra | tam | vi̱va̱kmi̱ | vakmya̍ḥ | yaḥ | e̱ṣā̱m | ma̱rutā̍m | ma̱hi̱mā | sa̱tyaḥ | asti̍ |
sacā̍ | yat | ī̱m | vṛṣa̍-manāḥ | a̱ha̱m-yuḥ | sthi̱rā | ci̱t | janī̍ḥ | vaha̍te | su̱-bhā̱gāḥ |
pānti̍ | mi̱trāvaru̍ṇau | a̱va̱dyāt | caya̍te | ī̱m | a̱rya̱mo iti̍ | apra̍-śastān |
u̱ta | cya̱va̱nte̱ | acyu̍tā | dhru̱vāṇi̍ | va̱vṛ̱dhe | ī̱m | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | dāti̍-vāraḥ |
na̱hi | nu | va̱ḥ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | anti̍ | a̱sme iti̍ | ā̱rāttā̍t | ci̱t | śava̍saḥ | anta̍m | ā̱puḥ |
te | dhṛ̱ṣṇunā̍ | śava̍sā | śū̱śu̱-vāṁsa̍ḥ | arṇa̍ḥ | na | dveṣa̍ḥ | dhṛ̱ṣa̱tā | pari̍ | sthu̱ḥ |
va̱yam | a̱dya | indra̍sya | preṣṭhā̍ḥ | va̱yam | śvaḥ | vo̱ce̱ma̱hi̱ | sa̱-ma̱rye |
va̱yam | pu̱rā | mahi̍ | ca̱ | na̱ḥ | anu̍ | dyūn | tat | na̱ḥ | ṛ̱bhu̱kṣāḥ | na̱rām | anu̍ | syā̱t |
e̱ṣaḥ | va̱ḥ | stoma̍ḥ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | i̱yam | gīḥ | mā̱ndā̱ryasya̍ | mā̱nyasya̍ | kā̱roḥ |
ā | i̱ṣā | yā̱sī̱ṣṭa̱ | ta̱nve̍ | va̱yām | vi̱dyāma̍ | i̱ṣam | vṛ̱jana̍m | jī̱ra-dā̍num |
ya̱jñā-ya̍jñā | va̱ḥ | sa̱ma̱nā | tu̱tu̱rvaṇi̍ḥ | dhiya̍m-dhiyam | va̱ḥ | de̱va̱-yāḥ | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | da̱dhi̱dhve̱ |
ā | va̱ḥ | a̱rvāca̍ḥ | su̱vi̱tāya̍ | roda̍syoḥ | ma̱he | va̱vṛ̱tyā̱m | ava̍se | su̱vṛ̱kti-bhi̍ḥ |
va̱vrāsa̍ḥ | na | ye | sva̱-jāḥ | sva-ta̍vasaḥ | iṣa̍m | sva̍ḥ | a̱bhi̱-jāya̍nta | dhūta̍yaḥ |
sa̱ha̱sriyā̍saḥ | a̱pām | na | ū̱rmaya̍ḥ | ā̱sā | gāva̍ḥ | vandyā̍saḥ | na | u̱kṣaṇa̍ḥ |
somā̍saḥ | na | ye | su̱tāḥ | tṛ̱pta-a̍ṁśavaḥ | hṛ̱t-su | pī̱tāsa̍ḥ | du̱vasa̍ḥ | na | āsa̍te |
ā | e̱ṣā̱m | aṁse̍ṣu | ra̱mbhiṇī̍-iva | ra̱ra̱bhe̱ | haste̍ṣu | khā̱diḥ | ca̱ | kṛ̱tiḥ | ca̱ | sam | da̱dhe̱ |
ava̍ | sva-yu̍ktāḥ | di̱vaḥ | ā | vṛthā̍ | ya̱yu̱ḥ | ama̍rtyāḥ | kaśa̍yā | co̱da̱ta̱ | tmanā̍ |
a̱re̱ṇava̍ḥ | tu̱vi̱-jā̱tāḥ | a̱cu̱cya̱vu̱ḥ | dṛ̱ḻhāni̍ | ci̱t | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | bhrāja̍t-ṛṣṭayaḥ |
kaḥ | va̱ḥ | a̱ntaḥ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | ṛ̱ṣṭi̱-vi̱dyu̱ta̱ḥ | reja̍ti | tmanā̍ | hanvā̍-iva | ji̱hvayā̍ |
dha̱nva̱-cyuta̍ḥ | i̱ṣām | na | yāma̍ni | pu̱ru̱-praiṣā̍ḥ | a̱ha̱nya̍ḥ | na | eta̍śaḥ |
kva̍ | svi̱t | a̱sya | raja̍saḥ | ma̱haḥ | para̍m | kva̍ | ava̍ram | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | yasmi̍n | ā̱-ya̱ya |
yat | cya̱vaya̍tha | vi̱thu̱rā-i̍va | sam-hi̍tam | vi | adri̍ṇā | pa̱ta̱tha̱ | tve̱ṣam | a̱rṇa̱vam |
sā̱tiḥ | na | va̱ḥ | ama̍-vatī | sva̍ḥ-vatī | tve̱ṣā | vi-pā̍kā | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | pipi̍ṣvatī |
bha̱drā | va̱ḥ | rā̱tiḥ | pṛ̱ṇa̱taḥ | na | dakṣi̍ṇā | pṛ̱thu̱-jrayī̍ | a̱su̱ryā̍-iva | jañja̍tī |
prati̍ | sto̱bha̱nti̱ | sindha̍vaḥ | pa̱vi-bhya̍ḥ | yat | a̱bhriyā̍m | vāca̍m | u̱t-ī̱raya̍nti |
ava̍ | sma̱ya̱nta̱ | vi̱-dyuta̍ḥ | pṛ̱thi̱vyām | yadi̍ | ghṛ̱tam | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | pru̱ṣṇu̱vanti̍ |
asū̍ta | pṛśni̍ḥ | ma̱ha̱te | raṇā̍ya | tve̱ṣam | a̱yāsā̍m | ma̱rutā̍m | anī̍kam |
te | sa̱psa̱rāsa̍ḥ | a̱ja̱na̱ya̱nta̱ | abhva̍m | āt | it | sva̱dhām | i̱ṣi̱rām | pari̍ | a̱pa̱śya̱n |
e̱ṣaḥ | va̱ḥ | stoma̍ḥ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | i̱yam | gīḥ | mā̱ndā̱ryasya̍ | mā̱nyasya̍ | kā̱roḥ |
ā | i̱ṣā | yā̱sī̱ṣṭa̱ | ta̱nve̍ | va̱yām | vi̱dyāma̍ | i̱ṣam | vṛ̱jana̍m | jī̱ra-dā̍num |
ma̱haḥ | ci̱t | tvam | i̱ndra̱ | ya̱taḥ | e̱tān | ma̱haḥ | ci̱t | a̱si̱ | tyaja̍saḥ | va̱rū̱tā |
saḥ | na̱ḥ | ve̱dha̱ḥ | ma̱rutā̍m | ci̱ki̱tvān | su̱mnā | va̱nu̱ṣva̱ | tava̍ | hi | preṣṭhā̍ |
ayu̍jran | te | i̱ndra̱ | vi̱śva-kṛ̍ṣṭīḥ | vi̱dā̱nāsa̍ḥ | ni̱ḥ-sidha̍ḥ | ma̱rtya̱-trā |
ma̱rutā̍m | pṛ̱tsu̱tiḥ | hāsa̍mānā | sva̍ḥ-mīḻhasya | pra̱-dhana̍sya | sā̱tau |
amya̍k | sā | te̱ | i̱ndra̱ | ṛ̱ṣṭiḥ | a̱sme iti̍ | sane̍mi | abhva̍m | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | ju̱na̱nti̱ |
a̱gniḥ | ci̱t | hi | sma̱ | a̱ta̱se | śu̱śu̱kvān | āpa̍ḥ | na | dvī̱pam | dadha̍ti | prayā̍ṁsi |
tvam | tu | na̱ḥ | i̱ndra̱ | tam | ra̱yim | dā̱ḥ | oji̍ṣṭhayā | dakṣi̍ṇayā-iva | rā̱tim |
stuta̍ḥ | ca̱ | yāḥ | te̱ | ca̱kana̍nta | vā̱yoḥ | stana̍m | na | madhva̍ḥ | pī̱pa̱ya̱nta̱ | vājai̍ḥ |
tve iti̍ | rāya̍ḥ | i̱ndra̱ | to̱śa-ta̍māḥ | pra̱-ne̱tāra̍ḥ | kasya̍ | ci̱t | ṛ̱ta̱-yoḥ |
te | su | na̱ḥ | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | mṛ̱ḻa̱ya̱ntu̱ | ye | sma̱ | pu̱rā | gā̱tu̱yanti̍-iva | de̱vāḥ |
prati̍ | pra | yā̱hi̱ | i̱ndra̱ | mī̱ḻhuṣa̍ḥ | nṝn | ma̱haḥ | pārthi̍ve | sada̍ne | ya̱ta̱sva̱ |
adha̍ | yat | e̱ṣā̱m | pṛ̱thu̱-bu̱dhnāsa̍ḥ | etā̍ḥ | tī̱rthe | na | a̱ryaḥ | pauṁsyā̍ni | ta̱sthuḥ |
prati̍ | gho̱rāṇā̍m | etā̍nām | a̱yāsā̍m | ma̱rutā̍m | śṛ̱ṇve̱ | ā̱-ya̱tām | u̱pa̱bdiḥ |
ye | martya̍m | pṛ̱ta̱nā̱-yanta̍m | ūmai̍ḥ | ṛ̱ṇa̱-vāna̍m | na | pa̱taya̍nta | sargai̍ḥ |
tvam | māne̍bhyaḥ | i̱ndra̱ | vi̱śva-ja̍nyā | rada̍ | ma̱rut-bhi̍ḥ | śu̱rudha̍ḥ | go-a̍grāḥ |
stavā̍nebhiḥ | sta̱va̱se̱ | de̱va̱ | de̱vaiḥ | vi̱dyāma̍ | i̱ṣam | vṛ̱jana̍m | jī̱ra-dā̍num |
na | nū̱nam | asti̍ | no iti̍ | śvaḥ | kaḥ | tat | ve̱da̱ | yat | adbhu̍tam |
a̱nyasya̍ | ci̱ttam | a̱bhi | sa̱m-ca̱reṇya̍m | u̱ta | ā-dhī̍tam | vi | na̱śya̱ti̱ |
kim | na̱ḥ | i̱ndra̱ | ji̱ghā̱ṁsa̱si̱ | bhrāta̍raḥ | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | tava̍ |
tebhi̍ḥ | ka̱lpa̱sva̱ | sā̱dhu̱-yā | mā | na̱ḥ | sa̱m-ara̍ṇe | va̱dhī̱ḥ |
kim | na̱ḥ | bhrā̱ta̱ḥ | a̱ga̱stya̱ | sakhā̍ | san | ati̍ | ma̱nya̱se̱ |
vi̱dma | hi | te̱ | yathā̍ | mana̍ḥ | a̱smabhya̍m | it | na | di̱tsa̱si̱ |
ara̍m | kṛ̱ṇva̱ntu̱ | vedi̍m | sam | a̱gnim | i̱ndha̱tā̱m | pu̱raḥ |
tatra̍ | a̱mṛta̍sya | ceta̍nam | ya̱jñam | te̱ | ta̱na̱vā̱va̱hai̱ |
tvam | ī̱śi̱ṣe̱ | va̱su̱-pa̱te̱ | vasū̍nām | tvam | mi̱trāṇā̍m | mi̱tra̱-pa̱te̱ | dheṣṭha̍ḥ |
indra̍ | tvam | ma̱rut-bhi̍ḥ | sam | va̱da̱sva̱ | adha̍ | pra | a̱śā̱na̱ | ṛ̱tu̱-thā | ha̱vīṁṣi̍ |
prati̍ | va̱ḥ | e̱nā | nama̍sā | a̱ham | e̱mi̱ | su̱-u̱ktena̍ | bhi̱kṣe̱ | su̱-ma̱tim | tu̱rāṇā̍m |
ra̱rā̱ṇatā̍ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | ve̱dyābhi̍ḥ | ni | heḻa̍ḥ | dha̱tta | vi | mu̱ca̱dhva̱m | aśvā̍n |
e̱ṣaḥ | va̱ḥ | stoma̍ḥ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | nama̍svān | hṛ̱dā | ta̱ṣṭaḥ | mana̍sā | dhā̱yi̱ | de̱vā̱ḥ |
upa̍ | ī̱m | ā | yā̱ta̱ | mana̍sā | ju̱ṣā̱ṇāḥ | yū̱yam | hi | stha | nama̍saḥ | it | vṛ̱dhāsa̍ḥ |
stu̱tāsa̍ḥ | na̱ḥ | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | mṛ̱ḻa̱ya̱ntu̱ | u̱ta | stu̱taḥ | ma̱gha-vā̍ | śam-bha̍viṣṭhaḥ |
ū̱rdhvā | na̱ḥ | sa̱ntu̱ | ko̱myā | vanā̍ni | ahā̍ni | viśvā̍ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | ji̱gī̱ṣā |
a̱smāt | a̱ham | ta̱vi̱ṣāt | īṣa̍māṇaḥ | indrā̍t | bhi̱yā | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | reja̍mānaḥ |
yu̱ṣmabhya̍m | ha̱vyā | ni-śi̍tāni | ā̱sa̱n | tāni̍ | ā̱re | ca̱kṛ̱ma̱ | mṛ̱ḻata̍ | na̱ḥ |
yena̍ | mānā̍saḥ | ci̱taya̍nte | u̱srāḥ | vi-u̍ṣṭiṣu | śava̍sā | śaśva̍tīnām |
saḥ | na̱ḥ | ma̱rut-bhi̍ḥ | vṛ̱ṣa̱bha̱ | śrava̍ḥ | dhā̱ḥ | u̱graḥ | u̱grebhi̍ḥ | sthavi̍raḥ | sa̱ha̱ḥ-dāḥ |
tvam | pā̱hi̱ | i̱ndra̱ | sahī̍yasaḥ | nṝn | bhava̍ | ma̱rut-bhi̍ḥ | ava̍yāta-heḻāḥ |
su̱-pra̱ke̱tebhi̍ḥ | sa̱sa̱hiḥ | dadhā̍naḥ | vi̱dyāma̍ | i̱ṣam | vṛ̱jana̍m | jī̱ra-dā̍num |
ci̱traḥ | va̱ḥ | a̱stu̱ | yāma̍ḥ | ci̱traḥ | ū̱tī | su̱-dā̱na̱va̱ḥ |
maru̍taḥ | ahi̍-bhānavaḥ |
ā̱re | sā | va̱ḥ | su̱-dā̱na̱va̱ḥ | maru̍taḥ | ṛ̱ñja̱tī | śaru̍ḥ |
ā̱re | aśmā̍ | yam | asya̍tha |
tṛ̱ṇa̱-ska̱ndasya̍ | nu | viśa̍ḥ | pari̍ | vṛ̱ṅkta̱ | su̱-dā̱na̱va̱ḥ |
ū̱rdhvān | na̱ḥ | ka̱rta̱ | jī̱vase̍ |
gāya̍t | sāma̍ | na̱bha̱nya̍m | yathā̍ | veḥ | arcā̍ma | tat | va̱vṛ̱dhā̱nam | sva̍ḥ-vat |
gāva̍ḥ | dhe̱nava̍ḥ | ba̱rhiṣi̍ | ada̍bdhāḥ | ā | yat | sa̱dmāna̍m | di̱vyam | vivā̍sān |
arca̍t | vṛṣā̍ | vṛṣa̍-bhiḥ | sva̱-idu̍havyaiḥ | mṛ̱gaḥ | na | aśna̍ḥ | ati̍ | yat | ju̱gu̱ryāt |
pra | ma̱nda̱yuḥ | ma̱nām | gū̱rta̱ | hotā̍ | bhara̍te | marya̍ḥ | mi̱thu̱nā | yaja̍traḥ |
nakṣa̍t | hotā̍ | pari̍ | sadma̍ | mi̱tā | yan | bhara̍t | garbha̍m | ā | śa̱rada̍ḥ | pṛ̱thi̱vyāḥ |
kranda̍t | aśva̍ḥ | naya̍mānaḥ | ru̱vat | gauḥ | a̱ntaḥ | dū̱taḥ | na | roda̍sī̱ iti̍ | ca̱ra̱t | vāk |
tā | ka̱rma̱ | aṣa̍-tarā | a̱smai̱ | pra | cyau̱tnāni̍ | de̱va̱-yanta̍ḥ | bha̱ra̱nte̱ |
jujo̍ṣat | indra̍ḥ | da̱sma-va̍rcāḥ | nāsa̍tyā-iva | sugmya̍ḥ | ra̱the̱-sthāḥ |
tam | u̱m̐ iti̍ | stu̱hi̱ | indra̍m | yaḥ | ha̱ | satvā̍ | yaḥ | śūra̍ḥ | ma̱gha-vā̍ | yaḥ | ra̱the̱-sthāḥ |
pra̱tī̱caḥ | ci̱t | yodhī̍yān | vṛṣa̍ṇ-vān | va̱va̱vruṣa̍ḥ | ci̱t | tama̍saḥ | vi̱-ha̱ntā |
pra | yat | i̱tthā | ma̱hi̱nā | nṛ-bhya̍ḥ | asti̍ | ara̍m | roda̍sī̱ iti̍ | ka̱kṣye̱3̱̍ iti̍ | na | a̱smai̱ |
sam | vi̱vye̱ | indra̍ḥ | vṛ̱jana̍m | na | bhūma̍ | bharti̍ | sva̱dhā-vā̍n | o̱pa̱śam-i̍va | dyām |
sa̱mat-su̍ | tvā̱ | śū̱ra̱ | sa̱tām | u̱rā̱ṇam | pra̱pa̱thin-ta̍mam | pa̱ri̱-ta̱ṁsa̱yadhyai̍ |
sa̱-joṣa̍saḥ | indra̍m | made̍ | kṣo̱ṇīḥ | sū̱rim | ci̱t | ye | a̱nu̱-mada̍nti | vājai̍ḥ |
e̱va | hi | te̱ | śam | sava̍nā | sa̱mu̱dre | āpa̍ḥ | yat | te̱ | ā̱su | mada̍nti | de̱vīḥ |
viśvā̍ | te̱ | anu̍ | joṣyā̍ | bhū̱t | gauḥ | sū̱rīn | ci̱t | yadi̍ | dhi̱ṣā | veṣi̍ | janā̍n |
asā̍ma | yathā̍ | su̱-sa̱khāya̍ḥ | e̱na̱ | su̱-a̱bhi̱ṣṭaya̍ḥ | na̱rām | na | śaṁsai̍ḥ |
asa̍t | yathā̍ | na̱ḥ | indra̍ḥ | va̱nda̱ne̱-sthāḥ | tu̱raḥ | na | karma̍ | naya̍mānaḥ | u̱kthā |
vi-spa̍rdhasaḥ | na̱rām | na | śaṁsai̍ḥ | a̱smāka̍ | a̱sa̱t | indra̍ḥ | vajra̍-hastaḥ |
mi̱tra̱-yuva̍ḥ | na | pūḥ-pa̍tim | su-śi̍ṣṭau | ma̱dhya̱-yuva̍ḥ | upa̍ | śi̱kṣa̱nti̱ | ya̱jñaiḥ |
ya̱jñaḥ | hi | sma̱ | indra̍m | kaḥ | ci̱t | ṛ̱ndhan | ju̱hu̱rā̱ṇaḥ | ci̱t | mana̍sā | pa̱ri̱-yan |
tī̱rthe | na | accha̍ | ta̱tṛ̱ṣā̱ṇam | oka̍ḥ | dī̱rghaḥ | na | si̱dhram | ā | kṛ̱ṇo̱ti̱ | adhvā̍ |
mo iti̍ | su | na̱ḥ | i̱ndra̱ | atra̍ | pṛ̱t-su | de̱vaiḥ | asti̍ | hi | sma̱ | te̱ | śu̱ṣmi̱n | a̱va̱-yāḥ |
ma̱haḥ | ci̱t | yasya̍ | mī̱ḻhuṣa̍ḥ | ya̱vyā | ha̱viṣma̍taḥ | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | vanda̍te | gīḥ |
e̱ṣaḥ | stoma̍ḥ | i̱ndra̱ | tubhya̍m | a̱sme iti̍ | e̱tena̍ | gā̱tum | ha̱ri̱-va̱ḥ | vi̱da̱ḥ | na̱ḥ |
ā | na̱ḥ | va̱vṛ̱tyā̱ḥ | su̱vi̱tāya̍ | de̱va̱ | vi̱dyāma̍ | i̱ṣam | vṛ̱jana̍m | jī̱ra-dā̍num |
tvam | rājā̍ | i̱ndra̱ | ye | ca̱ | de̱vāḥ | rakṣa̍ | nṝn | pā̱hi | a̱su̱ra̱ | tvam | a̱smān |
tvam | sat-pa̍tiḥ | ma̱gha-vā̍ | na̱ḥ | taru̍traḥ | tvam | sa̱tyaḥ | vasa̍vānaḥ | sa̱ha̱ḥ-dāḥ |
dana̍ḥ | viśa̍ḥ | i̱ndra̱ | mṛ̱dhra-vā̍caḥ | sa̱pta | yat | pura̍ḥ | śarma̍ | śāra̍dīḥ | dart |
ṛ̱ṇoḥ | a̱paḥ | a̱na̱va̱dya̱ | arṇā̍ḥ | yūne̍ | vṛ̱tram | pu̱ru̱-kutsā̍ya | ra̱ndhī̱ḥ |
aja̍ | vṛta̍ḥ | i̱ndra̱ | śūra̍-patnīḥ | dyām | ca̱ | yebhi̍ḥ | pu̱ru̱-hū̱ta̱ | nū̱nam |
rakṣo̱ iti̍ | a̱gnim | a̱śuṣa̍m | tūrva̍yāṇam | si̱ṁhaḥ | na | dame̍ | apā̍ṁsi | vasto̍ḥ |
śeṣa̍n | nu | te | i̱ndra̱ | sasmi̍n | yonau̍ | pra-śa̍staye | pavī̍ravasya | ma̱hnā |
sṛ̱jat | arṇā̍ṁsi | ava̍ | yat | yu̱dhā | gāḥ | tiṣṭha̍t | harī̱ iti̍ | dhṛ̱ṣa̱tā | mṛ̱ṣṭa̱ | vājā̍n |
vaha̍ | kutsa̍m | i̱ndra̱ | yasmi̍n | cā̱kan | syū̱ma̱nyū iti̍ | ṛ̱jrā | vāta̍sya | aśvā̍ |
pra | sūra̍ḥ | ca̱kram | vṛ̱ha̱tā̱t | a̱bhīke̍ | a̱bhi | spṛdha̍ḥ | yā̱si̱ṣa̱t | vajra̍-bāhuḥ |
ja̱gha̱nvān | i̱ndra̱ | mi̱trerū̍n | co̱da-pra̍vṛddhaḥ | ha̱ri̱-va̱ḥ | adā̍śūn |
pra | ye | paśya̍n | a̱rya̱maṇa̍m | sacā̍ | ā̱yoḥ | tvayā̍ | śū̱rtāḥ | vaha̍mānāḥ | apa̍tyam |
rapa̍t | ka̱viḥ | i̱ndra̱ | a̱rka-sā̍tau | kṣām | dā̱sāya̍ | u̱pa̱-barha̍ṇīm | ka̱riti̍ kaḥ |
kara̍t | ti̱sraḥ | ma̱gha-vā̍ | dānu̍-citrāḥ | ni | du̱ryo̱ṇe | kuya̍vācam | mṛ̱dhi | śre̱t |
sanā̍ | tā | te̱ | i̱ndra̱ | navyā̍ḥ | ā | a̱gu̱ḥ | saha̍ḥ | nabha̍ḥ | avi̍-raṇāya | pū̱rvīḥ |
bhi̱nat | pura̍ḥ | na | bhida̍ḥ | ade̍vīḥ | na̱nama̍ḥ | vadha̍ḥ | ade̍vasya | pī̱yoḥ |
tvam | dhuni̍ḥ | i̱ndra̱ | dhuni̍-matīḥ | ṛ̱ṇoḥ | a̱paḥ | sī̱rāḥ | na | srava̍ntīḥ |
pra | yat | sa̱mu̱dram | ati̍ | śū̱ra̱ | parṣi̍ | pā̱raya̍ | tu̱rvaśa̍m | yadu̍m | sva̱sti |
tvam | a̱smāka̍m | i̱ndra̱ | vi̱śvadha̍ | syā̱ḥ | a̱vṛ̱ka-ta̍maḥ | na̱rām | nṛ̱-pā̱tā |
saḥ | na̱ḥ | viśvā̍sām | spṛ̱dhām | sa̱ha̱ḥ-dāḥ | vi̱dyāma̍ | i̱ṣam | vṛ̱jana̍m | jī̱ra-dā̍num |
matsi̍ | apā̍yi | te̱ | maha̍ḥ | pātra̍sya-iva | ha̱ri̱-vaḥ | ma̱tsa̱raḥ | mada̍ḥ |
vṛṣā̍ | te̱ | vṛṣṇe̍ | indu̍ḥ | vā̱jī | sa̱ha̱sra̱-sāta̍maḥ |
ā | na̱ḥ | te̱ | ga̱ntu̱ | ma̱tsa̱raḥ | vṛṣā̍ | mada̍ḥ | vare̍ṇyaḥ |
sa̱ha-vā̍n | i̱ndra̱ | sā̱na̱siḥ | pṛ̱ta̱nā̱ṣāṭ | ama̍rtyaḥ |
tvam | hi | śūra̍ḥ | sani̍tā | co̱daya̍ḥ | manu̍ṣaḥ | ratha̍m |
sa̱ha-vā̍n | dasyu̍m | a̱vra̱tam | oṣa̍ḥ | pātra̍m | na | śo̱ciṣā̍ |
mu̱ṣā̱ya | sūrya̍m | ka̱ve̱ | ca̱kram | īśā̍naḥ | oja̍sā |
vaha̍ | śuṣṇā̍ya | va̱dham | kutsa̍m | vāta̍sya | aśvai̍ḥ |
śu̱ṣmin-ta̍maḥ | hi | te̱ | mada̍ḥ | dyu̱mnin-ta̍maḥ | u̱ta | kratu̍ḥ |
vṛ̱tra̱-ghnā | va̱ri̱va̱ḥ-vidā̍ | ma̱ṁsī̱ṣṭhāḥ | a̱śva̱-sāta̍maḥ |
yathā̍ | pūrve̍bhyaḥ | ja̱ri̱tṛ-bhya̍ḥ | i̱ndra̱ | maya̍ḥ-iva | āpa̍ḥ | na | tṛṣya̍te | ba̱bhūtha̍ |
tām | anu̍ | tvā̱ | ni̱-vida̍m | jo̱ha̱vī̱mi̱ | vi̱dyāma̍ | i̱ṣam | vṛ̱jana̍m | jī̱ra-dā̍num |
matsi̍ | na̱ḥ | vasya̍ḥ-iṣṭaye | indra̍m | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ | vṛṣā̍ | ā | vi̱śa̱ |
ṛ̱ghā̱yamā̍ṇaḥ | i̱nva̱si̱ | śatru̍m | anti̍ | na | vi̱nda̱si̱ |
tasmi̍n | ā | ve̱śa̱ya̱ | gira̍ḥ | yaḥ | eka̍ḥ | ca̱rṣa̱ṇī̱nām |
anu̍ | sva̱dhā | yam | u̱pyate̍ | yava̍m | na | carkṛ̍ṣat | vṛṣā̍ |
yasya̍ | viśvā̍ni | hasta̍yoḥ | pañca̍ | kṣi̱tī̱nām | vasu̍ |
spā̱śaya̍sva | yaḥ | a̱sma̱-dhruk | di̱vyā-i̍va | a̱śani̍ḥ | ja̱hi̱ |
asu̍nvantam | sa̱ma̱m | ja̱hi̱ | du̱ḥ-naśa̍m | yaḥ | na | te̱ | maya̍ḥ |
a̱smabhya̍m | a̱sya̱ | veda̍nam | da̱ddhi | sū̱riḥ | ci̱t | o̱ha̱te̱ |
āva̍ḥ | yasya̍ | dvi̱-barha̍saḥ | a̱rkeṣu̍ | sā̱nu̱ṣak | asa̍t |
ā̱jau | indra̍sya | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ | pra | ā̱va̱ḥ | vāje̍ṣu | vā̱jina̍m |
yathā̍ | pūrve̍bhyaḥ | ja̱ri̱tṛ-bhya̍ḥ | i̱ndra̱ | maya̍ḥ-iva | āpa̍ḥ | na | tṛṣya̍te | ba̱bhūtha̍ |
tām | anu̍ | tvā̱ | ni̱-vida̍m | jo̱ha̱vī̱mi̱ | vi̱dyāma̍ | i̱ṣam | vṛ̱jana̍m | jī̱ra-dā̍num |
ā | ca̱rṣa̱ṇi̱-prāḥ | vṛ̱ṣa̱bhaḥ | janā̍nām | rājā̍ | kṛ̱ṣṭī̱nām | pu̱ru̱-hū̱taḥ | indra̍ḥ |
stu̱taḥ | śra̱va̱syan | ava̍sā | upa̍ | ma̱drik | yu̱ktvā | harī̱ iti̍ | vṛ̱ṣa̱ṇā | ā | yā̱hi̱ | a̱rvāṅ |
ye | te̱ | vṛṣa̍ṇaḥ | vṛ̱ṣa̱bhāsa̍ḥ | i̱ndra̱ | bra̱hma̱-yuja̍ḥ | vṛṣa̍-rathāsaḥ | atyā̍ḥ |
tān | ā | ti̱ṣṭha̱ | tebhi̍ḥ | ā | yā̱hi̱ | a̱rvāṅ | havā̍mahe | tvā̱ | su̱te | i̱ndra̱ | some̍ |
ā | ti̱ṣṭha̱ | ratha̍m | vṛṣa̍ṇam | vṛṣā̍ | te̱ | su̱taḥ | soma̍ḥ | pari̍-siktā | madhū̍ni |
yu̱ktvā | vṛṣa̍-bhyām | vṛ̱ṣa̱bha̱ | kṣi̱tī̱nām | hari̍-bhyām | yā̱hi̱ | pra̱-vatā̍ | upa̍ | ma̱drik |
a̱yam | ya̱jñaḥ | de̱va̱-yāḥ | a̱yam | mi̱yedha̍ḥ | i̱mā | brahmā̍ṇi | a̱yam | i̱ndra̱ | soma̍ḥ |
stī̱rṇam | ba̱rhiḥ | ā | tu | śa̱kra̱ | pra | yā̱hi̱ | piba̍ | ni̱-sadya̍ | vi | mu̱ca̱ | harī̱ iti̍ | i̱ha |
o iti̍ | su-stu̍taḥ | i̱ndra̱ | yā̱hi̱ | a̱rvāṅ | upa̍ | brahmā̍ṇi | mā̱nyasya̍ | kā̱roḥ |
vi̱dyāma̍ | vasto̍ḥ | ava̍sā | gṛ̱ṇanta̍ḥ | vi̱dyāma̍ | i̱ṣam | vṛ̱jana̍m | jī̱ra-dā̍num |
yat | ha̱ | syā | te̱ | i̱ndra̱ | śru̱ṣṭiḥ | asti̍ | yayā̍ | ba̱bhūtha̍ | ja̱ri̱tṛ-bhya̍ḥ | ū̱tī |
mā | na̱ḥ | kāma̍m | ma̱haya̍ntam | ā | dha̱k | viśvā̍ | te̱ | a̱śyā̱m | pari̍ | āpa̍ḥ | ā̱yoḥ |
na | gha̱ | rājā̍ | indra̍ḥ | ā | da̱bha̱t | na̱ḥ | yā | nu | svasā̍rā | kṛ̱ṇava̍nta | yonau̍ |
āpa̍ḥ | ci̱t | a̱smai̱ | su̱-tukā̍ḥ | a̱ve̱ṣa̱n | gama̍t | na̱ḥ | indra̍ḥ | sa̱khyā | vaya̍ḥ | ca̱ |
jetā̍ | nṛ-bhi̍ḥ | indra̍ḥ | pṛ̱t-su | śūra̍ḥ | śrotā̍ | hava̍m | nādha̍mānasya | kā̱roḥ |
pra-bha̍rtā | ratha̍m | dā̱śuṣa̍ḥ | u̱pā̱ke | ut-ya̍ntā | gira̍ḥ | yadi̍ | ca̱ | tmanā̍ | bhūt |
e̱va | nṛ-bhi̍ḥ | indra̍ḥ | su̱-śra̱va̱syā | pra̱-khā̱daḥ | pṛ̱kṣaḥ | a̱bhi | mi̱triṇa̍ḥ | bhū̱t |
sa̱-ma̱rye | i̱ṣaḥ | sta̱va̱te̱ | vi-vā̍ci | sa̱trā̱-ka̱raḥ | yaja̍mānasya | śaṁsa̍ḥ |
tvayā̍ | va̱yam | ma̱gha̱-va̱n | i̱ndra̱ | śatrū̍n | a̱bhi | syā̱ma̱ | ma̱ha̱taḥ | manya̍mānān |
tvam | trā̱tā | tvam | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | na̱ḥ | vṛ̱dhe | bhū̱ḥ | vi̱dyāma̍ | i̱ṣam | vṛ̱jana̍m | jī̱ra-dā̍num |
pū̱rvīḥ | a̱ham | śa̱rada̍ḥ | śa̱śra̱mā̱ṇā | do̱ṣāḥ | vasto̍ḥ | u̱ṣasa̍ḥ | ja̱raya̍ntīḥ |
mi̱nāti̍ | śriya̍m | ja̱ri̱mā | ta̱nūnā̍m | api̍ | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | nu | patnī̍ḥ | vṛṣa̍ṇaḥ | ja̱ga̱myu̱ḥ |
ye | ci̱t | hi | pūrve̍ | ṛ̱ta̱-sāpa̍ḥ | āsa̍n | sā̱kam | de̱vebhi̍ḥ | ava̍dan | ṛ̱tāni̍ |
te | ci̱t | ava̍ | a̱su̱ḥ | na̱hi | anta̍m | ā̱puḥ | sam | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | nu | patnī̍ḥ | vṛṣa̍-bhiḥ | ja̱ga̱myu̱ḥ |
na | mṛṣā̍ | śrā̱ntam | yat | ava̍nti | de̱vāḥ | viśvā̍ḥ | it | spṛdha̍ḥ | a̱bhi | a̱śna̱vā̱va̱ |
jayā̍va | it | atra̍ | śa̱ta-nī̍tham | ā̱jim | yat | sa̱myañcā̍ | mi̱thu̱nau | a̱bhi | ajā̍va |
na̱dasya̍ | mā̱ | ru̱dha̱taḥ | kāma̍ḥ | ā | a̱ga̱n | i̱taḥ | ā-jā̍taḥ | a̱muta̍ḥ | kuta̍ḥ | ci̱t |
lopā̍mudrā | vṛṣa̍ṇam | niḥ | ri̱ṇā̱ti̱ | dhīra̍m | adhī̍rā | dha̱ya̱ti̱ | śva̱santa̍m |
i̱mam | nu | soma̍m | anti̍taḥ | hṛ̱t-su | pī̱tam | upa̍ | bru̱ve̱ |
yat | sī̱m | āga̍ḥ | ca̱kṛ̱ma | tat | su | mṛ̱ḻa̱tu̱ | pu̱lu̱-kāma̍ḥ | hi | martya̍ḥ |
a̱gastya̍ḥ | khana̍mānaḥ | kha̱nitrai̍ḥ | pra̱-jām | apa̍tyam | bala̍m | i̱cchamā̍naḥ |
u̱bhau | varṇau̍ | ṛṣi̍ḥ | u̱graḥ | pu̱po̱ṣa̱ | sa̱tyāḥ | de̱veṣu̍ | ā̱-śiṣa̍ḥ | ja̱gā̱ma̱ |
yu̱voḥ | rajā̍ṁsi | su̱-yamā̍saḥ | aśvā̍ḥ | ratha̍ḥ | yat | vā̱m | pari̍ | arṇā̍ṁsi | dīya̍t |
hi̱ra̱ṇyayā̍ḥ | vām | pa̱vaya̍ḥ | pru̱ṣā̱ya̱n | madhva̍ḥ | piba̍ntau | u̱ṣasa̍ḥ | sa̱ce̱the̱ iti̍ |
yu̱vam | atya̍sya | ava̍ | na̱kṣa̱tha̱ḥ | yat | vi-pa̍tmanaḥ | narya̍sya | pra-ya̍jyoḥ |
svasā̍ | yat | vā̱m | vi̱śva̱gū̱rtī̱ iti̍ viśva-gūrtī | bharā̍ti | vājā̍ya | īṭṭe̍ | ma̱dhu̱-pau̱ | i̱ṣe | ca̱ |
yu̱vam | paya̍ḥ | u̱sriyā̍yām | a̱dha̱tta̱m | pa̱kvam | ā̱māyā̍m | ava̍ | pūrvya̍m | goḥ |
a̱ntaḥ | yat | va̱nina̍ḥ | vā̱m | ṛ̱ta̱psū̱ ityṛ̍ta-psū | hvā̱raḥ | na | śuci̍ḥ | yaja̍te | ha̱viṣmā̍n |
yu̱vam | ha̱ | gha̱rmam | madhu̍-mantam | atra̍ye | a̱paḥ | na | kṣoda̍ḥ | a̱vṛ̱ṇī̱ta̱m | e̱ṣe |
tat | vā̱m | na̱rau̱ | a̱śvi̱nā̱ | paśva̍ḥ-iṣṭiḥ | rathyā̍-iva | ca̱krā | prati̍ | ya̱nti̱ | madhva̍ḥ |
ā | vā̱m | dā̱nāya̍ | va̱vṛ̱tī̱ya̱ | da̱srā̱ | goḥ | ohe̍na | tau̱gryaḥ | na | jivri̍ḥ |
a̱paḥ | kṣo̱ṇī iti̍ | sa̱ca̱te̱ | māhi̍nā | vā̱m | jū̱rṇaḥ | vā̱m | akṣu̍ḥ | aṁha̍saḥ | ya̱ja̱trā̱ |
ni | yat | yu̱vethe̱ iti̍ | ni̱-yuta̍ḥ | su̱dā̱nū̱ iti̍ su-dānū | upa̍ | sva̱dhābhi̍ḥ | sṛ̱ja̱tha̱ḥ | pura̍m-dhim |
preṣa̍t | veṣa̍t | vāta̍ḥ | na | sū̱riḥ | ā | ma̱he | da̱de̱ | su̱-vra̱taḥ | na | vāja̍m |
va̱yam | ci̱t | hi | vā̱m | ja̱ri̱tāra̍ḥ | sa̱tyāḥ | vi̱pa̱nyāma̍he | vi | pa̱ṇiḥ | hi̱ta-vā̍n |
adha̍ | ci̱t | hi | sma̱ | a̱śvi̱nau̱ | a̱ni̱ndyā̱ | pā̱thaḥ | hi | sma̱ | vṛ̱ṣa̱ṇau̱ | anti̍-devam |
yu̱vām | ci̱t | hi | sma̱ | a̱śvi̱nau̱ | anu̍ | dyūn | vi-ru̍drasya | pra̱-srava̍ṇasya | sā̱tau |
a̱gastya̍ḥ | na̱rām | nṛṣu̍ | pra-śa̍staḥ | kārā̍dhunī-iva | ci̱ta̱ya̱t | sa̱hasrai̍ḥ |
pra | yat | vahe̍the̱ iti̍ | ma̱hi̱nā | ratha̍sya | pra | spa̱ndrā̱ | yā̱tha̱ḥ | manu̍ṣaḥ | na | hotā̍ |
dha̱ttam | sū̱ri-bhya̍ḥ | u̱ta | vā̱ | su̱-aśvya̍m | nāsa̍tyā | ra̱yi̱-sāca̍ḥ | syā̱ma̱ |
tam | vā̱m | ratha̍m | va̱yam | a̱dya | hu̱ve̱ma̱ | stomai̍ḥ | a̱śvi̱nā̱ | su̱vi̱tāya̍ | navya̍m |
ari̍ṣṭa-nemim | pari̍ | dyām | i̱yā̱nam | vi̱dyāma̍ | i̱ṣam | vṛ̱jana̍m | jī̱ra-dā̍num |
kat | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | preṣṭhau̍ | i̱ṣām | ra̱yī̱ṇām | a̱dhva̱ryantā̍ | yat | u̱t-ni̱nī̱thaḥ | a̱pām |
a̱yam | vā̱m | ya̱jñaḥ | a̱kṛ̱ta̱ | pra-śa̍stim | vasu̍dhitī̱ iti̱ vasu̍-dhitī | avi̍tārā | ja̱nā̱nā̱m |
ā | vā̱m | aśvā̍saḥ | śuca̍yaḥ | pa̱ya̱ḥ-pāḥ | vāta̍-raṁhasaḥ | di̱vyāsa̍ḥ | atyā̍ḥ |
ma̱na̱ḥ-juva̍ḥ | vṛṣa̍ṇaḥ | vī̱ta-pṛ̍ṣṭhāḥ | ā | i̱ha | sva̱-rāja̍ḥ | a̱śvinā̍ | va̱ha̱ntu̱ |
ā | vā̱m | ratha̍ḥ | a̱vani̍ḥ | na | pra̱vatvā̍n | sṛ̱pra-va̍ndhuraḥ | su̱vi̱tāya̍ | ga̱myā̱ḥ |
vṛṣṇa̍ḥ | sthā̱tā̱rā̱ | mana̍saḥ | javī̍yān | a̱ha̱m-pū̱rvaḥ | ya̱ja̱taḥ | dhi̱ṣṇyā̱ | yaḥ |
i̱ha-i̍ha | jā̱tā | sam | a̱vā̱va̱śī̱tā̱m | a̱re̱pasā̍ | ta̱nvā̍ | nāma̍-bhiḥ | svaiḥ |
ji̱ṣṇuḥ | vā̱m | a̱nyaḥ | su-ma̍khasya | sū̱riḥ | di̱vaḥ | a̱nyaḥ | su̱-bhaga̍ḥ | pu̱traḥ | ū̱he̱ |
pra | vā̱m | ni̱-ce̱ruḥ | ka̱ku̱haḥ | vaśā̍n | anu̍ | pi̱śaṅga̍-rūpaḥ | sada̍nāni | ga̱myā̱ḥ |
harī̱ iti̍ | a̱nyasya̍ | pī̱paya̍nta | vājai̍ḥ | ma̱thrā | rajā̍ṁsi | a̱śvi̱nā̱ | vi | ghoṣai̍ḥ |
pra | vā̱m | śa̱rat-vā̍n | vṛ̱ṣa̱bhaḥ | na | ni̱ṣṣāṭ | pū̱rvīḥ | iṣa̍ḥ | ca̱ra̱ti̱ | madhva̍ḥ | i̱ṣṇan |
evai̍ḥ | a̱nyasya̍ | pī̱paya̍nta | vājai̍ḥ | veṣa̍ntīḥ | ū̱rdhvāḥ | na̱dya̍ḥ | na̱ḥ | ā | a̱gu̱ḥ |
asa̍rji | vā̱m | sthavi̍rā | ve̱dha̱sā̱ | gīḥ | bā̱ḻhe | a̱śvi̱nā̱ | tre̱dhā | kṣara̍ntī |
upa̍-stutau | a̱va̱ta̱m | nādha̍mānam | yāma̍n | ayā̍man | śṛ̱ṇu̱ta̱m | hava̍m | me̱ |
u̱ta | syā | vā̱m | ruśa̍taḥ | vapsa̍saḥ | gīḥ | tri̱-ba̱rhiṣi̍ | sada̍si | pi̱nva̱te̱ | nṝn |
vṛṣā̍ | vā̱m | me̱ghaḥ | vṛ̱ṣa̱ṇā̱ | pī̱pā̱ya̱ | goḥ | na | seke̍ | manu̍ṣaḥ | da̱śa̱syan |
yu̱vām | pū̱ṣā-i̍va | a̱śvi̱nā̱ | pura̍m-dhiḥ | a̱gnim | u̱ṣām | na | ja̱ra̱te̱ | ha̱viṣmā̍n |
hu̱ve | yat | vā̱m | va̱ri̱va̱syā | gṛ̱ṇā̱naḥ | vi̱dyāma̍ | i̱ṣam | vṛ̱jana̍m | jī̱ra-dā̍num |
abhū̍t | i̱dam | va̱yuna̍m | o iti̍ | su | bhū̱ṣa̱ta̱ | ratha̍ḥ | vṛṣa̍ṇ-vān | mada̍ta | ma̱nī̱ṣi̱ṇa̱ḥ |
dhi̱ya̱m-ji̱nvā | dhiṣṇyā̍ | vi̱śpalā̍vasū̱ iti̍ | di̱vaḥ | napā̍tā | su̱-kṛte̍ | śuci̍-vratā |
indra̍-tamā | hi | dhiṣṇyā̍ | ma̱rut-ta̍mā | da̱srā | daṁsi̍ṣṭhā | ra̱thyā̍ | ra̱thi-ta̍mā |
pū̱rṇam | ratha̍m | va̱he̱the̱ iti̍ | madhva̍ḥ | ā-ci̍tam | tena̍ | dā̱śvāṁsa̍m | upa̍ | yā̱tha̱ḥ | a̱śvi̱nā̱ |
kim | atra̍ | da̱srā̱ | kṛ̱ṇu̱tha̱ḥ | kim | ā̱sā̱the̱ iti̍ | jana̍ḥ | yaḥ | kaḥ | ci̱t | aha̍viḥ | ma̱hī̱yate̍ |
ati̍ | kra̱mi̱ṣṭa̱m | ju̱rata̍m | pa̱ṇeḥ | asu̍m | jyoti̍ḥ | viprā̍ya | kṛ̱ṇu̱ta̱m | va̱ca̱syave̍ |
ja̱mbhaya̍tam | a̱bhita̍ḥ | rāya̍taḥ | śuna̍ḥ | ha̱tam | mṛdha̍ḥ | vi̱dathu̍ḥ | tāni̍ | a̱śvi̱nā̱ |
vāca̍m-vācam | ja̱ri̱tuḥ | ra̱tninī̍m | kṛ̱ta̱m | u̱bhā | saṁsa̍m | nā̱sa̱tyā̱ | a̱va̱ta̱m | mama̍ |
yu̱vam | e̱tam | ca̱kra̱tu̱ḥ | sindhu̍ṣu | pla̱vam | ā̱tma̱n-vanta̍m | pa̱kṣiṇa̍m | tau̱gryāya̍ | kam |
yena̍ | de̱va̱-trā | mana̍sā | ni̱ḥ-ū̱hathu̍ḥ | su̱-pa̱pta̱ni | pe̱ta̱thu̱ḥ | kṣoda̍saḥ | ma̱haḥ |
ava̍-viddham | tau̱gryam | a̱p-su | a̱ntaḥ | a̱nā̱ra̱mbha̱ṇe | tama̍si | pra-vi̍ddham |
cata̍sraḥ | nāva̍ḥ | jaṭha̍lasya | juṣṭā̍ḥ | ut | a̱śvi-bhyā̍m | i̱ṣi̱tāḥ | pā̱ra̱ya̱nti̱ |
kaḥ | svi̱t | vṛ̱kṣaḥ | niḥ-sthi̍taḥ | madhye̍ | arṇa̍saḥ | yam | tau̱gryaḥ | nā̱dhi̱taḥ | pa̱ri̱-asa̍svajat |
pa̱rṇā | mṛ̱gasya̍ | pa̱taro̍ḥ-iva | ā̱-rabhe̍ | ut | a̱śvi̱nau̱ | ū̱ha̱thu̱ḥ | śroma̍tāya | kam |
tat | vā̱m | na̱rā̱ | nā̱sa̱tyau̱ | anu̍ | syā̱t | yat | vā̱m | mānā̍saḥ | u̱catha̍m | avo̍can |
a̱smāt | a̱dya | sada̍saḥ | so̱myāt | ā | vi̱dyāma̍ | i̱ṣam | vṛ̱jana̍m | jī̱ra-dā̍num |
tam | yu̱ñjā̱thā̱m | mana̍saḥ | yaḥ | javī̍yān | tri̱-va̱ndhu̱raḥ | vṛ̱ṣa̱ṇā̱ | yaḥ | tri̱-ca̱kraḥ |
yena̍ | u̱pa̱-yā̱thaḥ | su̱-kṛta̍ḥ | du̱ro̱ṇam | tri̱-dhātu̍nā | pa̱ta̱tha̱ḥ | viḥ | na | pa̱rṇaiḥ |
su̱-vṛt | ratha̍ḥ | va̱rta̱te̱ | yan | a̱bhi | kṣām | yat | tiṣṭha̍thaḥ | kratu̍-mantā | anu̍ | pṛ̱kṣe |
vapu̍ḥ | va̱pu̱ṣyā | sa̱ca̱tā̱m | i̱yam | gīḥ | di̱vaḥ | du̱hi̱trā | u̱ṣasā̍ | sa̱ce̱the̱ iti̍ |
ā | ti̱ṣṭha̱ta̱m | su̱-vṛta̍m | yaḥ | ratha̍ḥ | vā̱m | anu̍ | vra̱tāni̍ | varta̍te | ha̱viṣmā̍n |

mā | vā̱m | vṛka̍ḥ | mā | vṛ̱kīḥ | ā | da̱dha̱rṣī̱t | mā | pari̍ | va̱rkta̱m | u̱ta | mā | ati̍ | dha̱kta̱m |
a̱yam | vā̱m | bhā̱gaḥ | ni-hi̍taḥ | i̱yam | gīḥ | dasrau̍ | i̱me | vā̱m | ni̱-dhaya̍ḥ | madhū̍nām |
yu̱vām | gota̍maḥ | pu̱ru̱-mī̱ḻhaḥ | atri̍ḥ | dasrā̍ | hava̍te | ava̍se | ha̱viṣmā̍n |
diśa̍m | na | di̱ṣṭām | ṛ̱ju̱yā-i̍va | yantā̍ | ā | me̱ | hava̍m | nā̱sa̱tyā̱ | upa̍ | yā̱ta̱m |
atā̍riṣma | tama̍saḥ | pā̱ram | a̱sya | prati̍ | vā̱m | stoma̍ḥ | a̱śvi̱nau̱ | a̱dhā̱yi̱ |
ā | i̱ha | yā̱ta̱m | pa̱thi-bhi̍ḥ | de̱va̱-yānai̍ḥ | vi̱dyāma̍ | i̱ṣam | vṛ̱jana̍m | jī̱ra-dā̍num |

nāsa̍tyā | kuha̍ | ci̱t | santau̍ | a̱ryaḥ | di̱vaḥ | napā̍tā | su̱dāḥ-ta̍rāya |
a̱sme iti̍ | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | su | vṛ̱ṣa̱ṇā̱ | mā̱da̱ye̱thā̱m | ut | pa̱ṇīn | ha̱ta̱m | ū̱rmyā | mada̍ntā |
śru̱tam | me̱ | accho̍kti-bhiḥ | ma̱tī̱nām | eṣṭā̍ | na̱rā̱ | ni-ce̍tārā | ca̱ | karṇai̍ḥ |
śri̱ye | pū̱ṣa̱n | i̱ṣu̱kṛtā̍-iva | de̱vā | nāsa̍tyā | va̱ha̱tum | sū̱ryāyā̍ḥ |
va̱cyante̍ | vām | ka̱ku̱hāḥ | a̱p-su | jā̱tāḥ | yu̱gā | jū̱rṇā-i̍va | varu̍ṇasya | bhūre̍ḥ |

anu̍ | yat | vā̱m | śra̱va̱syā̍ | su̱dā̱nū̱ iti̍ su-dānū | su̱-vīryā̍ya | ca̱rṣa̱ṇaya̍ḥ | mada̍nti |

nitya̍m | na | sū̱num | pi̱troḥ | u̱pa-sthe̍ | dyāvā̍ | rakṣa̍tam | pṛ̱thi̱vī̱ iti̍ | na̱ḥ | abhvā̍t |
a̱ne̱haḥ | dā̱tram | adi̍teḥ | a̱na̱rvam | hu̱ve | sva̍ḥ-vat | a̱va̱dham | nama̍svat |
tat | ro̱da̱sī̱ iti̍ | ja̱na̱ya̱ta̱m | ja̱ri̱tre | dyāvā̍ | rakṣa̍tam | pṛ̱thi̱vī̱ iti̍ | na̱ḥ | abhvā̍t |
ata̍pyamāne̱ iti̍ | ava̍sā | ava̍ntī̱ iti̍ | anu̍ | syā̱ma̱ | roda̍sī̱ iti̍ | de̱vapu̍tre̱ iti̍ de̱va-pu̍tre |
u̱bhe iti̍ | de̱vānā̍m | u̱bhaye̍bhiḥ | ahnā̍m | dyāvā̍ | rakṣa̍tam | pṛ̱thi̱vī̱ iti̍ | na̱ḥ | abhvā̍t |
sa̱ṁgaccha̍māne̱ iti̍ sa̱m-gaccha̍māne | yu̱va̱tī iti̍ | sama̍nte̱ iti̱ sam-a̍nte | svasā̍rā | jā̱mī iti̍ | pi̱troḥ | u̱pa-sthe̍ |
a̱bhi̱jighra̍ntī̱ itya̍bhi̱-jighra̍ntī | bhuva̍nasya | nābhi̍m | dyāvā̍ | rakṣa̍tam | pṛ̱thi̱vī̱ iti̍ | na̱ḥ | abhvā̍t |

ā | na̱ḥ | iḻā̍bhiḥ | vi̱dathe̍ | su̱-śa̱sti | vi̱śvāna̍raḥ | sa̱vi̱tā | de̱vaḥ | e̱tu̱ |

pro iti̍ | a̱śvinau̍ | ava̍se | kṛ̱ṇu̱dhva̱m | pra | pū̱ṣaṇa̍m | sva-ta̍vasaḥ | hi | santi̍ |
a̱dve̱ṣaḥ | viṣṇu̍ḥ | vāta̍ḥ | ṛ̱bhu̱kṣāḥ | accha̍ | su̱mnāya̍ | va̱vṛ̱tī̱ya̱ | de̱vān |

vātā̍pe | pīva̍ḥ | it | bha̱va̱ |

vātā̍pe | pīva̍ḥ | it | bha̱va̱ |
tvam | tvā̱ | va̱yam | pi̱to̱ iti̍ | vaca̍ḥ-bhiḥ | gāva̍ḥ | na | ha̱vyā | su̱sū̱di̱ma̱ |
de̱vebhya̍ḥ | tvā̱ | sa̱dha̱-māda̍m | a̱smabhya̍m | tvā̱ | sa̱dha̱-māda̍m |
sam-i̍ddhaḥ | a̱dya | rā̱ja̱si̱ | de̱vaḥ | de̱vaiḥ | sa̱ha̱sra̱-ji̱t |
dū̱taḥ | ha̱vyā | ka̱viḥ | va̱ha̱ |

dadha̍t | sa̱ha̱sriṇī̍ḥ | iṣa̍ḥ |
ā̱-juhvā̍naḥ | na̱ḥ | īḍya̍ḥ | de̱vān | ā | va̱kṣi̱ | ya̱jñiyā̍n |
agne̍ | sa̱ha̱sra̱-sāḥ | a̱si̱ |
