va̱yam | a̱gne̱ | va̱nu̱yā̱ma̱ | tvā-ū̍tāḥ | va̱su̱-yava̍ḥ | ha̱viṣā̍ | budhya̍mānāḥ |
va̱yam | sa̱-ma̱rye | vi̱dathe̍ṣu | ahnā̍m | va̱yam | rā̱yā | sa̱ha̱sa̱ḥ | pu̱tra̱ | martā̍n |
yaḥ | na̱ḥ | āga̍ḥ | a̱bhi | ena̍ḥ | bharā̍ti | adhi̍ | it | a̱gham | a̱gha-śa̍ṁse | da̱dhā̱ta̱ |
ja̱hi | ci̱ki̱tva̱ḥ | a̱bhi-śa̍stim | e̱tām | agne̍ | yaḥ | na̱ḥ | ma̱rcaya̍ti | dva̱yena̍ |
tvām | a̱syāḥ | vi̱-uṣi̍ | de̱va̱ | pūrve̍ | dū̱tam | kṛ̱ṇvā̱nāḥ | a̱ya̱ja̱nta̱ | ha̱vyaiḥ |
sa̱m-sthe | yat | a̱gne̱ | īya̍se | ra̱yī̱ṇām | de̱vaḥ | martai̍ḥ | vasu̍-bhiḥ | i̱dhyamā̍naḥ |
ava̍ | spṛ̱dhi̱ | pi̱tara̍m | yodhi̍ | vi̱dvān | pu̱traḥ | yaḥ | te̱ | sa̱ha̱sa̱ḥ | sū̱no̱ iti̍ | ū̱he |
ka̱dā | ci̱ki̱tva̱ḥ | a̱bhi | ca̱kṣa̱se̱ | na̱ḥ | agne̍ | ka̱dā | ṛ̱ta̱-cit | yā̱ta̱yā̱se̱ |
bhūri̍ | nāma̍ | vanda̍mānaḥ | da̱dhā̱ti̱ | pi̱tā | va̱so̱ iti̍ | yadi̍ | tat | jo̱ṣayā̍se |
ku̱vit | de̱vasya̍ | saha̍sā | ca̱kā̱naḥ | su̱mnam | a̱gniḥ | va̱na̱te̱ | va̱vṛ̱dhā̱naḥ |
tvam | a̱ṅga | ja̱ri̱tāra̍m | ya̱vi̱ṣṭha̱ | viśvā̍ni | a̱gne̱ | du̱ḥ-i̱tā | ati̍ | pa̱rṣi |
ste̱nāḥ | a̱dṛ̱śra̱n | ri̱pava̍ḥ | janā̍saḥ | ajñā̍ta-ketāḥ | vṛ̱ji̱nāḥ | a̱bhū̱va̱n |
i̱me | yāmā̍saḥ | tva̱drik | a̱bhū̱va̱n | vasa̍ve | vā̱ | tat | it | āga̍ḥ | a̱vā̱ci̱ |
na | aha̍ | a̱yam | a̱gniḥ | a̱bhi-śa̍staye | na̱ḥ | na | riṣa̍te | va̱vṛ̱dhā̱naḥ | parā̍ | dā̱t |
tvām | a̱gne̱ | vasu̍-patim | vasū̍nām | a̱bhi | pra | ma̱nde̱ | a̱dhva̱reṣu̍ | rā̱ja̱n |
tvayā̍ | vāja̍m | vā̱ja̱-yanta̍ḥ | ja̱ye̱ma̱ | a̱bhi | syā̱ma̱ | pṛ̱tsu̱tīḥ | martyā̍nām |
ha̱vya̱-vāṭ | a̱gniḥ | a̱jara̍ḥ | pi̱tā | na̱ḥ | vi̱-bhuḥ | vi̱bhā-vā̍ | su̱-dṛśī̍kaḥ | a̱sme iti̍ |
su̱-gā̱rha̱pa̱tyāḥ | sam | iṣa̍ḥ | di̱dī̱hi̱ | a̱sma̱drya̍k | sam | mi̱mī̱hi̱ | śravā̍ṁsi |
vi̱śām | ka̱vim | vi̱śpati̍m | mānu̍ṣīṇām | śuci̍m | pā̱va̱kam | ghṛ̱ta-pṛ̍ṣṭham | a̱gnim |
ni | hotā̍ram | vi̱śva̱-vida̍m | da̱dhi̱dhve̱ | saḥ | de̱veṣu̍ | va̱na̱te̱ | vāryā̍ṇi |
ju̱ṣasva̍ | a̱gne̱ | iḻa̍yā | sa̱-joṣā̍ḥ | yata̍mānaḥ | ra̱śmi-bhi̍ḥ | sūrya̍sya |
ju̱ṣasva̍ | na̱ḥ | sa̱m-idha̍m | jā̱ta̱-ve̱da̱ḥ | ā | ca̱ | de̱vān | ha̱vi̱ḥ-adyā̍ya | va̱kṣi̱ |
juṣṭa̍ḥ | damū̍nāḥ | ati̍thiḥ | du̱ro̱ṇe | i̱mam | na̱ḥ | ya̱jñam | upa̍ | yā̱hi̱ | vi̱dvān |
viśvā̍ḥ | a̱gne̱ | a̱bhi̱-yuja̍ḥ | vi̱-hatya̍ | śa̱tru̱-ya̱tām | ā | bha̱ra̱ | bhoja̍nāni |
ve̱dhena̍ | dasyu̍m | pra | hi | cā̱taya̍sva | vaya̍ḥ | kṛ̱ṇvā̱naḥ | ta̱nve̍ | svāyai̍ |
pipa̍rṣi | yat | sa̱ha̱sa̱ḥ | pu̱tra̱ | de̱vān | saḥ | a̱gne̱ | pā̱hi̱ | nṛ̱-ta̱ma̱ | vāje̍ | a̱smān |
va̱yam | te̱ | a̱gne̱ | u̱kthaiḥ | vi̱dhe̱ma̱ | va̱yam | ha̱vyaiḥ | pā̱va̱ka̱ | bha̱dra̱-śo̱ce̱ |
a̱sme iti̍ | ra̱yim | vi̱śva-vā̍ram | sam | i̱nva̱ | a̱sme iti̍ | viśvā̍ni | dravi̍ṇāni | dhe̱hi̱ |
a̱smāka̍m | a̱gne̱ | a̱dhva̱ram | ju̱ṣa̱sva̱ | saha̍saḥ | sū̱no̱ iti̍ | tri̱-sa̱dha̱stha̱ | ha̱vyam |
va̱yam | de̱veṣu̍ | su̱-kṛta̍ḥ | syā̱ma̱ | śarma̍ṇā | na̱ḥ | tri̱-varū̍thena | pā̱hi̱ |
viśvā̍ni | na̱ḥ | du̱ḥ-gahā̍ | jā̱ta̱-ve̱da̱ḥ | sindhu̍m | na | nā̱vā | du̱ḥ-i̱tā | ati̍ | pa̱rṣi̱ |
agne̍ | a̱tri̱-vat | nama̍sā | gṛ̱ṇā̱naḥ | a̱smāka̍m | bo̱dhi̱ | a̱vi̱tā | ta̱nūnā̍m |
yaḥ | tvā̱ | hṛ̱dā | kī̱riṇā̍ | manya̍mānaḥ | ama̍rtyam | martya̍ḥ | joha̍vīmi |
jāta̍-vedaḥ | yaśa̍ḥ | a̱smāsu̍ | dhe̱hi̱ | pra̱-jābhi̍ḥ | a̱gne̱ | a̱mṛ̱ta̱-tvam | a̱śyā̱m |
yasmai̍ | tvam | su̱-kṛte̍ | jā̱ta̱-ve̱da̱ḥ | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | lo̱kam | a̱gne̱ | kṛ̱ṇava̍ḥ | syo̱nam |
a̱śvina̍m | saḥ | pu̱triṇa̍m | vī̱ra-va̍ntam | go-ma̍ntam | ra̱yim | na̱śa̱te̱ | sva̱sti |
su-sa̍middhāya | śo̱ciṣe̍ | ghṛ̱tam | tī̱vram | ju̱ho̱ta̱na̱ |
a̱gnaye̍ | jā̱ta-ve̍dase |
narā̱śaṁsa̍ḥ | su̱sū̱da̱ti̱ | i̱mam | ya̱jñam | adā̍bhyaḥ |
ka̱viḥ | hi | madhu̍-hastyaḥ |
ī̱ḻi̱taḥ | a̱gne̱ | ā | va̱ha̱ | indra̍m | ci̱tram | i̱ha | pri̱yam |
su̱-khaiḥ | rathe̍bhiḥ | ū̱taye̍ |
ūrṇa̍-mradāḥ | vi | pra̱tha̱sva̱ | a̱bhi | a̱rkāḥ | a̱nū̱ṣa̱ta̱ |
bhava̍ | na̱ḥ | śu̱bhra̱ | sā̱taye̍ |
devī̍ḥ | dvā̱ra̱ḥ | vi | śra̱ya̱dhva̱m | su̱pra̱-a̱ya̱nāḥ | na̱ḥ | ū̱taye̍ |
pra-pra̍ | ya̱jñam | pṛ̱ṇī̱ta̱na̱ |
su̱pratī̍ke̱ iti̍ su̱-pratī̍ke | va̱ya̱ḥ-vṛdhā̍ | ya̱hvī iti̍ | ṛ̱tasya̍ | mā̱tarā̍ |
do̱ṣām | u̱ṣasa̍m | ī̱ma̱he̱ |
vāta̍sya | patma̍n | ī̱ḻi̱tā | daivyā̍ | hotā̍rā | manu̍ṣaḥ |
i̱mam | na̱ḥ | ya̱jñam | ā | ga̱ta̱m |
iḻā̍ | sara̍svatī | ma̱hī | ti̱sraḥ | de̱vīḥ | ma̱ya̱ḥ-bhuva̍ḥ |
ba̱rhiḥ | sī̱da̱ntu̱ | a̱sridha̍ḥ |
śi̱vaḥ | tva̱ṣṭa̱ḥ | i̱ha | ā̱ | ga̱hi̱ | vi̱-bhuḥ | poṣe̍ | u̱ta | tmanā̍ |
ya̱jñe-ya̍jñe | na̱ḥ | ut | a̱va̱ |
yatra̍ | vettha̍ | va̱na̱spa̱te̱ | de̱vānā̍m | guhyā̍ | nāmā̍ni |
tatra̍ | ha̱vyāni̍ | ga̱ma̱ya̱ |
svāhā̍ | a̱gnaye̍ | varu̍ṇāya | svāhā̍ | indrā̍ya | ma̱rut-bhya̍ḥ |
svāhā̍ | de̱vebhya̍ḥ | ha̱viḥ |
a̱gnim | tam | ma̱nye̱ | yaḥ | vasu̍ḥ | asta̍m | yam | yanti̍ | dhe̱nava̍ḥ |
asta̍m | arva̍ntaḥ | ā̱śava̍ḥ | asta̍m | nityā̍saḥ | vā̱jina̍ḥ | iṣa̍m | sto̱tṛ-bhya̍ḥ | ā | bha̱ra̱ |
saḥ | a̱gniḥ | yaḥ | vasu̍ḥ | gṛ̱ṇe | sam | yam | ā̱-yanti̍ | dhe̱nava̍ḥ |
sam | arva̍ntaḥ | ra̱ghu̱-druva̍ḥ | sam | su̱-jā̱tāsa̍ḥ | sū̱raya̍ | iṣa̍m | sto̱tṛ-bhya̍ḥ | ā | bha̱ra̱ |
a̱gniḥ | hi | vā̱jina̍m | vi̱śe | dadā̍ti | vi̱śva-ca̍rṣaṇiḥ |
a̱gniḥ | rā̱ye | su̱-ā̱bhuva̍m | saḥ | prī̱taḥ | yā̱ti̱ | vārya̍m | iṣa̍m | sto̱tṛ-bhya̍ḥ | ā | bha̱ra̱ |
ā | te̱ | a̱gne̱ | i̱dhī̱ma̱hi̱ | dyu̱-manta̍m | de̱va̱ | a̱jara̍m |
yat | ha̱ | syā | te̱ | panī̍yasī | sa̱m-it | dī̱daya̍ti | dyavi̍ | iṣa̍m | sto̱tṛ-bhya̍ḥ | ā | bha̱ra̱ |
ā | te̱ | a̱gne̱ | ṛ̱cā | ha̱viḥ | śukra̍sya | śo̱ci̱ṣa̱ḥ | pa̱te̱ |
su-ca̍ndra | dasma̍ | viśpa̍te | havya̍-vāṭ | tubhya̍m | hū̱ya̱te̱ | iṣa̍m | sto̱tṛ-bhya̍ḥ | ā | bha̱ra̱ |
pro iti̍ | tye | a̱gnaya̍ḥ | a̱gniṣu̍ | viśva̍m | pu̱ṣya̱nti̱ | vārya̍m |
te | hi̱nvi̱re̱ | te | i̱nvi̱re̱ | te | i̱ṣa̱ṇya̱nti̱ | ā̱nu̱ṣak | iṣa̍m | sto̱tṛ-bhya̍ḥ | ā | bha̱ra̱ |
tava̍ | tye | a̱gne̱ | a̱rcaya̍ḥ | mahi̍ | vrā̱dha̱nta̱ | vā̱jina̍ḥ |
ye | patva̍-bhiḥ | śa̱phānā̍m | vra̱jā | bhu̱ranta̍ | gonā̍m | iṣa̍m | sto̱tṛ-bhya̍ḥ | ā | bha̱ra̱ |
navā̍ḥ | na̱ḥ | a̱gne̱ | ā | bha̱ra̱ | sto̱tṛ-bhya̍ḥ | su̱-kṣi̱tīḥ | iṣa̍ḥ |
te | syā̱ma̱ | ye | ā̱nṛ̱cuḥ | tvā-dū̍tāsaḥ | dame̍-dame | iṣa̍m | sto̱tṛ-bhya̍ḥ | ā | bha̱ra̱ |
u̱bhe iti̍ | su̱-ca̱ndra̱ | sa̱rpiṣa̍ḥ | darvī̱ iti̍ | śrī̱ṇī̱ṣe̱ | ā̱sani̍ |
u̱to iti̍ | na̱ḥ | ut | pu̱pū̱ryā̱ḥ | u̱ktheṣu̍ | śa̱va̱sa̱ḥ | pa̱te̱ | iṣa̍m | sto̱tṛ-bhya̍ḥ | ā | bha̱ra̱ |
e̱va | a̱gnim | a̱ju̱rya̱mu̱ḥ | gī̱ḥ-bhiḥ | ya̱jñebhi̍ḥ | ā̱nu̱ṣak |
dadha̍t | a̱sme iti̍ | su̱-vīrya̍m | u̱ta | tyat | ā̱śu̱-aśvya̍m | iṣa̍m | sto̱tṛ-bhya̍ḥ | ā | bha̱ra̱ |
sakhā̍yaḥ | sam | va̱ḥ | sa̱myañca̍m | iṣa̍m | stoma̍m | ca̱ | a̱gnaye̍ |
varṣi̍ṣṭhāya | kṣi̱tī̱nām | ū̱rjaḥ | naptre̍ | saha̍svate |
kutra̍ | ci̱t | yasya̍ | sam-ṛ̍tau | ra̱ṇvāḥ | nara̍ḥ | nṛ̱-sada̍ne |
arha̍ntaḥ | ci̱t | yam | i̱ndha̱te | sa̱m-ja̱naya̍nti | ja̱ntava̍ḥ |
sam | yat | i̱ṣaḥ | vanā̍mahe | sam | ha̱vyā | mānu̍ṣāṇām |
u̱ta | dyu̱mnasya̍ | śava̍sā | ṛ̱tasya̍ | ra̱śmim | ā | da̱de̱ |
saḥ | sma̱ | kṛ̱ṇo̱ti̱ | ke̱tum | ā | nakta̍m | ci̱t | dū̱re | ā | sa̱te |
pā̱va̱kaḥ | yat | vana̱spatī̍n | pra | sma̱ | mi̱nāti̍ | a̱jara̍ḥ |
ava̍ | sma̱ | yasya̍ | veṣa̍ṇe | sveda̍m | pa̱thiṣu̍ | juhva̍ti |
a̱bhi | ī̱m | aha̍ | sva-je̍nyam | bhūma̍ | pṛ̱ṣṭhā-i̍va | ru̱ru̱hu̱ḥ |
yam | martya̍ḥ | pu̱ru̱-spṛha̍m | vi̱dat | viśva̍sya | dhāya̍se |
pra | svāda̍nam | pi̱tū̱nām | asta̍-tātim | ci̱t | ā̱yave̍ |
saḥ | hi | sma̱ | dhanva̍ | ā-kṣi̍tam | dātā̍ | na | dāti̍ | ā | pa̱śuḥ |
hiri̍-śmaśruḥ | śuci̍-dan | ṛ̱bhuḥ | ani̍bhṛṣṭa-taviṣiḥ |
śuci̍ḥ | sma̱ | yasmai̍ | a̱tri̱-vat | pra | svadhi̍tiḥ-iva | rīya̍te |
su̱-sūḥ | a̱sū̱ta̱ | mā̱tā | krā̱ṇā | yat | ā̱na̱śe | bhaga̍m |
ā | yaḥ | te̱ | sa̱rpi̱ḥ-ā̱su̱te̱ | agne̍ | śam | asti̍ | dhāya̍se |
ā | e̱ṣu̱ | dyu̱mnam | u̱ta | śrava̍ḥ | ā | ci̱ttam | martye̍ṣu | dhā̱ḥ |
iti̍ | ci̱t | ma̱nyum | a̱dhrija̍ḥ | tvā-dā̍tam | ā | pa̱śum | da̱de̱ |
āt | a̱gne̱ | apṛ̍ṇataḥ | atri̍ḥ | sa̱sa̱hyā̱t | dasyū̍n | i̱ṣaḥ | sa̱sa̱hyā̱t | nṝn |
tvām | a̱gne̱ | ṛ̱ta̱-yava̍ḥ | sam | ī̱dhi̱re̱ | pra̱tnam | pra̱tnāsa̍ḥ | ū̱taye̍ | sa̱ha̱ḥ-kṛ̱ta̱ |
pu̱ru̱-ca̱ndram | ya̱ja̱tam | vi̱śva-dhā̍yasam | damū̍nasam | gṛ̱ha-pa̍tim | vare̍ṇyam |
tvām | a̱gne̱ | ati̍thim | pū̱rvyam | viśa̍ḥ | śo̱ciḥ-ke̍śam | gṛ̱ha-pa̍tim | ni | se̱di̱re̱ |
bṛ̱hat-ke̍tum | pu̱ru̱-rūpa̍m | dha̱na̱-spṛta̍m | su̱-śarmā̍ṇam | su̱-ava̍sam | ja̱ra̱t-viṣa̍m |
tvām | a̱gne̱ | mānu̍ṣīḥ | ī̱ḻa̱te̱ | viśa̍ḥ | ho̱trā̱-vida̍m | vivi̍cim | ra̱tna̱-dhāta̍mam |
guhā̍ | santa̍m | su̱-bha̱ga̱ | vi̱śva-da̍rśatam | tu̱vi̱-sva̱ṇasa̍m | su̱-yaja̍m | ghṛ̱ta̱-śriya̍m |
tvām | a̱gne̱ | dha̱rṇa̱sim | vi̱śvadhā̍ | va̱yam | gī̱ḥ-bhiḥ | gṛ̱ṇanta̍ḥ | nama̍sā | upa̍ | se̱di̱ma̱ |
saḥ | na̱ḥ | ju̱ṣa̱sva̱ | sa̱m-i̱dhā̱naḥ | a̱ṅgi̱ra̱ḥ | de̱vaḥ | marta̍sya | ya̱śasā̍ | su̱dī̱ti-bhi̍ḥ |
tvam | a̱gne̱ | pu̱ru̱-rūpa̍ḥ | vi̱śe-vi̍śe | vaya̍ḥ | da̱dhā̱si̱ | pra̱tna-thā̍ | pu̱ru̱-stu̱ta̱ |
pu̱rūṇi̍ | annā̍ | saha̍sā | vi | rā̱ja̱si̱ | tviṣi̍ḥ | sā | te̱ | ti̱tvi̱ṣā̱ṇasya̍ | na | ā̱-dhṛṣe̍ |
tvām | a̱gne̱ | sa̱m-i̱dhā̱nam | ya̱vi̱ṣṭhya̱ | de̱vāḥ | dū̱tam | ca̱kri̱re̱ | ha̱vya̱-vāha̍nam |
u̱ru̱-jraya̍sam | ghṛ̱ta-yo̍nim | ā-hu̍tam | tve̱ṣam | cakṣu̍ḥ | da̱dhi̱re̱ | co̱da̱yat-ma̍ti |
tvām | a̱gne̱ | pra̱-diva̍ḥ | ā-hu̍tam | ghṛ̱taiḥ | su̱mna̱-yava̍ḥ | su̱-sa̱midhā̍ | sam | ī̱dhi̱re̱ |
saḥ | va̱vṛ̱dhā̱naḥ | oṣa̍dhībhiḥ | u̱kṣi̱taḥ | a̱bhi | jrayā̍ṁsi | pārthi̍vā | vi | ti̱ṣṭha̱se̱ |
tvām | a̱gne̱ | ha̱viṣma̍ntaḥ | de̱vam | martā̍saḥ | ī̱ḻa̱te̱ |
manye̍ | tvā̱ | jā̱ta-ve̍dasam | saḥ | ha̱vyā | va̱kṣi̱ | ā̱nu̱ṣak |
a̱gniḥ | hotā̍ | dāsva̍taḥ | kṣaya̍sya | vṛ̱kta-ba̍rhiṣaḥ |
sam | ya̱jñāsa̍ḥ | cara̍nti | yam | sam | vājā̍saḥ | śra̱va̱syava̍ḥ |
u̱ta | sma̱ | yam | śiśu̍m | ya̱thā̱ | nava̍m | jani̍ṣṭa | a̱raṇī̱ iti̍ |
dha̱rtāra̍m | mānu̍ṣīṇām | vi̱śām | a̱gnim | su̱-a̱dhva̱ram |
u̱ta | sma̱ | du̱ḥ-gṛ̱bhī̱ya̱se̱ | pu̱traḥ | na | hvā̱ryāṇā̍m |
pu̱ru | yaḥ | dagdhā̍ | asi̍ | vanā̍ | agne̍ | pa̱śuḥ | na | yava̍se |
adha̍ | sma̱ | yasya̍ | a̱rcaya̍ḥ | sa̱myak | sa̱m-yanti̍ | dhū̱mina̍ḥ |
yat | ī̱m | aha̍ | tri̱taḥ | di̱vi | upa̍ | dhmātā̍-iva | dhama̍ti | śiśī̍te | dhmā̱tari̍ | ya̱thā̱ |
tava̍ | a̱ham | a̱gne̱ | ū̱ti-bhi̍ḥ | mi̱trasya̍ | ca̱ | praśa̍sti-bhiḥ |
dve̱ṣa̱ḥ-yuta̍ḥ | na | du̱ḥ-i̱tā | tu̱ryāma̍ | martyā̍nām |
tam | na̱ḥ | a̱gne̱ | a̱bhi | nara̍ḥ | ra̱yim | sa̱ha̱sva̱ḥ | ā | bha̱ra̱ |
saḥ | kṣe̱pa̱ya̱t | saḥ | po̱ṣa̱ya̱t | bhuva̍t | vāja̍sya | sā̱taye̍ | u̱ta | e̱dhi̱ | pṛ̱t-su | na̱ḥ | vṛ̱dhe |
agne̍ | oji̍ṣṭham | ā | bha̱ra̱ | dyu̱mnam | a̱smabhya̍m | a̱dhri̱go̱ itya̍dhri-go |
pra | na̱ḥ | rā̱yā | parī̍ṇasā | ratsi̍ | vājā̍ya | panthā̍m |
tvam | na̱ḥ | a̱gne̱ | a̱dbhu̱ta̱ | kratvā̍ | dakṣa̍sya | ma̱ṁhanā̍ |
tve iti̍ | a̱su̱rya̍m | ā | a̱ru̱ha̱t | krā̱ṇā | mi̱traḥ | na | ya̱jñiya̍ḥ |
tvam | na̱ḥ | a̱gne̱ | e̱ṣā̱m | gaya̍m | pu̱ṣṭim | ca̱ | va̱rdha̱ya̱ |
ye | stome̍bhiḥ | pra | sū̱raya̍ḥ | nara̍ḥ | ma̱ghāni̍ | ā̱na̱śuḥ |
ye | a̱gne̱ | ca̱ndra̱ | te̱ | gira̍ḥ | śu̱mbhanti̍ | aśva̍-rādhasaḥ |
śuṣme̍bhiḥ | śu̱ṣmiṇa̍ḥ | nara̍ḥ | di̱vaḥ | ci̱t | yeṣā̍m | bṛ̱hat | su̱-kī̱rtiḥ | bodha̍ti | tmanā̍ |
tava̍ | tye | a̱gne̱ | a̱rcaya̍ḥ | bhrāja̍ntaḥ | ya̱nti̱ | dhṛ̱ṣṇu̱-yā |
pari̍-jmānaḥ | na | vi̱-dyuta̍ḥ | svā̱naḥ | ratha̍ḥ | na | vā̱ja̱-yuḥ |
nu | na̱ḥ | a̱gne̱ | ū̱taye̍ | sa̱-bādha̍saḥ | ca̱ | rā̱taye̍ |
a̱smākā̍saḥ | ca̱ | sū̱raya̍ḥ | viśvā̍ḥ | āśā̍ḥ | ta̱rī̱ṣaṇi̍ |
tvam | na̱ḥ | a̱gne̱ | a̱ṅgi̱ra̱ḥ | stu̱taḥ | stavā̍naḥ | ā | bha̱ra̱ |
hota̍ḥ | vi̱bhva̱-saha̍m | ra̱yim | sto̱tṛ-bhya̍ḥ | stava̍se | ca̱ | na̱ḥ | u̱ta | e̱dhi̱ | pṛ̱t-su | na̱ḥ | vṛ̱dhe |
jana̍sya | go̱pāḥ | a̱ja̱ni̱ṣṭa̱ | jāgṛ̍viḥ | a̱gniḥ | su̱-dakṣa̍ḥ | su̱vi̱tāya̍ | navya̍se |
ghṛ̱ta-pra̍tīkaḥ | bṛ̱ha̱tā | di̱vi̱-spṛśā̍ | dyu̱-mat | vi | bhā̱ti̱ | bha̱ra̱tebhya̍ḥ | śuci̍ḥ |
ya̱jñasya̍ | ke̱tum | pra̱tha̱mam | pu̱raḥ-hi̍tam | a̱gnim | nara̍ḥ | tri̱-sa̱dha̱sthe | sam | ī̱dhi̱re̱ |
indre̍ṇa | de̱vaiḥ | sa̱-ratha̍m | saḥ | ba̱rhiṣi̍ | sīda̍t | ni | hotā̍ | ya̱jathā̍ya | su̱-kratu̍ḥ |
asa̍m-mṛṣṭaḥ | jā̱ya̱se̱ | mā̱troḥ | śuci̍ḥ | ma̱ndraḥ | ka̱viḥ | ut | a̱ti̱ṣṭha̱ḥ | vi̱vasva̍taḥ |
ghṛ̱tena̍ | tvā̱ | a̱va̱rdha̱ya̱n | a̱gne̱ | ā̱-hu̱ta̱ | dhū̱maḥ | te̱ | ke̱tuḥ | a̱bha̱va̱t | di̱vi | śri̱taḥ |
a̱gniḥ | na̱ḥ | ya̱jñam | upa̍ | ve̱tu̱ | sā̱dhu̱-yā | a̱gnim | nara̍ḥ | vi | bha̱ra̱nte̱ | gṛ̱he-gṛ̍he |
a̱gniḥ | dū̱taḥ | a̱bha̱va̱t | ha̱vya̱-vāha̍naḥ | a̱gnim | vṛ̱ṇā̱nāḥ | vṛ̱ṇa̱te̱ | ka̱vi-kra̍tum |
tubhya̍ | i̱dam | a̱gne̱ | madhu̍mat-tamam | vaca̍ḥ | tubhya̍m | ma̱nī̱ṣā | i̱yam | a̱stu̱ | śam | hṛ̱de |
tvām | gira̍ḥ | sindhu̍m-iva | a̱vanī̍ḥ | ma̱hīḥ | ā | pṛ̱ṇa̱nti̱ | śava̍sā | va̱rdhaya̍nti | ca̱ |
tvām | a̱gne̱ | aṅgi̍rasaḥ | guhā̍ | hi̱tam | anu̍ | a̱vi̱nda̱n | śi̱śri̱yā̱ṇam | vane̍-vane |
saḥ | jā̱ya̱se̱ | ma̱thyamā̍naḥ | saha̍ḥ | ma̱hat | tvām | ā̱hu̱ḥ | saha̍saḥ | pu̱tram | a̱ṅgi̱ra̱ḥ |
pra | a̱gnaye̍ | bṛ̱ha̱te | ya̱jñiyā̍ya | ṛ̱tasya̍ | vṛṣṇe̍ | asu̍rāya | manma̍ |
ghṛ̱tam | na | ya̱jñe | ā̱sye̍ | su-pū̍tam | gira̍m | bha̱re̱ | vṛ̱ṣa̱bhāya̍ | pra̱tī̱cīm |
ṛ̱tam | ci̱ki̱tva̱ḥ | ṛ̱tam | it | ci̱ki̱ddhi̱ | ṛ̱tasya̍ | dhārā̍ḥ | anu̍ | tṛ̱ndhi̱ | pū̱rvīḥ |
na | a̱ham | yā̱tum | saha̍sā | na | dva̱yena̍ | ṛ̱tam | sa̱pā̱mi̱ | a̱ru̱ṣasya̍ | vṛṣṇa̍ḥ |
kayā̍ | na̱ḥ | a̱gne̱ | ṛ̱taya̍n | ṛ̱tena̍ | bhuva̍ḥ | nave̍dāḥ | u̱catha̍sya | navya̍ḥ |
veda̍ | me̱ | de̱vaḥ | ṛ̱tu̱-pāḥ | ṛ̱tū̱nām | na | a̱ham | pati̍m | sa̱ni̱tu̱ḥ | a̱sya | rā̱yaḥ |
ke | te̱ | a̱gne̱ | ri̱pave̍ | bandha̍nāsaḥ | ke | pā̱yava̍ḥ | sa̱ni̱ṣa̱nta̱ | dyu̱-manta̍ḥ |
ke | dhā̱sim | a̱gne̱ | anṛ̍tasya | pā̱nti̱ | ke | asa̍taḥ | vaca̍saḥ | sa̱nti̱ | go̱pāḥ |
sakhā̍yaḥ | te̱ | viṣu̍ṇāḥ | a̱gne̱ | e̱te | śi̱vāsa̍ḥ | santa̍ḥ | aśi̍vāḥ | a̱bhū̱va̱n |
adhū̍rṣata | sva̱yam | e̱te | vaca̍ḥ-bhiḥ | ṛ̱ju̱-ya̱te | vṛ̱ji̱nāni̍ | bru̱vanta̍ḥ |
yaḥ | te̱ | a̱gne̱ | nama̍sā | ya̱jñam | īṭṭe̍ | ṛ̱tam | saḥ | pā̱ti̱ | a̱ru̱ṣasya̍ | vṛṣṇa̍ḥ |
tasya̍ | kṣaya̍ḥ | pṛ̱thuḥ | ā | sā̱dhuḥ | e̱tu̱ | pra̱-sarsrā̍ṇasya | nahu̍ṣasya | śeṣa̍ḥ |
arca̍ntaḥ | tvā̱ | ha̱vā̱ma̱he̱ | arca̍ntaḥ | sam | i̱dhī̱ma̱hi̱ |
agne̍ | arca̍ntaḥ | ū̱taye̍ |
a̱gneḥ | stoma̍m | ma̱nā̱ma̱he̱ | si̱dhram | a̱dya | di̱vi̱-spṛśa̍ḥ |
de̱vasya̍ | dra̱vi̱ṇa̱syava̍ḥ |
a̱gniḥ | ju̱ṣa̱ta̱ | na̱ḥ | gira̍ḥ | hotā̍ | yaḥ | mānu̍ṣeṣu | ā |
saḥ | ya̱kṣa̱t | daivya̍m | jana̍m |
tvam | a̱gne̱ | sa̱-prathā̍ḥ | a̱si̱ | juṣṭa̍ḥ | hotā̍ | vare̍ṇyaḥ |
tvayā̍ | ya̱jñam | vi | ta̱nva̱te̱ |
tvām | a̱gne̱ | vā̱ja̱-sāta̍mam | viprā̍ḥ | va̱rdha̱nti̱ | su-stu̍tam |
saḥ | na̱ḥ | rā̱sva̱ | su̱-vīrya̍m |
agne̍ | ne̱miḥ | a̱rān-i̍va | de̱vān | tvam | pa̱ri̱-bhūḥ | a̱si̱ |
ā | rādha̍ḥ | ci̱tram | ṛ̱ñja̱se̱ |
a̱gnim | stome̍na | bo̱dha̱ya̱ | sa̱m-i̱dhā̱naḥ | ama̍rtyam |
ha̱vyā | de̱veṣu̍ | na̱ḥ | da̱dha̱t |
tam | a̱dhva̱reṣu̍ | ī̱ḻa̱te̱ | de̱vam | martā̍ḥ | ama̍rtyam |
yaji̍ṣṭham | mānu̍ṣe | jane̍ |
tam | hi | śaśva̍ntaḥ | īḻa̍te | sru̱cā | de̱vam | ghṛ̱ta̱-ścutā̍ |
a̱gnim | ha̱vyāya̍ | voḻha̍ve |
a̱gniḥ | jā̱taḥ | a̱ro̱ca̱ta̱ | ghnan | dasyū̍n | jyoti̍ṣā | tama̍ḥ |
avi̍ndat | gāḥ | a̱paḥ | sva1̱̍riti̱ sva̍ḥ |
a̱gnim | ī̱ḻenya̍m | ka̱vim | ghṛ̱ta-pṛ̍ṣṭham | sa̱pa̱rya̱ta̱ |
vetu̍ | me̱ | śṛ̱ṇava̍t | hava̍m |
a̱gnim | ghṛ̱tena̍ | va̱vṛ̱dhu̱ḥ | stome̍bhiḥ | vi̱śva-ca̍rṣaṇim |
su̱-ā̱dhībhi̍ḥ | va̱ca̱syu-bhi̍ḥ |
pra | ve̱dhase̍ | ka̱vaye̍ | vedyā̍ya | gira̍m | bha̱re̱ | ya̱śase̍ | pū̱rvyāya̍ |
ghṛ̱ta-pra̍sattaḥ | asu̍raḥ | su̱-śeva̍ḥ | rā̱yaḥ | dha̱rtā | dha̱ruṇa̍ḥ | vasva̍ḥ | a̱gniḥ |
ṛ̱tena̍ | ṛ̱tam | dha̱ruṇa̍m | dhā̱ra̱ya̱nta̱ | ya̱jñasya̍ | śo̱ke | pa̱ra̱me | vi-o̍man |
di̱vaḥ | dharma̍n | dha̱ruṇe̍ | se̱duṣa̍ḥ | nṝn | jā̱taiḥ | ajā̍tān | a̱bhi | ye | na̱na̱kṣuḥ |
a̱ṁha̱ḥ-yuva̍ḥ | ta̱nva̍ḥ | ta̱nva̱te̱ | vi | vaya̍ḥ | ma̱hat | du̱stara̍m | pū̱rvyāya̍ |
saḥ | sa̱m-vata̍ḥ | nava̍-jātaḥ | tu̱tu̱ryā̱t | si̱ṁham | na | kru̱ddham | a̱bhita̍ḥ | pari̍ | sthu̱ḥ |
mā̱tā-i̍va | yat | bhara̍se | pa̱pra̱thā̱naḥ | jana̍m-janam | dhāya̍se | cakṣa̍se | ca̱ |
vaya̍ḥ-vayaḥ | ja̱ra̱se̱ | yat | dadhā̍naḥ | pari̍ | tmanā̍ | viṣu̍-rūpaḥ | ji̱gā̱si̱ |
vāja̍ḥ | nu | te̱ | śava̍saḥ | pā̱tu̱ | anta̍m | u̱rum | dogha̍m | dha̱ruṇa̍m | de̱va̱ | rā̱yaḥ |
pa̱dam | na | tā̱yuḥ | guhā̍ | dadhā̍naḥ | ma̱haḥ | rā̱ye | ci̱taya̍n | atri̍m | a̱spa̱ritya̍spaḥ |
bṛ̱hat | vaya̍ḥ | hi | bhā̱nave̍ | arca̍ | de̱vāya̍ | a̱gnaye̍ |
yam | mi̱tram | na | praśa̍sti-bhiḥ | martā̍saḥ | da̱dhi̱re | pu̱raḥ |
saḥ | hi | dyu-bhi̍ḥ | janā̍nām | hotā̍ | dakṣa̍sya | bā̱hvoḥ |
vi | ha̱vyam | a̱gniḥ | ā̱nu̱ṣak | bhaga̍ḥ | na | vāra̍m | ṛ̱ṇva̱ti̱ |
a̱sya | stome̍ | ma̱ghona̍ḥ | sa̱khye | vṛ̱ddha-śo̍ciṣaḥ |
viśvā̍ | yasmi̍n | tu̱vi̱-svaṇi̍ | sam | a̱rye | śuṣma̍m | ā̱-da̱dhuḥ |
adha̍ | hi | a̱gne̱ | e̱ṣā̱m | su̱-vīrya̍sya | ma̱ṁhanā̍ |
tam | it | ya̱hvam | na | roda̍sī̱ iti̍ | pari̍ | śrava̍ḥ | ba̱bhū̱va̱tu̱ḥ |
nu | na̱ḥ | ā | i̱hi̱ | vārya̍m | agne̍ | gṛ̱ṇā̱naḥ | ā | bha̱ra̱ |
ye | va̱yam | ye | ca̱ | sū̱raya̍ḥ | sva̱sti | dhāma̍he | sacā̍ | u̱ta | e̱dhi̱ | pṛ̱t-su | na̱ḥ | vṛ̱dhe |
ā | ya̱jñaiḥ | de̱va̱ | martya̍ḥ | i̱tthā | tavyā̍ṁsam | ū̱taye̍ |
a̱gnim | kṛ̱te | su̱-a̱dhva̱re | pū̱ruḥ | ī̱ḻī̱ta̱ | ava̍se |
asya̍ | hi | svaya̍śaḥ-taraḥ | ā̱sā | vi̱-dha̱rma̱n | manya̍se |
tam | nāka̍m | ci̱tra-śo̍ciṣam | ma̱ndram | pa̱raḥ | ma̱nī̱ṣayā̍ |
a̱sya | vai | a̱sau | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | a̱rciṣā̍ | yaḥ | ayu̍kta | tu̱jā | gi̱rā |
di̱vaḥ | na | yasya̍ | reta̍sā | bṛ̱hat | śoca̍nti | a̱rcaya̍ḥ |
a̱sya | kratvā̍ | vi-ce̍tasaḥ | da̱smasya̍ | vasu̍ | rathe̍ | ā |
adha̍ | viśvā̍su | havya̍ḥ | a̱gniḥ | vi̱kṣu | pra | śa̱sya̱te̱ |
nu | na̱ḥ | it | hi | vārya̍m | ā̱sā | sa̱ca̱nta̱ | sū̱raya̍ḥ |
ūrja̍ḥ | na̱pā̱t | a̱bhiṣṭa̍ye | pā̱hi | śa̱gdhi | sva̱staye̍ | u̱ta | e̱dhi̱ | pṛ̱t-su | na̱ḥ | vṛ̱dhe |
prā̱taḥ | a̱gniḥ | pu̱ru̱-pri̱yaḥ | vi̱śaḥ | sta̱ve̱ta̱ | ati̍thiḥ |
viśvā̍ni | yaḥ | ama̍rtyaḥ | ha̱vyā | marte̍ṣu | raṇya̍ti |
dvi̱tāya̍ | mṛ̱kta-vā̍hase | svasya̍ | dakṣa̍sya | ma̱ṁhanā̍ |
indu̱m | saḥ | dha̱tte̱ | ā̱nu̱ṣak | sto̱tā | ci̱t | te̱ | a̱ma̱rtya̱ |
tam | va̱ḥ | dī̱rghāyu̍-śociṣam | gi̱rā | hu̱ve̱ | ma̱ghonā̍m |
ari̍ṣṭaḥ | yeṣā̍m | ratha̍ḥ | vi | a̱śva̱-dā̱va̱n | īya̍te |
ci̱trā | vā̱ | yeṣu̍ | dīdhi̍tiḥ | ā̱san | u̱kthā | pānti̍ | ye |
stī̱rṇam | ba̱rhiḥ | sva̍ḥ-nare | śravā̍ṁsi | da̱dhi̱re̱ | pari̍ |
ye | me̱ | pa̱ñcā̱śata̍m | da̱duḥ | aśvā̍nām | sa̱dha-stu̍ti |
dyu̱-mat | a̱gne̱ | mahi̍ | śrava̍ḥ | bṛ̱hat | kṛ̱dhi̱ | ma̱ghonā̍m | nṛ̱-vat | a̱mṛ̱ta̱ | nṛ̱ṇām |
a̱bhi | a̱va̱-sthāḥ | pra | jā̱ya̱nte̱ | pra | va̱vreḥ | va̱vriḥ | ci̱ke̱ta̱ |
u̱pa-sthe̍ | mā̱tuḥ | vi | ca̱ṣṭe̱ |
ju̱hu̱re | vi | ci̱taya̍ntaḥ | ani̍-miṣam | nṛ̱mṇam | pā̱nti̱ |
ā | dṛ̱ḻhām | pura̍m | vi̱vi̱śu̱ḥ |
ā | śvai̱tre̱yasya̍ | ja̱ntava̍ḥ | dyu̱-mat | va̱rdha̱nta̱ | kṛ̱ṣṭaya̍ḥ |
ni̱ṣka-grī̍vaḥ | bṛ̱hat-u̍kthaḥ | e̱nā | madhvā̍ | na | vā̱ja̱-yuḥ |
pri̱yam | du̱gdham | na | kāmya̍m | ajā̍mi | jā̱myoḥ | sacā̍ |
gha̱rmaḥ | na | vāja̍-jaṭharaḥ | ada̍bdhaḥ | śaśva̍taḥ | dabha̍ḥ |
krīḻa̍n | na̱ḥ | ra̱śme̱ | ā | bhu̱va̱ḥ | sam | bhasma̍nā | vā̱yunā̍ | vevi̍dānaḥ |
tāḥ | a̱sya̱ | sa̱n | dhṛ̱ṣaja̍ḥ | na | ti̱gmāḥ | su-sa̍ṁśitāḥ | va̱kṣya̍ḥ | va̱kṣa̱ṇe̱-sthāḥ |
yam | a̱gne̱ | vā̱ja̱-sā̱ta̱ma̱ | tvam | ci̱t | manya̍se | ra̱yim |
tam | na̱ḥ | gī̱ḥ-bhiḥ | śra̱vāyya̍m | de̱va̱-trā | pa̱na̱ya̱ | yuja̍m |
ye | a̱gne̱ | na | ī̱raya̍nti | te̱ | vṛ̱ddhāḥ | u̱grasya̍ | śava̍saḥ |
apa̍ | dveṣa̍ḥ | apa̍ | hvara̍ḥ | a̱nya-vra̍tasya | sa̱ści̱re̱ |
hotā̍ram | tvā̱ | vṛ̱ṇī̱ma̱he̱ | agne̍ | dakṣa̍sya | sādha̍nam |
ya̱jñeṣu̍ | pū̱rvyam | gi̱rā | praya̍svantaḥ | ha̱vā̱ma̱he̱ |
i̱tthā | yathā̍ | te̱ | ū̱taye̍ | saha̍sā-van | di̱ve-di̍ve |
rā̱ye | ṛ̱tāya̍ | su̱kra̱to̱ iti̍ su-krato | gobhi̍ḥ | syā̱ma̱ | sa̱dha̱-māda̍ḥ | vī̱raiḥ | syā̱ma̱ | sa̱dha̱-māda̍ḥ |
ma̱nu̱ṣvat | tvā̱ | ni | dhī̱ma̱hi̱ | ma̱nu̱ṣvat | sam | i̱dhī̱ma̱hi̱ |
agne̍ | ma̱nu̱ṣvat | a̱ṅgi̱ra̱ḥ | de̱vān | de̱va̱-ya̱te | ya̱ja̱ |
tvam | hi | mānu̍ṣe | jane̍ | agne̍ | su-prī̍taḥ | i̱dhyase̍ |
sruca̍ḥ | tvā̱ | ya̱nti̱ | ā̱nu̱ṣak | su-jā̍ta | sarpi̍ḥ-āsute |
tvām | viśve̍ | sa̱-joṣa̍saḥ | de̱vāsa̍ḥ | dū̱tam | a̱kra̱ta̱ |
sa̱pa̱ryanta̍ḥ | tvā̱ | ka̱ve̱ | ya̱jñeṣu̍ | de̱vam | ī̱ḻa̱te̱ |
de̱vam | va̱ḥ | de̱va̱-ya̱jyayā̍ | a̱gnim | ī̱ḻī̱ta̱ | martya̍ḥ |
sam-i̍ddhaḥ | śu̱kra̱ | dī̱di̱hi̱ | ṛ̱tasya̍ | yoni̍m | ā | a̱sa̱da̱ḥ | sa̱sasya̍ | yoni̍m | ā | a̱sa̱da̱ḥ |
pra | vi̱śva̱-sā̱ma̱n | a̱tri̱-vat | arca̍ | pā̱va̱ka-śo̍ciṣe |
yaḥ | a̱dhva̱reṣu̍ | īḍya̍ḥ | hotā̍ | ma̱ndra-ta̍maḥ | vi̱śi |
ni | a̱gnim | jā̱ta-ve̍dasam | dadhā̍ta | de̱vam | ṛ̱tvija̍m |
pra | ya̱jñaḥ | e̱tu̱ | ā̱nu̱ṣak | a̱dya | de̱vavya̍caḥ-tamaḥ |
ci̱ki̱tvit-ma̍nasam | tvā̱ | de̱vam | martā̍saḥ | ū̱taye̍ |
vare̍ṇyasya | te̱ | ava̍saḥ | i̱yā̱nāsa̍ḥ | a̱ma̱nma̱hi̱ |
agne̍ | ci̱ki̱ddhi | a̱sya | na̱ḥ | i̱dam | vaca̍ḥ | sa̱ha̱sya̱ |
tam | tvā̱ | su̱-śi̱pra̱ | da̱m-pa̱te̱ | stomai̍ḥ | va̱rdha̱nti̱ | atra̍yaḥ | gī̱ḥ-bhiḥ | śu̱mbha̱nti̱ | atra̍yaḥ |
agne̍ | saha̍ntam | ā | bha̱ra̱ | dyu̱mnasya̍ | pra̱-sahā̍ | ra̱yim |
viśvā̍ḥ | yaḥ | ca̱rṣa̱ṇīḥ | a̱bhi | ā̱sā | vāje̍ṣu | sa̱saha̍t |
tam | a̱gne̱ | pṛ̱ta̱nā̱-saha̍m | ra̱yim | sa̱ha̱sva̱ḥ | ā | bha̱ra̱ |
tvam | hi | sa̱tyaḥ | adbhu̍taḥ | dā̱tā | vāja̍sya | go-ma̍taḥ |
viśve̍ | hi | tvā̱ | sa̱-joṣa̍saḥ | janā̍saḥ | vṛ̱kta-ba̍rhiṣaḥ |
hotā̍ram | sadma̍-su | pri̱yam | vyanti̍ | vāryā̍ | pu̱ru |
saḥ | hi | sma̱ | vi̱śva-ca̍rṣaṇiḥ | a̱bhi-mā̍ti | saha̍ḥ | da̱dhe |
agne̍ | e̱ṣu | kṣaye̍ṣu | ā | re̱vat | na̱ḥ | śu̱kra̱ | dī̱di̱hi̱ | dyu̱-mat | pā̱va̱ka̱ | dī̱di̱hi̱ |
agne̍ | tvam | na̱ḥ | anta̍maḥ | u̱ta | trā̱tā | śi̱vaḥ | bha̱va̱ | va̱rū̱thya̍ḥ |
vasu̍ḥ | a̱gniḥ | vasu̍-śravāḥ | accha̍ | na̱kṣi̱ | dyu̱mat-ta̍mam | ra̱yim | dā̱ḥ |
saḥ | na̱ḥ | bo̱dhi̱ | śru̱dhi | hava̍m | u̱ru̱ṣya | na̱ḥ | a̱gha̱-ya̱taḥ | sa̱ma̱smā̱t |
tam | tvā̱ | śo̱ci̱ṣṭha̱ | dī̱di̱-va̱ḥ | su̱mnāya̍ | nū̱nam | ī̱ma̱he̱ | sakhi̍-bhyaḥ |
accha̍ | va̱ḥ | a̱gnim | ava̍se | de̱vam | gā̱si̱ | saḥ | na̱ḥ | vasu̍ḥ |
rāsa̍t | pu̱traḥ | ṛ̱ṣū̱ṇām | ṛ̱ta-vā̍ | pa̱rṣa̱ti̱ | dvi̱ṣaḥ |
saḥ | hi | sa̱tyaḥ | yam | pūrve̍ | ci̱t | de̱vāsa̍ḥ | ci̱t | yam | ī̱dhi̱re |
hotā̍ram | ma̱ndra-ji̍hvam | it | su̱dī̱ti-bhi̍ḥ | vi̱bhā-va̍sum |
saḥ | na̱ḥ | dhī̱tī | vari̍ṣṭhayā | śreṣṭha̍yā | ca̱ | su̱-ma̱tyā |
agne̍ | rā̱yaḥ | di̱dī̱hi̱ | na̱ḥ | su̱vṛ̱kti-bhi̍ḥ | va̱re̱ṇya̱ |
a̱gniḥ | de̱veṣu̍ | rā̱ja̱ti̱ | a̱gniḥ | marte̍ṣu | ā̱-vi̱śan |
a̱gniḥ | na̱ḥ | ha̱vya̱-vāha̍naḥ | a̱gnim | dhī̱bhiḥ | sa̱pa̱rya̱ta̱ |
a̱gniḥ | tu̱viśra̍vaḥ-tamam | tu̱vi-bra̍hmāṇam | u̱t-ta̱mam |
a̱tūrta̍m | śra̱va̱yat-pa̍tim | pu̱tram | da̱dā̱ti̱ | dā̱śuṣe̍ |
a̱gniḥ | da̱dā̱ti̱ | sat-pa̍tim | sa̱sāha̍ | yaḥ | yu̱dhā | nṛ-bhi̍ḥ |
a̱gniḥ | atya̍m | ra̱ghu̱-syada̍m | jetā̍ram | apa̍rā-jitam |
yat | vāhi̍ṣṭham | tat | a̱gnaye̍ | bṛ̱hat | a̱rca̱ | vi̱bhā̱va̱so̱ iti̍ vibhā-vaso |
mahi̍ṣī-iva | tvat | ra̱yiḥ | tvat | vājā̍ḥ | ut | ī̱ra̱te̱ |
tava̍ | dyu̱-manta̍ḥ | a̱rcaya̍ḥ | grāvā̍-iva | u̱cya̱te̱ | bṛ̱hat |
u̱to iti̍ | te̱ | ta̱nya̱tuḥ | ya̱thā̱ | svā̱naḥ | a̱rta̱ | tmanā̍ | di̱vaḥ |
e̱va | a̱gnim | va̱su̱-yava̍ḥ | sa̱ha̱sā̱nam | va̱va̱ndi̱ma̱ |
saḥ | na̱ḥ | viśvā̍ḥ | ati̍ | dviṣa̍ḥ | parṣa̍t | nā̱vā-i̍va | su̱-kratu̍ḥ |
agne̍ | pā̱va̱ka̱ | ro̱ciṣā̍ | ma̱ndrayā̍ | de̱va̱ | ji̱hvayā̍ |
ā | de̱vān | va̱kṣi̱ | yakṣi̍ | ca̱ |
tam | tvā̱ | ghṛ̱ta̱sno̱ iti̍ ghṛta-sno | ī̱ma̱he̱ | citra̍bhāno̱ iti̱ citra̍-bhāno | sva̱ḥ-dṛśa̍m |
de̱vān | ā | vī̱taye̍ | va̱ha̱ |
vī̱ti-ho̍tram | tvā̱ | ka̱ve̱ | dyu̱-manta̍m | sam | i̱dhī̱ma̱hi̱ |
agne̍ | bṛ̱hanta̍m | a̱dhva̱re |
agne̍ | viśve̍-bhiḥ | ā | ga̱hi̱ | de̱vebhi̍ḥ | ha̱vya-dā̍taye |
hotā̍ram | tvā̱ | vṛ̱ṇī̱ma̱he̱ |
yaja̍mānāya | su̱nva̱te | ā | a̱gne̱ | su̱-vīrya̍m | va̱ha̱ |
de̱vaiḥ | ā | sa̱tsi̱ | ba̱rhiṣi̍ |
sa̱m-i̱dhā̱naḥ | sa̱ha̱sra̱-ji̱t | agne̍ | dharmā̍ṇi | pu̱ṣya̱si̱ |
de̱vānā̍m | dū̱taḥ | u̱kthya̍ḥ |
ni | a̱gnim | jā̱ta-ve̍dasam | ho̱tra̱-vāha̍m | yavi̍ṣṭhyam |
dadhā̍ta | de̱vam | ṛ̱tvija̍m |
pra | ya̱jñaḥ | e̱tu̱ | ā̱nu̱ṣak | a̱dya | de̱vavya̍caḥ-tamaḥ |
stṛ̱ṇī̱ta | ba̱rhiḥ | ā̱-sade̍ |
ā | i̱dam | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | a̱śvinā̍ | mi̱traḥ | sī̱da̱ntu̱ | varu̍ṇaḥ |
de̱vāsa̍ḥ | sarva̍yā | vi̱śā |
ana̍svantā | sat-pa̍tiḥ | ma̱ma̱he̱ | me̱ | gāvā̍ | ceti̍ṣṭhaḥ | asu̍raḥ | ma̱ghona̍ḥ |
trai̱vṛ̱ṣṇaḥ | a̱gne̱ | da̱śa-bhi̍ḥ | sa̱hasrai̍ḥ | vaiśvā̍nara | tri-a̍ruṇaḥ | ci̱ke̱ta̱ |
yaḥ | me̱ | śa̱tā | ca̱ | vi̱ṁśa̱tim | ca̱ | gonā̍m | harī̱ iti̍ | ca̱ | yu̱ktā | su̱-dhurā̍ | dadā̍ti |
vaiśvā̍nara | su-stu̍taḥ | va̱vṛ̱dhā̱naḥ | agne̍ | yaccha̍ | tri-a̍ruṇāya | śarma̍ |
e̱va | te̱ | a̱gne̱ | su̱-ma̱tim | ca̱kā̱naḥ | navi̍ṣṭhāya | na̱va̱mam | tra̱sada̍syuḥ |
yaḥ | me̱ | gira̍ḥ | tu̱vi̱-jā̱tasya̍ | pū̱rvīḥ | yu̱ktena̍ | a̱bhi | tri-a̍ruṇaḥ | gṛ̱ṇāti̍ |
yaḥ | me̱ | iti̍ | pra̱-voca̍ti | aśva̍-medhāya | sū̱raye̍ |
dada̍t | ṛ̱cā | sa̱nim | ya̱te | dada̍t | me̱dhām | ṛ̱ta̱-ya̱te |
yasya̍ | mā̱ | pa̱ru̱ṣāḥ | śa̱tam | u̱t-ha̱rṣaya̍nti | u̱kṣaṇa̍ḥ |
aśva̍-medhasya | dānā̍ḥ | somā̍ḥ-iva | tri-ā̍śiraḥ |
indrā̍gnī̱ iti̍ | śa̱ta̱-dāvni̍ | aśva̍-medhe | su̱-vīrya̍m |
kṣa̱tram | dhā̱ra̱ya̱ta̱m | bṛ̱hat | di̱vi | sūrya̍m-iva | a̱jara̍m |
sam-i̍ddhaḥ | a̱gniḥ | di̱vi | śo̱ciḥ | a̱śre̱t | pra̱tyaṅ | u̱ṣasa̍m | u̱rvi̱yā | vi | bhā̱ti̱ |
eti̍ | prācī̍ | vi̱śva-vā̍rā | nama̍ḥ-bhiḥ | de̱vān | īḻā̍nā | ha̱viṣā̍ | ghṛ̱tācī̍ |
sa̱m-i̱dhyamā̍naḥ | a̱mṛta̍sya | rā̱ja̱si̱ | ha̱viḥ | kṛ̱ṇvanta̍m | sa̱ca̱se̱ | sva̱staye̍ |
viśva̍m | saḥ | dha̱tte̱ | dravi̍ṇam | yam | inva̍si | ā̱ti̱thyam | a̱gne̱ | ni | ca̱ | dha̱tte̱ | it | pu̱raḥ |
agne̍ | śardha̍ | ma̱ha̱te | saubha̍gāya | tava̍ | dyu̱mnāni̍ | u̱t-ta̱māni̍ | sa̱ntu̱ |
sam | jā̱ḥ-pa̱tyam | su̱-yama̍m | ā | kṛ̱ṇu̱ṣva̱ | śa̱tru̱-ya̱tām | a̱bhi | ti̱ṣṭha̱ | mahā̍ṁsi |
sam-i̍ddhasya | pra-ma̍hasaḥ | a̱gne̱ | vande̍ | tava̍ | śriya̍m |
vṛ̱ṣa̱bhaḥ | dyu̱mna-vā̍n | a̱si̱ | sam | a̱dhva̱reṣu̍ | i̱dhya̱se̱ |
sam-i̍ddhaḥ | a̱gne̱ | ā̱-hu̱ta̱ | de̱vān | ya̱kṣi̱ | su̱-a̱dhva̱ra̱ |
tvam | hi | ha̱vya̱-vāṭ | asi̍ |
ā | ju̱ho̱ta̱ | du̱va̱syata̍ | a̱gnim | pra̱-ya̱ti | a̱dhva̱re |
vṛ̱ṇī̱dhvam | ha̱vya̱-vāha̍nam |
trī | a̱rya̱mā | manu̍ṣaḥ | de̱va-tā̍tā | trī | ro̱ca̱nā | di̱vyā | dhā̱ra̱ya̱nta̱ |
arca̍nti | tvā̱ | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | pū̱ta-da̍kṣāḥ | tvam | e̱ṣā̱m | ṛṣi̍ḥ | i̱ndra̱ | a̱si̱ | dhīra̍ḥ |
anu̍ | yat | ī̱m | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | ma̱nda̱sā̱nam | ārca̍n | indra̍m | pa̱pi̱-vāṁsa̍m | su̱tasya̍ |
ā | a̱da̱tta̱ | vajra̍m | a̱bhi | yat | ahi̍m | han | a̱paḥ | ya̱hvīḥ | a̱sṛ̱ja̱t | sarta̱vai | ū̱m̐ iti̍ |
u̱ta | bra̱hmā̱ṇa̱ḥ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | me̱ | a̱sya | indra̍ḥ | soma̍sya | su-su̍tasya | pe̱yā̱ḥ |
tat | hi | ha̱vyam | manu̍ṣe | gāḥ | avi̍ndat | aha̍n | ahi̍m | pa̱pi̱-vān | indra̍ḥ | a̱sya̱ |
āt | roda̍sī̱ iti̍ | vi̱-ta̱ram | vi | ska̱bhā̱ya̱t | sa̱m-vi̱vyā̱naḥ | ci̱t | bhi̱yase̍ | mṛ̱gam | ka̱riti̍ kaḥ |
jiga̍rtim | indra̍ḥ | a̱pa̱-jargu̍rāṇaḥ | prati̍ | śva̱santa̍m | ava̍ | dā̱na̱vam | ha̱nniti̍ han |
adha̍ | kratvā̍ | ma̱gha̱-va̱n | tubhya̍m | de̱vāḥ | anu̍ | viśve̍ | a̱da̱du̱ḥ | so̱ma̱-peya̍m |
yat | sūrya̍sya | ha̱rita̍ḥ | pata̍ntīḥ | pu̱raḥ | sa̱tīḥ | upa̍rāḥ | eta̍śe | kariti̱ kaḥ |
nava̍ | yat | a̱sya̱ | na̱va̱tim | ca̱ | bho̱gān | sā̱kam | vajre̍ṇa | ma̱gha-vā̍ | vi̱vṛ̱ścat |
arca̍nti | indra̍m | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | sa̱dha-sthe̍ | traistu̍bhena | vaca̍sā | bā̱dha̱ta̱ | dyām |
sakhā̍ | sakhye̍ | a̱pa̱ca̱t | tūya̍m | a̱gniḥ | a̱sya | kratvā̍ | ma̱hi̱ṣā | trī | śa̱tāni̍ |
trī | sā̱kam | indra̍ḥ | manu̍ṣaḥ | sarā̍ṁsi | su̱tam | pi̱ba̱t | vṛ̱tra̱-hatyā̍ya | soma̍m |
trī | yat | śa̱tā | ma̱hi̱ṣāṇā̍m | agha̍ḥ | māḥ | trī | sarā̍ṁsi | ma̱gha-vā̍ | so̱myā | apā̍ḥ |
kā̱ram | na | viśve̍ | a̱hva̱nta̱ | de̱vāḥ | bhara̍m | indrā̍ya | yat | ahi̍m | ja̱ghāna̍ |
u̱śanā̍ | yat | sa̱ha̱syai̍ḥ | ayā̍tam | gṛ̱ham | i̱ndra̱ | jū̱ju̱vā̱nebhi̍ḥ | aśvai̍ḥ |
va̱nvā̱naḥ | atra̍ | sa̱-ratha̍m | ya̱yā̱tha̱ | kutse̍na | de̱vaiḥ | ava̍noḥ | ha̱ | śuṣṇa̍m |
pra | a̱nyat | ca̱kram | a̱vṛ̱ha̱ḥ | sūrya̍sya | kutsā̍ya | a̱nyat | vari̍vaḥ | yāta̍ve | a̱ka̱ritya̍kaḥ |
a̱nāsa̍ḥ | dasyū̍n | a̱mṛ̱ṇa̱ḥ | va̱dhena̍ | ni | du̱ryo̱ṇe | a̱vṛ̱ṇa̱k | mṛ̱dhra-vā̍caḥ |
stomā̍saḥ | tvā̱ | gauri̍-vīteḥ | a̱va̱rdha̱n | ara̍ndhayaḥ | vai̱da̱thi̱nāya̍ | pipru̍m |
ā | tvām | ṛ̱jiśvā̍ | sa̱khyāya̍ | ca̱kre̱ | paca̍n | pa̱ktīḥ | api̍baḥ | soma̍m | a̱sya̱ |
nava̍-gvāsaḥ | su̱ta-so̍māsaḥ | indra̍m | daśa̍-gvāsaḥ | a̱bhi | a̱rca̱nti̱ | a̱rkaiḥ |
gavya̍m | ci̱t | ū̱rvam | a̱pi̱dhāna̍-vantam | tam | ci̱t | nara̍ḥ | śa̱śa̱mā̱nāḥ | apa̍ | vra̱n |
ka̱tho iti̍ | nu | te̱ | pari̍ | ca̱rā̱ṇi̱ | vi̱dvān | vī̱ryā̍ | ma̱gha̱-va̱n | yā | ca̱kartha̍ |
yā | co̱ iti̍ | nu | navyā̍ | kṛ̱ṇava̍ḥ | śa̱vi̱ṣṭha̱ | pra | it | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | tā | te̱ | vi̱dathe̍ṣu | bra̱vā̱ma̱ |
e̱tā | viśvā̍ | ca̱kṛ̱-vān | i̱ndra̱ | bhūri̍ | apa̍ri-itaḥ | ja̱nuṣā̍ | vī̱rye̍ṇa |
yā | ci̱t | nu | va̱jri̱n | kṛ̱ṇava̍ḥ | da̱dhṛ̱ṣvān | na | te̱ | va̱rtā | tavi̍ṣyāḥ | a̱sti̱ | tasyā̍ḥ |
indra̍ | brahma̍ | kri̱yamā̍ṇā | ju̱ṣa̱sva̱ | yā | te̱ | śa̱vi̱ṣṭha̱ | navyā̍ḥ | aka̍rma |
vastrā̍-iva | bha̱drā | su-kṛ̍tā | va̱su̱-yuḥ | ratha̍m | na | dhīra̍ḥ | su̱-apā̍ḥ | a̱ta̱kṣa̱m |
kva̍ | syaḥ | vī̱raḥ | kaḥ | a̱pa̱śya̱t | indra̍m | su̱kha-ra̍tham | īya̍mānam | hari̍-bhyām |
yaḥ | rā̱yā | va̱jrī | su̱ta-so̍mam | i̱cchan | tat | oka̍ḥ | gantā̍ | pu̱ru̱-hū̱taḥ | ū̱tī |
ava̍ | a̱ca̱ca̱kṣa̱m | pa̱dam | a̱sya̱ | sa̱svaḥ | u̱gram | ni̱-dhā̱tuḥ | anu̍ | ā̱ya̱m | i̱cchan |
apṛ̍ccham | a̱nyān | u̱ta | te | me̱ | ā̱hu̱ḥ | indra̍m | nara̍ḥ | bu̱bu̱dhā̱nāḥ | a̱śe̱ma̱ |
pra | nu | va̱yam | su̱te | yā | te̱ | kṛ̱tāni̍ | indra̍ | bravā̍ma | yāni̍ | na̱ḥ | jujo̍ṣaḥ |
veda̍t | avi̍dvān | śṛ̱ṇava̍t | ca̱ | vi̱dvān | vaha̍te | a̱yam | ma̱gha-vā̍ | sarva̍-senaḥ |
sthi̱ram | mana̍ḥ | ca̱kṛ̱ṣe̱ | jā̱taḥ | i̱ndra̱ | veṣi̍ | it | eka̍ḥ | yu̱dhaye̍ | bhūya̍saḥ | ci̱t |
aśmā̍nam | ci̱t | śava̍sā | di̱dyu̱ta̱ḥ | vi | vi̱daḥ | gavā̍m | ū̱rvam | u̱sriyā̍ṇām |
pa̱raḥ | yat | tvam | pa̱ra̱maḥ | ā̱-jani̍ṣṭhāḥ | pa̱rā̱-vati̍ | śrutya̍m | nāma̍ | bibhra̍t |
ata̍ḥ | ci̱t | indrā̍t | a̱bha̱ya̱nta̱ | de̱vāḥ | viśvā̍ḥ | a̱paḥ | a̱ja̱ya̱t | dā̱sa-pa̍tnīḥ |
tubhya̍ | it | e̱te | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | su̱-śevā̍ḥ | arca̍nti | a̱rkam | su̱nvanti̍ | andha̍ḥ |
ahi̍m | o̱hā̱nam | a̱paḥ | ā̱-śayā̍nam | pra | mā̱yābhi̍ḥ | mā̱yina̍m | sa̱kṣa̱t | indra̍ḥ |
vi | su | mṛdha̍ḥ | ja̱nuṣā̍ | dāna̍m | inva̍n | aha̍n | gavā̍ | ma̱gha̱-va̱n | sa̱m-ca̱kā̱naḥ |
atra̍ | dā̱sasya̍ | namu̍ceḥ | śira̍ḥ | yat | ava̍rtayaḥ | mana̍ve | gā̱tum | i̱cchan |
yuja̍m | hi | mām | akṛ̍thāḥ | āt | it | i̱ndra̱ | śira̍ḥ | dā̱sasya̍ | namu̍ceḥ | ma̱thā̱yan |
aśmā̍nam | ci̱t | sva̱rya̍m | varta̍mānam | pra | ca̱kriyā̍-iva | roda̍sī̱ iti̍ | ma̱rut-bhya̍ḥ |
striya̍ḥ | hi | dā̱saḥ | āyu̍dhāni | ca̱kre | kim | mā̱ | ka̱ra̱n | a̱ba̱lāḥ | a̱sya̱ | senā̍ḥ |
a̱ntaḥ | hi | akhya̍t | u̱bhe iti̍ | a̱sya̱ | dhene̱ iti̍ | atha̍ | upa̍ | pra | ai̱t | yu̱dhaye̍ | dasyu̍m | indra̍ḥ |
sam | atra̍ | gāva̍ḥ | a̱bhita̍ḥ | a̱na̱va̱nta̱ | i̱ha-i̍ha | va̱tsaiḥ | vi-yu̍tāḥ | yat | āsa̍n |
sam | tāḥ | indra̍ḥ | a̱sṛ̱ja̱t | a̱sya̱ | śā̱kaiḥ | yat | ī̱m | somā̍saḥ | su-su̍tāḥ | ama̍ndan |
yat | ī̱m | somā̍ḥ | ba̱bhru-dhū̍tāḥ | ama̍ndan | aro̍ravīt | vṛ̱ṣa̱bhaḥ | sada̍neṣu |
pu̱ra̱m-da̱raḥ | pa̱pi̱-vān | indra̍ḥ | a̱sya̱ | puna̍ḥ | gavā̍m | a̱da̱dā̱t | u̱sriyā̍ṇām |
bha̱dram | i̱dam | ru̱śamā̍ḥ | a̱gne̱ | a̱kra̱n | gavā̍m | ca̱tvāri̍ | dada̍taḥ | sa̱hasrā̍ |
ṛ̱ṇa̱m-ca̱yasya̍ | pra-ya̍tā | ma̱ghāni̍ | prati̍ | a̱gra̱bhī̱ṣma̱ | nṛ-ta̍masya | nṛ̱ṇām |
su̱-peśa̍sam | mā̱ | ava̍ | sṛ̱ja̱nti̱ | asta̍m | gavā̍m | sa̱hasrai̍ḥ | ru̱śamā̍saḥ | a̱gne̱ |
tī̱vrāḥ | indra̍m | a̱ma̱ma̱ndu̱ḥ | su̱tāsa̍ḥ | a̱ktoḥ | vi-u̍ṣṭau | pari̍-takmyāyāḥ |
auccha̍t | sā | rātrī̍ | pari̍-takmyā | yā | ṛ̱ṇa̱m-ca̱ye | rāja̍ni | ru̱śamā̍nām |
atya̍ḥ | na | vā̱jī | ra̱ghuḥ | a̱jyamā̍naḥ | ba̱bhruḥ | ca̱tvāri̍ | a̱sa̱na̱t | sa̱hasrā̍ |
catu̍ḥ-sahasram | gavya̍sya | pa̱śvaḥ | prati̍ | a̱gra̱bhī̱ṣma̱ | ru̱śame̍ṣu | a̱gne̱ |
gha̱rmaḥ | ci̱t | ta̱ptaḥ | pra̱-vṛje̍ | yaḥ | āsī̍t | a̱ya̱smaya̍ḥ | tam | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | ādā̍ma | viprā̍ḥ |
indra̍ḥ | rathā̍ya | pra̱-vata̍m | kṛ̱ṇo̱ti̱ | yam | a̱dhi̱-asthā̍t | ma̱gha-vā̍ | vā̱ja̱-yanta̍m |
yū̱thā-i̍va | pa̱śvaḥ | vi | u̱no̱ti̱ | go̱pāḥ | ari̍ṣṭaḥ | yā̱ti̱ | pra̱tha̱maḥ | sisā̍san |
ā | pra | dra̱va̱ | ha̱ri̱-va̱ḥ | mā | vi | ve̱na̱ḥ | piśa̍ṅga-rāte | a̱bhi | na̱ḥ | sa̱ca̱sva̱ |
na̱hi | tvat | i̱ndra̱ | vasya̍ḥ | a̱nyat | asti̍ | a̱me̱nān | ci̱t | jani̍-vataḥ | ca̱ka̱rtha̱ |
ut | yat | saha̍ḥ | saha̍saḥ | ā | aja̍niṣṭa | dedi̍ṣṭe | indra̍ḥ | i̱ndri̱yāṇi̍ | viśvā̍ |
pra | a̱co̱da̱ya̱t | su̱-dughā̍ḥ | va̱vre | a̱ntaḥ | vi | jyoti̍ṣā | sa̱m-va̱vṛ̱tvat | tama̍ḥ | a̱va̱ritya̍vaḥ |
ana̍vaḥ | te̱ | ratha̍m | aśvā̍ya | ta̱kṣa̱n | tvaṣṭā̍ | vajra̍m | pu̱ru̱-hū̱ta̱ | dyu̱-manta̍m |
bra̱hmāṇa̍ḥ | indra̍m | ma̱haya̍ntaḥ | a̱rkaiḥ | ava̍rdhayan | aha̍ye | hanta̱vai | ū̱m̐ iti̍ |
vṛṣṇe̍ | yat | te̱ | vṛṣa̍ṇaḥ | a̱rkam | arcā̍n | indra̍ | grāvā̍ṇaḥ | adi̍tiḥ | sa̱-joṣā̍ḥ |
a̱na̱śvāsa̍ḥ | ye | pa̱vaya̍ḥ | a̱ra̱thāḥ | indra̍-iṣitāḥ | a̱bhi | ava̍rtanta | dasyū̍n |
pra | te̱ | pūrvā̍ṇi | kara̍ṇāni | vo̱ca̱m | pra | nūta̍nā | ma̱gha̱-va̱n | yā | ca̱kartha̍ |
śakti̍-vaḥ | yat | vi̱-bharā̍ḥ | roda̍sī̱ iti̍ | u̱bhe iti̍ | jaya̍n | a̱paḥ | mana̍ve | dānu̍-citrāḥ |
tat | it | nu | te̱ | kara̍ṇam | da̱sma̱ | vi̱pra̱ | ahi̍m | yat | ghnan | oja̍ḥ | atra̍ | ami̍mīthāḥ |
śuṣṇa̍sya | ci̱t | pari̍ | mā̱yāḥ | a̱gṛ̱bhṇā̱ḥ | pra̱-pi̱tvam | yan | apa̍ | dasyū̍n | a̱se̱dha̱ḥ |
tvam | a̱paḥ | yada̍ve | tu̱rvaśā̍ya | ara̍mayaḥ | su̱-dughā̍ḥ | pā̱raḥ | i̱ndra̱ |
u̱gram | a̱yā̱ta̱m | ava̍haḥ | ha̱ | kutsa̍m | sam | ha̱ | yat | vā̱m | u̱śanā̍ | ara̍nta | de̱vāḥ |
indrā̍kutsā | vaha̍mānā | rathe̍na | ā | vā̱m | atyā̍ḥ | api̍ | karṇe̍ | va̱ha̱ntu̱ |
niḥ | sī̱m | a̱t-bhyaḥ | dhama̍thaḥ | niḥ | sa̱dha-sthā̍t | ma̱ghona̍ḥ | hṛ̱daḥ | va̱ra̱tha̱ḥ | tamā̍ṁsi |
vāta̍sya | yu̱ktān | su̱-yuja̍ḥ | ci̱t | aśvā̍n | ka̱viḥ | ci̱t | e̱ṣaḥ | a̱ja̱ga̱n | a̱va̱syuḥ |
viśve̍ | te̱ | atra̍ | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | sakhā̍yaḥ | indra̍ | brahmā̍ṇi | tavi̍ṣīm | a̱va̱rdha̱n |
sūra̍ḥ | ci̱t | ratha̍m | pari̍-takmyāyām | pūrva̍m | ka̱ra̱t | upa̍ram | jū̱ju̱-vāṁsa̍m |
bhara̍t | ca̱kram | eta̍śaḥ | sam | ri̱ṇā̱ti̱ | pu̱raḥ | dadha̍t | sa̱ni̱ṣya̱ti̱ | kratu̍m | na̱ḥ |
ā | a̱yam | ja̱nā̱ḥ | a̱bhi̱-cakṣe̍ | ja̱gā̱ma̱ | indra̍ḥ | sakhā̍yam | su̱ta-so̍mam | i̱cchan |
vada̍n | grāvā̍ | ava̍ | vedi̍m | bhri̱yā̱te̱ | yasya̍ | jī̱ram | a̱dhva̱ryava̍ḥ | cara̍nti |
ye | cā̱kana̍nta | cā̱kana̍nta | nu | te | martā̍ḥ | a̱mṛ̱ta̱ | mo iti̍ | te | aṁha̍ḥ | ā | a̱ra̱n |
va̱va̱ndhi | yajyū̍n | u̱ta | teṣu̍ | dhe̱hi̱ | oja̍ḥ | jane̍ṣu | yeṣu̍ | te̱ | syāma̍ |
ada̍rdaḥ | utsa̍m | asṛ̍jaḥ | vi | khāni̍ | tvam | a̱rṇa̱vān | ba̱dba̱dhā̱nān | ara̍mṇāḥ |
ma̱hānta̍m | i̱ndra̱ | parva̍tam | vi | yat | variti̱ vaḥ | sṛ̱jaḥ | vi | dhārā̍ḥ | ava̍ | dā̱na̱vam | ha̱nniti̍ han |
tvam | utsā̍n | ṛ̱tu-bhi̍ḥ | ba̱dba̱dhā̱nān | ara̍ṁhaḥ | ūdha̍ḥ | parva̍tasya | va̱jri̱n |
ahi̍m | ci̱t | u̱gra̱ | pra-yu̍tam | śayā̍nam | ja̱gha̱nvān | i̱ndra̱ | tavi̍ṣīm | a̱dha̱tthā̱ḥ |
tyasya̍ | ci̱t | ma̱ha̱taḥ | niḥ | mṛ̱gasya̍ | vadha̍ḥ | ja̱ghā̱na̱ | tavi̍ṣībhiḥ | indra̍ḥ |
yaḥ | eka̍ḥ | it | a̱pra̱tiḥ | manya̍mānaḥ | āt | a̱smā̱t | a̱nyaḥ | a̱ja̱ni̱ṣṭa̱ | tavyā̍n |
tyam | ci̱t | e̱ṣā̱m | sva̱dhayā̍ | mada̍ntam | mi̱haḥ | napā̍tam | su̱-vṛdha̍m | ta̱ma̱ḥ-gām |
vṛṣa̍-prabharmā | dā̱na̱vasya̍ | bhāma̍m | vajre̍ṇa | va̱jrī | ni | ja̱ghā̱na̱ | śuṣṇa̍m |
tyam | ci̱t | a̱sya̱ | kratu̍-bhiḥ | ni-sa̍ttam | a̱ma̱rmaṇa̍ḥ | vi̱dat | it | a̱sya̱ | marma̍ |
yat | ī̱m | su̱-kṣa̱tra̱ | pra-bhṛ̍tā | mada̍sya | yuyu̍tsantam | tama̍si | ha̱rmye | dhāḥ |
tyam | ci̱t | i̱tthā | ka̱tpa̱yam | śayā̍nam | a̱sū̱rye | tama̍si | va̱vṛ̱dhā̱nam |
tam | ci̱t | ma̱ndā̱naḥ | vṛ̱ṣa̱bhaḥ | su̱tasya̍ | u̱ccaiḥ | indra̍ḥ | a̱pa̱-gūrya̍ | ja̱ghā̱na̱ |
ut | yat | indra̍ḥ | ma̱ha̱te | dā̱na̱vāya̍ | vadha̍ḥ | yami̍ṣṭa | saha̍ḥ | apra̍ti-itam |
yat | ī̱m | vajra̍sya | pra-bhṛ̍tau | da̱dābha̍ | viśva̍sya | ja̱ntoḥ | a̱dha̱mam | ca̱kā̱ra̱ |
tyam | ci̱t | arṇa̍m | ma̱dhu̱-pam | śayā̍nam | a̱si̱nvam | va̱vram | mahi̍ | āda̍t | u̱graḥ |
a̱pāda̍m | a̱tram | ma̱ha̱tā | va̱dhena̍ | ni | du̱ryo̱ṇe | a̱vṛ̱ṇa̱k | mṛ̱dhra-vā̍cam |
kaḥ | a̱sya̱ | śuṣma̍m | tavi̍ṣīm | va̱rā̱te̱ | eka̍ḥ | dhanā̍ | bha̱ra̱te̱ | apra̍ti-itaḥ |
i̱me iti̍ | ci̱t | a̱sya̱ | jraya̍saḥ | nu | de̱vī iti̍ | indra̍sya | oja̍saḥ | bhi̱yasā̍ | ji̱hā̱te̱ iti̍ |
ni | a̱smai̱ | de̱vī | sva-dhi̍tiḥ | ji̱hī̱te̱ | indrā̍ya | gā̱tuḥ | u̱śa̱tī-i̍va | ye̱me̱ |
sam | yat | oja̍ḥ | yu̱vate̍ | viśva̍m | ā̱bhi̱ḥ | anu̍ | sva̱dhā-vne̍ | kṣi̱taya̍ḥ | na̱ma̱nta̱ |
eka̱m | nu | tvā̱ | sat-pa̍tim | pāñca̍-janyam | jā̱tam | śṛ̱ṇo̱mi̱ | ya̱śasa̍m | jane̍ṣu |
tam | me̱ | ja̱gṛ̱bhre̱ | ā̱-śasa̍ḥ | navi̍ṣṭham | do̱ṣā | vasto̍ḥ | hava̍mānāsaḥ | indra̍m |
e̱va | hi | tvām | ṛ̱tu̱-thā | yā̱taya̍ntam | ma̱ghā | vipre̍bhyaḥ | dada̍tam | śṛ̱ṇomi̍ |
kim | te̱ | bra̱hmāṇa̍ḥ | gṛ̱ha̱te̱ | sakhā̍yaḥ | ye | tvā̱-yā | ni̱-da̱dhuḥ | kāma̍m | i̱ndra̱ |
mahi̍ | ma̱he | ta̱vase̍ | dī̱dhye̱ | nṝn | indrā̍ya | i̱tthā | ta̱vase̍ | ata̍vyān |
yaḥ | a̱smai̱ | su̱-ma̱tim | vāja̍-sātau | stu̱taḥ | jane̍ | sa̱-ma̱rya̍ḥ | ci̱keta̍ |
saḥ | tvam | na̱ḥ | i̱ndra̱ | dhi̱ya̱sā̱naḥ | a̱rkaiḥ | harī̍ṇām | vṛ̱ṣa̱n | yoktra̍m | a̱śre̱ḥ |
yāḥ | i̱tthā | ma̱gha̱-va̱n | anu̍ | joṣa̍m | vakṣa̍ḥ | a̱bhi | pra | a̱ryaḥ | sa̱kṣi̱ | janā̍n |
na | te | te̱ | i̱ndra̱ | a̱bhi | a̱smat | ṛ̱ṣva̱ | ayu̍ktāsaḥ | a̱bra̱hmatā̍ | yat | asa̍n |
tiṣṭha̍ | ratha̍m | adhi̍ | tam | va̱jra̱-ha̱sta̱ | ā | ra̱śmim | de̱va̱ | ya̱ma̱se̱ | su̱-aśva̍ḥ |
pu̱ru | yat | te̱ | i̱ndra̱ | santi̍ | u̱kthā | gave̍ | ca̱kartha̍ | u̱rvarā̍su | yudhya̍n |
ta̱ta̱kṣe | sūryā̍ya | ci̱t | oka̍si | sve | vṛṣā̍ | sa̱mat-su̍ | dā̱sasya̍ | nāma̍ | ci̱t |
va̱yam | te | te̱ | i̱ndra̱ | ye | ca̱ | nara̍ḥ | śardha̍ḥ | ja̱jñā̱nāḥ | yā̱tāḥ | ca̱ | rathā̍ḥ |
ā | a̱smān | ja̱ga̱myā̱t | a̱hi̱-śu̱ṣma̱ | satvā̍ | bhaga̍ḥ | na | havya̍ḥ | pra̱-bhṛ̱theṣu̍ | cāru̍ḥ |
pa̱pṛ̱kṣeṇya̍m | i̱ndra̱ | tve iti̍ | hi | oja̍ḥ | nṛ̱mṇāni̍ | ca̱ | nṛ̱tamā̍naḥ | ama̍rtaḥ |
saḥ | na̱ḥ | enī̍m | va̱sa̱vā̱na̱ḥ | ra̱yim | dā̱ḥ | pra | a̱ryaḥ | stu̱ṣe̱ | tu̱vi̱-ma̱ghasya̍ | dāna̍m |
e̱va | na̱ḥ | i̱ndra̱ | ū̱ti-bhi̍ḥ | a̱va̱ | pā̱hi | gṛ̱ṇa̱taḥ | śū̱ra̱ | kā̱rūn |
u̱ta | tvaca̍m | dada̍taḥ | vāja̍-sātau | pi̱prī̱hi | madhva̍ḥ | su-su̍tasya | cāro̍ḥ |
u̱ta | tye | mā̱ | pau̱ru̱-ku̱tsyasya̍ | sū̱reḥ | tra̱sada̍syoḥ | hi̱ra̱ṇina̍ḥ | rarā̍ṇāḥ |
vaha̍ntu | mā̱ | daśa̍ | śyetā̍saḥ | a̱sya̱ | gai̱ri̱-kṣi̱tasya̍ | kratu̍-bhiḥ | nu | sa̱śce̱ |
u̱ta | tye | mā̱ | mā̱ru̱ta-a̍śvasya | śoṇā̍ḥ | kratvā̍-maghāsaḥ | vi̱datha̍sya | rā̱tau |
sa̱hasrā̍ | me̱ | cyava̍tānaḥ | dadā̍naḥ | ā̱nū̱kam | a̱ryaḥ | vapu̍ṣe | na | ā̱rca̱t |
u̱ta | tye | mā̱ | dhva̱nya̍sya | juṣṭā̍ḥ | la̱kṣma̱ṇya̍sya | su̱-ruca̍ḥ | yatā̍nāḥ |
ma̱hnā | rā̱yaḥ | sa̱m-vara̍ṇasya | ṛṣe̍ḥ | vra̱jam | na | gāva̍ḥ | pra-ya̍tāḥ | api̍ | gma̱n |
ajā̍ta-śatrum | a̱jarā̍ | sva̍ḥ-vatī | anu̍ | sva̱dhā | ami̍tā | da̱smam | ī̱ya̱te̱ |
su̱nota̍na | paca̍ta | brahma̍-vāhase | pu̱ru̱-stu̱tāya̍ | pra̱-ta̱ram | da̱dhā̱ta̱na̱ |
ā | yaḥ | some̍na | ja̱ṭhara̍m | api̍prata | ama̍ndata | ma̱gha-vā̍ | madhva̍ḥ | andha̍saḥ |
yat | ī̱m | mṛ̱gāya̍ | hanta̍ve | ma̱hā-va̍dhaḥ | sa̱hasra̍-bhṛṣṭim | u̱śanā̍ | va̱dham | yama̍t |
yaḥ | a̱smai̱ | ghra̱ṁse | u̱ta | vā̱ | yaḥ | ūdha̍ni | soma̍m | su̱noti̍ | bhava̍ti | dyu̱-mān | aha̍ |
apa̍-apa | śa̱kraḥ | ta̱ta̱nuṣṭi̍m | ū̱ha̱ti̱ | ta̱nū-śu̍bhram | ma̱gha-vā̍ | yaḥ | ka̱va̱-sa̱khaḥ |
yasya̍ | ava̍dhīt | pi̱tara̍m | yasya̍ | mā̱tara̍m | yasya̍ | śa̱kraḥ | bhrāta̍ram | na | ata̍ḥ | ī̱ṣa̱te̱ |
veti̍ | it | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | a̱sya̱ | pra-ya̍tā | ya̱ta̱m-ka̱raḥ | na | kilbi̍ṣāt | ī̱ṣa̱te̱ | vasva̍ḥ | ā̱-ka̱raḥ |
na | pa̱ñca-bhi̍ḥ | da̱śa-bhi̍ḥ | va̱ṣṭi̱ | ā̱-rabha̍m | na | asu̍nvatā | sa̱ca̱te̱ | puṣya̍tā | ca̱na |
ji̱nāti̍ | vā̱ | it | a̱mu̱yā | hanti̍ | vā̱ | dhuni̍ḥ | ā | de̱va̱-yum | bha̱ja̱ti̱ | go-ma̍ti | vra̱je |
vi̱-tvakṣa̍ṇaḥ | sam-ṛ̍tau | ca̱kra̱m-ā̱sa̱jaḥ | asu̍nvataḥ | viṣu̍ṇaḥ | su̱nva̱taḥ | vṛ̱dhaḥ |
indra̍ḥ | viśva̍sya | da̱mi̱tā | vi̱-bhīṣa̍ṇaḥ | ya̱thā̱-va̱śam | na̱ya̱ti̱ | dāsa̍m | ārya̍ḥ |
sam | ī̱m | pa̱ṇeḥ | a̱ja̱ti̱ | bhoja̍nam | mu̱ṣe | vi | dā̱śuṣe̍ | bha̱ja̱ti̱ | sū̱nara̍m | vasu̍ |
du̱ḥ-ge | ca̱na | dhri̱ya̱te̱ | viśva̍ḥ | ā | pu̱ru | jana̍ḥ | yaḥ | a̱sya̱ | tavi̍ṣīm | acu̍krudhat |
sam | yat | janau̍ | su̱-dhanau̍ | vi̱śva-śa̍rdhasau | ave̍t | indra̍ḥ | ma̱gha-vā̍ | goṣu̍ | śu̱bhriṣu̍ |
yuja̍m | hi | a̱nyam | akṛ̍ta | pra̱-ve̱pa̱nī | ut | ī̱m | gavya̍m | sṛ̱ja̱te̱ | satva̍-bhiḥ | dhuni̍ḥ |
sa̱ha̱sra̱-sām | āgni̍-veśim | gṛ̱ṇī̱ṣe̱ | śatri̍m | a̱gne̱ | u̱pa̱-mām | ke̱tum | a̱ryaḥ |
tasmai̍ | āpa̍ḥ | sa̱m-yata̍ḥ | pī̱pa̱ya̱nta̱ | tasmi̍n | kṣa̱tram | ama̍-vat | tve̱ṣam | a̱stu̱ |
yaḥ | te̱ | sādhi̍ṣṭhaḥ | ava̍se | indra̍ | kratu̍ḥ | tam | ā | bha̱ra̱ |
a̱smabhya̍m | ca̱rṣa̱ṇi̱-saha̍m | sasni̍m | vāje̍ṣu | du̱stara̍m |
yat | i̱ndra̱ | te̱ | cata̍sraḥ | yat | śū̱ra̱ | santi̍ | ti̱sraḥ |
yat | vā̱ | pañca̍ | kṣi̱tī̱nām | ava̍ḥ | tat | su | na̱ḥ | ā | bha̱ra̱ |
ā | te̱ | ava̍ḥ | vare̍ṇyam | vṛṣa̍n-tamasya | hū̱ma̱he̱ |
vṛṣa̍-jūtiḥ | hi | ja̱jñi̱ṣe | ā̱-bhūbhi̍ḥ | i̱ndra̱ | tu̱rvaṇi̍ḥ |
vṛṣā̍ | hi | asi̍ | rādha̍se | ja̱jñi̱ṣe | vṛṣṇi̍ | te̱ | śava̍ḥ |
sva-kṣa̍tram | te̱ | dhṛ̱ṣat | mana̍ḥ | sa̱trā̱-ham | i̱ndra̱ | pauṁsya̍m |
tvam | tam | i̱ndra̱ | martya̍m | a̱mi̱tra̱-yanta̍m | a̱dri̱-va̱ḥ |
sa̱rva̱-ra̱thā | śa̱ta̱kra̱to̱ iti̍ śata-krato | ni | yā̱hi̱ | śa̱va̱sa̱ḥ | pa̱te̱ |
tvām | it | vṛ̱tra̱ha̱n-ta̱ma̱ | janā̍saḥ | vṛ̱kta-ba̍rhiṣaḥ |
u̱gram | pū̱rvīṣu̍ | pū̱rvyam | hava̍nte | vāja̍-sātaye |
a̱smāka̍m | i̱ndra̱ | du̱stara̍m | pu̱ra̱ḥ-yāvā̍nam | ā̱jiṣu̍ |
sa̱-yāvā̍nam | dhane̍-dhane | vā̱ja̱-yanta̍m | a̱va̱ | ratha̍m |
a̱smāka̍m | i̱ndra̱ | ā | i̱hi̱ | na̱ḥ | ratha̍m | a̱va̱ | pura̍m-dhyā |
va̱yam | śa̱vi̱ṣṭha̱ | vārya̍m | di̱vi | śrava̍ḥ | da̱dhī̱ma̱hi̱ | di̱vi | stoma̍m | ma̱nā̱ma̱he̱ |
saḥ | ā | ga̱ma̱t | indra̍ḥ | yaḥ | vasū̍nām | cike̍tat | dātu̍m | dāma̍naḥ | ra̱yī̱ṇām |
dha̱nva̱-ca̱raḥ | na | vaṁsa̍gaḥ | tṛ̱ṣā̱ṇaḥ | ca̱ka̱mā̱naḥ | pi̱ba̱tu̱ | du̱gdham | a̱ṁśum |
ā | te̱ | hanū̱ iti̍ | ha̱ri̱-va̱ḥ | śū̱ra̱ | śipre̱ iti̍ | ruha̍t | soma̍ḥ | na | parva̍tasya | pṛ̱ṣṭhe |
anu̍ | tvā̱ | rā̱ja̱n | arva̍taḥ | na | hi̱nvan | gī̱ḥ-bhiḥ | ma̱de̱ma̱ | pu̱ru̱-hū̱ta̱ | viśve̍ |
ca̱kram | na | vṛ̱ttam | pu̱ru̱-hū̱ta̱ | ve̱pa̱te̱ | mana̍ḥ | bhi̱yā | me̱ | ama̍teḥ | it | a̱dri̱-va̱ḥ |
rathā̍t | adhi̍ | tvā̱ | ja̱ri̱tā | sa̱dā̱-vṛ̱dha̱ | ku̱vit | nu | sto̱ṣa̱t | ma̱gha̱-va̱n | pu̱ru̱-vasu̍ḥ |
e̱ṣaḥ | grāvā̍-iva | ja̱ri̱tā | te̱ | i̱ndra̱ | iya̍rti | vāca̍m | bṛ̱hat | ā̱śu̱ṣā̱ṇaḥ |
pra | sa̱vyena̍ | ma̱gha̱-va̱n | yaṁsi̍ | rā̱yaḥ | pra | da̱kṣi̱ṇit | ha̱ri̱-va̱ḥ | mā | vi | ve̱na̱ḥ |
vṛṣā̍ | tvā̱ | vṛṣa̍ṇam | va̱rdha̱tu̱ | dyauḥ | vṛṣā̍ | vṛṣa̍-bhyām | va̱ha̱se̱ | hari̍-bhyām |
saḥ | na̱ḥ | vṛṣā̍ | vṛṣa̍-rathaḥ | su̱-śi̱pra̱ | vṛṣa̍krato̱ iti̱ vṛṣa̍-krato | vṛṣā̍ | vajri̱n | bhare̍ | dhā̱ḥ |
yaḥ | rohi̍tau | vā̱jinau̍ | vā̱jinī̍-vān | tri̱-bhiḥ | śa̱taiḥ | saca̍mānau | adi̍ṣṭa |
yūne̍ | sam | a̱smai̱ | kṣi̱taya̍ḥ | na̱ma̱ntā̱m | śru̱ta-ra̍thāya | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | du̱va̱ḥ-yā |
sam | bhā̱nunā̍ | ya̱ta̱te̱ | sūrya̍sya | ā̱-juhvā̍naḥ | ghṛ̱ta-pṛ̍ṣṭhaḥ | su̱-añcā̍ḥ |
tasmai̍ | amṛ̍dhrāḥ | u̱ṣasa̍ḥ | vi | u̱cchā̱n | yaḥ | indrā̍ya | su̱navā̍ma | iti̍ | āha̍ |
sami̍ddha-agniḥ | va̱na̱va̱t | stī̱rṇa-ba̍rhiḥ | yu̱kta-grā̍vā | su̱ta-so̍maḥ | ja̱rā̱te̱ |
grāvā̍ṇaḥ | yasya̍ | i̱ṣi̱ram | vada̍nti | aya̍t | a̱dhva̱ryuḥ | ha̱viṣā̍ | ava̍ | sindhu̍m |
va̱dhūḥ | i̱yam | pati̍m | i̱cchantī̍ | e̱ti̱ | yaḥ | ī̱m | vahā̍te | mahi̍ṣīm | i̱ṣi̱rām |
ā | a̱sya̱ | śra̱va̱syā̱t | ratha̍ḥ | ā | ca̱ | gho̱ṣā̱t | pu̱ru | sa̱hasrā̍ | pari̍ | va̱rta̱yā̱te̱ |
na | saḥ | rājā̍ | vya̱tha̱te̱ | yasmi̍n | indra̍ḥ | tī̱vram | soma̍m | piba̍ti | go-sa̍khāyam |
ā | sa̱tva̱naiḥ | aja̍ti | hanti̍ | vṛ̱tram | kṣeti̍ | kṣi̱tīḥ | su̱-bhaga̍ḥ | nāma̍ | puṣya̍n |
puṣyā̍t | kṣeme̍ | a̱bhi | yoge̍ | bha̱vā̱ti̱ | u̱bhe iti̍ | vṛtau̍ | sa̱ṁya̱tī iti̍ sa̱m-ya̱tī | sam | ja̱yā̱ti̱ |
pri̱yaḥ | sūrye̍ | pri̱yaḥ | a̱gnā | bha̱vā̱ti̱ | yaḥ | indrā̍ya | su̱ta-so̍maḥ | dadā̍śat |
u̱roḥ | te̱ | i̱ndra̱ | rādha̍saḥ | vi̱-bhvī | rā̱tiḥ | śa̱ta̱kra̱to̱ iti̍ śata-krato |
adha̍ | na̱ḥ | vi̱śva̱-ca̱rṣa̱ṇe̱ | dyu̱mnā | su̱-kṣa̱tra̱ | ma̱ṁha̱ya̱ |
yat | ī̱m | i̱ndra̱ | śra̱vāyya̍m | iṣa̍m | śa̱vi̱ṣṭha̱ | da̱dhi̱ṣe |
pa̱pra̱the | dī̱rgha̱śrut-ta̍mam | hira̍ṇya-varṇa | du̱stara̍m |
śuṣmā̍saḥ | ye | te̱ | a̱dri̱-va̱ḥ | me̱hanā̍ | ke̱ta̱-sāpa̍ḥ |
u̱bhā | de̱vau | a̱bhiṣṭa̍ye | di̱vaḥ | ca̱ | gmaḥ | ca̱ | rā̱ja̱tha̱ḥ |
u̱to iti̍ | na̱ḥ | a̱sya | kasya̍ | ci̱t | dakṣa̍sya | tava̍ | vṛ̱tra̱-ha̱n |
a̱smabhya̍m | nṛ̱mṇam | ā | bha̱ra̱ | a̱smabhya̍m | nṛ̱-ma̱na̱sya̱se̱ |
nu | te̱ | ā̱bhiḥ | a̱bhiṣṭi̍-bhiḥ | tava̍ | śarma̍n | śa̱ta̱kra̱to̱ iti̍ śata-krato |
indra̍ | syāma̍ | su̱-go̱pāḥ | śūra̍ | syāma̍ | su̱-go̱pāḥ |
yat | i̱ndra̱ | ci̱tra̱ | me̱hanā̍ | asti̍ | tvā-dā̍tam | a̱dri̱-va̱ḥ |
rādha̍ḥ | tat | na̱ḥ | vi̱da̱dva̱so̱ iti̍ vidat-vaso | u̱bha̱yā̱ha̱sti | ā | bha̱ra̱ |
yat | manya̍se | vare̍ṇyam | indra̍ | dyu̱kṣam | tat | ā | bha̱ra̱ |
vi̱dyāma̍ | tasya̍ | te̱ | va̱yam | akū̍pārasya | dā̱vane̍ |
yat | te̱ | di̱tsu | pra̱-rādhya̍m | mana̍ḥ | asti̍ | śru̱tam | bṛ̱hat |
tena̍ | dṛ̱ḻhā | ci̱t | a̱dri̱-va̱ḥ | ā | vāja̍m | da̱rṣi̱ | sā̱taye̍ |
maṁhi̍ṣṭham | va̱ḥ | ma̱ghonā̍m | rājā̍nam | ca̱rṣa̱ṇī̱nām |
indra̍m | upa̍ | pra-śa̍staye | pū̱rvībhi̍ḥ | ju̱ju̱ṣe̱ | gira̍ḥ |
asmai̍ | it | kāvya̍m | vaca̍ḥ | u̱ktham | indrā̍ya | śaṁsya̍m |
tasmai̍ | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | brahma̍-vāhase | gira̍ḥ | va̱rdha̱nti̱ | atra̍yaḥ | gira̍ḥ | śu̱mbha̱nti̱ | atra̍yaḥ |
ā | yā̱hi̱ | adri̍-bhiḥ | su̱tam | soma̍m | so̱ma̱-pa̱te̱ | pi̱ba̱ |
vṛṣa̍n | i̱ndra̱ | vṛṣa̍-bhiḥ | vṛ̱tra̱ha̱n-ta̱ma̱ |
vṛṣā̍ | grāvā̍ | vṛṣā̍ | mada̍ḥ | vṛṣā̍ | soma̍ḥ | a̱yam | su̱taḥ |
vṛṣa̍n | i̱ndra̱ | vṛṣa̍-bhiḥ | vṛ̱tra̱ha̱n-ta̱ma̱ |
vṛṣā̍ | tvā̱ | vṛṣa̍ṇam | hu̱ve̱ | vajri̍n | ci̱trābhi̍ḥ | ū̱ti-bhi̍ḥ |
vṛṣa̍n | i̱ndra̱ | vṛṣa̍-bhiḥ | vṛ̱tra̱ha̱n-ta̱ma̱ |
ṛ̱jī̱ṣī | va̱jrī | vṛ̱ṣa̱bhaḥ | tu̱rā̱ṣāṭ | śu̱ṣmī | rājā̍ | vṛ̱tra̱-hā | so̱ma̱-pāvā̍ |
yu̱ktvā | hari̍-bhyām | upa̍ | yā̱sa̱t | a̱rvāṅ | mādhya̍ndine | sava̍ne | ma̱tsa̱t | indra̍ḥ |
yat | tvā̱ | sū̱rya̱ | sva̍ḥ-bhānuḥ | tama̍sā | avi̍dhyat | ā̱su̱raḥ |
akṣe̍tra-vit | yathā̍ | mu̱gdhaḥ | bhuva̍nāni | a̱dī̱dha̱yu̱ḥ |
sva̍ḥ-bhānoḥ | adha̍ | yat | i̱ndra̱ | mā̱yāḥ | a̱vaḥ | di̱vaḥ | varta̍mānāḥ | a̱va̱-aha̍n |
gū̱ḻham | sūrya̍m | tama̍sā | apa̍-vratena | tu̱rīye̍ṇa | brahma̍ṇā | a̱vi̱nda̱t | atri̍ḥ |
mā | mām | i̱mam | tava̍ | santa̍m | a̱tre̱ | i̱ra̱syā | dru̱gdhaḥ | bhi̱yasā̍ | ni | gā̱rī̱t |
tvam | mi̱traḥ | a̱si̱ | sa̱tya-rā̍dhāḥ | tau | mā̱ | i̱ha | a̱va̱ta̱m | varu̍ṇaḥ | ca̱ | rājā̍ |
grāvṇa̍ḥ | bra̱hmā | yu̱yu̱jā̱naḥ | sa̱pa̱ryan | kī̱riṇā̍ | de̱vān | nama̍sā | u̱pa̱-śikṣa̍n |
atri̍ḥ | sūrya̍sya | di̱vi | cakṣu̍ḥ | ā | a̱dhā̱t | sva̍ḥ-bhānoḥ | apa̍ | mā̱yāḥ | a̱ghu̱kṣa̱t |
yam | vai | sūrya̍m | sva̍ḥ-bhānuḥ | tama̍sā | avi̍dhyat | ā̱su̱raḥ |
atra̍yaḥ | tam | anu̍ | a̱vi̱nda̱n | na̱hi | a̱nye | aśa̍knuvan |
kaḥ | nu | vā̱m | mi̱trā̱va̱ru̱ṇau̱ | ṛ̱ta̱-yan | di̱vaḥ | vā̱ | ma̱haḥ | pārthi̍vasya | vā̱ | de |
ṛ̱tasya̍ | vā̱ | sada̍si | trāsī̍thām | na̱ḥ | ya̱jña̱-ya̱te | vā̱ | pa̱śu̱-saḥ | na | vājā̍n |
te | na̱ḥ | mi̱traḥ | varu̍ṇaḥ | a̱rya̱mā | ā̱yuḥ | indra̍ḥ | ṛ̱bhu̱kṣāḥ | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | ju̱ṣa̱nta̱ |
nama̍ḥ-bhiḥ | vā̱ | ye | dadha̍te | su̱-vṛ̱ktim | stoma̍m | ru̱drāya̍ | mī̱ḻhuṣe̍ | sa̱-joṣā̍ḥ |
ā | vā̱m | yeṣṭhā̍ | a̱śvi̱nā̱ | hu̱vadhyai̍ | vāta̍sya | patma̍n | rathya̍sya | pu̱ṣṭau |
u̱ta | vā̱ | di̱vaḥ | asu̍rāya | manma̍ | pra | andhā̍ṁsi-iva | yajya̍ve | bha̱ra̱dhva̱m |
pra | sa̱kṣaṇa̍ḥ | di̱vyaḥ | kaṇva̍-hotā | tri̱taḥ | di̱vaḥ | sa̱-joṣā̍ḥ | vāta̍ḥ | a̱gniḥ |
pū̱ṣā | bhaga̍ḥ | pra̱-bhṛ̱the | vi̱śva-bho̍jāḥ | ā̱jim | na | ja̱gmu̱ḥ | ā̱śva̍śva-tamāḥ |
pra | va̱ḥ | ra̱yim | yu̱kta-a̍śvam | bha̱ra̱dhva̱m | rā̱yaḥ | eṣe̍ | ava̍se | da̱dhī̱ta̱ | dhīḥ |
su̱-śeva̍ḥ | evai̍ḥ | au̱śi̱jasya̍ | hotā̍ | ye | va̱ḥ | evā̍ḥ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | tu̱rāṇā̍m |
pra | va̱ḥ | vā̱yum | ra̱tha̱-yuja̍m | kṛ̱ṇu̱dhva̱m | pra | de̱vam | vipra̍m | pa̱ni̱tāra̍m | a̱rkaiḥ |
i̱ṣu̱dhyava̍ḥ | ṛ̱ta̱-sāpa̍ḥ | pura̍m-dhīḥ | vasvī̍ḥ | na̱ḥ | atra̍ | patnī̍ḥ | ā | dhi̱ye | dhu̱riti̍ dhuḥ |
upa̍ | va̱ḥ | eṣe̍ | vandye̍bhiḥ | śū̱ṣaiḥ | pra | ya̱hvī iti̍ | di̱vaḥ | ci̱taya̍t-bhiḥ | a̱rkaiḥ |
u̱ṣasā̱naktā̍ | vi̱duṣī̍ i̱veti̍ vi̱duṣī̍-iva | viśva̍m | ā | ha̱ | va̱ha̱ta̱ḥ | martyā̍ya | ya̱jñam |
a̱bhi | va̱ḥ | a̱rce̱ | po̱ṣyā-va̍taḥ | nṝn | vāsto̍ḥ | pati̍m | tvaṣṭā̍ram | rarā̍ṇaḥ |
dhanyā̍ | sa̱-joṣā̍ḥ | dhi̱ṣaṇā̍ | nama̍ḥ-bhiḥ | vana̱spatī̍n | oṣa̍dhīḥ | rā̱yaḥ | eṣe̍ |
tu̱je | na̱ḥ | tane̍ | parva̍tāḥ | sa̱ntu̱ | sva-e̍tavaḥ | ye | vasa̍vaḥ | na | vī̱rāḥ |
pa̱ni̱taḥ | ā̱ptyaḥ | ya̱ja̱taḥ | sadā̍ | na̱ḥ | vardhā̍t | na̱ḥ | śaṁsa̍m | narya̍ḥ | a̱bhiṣṭau̍ |
vṛṣṇa̍ḥ | a̱sto̱ṣi̱ | bhū̱myasya̍ | garbha̍m | tri̱taḥ | napā̍tam | a̱pām | su̱-vṛ̱kti |
gṛ̱ṇī̱te | a̱gniḥ | e̱tari̍ | na | śū̱ṣaiḥ | śo̱ciḥ-ke̍śaḥ | ni | ri̱ṇā̱ti̱ | vanā̍ |
ka̱thā | ma̱he | ru̱driyā̍ya | bra̱vā̱ma̱ | kat | rā̱ye | ci̱ki̱tuṣe̍ | bhagā̍ya |
āpa̍ḥ | oṣa̍dhīḥ | u̱ta | na̱ḥ | a̱va̱ntu̱ | dyauḥ | vanā̍ | gi̱raya̍ḥ | vṛ̱kṣa-ke̍śāḥ |
śṛ̱ṇotu̍ | na̱ḥ | ū̱rjām | pati̍ḥ | gira̍ḥ | saḥ | nabha̍ḥ | tarī̍yān | i̱ṣi̱raḥ | pari̍-jmā |
śṛ̱ṇvantu̍ | āpa̍ḥ | pura̍ḥ | na | śu̱bhrāḥ | pari̍ | sruca̍ḥ | ba̱bṛ̱hā̱ṇasya̍ | adre̍ḥ |
vi̱da | ci̱t | nu | ma̱hā̱nta̱ḥ | ye | va̱ḥ | evā̍ḥ | bravā̍ma | da̱smā̱ḥ | vārya̍m | dadhā̍nāḥ |
vaya̍ḥ | ca̱na | su̱-bhva̍ḥ | ā | ava̍ | ya̱nti̱ | kṣu̱bhā | marta̍m | anu̍-yatam | va̱dha̱-snaiḥ |
ā | daivyā̍ni | pārthi̍vāni | janma̍ | a̱paḥ | ca̱ | accha̍ | su-ma̍khāya | vo̱ca̱m |
vardha̍ntām | dyāva̍ḥ | gira̍ḥ | ca̱ndra-a̍grāḥ | u̱dā | va̱rdha̱ntā̱m | a̱bhi-sā̍tāḥ | arṇā̍ḥ |
pa̱de-pa̍de | me̱ | ja̱ri̱mā | ni | dhā̱yi̱ | varū̍trī | vā̱ | śa̱krā | yā | pā̱yu-bhi̍ḥ | ca̱ |
sisa̍ktu | mā̱tā | ma̱hī | ra̱sā | na̱ḥ | smat | sū̱ri-bhi̍ḥ | ṛ̱ju̱-hastā̍ | ṛ̱ju̱-vani̍ḥ |
ka̱thā | dā̱śe̱ma̱ | nama̍sā | su̱-dānū̍n | e̱va̱-yā | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | accha̍-uktau | pra-śra̍vasaḥ | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | accha̍-uktau |
mā | na̱ḥ | ahi̍ḥ | bu̱dhnya̍ḥ | ri̱ṣe | dhā̱t | a̱smāka̍m | bhū̱t | u̱pa̱mā̱ti̱-vani̍ḥ |
iti̍ | ci̱t | nu | pra̱-jāyai̍ | pa̱śu̱-matyai̍ | devā̍saḥ | vana̍te | martya̍ḥ | va̱ḥ | ā | de̱vā̱sa̱ḥ | va̱na̱te̱ | martya̍ḥ | va̱ḥ |
atra̍ | śi̱vām | ta̱nva̍ḥ | dhā̱sim | a̱syāḥ | ja̱rām | ci̱t | me̱ | niḥ-ṛ̍tiḥ | ja̱gra̱sī̱ta̱ |
tām | va̱ḥ | de̱vā̱ḥ | su̱-ma̱tim | ū̱rjaya̍ntīm | iṣa̍m | a̱śyā̱ma̱ | va̱sa̱va̱ḥ | śasā̍ | goḥ |
sā | na̱ḥ | su̱-dānu̍ḥ | mṛ̱ḻaya̍ntī | de̱vī | prati̍ | drava̍ntī | su̱vi̱tāya̍ | ga̱myā̱ḥ |
a̱bhi | na̱ḥ | iḻā̍ | yū̱thasya̍ | mā̱tā | smat | na̱dībhi̍ḥ | u̱rvaśī̍ | vā̱ | gṛ̱ṇā̱tu̱ |
u̱rvaśī̍ | vā̱ | bṛ̱ha̱t-di̱vā | gṛ̱ṇā̱nā | a̱bhi̱-ū̱rṇvā̱nā | pra̱-bhṛ̱thasya̍ | ā̱yoḥ |
sisa̍ktu | na̱ḥ | ū̱rja̱vya̍sya | pu̱ṣṭeḥ |
pra | śam-ta̍mā | varu̍ṇam | dīdhi̍tī | gīḥ | mi̱tram | bhaga̍m | adi̍tim | nū̱nam | a̱śyā̱ḥ |
pṛṣa̍t-yoniḥ | pañca̍-hotā | śṛ̱ṇo̱tu̱ | atū̍rta-panthāḥ | asu̍raḥ | ma̱ya̱ḥ-bhuḥ |
prati̍ | me̱ | stoma̍m | adi̍tiḥ | ja̱gṛ̱bhyā̱t | sū̱num | na | mā̱tā | hṛdya̍m | su̱-śeva̍m |
brahma̍ | pri̱yam | de̱va-hi̍tam | yat | asti̍ | a̱ham | mi̱tre | varu̍ṇe | yat | ma̱ya̱ḥ-bhuḥ |
ut | ī̱ra̱ya̱ | ka̱vi-ta̍mam | ka̱vī̱nām | u̱natta̍ | e̱na̱m | a̱bhi | madhvā̍ | ghṛ̱tena̍ |
saḥ | na̱ḥ | vasū̍ni | pra-ya̍tā | hi̱tāni̍ | ca̱ndrāṇi̍ | de̱vaḥ | sa̱vi̱tā | su̱vā̱ti̱ |
sam | i̱ndra̱ | na̱ḥ | mana̍sā | ne̱ṣi̱ | gobhi̍ḥ | sam | sū̱ri-bhi̍ḥ | ha̱ri̱-va̱ḥ | sam | sva̱sti |
sam | brahma̍ṇā | de̱va-hi̍tam | yat | asti̍ | sam | de̱vānā̍m | su̱-ma̱tyā | ya̱jñiyā̍nām |
de̱vaḥ | bhaga̍ḥ | sa̱vi̱tā | rā̱yaḥ | aṁśa̍ḥ | indra̍ḥ | vṛ̱trasya̍ | sa̱m-jita̍ḥ | dhanā̍nām |
ṛ̱bhu̱kṣāḥ | vāja̍ḥ | u̱ta | vā̱ | pura̍m-dhiḥ | ava̍ntu | na̱ḥ | a̱mṛtā̍saḥ | tu̱rāsa̍ḥ |
ma̱rutva̍taḥ | apra̍ti-itasya | ji̱ṣṇoḥ | ajū̍ryataḥ | pra | bra̱vā̱ma̱ | kṛ̱tāni̍ |
na | te̱ | pūrve̍ | ma̱gha̱-va̱n | na | apa̍rāsaḥ | na | vī̱rya̍m | nūta̍naḥ | kaḥ | ca̱na | ā̱pa̱ |
upa̍ | stu̱hi̱ | pra̱tha̱mam | ra̱tna̱-dheya̍m | bṛha̱spati̍m | sa̱ni̱tāra̍m | dhanā̍nām |
yaḥ | śaṁsa̍te | stu̱va̱te | śam-bha̍viṣṭhaḥ | pu̱ru̱-vasu̍ḥ | ā̱-gama̍t | johu̍vānam |
tava̍ | ū̱ti-bhi̍ḥ | saca̍mānāḥ | ari̍ṣṭāḥ | bṛha̍spate | ma̱gha-vā̍naḥ | su̱-vīrā̍ḥ |
ye | a̱śva̱-dāḥ | u̱ta | vā̱ | santi̍ | go̱-dāḥ | ye | va̱stra̱-dāḥ | su̱-bhagā̍ḥ | teṣu̍ | rāya̍ḥ |
vi̱-sa̱rmāṇa̍m | kṛ̱ṇu̱hi̱ | vi̱ttam | e̱ṣā̱m | ye | bhu̱ñjate̍ | apṛ̍ṇantaḥ | na̱ḥ | u̱kthaiḥ |
apa̍-vratān | pra̱-sa̱ve | va̱vṛ̱dhā̱nān | bra̱hma̱-dviṣa̍ḥ | sūryā̍t | ya̱va̱ya̱sva̱ |
yaḥ | oha̍te | ra̱kṣasa̍ḥ | de̱va-vī̍tau | a̱ca̱krebhi̍ḥ | tam | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | ni | yā̱ta̱ |
yaḥ | va̱ḥ | śamī̍m | śa̱śa̱mā̱nasya̍ | nindā̍t | tu̱cchyān | kāmā̍n | ka̱ra̱te̱ | si̱svi̱dā̱naḥ |
tam | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | stu̱hi̱ | yaḥ | su̱-i̱ṣuḥ | su̱-dhanvā̍ | yaḥ | viśva̍sya | kṣaya̍ti | bhe̱ṣa̱jasya̍ |
yakṣva̍ | ma̱he | sau̱ma̱na̱sāya̍ | ru̱dram | nama̍ḥ-bhiḥ | de̱vam | asu̍ram | du̱va̱sya̱ |
damū̍nasaḥ | a̱pasa̍ḥ | ye | su̱-hastā̍ḥ | vṛṣṇa̍ḥ | patnī̍ḥ | na̱dya̍ḥ | vi̱bhva̱-ta̱ṣṭāḥ |
sara̍svatī | bṛ̱ha̱t-di̱vā | u̱ta | rā̱kā | da̱śa̱syantī̍ḥ | va̱ri̱va̱sya̱ntu̱ | śu̱bhrāḥ |
pra | su | ma̱he | su̱-śa̱ra̱ṇāya̍ | me̱dhām | gira̍m | bha̱re̱ | navya̍sīm | jāya̍mānām |
yaḥ | ā̱ha̱nāḥ | du̱hi̱tuḥ | va̱kṣaṇā̍su | rū̱pā | mi̱nā̱naḥ | akṛ̍ṇot | i̱dam | na̱ḥ |
pra | su̱-stu̱tiḥ | sta̱naya̍ntam | ru̱vanta̍m | i̱ḻaḥ | pati̍m | ja̱ri̱ta̱ḥ | nū̱nam | a̱śyā̱ḥ |
yaḥ | a̱bdi̱-mān | u̱da̱ni̱-mān | iya̍rti | pra | vi̱-dyutā̍ | roda̍sī̱ iti̍ | u̱kṣamā̍ṇaḥ |
e̱ṣaḥ | stoma̍ḥ | māru̍tam | śardha̍ḥ | accha̍ | ru̱drasya̍ | sū̱nūn | yu̱va̱nyūn | ut | a̱śyā̱ḥ |
kāma̍ḥ | rā̱ye | ha̱va̱te̱ | mā̱ | sva̱sti | upa̍ | stu̱hi̱ | pṛṣa̍t-aśvān | a̱yāsa̍ḥ |
pra | e̱ṣaḥ | stoma̍ḥ | pṛ̱thi̱vīm | a̱ntari̍kṣam | vana̱spatī̍n | oṣa̍dhīḥ | rā̱ye | a̱śyā̱ḥ |
de̱vaḥ-de̍vaḥ | su̱-hava̍ḥ | bhū̱tu̱ | mahya̍m | mā | na̱ḥ | mā̱tā | pṛ̱thi̱vī | du̱ḥ-ma̱tau | dhā̱t |
u̱rau | de̱vā̱ḥ | a̱ni̱-bā̱dhe | syā̱ma̱ |
sam | a̱śvino̍ḥ | ava̍sā | nūta̍nena | ma̱ya̱ḥ-bhuvā̍ | su̱-pranī̍tī | ga̱me̱ma̱ |
ā | na̱ḥ | ra̱yim | va̱ha̱ta̱m | ā | u̱ta | vī̱rān | ā | viśvā̍ni | a̱mṛ̱tā̱ | saubha̍gāni |
ā | dhe̱nava̍ḥ | paya̍sā | tūrṇi̍-arthāḥ | ama̍rdhantīḥ | upa̍ | na̱ḥ | ya̱ntu̱ | madhvā̍ |
ma̱haḥ | rā̱ye | bṛ̱ha̱tīḥ | sa̱pta | vipra̍ḥ | ma̱ya̱ḥ-bhuva̍ḥ | ja̱ri̱tā | jo̱ha̱vī̱ti̱ |
ā | su̱-stu̱tī | nama̍sā | va̱rta̱yadhyai̍ | dyāvā̍ | vājā̍ya | pṛ̱thi̱vī iti̍ | amṛ̍dhre̱ iti̍ |
pi̱tā | mā̱tā | madhu̍-vacāḥ | su̱-hastā̍ | bhare̍-bhare | na̱ḥ | ya̱śasau̍ | a̱vi̱ṣṭā̱m |
adhva̍ryavaḥ | ca̱kṛ̱-vāṁsa̍ḥ | madhū̍ni | pra | vā̱yave̍ | bha̱ra̱ta̱ | cāru̍ | śu̱kram |
hotā̍-iva | na̱ḥ | pra̱tha̱maḥ | pā̱hi̱ | a̱sya | deva̍ | madhva̍ḥ | ra̱ri̱ma | te̱ | madā̍ya |
daśa̍ | kṣipa̍ḥ | yu̱ñja̱te̱ | bā̱hū iti̍ | adri̍m | soma̍sya | yā | śa̱mi̱tārā̍ | su̱-hastā̍ |
madhva̍ḥ | rasa̍m | su̱-gabha̍stiḥ | gi̱ri̱-sthām | cani̍ścadat | du̱du̱he̱ | śu̱kram | a̱ṁśuḥ |
asā̍vi | te̱ | ju̱ju̱ṣā̱ṇāya̍ | soma̍ḥ | kratve̍ | dakṣā̍ya | bṛ̱ha̱te | madā̍ya |
harī̱ iti̍ | rathe̍ | su̱-dhurā̍ | yoge̍ | a̱rvāk | indra̍ | pri̱yā | kṛ̱ṇu̱hi̱ | hū̱yamā̍naḥ |
ā | na̱ḥ | ma̱hīm | a̱rama̍tim | sa̱-joṣā̍ḥ | gnām | de̱vīm | nama̍sā | rā̱ta-ha̍vyām |
madho̍ḥ | madā̍ya | bṛ̱ha̱tīm | ṛ̱ta̱-jñām | ā | a̱gne̱ | va̱ha̱ | pa̱thi-bhi̍ḥ | de̱va̱-yānai̍ḥ |
a̱ñjanti̍ | yam | pra̱thaya̍ntaḥ | na | viprā̍ḥ | va̱pā-va̍ntam | na | a̱gninā̍ | tapa̍ntaḥ |
pi̱tuḥ | na | pu̱traḥ | u̱pasi̍ | preṣṭha̍ḥ | ā | gha̱rmaḥ | a̱gnim | ṛ̱taya̍n | a̱sā̱di̱ |
accha̍ | ma̱hī | bṛ̱ha̱tī | śam-ta̍mā | gīḥ | dū̱taḥ | na | ga̱ntu̱ | a̱śvinā̍ | hu̱vadhyai̍ |
ma̱ya̱ḥ-bhuvā̍ | sa̱-rathā̍ | ā | yā̱ta̱m | a̱rvāk | ga̱ntam | ni̱-dhim | dhura̍m | ā̱ṇiḥ | na | nābhi̍m |
pra | tavya̍saḥ | nama̍ḥ-uktim | tu̱rasya̍ | a̱ham | pū̱ṣṇaḥ | u̱ta | vā̱yoḥ | a̱di̱kṣi̱ |
yā | rādha̍sā | co̱di̱tārā̍ | ma̱tī̱nām | yā | vāja̍sya | dra̱vi̱ṇa̱ḥ-dau | u̱ta | tman |
ā | nāma̍-bhiḥ | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | va̱kṣi̱ | viśvā̍n | ā | rū̱pebhi̍ḥ | jā̱ta̱-ve̱da̱ḥ | hu̱vā̱naḥ |
ya̱jñam | gira̍ḥ | ja̱ri̱tuḥ | su̱-stu̱tim | ca̱ | viśve̍ | ga̱nta̱ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | viśve̍ | ū̱tī |
ā | na̱ḥ | di̱vaḥ | bṛ̱ha̱taḥ | parva̍tāt | ā | sara̍svatī | ya̱ja̱tā | ga̱ntu̱ | ya̱jñam |
hava̍m | de̱vī | ju̱ju̱ṣā̱ṇā | ghṛ̱tācī̍ | śa̱gmām | na̱ḥ | vāca̍m | u̱śa̱tī | śṛ̱ṇo̱tu̱ |
ā | ve̱dhasa̍m | nīla̍-pṛṣṭham | bṛ̱hanta̍m | bṛha̱spati̍m | sada̍ne | sā̱da̱ya̱dhva̱m |
sā̱dat-yo̍nim | dame̍ | ā | dī̱di̱-vāṁsa̍m | hira̍ṇya-varṇam | a̱ru̱ṣam | sa̱pe̱ma̱ |
ā | dha̱rṇa̱siḥ | bṛ̱hat-di̍vaḥ | rarā̍ṇaḥ | viśve̍bhiḥ | ga̱ntu̱ | oma̍-bhiḥ | hu̱vā̱naḥ |
gnāḥ | vasā̍naḥ | oṣa̍dhīḥ | amṛ̍dhraḥ | tri̱dhātu̍-śṛṅgaḥ | vṛ̱ṣa̱bhaḥ | va̱ya̱ḥ-dhāḥ |
mā̱tuḥ | pa̱de | pa̱ra̱me | śu̱kre | ā̱yoḥ | vi̱pa̱nyava̍ḥ | rā̱spi̱rāsa̍ḥ | a̱gma̱n |
su̱-śevya̍m | nama̍sā | rā̱ta-ha̍vyāḥ | śiśu̍m | mṛ̱ja̱nti̱ | ā̱yava̍ḥ | na | vā̱se |
bṛ̱hat | vaya̍ḥ | bṛ̱ha̱te | tubhya̍m | a̱gne̱ | dhi̱yā̱-jura̍ḥ | mi̱thu̱nāsa̍ḥ | sa̱ca̱nta̱ |
de̱vaḥ-de̍vaḥ | su̱-hava̍ḥ | bhū̱tu̱ | mahya̍m | mā | na̱ḥ | mā̱tā | pṛ̱thi̱vī | du̱ḥ-ma̱tau | dhā̱t |
u̱rau | de̱vā̱ḥ | a̱ni̱-bā̱dhe | syā̱ma̱ |
sam | a̱śvino̍ḥ | ava̍sā | nūta̍nena | ma̱ya̱ḥ-bhuvā̍ | su̱-pranī̍tī | ga̱me̱ma̱ |
ā | na̱ḥ | ra̱yim | va̱ha̱ta̱m | ā | u̱ta | vī̱rān | ā | viśvā̍ni | a̱mṛ̱tā̱ | saubha̍gāni |
tam | pra̱tna-thā̍ | pū̱rva-thā̍ | vi̱śva-thā̍ | i̱m-athā̍ | jye̱ṣṭha-tā̍tim | ba̱rhi̱-sada̍m | sva̱ḥ-vida̍m |
pra̱tī̱cī̱nam | vṛ̱jana̍m | do̱ha̱se̱ | gi̱rā | ā̱śum | jaya̍ntam | anu̍ | yāsu̍ | vardha̍se |
śri̱ye | su̱-dṛśī̍ḥ | upa̍rasya | yāḥ | sva̍ḥ | vi̱-roca̍mānaḥ | ka̱kubhā̍m | a̱co̱date̍ |
su̱-go̱pāḥ | a̱si̱ | na | dabhā̍ya | su̱kra̱to̱ iti̍ su-krato | pa̱raḥ | mā̱yābhi̍ḥ | ṛ̱te | ā̱sa̱ | nāma̍ | te̱ |
atya̍m | ha̱viḥ | sa̱ca̱te̱ | sat | ca̱ | dhātu̍ | ca̱ | ari̍ṣṭa-gātuḥ | saḥ | hotā̍ | sa̱ha̱ḥ-bhari̍ḥ |
pra̱-sarsrā̍ṇaḥ | anu̍ | ba̱rhiḥ | vṛṣā̍ | śiśu̍ḥ | madhye̍ | yuvā̍ | a̱jara̍ḥ | vi̱-sruhā̍ | hi̱taḥ |
pra | va̱ḥ | e̱te | su̱-yuja̍ḥ | yāma̍n | i̱ṣṭaye̍ | nīcī̍ḥ | a̱muṣmai̍ | ya̱mya̍ḥ | ṛ̱ta̱-vṛdha̍ḥ |
su̱yantu̍-bhiḥ | sa̱rva̱-śā̱saiḥ | a̱bhīśu̍-bhiḥ | krivi̍ḥ | nāmā̍ni | pra̱va̱ṇe | mu̱ṣā̱ya̱ti̱ |
sa̱m-jarbhu̍rāṇaḥ | taru̍-bhiḥ | su̱te̱-gṛbha̍m | va̱yā̱kina̍m | ci̱tta-ga̍rbhāsu | su̱-svaru̍ḥ |
dhā̱ra̱-vā̱keṣu̍ | ṛ̱ju̱-gā̱tha̱ | śo̱bha̱se̱ | vardha̍sva | patnī̍ḥ | a̱bhi | jī̱vaḥ | a̱dhva̱re |
yā̱dṛk | e̱va | dadṛ̍śe | tā̱dṛk | u̱cya̱te̱ | sam | chā̱yayā̍ | da̱dhi̱re̱ | si̱dhrayā̍ | a̱p-su | ā |
ma̱hīm | a̱smabhya̍m | u̱ru̱-sām | u̱ru | jraya̍ḥ | bṛ̱hat | su̱-vīra̍m | ana̍pa-cyutam | saha̍ḥ |
veti̍ | agru̍ḥ | jani̍-vān | vai | ati̍ | spṛdha̍ḥ | sa̱-ma̱rya̱tā | mana̍sā | sūrya̍ḥ | ka̱viḥ |
ghra̱ṁsam | rakṣa̍ntam | pari̍ | vi̱śvata̍ḥ | gaya̍m | a̱smāka̍m | śarma̍ | va̱na̱va̱t | sva-va̍suḥ |
jyāyā̍ṁsam | a̱sya | ya̱tuna̍sya | ke̱tunā̍ | ṛ̱ṣi̱-sva̱ram | ca̱ra̱ti̱ | yāsu̍ | nāma̍ | te̱ |
yā̱dṛśmi̍n | dhā̱yi̱ | tam | a̱pa̱syayā̍ | vi̱da̱t | yaḥ | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | sva̱yam | vaha̍te | saḥ | ara̍m | ka̱ra̱t |
sa̱mu̱dram | ā̱sā̱m | ava̍ | ta̱sthe̱ | a̱gri̱mā | na | ri̱ṣya̱ti̱ | sava̍nam | yasmi̍n | ā-ya̍tā |
atra̍ | na | hārdi̍ | kra̱va̱ṇasya̍ | re̱ja̱te̱ | yatra̍ | ma̱tiḥ | vi̱dyate̍ | pū̱ta̱-bandha̍nī |
saḥ | hi | kṣa̱trasya̍ | ma̱na̱sasya̍ | citti̍-bhiḥ | e̱va̱-va̱dasya̍ | ya̱ja̱tasya̍ | sadhre̍ḥ |
a̱va̱-tsā̱rasya̍ | spṛ̱ṇa̱vā̱ma̱ | raṇva̍-bhiḥ | śavi̍ṣṭham | vāja̍m | vi̱duṣā̍ | ci̱t | ardhya̍m |
śye̱naḥ | ā̱sā̱m | adi̍tiḥ | ka̱kṣya̍ḥ | mada̍ḥ | vi̱śva-vā̍rasya | ya̱ja̱tasya̍ | mā̱yina̍ḥ |
sam | a̱nyam-a̍nyam | a̱rtha̱ya̱nti̱ | eta̍ve | vi̱duḥ | vi̱-sāṇa̍m | pa̱ri̱-pāna̍m | anti̍ | te̱ |
sa̱dā̱-pṛ̱ṇaḥ | ya̱ja̱taḥ | vi | dviṣa̍ḥ | va̱dhī̱t | bā̱hu̱-vṛ̱ktaḥ | śru̱ta̱-vit | tarya̍ḥ | va̱ḥ | sacā̍ |
u̱bhā | saḥ | varā̍ | prati̍ | e̱ti̱ | bhāti̍ | ca̱ | yat | ī̱m | ga̱ṇam | bhaja̍te | su̱pra̱yāva̍-bhiḥ |
su̱ta̱m-bha̱raḥ | yaja̍mānasya | sat-pa̍tiḥ | viśvā̍sām | ūdha̍ḥ | saḥ | dhi̱yām | u̱t-añca̍naḥ |
bhara̍t | dhe̱nuḥ | rasa̍-vat | śi̱śri̱ye̱ | paya̍ḥ | a̱nu̱-bru̱vā̱ṇaḥ | adhi̍ | e̱ti̱ | na | sva̱pan |
yaḥ | jā̱gāra̍ | tam | ṛca̍ḥ | kā̱ma̱ya̱nte̱ | yaḥ | jā̱gāra̍ | tam | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | sāmā̍ni | ya̱nti̱ |
yaḥ | jā̱gāra̍ | tam | a̱yam | soma̍ḥ | ā̱ha̱ | tava̍ | a̱ham | a̱smi̱ | sa̱khye | ni-o̍kāḥ |
a̱gniḥ | jā̱gā̱ra̱ | tam | ṛca̍ḥ | kā̱ma̱ya̱nte̱ | a̱gniḥ | jā̱gā̱ra̱ | tam | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | sāmā̍ni | ya̱nti̱ |
a̱gniḥ | jā̱gā̱ra̱ | tam | a̱yam | soma̍ḥ | ā̱ha̱ | tava̍ | a̱ham | a̱smi̱ | sa̱khye | ni-o̍kāḥ |
vi̱dāḥ | di̱vaḥ | vi̱-syan | adri̍m | u̱kthaiḥ | ā̱-ya̱tyāḥ | u̱ṣasa̍ḥ | a̱rcina̍ḥ | gu̱ḥ |
apa̍ | a̱vṛ̱ta̱ | vra̱jinī̍ḥ | ut | sva̍ḥ | gā̱t | vi | dura̍ḥ | mānu̍ṣīḥ | de̱vaḥ | ā̱va̱rityā̍vaḥ |
vi | sūrya̍ḥ | a̱mati̍m | na | śriya̍m | sā̱t | ā | ū̱rvāt | gavā̍m | mā̱tā | jā̱na̱tī | gā̱t |
dhanva̍-arṇasaḥ | na̱dya̍ḥ | khāda̍ḥ-arṇāḥ | sthūṇā̍-iva | su-mi̍tā | dṛ̱ṁha̱ta̱ | dyauḥ |
a̱smai | u̱kthāya̍ | parva̍tasya | garbha̍ḥ | ma̱hīnā̍m | ja̱nuṣe̍ | pū̱rvyāya̍ |
vi | parva̍taḥ | jihī̍ta | sādha̍ta | dyauḥ | ā̱-vivā̍santaḥ | da̱sa̱ya̱nta̱ | bhūma̍ |
su̱-u̱ktebhi̍ḥ | va̱ḥ | vaca̍ḥ-bhiḥ | de̱va-ju̍ṣṭaiḥ | indrā̍ | nu | a̱gnī iti̍ | ava̍se | hu̱vadhyai̍ |
u̱kthebhi̍ḥ | hi | sma̱ | ka̱vaya̍ḥ | su̱-ya̱jñāḥ | ā̱-vivā̍santaḥ | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | yaja̍nti |

ā̱re | dveṣā̍ṁsi | sa̱nu̱taḥ | da̱dhā̱ma̱ | ayā̍ma | prāñca̍ḥ | yaja̍mānam | accha̍ |
ā | i̱ta̱ | dhiya̍m | kṛ̱ṇavā̍ma | sa̱khā̱ya̱ḥ | apa̍ | yā | mā̱tā | ṛ̱ṇu̱ta | vra̱jam | goḥ |

utsa̍ḥ | ā̱sā̱m | pa̱ra̱me | sa̱dha-sthe̍ | ṛ̱tasya̍ | pa̱thā | sa̱ramā̍ | vi̱da̱t | gāḥ |
ā | sūrya̍ḥ | yā̱tu̱ | sa̱pta-a̍śvaḥ | kṣetra̍m | yat | a̱sya̱ | u̱rvi̱yā | dī̱rgha̱-yā̱the |
ra̱ghuḥ | śye̱naḥ | pa̱ta̱ya̱t | andha̍ḥ | accha̍ | yuvā̍ | ka̱viḥ | dī̱da̱ya̱t | goṣu̍ | gaccha̍n |

u̱dnā | na | nāva̍m | a̱na̱ya̱nta̱ | dhīrā̍ḥ | ā̱-śṛ̱ṇva̱tīḥ | āpa̍ḥ | a̱rvāk | a̱ti̱ṣṭha̱n |
dhiya̍m | va̱ḥ | a̱p-su | da̱dhi̱ṣe̱ | sva̱ḥ-sām | yayā̍ | ata̍ran | daśa̍ | mā̱saḥ | nava̍-gvāḥ |
a̱yā | dhi̱yā | syā̱ma̱ | de̱va-go̍pāḥ | a̱yā | dhi̱yā | tu̱tu̱ryā̱ma̱ | ati̍ | aṁha̍ḥ |
haya̍ḥ | na | vi̱dvān | a̱yu̱ji̱ | sva̱yam | dhu̱ri | tām | va̱hā̱mi̱ | pra̱-tara̍ṇīm | a̱va̱syuva̍m |
na | a̱syā̱ḥ | va̱śmi̱ | vi̱-muca̍m | na | ā̱-vṛta̍m | puna̍ḥ | vi̱dvān | pa̱thaḥ | pu̱ra̱ḥ-e̱tā | ṛ̱ju | ne̱ṣa̱ti̱ |
agne̍ | indra̍ | varu̍ṇa | mitra̍ | devā̍ḥ | śardha̍ḥ | pra | ya̱nta̱ | māru̍ta | u̱ta | vi̱ṣṇo̱ iti̍ |
u̱bhā | nāsa̍tyā | ru̱draḥ | adha̍ | gnāḥ | pū̱ṣā | bhaga̍ḥ | sara̍svatī | ju̱ṣa̱nta̱ |
i̱ndrā̱gnī iti̍ | mi̱trāvaru̍ṇā | adi̍tim | sva1̱̍riti̱ sva̍ḥ | pṛ̱thi̱vīm | dyām | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | parva̍tān | a̱paḥ |
hu̱ve | viṣṇu̍m | pū̱ṣaṇa̍m | brahma̍ṇaḥ | pati̍m | bhaga̍m | nu | śaṁsa̍m | sa̱vi̱tāra̍m | ū̱taye̍ |
u̱ta | na̱ḥ | viṣṇu̍ḥ | u̱ta | vāta̍ḥ | a̱sridha̍ḥ | dra̱vi̱ṇa̱ḥ-dāḥ | u̱ta | soma̍ḥ | maya̍ḥ | ka̱ra̱t |
u̱ta | ṛ̱bhava̍ḥ | u̱ta | rā̱ye | na̱ḥ | a̱śvinā̍ | u̱ta | tvaṣṭā̍ | u̱ta | vi-bhvā̍ | anu̍ | ma̱ṁsa̱te̱ |
u̱ta | tyat | na̱ḥ | māru̍tam | śardha̍ḥ | ā | ga̱ma̱t | di̱vi̱-kṣa̱yam | ya̱ja̱tam | ba̱rhiḥ | ā̱-sade̍ |
bṛha̱spati̍ḥ | śarma̍ | pū̱ṣā | u̱ta | na̱ḥ | ya̱ma̱t | va̱rū̱thya̍m | varu̍ṇaḥ | mi̱traḥ | a̱rya̱mā |
u̱ta | tye | na̱ḥ | parva̍tāsaḥ | su̱-śa̱staya̍ḥ | su̱-dī̱taya̍ḥ | na̱dya̍ḥ | trāma̍ṇe | bhu̱va̱n |
bhaga̍ḥ | vi̱-bha̱ktā | śava̍sā | ava̍sā | ā | ga̱ma̱t | u̱ru̱-vyacā̍ḥ | adi̍tiḥ | śro̱tu̱ | me̱ | hava̍m |
de̱vānā̍m | patnī̍ḥ | u̱śa̱tīḥ | a̱va̱ntu̱ | na̱ḥ | pra | a̱va̱ntu̱ | na̱ḥ | tu̱jaye̍ | vāja̍-sātaye |
yāḥ | pārthi̍vāsaḥ | yāḥ | a̱pām | api̍ | vra̱te | tāḥ | na̱ḥ | de̱vī̱ḥ | su̱-ha̱vā̱ḥ | śarma̍ | ya̱ccha̱ta̱ |
u̱ta | gnāḥ | vya̱ntu̱ | de̱va-pa̍tnīḥ | i̱ndrā̱ṇī | a̱gnāyī̍ | a̱śvinī̍ | rāṭ |
ā | roda̍sī̱ iti̍ | va̱ru̱ṇā̱nī | śṛ̱ṇo̱tu̱ | vyantu̍ | de̱vīḥ | yaḥ | ṛ̱tuḥ | janī̍nām |
pra̱-yu̱ñja̱tī | di̱vaḥ | e̱ti̱ | bru̱vā̱ṇā | ma̱hī | mā̱tā | du̱hi̱tuḥ | bo̱dhaya̍ntī |
ā̱-vivā̍santī | yu̱va̱tiḥ | ma̱nī̱ṣā | pi̱tṛ-bhya̍ḥ | ā | sada̍ne | johu̍vānā |
a̱ji̱rāsa̍ḥ | tat-a̍paḥ | īya̍mānāḥ | ā̱ta̱sthi̱-vāṁsa̍ḥ | a̱mṛta̍sya | nābhi̍m |
a̱na̱ntāsa̍ḥ | u̱rava̍ḥ | vi̱śvata̍ḥ | sī̱m | pari̍ | dyāvā̍pṛthi̱vī iti̍ | ya̱nti̱ | panthā̍ḥ |
u̱kṣā | sa̱mu̱draḥ | a̱ru̱ṣaḥ | su̱-pa̱rṇaḥ | pūrva̍sya | yoni̍m | pi̱tuḥ | ā | vi̱ve̱śa̱ |
madhye̍ | di̱vaḥ | ni-hi̍taḥ | pṛśni̍ḥ | aśmā̍ | vi | ca̱kra̱me̱ | raja̍saḥ | pā̱ti̱ | antau̍ |
ca̱tvāra̍ḥ | ī̱m | bi̱bhra̱ti̱ | kṣe̱ma̱-yanta̍ḥ | daśa̍ | garbha̍m | ca̱rase̍ | dhā̱pa̱ya̱nte̱ |
tri̱-dhāta̍vaḥ | pa̱ra̱māḥ | a̱sya̱ | gāva̍ḥ | di̱vaḥ | ca̱ra̱nti̱ | pari̍ | sa̱dyaḥ | antā̍n |
i̱dam | vapu̍ḥ | ni̱-vaca̍nam | ja̱nā̱sa̱ḥ | cara̍nti | yat | na̱dya̍ḥ | ta̱sthuḥ | āpa̍ḥ |
dve iti̍ | yat | ī̱m | bi̱bhṛ̱taḥ | mā̱tuḥ | a̱nye iti̍ | i̱ha-i̍ha | jā̱te iti̍ | ya̱myā̍ | saba̍ndhū̱ iti̱ sa-ba̍ndhū |
vi | ta̱nva̱te̱ | dhiya̍ḥ | a̱smai̱ | apā̍ṁsi | vastrā̍ | pu̱trāya̍ | mā̱tara̍ḥ | va̱ya̱nti̱ |
u̱pa̱-pra̱kṣe | vṛṣa̍ṇaḥ | moda̍mānāḥ | di̱vaḥ | pa̱thā | va̱dhva̍ḥ | ya̱nti̱ | accha̍ |
tat | a̱stu̱ | mi̱trā̱va̱ru̱ṇā̱ | tat | a̱gne̱ | śam | yoḥ | a̱smabhya̍m | i̱dam | a̱stu̱ | śa̱stam |
a̱śī̱mahi̍ | gā̱dham | u̱ta | pra̱ti̱-sthām | nama̍ḥ | di̱ve | bṛ̱ha̱te | sada̍nāya |
kat | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | pri̱yāya̍ | dhāmne̍ | ma̱nā̱ma̱he̱ | sva-kṣa̍trāya | sva-ya̍śase | ma̱he | va̱yam |
ā̱-me̱nyasya̍ | raja̍saḥ | yat | a̱bhre | ā | a̱paḥ | vṛ̱ṇā̱nā | vi̱-ta̱noti̍ | mā̱yinī̍ |
tāḥ | a̱tna̱ta̱ | va̱yuna̍m | vī̱ra-va̍kṣaṇam | sa̱mā̱nyā | vṛ̱tayā̍ | viśva̍m | ā | raja̍ḥ |
apo̱ iti̍ | apā̍cīḥ | apa̍rāḥ | apa̍ | ī̱ja̱te̱ | pra | pūrvā̍bhiḥ | ti̱ra̱te̱ | de̱va̱-yuḥ | jana̍ḥ |
ā | grāva̍-bhiḥ | a̱ha̱nye̍bhiḥ | a̱ktu-bhi̍ḥ | vari̍ṣṭham | vajra̍m | ā | ji̱gha̱rti̱ | mā̱yini̍ |
śa̱tam | vā̱ | yasya̍ | pra̱-cara̍n | sve | dame̍ | sa̱m-va̱rtaya̍ntaḥ | vi | ca̱ | va̱rta̱ya̱n | ahā̍ |
tām | a̱sya̱ | rī̱tim | pa̱ra̱śoḥ-i̍va | prati̍ | anī̍kam | a̱khya̱m | bhu̱je | a̱sya̱ | varpa̍saḥ |
sacā̍ | yadi̍ | pi̱tu̱manta̍m-iva | kṣaya̍m | ratna̍m | dadhā̍ti | bhara̍-hūtaye | vi̱śe |
saḥ | ji̱hvayā̍ | catu̍ḥ-anīkaḥ | ṛ̱ñja̱te̱ | cāru̍ | vasā̍naḥ | varu̍ṇaḥ | yata̍n | a̱rim |
na | tasya̍ | vi̱dma̱ | pu̱ru̱ṣa̱tvatā̍ | va̱yam | yata̍ḥ | bhaga̍ḥ | sa̱vi̱tā | dāti̍ | vārya̍m |
de̱vam | va̱ḥ | a̱dya | sa̱vi̱tāra̍m | ā | ī̱ṣe̱ | bhaga̍m | ca̱ | ratna̍m | vi̱-bhaja̍ntam | ā̱yoḥ |
ā | vā̱m | na̱rā̱ | pu̱ru̱-bhu̱jā̱ | va̱vṛ̱tyā̱m | di̱ve-di̍ve | ci̱t | a̱śvi̱nā̱ | sa̱khi̱-yan |
prati̍ | pra̱-yāna̍m | asu̍rasya | vi̱dvān | su̱-u̱ktaiḥ | de̱vam | sa̱vi̱tāra̍m | du̱va̱sya̱ |
upa̍ | bru̱vī̱ta̱ | nama̍sā | vi̱-jā̱nan | jyeṣṭha̍m | ca̱ | ratna̍m | vi̱-bhaja̍ntam | ā̱yoḥ |
a̱da̱tra̱-yā | da̱ya̱te̱ | vāryā̍ṇi | pū̱ṣā | bhaga̍ḥ | adi̍tiḥ | vaste̍ | u̱sraḥ |
indra̍ḥ | viṣṇu̍ḥ | varu̍ṇaḥ | mi̱traḥ | a̱gniḥ | ahā̍ni | bha̱drā | ja̱na̱ya̱nta̱ | da̱smāḥ |
tat | na̱ḥ | a̱na̱rvā | sa̱vi̱tā | varū̍tham | tat | sindha̍vaḥ | i̱ṣaya̍ntaḥ | anu̍ | gma̱n |
upa̍ | yat | voce̍ | a̱dhva̱rasya̍ | hotā̍ | rā̱yaḥ | syā̱ma̱ | pata̍yaḥ | vāja̍-ratnāḥ |
pra | ye | vasu̍-bhyaḥ | īva̍t | ā | nama̍ḥ | duḥ | ye | mi̱tre | varu̍ṇe | sū̱kta-vā̍caḥ |
ava̍ | e̱tu̱ | abhva̍m | kṛ̱ṇu̱ta | varī̍yaḥ | di̱vaḥpṛ̍thi̱vyoḥ | ava̍sā | ma̱de̱ma̱ |
viśva̍ḥ | de̱vasya̍ | ne̱tuḥ | marta̍ḥ | vu̱rī̱ta̱ | sa̱khyam |
viśva̍ḥ | rā̱ye | i̱ṣu̱dhya̱ti̱ | dyu̱mnam | vṛ̱ṇī̱ta̱ | pu̱ṣyase̍ |
te | te̱ | de̱va̱ | ne̱ta̱ḥ | ye | ca̱ | i̱mān | a̱nu̱-śase̍ |
te | rā̱yā | te | hi | ā̱-pṛce̍ | sace̍mahi | sa̱ca̱thyai̍ḥ |
ata̍ḥ | na̱ḥ | ā | nṝn | ati̍thīn | ata̍ḥ | patnī̍ḥ | da̱śa̱sya̱ta̱ |
ā̱re | viśva̍m | pa̱the̱-sthām | dvi̱ṣaḥ | yu̱yo̱tu̱ | yuyu̍viḥ |
yatra̍ | vahni̍ḥ | a̱bhi-hi̍taḥ | du̱drava̍t | droṇya̍ḥ | pa̱śuḥ |
nṛ̱-manā̍ḥ | vī̱ra-pa̍styaḥ | arṇā̍ | dhīrā̍-iva | sani̍tā |
e̱ṣaḥ | te̱ | de̱va̱ | ne̱ta̱riti̍ | ratha̱ḥpati̍ḥ | śam | ra̱yiḥ |
śam | rā̱ye | śam | sva̱staye̍ | i̱ṣa̱ḥ-stuta̍ḥ | ma̱nā̱ma̱he̱ | de̱va̱-stuta̍ḥ | ma̱nā̱ma̱he̱ |
agne̍ | su̱tasya̍ | pī̱taye̍ | viśvai̍ḥ | ūme̍bhiḥ | ā | ga̱hi̱ |
de̱vebhi̍ḥ | ha̱vya-dā̍taye |
ṛta̍-dhītayaḥ | ā | ga̱ta̱ | satya̍-dharmāṇaḥ | a̱dhva̱ram |
a̱gneḥ | pi̱ba̱ta̱ | ji̱hvayā̍ |
vipre̍bhiḥ | vi̱pra̱ | sa̱ntya̱ | prā̱ta̱ryāva̍-bhiḥ | ā | ga̱hi̱ |
de̱vebhi̍ḥ | soma̍-pītaye |
a̱yam | soma̍ḥ | ca̱mū iti̍ | su̱taḥ | ama̍tre | pari̍ | si̱cya̱te̱ |
pri̱yaḥ | indrā̍ya | vā̱yave̍ |
vāyo̱ iti̍ | ā | yā̱hi̱ | vī̱taye̍ | ju̱ṣā̱ṇaḥ | ha̱vya-dā̍taye |
piba̍ | su̱tasya̍ | andha̍saḥ | a̱bhi | praya̍ḥ |
indra̍ḥ | ca̱ | vā̱yo̱ iti̍ | e̱ṣā̱m | su̱tānā̍m | pī̱tim | a̱rha̱tha̱ḥ |
tān | ju̱ṣe̱thā̱m | a̱re̱pasau̍ | a̱bhi | praya̍ḥ |
su̱tāḥ | indrā̍ya | vā̱yave̍ | somā̍saḥ | dadhi̍-āśiraḥ |
ni̱mnam | na | ya̱nti̱ | sindha̍vaḥ | a̱bhi | praya̍ḥ |
sa̱-jūḥ | viśve̍bhiḥ | de̱vebhi̍ḥ | a̱śvi-bhyā̍m | u̱ṣasā̍ | sa̱-jūḥ |
ā | yā̱hi̱ | a̱gne̱ | a̱tri̱-vat | su̱te | raṇa̱ |
sa̱-jūḥ | mi̱trāvaru̍ṇābhyām | sa̱-jūḥ | some̍na | viṣṇu̍nā |
ā | yā̱hi̱ | a̱gne̱ | a̱tri̱-vat | su̱te | raṇa̱ |
sa̱-jūḥ | ā̱di̱tyaiḥ | vasu̍-bhiḥ | sa̱-jūḥ | indre̍ṇa | vā̱yunā̍ |
ā | yā̱hi̱ | a̱gne̱ | a̱tri̱-vat | su̱te | raṇa̱ |
sva̱sti | na̱ḥ | mi̱mī̱tā̱m | a̱śvinā̍ | bhaga̍ḥ | sva̱sti | de̱vī | adi̍tiḥ | a̱na̱rvaṇa̍ḥ |
sva̱sti | pū̱ṣā | asu̍raḥ | da̱dhā̱tu̱ | na̱ḥ | sva̱sti | dyāvā̍pṛthi̱vī iti̍ | su̱-ce̱tunā̍ |
sva̱staye̍ | vā̱yum | upa̍ | bra̱vā̱ma̱hai̱ | soma̍m | sva̱sti | bhuva̍nasya | yaḥ | pati̍ḥ |
bṛha̱spati̍m | sarva̍-gaṇam | sva̱staye̍ | sva̱staye̍ | ā̱di̱tyāsa̍ḥ | bha̱va̱ntu̱ | na̱ḥ |
viśve̍ | de̱vāḥ | na̱ḥ | a̱dya | sva̱staye̍ | vai̱śvā̱na̱raḥ | vasu̍ḥ | a̱gniḥ | sva̱staye̍ |
de̱vāḥ | a̱va̱ntu̱ | ṛ̱bhava̍ḥ | sva̱staye̍ | sva̱sti | na̱ḥ | ru̱draḥ | pā̱tu̱ | aṁha̍saḥ |
sva̱sti | mi̱trā̱va̱ru̱ṇā̱ | sva̱sti | pa̱thye̱ | re̱va̱ti̱ |
sva̱sti | na̱ḥ | indra̍ḥ | ca̱ | a̱gniḥ | ca̱ | sva̱sti | na̱ḥ | a̱di̱te̱ | kṛ̱dhi̱ |
sva̱sti | panthā̍m | anu̍ | ca̱re̱ma̱ | sū̱ryā̱ca̱ndra̱masau̍-iva |
puna̍ḥ | dada̍tā | aghna̍tā | jā̱na̱tā | sam | ga̱me̱ma̱hi̱ |
pra | śyā̱va̱-a̱śva̱ | dhṛ̱ṣṇu̱-yā | arca̍ | ma̱rut-bhi̍ḥ | ṛkva̍-bhiḥ |
ye | a̱dro̱gham | a̱nu̱-sva̱dham | śrava̍ḥ | mada̍nti | ya̱jñiyā̍ḥ |
te | hi | sthi̱rasya̍ | śava̍saḥ | sakhā̍yaḥ | santi̍ | dhṛ̱ṣṇu̱-yā |
te | yāma̍n | ā | dhṛ̱ṣa̱t-vina̍ḥ | tmanā̍ | pā̱nti̱ | śaśva̍taḥ |
te | spa̱ndrāsa̍ḥ | na | u̱kṣaṇa̍ḥ | ati̍ | ska̱nda̱nti̱ | śarva̍rīḥ |
ma̱rutā̍m | adha̍ | maha̍ḥ | di̱vi | kṣa̱mā | ca̱ | ma̱nma̱he̱ |
ma̱rut-su̍ | va̱ḥ | da̱dhī̱ma̱hi̱ | stoma̍m | ya̱jñam | ca̱ | dhṛ̱ṣṇu̱-yā |
viśve̍ | ye | mānu̍ṣā | yu̱gā | pānti̍ | martya̍m | ri̱ṣaḥ |
arha̍ntaḥ | ye | su̱-dāna̍vaḥ | nara̍ḥ | asā̍mi-śavasaḥ |
pra | ya̱jñam | ya̱jñiye̍bhyaḥ | di̱vaḥ | a̱rca̱ | ma̱rut-bhya̍ḥ |
ā | ru̱kmaiḥ | ā | yu̱dhā | nara̍ḥ | ṛ̱ṣvāḥ | ṛ̱ṣṭīḥ | a̱sṛ̱kṣa̱ta̱ |
anu̍ | e̱nā̱n | aha̍ | vi̱-dyuta̍ḥ | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | jajjha̍tīḥ-iva | bhā̱nuḥ | a̱rta̱ | tmanā̍ | di̱vaḥ |
ye | va̱vṛ̱dhanta̍ | pārthi̍vāḥ | ye | u̱rau | a̱ntari̍kṣe | ā |
vṛ̱jane̍ | vā̱ | na̱dīnā̍m | sa̱dha-sthe̍ | vā̱ | ma̱haḥ | di̱vaḥ |
śardha̍ḥ | māru̍tam | ut | śa̱ṁsa̱ | sa̱tya-śa̍vasam | ṛbhva̍sam |
u̱ta | sma̱ | te | śu̱bhe | nara̍ḥ | pra | spa̱ndrāḥ | yu̱ja̱ta̱ | tmanā̍ |
u̱ta | sma̱ | te | paru̍ṣṇyām | ūrṇā̍ḥ | va̱sa̱ta̱ | śu̱ndhyava̍ḥ |
u̱ta | pa̱vyā | rathā̍nām | adri̍m | bhi̱nda̱nti̱ | oja̍sā |
āpa̍thayaḥ | vi-pa̍thayaḥ | anta̍ḥ-pathāḥ | anu̍-pathāḥ |
e̱tebhi̍ḥ | mahya̍m | nāma̍-bhiḥ | ya̱jñam | vi̱-stā̱raḥ | o̱ha̱te̱ |
adha̍ | nara̍ḥ | ni | o̱ha̱te̱ | adha̍ | ni̱-yuta̍ḥ | o̱ha̱te̱ |
adha̍ | pārā̍vatāḥ | iti̍ | ci̱trā | rū̱pāṇi̍ | darśyā̍ |
cha̱nda̱ḥ-stubha̍ḥ | ku̱bha̱nyava̍ḥ | utsa̍m | ā | kī̱riṇa̍ḥ | nṛ̱tu̱ḥ |
te | me̱ | ke | ci̱t | na | tā̱yava̍ḥ | ūmā̍ḥ | ā̱sa̱n | dṛ̱śi | tvi̱ṣe |
ye | ṛ̱ṣvāḥ | ṛ̱ṣṭi-vi̍dyutaḥ | ka̱vaya̍ḥ | santi̍ | ve̱dhasa̍ḥ |
tam | ṛ̱ṣe̱ | māru̍tam | ga̱ṇam | na̱ma̱sya | ra̱maya̍ | gi̱rā |
accha̍ | ṛ̱ṣe̱ | māru̍tam | ga̱ṇam | dā̱nā | mi̱tram | na | yo̱ṣaṇā̍ |
di̱vaḥ | vā̱ | dhṛ̱ṣṇa̱va̱ḥ | oja̍sā | stu̱tāḥ | dhī̱bhiḥ | i̱ṣa̱ṇya̱ta̱ |
nu | ma̱nvā̱naḥ | e̱ṣā̱m | de̱vān | accha̍ | na | va̱kṣaṇā̍ |
dā̱nā | sa̱ce̱ta̱ | sū̱ri-bhi̍ḥ | yāma̍-śrutebhiḥ | a̱ñji-bhi̍ḥ |
pra | ye | me̱ | ba̱ndhu̱-e̱ṣe | gām | voca̍nta | sū̱raya̍ḥ | pṛśni̍m | vo̱ca̱nta̱ | mā̱tara̍m |
adha̍ | pi̱tara̍m | i̱ṣmiṇa̍m | ru̱dram | vo̱ca̱nta̱ | śikva̍saḥ |
sa̱pta | me̱ | sa̱pta | śā̱kina̍ḥ | eka̍m-ekā | śa̱tā | da̱du̱ḥ |
ya̱munā̍yām | adhi̍ | śru̱tam | ut | rādha̍ḥ | gavya̍m | mṛ̱je̱ | ni | rādha̍ḥ | aśvya̍m | mṛ̱je̱ |
kaḥ | ve̱da̱ | jāna̍m | e̱ṣā̱m | kaḥ | vā̱ | pu̱rā | su̱mneṣu̍ | ā̱sa̱ | ma̱rutā̍m |
yat | yu̱yu̱jre | ki̱lā̱sya̍ḥ |
ā | e̱tān | rathe̍ṣu | ta̱sthuṣa̍ḥ | kaḥ | śu̱śrā̱va̱ | ka̱thā | ya̱yu̱ḥ |
kasmai̍ | sa̱sru̱ḥ | su̱-dāse̍ | anu̍ | ā̱paya̍ḥ | iḻā̍bhiḥ | vṛ̱ṣṭaya̍ḥ | sa̱ha |
te | me̱ | ā̱hu̱ḥ | ye | ā̱-ya̱yuḥ | upa̍ | dyu-bhi̍ḥ | vi-bhi̍ḥ | made̍ |
nara̍ḥ | maryā̍ḥ | a̱re̱pasa̍ḥ | i̱mān | paśya̍n | iti̍ | stu̱hi̱ |
ye | a̱ñjiṣu̍ | ye | vāśī̍ṣu | sva-bhā̍navaḥ | sra̱kṣu | ru̱kmeṣu̍ | khā̱diṣu̍ |
śrā̱yāḥ | rathe̍ṣu | dhanva̍-su |
yu̱ṣmāka̍m | sma̱ | rathā̍n | anu̍ | mu̱de | da̱dhe̱ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | jī̱ra̱-dā̱na̱va̱ḥ |
vṛ̱ṣṭī | dyāva̍ḥ | ya̱tīḥ-i̍va |
ā | yam | nara̍ḥ | su̱-dāna̍vaḥ | da̱dā̱śuṣe̍ | di̱vaḥ | kośa̍m | acu̍cyavuḥ |
vi | pa̱rjanya̍m | sṛ̱ja̱nti̱ | roda̍sī̱ iti̍ | anu̍ | dhanva̍nā | ya̱nti̱ | vṛ̱ṣṭaya̍ḥ |
ta̱tṛ̱dā̱nāḥ | sindha̍vaḥ | kṣoda̍sā | raja̍ḥ | pra | sa̱sru̱ḥ | dhe̱nava̍ḥ | ya̱thā̱ |
sya̱nnāḥ | aśvā̍ḥ-iva | adhva̍naḥ | vi̱-moca̍ne | vi | yat | varta̍nte | e̱nya̍ḥ |
ā | yā̱ta̱ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | di̱vaḥ | ā | a̱ntari̍kṣāt | a̱māt | u̱ta |
mā | ava̍ | sthā̱ta̱ | pa̱rā̱-vata̍ḥ |
mā | va̱ḥ | ra̱sā | ani̍tabhā | kubhā̍ | krumu̍ḥ | mā | va̱ḥ | sindhu̍ḥ | ni | rī̱ra̱ma̱t |
mā | va̱ḥ | pari̍ | sthā̱t | sa̱rayu̍ḥ | pu̱rī̱ṣiṇī̍ | a̱sme iti̍ | it | su̱mnam | a̱stu̱ | va̱ḥ |
tam | va̱ḥ | śardha̍m | rathā̍nām | tve̱ṣam | ga̱ṇam | māru̍tam | navya̍sīnām |
anu̍ | pra | ya̱nti̱ | vṛ̱ṣṭaya̍ḥ |
śardha̍m-śardham | va̱ḥ | e̱ṣā̱m | vrāta̍m-vrātam | ga̱ṇam-ga̍ṇam | su̱śa̱sti-bhi̍ḥ |
anu̍ | krā̱me̱ma̱ | dhī̱ti-bhi̍ḥ |
kasmai̍ | a̱dya | su-jā̍tāya | rā̱ta-ha̍vyāya | pra | ya̱yu̱ḥ |
e̱nā | yāme̍na | ma̱ruta̍ḥ |
yena̍ | to̱kāya̍ | tana̍yāya | dhā̱nya̍m | bīja̍m | vaha̍dhve | akṣi̍tam |
a̱smabhya̍m | tat | dha̱tta̱na̱ | yat | va̱ḥ | īma̍he | rādha̍ḥ | vi̱śva-ā̍yu | saubha̍gam |
ati̍ | i̱yā̱ma̱ | ni̱daḥ | ti̱raḥ | sva̱sti-bhi̍ḥ | hi̱tvā | a̱va̱dyam | arā̍tīḥ |
vṛ̱ṣṭvī | sam | yoḥ | āpa̍ḥ | u̱sri | bhe̱ṣa̱jam | syāma̍ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | sa̱ha |
su̱-de̱vaḥ | sa̱ma̱ha̱ | a̱sa̱ti̱ | su̱-vīra̍ḥ | na̱ra̱ḥ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | saḥ | martya̍ḥ |
yam | trāya̍dhve | syāma̍ | te |
stu̱hi | bho̱jān | stu̱va̱taḥ | a̱sya̱ | yāma̍ni | raṇa̍n | gāva̍ḥ | na | yava̍se |
ya̱taḥ | pūrvā̍n-iva | sakhī̍n | anu̍ | hva̱ya̱ | gi̱rā | gṛ̱ṇī̱hi̱ | kā̱mina̍ḥ |
pra | śardhā̍ya | māru̍tāya | sva-bhā̍nave | i̱mām | vāca̍m | a̱na̱ja̱ | pa̱rva̱ta̱-cyute̍ |
gha̱rma̱-stubhe̍ | di̱vaḥ | ā | pṛ̱ṣṭha̱-yajva̍ne | dyu̱mna-śra̍vase | mahi̍ | nṛ̱mṇam | a̱rca̱ta̱ |
pra | va̱ḥ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | ta̱vi̱ṣāḥ | u̱da̱nyava̍ḥ | va̱ya̱ḥ-vṛdha̍ḥ | a̱śva̱-yuja̍ḥ | pari̍-jrayaḥ |
sam | vi̱-dyutā̍ | dadha̍ti | vāśa̍ti | tri̱taḥ | svara̍nti | āpa̍ḥ | a̱vanā̍ | pari̍-jrayaḥ |
vi̱dyut-ma̍hasaḥ | nara̍ḥ | aśma̍-didyavaḥ | vāta̍-tviṣaḥ | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | pa̱rva̱ta̱-cyuta̍ḥ |
a̱bda̱-yā | ci̱t | muhu̍ḥ | ā | hrā̱du̱ni̱-vṛta̍ḥ | sta̱naya̍t-amāḥ | ra̱bha̱sāḥ | ut-o̍jasaḥ |
vi | a̱ktūn | ru̱drā̱ḥ | vi | ahā̍ni | śi̱kva̱sa̱ḥ | vi | a̱ntari̍kṣam | vi | rajā̍ṁsi | dhū̱ta̱ya̱ḥ |
vi | yat | ajrā̍n | aja̍tha | nāva̍ḥ | ī̱m | ya̱thā̱ | vi | du̱ḥ-gāni̍ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | na | aha̍ | ri̱ṣya̱tha̱ |
tat | vī̱rya̍m | va̱ḥ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | ma̱hi̱-tva̱nam | dī̱rgham | ta̱tā̱na̱ | sūrya̍ḥ | na | yoja̍nam |
etā̍ḥ | na | yāme̍ | agṛ̍bhīta-śociṣaḥ | ana̍śva-dām | yat | ni | ayā̍tana | gi̱rim |
abhrā̍ji | śardha̍ḥ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | yat | a̱rṇa̱sam | moṣa̍tha | vṛ̱kṣam | ka̱pa̱nā-i̍va | ve̱dha̱sa̱ḥ |
adha̍ | sma̱ | na̱ḥ | a̱rama̍tim | sa̱-jo̱ṣa̱sa̱ḥ | cakṣu̍ḥ-iva | yanta̍m | anu̍ | ne̱ṣa̱tha̱ | su̱-gam |
na | saḥ | jī̱ya̱te̱ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | na | ha̱nya̱te̱ | na | sre̱dha̱ti̱ | na | vya̱tha̱te̱ | na | ri̱ṣya̱ti̱ |
na | a̱sya̱ | rāya̍ḥ | upa̍ | da̱sya̱nti̱ | na | ū̱taya̍ḥ | ṛṣi̍m | vā̱ | yam | rājā̍nam | vā̱ | susū̍datha |
ni̱yutva̍ntaḥ | grā̱ma̱-jita̍ḥ | yathā̍ | nara̍ḥ | a̱rya̱maṇa̍ḥ | na | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | ka̱va̱ndhina̍ḥ |
pinva̍nti | utsa̍m | yat | i̱nāsa̍ḥ | asva̍ran | vi | u̱nda̱nti̱ | pṛ̱thi̱vīm | madhva̍ḥ | andha̍sā |
pra̱vatva̍tī | i̱yam | pṛ̱thi̱vī | ma̱rut-bhya̍ḥ | pra̱vatva̍tī | dyauḥ | bha̱va̱ti̱ | pra̱yat-bhya̍ḥ |
pra̱vatva̍tīḥ | pa̱thyā̍ḥ | a̱ntari̍kṣyāḥ | pra̱vatva̍ntaḥ | parva̍tāḥ | jī̱ra-dā̍navaḥ |
yat | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | sa̱-bha̱ra̱sa̱ḥ | sva̱ḥ-na̱ra̱ḥ | sūrye̍ | ut-i̍te | mada̍tha | di̱va̱ḥ | na̱ra̱ḥ |
na | va̱ḥ | aśvā̍ḥ | śra̱tha̱ya̱nta̱ | aha̍ | sisra̍taḥ | sa̱dyaḥ | a̱sya | adhva̍naḥ | pā̱ram | a̱śnu̱tha̱ |
aṁse̍ṣu | va̱ḥ | ṛ̱ṣṭaya̍ḥ | pa̱t-su | khā̱daya̍ḥ | vakṣa̍ḥ-su | ru̱kmāḥ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | rathe̍ | śubha̍ḥ |
a̱gni-bhrā̍jasaḥ | vi̱-dyuta̍ḥ | gabha̍styoḥ | śiprā̍ḥ | śī̱rṣa-su̍ | vi-ta̍tāḥ | hi̱ra̱ṇyayī̍ḥ |
tam | nāka̍m | a̱ryaḥ | agṛ̍bhīta-śociṣam | ruśa̍t | pippa̍lam | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | vi | dhū̱nu̱tha̱ |
sam | a̱cya̱nta̱ | vṛ̱janā̍ | ati̍tviṣanta | yat | svara̍nti | ghoṣa̍m | vi-ta̍tam | ṛ̱ta̱-yava̍ḥ |
yu̱ṣmā-da̍ttasya | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | vi̱-ce̱ta̱sa̱ḥ | rā̱yaḥ | syā̱ma̱ | ra̱thya̍ḥ | vaya̍svataḥ |
na | yaḥ | yuccha̍ti | ti̱ṣya̍ḥ | yathā̍ | di̱vaḥ | a̱sme iti̍ | ra̱ra̱nta̱ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | sa̱ha̱sriṇa̍m |
yū̱yam | ra̱yim | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | spā̱rha-vī̍ram | yū̱yam | ṛṣi̍m | a̱va̱tha̱ | sāma̍-vipram |
yū̱yam | arva̍ntam | bha̱ra̱tāya̍ | vāja̍m | yū̱yam | dha̱ttha̱ | rājā̍nam | śru̱ṣṭi̱-manta̍m |
tat | va̱ḥ | yā̱mi̱ | dravi̍ṇam | sa̱dya̱ḥ-ū̱ta̱ya̱ḥ | yena̍ | sva̍ḥ | na | ta̱tanā̍ma | nṝn | a̱bhi |
i̱dam | su | me̱ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | ha̱rya̱ta̱ | vaca̍ḥ | yasya̍ | tare̍ma | tara̍sā | śa̱tam | himā̍ḥ |
pra-ya̍jyavaḥ | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | bhrāja̍t-ṛṣṭayaḥ | bṛ̱hat | vaya̍ḥ | da̱dhi̱re̱ | ru̱kma-va̍kṣasaḥ |
īya̍nte | aśvai̍ḥ | su̱-yame̍bhiḥ | ā̱śu-bhi̍ḥ | śubha̍m | yā̱tām | anu̍ | rathā̍ḥ | a̱vṛ̱tsa̱ta̱ |
sva̱yam | da̱dhi̱dhve̱ | tavi̍ṣīm | yathā̍ | vi̱da | bṛ̱hat | ma̱hā̱nta̱ḥ | u̱rvi̱yā | vi | rā̱ja̱tha̱ |
u̱ta | a̱ntari̍kṣam | ma̱mi̱re̱ | vi | oja̍sā | śubha̍m | yā̱tām | anu̍ | rathā̍ḥ | a̱vṛ̱tsa̱ta̱ |
sā̱kam | jā̱tāḥ | su̱-bhva̍ḥ | sā̱kam | u̱kṣi̱tāḥ | śri̱ye | ci̱t | ā | pra̱-ta̱ram | va̱vṛ̱dhu̱ḥ | nara̍ḥ |
vi̱-ro̱kiṇa̍ḥ | sūrya̍sya-iva | ra̱śmaya̍ḥ | śubha̍m | yā̱tām | anu̍ | rathā̍ḥ | a̱vṛ̱tsa̱ta̱ |
ā̱-bhū̱ṣeṇya̍m | va̱ḥ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | ma̱hi̱-tva̱nam | di̱dṛ̱kṣeṇya̍m | sūrya̍sya-iva | cakṣa̍ṇam |
u̱to iti̍ | a̱smān | a̱mṛ̱ta̱-tve | da̱dhā̱ta̱na̱ | śubha̍m | yā̱tām | anu̍ | rathā̍ḥ | a̱vṛ̱tsa̱ta̱ |
ut | ī̱ra̱ya̱tha̱ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | sa̱mu̱dra̱taḥ | yū̱yam | vṛ̱ṣṭim | va̱rṣa̱ya̱tha̱ | pu̱rī̱ṣi̱ṇa̱ḥ |
na | va̱ḥ | da̱srā̱ | upa̍ | da̱sya̱nti̱ | dhe̱nava̍ḥ | śubha̍m | yā̱tām | anu̍ | rathā̍ḥ | a̱vṛ̱tsa̱ta̱ |
yat | aśvā̍n | dhū̱ḥ-su | pṛṣa̍tīḥ | ayu̍gdhvam | hi̱ra̱ṇyayā̍n | prati̍ | atkā̍n | amu̍gdhvam |
viśvā̍ḥ | it | spṛdha̍ḥ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | vi | a̱sya̱tha̱ | śubha̍m | yā̱tām | anu̍ | rathā̍ḥ | a̱vṛ̱tsa̱ta̱ |
na | parva̍tāḥ | na | na̱dya̍ḥ | va̱ra̱nta̱ | va̱ḥ | yatra̍ | aci̍dhvam | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | gaccha̍tha | it | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | tat |
u̱ta | dyāvā̍pṛthi̱vī iti̍ | yā̱tha̱na̱ | pari̍ | śubha̍m | yā̱tām | anu̍ | rathā̍ḥ | a̱vṛ̱tsa̱ta̱ |
yat | pū̱rvyam | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | yat | ca̱ | nūta̍nam | yat | u̱dyate̍ | va̱sa̱va̱ḥ | yat | ca̱ | śa̱syate̍ |
viśva̍sya | tasya̍ | bha̱va̱tha̱ | nave̍dasaḥ | śubha̍m | yā̱tām | anu̍ | rathā̍ḥ | a̱vṛ̱tsa̱ta̱ |
mṛ̱ḻata̍ | na̱ḥ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | mā | va̱dhi̱ṣṭa̱na̱ | a̱smabhya̍m | śarma̍ | ba̱hu̱lam | vi | ya̱nta̱na̱ |
adhi̍ | sto̱trasya̍ | sa̱khyasya̍ | gā̱ta̱na̱ | śubha̍m | yā̱tām | anu̍ | rathā̍ḥ | a̱vṛ̱tsa̱ta̱ |
yū̱yam | a̱smān | na̱ya̱ta̱ | vasya̍ḥ | accha̍ | niḥ | a̱ṁha̱ti-bhya̍ḥ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | gṛ̱ṇā̱nāḥ |
ju̱ṣadhva̍m | na̱ḥ | ha̱vya-dā̍tim | ya̱ja̱trā̱ḥ | va̱yam | syā̱ma̱ | pata̍yaḥ | ra̱yī̱ṇām |
agne̍ | śardha̍ntam | ā | ga̱ṇam | pi̱ṣṭam | ru̱kmebhi̍ḥ | a̱ñji-bhi̍ḥ |
viśa̍ḥ | a̱dya | ma̱rutā̍m | ava̍ | hva̱ye̱ | di̱vaḥ | ci̱t | ro̱ca̱nāt | adhi̍ |
yathā̍ | ci̱t | manya̍se | hṛ̱dā | tat | it | me̱ | ja̱gmu̱ḥ | ā̱-śasa̍ḥ |
ye | te̱ | nedi̍ṣṭham | hava̍nāni | ā̱-gama̍n | tān | va̱rdha̱ | bhī̱ma-sa̍ṁdṛśaḥ |
mī̱ḻhuṣma̍tī-iva | pṛ̱thi̱vī | parā̍-hatā | mada̍ntī | e̱ti̱ | a̱smat | ā |
ṛkṣa̍ḥ | na | va̱ḥ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | śimī̍-vān | ama̍ḥ | du̱dhraḥ | gauḥ-i̍va | bhī̱ma̱-yuḥ |
ni | ye | ri̱ṇanti̍ | oja̍sā | vṛthā̍ | gāva̍ḥ | na | du̱ḥ-dhura̍ḥ |
aśmā̍nam | ci̱t | sva̱rya̍m | parva̍tam | gi̱rim | pra | cya̱va̱ya̱nti̱ | yāma̍-bhiḥ |
ut | ti̱ṣṭha̱ | nū̱nam | e̱ṣā̱m | stomai̍ḥ | sam-u̍kṣitānām |
ma̱rutā̍m | pu̱ru̱-tama̍m | apū̍rvyam | gavā̍m | sarga̍m-iva | hva̱ye̱ |
yu̱ṅgdhvam | hi | aru̍ṣīḥ | rathe̍ | yu̱ṅgdhvam | rathe̍ṣu | ro̱hita̍ḥ |
yu̱ṅgdhvam | harī̱ iti̍ | a̱ji̱rā | dhu̱ri | voḻha̍ve | vahi̍ṣṭhā | dhu̱ri | voḻha̍ve |
u̱ta | syaḥ | vā̱jī | a̱ru̱ṣaḥ | tu̱vi̱-svaṇi̍ḥ | i̱ha | sma̱ | dhā̱yi̱ | da̱rśa̱taḥ |
mā | va̱ḥ | yāme̍ṣu | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | ci̱ram | ka̱ra̱t | pra | tam | rathe̍ṣu | co̱da̱ta̱ |
ratha̍m | nu | māru̍tam | va̱yam | śra̱va̱syum | ā | hu̱vā̱ma̱he̱ |
ā | yasmi̍n | ta̱sthau | su̱-raṇā̍ni | bibhra̍tī | sacā̍ | ma̱rut-su̍ | ro̱da̱sī |
tam | va̱ḥ | śardha̍m | ra̱the̱-śubha̍m | tve̱ṣam | pa̱na̱syum | ā | hu̱ve̱ |
yasmi̍n | su-jā̍tā | su̱-bhagā̍ | ma̱hī̱yate̍ | sacā̍ | ma̱rut-su̍ | mī̱ḻhu̱ṣī |
ā | ru̱drā̱sa̱ḥ | indra̍-vantaḥ | sa̱-joṣa̍saḥ | hira̍ṇya-rathāḥ | su̱vi̱tāya̍ | ga̱nta̱na̱ |
i̱yam | va̱ḥ | a̱smat | prati̍ | ha̱rya̱te̱ | ma̱tiḥ | tṛ̱ṣṇa-je̍ | na | di̱vaḥ | utsā̍ḥ | u̱da̱nyave̍ |
vāśī̍-mantaḥ | ṛ̱ṣṭi̱-manta̍ḥ | ma̱nī̱ṣiṇa̍ḥ | su̱-dhanvā̍naḥ | iṣu̍-mantaḥ | ni̱ṣa̱ṅgiṇa̍ḥ |
su̱-aśvā̍ḥ | stha̱ | su̱-rathā̍ḥ | pṛ̱śni̱-mā̱ta̱ra̱ḥ | su̱-ā̱yu̱dhāḥ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | yā̱tha̱na̱ | śubha̍m |
dhū̱nu̱tha | dyām | parva̍tān | dā̱śuṣe̍ | vasu̍ | ni | va̱ḥ | vanā̍ | ji̱ha̱te̱ | yāma̍naḥ | bhi̱yā |
ko̱paya̍tha | pṛ̱thi̱vīm | pṛ̱śni̱-mā̱ta̱ra̱ḥ | śu̱bhe | yat | u̱grā̱ḥ | pṛṣa̍tīḥ | ayu̍gdhvam |
vāta̍-tviṣaḥ | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | va̱rṣa-ni̍rnijaḥ | ya̱māḥ-i̍va | su-sa̍dṛśaḥ | su̱-peśa̍saḥ |
pi̱śaṅga̍-aśvāḥ | a̱ru̱ṇa-a̍śvāḥ | a̱re̱pasa̍ḥ | pra-tva̍kṣasaḥ | ma̱hi̱nā | dyauḥ-i̍va | u̱rava̍ḥ |
pu̱ru̱-dra̱psāḥ | a̱ñji̱-manta̍ḥ | su̱-dāna̍vaḥ | tve̱ṣa-sa̍ṁdṛśaḥ | a̱na̱va̱bhra-rā̍dhasaḥ |
su̱-jā̱tāsa̍ḥ | ja̱nuṣā̍ | ru̱kma-va̍kṣasaḥ | di̱vaḥ | a̱rkāḥ | a̱mṛta̍m | nāma̍ | bhe̱ji̱re̱ |
ṛ̱ṣṭaya̍ḥ | va̱ḥ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | aṁsa̍yoḥ | adhi̍ | saha̍ḥ | oja̍ḥ | bā̱hvoḥ | va̱ḥ | bala̍m | hi̱tam |
nṛ̱mṇā | śī̱rṣa-su̍ | āyu̍dhā | rathe̍ṣu | va̱ḥ | viśvā̍ | va̱ḥ | śrīḥ | adhi̍ | ta̱nūṣu̍ | pi̱pi̱śe̱ |
go-ma̍t | aśva̍-vat | ratha̍-vat | su̱-vīra̍m | ca̱ndra-va̍t | rādha̍ḥ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | da̱da̱ | na̱ḥ |
pra-śa̍stim | na̱ḥ | kṛ̱ṇu̱ta̱ | ru̱dri̱yā̱sa̱ḥ | bha̱kṣī̱ya | va̱ḥ | ava̍saḥ | daivya̍sya |
