u̱roḥ | varī̍yaḥ | varu̍ṇaḥ | te̱ | kṛ̱ṇo̱tu̱ | jaya̍ntam | tvā̱ | anu̍ | de̱vāḥ | ma̱da̱ntu̱ |
yaḥ | na̱ḥ | svaḥ | ara̍ṇaḥ | yaḥ | ca̱ | niṣṭya̍ḥ | jighā̍ṁsati |
de̱vāḥ | tam | sarve̍ | dhū̱rva̱ntu̱ | brahma̍ | varma̍ | mama̍ | anta̍ram |
a̱gnim | nara̍ḥ | dīdhi̍ti-bhiḥ | a̱raṇyo̍ḥ | hasta̍-cyutī | ja̱na̱ya̱nta̱ | pra̱-śa̱stam |
dū̱re̱-dṛśa̍m | gṛ̱ha-pa̍tim | a̱tha̱ryum |
tam | a̱gnim | aste̍ | vasa̍vaḥ | ni | ṛ̱ṇva̱n | su̱-pra̱ti̱cakṣa̍m | ava̍se | kuta̍ḥ | ci̱t |
da̱kṣāyya̍ḥ | yaḥ | dame̍ | āsa̍ | nitya̍ḥ |
pra-i̍ddhaḥ | a̱gne̱ | dī̱di̱hi̱ | pu̱raḥ | na̱ḥ | aja̍srayā | sū̱rmyā̍ | ya̱vi̱ṣṭha̱ |
tvām | śaśva̍ntaḥ | upa̍ | ya̱nti̱ | vājā̍ḥ |
pra | te | a̱gnaya̍ḥ | a̱gni-bhya̍ḥ | vara̍m | niḥ | su̱-vīrā̍saḥ | śo̱śu̱ca̱nta̱ | dyu̱-manta̍ḥ |
yatra̍ | nara̍ḥ | sa̱m-āsa̍te | su̱-jā̱tāḥ |
dāḥ | na̱ḥ | a̱gne̱ | dhi̱yā | ra̱yim | su̱-vīra̍m | su̱-a̱pa̱tyam | sa̱ha̱sya̱ | pra̱-śa̱stam |
na | yam | yāvā̍ | tara̍ti | yā̱tu̱-māvā̍n |
upa̍ | yam | eti̍ | yu̱va̱tiḥ | su̱-dakṣa̍m | do̱ṣā | vasto̍ḥ | ha̱viṣma̍tī | ghṛ̱tācī̍ |
upa̍ | svā | e̱na̱m | a̱rama̍tiḥ | va̱su̱-yuḥ |
viśvā̍ḥ | a̱gne̱ | apa̍ | da̱ha̱ | arā̍tīḥ | yebhi̍ḥ | tapa̍ḥ-bhiḥ | ada̍haḥ | jarū̍tham |
pra | ni̱-sva̱ram | cā̱ta̱ya̱sva̱ | amī̍vām |
ā | yaḥ | te̱ | a̱gne̱ | i̱dha̱te | anī̍kam | vasi̍ṣṭha | śukra̍ | dīdi̍-vaḥ | pāva̍ka |
u̱to iti̍ | na̱ḥ | e̱bhiḥ | sta̱vathai̍ḥ | i̱ha | syā̱ḥ |
vi | ye | te̱ | a̱gne̱ | bhe̱ji̱re | anī̍kam | martā̍ḥ | nara̍ḥ | pitryā̍saḥ | pu̱ru̱-trā |
u̱to iti̍ | na̱ḥ | e̱bhiḥ | su̱-manā̍ḥ | i̱ha | syā̱ḥ |
i̱me | nara̍ḥ | vṛ̱tra̱-hatye̍ṣu | śūrā̍ḥ | viśvā̍ḥ | ade̍vīḥ | a̱bhi | sa̱ntu̱ | mā̱yāḥ |
ye | me̱ | dhiya̍m | pa̱naya̍nta | pra̱-śa̱stām |
mā | śūne̍ | a̱gne̱ | ni | sa̱dā̱ma̱ | nṛ̱ṇām | mā | a̱śeṣa̍saḥ | a̱vīra̍tā | pari̍ | tvā̱ |
pra̱jā-va̍tīṣu | duryā̍su | du̱rya̱ |
yam | a̱śvī | nitya̍m | u̱pa̱-yāti̍ | ya̱jñam | pra̱jā-va̍ntam | su̱-a̱pa̱tyam | kṣaya̍m | na̱ḥ |
sva-ja̍nmanā | śeṣa̍sā | va̱vṛ̱dhā̱nam |
pā̱hi | na̱ḥ | a̱gne̱ | ra̱kṣasa̍ḥ | aju̍ṣṭāt | pā̱hi | dhū̱rteḥ | ara̍ruṣaḥ | a̱gha̱-yoḥ |
tvā | yu̱jā | pṛ̱ta̱nā̱-yūn | a̱bhi | syā̱m |
saḥ | it | a̱gniḥ | a̱gnīn | ati̍ | a̱stu̱ | a̱nyān | yatra̍ | vā̱jī | tana̍yaḥ | vī̱ḻu-pā̍ṇiḥ |
sa̱hasra̍-pāthāḥ | a̱kṣarā̍ | sa̱m-eti̍ |
saḥ | it | a̱gniḥ | yaḥ | va̱nu̱ṣya̱taḥ | ni̱-pāti̍ | sa̱m-e̱ddhāra̍m | aṁha̍saḥ | u̱ru̱ṣyāt |
su̱-jā̱tāsa̍ḥ | pari̍ | ca̱ra̱nti̱ | vī̱rāḥ |
a̱yam | saḥ | a̱gniḥ | ā-hu̍taḥ | pu̱ru̱-trā | yam | īśā̍naḥ | sam | it | i̱ndhe | ha̱viṣmā̍n |
pari̍ | yam | eti̍ | a̱dhva̱reṣu̍ | hotā̍ |
tve iti̍ | a̱gne̱ | ā̱-hava̍nāni | bhūri̍ | ī̱śā̱nāsa̍ḥ | ā | ju̱hu̱yā̱ma̱ | nityā̍ |
u̱bhā | kṛ̱ṇvanta̍ḥ | va̱ha̱tū iti̍ | mi̱yedhe̍ |
i̱mo iti̍ | a̱gne̱ | vī̱ta-ta̍māni | ha̱vyā | aja̍sraḥ | va̱kṣi̱ | de̱va-tā̍tim | iccha̍ |
prati̍ | na̱ḥ | ī̱m | su̱ra̱bhīṇi̍ | vya̱ntu̱ |
mā | na̱ḥ | a̱gne̱ | a̱vīra̍te | parā̍ | dāḥ | du̱ḥ-vāsa̍se | ama̍taye | mā | na̱ḥ | a̱syai |
mā | na̱ḥ | kṣu̱dhe | mā | ra̱kṣase̍ | ṛ̱ta̱-va̱ḥ | mā | na̱ḥ | dame̍ | mā | vane̍ | ā | ju̱hū̱rthā̱ḥ |
nu | me̱ | brahmā̍ṇi | a̱gne̱ | ut | śa̱śā̱dhi̱ | tvam | de̱va̱ | ma̱ghava̍t-bhyaḥ | su̱sū̱da̱ḥ |
rā̱tau | syā̱ma̱ | u̱bhayā̍saḥ | ā | te̱ | yū̱yam | pā̱ta̱ | sva̱sti-bhi̍ḥ | sadā̍ | na̱ḥ |
tvam | a̱gne̱ | su̱-hava̍ḥ | ra̱ṇva-sa̍ṁdṛk | su̱-dī̱tī | sū̱no̱ iti̍ | sa̱ha̱sa̱ḥ | di̱dī̱hi̱ |
mā | tve iti̍ | sacā̍ | tana̍ye | nitye̍ | ā | dha̱k | mā | vī̱raḥ | a̱smat | narya̍ḥ | vi | dā̱sī̱t |
mā | na̱ḥ | a̱gne̱ | du̱ḥ-bhṛ̱taye̍ | sacā̍ | e̱ṣu | de̱va-i̍ddheṣu | a̱gniṣu̍ | pra | vo̱ca̱ḥ |
mā | te̱ | a̱smān | du̱ḥ-ma̱taya̍ḥ | bhṛ̱māt | ci̱t | de̱vasya̍ | sū̱no̱ iti̍ | sa̱ha̱sa̱ḥ | na̱śa̱nta̱ |
saḥ | marta̍ḥ | a̱gne̱ | su̱-a̱nī̱ka̱ | re̱vān | ama̍rtye | yaḥ | ā̱-ju̱hoti̍ | ha̱vyam |
saḥ | de̱vatā̍ | va̱su̱-vani̍m | da̱dhā̱ti̱ | yam | sū̱riḥ | a̱rthī | pṛ̱cchamā̍naḥ | eti̍ |
ma̱haḥ | na̱ḥ | a̱gne̱ | su̱vi̱tasya̍ | vi̱dvān | ra̱yim | sū̱ri-bhya̍ḥ | ā | va̱ha̱ | bṛ̱hanta̍m |
yena̍ | va̱yam | sa̱ha̱sā̱-va̱n | made̍ma | avi̍-kṣitāsaḥ | āyu̍ṣā | su̱-vīrā̍ḥ |
nu | me̱ | brahmā̍ṇi | a̱gne̱ | ut | śa̱śā̱dhi̱ | tvam | de̱va̱ | ma̱ghava̍t-bhyaḥ | su̱sū̱da̱ḥ |
rā̱tau | syā̱ma̱ | u̱bhayā̍saḥ | ā | te̱ | yū̱yam | pā̱ta̱ | sva̱sti-bhi̍ḥ | sadā̍ | na̱ḥ |
ju̱ṣasva̍ | na̱ḥ | sa̱m-idha̍m | a̱gne̱ | a̱dya | śoca̍ | bṛ̱hat | ya̱ja̱tam | dhū̱mam | ṛ̱ṇvan |
upa̍ | spṛ̱śa̱ | di̱vyam | sānu̍ | stūpai̍ḥ | sam | ra̱śmi-bhi̍ḥ | ta̱ta̱na̱ḥ | sūrya̍sya |
narā̱śaṁsa̍sya | ma̱hi̱māna̍m | e̱ṣā̱m | upa̍ | sto̱ṣā̱ma̱ | ya̱ja̱tasya̍ | ya̱jñaiḥ |
ye | su̱-krata̍vaḥ | śuca̍yaḥ | dhi̱ya̱m-dhāḥ | svada̍nti | de̱vāḥ | u̱bhayā̍ni | ha̱vyā |
ī̱ḻenya̍m | va̱ḥ | asu̍ram | su̱-dakṣa̍m | a̱ntaḥ | dū̱tam | roda̍sī̱ iti̍ | sa̱tya̱-vāca̍m |
ma̱nu̱ṣvat | a̱gnim | manu̍nā | sam-i̍ddham | sam | a̱dhva̱rāya̍ | sada̍m | it | ma̱he̱ma̱ |
sa̱pa̱ryava̍ḥ | bhara̍māṇāḥ | a̱bhi̱-jñu | pra | vṛ̱ñja̱te̱ | nama̍sā | ba̱rhiḥ | a̱gnau |
ā̱-juhvā̍nāḥ | ghṛ̱ta-pṛ̍ṣṭham | pṛṣa̍t-vat | adhva̍ryavaḥ | ha̱viṣā̍ | ma̱rja̱ya̱dhva̱m |
su̱-ā̱dhya̍ḥ | vi | dura̍ḥ | de̱va̱-yanta̍ḥ | aśi̍śrayuḥ | ra̱tha̱-yuḥ | de̱va-tā̍tā |
pū̱rvī iti̍ | śiśu̍m | na | mā̱tarā̍ | ri̱hā̱ṇe iti̍ | sam | a̱gruva̍ḥ | na | sama̍neṣu | a̱ñja̱n |
u̱ta | yoṣa̍ṇe̱ iti̍ | di̱vye iti̍ | ma̱hī iti̍ | na̱ḥ | u̱ṣasā̱naktā̍ | su̱dughā̍-iva | dhe̱nuḥ |
ba̱rhi̱-sadā̍ | pu̱ru̱hū̱te iti̍ pu̱ru̱-hū̱te | ma̱ghonī̱ iti̍ | ā | ya̱jñiye̱ iti̍ | su̱vi̱tāya̍ | śra̱ye̱tā̱m |
viprā̍ | ya̱jñeṣu̍ | mānu̍ṣeṣu | kā̱rū iti̍ | manye̍ | vā̱m | jā̱ta-ve̍dasā | yaja̍dhyai |
ū̱rdhvam | na̱ḥ | a̱dhva̱ram | kṛ̱ta̱m | have̍ṣu | tā | de̱veṣu̍ | va̱na̱tha̱ḥ | vāryā̍ṇi |
ā | bhāra̍tī | bhāra̍tībhiḥ | sa̱-joṣā̍ḥ | iḻā̍ | de̱vaiḥ | ma̱nu̱ṣye̍bhiḥ | a̱gniḥ |
sara̍svatī | sā̱ra̱sva̱tebhi̍ḥ | a̱rvāk | ti̱sraḥ | de̱vīḥ | ba̱rhiḥ | ā | i̱dam | sa̱da̱ntu̱ |
tat | na̱ḥ | tu̱rīpa̍m | adha̍ | po̱ṣa̱yi̱tnu | deva̍ | tva̱ṣṭa̱ḥ | vi | ra̱rā̱ṇaḥ | sya̱sveti̍ syasva |
yata̍ḥ | vī̱raḥ | ka̱rma̱ṇya̍ḥ | su̱-dakṣa̍ḥ | yu̱kta-grā̍vā | jāya̍te | de̱va-kā̍maḥ |
vana̍spate | ava̍ | sṛ̱ja̱ | upa̍ | de̱vān | a̱gniḥ | ha̱viḥ | śa̱mi̱tā | sū̱da̱yā̱ti̱ |
saḥ | it | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | hotā̍ | sa̱tya-ta̍raḥ | ya̱jā̱ti̱ | yathā̍ | de̱vānā̍m | jani̍māni | veda̍ |
ā | yā̱hi̱ | a̱gne̱ | sa̱m-i̱dhā̱naḥ | a̱rvāṅ | indre̍ṇa | de̱vaiḥ | sa̱-ratha̍m | tu̱rebhi̍ḥ |
ba̱rhiḥ | na̱ḥ | āstā̍m | adi̍tiḥ | su̱-pu̱trā | svāhā̍ | de̱vāḥ | a̱mṛtā̍ḥ | mā̱da̱ya̱ntā̱m |
a̱gnim | va̱ḥ | de̱vam | a̱gni-bhi̍ḥ | sa̱-joṣā̍ḥ | yaji̍ṣṭham | dū̱tam | a̱dhva̱re | kṛ̱ṇu̱dhva̱m |
yaḥ | martye̍ṣu | ni-dhru̍viḥ | ṛ̱ta-vā̍ | tapu̍ḥ-mūrdhā | ghṛ̱ta-a̍nnaḥ | pā̱va̱kaḥ |
protha̍t | aśva̍ḥ | na | yava̍se | a̱vi̱ṣyan | ya̱dā | ma̱haḥ | sa̱m-vara̍ṇāt | vi | asthā̍t |
āt | a̱sya̱ | vāta̍ḥ | anu̍ | vā̱ti̱ | śo̱ciḥ | adha̍ | sma̱ | te̱ | vraja̍nam | kṛ̱ṣṇam | a̱sti̱ |
ut | yasya̍ | te̱ | nava̍-jātasya | vṛṣṇa̍ḥ | agne̍ | cara̍nti | a̱jarā̍ḥ | i̱dhā̱nāḥ |
accha̍ | dyām | a̱ru̱ṣaḥ | dhū̱maḥ | e̱ti̱ | sam | dū̱taḥ | a̱gne̱ | īya̍se | hi | de̱vān |
vi | yasya̍ | te̱ | pṛ̱thi̱vyām | pāja̍ḥ | aśre̍t | tṛ̱ṣu | yat | annā̍ | sa̱m-avṛ̍kta | jambhai̍ḥ |
senā̍-iva | sṛ̱ṣṭā | pra-si̍tiḥ | te̱ | e̱ti̱ | yava̍m | na | da̱sma̱ | ju̱hvā̍ | vi̱ve̱kṣi̱ |
tam | it | do̱ṣā | tam | u̱ṣasi̍ | yavi̍ṣṭham | a̱gnim | atya̍m | na | ma̱rja̱ya̱nta̱ | nara̍ḥ |
ni̱-śiśā̍nāḥ | ati̍thim | a̱sya̱ | yonau̍ | dī̱dāya̍ | śo̱ciḥ | ā-hu̍tasya | vṛṣṇa̍ḥ |
su̱-sa̱ṁdṛk | te̱ | su̱-a̱nī̱ka̱ | pratī̍kam | vi | yat | ru̱kmaḥ | na | roca̍se | u̱pā̱ke |
di̱vaḥ | na | te̱ | ta̱nya̱tuḥ | e̱ti̱ | śuṣma̍ḥ | ci̱traḥ | na | sūra̍ḥ | prati̍ | ca̱kṣi̱ | bhā̱num |
yathā̍ | va̱ḥ | svāhā̍ | a̱gnaye̍ | dāśe̍ma | pari̍ | iḻā̍bhiḥ | ghṛ̱tava̍t-bhiḥ | ca̱ | ha̱vyaiḥ |
tebhi̍ḥ | na̱ḥ | a̱gne̱ | ami̍taiḥ | maha̍ḥ-bhiḥ | śa̱tam | pū̱ḥ-bhiḥ | āya̍sībhiḥ | ni | pā̱hi̱ |
yāḥ | vā̱ | te̱ | santi̍ | dā̱śuṣe̍ | adhṛ̍ṣṭāḥ | gira̍ḥ | vā̱ | yābhi̍ḥ | nṛ̱-vatī̍ḥ | u̱ru̱ṣyāḥ |
tābhi̍ḥ | na̱ḥ | sū̱no̱ iti̍ | sa̱ha̱sa̱ḥ | ni | pā̱hi̱ | smat | sū̱rīn | ja̱ri̱tṝn | jā̱ta̱-ve̱da̱ḥ |
niḥ | yat | pū̱tā-i̍va | sva-dhi̍tiḥ | śuci̍ḥ | gāt | svayā̍ | kṛ̱pā | ta̱nvā̍ | roca̍mānaḥ |
ā | yaḥ | mā̱troḥ | u̱śenya̍ḥ | jani̍ṣṭa | de̱va̱-yajyā̍ya | su̱-kratu̍ḥ | pā̱va̱kaḥ |
e̱tā | na̱ḥ | a̱gne̱ | saubha̍gā | di̱dī̱hi̱ | api̍ | kratu̍m | su̱-ceta̍sam | va̱te̱ma̱ |
viśvā̍ | sto̱tṛ-bhya̍ḥ | gṛ̱ṇa̱te | ca̱ | sa̱ntu̱ | yū̱yam | pā̱ta̱ | sva̱sti-bhi̍ḥ | sadā̍ | na̱ḥ |
pra | va̱ḥ | śu̱krāya̍ | bhā̱nave̍ | bha̱ra̱dhva̱m | ha̱vyam | ma̱tim | ca̱ | a̱gnaye̍ | su-pū̍tam |
yaḥ | daivyā̍ni | mānu̍ṣā | ja̱nūṁṣi̍ | a̱ntaḥ | viśvā̍ni | vi̱dmanā̍ | jigā̍ti |
saḥ | gṛtsa̍ḥ | a̱gniḥ | taru̍ṇaḥ | ci̱t | a̱stu̱ | yata̍ḥ | yavi̍ṣṭhaḥ | aja̍niṣṭa | mā̱tuḥ |
sam | yaḥ | vanā̍ | yu̱vate̍ | śuci̍-dan | bhūri̍ | ci̱t | annā̍ | sam | it | a̱tti̱ | sa̱dyaḥ |
a̱sya | de̱vasya̍ | sa̱m-sadi̍ | anī̍ke | yam | martā̍saḥ | śye̱tam | ja̱gṛ̱bhre |
ni | yaḥ | gṛbha̍m | pauru̍ṣeyīm | u̱voca̍ | du̱ḥ-oka̍m | a̱gniḥ | ā̱yave̍ | śu̱śo̱ca̱ |
a̱yam | ka̱viḥ | aka̍viṣu | pra-ce̍tāḥ | marte̍ṣu | a̱gniḥ | a̱mṛta̍ḥ | ni | dhā̱yi̱ |
saḥ | mā | na̱ḥ | atra̍ | ju̱hu̱ra̱ḥ | sa̱ha̱sva̱ḥ | sadā̍ | tve iti̍ | su̱-mana̍saḥ | syā̱ma̱ |
ā | yaḥ | yoni̍m | de̱va-kṛ̍tam | sa̱sāda̍ | kratvā̍ | hi | a̱gniḥ | a̱mṛtā̍n | atā̍rīt |
tam | oṣa̍dhīḥ | ca̱ | va̱nina̍ḥ | ca̱ | garbha̍m | bhūmi̍ḥ | ca̱ | vi̱śva-dhā̍yasam | bi̱bha̱rti̱ |
īśe̍ | hi | a̱gniḥ | a̱mṛta̍sya | bhūre̍ḥ | īśe̍ | rā̱yaḥ | su̱-vīrya̍sya | dāto̍ḥ |
mā | tvā̱ | va̱yam | sa̱ha̱sā̱-va̱n | a̱vīrā̍ḥ | mā | apsa̍vaḥ | pari̍ | sa̱dā̱ma̱ | mā | adu̍vaḥ |
pa̱ri̱-sadya̍m | hi | ara̍ṇasya | rekṇa̍ḥ | nitya̍sya | rā̱yaḥ | pata̍yaḥ | syā̱ma̱ |
na | śeṣa̍ḥ | a̱gne̱ | a̱nya-jā̍tam | a̱sti̱ | ace̍tānasya | mā | pa̱thaḥ | vi | du̱kṣa̱ḥ |
na̱hi | grabhā̍ya | ara̍ṇaḥ | su̱-śeva̍ḥ | a̱nya-u̍daryaḥ | mana̍sā | manta̱vai | ū̱m̐ iti̍ |
adha̍ | ci̱t | oka̍ḥ | puna̍ḥ | it | saḥ | e̱ti̱ | ā | na̱ḥ | vā̱jī | a̱bhī̱ṣāṭ | e̱tu̱ | navya̍ḥ |
tvam | a̱gne̱ | va̱nu̱ṣya̱taḥ | ni | pā̱hi̱ | tvam | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | na̱ḥ | sa̱ha̱sā̱-va̱n | a̱va̱dyāt |
sam | tvā̱ | dhva̱sma̱n-vat | a̱bhi | e̱tu̱ | pātha̍ḥ | sam | ra̱yiḥ | spṛ̱ha̱yāyya̍ḥ | sa̱ha̱srī |
e̱tā | na̱ḥ | a̱gne̱ | saubha̍gā | di̱dī̱hi̱ | api̍ | kratu̍m | su̱-ceta̍sam | va̱te̱ma̱ |
viśvā̍ | sto̱tṛ-bhya̍ḥ | gṛ̱ṇa̱te | ca̱ | sa̱ntu̱ | yū̱yam | pā̱ta̱ | sva̱sti-bhi̍ḥ | sadā̍ | na̱ḥ |
pra | a̱gnaye̍ | ta̱vase̍ | bha̱ra̱dhva̱m | gira̍m | di̱vaḥ | a̱ra̱taye̍ | pṛ̱thi̱vyāḥ |
yaḥ | viśve̍ṣām | a̱mṛtā̍nām | u̱pa-sthe̍ | vai̱śvā̱na̱raḥ | va̱vṛ̱dhe | jā̱gṛ̱vat-bhi̍ḥ |
pṛ̱ṣṭaḥ | di̱vi | dhāyi̍ | a̱gniḥ | pṛ̱thi̱vyām | ne̱tā | sindhū̍nām | vṛ̱ṣa̱bhaḥ | stiyā̍nām |
saḥ | mānu̍ṣīḥ | a̱bhi | viśa̍ḥ | vi | bhā̱ti̱ | vai̱śvā̱na̱raḥ | va̱vṛ̱dhā̱naḥ | vare̍ṇa |
tvat | bhi̱yā | viśa̍ḥ | ā̱ya̱n | asi̍knīḥ | a̱sa̱ma̱nāḥ | jaha̍tīḥ | bhoja̍nāni |
vaiśvā̍nara | pū̱rave̍ | śośu̍cānaḥ | pura̍ḥ | yat | a̱gne̱ | da̱raya̍n | adī̍deḥ |
tava̍ | tri̱-dhātu̍ | pṛ̱thi̱vī | u̱ta | dyauḥ | vaiśvā̍nara | vra̱tam | a̱gne̱ | sa̱ca̱nta̱ |
tvam | bhā̱sā | roda̍sī̱ iti̍ | ā | ta̱ta̱ntha̱ | aja̍sreṇa | śo̱ciṣā̍ | śośu̍cānaḥ |
tvām | a̱gne̱ | ha̱rita̍ḥ | vā̱va̱śā̱nāḥ | gira̍ḥ | sa̱ca̱nte̱ | dhuna̍yaḥ | ghṛ̱tācī̍ḥ |
pati̍m | kṛ̱ṣṭī̱nām | ra̱thya̍m | ra̱yī̱ṇām | vai̱śvā̱na̱ram | u̱ṣasā̍m | ke̱tum | ahnā̍m |
tve iti̍ | a̱su̱rya̍m | vasa̍vaḥ | ni | ṛ̱ṇva̱n | kratu̍m | hi | te̱ | mi̱tra̱-ma̱ha̱ḥ | ju̱ṣanta̍ |
tvam | dasyū̍n | oka̍saḥ | a̱gne̱ | ā̱ja̱ḥ | u̱ru | jyoti̍ḥ | ja̱naya̍n | āryā̍ya |
saḥ | jāya̍mānaḥ | pa̱ra̱me | vi-o̍man | vā̱yuḥ | na | pātha̍ḥ | pari̍ | pā̱si̱ | sa̱dyaḥ |
tvam | bhuva̍nā | ja̱naya̍n | a̱bhi | kra̱n | apa̍tyāya | jā̱ta̱-ve̱da̱ḥ | da̱śa̱syan |
tām | a̱gne̱ | a̱sme iti̍ | iṣa̍m | ā | ī̱ra̱ya̱sva̱ | vaiśvā̍nara | dyu̱-matī̍m | jā̱ta̱-ve̱da̱ḥ |
yayā̍ | rādha̍ḥ | pinva̍si | vi̱śva̱-vā̱ra̱ | pṛ̱thu | śrava̍ḥ | dā̱śuṣe̍ | martyā̍ya |
tam | na̱ḥ | a̱gne̱ | ma̱ghava̍t-bhyaḥ | pu̱ru̱-kṣum | ra̱yim | ni | vāja̍m | śrutya̍m | yu̱va̱sva̱ |
vaiśvā̍nara | mahi̍ | na̱ḥ | śarma̍ | ya̱ccha̱ | ru̱drebhi̍ḥ | a̱gne̱ | vasu̍-bhiḥ | sa̱-joṣā̍ḥ |
pra | sa̱m-rāja̍ḥ | asu̍rasya | pra-śa̍stim | pu̱ṁsaḥ | kṛ̱ṣṭī̱nām | a̱nu̱-mādya̍sya |
indra̍sya-iva | pra | ta̱vasa̍ḥ | kṛ̱tāni̍ | vande̍ | dā̱rum | vanda̍mānaḥ | vi̱va̱kmi̱ |
ka̱vim | ke̱tum | dhā̱sim | bhā̱num | adre̍ḥ | hi̱nvanti̍ | śam | rā̱jyam | roda̍syoḥ |
pu̱ra̱m-da̱rasya̍ | gī̱ḥ-bhiḥ | ā | vi̱vā̱se̱ | a̱gneḥ | vra̱tāni̍ | pū̱rvyā | ma̱hāni̍ |
ni | a̱kra̱tūn | gra̱thina̍ḥ | mṛ̱dhra-vā̍caḥ | pa̱ṇīn | a̱śra̱ddhān | a̱vṛ̱dhān | a̱ya̱jñān |
pra-pra̍ | tān | dasyū̍n | a̱gniḥ | vi̱vā̱ya̱ | pūrva̍ḥ | ca̱kā̱ra̱ | apa̍rān | aya̍jyūn |
yaḥ | a̱pā̱cīne̍ | tama̍si | mada̍ntīḥ | prācī̍ḥ | ca̱kāra̍ | nṛ-ta̍maḥ | śacī̍bhiḥ |
tam | īśā̍nam | vasva̍ḥ | a̱gnim | gṛ̱ṇī̱ṣe̱ | anā̍natam | da̱maya̍ntam | pṛ̱ta̱nyūn |
yaḥ | de̱hya̍ḥ | ana̍mayat | va̱dha̱-snaiḥ | yaḥ | a̱rya-pa̍tnīḥ | u̱ṣasa̍ḥ | ca̱kāra̍ |
saḥ | ni̱-rudhya̍ | nahu̍ṣaḥ | ya̱hvaḥ | a̱gniḥ | viśa̍ḥ | ca̱kre̱ | ba̱li̱-hṛta̍ḥ | saha̍ḥ-bhiḥ |
yasya̍ | śa̱rma̱n | upa̍ | viśve̍ | janā̍saḥ | evai̍ḥ | ta̱sthuḥ | su̱-ma̱tim | bhikṣa̍māṇāḥ |
vai̱śvā̱na̱raḥ | vara̍m | ā | roda̍syoḥ | ā | a̱gniḥ | sa̱sā̱da̱ | pi̱troḥ | u̱pa-stha̍m |
ā | de̱vaḥ | da̱de̱ | bu̱dhnyā̍ | vasū̍ni | vai̱śvā̱na̱raḥ | ut-i̍tā | sūrya̍sya |
ā | sa̱mu̱drāt | ava̍rāt | ā | para̍smāt | ā | a̱gniḥ | da̱de̱ | di̱vaḥ | ā | pṛ̱thi̱vyāḥ |
pra | va̱ḥ | de̱vam | ci̱t | sa̱ha̱sā̱nam | a̱gnim | aśva̍m | na | vā̱jina̍m | hi̱ṣe̱ | nama̍ḥ-bhiḥ |
bhava̍ | na̱ḥ | dū̱taḥ | a̱dhva̱rasya̍ | vi̱dvān | tmanā̍ | de̱veṣu̍ | vi̱vi̱de̱ | mi̱ta-dru̍ḥ |
ā | yā̱hi̱ | a̱gne̱ | pa̱thyā̍ḥ | anu̍ | svāḥ | ma̱ndraḥ | de̱vānā̍m | sa̱khyam | ju̱ṣā̱ṇaḥ |
ā | sānu̍ | śuṣmai̍ḥ | na̱daya̍n | pṛ̱thi̱vyāḥ | jambhe̍bhiḥ | viśva̍m | u̱śadha̍k | vanā̍ni |
prā̱cīna̍ḥ | ya̱jñaḥ | su-dhi̍tam | hi | ba̱rhiḥ | prī̱ṇī̱te | a̱gniḥ | ī̱ḻi̱taḥ | na | hotā̍ |
ā | mā̱tarā̍ | vi̱śvavā̍re̱ iti̍ vi̱śva-vā̍re | hu̱vā̱naḥ | yata̍ḥ | ya̱vi̱ṣṭha̱ | ja̱jñi̱ṣe | su̱-śeva̍ḥ |
sa̱dyaḥ | a̱dhva̱re | ra̱thi̱ram | ja̱na̱nta̱ | mānu̍ṣāsaḥ | vi-ce̍tasaḥ | yaḥ | e̱ṣā̱m |
vi̱śām | a̱dhā̱yi̱ | vi̱śpati̍ḥ | du̱ro̱ṇe | a̱gniḥ | ma̱ndraḥ | madhu̍-vacāḥ | ṛ̱ta-vā̍ |
asā̍di | vṛ̱taḥ | vahni̍ḥ | ā̱-ja̱ga̱nvān | a̱gniḥ | bra̱hmā | nṛ̱-sada̍ne | vi̱-dha̱rtā |
dyauḥ | ca̱ | yam | pṛ̱thi̱vī | va̱vṛ̱dhāte̱ iti̍ | ā | yam | hotā̍ | yaja̍ti | vi̱śva-vā̍ram |
e̱te | dyu̱mnebhi̍ḥ | viśva̍m | ā | a̱ti̱ra̱nta̱ | mantra̍m | ye | vā̱ | ara̍m | naryā̍ḥ | ata̍kṣan |
pra | ye | viśa̍ḥ | ti̱ranta̍ | śroṣa̍māṇāḥ | ā | ye | me̱ | a̱sya | dīdha̍yan | ṛ̱tasya̍ |
nu | tvām | a̱gne̱ | ī̱ma̱he̱ | vasi̍ṣṭhāḥ | ī̱śā̱nam | sū̱no̱ iti̍ | sa̱ha̱sa̱ḥ | vasū̍nām |
iṣa̍m | sto̱tṛ-bhya̍ḥ | ma̱ghava̍t-bhyaḥ | ā̱na̱ṭ | yū̱yam | pā̱ta̱ | sva̱sti-bhi̍ḥ | sadā̍ | na̱ḥ |
i̱ndhe | rājā̍ | sam | a̱ryaḥ | nama̍ḥ-bhiḥ | yasya̍ | pratī̍kam | ā-hu̍tam | ghṛ̱tena̍ |
nara̍ḥ | ha̱vyebhi̍ḥ | ī̱ḻa̱te̱ | sa̱-bādha̍ḥ | ā | a̱gniḥ | agre̍ | u̱ṣasā̍m | a̱śo̱ci̱ |
a̱yam | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | syaḥ | su-ma̍hān | a̱ve̱di̱ | hotā̍ | ma̱ndraḥ | manu̍ṣaḥ | ya̱hvaḥ | a̱gniḥ |
vi | bhāḥ | a̱ka̱ritya̍kaḥ | sa̱sṛ̱jā̱naḥ | pṛ̱thi̱vyām | kṛ̱ṣṇa-pa̍viḥ | oṣa̍dhībhiḥ | va̱va̱kṣe̱ |
kayā̍ | na̱ḥ | a̱gne̱ | vi | va̱sa̱ḥ | su̱-vṛ̱ktim | kām | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | sva̱dhām | ṛ̱ṇa̱va̱ḥ | śa̱syamā̍naḥ |
ka̱dā | bha̱ve̱ma̱ | pata̍yaḥ | su̱-da̱tra̱ | rā̱yaḥ | va̱ntāra̍ḥ | du̱stara̍sya | sā̱dhoḥ |
pra-pra̍ | a̱yam | a̱gniḥ | bha̱ra̱tasya̍ | śṛ̱ṇve̱ | vi | yat | sūrya̍ḥ | na | roca̍te | bṛ̱hat | bhāḥ |
a̱bhi | yaḥ | pū̱rum | pṛta̍nāsu | ta̱sthau | dyu̱tā̱naḥ | daivya̍ḥ | ati̍thiḥ | śu̱śo̱ca̱ |
asa̍n | it | tve iti̍ | ā̱-hava̍nāni | bhūri̍ | bhuva̍ḥ | viśve̍bhiḥ | su̱-manā̍ḥ | anī̍kaiḥ |
stu̱taḥ | ci̱t | a̱gne̱ | śṛ̱ṇvi̱ṣe̱ | gṛ̱ṇā̱naḥ | sva̱yam | va̱rdha̱sva̱ | ta̱nva̍m | su̱-jā̱ta̱ |
i̱dam | vaca̍ḥ | śa̱ta̱-sāḥ | sam-sa̍hasram | ut | a̱gnaye̍ | ja̱ni̱ṣī̱ṣṭa̱ | dvi̱-barhā̍ḥ |
śam | yat | sto̱tṛ-bhya̍ḥ | ā̱paye̍ | bhavā̍ti | dyu̱-mat | a̱mī̱va̱-cāta̍nam | ra̱kṣa̱ḥ-hā |
nu | tvām | a̱gne̱ | ī̱ma̱he̱ | vasi̍ṣṭhāḥ | ī̱śā̱nam | sū̱no̱ iti̍ | sa̱ha̱sa̱ḥ | vasū̍nām |
iṣa̍m | sto̱tṛ-bhya̍ḥ | ma̱ghava̍t-bhyaḥ | ā̱na̱ṭ | yū̱yam | pā̱ta̱ | sva̱sti-bhi̍ḥ | sadā̍ | na̱ḥ |
abo̍dhi | jā̱raḥ | u̱ṣasā̍m | u̱pa-sthā̍t | hotā̍ | ma̱ndraḥ | ka̱vi-ta̍maḥ | pā̱va̱kaḥ |
dadhā̍ti | ke̱tum | u̱bhaya̍sya | ja̱ntoḥ | ha̱vyā | de̱veṣu̍ | dravi̍ṇam | su̱kṛt-su̍ |
saḥ | su̱-kratu̍ḥ | yaḥ | vi | dura̍ḥ | pa̱ṇī̱nām | pu̱nā̱naḥ | a̱rkam | pu̱ru̱-bhoja̍sam | na̱ḥ |
hotā̍ | ma̱ndraḥ | vi̱śām | damū̍nāḥ | ti̱raḥ | tama̍ḥ | da̱dṛ̱śe̱ | rā̱myāṇā̍m |
amū̍raḥ | ka̱viḥ | adi̍tiḥ | vi̱vasvā̍n | su̱-sa̱ṁsat | mi̱traḥ | ati̍thiḥ | śi̱vaḥ | na̱ḥ |
ci̱tra-bhā̍nuḥ | u̱ṣasā̍m | bhā̱ti̱ | agre̍ | a̱pām | garbha̍ḥ | pra̱-sva̍ḥ | ā | vi̱ve̱śa̱ |
ī̱ḻenya̍ḥ | va̱ḥ | manu̍ṣaḥ | yu̱geṣu̍ | sa̱ma̱na̱-gāḥ | a̱śu̱ca̱t | jā̱ta-ve̍dāḥ |
su̱-sa̱ṁdṛśā̍ | bhā̱nunā̍ | yaḥ | vi̱-bhāti̍ | prati̍ | gāva̍ḥ | sa̱m-i̱dhā̱nam | bu̱dha̱nta̱ |
agne̍ | yā̱hi | dū̱tya̍m | mā | ri̱ṣa̱ṇya̱ḥ | de̱vān | accha̍ | bra̱hma̱-kṛtā̍ | ga̱ṇena̍ |
sara̍svatīm | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | a̱śvinā̍ | a̱paḥ | yakṣi̍ | de̱vān | ra̱tna̱-dheyā̍ya | viśvā̍n |
tvām | a̱gne̱ | sa̱m-i̱dhā̱naḥ | vasi̍ṣṭhaḥ | jarū̍tham | ha̱n | yakṣi̍ | rā̱ye | pura̍m-dhim |
pu̱ru̱-nī̱thā | jā̱ta̱-ve̱da̱ḥ | ja̱ra̱sva̱ | yū̱yam | pā̱ta̱ | sva̱sti-bhi̍ḥ | sadā̍ | na̱ḥ |
u̱ṣaḥ | na | jā̱raḥ | pṛ̱thu | pāja̍ḥ | a̱śre̱t | davi̍dyutat | dīdya̍t | śośu̍cānaḥ |
vṛṣā̍ | hari̍ḥ | śuci̍ḥ | ā | bhā̱ti̱ | bhā̱sā | dhiya̍ḥ | hi̱nvā̱naḥ | u̱śa̱tīḥ | a̱jī̱ga̱riti̍ |
sva̍ḥ | na | vasto̍ḥ | u̱ṣasā̍m | a̱ro̱ci̱ | ya̱jñam | ta̱nvā̱nāḥ | u̱śija̍ḥ | na | manma̍ |
a̱gniḥ | janmā̍ni | de̱vaḥ | ā | vi | vi̱dvān | dra̱vat | dū̱taḥ | de̱va̱-yāvā̍ | vani̍ṣṭhaḥ |
accha̍ | gira̍ḥ | ma̱taya̍ḥ | de̱va̱-yantī̍ḥ | a̱gnim | ya̱nti̱ | dravi̍ṇam | bhikṣa̍māṇāḥ |
su̱-sa̱ṁdṛśa̍m | su̱-pratī̍kam | su̱-añca̍m | ha̱vya̱-vāha̍m | a̱ra̱tim | mānu̍ṣāṇām |
indra̍m | na̱ḥ | a̱gne̱ | vasu̍-bhiḥ | sa̱-joṣā̍ḥ | ru̱dram | ru̱drebhi̍ḥ | ā | va̱ha̱ | bṛ̱hanta̍m |
ā̱di̱tyebhi̍ḥ | adi̍tim | vi̱śva-ja̍nyām | bṛha̱spati̍m | ṛkva̍-bhiḥ | vi̱śva-vā̍ram |
ma̱ndram | hotā̍ram | u̱śija̍ḥ | yavi̍ṣṭham | a̱gnim | viśa̍ḥ | ī̱ḻa̱te̱ | a̱dhva̱reṣu̍ |
saḥ | hi | kṣapā̍-vān | abha̍vat | ra̱yī̱ṇām | ata̍ndraḥ | dū̱taḥ | ya̱jathā̍ya | de̱vān |
ma̱hān | a̱si̱ | a̱dhva̱rasya̍ | pra̱-ke̱taḥ | na | ṛ̱te | tvat | a̱mṛtā̍ḥ | mā̱da̱ya̱nte̱ |
ā | viśve̍bhiḥ | sa̱-ratha̍m | yā̱hi̱ | de̱vaiḥ | ni | a̱gne̱ | hotā̍ | pra̱tha̱maḥ | sa̱da̱ | i̱ha |
tvām | ī̱ḻa̱te̱ | a̱ji̱ram | dū̱tyā̍ya | ha̱viṣma̍ntaḥ | sada̍m | it | mānu̍ṣāsaḥ |
yasya̍ | de̱vaiḥ | ā | asa̍daḥ | ba̱rhiḥ | a̱gne̱ | ahā̍ni | a̱smai̱ | su̱-dinā̍ | bha̱va̱nti̱ |
triḥ | ci̱t | a̱ktoḥ | pra | ci̱ki̱tu̱ḥ | vasū̍ni | tve iti̍ | a̱ntaḥ | dā̱śuṣe̍ | martyā̍ya |
ma̱nu̱ṣvat | a̱gne̱ | i̱ha | ya̱kṣi̱ | de̱vān | bhava̍ | na̱ḥ | dū̱taḥ | a̱bhi̱śa̱sti̱-pāvā̍ |
a̱gniḥ | ī̱śe̱ | bṛ̱ha̱taḥ | a̱dhva̱rasya̍ | a̱gniḥ | viśva̍sya | ha̱viṣa̍ḥ | kṛ̱tasya̍ |
kratu̍m | hi | a̱sya̱ | vasa̍vaḥ | ju̱ṣanta̍ | atha̍ | de̱vāḥ | da̱dhi̱re̱ | ha̱vya̱-vāha̍m |
ā | a̱gne̱ | va̱ha̱ | ha̱vi̱ḥ-adyā̍ya | de̱vān | indra̍-jyeṣṭhāsaḥ | i̱ha | mā̱da̱ya̱ntā̱m |
i̱mam | ya̱jñam | di̱vi | de̱veṣu̍ | dhe̱hi̱ | yū̱yam | pā̱ta̱ | sva̱sti-bhi̍ḥ | sadā̍ | na̱ḥ |
aga̍nma | ma̱hā | nama̍sā | yavi̍ṣṭham | yaḥ | dī̱dāya̍ | sam-i̍ddhaḥ | sve | du̱ro̱ṇe |
ci̱tra-bhā̍num | roda̍sī̱ iti̍ | a̱ntaḥ | u̱rvī iti̍ | su-ā̍hutam | vi̱śvata̍ḥ | pra̱tyañca̍m |
saḥ | ma̱hnā | viśvā̍ | du̱ḥ-i̱tāni̍ | sā̱hvān | a̱gniḥ | sta̱ve̱ | dame̍ | ā | jā̱ta-ve̍dāḥ |
saḥ | na̱ḥ | ra̱kṣi̱ṣa̱t | du̱ḥ-i̱tāt | a̱va̱dyā̱t | a̱smān | gṛ̱ṇa̱taḥ | u̱ta | na̱ḥ | ma̱ghona̍ḥ |
tvam | varu̍ṇaḥ | u̱ta | mi̱traḥ | a̱gne̱ | tvām | va̱rdha̱nti̱ | ma̱ti-bhi̍ḥ | vasi̍ṣṭhāḥ |
tve iti̍ | vasu̍ | su̱-sa̱na̱nāni̍ | sa̱ntu̱ | yū̱yam | pā̱ta̱ | sva̱sti-bhi̍ḥ | sadā̍ | na̱ḥ |
pra | a̱gnaye̍ | vi̱śva̱-śuce̍ | dhi̱ya̱m-dhe | a̱su̱ra̱-ghne | manma̍ | dhī̱tim | bha̱ra̱dhva̱m |
bhare̍ | ha̱viḥ | na | ba̱rhiṣi̍ | prī̱ṇā̱naḥ | vai̱śvā̱na̱rāya̍ | yata̍ye | ma̱tī̱nām |
tvam | a̱gne̱ | śo̱ciṣā̍ | śośu̍cānaḥ | ā | roda̍sī̱ iti̍ | a̱pṛ̱ṇā̱ḥ | jāya̍mānaḥ |
tvam | de̱vān | a̱bhi-śa̍steḥ | a̱mu̱ñca̱ḥ | vaiśvā̍nara | jā̱ta̱-ve̱da̱ḥ | ma̱hi̱-tvā |
jā̱taḥ | yat | a̱gne̱ | bhuva̍nā | vi | akhya̍ḥ | pa̱śūn | na | go̱pāḥ | irya̍ḥ | pari̍-jmā |
vaiśvā̍nara | brahma̍ṇe | vi̱nda̱ | gā̱tum | yū̱yam | pā̱ta̱ | sva̱sti-bhi̍ḥ | sadā̍ | na̱ḥ |
sa̱m-idhā̍ | jā̱ta-ve̍dase | de̱vāya̍ | de̱vahū̍ti-bhiḥ |
ha̱viḥ-bhi̍ḥ | śu̱kra-śo̍ciṣe | na̱ma̱svina̍ḥ | va̱yam | dā̱śe̱ma̱ | a̱gnaye̍ |
va̱yam | te̱ | a̱gne̱ | sa̱m-idhā̍ | vi̱dhe̱ma̱ | va̱yam | dā̱śe̱ma̱ | su̱-stu̱tī | ya̱ja̱tra̱ |
va̱yam | ghṛ̱tena̍ | a̱dhva̱ra̱sya̱ | ho̱ta̱ḥ | va̱yam | de̱va̱ | ha̱viṣā̍ | bha̱dra̱-śo̱ce̱ |
ā | na̱ḥ | de̱vebhi̍ḥ | upa̍ | de̱va-hū̍tim | agne̍ | yā̱hi | vaṣa̍ṭ-kṛtim | ju̱ṣā̱ṇaḥ |
tubhya̍m | de̱vāya̍ | dāśa̍taḥ | syā̱ma̱ | yū̱yam | pā̱ta̱ | sva̱sti-bhi̍ḥ | sadā̍ | na̱ḥ |
u̱pa̱-sadyā̍ya | mī̱ḻhuṣe̍ | ā̱sye̍ | ju̱hu̱ta̱ | ha̱viḥ |
yaḥ | na̱ḥ | nedi̍ṣṭham | āpya̍m |
yaḥ | pañca̍ | ca̱rṣa̱ṇīḥ | a̱bhi | ni̱-sa̱sāda̍ | dame̍-dame |
ka̱viḥ | gṛ̱ha-pa̍tiḥ | yuvā̍ |
saḥ | na̱ḥ | veda̍ḥ | a̱mātya̍m | a̱gniḥ | ra̱kṣa̱tu̱ | vi̱śvata̍ḥ |
u̱ta | a̱smān | pā̱tu̱ | aṁha̍saḥ |
nava̍m | nu | stoma̍m | a̱gnaye̍ | di̱vaḥ | śye̱nāya̍ | jī̱ja̱na̱m |
vasva̍ḥ | ku̱vit | va̱nāti̍ | na̱ḥ |
spā̱rhāḥ | yasya̍ | śriya̍ḥ | dṛ̱śe | ra̱yiḥ | vī̱ra-va̍taḥ | ya̱thā̱ |
agre̍ | ya̱jñasya̍ | śoca̍taḥ |
saḥ | i̱mām | ve̱tu̱ | vaṣa̍ṭ-kṛtim | a̱gniḥ | ju̱ṣa̱ta̱ | na̱ḥ | gira̍ḥ |
yaji̍ṣṭhaḥ | ha̱vya̱-vāha̍naḥ |
ni | tvā̱ | na̱kṣya̱ | vi̱śpa̱te̱ | dyu̱-manta̍m | de̱va̱ | dhī̱ma̱hi̱ |
su̱-vīra̍m | a̱gne̱ | ā̱-hu̱ta̱ |
kṣapa̍ḥ | u̱sraḥ | ca̱ | dī̱di̱hi̱ | su̱-a̱gnaya̍ḥ | tvayā̍ | va̱yam |
su̱-vīra̍ḥ | tvam | a̱sma̱-yuḥ |
upa̍ | tvā̱ | sā̱taye̍ | nara̍ḥ | viprā̍saḥ | ya̱nti̱ | dhī̱ti-bhi̍ḥ |
upa̍ | akṣa̍rā | sa̱ha̱sriṇī̍ |
a̱gniḥ | rakṣā̍ṁsi | se̱dha̱ti̱ | śu̱kra-śo̍ciḥ | ama̍rtyaḥ |
śuci̍ḥ | pā̱va̱kaḥ | īḍya̍ḥ |
saḥ | na̱ḥ | rādhā̍ṁsi | ā | bha̱ra̱ | īśā̍naḥ | sa̱ha̱sa̱ḥ | ya̱ho̱ iti̍ |
bhaga̍ḥ | ca̱ | dā̱tu̱ | vārya̍m |
tvam | a̱gne̱ | vī̱ra-va̍t | yaśa̍ḥ | de̱vaḥ | ca̱ | sa̱vi̱tā | bhaga̍ḥ |
diti̍ḥ | ca̱ | dā̱ti̱ | vārya̍m |
agne̍ | rakṣa̍ | na̱ḥ | aṁha̍saḥ | prati̍ | sma̱ | de̱va̱ | riṣa̍taḥ |
tapi̍ṣṭhaiḥ | a̱jara̍ḥ | da̱ha̱ |
adha̍ | ma̱hī | na̱ḥ | āya̍sī | anā̍dhṛṣṭaḥ | nṛ-pī̍taye |
pūḥ | bha̱va̱ | śa̱ta-bhu̍jiḥ |
tvam | na̱ḥ | pā̱hi̱ | aṁha̍saḥ | doṣā̍-vastaḥ | a̱gha̱-ya̱taḥ |
divā̍ | nakta̍m | a̱dā̱bhya̱ |
e̱nā | va̱ḥ | a̱gnim | nama̍sā | ū̱rjaḥ | napā̍tam | ā | hu̱ve̱ |
pri̱yam | ceti̍ṣṭham | a̱ra̱tim | su̱-a̱dhva̱ram | viśva̍sya | dū̱tam | a̱mṛta̍m |
saḥ | yo̱ja̱te̱ | a̱ru̱ṣā | vi̱śva-bho̍jasā | saḥ | du̱dra̱va̱t | su-ā̍hutaḥ |
su̱-brahmā̍ | ya̱jñaḥ | su̱-śamī̍ | vasū̍nām | de̱vam | rādha̍ḥ | janā̍nām |
ut | a̱sya̱ | śo̱ciḥ | a̱sthā̱t | ā̱-juhvā̍nasya | mī̱ḻhuṣa̍ḥ |
ut | dhū̱māsa̍ḥ | a̱ru̱ṣāsa̍ḥ | di̱vi̱-spṛśa̍ḥ | sam | a̱gnim | i̱ndha̱te̱ | nara̍ḥ |
tam | tvā̱ | dū̱tam | kṛ̱ṇma̱he̱ | ya̱śaḥ-ta̍mam | de̱vān | ā | vī̱taye̍ | va̱ha̱ |
viśvā̍ | sū̱no̱ iti̍ | sa̱ha̱sa̱ḥ | ma̱rta̱-bhoja̍nā | rāsva̍ | tat | yat | tvā̱ | īma̍he |
tvam | a̱gne̱ | gṛ̱ha-pa̍tiḥ | tvam | hotā̍ | na̱ḥ | a̱dhva̱re |
tvam | potā̍ | vi̱śva̱-vā̱ra̱ | pra-ce̍tāḥ | yakṣi̍ | veṣi̍ | ca̱ | vārya̍m |
kṛ̱dhi | ratna̍m | yaja̍mānāya | su̱kra̱to̱ iti̍ su-krato | tvam | hi | ra̱tna̱-dhāḥ | asi̍ |
ā | na̱ḥ | ṛ̱te | śi̱śī̱hi̱ | viśva̍m | ṛ̱tvija̍m | su̱-śaṁsa̍ḥ | yaḥ | ca̱ | dakṣa̍te |
tve iti̍ | a̱gne̱ | su̱-ā̱hu̱ta̱ | pri̱yāsa̍ḥ | sa̱ntu̱ | sū̱raya̍ḥ |
ya̱ntāra̍ḥ | ye | ma̱gha-vā̍naḥ | janā̍nām | ū̱rvān | daya̍nta | gonā̍m |
yeṣā̍m | iḻā̍ | ghṛ̱ta-ha̍stā | du̱ro̱ṇe | ā | api̍ | prā̱tā | ni̱-sīda̍ti |
tān | trā̱ya̱sva̱ | sa̱ha̱sya̱ | dru̱haḥ | ni̱daḥ | yaccha̍ | na̱ḥ | śarma̍ | dī̱rgha̱-śrut |
saḥ | ma̱ndrayā̍ | ca̱ | ji̱hvayā̍ | vahni̍ḥ | ā̱sā | vi̱duḥ-ta̍raḥ |
agne̍ | ra̱yim | ma̱ghava̍t-bhyaḥ | na̱ḥ | ā | va̱ha̱ | ha̱vya-dā̍tim | ca̱ | sū̱da̱ya̱ |
ye | rādhā̍ṁsi | dada̍ti | aśvyā̍ | ma̱ghā | kāme̍na | śrava̍saḥ | ma̱haḥ |
tān | aṁha̍saḥ | pi̱pṛ̱hi̱ | pa̱rtṛ-bhi̍ḥ | tvam | śa̱tam | pū̱ḥ-bhiḥ | ya̱vi̱ṣṭhya̱ |
de̱vaḥ | va̱ḥ | dra̱vi̱ṇa̱ḥ-dāḥ | pū̱rṇām | vi̱va̱ṣṭi̱ | ā̱-sica̍m |
ut | vā̱ | si̱ñcadhva̍m | upa̍ | vā̱ | pṛ̱ṇa̱dhva̱m | āt | it | va̱ḥ | de̱vaḥ | o̱ha̱te̱ |
tam | hotā̍ram | a̱dhva̱rasya̍ | pra-ce̍tasam | vahni̍m | de̱vāḥ | a̱kṛ̱ṇva̱ta̱ |
dadhā̍ti | ratna̍m | vi̱dha̱te | su̱-vīrya̍m | a̱gniḥ | janā̍ya | dā̱śuṣe̍ |
agne̍ | bhava̍ | su̱-sa̱midhā̍ | sam-i̍ddhaḥ | u̱ta | ba̱rhiḥ | u̱rvi̱yā | vi | stṛ̱ṇī̱tā̱m |
u̱ta | dvāra̍ḥ | u̱śa̱tīḥ | vi | śra̱ya̱ntā̱m | u̱ta | de̱vān | u̱śa̱taḥ | ā | va̱ha̱ | i̱ha |
agne̍ | vī̱hi | ha̱viṣā̍ | yakṣi̍ | de̱vān | su̱-a̱dhva̱rā | kṛ̱ṇu̱hi̱ | jā̱ta̱-ve̱da̱ḥ |
su̱-a̱dhva̱rā | ka̱ra̱ti̱ | jā̱ta-ve̍dāḥ | yakṣa̍t | de̱vān | a̱mṛtā̍n | pi̱praya̍t | ca̱ |
vaṁsva̍ | viśvā̍ | vāryā̍ṇi | pra̱ce̱ta̱ iti̍ pra-cetaḥ | sa̱tyāḥ | bha̱va̱ntu̱ | ā̱-śiṣa̍ḥ | na̱ḥ | a̱dya |
tvām | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | te | da̱dhi̱re̱ | ha̱vya̱-vāha̍m | de̱vāsa̍ḥ | a̱gne̱ | ū̱rjaḥ | ā | napā̍tam |
te | te̱ | de̱vāya̍ | dāśa̍taḥ | syā̱ma̱ | ma̱haḥ | na̱ḥ | ratnā̍ | vi | da̱dha̱ḥ | i̱yā̱naḥ |
tve iti̍ | ha̱ | yat | pi̱tara̍ḥ | ci̱t | na̱ḥ | i̱ndra̱ | viśvā̍ | vā̱mā | ja̱ri̱tāra̍ḥ | asa̍nvan |
tve iti̍ | gāva̍ḥ | su̱-dughā̍ḥ | tve iti̍ | hi | aśvā̍ḥ | tvam | vasu̍ | de̱va̱-ya̱te | vani̍ṣṭhaḥ |
rājā̍-iva | hi | jani̍-bhiḥ | kṣeṣi̍ | e̱va | ava̍ | dyu-bhi̍ḥ | a̱bhi | vi̱duḥ | ka̱viḥ | san |
pi̱śā | gira̍ḥ | ma̱gha̱-va̱n | gobhi̍ḥ | aśvai̍ḥ | tvā̱-ya̱taḥ | śi̱śī̱hi̱ | rā̱ye | a̱smān |
i̱māḥ | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | tvā̱ | pa̱spṛ̱dhā̱nāsa̍ḥ | atra̍ | ma̱ndrāḥ | gira̍ḥ | de̱va̱-yantī̍ḥ | upa̍ | sthu̱ḥ |
a̱rvācī̍ | te̱ | pa̱thyā̍ | rā̱yaḥ | e̱tu̱ | syāma̍ | te̱ | su̱-ma̱tau | i̱ndra̱ | śarma̍n |
dhe̱num | na | tvā̱ | su̱-yava̍se | dudhu̍kṣan | upa̍ | brahmā̍ṇi | sa̱sṛ̱je̱ | vasi̍ṣṭhaḥ |
tvām | it | me̱ | go-pa̍tim | viśva̍ḥ | ā̱ha̱ | ā | na̱ḥ | indra̍ḥ | su̱-ma̱tim | ga̱ntu̱ | accha̍ |
arṇā̍ṁsi | ci̱t | pa̱pra̱thā̱nā | su̱-dāse̍ | indra̍ḥ | gā̱dhāni̍ | a̱kṛ̱ṇo̱t | su̱-pā̱rā |
śardha̍ntam | śi̱myum | u̱catha̍sya | navya̍ḥ | śāpa̍m | sindhū̍nām | a̱kṛ̱ṇo̱t | aśa̍stīḥ |
pu̱ro̱ḻāḥ | it | tu̱rvaśa̍ḥ | yakṣu̍ḥ | ā̱sī̱t | rā̱ye | matsyā̍saḥ | ni-śi̍tāḥ | api̍-iva |
śru̱ṣṭim | ca̱kru̱ḥ | bhṛga̍vaḥ | dru̱hyava̍ḥ | ca̱ | sakhā̍ | sakhā̍yam | a̱ta̱ra̱t | viṣū̍coḥ |
ā | pa̱kthāsa̍ḥ | bha̱lā̱nasa̍ḥ | bha̱na̱nta̱ | ā | ali̍nāsaḥ | vi̱ṣā̱ṇina̍ḥ | śi̱vāsa̍ḥ |
ā | yaḥ | ana̍yat | sa̱dha̱-māḥ | ārya̍sya | ga̱vyā | tṛtsu̍-bhyaḥ | a̱ja̱ga̱n | yu̱dhā | nṝn |
du̱ḥ-ā̱dhya̍ḥ | adi̍tim | sre̱vaya̍ntaḥ | a̱ce̱tasa̍ḥ | vi | ja̱gṛ̱bhre̱ | parū̍ṣṇīm |
ma̱hnā | a̱vi̱vya̱k | pṛ̱thi̱vīm | patya̍mānaḥ | pa̱śuḥ | ka̱viḥ | a̱śa̱ya̱t | cāya̍mānaḥ |
ī̱yuḥ | artha̍m | na | ni̱-a̱rtham | paru̍ṣṇīm | ā̱śuḥ | ca̱na | it | ā̱bhi̱-pi̱tvam | ja̱gā̱ma̱ |
su̱-dāse̍ | indra̍ḥ | su̱-tukā̍n | a̱mitrā̍n | ara̍ndhayat | mānu̍ṣe | vadhri̍-vācaḥ |
ī̱yuḥ | gāva̍ḥ | na | yava̍sāt | ago̍pāḥ | ya̱thā̱-kṛ̱tam | a̱bhi | mi̱tram | ci̱tāsa̍ḥ |
pṛśni̍-gāvaḥ | pṛśni̍-nipreṣitāsaḥ | śru̱ṣṭim | ca̱kru̱ḥ | ni̱-yuta̍ḥ | ranta̍yaḥ | ca̱ |
eka̍m | ca̱ | yaḥ | vi̱ṁśa̱tim | ca̱ | śra̱va̱syā | vai̱ka̱rṇayo̍ḥ | janā̍n | rājā̍ | ni | asta̱rityasta̍ḥ |
da̱smaḥ | na | sadma̍n | ni | śi̱śā̱ti̱ | ba̱rhiḥ | śūra̍ḥ | sarga̍m | a̱kṛ̱ṇo̱t | indra̍ḥ | e̱ṣā̱m |
adha̍ | śru̱tam | ka̱vaṣa̍m | vṛ̱ddham | a̱p-su | anu̍ | dru̱hyum | ni | vṛ̱ṇa̱k | vajra̍-bāhuḥ |
vṛ̱ṇā̱nāḥ | atra̍ | sa̱khyāya̍ | sa̱khyam | tvā̱-yanta̍ḥ | ye | ama̍dan | anu̍ | tvā̱ |
vi | sa̱dyaḥ | viśvā̍ | dṛ̱ṁhi̱tāni̍ | e̱ṣā̱m | indra̍ḥ | pura̍ḥ | saha̍sā | sa̱pta | da̱rda̱riti̍ dardaḥ |
vi | āna̍vasya | tṛtsa̍ve | gaya̍m | bhā̱k | jeṣma̍ | pū̱rum | vi̱dathe̍ | mṛ̱dhra-vā̍cam |
ni | ga̱vyava̍ḥ | ana̍vaḥ | du̱hyava̍ḥ | ca̱ | ṣa̱ṣṭiḥ | śa̱tā | su̱su̱pu̱ḥ | ṣaṭ | sa̱hasrā̍ |
ṣa̱ṣṭiḥ | vī̱rāsa̍ḥ | adhi̍ | ṣaṭ | du̱va̱ḥ-yu | viśvā̍ | it | indra̍sya | vī̱ryā̍ | kṛ̱tāni̍ |
indre̍ṇa | e̱te | tṛtsa̍vaḥ | vevi̍ṣāṇāḥ | āpa̍ḥ | na | sṛ̱ṣṭāḥ | a̱dha̱va̱nta̱ | nīcī̍ḥ |
du̱ḥ-mi̱trāsa̍ḥ | pra̱ka̱la̱-vit | mimā̍nāḥ | ja̱huḥ | viśvā̍ni | bhoja̍nā | su̱-dāse̍ |
a̱rdham | vī̱rasya̍ | śṛ̱ta̱-pām | a̱ni̱ndram | parā̍ | śardha̍ntam | nu̱nu̱de̱ | a̱bhi | kṣām |
indra̍ḥ | ma̱nyum | ma̱nyu̱-mya̍ḥ | mi̱mā̱ya̱ | bhe̱je | pa̱thaḥ | va̱rta̱nim | patya̍mānaḥ |
ā̱dhreṇa̍ | ci̱t | tat | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | eka̍m | ca̱kā̱ra̱ | si̱ṁhya̍m | ci̱t | petve̍na | ja̱ghā̱na̱ |
ava̍ | sra̱ktīḥ | ve̱śyā̍ | a̱vṛ̱śca̱t | indra̍ḥ | pra | a̱ya̱ccha̱t | viśvā̍ | bhoja̍nā | su̱-dāse̍ |
śaśva̍ntaḥ | hi | śatra̍vaḥ | ra̱ra̱dhuḥ | te̱ | bhe̱dasya̍ | ci̱t | śardha̍taḥ | vi̱nda̱ | randhi̍m |
martā̍n | ena̍ḥ | stu̱va̱taḥ | yaḥ | kṛ̱ṇoti̍ | ti̱gmam | tasmi̍n | ni | ja̱hi̱ | vajra̍m | i̱ndra̱ |
āva̍t | indra̍m | ya̱munā̍ | tṛtsa̍vaḥ | ca̱ | pra | atra̍ | bhe̱dam | sa̱rva-tā̍tā | mu̱ṣā̱ya̱t |
a̱jāsa̍ḥ | ca̱ | śigra̍vaḥ | yakṣa̍vaḥ | ca̱ | ba̱lim | śī̱rṣāṇi̍ | ja̱bhru̱ḥ | aśvyā̍ni |
na | te̱ | i̱ndra̱ | su̱-ma̱taya̍ḥ | na | rāya̍ḥ | sa̱m-cakṣe̍ | pūrvā̍ḥ | u̱ṣasa̍ḥ | na | nūtnā̍ḥ |
deva̍kam | ci̱t | mā̱nya̱mā̱nam | ja̱gha̱ntha̱ | ava̍ | tmanā̍ | bṛ̱ha̱taḥ | śamba̍ram | bhe̱t |
pra | ye | gṛ̱hāt | ama̍maduḥ | tvā̱-yā | pa̱rā̱-śa̱raḥ | śa̱ta-yā̍tuḥ | vasi̍ṣṭhaḥ |
na | te̱ | bho̱jasya̍ | sa̱khyam | mṛ̱ṣa̱nta̱ | adha̍ | sū̱ri-bhya̍ḥ | su̱-dinā̍ | vi | u̱cchā̱n |
dve iti̍ | naptu̍ḥ | de̱va-va̍taḥ | śa̱te iti̍ | goḥ | dvā | rathā̍ | va̱dhū-ma̍ntā | su̱-dāsa̍ḥ |
arha̍n | a̱gne̱ | pai̱ja̱-va̱nasya̍ | dāna̍m | hotā̍-iva | sadma̍ | pari̍ | e̱mi̱ | rebha̍n |
ca̱tvāra̍ḥ | mā̱ | pai̱ja̱-va̱nasya̍ | dānā̍ḥ | smat-di̍ṣṭayaḥ | kṛ̱śa̱nina̍ḥ | ni̱re̱ke |
ṛ̱jrāsa̍ḥ | mā̱ | pṛ̱thi̱vi̱-sthāḥ | su̱-dāsa̍ḥ | to̱kam | to̱kāya̍ | śrava̍se | va̱ha̱nti̱ |
yasya̍ | śrava̍ḥ | roda̍sī̱ iti̍ | a̱ntaḥ | u̱rvī iti̍ | śī̱rṣṇe-śī̍rṣṇe | vi̱-ba̱bhāja̍ | vi̱-bha̱ktā |
sa̱pta | it | indra̍m | na | sra̱vata̍ḥ | gṛ̱ṇa̱nti̱ | ni | yu̱dhyā̱ma̱dhim | ā̱śi̱śā̱t | a̱bhīke̍ |
i̱mam | na̱ra̱ḥ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | sa̱śca̱ta̱ | anu̍ | diva̍ḥ-dāsam | na | pi̱tara̍m | su̱-dāsa̍ḥ |
a̱vi̱ṣṭana̍ | pai̱ja̱-va̱nasya̍ | keta̍m | du̱ḥ-naśa̍m | kṣa̱tram | a̱jara̍m | du̱va̱ḥ-yu |
yaḥ | ti̱gma-śṛ̍ṅgaḥ | vṛ̱ṣa̱bhaḥ | na | bhī̱maḥ | eka̍ḥ | kṛ̱ṣṭīḥ | cya̱vaya̍ti | pra | viśvā̍ḥ |
yaḥ | śaśva̍taḥ | adā̍śuṣaḥ | gaya̍sya | pra̱-ya̱ntā | a̱si̱ | susvi̍-tarāya | veda̍ḥ |
tvam | ha̱ | tyat | i̱ndra̱ | kutsa̍m | ā̱va̱ḥ | śuśrū̍ṣamāṇaḥ | ta̱nvā̍ | sa̱-ma̱rye |
dāsa̍m | yat | śuṣṇa̍m | kuya̍vam | ni | a̱smai̱ | ara̍ndhayaḥ | ā̱rju̱ne̱yāya̍ | śikṣa̍n |
tvam | dhṛ̱ṣṇo̱ iti̍ | dhṛ̱ṣa̱tā | vī̱ta-ha̍vyam | pra | ā̱va̱ḥ | viśvā̍bhiḥ | ū̱ti-bhi̍ḥ | su̱-dāsa̍m |
pra | pauru̍-kutsim | tra̱sada̍syum | ā̱va̱ḥ | kṣetra̍-sātā | vṛ̱tra̱-hatye̍ṣu | pū̱rum |
tvam | nṛ-bhi̍ḥ | nṛ̱-ma̱na̱ḥ | de̱va-vī̍tau | bhūrī̍ṇi | vṛ̱trā | ha̱ri̱-a̱śva̱ | ha̱ṁsi̱ |
tvam | ni | dasyu̍m | cumu̍rim | dhuni̍m | ca̱ | asvā̍payaḥ | da̱bhīta̍ye | su̱-hantu̍ |
tava̍ | cyau̱tnāni̍ | va̱jra̱-ha̱sta̱ | tāni̍ | nava̍ | yat | pura̍ḥ | na̱va̱tim | ca̱ | sa̱dyaḥ |
ni̱-veśa̍ne | śa̱ta̱-ta̱mā | a̱vi̱ve̱ṣī̱ḥ | aha̍n | ca̱ | vṛ̱tram | namu̍cim | u̱ta | a̱ha̱n |
sanā̍ | tā | te̱ | i̱ndra̱ | bhoja̍nāni | rā̱ta-ha̍vyāya | dā̱śuṣe̍ | su̱-dāse̍ |
vṛṣṇe̍ | te̱ | harī̱ iti̍ | vṛṣa̍ṇā | yu̱na̱jmi̱ | vyantu̍ | brahmā̍ṇi | pu̱ru̱-śā̱ka̱ | vāja̍m |
mā | te̱ | a̱syām | sa̱ha̱sā̱-va̱n | pari̍ṣṭau | a̱ghāya̍ | bhū̱ma̱ | ha̱ri̱-va̱ḥ | pa̱rā̱-dai |
trāya̍sva | na̱ḥ | a̱vṛ̱kebhi̍ḥ | varū̍thaiḥ | tava̍ | pri̱yāsa̍ḥ | sū̱riṣu̍ | syā̱ma̱ |
pri̱yāsa̍ḥ | it | te̱ | ma̱gha̱-va̱n | a̱bhiṣṭau̍ | nara̍ḥ | ma̱de̱ma̱ | śa̱ra̱ṇe | sakhā̍yaḥ |
ni | tu̱rvaśa̍m | ni | yādva̍m | śi̱śī̱hi̱ | a̱ti̱thi̱-gvāya̍ | śaṁsya̍m | ka̱ri̱ṣyan |
sa̱dyaḥ | ci̱t | nu | te̱ | ma̱gha̱-va̱n | a̱bhiṣṭau̍ | nara̍ḥ | śa̱ṁsa̱nti̱ | u̱ktha̱-śasa̍ḥ | u̱kthā |
ye | te̱ | have̍bhiḥ | vi | pa̱ṇīn | adā̍śan | a̱smān | vṛ̱ṇī̱ṣva̱ | yujyā̍ya | tasmai̍ |
e̱te | stomā̍ḥ | na̱rām | nṛ̱-ta̱ma̱ | tubhya̍m | a̱sma̱drya̍ñcaḥ | dada̍taḥ | ma̱ghāni̍ |
teṣā̍m | i̱ndra̱ | vṛ̱tra̱-hatye̍ | śi̱vaḥ | bhū̱ḥ | sakhā̍ | ca̱ | śūra̍ḥ | a̱vi̱tā | ca̱ | nṛ̱ṇām |
nu | i̱ndra̱ | śū̱ra̱ | stava̍mānaḥ | ū̱tī | brahma̍-jūtaḥ | ta̱nvā̍ | va̱vṛ̱dha̱sva̱ |
upa̍ | na̱ḥ | vājā̍n | mi̱mī̱hi̱ | upa̍ | stīn | yū̱yam | pā̱ta̱ | sva̱sti-bhi̍ḥ | sadā̍ | na̱ḥ |
u̱graḥ | ja̱jñe̱ | vī̱ryā̍ya | sva̱dhā-vā̍n | cakri̍ḥ | apa̍ḥ | narya̍ḥ | yat | ka̱ri̱ṣyan |
jagmi̍ḥ | yuvā̍ | nṛ̱-sada̍nam | ava̍ḥ-bhiḥ | trā̱tā | na̱ḥ | indra̍ḥ | ena̍saḥ | ma̱haḥ | ci̱t |
hantā̍ | vṛ̱tram | indra̍ḥ | śūśu̍vānaḥ | pra | ā̱vī̱t | nu | vī̱raḥ | ja̱ri̱tāra̍m | ū̱tī |
kartā̍ | su̱-dāse̍ | aha̍ | vai | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | lo̱kam | dātā̍ | vasu̍ | muhu̍ḥ | ā | dā̱śuṣe̍ | bhū̱t |
yu̱dhmaḥ | a̱na̱rvā | kha̱ja̱-kṛt | sa̱mat-vā̍ | śūra̍ḥ | sa̱trā̱ṣāṭ | ja̱nuṣā̍ | ī̱m | aṣā̍ḻhaḥ |
vi | ā̱se̱ | indra̍ḥ | pṛta̍nāḥ | su̱-ojā̍ḥ | adha̍ | viśva̍m | śa̱tru̱-yanta̍m | ja̱ghā̱na̱ |
u̱bhe iti̍ | ci̱t | i̱ndra̱ | roda̍sī̱ iti̍ | ma̱hi̱-tvā | ā | pa̱prā̱tha̱ | tavi̍ṣībhiḥ | tu̱vi̱ṣma̱ḥ |
ni | vajra̍m | indra̍ḥ | hari̍-vān | mimi̍kṣan | sam | andha̍sā | made̍ṣu | vai | u̱vo̱ca̱ |
vṛṣā̍ | ja̱jā̱na̱ | vṛṣa̍ṇam | raṇā̍ya | tam | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | ci̱t | nārī̍ | narya̍m | sa̱sū̱va̱ |
pra | yaḥ | se̱nā̱-nīḥ | adha̍ | nṛ-bhya̍ḥ | asti̍ | i̱naḥ | satvā̍ | go̱-eṣa̍ṇaḥ | saḥ | dhṛ̱ṣṇuḥ |
nu | ci̱t | saḥ | bhre̱ṣa̱te̱ | jana̍ḥ | na | re̱ṣa̱t | mana̍ḥ | yaḥ | a̱sya̱ | gho̱ram | ā̱-vivā̍sāt |
ya̱jñaiḥ | yaḥ | indre̍ | dadha̍te | duvā̍ṁsi | kṣaya̍t | saḥ | rā̱ye | ṛ̱ta̱-pāḥ | ṛ̱te̱-jāḥ |
yat | i̱ndra̱ | pūrva̍ḥ | apa̍rāya | śi̱kṣa̱n | aya̍t | jyāyā̍n | kanī̍yasaḥ | de̱ṣṇam |
a̱mṛta̍ḥ | it | pari̍ | ā̱sī̱ta̱ | dū̱ram | ā | ci̱tra̱ | citrya̍m | bha̱ra̱ | ra̱yim | na̱ḥ |
yaḥ | te̱ | i̱ndra̱ | pri̱yaḥ | jana̍ḥ | dadā̍śat | asa̍t | ni̱re̱ke | a̱dri̱-va̱ḥ | sakhā̍ | te̱ |
va̱yam | te̱ | a̱syām | su̱-ma̱tau | cani̍ṣṭhāḥ | syā̱ma̱ | varū̍the | aghna̍taḥ | nṛ-pī̍tau |
e̱ṣaḥ | stoma̍ḥ | a̱ci̱kra̱da̱t | vṛṣā̍ | te̱ | u̱ta | stā̱muḥ | ma̱gha̱-va̱n | a̱kra̱pi̱ṣṭa̱ |
rā̱yaḥ | kāma̍ḥ | ja̱ri̱tāra̍m | te̱ | ā | a̱ga̱n | tvam | a̱ṅga | śa̱kra̱ | vasva̍ḥ | ā | śa̱ka̱ḥ | na̱ḥ |
saḥ | na̱ḥ | i̱ndra̱ | tva-ya̍tāyai | i̱ṣe | dhā̱ḥ | tmanā̍ | ca̱ | ye | ma̱gha-vā̍naḥ | ju̱nanti̍ |
vasvī̍ | su | te̱ | ja̱ri̱tre | a̱stu̱ | śa̱ktiḥ | yū̱yam | pā̱ta̱ | sva̱sti-bhi̍ḥ | sadā̍ | na̱ḥ |
asā̍vi | de̱vam | go-ṛ̍jīkam | andha̍ḥ | ni | a̱smi̱n | indra̍ḥ | ja̱nuṣā̍ | ī̱m | u̱vo̱ca̱ |
bodhā̍masi | tvā̱ | ha̱ri̱-a̱śva̱ | ya̱jñaiḥ | bodha̍ | na̱ḥ | stoma̍m | andha̍saḥ | made̍ṣu |
pra | ya̱nti̱ | ya̱jñam | vi̱paya̍nti | ba̱rhiḥ | so̱ma̱-māda̍ḥ | vi̱dathe̍ | du̱dhra-vā̍caḥ |
ni | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | bhri̱ya̱nte̱ | ya̱śasa̍ḥ | gṛ̱bhāt | ā | dū̱re-u̍pabdaḥ | vṛṣa̍ṇaḥ | nṛ̱-sāca̍ḥ |
tvam | i̱ndra̱ | sravi̍ta̱vai | a̱paḥ | ka̱riti̍ kaḥ | pari̍-sthitāḥ | ahi̍nā | śū̱ra̱ | pū̱rvīḥ |
tvat | vā̱va̱kre̱ | ra̱thya̍ḥ | na | dhenā̍ḥ | reja̍nte | viśvā̍ | kṛ̱trimā̍ṇi | bhī̱ṣā |
bhī̱maḥ | vi̱ve̱ṣa̱ | āyu̍dhebhiḥ | e̱ṣā̱m | apā̍ṁsi | viśvā̍ | naryā̍ṇi | vi̱dvān |
indra̍ḥ | pura̍ḥ | jarhṛ̍ṣāṇaḥ | vi | dū̱dho̱t | vi | vajra̍-hastaḥ | ma̱hi̱nā | ja̱ghā̱na̱ |
na | yā̱tava̍ḥ | i̱ndra̱ | jū̱ju̱vu̱ḥ | na̱ḥ | na | vanda̍nā | śa̱vi̱ṣṭha̱ | ve̱dyābhi̍ḥ |
saḥ | śa̱rdha̱t | a̱ryaḥ | viṣu̍ṇasya | ja̱ntoḥ | mā | śi̱śna-de̍vāḥ | api̍ | gu̱ḥ | ṛ̱tam | na̱ḥ |
a̱bhi | kratvā̍ | i̱ndra̱ | bhū̱ḥ | adha̍ | jman | na | te̱ | vi̱vya̱k | ma̱hi̱māna̍m | rajā̍ṁsi |
svena̍ | hi | vṛ̱tram | śava̍sā | ja̱ghantha̍ | na | śatru̍ḥ | anta̍m | vi̱vi̱da̱t | yu̱dhā | te̱ |
de̱vāḥ | ci̱t | te̱ | a̱su̱ryā̍ya | pūrve̍ | anu̍ | kṣa̱trāya̍ | ma̱mi̱re̱ | sahā̍ṁsi |
indra̍ḥ | ma̱ghāni̍ | da̱ya̱te̱ | vi̱-sahya̍ | indra̍m | vāja̍sya | jo̱hu̱va̱nta̱ | sā̱tau |
kī̱riḥ | ci̱t | hi | tvām | ava̍se | ju̱hāva̍ | īśā̍nam | i̱ndra̱ | saubha̍gasya | bhūre̍ḥ |
ava̍ḥ | ba̱bhū̱tha̱ | śa̱ta̱m-ū̱te̱ | a̱sme iti̍ | a̱bhi̱-kṣa̱ttuḥ | tvā-va̍taḥ | va̱rū̱tā |
sakhā̍yaḥ | te̱ | i̱ndra̱ | vi̱śvaha̍ | syā̱ma̱ | na̱ma̱ḥ-vṛ̱dhāsa̍ḥ | ma̱hi̱nā | ta̱ru̱tra̱ |
va̱nvantu̍ | sma̱ | te̱ | ava̍sā | sa̱m-ī̱ke | a̱bhi-i̍tim | a̱ryaḥ | va̱nuṣā̍m | śavā̍ṁsi |
saḥ | na̱ḥ | i̱ndra̱ | tva-ya̍tāyai | i̱ṣe | dhā̱ḥ | tmanā̍ | ca̱ | ye | ma̱gha-vā̍naḥ | ju̱nanti̍ |
vasvī̍ | su | te̱ | ja̱ri̱tre | a̱stu̱ | śa̱ktiḥ | yū̱yam | pā̱ta̱ | sva̱sti-bhi̍ḥ | sadā̍ | na̱ḥ |
piba̍ | soma̍m | i̱ndra̱ | manda̍tu | tvā̱ | yam | te̱ | su̱sāva̍ | ha̱ri̱-a̱śva̱ | adri̍ḥ |
so̱tuḥ | bā̱hu-bhyā̍m | su-ya̍taḥ | na | arvā̍ |
yaḥ | te̱ | mada̍ḥ | yujya̍ḥ | cāru̍ḥ | asti̍ | yena̍ | vṛ̱trāṇi̍ | ha̱ri̱-a̱śva̱ | haṁsi̍ |
saḥ | tvām | i̱ndra̱ | pra̱bhu̱va̱so̱ iti̍ prabhu-vaso | ma̱ma̱ttu̱ |
bodha̍ | su | me̱ | ma̱gha̱-va̱n | vāca̍m | ā | i̱mām | yām | te̱ | vasi̍ṣṭhaḥ | arca̍ti | pra-śa̍stim |
i̱mā | brahma̍ | sa̱dha̱-māde̍ | ju̱ṣa̱sva̱ |
śru̱dhi | hava̍m | vi̱-pi̱pā̱nasya̍ | adre̍ḥ | bodha̍ | vipra̍sya | arca̍taḥ | ma̱nī̱ṣām |
kṛ̱ṣva | duvā̍ṁsi | anta̍mā | sacā̍ | i̱mā |
na | te̱ | gira̍ḥ | api̍ | mṛ̱ṣye̱ | tu̱rasya̍ | na | su̱-stu̱tim | a̱su̱rya̍sya | vi̱dvān |
sadā̍ | te̱ | nāma̍ | sva̱-ya̱śa̱ḥ | vi̱va̱kmi̱ |
bhūri̍ | hi | te̱ | sava̍nā | mānu̍ṣeṣu | bhūri̍ | ma̱nī̱ṣī | ha̱va̱te̱ | tvām | it |
mā | ā̱re | a̱smat | ma̱gha̱-va̱n | jyok | ka̱riti̍ kaḥ |
tubhya̍ | it | i̱mā | sava̍nā | śū̱ra̱ | viśvā̍ | tubhya̍m | brahmā̍ṇi | vardha̍nā | kṛ̱ṇo̱mi̱ |
tvam | nṛ-bhi̍ḥ | havya̍ḥ | vi̱śvadhā̍ | a̱si̱ |
nu | ci̱t | nu | te̱ | manya̍mānasya | da̱sma̱ | ut | a̱śnu̱va̱nti̱ | ma̱hi̱māna̍m | u̱gra̱ |
na | vī̱rya̍m | i̱ndra̱ | te̱ | na | rādha̍ḥ |
ye | ca̱ | pūrve̍ | ṛṣa̍yaḥ | ye | ca̱ | nūtnā̍ḥ | indra̍ | brahmā̍ṇi | ja̱naya̍nta | viprā̍ḥ |
a̱sme iti̍ | te̱ | sa̱ntu̱ | sa̱khyā | śi̱vāni̍ | yū̱yam | pā̱ta̱ | sva̱sti-bhi̍ḥ | sadā̍ | na̱ḥ |
ut | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | brahmā̍ṇi | ai̱ra̱ta̱ | śra̱va̱syā | indra̍m | sa̱-ma̱rye | ma̱ha̱ya̱ | va̱si̱ṣṭha̱ |
ā | yaḥ | viśvā̍ni | śava̍sā | ta̱tāna̍ | u̱pa̱-śro̱tā | me̱ | īva̍taḥ | vacā̍ṁsi |
ayā̍mi | ghoṣa̍ḥ | i̱ndra̱ | de̱va-jā̍miḥ | i̱ra̱jyanta̍ | yat | śu̱rudha̍ḥ | vi-vā̍ci |
na̱hi | svam | āyu̍ḥ | ci̱ki̱te | jane̍ṣu | tāni̍ | it | aṁhā̍ṁsi | ati̍ | pa̱rṣi̱ | a̱smān |
yu̱je | ratha̍m | go̱-eṣa̍ṇam | hari̍-bhyām | upa̍ | brahmā̍ṇi | ju̱ju̱ṣā̱ṇam | a̱sthu̱ḥ |
vi | bā̱dhi̱ṣṭa̱ | syaḥ | roda̍sī̱ iti̍ | ma̱hi̱-tvā | indra̍ḥ | vṛ̱trāṇi̍ | a̱pra̱ti | ja̱gha̱nvān |
āpa̍ḥ | ci̱t | pi̱pyu̱ḥ | sta̱rya̍ḥ | na | gāva̍ḥ | nakṣa̍n | ṛ̱tam | ja̱ri̱tāra̍ḥ | te̱ | i̱ndra̱ |
yā̱hi | vā̱yuḥ | na | ni̱-yuta̍ḥ | na̱ḥ | accha̍ | tvam | hi | dhī̱bhiḥ | daya̍se | vi | vājā̍n |
te | tvā̱ | madā̍ḥ | i̱ndra̱ | mā̱da̱ya̱ntu̱ | śu̱ṣmiṇa̍m | tu̱vi̱-rādha̍sam | ja̱ri̱tre |
eka̍ḥ | de̱va̱-trā | daya̍se | hi | martā̍n | a̱smin | śū̱ra̱ | sava̍ne | mā̱da̱ya̱sva̱ |
e̱va | it | indra̍m | vṛṣa̍ṇam | vajra̍-bāhum | vasi̍ṣṭhāsaḥ | a̱bhi | a̱rca̱nti̱ | a̱rkaiḥ |
saḥ | na̱ḥ | stu̱taḥ | vī̱ra-va̍t | dhātu̍ | go-ma̍t | yū̱yam | pā̱ta̱ | sva̱sti-bhi̍ḥ | sadā̍ | na̱ḥ |
yoni̍ḥ | te̱ | i̱ndra̱ | sada̍ne | a̱kā̱ri̱ | tam | ā | nṛ-bhi̍ḥ | pu̱ru̱-hū̱ta̱ | pra | yā̱hi̱ |
asa̍ḥ | yathā̍ | na̱ḥ | a̱vi̱tā | vṛ̱dhe | ca̱ | dada̍ḥ | vasū̍ni | ma̱mada̍ḥ | ca̱ | somai̍ḥ |
gṛ̱bhī̱tam | te̱ | mana̍ḥ | i̱ndra̱ | dvi̱-barhā̍ḥ | su̱taḥ | soma̍ḥ | pari̍-siktā | madhū̍ni |
visṛ̍ṣṭa-dhenā | bha̱ra̱te̱ | su̱-vṛ̱ktiḥ | i̱yam | indra̍m | johu̍vatī | ma̱nī̱ṣā |
ā | na̱ḥ | di̱vaḥ | ā | pṛ̱thi̱vyāḥ | ṛ̱jī̱ṣi̱n | i̱dam | ba̱rhiḥ | so̱ma̱-peyā̍ya | yā̱hi̱ |
vaha̍ntu | tvā̱ | hara̍yaḥ | ma̱drya̍ñcam | ā̱ṅgū̱ṣam | accha̍ | ta̱vasa̍m | madā̍ya |
ā | na̱ḥ | viśvā̍bhiḥ | ū̱ti-bhi̍ḥ | sa̱-joṣā̍ḥ | brahma̍ | ju̱ṣā̱ṇaḥ | ha̱ri̱-a̱śva̱ | yā̱hi̱ |
varī̍vṛjat | sthavi̍rebhiḥ | su̱-śi̱pra̱ | a̱sme iti̍ | dadha̍t | vṛṣa̍ṇam | śuṣma̍m | i̱ndra̱ |
e̱ṣaḥ | stoma̍ḥ | ma̱he | u̱grāya̍ | vāhe̍ | dhu̱ri-i̍va | atya̍ḥ | na | vā̱jaya̍n | a̱dhā̱yi̱ |
indra̍ | tvā̱ | a̱yam | a̱rkaḥ | ī̱ṭṭe̱ | vasū̍nām | di̱vi-i̍va | dyām | adhi̍ | na̱ḥ | śroma̍tam | dhāḥ |
e̱va | na̱ḥ | i̱ndra̱ | vārya̍sya | pū̱rdhi̱ | pra | te̱ | ma̱hīm | su̱-ma̱tim | ve̱vi̱dā̱ma̱ |
iṣa̍m | pi̱nva̱ | ma̱ghava̍t-bhyaḥ | su̱-vīrā̍m | yū̱yam | pā̱ta̱ | sva̱sti-bhi̍ḥ | sadā̍ | na̱ḥ |
ā | te̱ | ma̱haḥ | i̱ndra̱ | ū̱tī | u̱gra̱ | sa-ma̍nyavaḥ | yat | sa̱m-ara̍nta | senā̍ḥ |
patā̍ti | di̱dyut | narya̍sya | bā̱hvoḥ | mā | te̱ | mana̍ḥ | vi̱ṣva̱drya̍k | vi | cā̱rī̱t |
ni | du̱ḥ-ge | i̱ndra̱ | śna̱thi̱hi̱ | a̱mitrā̍n | a̱bhi | ye | na̱ḥ | martā̍saḥ | a̱manti̍ |
ā̱re | tam | śaṁsa̍m | kṛ̱ṇu̱hi̱ | ni̱ni̱tsoḥ | ā | na̱ḥ | bha̱ra̱ | sa̱m-bhara̍ṇam | vasū̍nām |
śa̱tam | te̱ | śi̱pri̱n | ū̱taya̍ḥ | su̱-dāse̍ | sa̱hasra̍m | śaṁsā̍ḥ | u̱ta | rā̱tiḥ | a̱stu̱ |
ja̱hi | vadha̍ḥ | va̱nuṣa̍ḥ | martya̍sya | a̱sme iti̍ | dyu̱mnam | adhi̍ | ratna̍m | ca̱ | dhe̱hi̱ |
tvā-va̍taḥ | hi | i̱ndra̱ | kratve̍ | asmi̍ | tvā-va̍taḥ | a̱vi̱tuḥ | śū̱ra̱ | rā̱tau |
viśvā̍ | it | ahā̍ni | ta̱vi̱ṣī̱-va̱ḥ | u̱gra̱ | oka̍ḥ | kṛ̱ṇu̱ṣva̱ | ha̱ri̱-va̱ḥ | na | ma̱rdhī̱ḥ |
kutsā̍ḥ | e̱te | haryi̍-aśvāya | śū̱ṣam | indre̍ | saha̍ḥ | de̱va-jū̍tam | i̱yā̱nāḥ |
sa̱trā | kṛ̱dhi̱ | su̱-hanā̍ | śū̱ra̱ | vṛ̱trā | va̱yam | taru̍trāḥ | sa̱nu̱yā̱ma̱ | vāja̍m |
e̱va | na̱ḥ | i̱ndra̱ | vārya̍sya | pū̱rdhi̱ | pra | te̱ | ma̱hīm | su̱-ma̱tim | ve̱vi̱dā̱ma̱ |
iṣa̍m | pi̱nva̱ | ma̱ghava̍t-bhyaḥ | su̱-vīrā̍m | yū̱yam | pā̱ta̱ | sva̱sti-bhi̍ḥ | sadā̍ | na̱ḥ |
na | soma̍ḥ | indra̍m | asu̍taḥ | ma̱mā̱da̱ | na | abra̍hmāṇaḥ | ma̱gha-vā̍nam | su̱tāsa̍ḥ |
tasmai̍ | u̱ktham | ja̱na̱ye̱ | yat | jujo̍ṣat | nṛ̱-vat | navī̍yaḥ | śṛ̱ṇava̍t | yathā̍ | na̱ḥ |
u̱kthe-u̍kthe | soma̍ḥ | indra̍m | ma̱mā̱da̱ | nī̱the-nī̍the | ma̱gha-vā̍nam | su̱tāsa̍ḥ |
yat | ī̱m | sa̱-bādha̍ḥ | pi̱tara̍m | na | pu̱trāḥ | sa̱mā̱na-da̍kṣāḥ | ava̍se | hava̍nte |
ca̱kāra̍ | tā | kṛ̱ṇava̍t | nū̱nam | a̱nyā | yāni̍ | bru̱vanti̍ | ve̱dhasa̍ḥ | su̱teṣu̍ |
janī̍ḥ-iva | pati̍ḥ | eka̍ḥ | sa̱mā̱naḥ | ni | ma̱mṛ̱je̱ | pura̍ḥ | indra̍ḥ | su | sarvā̍ḥ |
e̱va | tam | ā̱hu̱ḥ | u̱ta | śṛ̱ṇve̱ | indra̍ḥ | eka̍ḥ | vi̱-bha̱ktā | ta̱raṇi̍ḥ | ma̱ghānā̍m |
mi̱tha̱ḥ-tura̍ḥ | ū̱taya̍ḥ | yasya̍ | pū̱rvīḥ | a̱sme iti̍ | bha̱drāṇi̍ | sa̱śca̱ta̱ | pri̱yāṇi̍ |
e̱va | vasi̍ṣṭhaḥ | indra̍m | ū̱taye̍ | nṝn | kṛ̱ṣṭī̱nām | vṛ̱ṣa̱bham | su̱te | gṛ̱ṇā̱ti̱ |
sa̱ha̱sriṇa̍ḥ | upa̍ | na̱ḥ | mā̱hi̱ | vājā̍n | yū̱yam | pā̱ta̱ | sva̱sti-bhi̍ḥ | sadā̍ | na̱ḥ |
indra̍m | nara̍ḥ | ne̱ma-dhi̍tā | ha̱va̱nte̱ | yat | pāryā̍ḥ | yu̱naja̍te | dhiya̍ḥ | tāḥ |
śūra̍ḥ | nṛ-sā̍tā | śava̍saḥ | ca̱kā̱naḥ | ā | go-ma̍ti | vra̱je | bha̱ja̱ | tvam | na̱ḥ |
yaḥ | i̱ndra̱ | śuṣma̍ḥ | ma̱gha̱-va̱n | te̱ | asti̍ | śikṣa̍ | sakhi̍-bhyaḥ | pu̱ru̱-hū̱ta̱ | nṛ-bhya̍ḥ |
tvam | hi | dṛ̱ḻhā | ma̱gha̱-va̱n | vi-ce̍tāḥ | apa̍ | vṛ̱dhi̱ | pari̍-vṛtam | na | rādha̍ḥ |
indra̍ḥ | rājā̍ | jaga̍taḥ | ca̱rṣa̱ṇī̱nām | adhi̍ | kṣami̍ | viṣu̍-rūpam | yat | asti̍ |
tata̍ḥ | da̱dā̱ti̱ | dā̱śuṣe̍ | vasū̍ni | coda̍t | rādha̍ḥ | upa̍-stutaḥ | ci̱t | a̱rvāk |
nu | ci̱t | na̱ḥ | indra̍ḥ | ma̱gha-vā̍ | sa-hū̍tī | dā̱naḥ | vāja̍m | ni | ya̱ma̱te̱ | na̱ḥ | ū̱tī |
anū̍nā | yasya̍ | dakṣi̍ṇā | pī̱pāya̍ | vā̱mam | nṛ-bhya̍ḥ | a̱bhi-vī̍tā | sakhi̍-bhyaḥ |
nu | i̱ndra̱ | rā̱ye | vari̍vaḥ | kṛ̱dhi̱ | na̱ḥ | ā | te̱ | mana̍ḥ | va̱vṛ̱tyā̱ma̱ | ma̱ghāya̍ |
go-ma̍t | aśva̍-vat | ratha̍-vat | vyanta̍ḥ | yū̱yam | pā̱ta̱ | sva̱sti-bhi̍ḥ | sadā̍ | na̱ḥ |
brahma̍ | na̱ḥ | i̱ndra̱ | upa̍ | yā̱hi̱ | vi̱dvān | a̱rvāñca̍ḥ | te̱ | hara̍yaḥ | sa̱ntu̱ | yu̱ktāḥ |
viśve̍ | ci̱t | hi | tvā̱ | vi̱-hava̍nta | martā̍ḥ | a̱smāka̍m | it | śṛ̱ṇu̱hi̱ | vi̱śva̱m-i̱nva̱ |
hava̍m | te̱ | i̱ndra̱ | ma̱hi̱mā | vi | ā̱na̱ṭ | brahma̍ | yat | pāsi̍ | śa̱va̱si̱n | ṛṣī̍ṇām |
ā | yat | vajra̍m | da̱dhi̱ṣe | haste̍ | u̱gra̱ | gho̱raḥ | san | kratvā̍ | ja̱ni̱ṣṭhā̱ḥ | aṣā̍ḻhaḥ |
tava̍ | pra-nī̍tī | i̱ndra̱ | johu̍vānān | sam | yat | nṝn | na | roda̍sī̱ iti̍ | ni̱netha̍ |
ma̱he | kṣa̱trāya̍ | śava̍se | hi | ja̱jñe | atū̍tujim | ci̱t | tūtu̍jiḥ | a̱śi̱śna̱t |
e̱bhiḥ | na̱ḥ | i̱ndra̱ | aha̍-bhiḥ | da̱śa̱sya̱ | du̱ḥ-mi̱trāsa̍ḥ | hi | kṣi̱taya̍ḥ | pava̍nte |
prati̍ | yat | caṣṭe̍ | anṛ̍tam | a̱ne̱nāḥ | ava̍ | dvi̱tā | varu̍ṇaḥ | mā̱yī | na̱ḥ | sā̱t |
vo̱cema̍ | it | indra̍m | ma̱gha-vā̍nam | e̱na̱m | ma̱haḥ | rā̱yaḥ | rādha̍saḥ | yat | dada̍t | na̱ḥ |
yaḥ | arca̍taḥ | brahma̍-kṛtim | avi̍ṣṭhaḥ | yū̱yam | pā̱ta̱ | sva̱sti-bhi̍ḥ | sadā̍ | na̱ḥ |
a̱yam | soma̍ḥ | i̱ndra̱ | tubhya̍m | su̱nve̱ | ā | tu | pra | yā̱hi̱ | ha̱ri̱-va̱ḥ | tat-o̍kāḥ |
piba̍ | tu | a̱sya | su-su̍tasya | cāro̍ḥ | dada̍ḥ | ma̱ghāni̍ | ma̱gha̱-va̱n | i̱yā̱naḥ |
brahma̍n | vī̱ra̱ | brahma̍-kṛtim | ju̱ṣā̱ṇaḥ | a̱rvā̱cī̱naḥ | hari̍-bhiḥ | yā̱hi̱ | tūya̍m |
a̱smin | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | su | sava̍ne | mā̱da̱ya̱sva̱ | upa̍ | brahmā̍ṇi | śṛ̱ṇa̱va̱ḥ | i̱mā | na̱ḥ |
kā | te̱ | a̱sti̱ | ara̍m-kṛtiḥ | su̱-u̱ktaiḥ | ka̱dā | nū̱nam | te̱ | ma̱gha̱-va̱n | dā̱śe̱ma̱ |
viśvā̍ḥ | ma̱tīḥ | ā | ta̱ta̱ne̱ | tvā̱-yā | adha̍ | me̱ | i̱ndra̱ | śṛ̱ṇa̱va̱ḥ | havā̍ | i̱mā |
u̱to iti̍ | gha̱ | te | pu̱ru̱ṣyā̍ḥ | it | ā̱sa̱n | yeṣā̍m | pūrve̍ṣām | a̱śṛ̱ṇo̱ḥ | ṛṣī̍ṇām |
adha̍ | a̱ham | tvā̱ | ma̱gha̱-va̱n | jo̱ha̱vī̱mi̱ | tvam | na̱ḥ | i̱ndra̱ | a̱si̱ | pra-ma̍tiḥ | pi̱tā-i̍va |
vo̱cema̍ | it | indra̍m | ma̱gha-vā̍nam | e̱na̱m | ma̱haḥ | ra̱yaḥ | rādha̍saḥ | yat | dada̍t | na̱ḥ |
yaḥ | arca̍taḥ | brahma̍-kṛtim | avi̍ṣṭhaḥ | yū̱yam | pā̱ta̱ | sva̱sti-bhi̍ḥ | sadā̍ | na̱ḥ |
ā | na̱ḥ | de̱va̱ | śava̍sā | yā̱hi̱ | śu̱ṣmi̱n | bhava̍ | vṛ̱dhaḥ | i̱ndra̱ | rā̱yaḥ | a̱sya |
ma̱he | nṛ̱mṇāya̍ | nṛ̱-pa̱te̱ | su̱-va̱jra̱ | mahi̍ | kṣa̱trāya̍ | pauṁsyā̍ya | śū̱ra̱ |
hava̍nte | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | tvā̱ | havya̍m | vi-vā̍ci | ta̱nūṣu̍ | śūrā̍ḥ | sūrya̍sya | sā̱tau |
tvam | viśve̍ṣu | senya̍ḥ | jane̍ṣu | tvam | vṛ̱trāṇi̍ | ra̱ndha̱ya̱ | su̱-hantu̍ |
ahā̍ | yat | i̱ndra̱ | su̱-dinā̍ | vi̱-u̱cchān | dadha̍ḥ | yat | ke̱tum | u̱pa̱-mam | sa̱mat-su̍ |
ni | a̱gniḥ | sī̱da̱t | asu̍raḥ | na | hotā̍ | hu̱vā̱naḥ | atra̍ | su̱-bhagā̍ya | de̱vān |
va̱yam | te | te̱ | i̱ndra̱ | ye | ca̱ | de̱va̱ | stava̍nta | śū̱ra̱ | dada̍taḥ | ma̱ghāni̍ |
yaccha̍ | sū̱ri-bhya̍ḥ | u̱pa̱-mam | varū̍tham | su̱-ā̱bhuva̍ḥ | ja̱ra̱ṇām | a̱śna̱va̱nta̱ |
vo̱cema̍ | it | indra̍m | ma̱gha-vā̍nam | e̱na̱m | ma̱haḥ | rā̱yaḥ | rādha̍saḥ | yat | dada̍t | na̱ḥ |
yaḥ | arca̍taḥ | brahma̍-kṛtim | avi̍ṣṭhaḥ | yū̱yam | pā̱ta̱ | sva̱sti-bhi̍ḥ | sadā̍ | na̱ḥ |
pra | va̱ḥ | indrā̍ya | māda̍nam | hari̍-aśvāya | gā̱ya̱ta̱ |
sakhā̍yaḥ | so̱ma̱-pāvne̍ |
śaṁsa̍ | it | u̱ktham | su̱-dāna̍ve | u̱ta | dyu̱kṣam | yathā̍ | nara̍ḥ |
ca̱kṛ̱ma | sa̱tya-rā̍dhase |
tvam | na̱ḥ | i̱ndra̱ | vā̱ja̱-yuḥ | tvam | ga̱vyuḥ | śa̱ta̱kra̱to̱ iti̍ śata-krato |
tvam | hi̱ra̱ṇya̱-yuḥ | va̱so̱ iti̍ |
va̱yam | i̱ndra̱ | tvā̱-yava̍ḥ | a̱bhi | pra | no̱nu̱ma̱ḥ | vṛ̱ṣa̱n |
vi̱ddhi | tu | a̱sya | na̱ḥ | va̱so̱ iti̍ |
mā | na̱ḥ | ni̱de | ca̱ | vakta̍ve | a̱ryaḥ | ra̱ndhī̱ḥ | arā̍vṇe |
tve iti̍ | api̍ | kratu̍ḥ | mama̍ |
tvam | varma̍ | a̱si̱ | sa̱-pratha̍ḥ | pu̱ra̱ḥ-yo̱dhaḥ | ca̱ | vṛ̱tra̱-ha̱n |
tvayā̍ | prati̍ | bru̱ve̱ | yu̱jā |
ma̱hān | u̱ta | a̱si̱ | yasya̍ | te̱ | anu̍ | sva̱dhāva̍rī̱ iti̍ sva̱dhā-va̍rī | saha̍ḥ |
ma̱mnāte̱ iti̍ | i̱ndra̱ | roda̍sī̱ iti̍ |
tam | tvā̱ | ma̱rutva̍tī | pari̍ | bhuva̍t | vāṇī̍ | sa̱-yāva̍rī |
nakṣa̍māṇā | sa̱ha | dyu-bhi̍ḥ |
ū̱rdhvāsa̍ḥ | tvā̱ | anu̍ | inda̍vaḥ | bhuva̍n | da̱smam | upa̍ | dyavi̍ |
sam | te̱ | na̱ma̱nta̱ | kṛ̱ṣṭaya̍ḥ |
pra | va̱ḥ | ma̱he | ma̱hi̱-vṛdhe̍ | bha̱ra̱dhva̱m | pra-ce̍tase | pra | su̱-ma̱tim | kṛ̱ṇu̱dhva̱m |
viśa̍ḥ | pū̱rvīḥ | pra | ca̱ra̱ | ca̱rṣa̱ṇi̱-prāḥ |
u̱ru̱-vyaca̍se | ma̱hine̍ | su̱-vṛ̱ktim | indrā̍ya | brahma̍ | ja̱na̱ya̱nta̱ | viprā̍ḥ |
tasya̍ | vra̱tāni̍ | na | mi̱na̱nti̱ | dhīrā̍ḥ |
indra̍m | vāṇī̍ḥ | anu̍tta-manyum | e̱va | sa̱trā | rājā̍nam | da̱dhi̱re̱ | saha̍dhyai |
hari̍-aśvāya | ba̱rha̱ya̱ | sam | ā̱pīn |
mo iti̍ | su | tvā̱ | vā̱ghata̍ḥ | ca̱na | ā̱re | a̱smat | ni | rī̱ra̱ma̱n |
ā̱rāttā̍t | ci̱t | sa̱dha̱-māda̍m | na̱ḥ | ā | ga̱hi̱ | i̱ha | vā̱ | san | upa̍ | śru̱dhi̱ |
i̱me | hi | te̱ | bra̱hma̱-kṛta̍ḥ | su̱te | sacā̍ | madhau̍ | na | makṣa̍ḥ | āsa̍te |
indre̍ | kāma̍m | ja̱ri̱tāra̍ḥ | va̱su̱-yava̍ḥ | rathe̍ | na | pāda̍m | ā | da̱dhu̱ḥ |
rā̱yaḥ-kā̍maḥ | vajra̍-hastam | su̱-dakṣi̍ṇam | pu̱traḥ | na | pi̱tara̍m | hu̱ve̱ |
i̱me | indrā̍ya | su̱nvi̱re̱ | somā̍saḥ | dadhi̍-āśiraḥ |
tān | ā | madā̍ya | va̱jra̱-ha̱sta̱ | pī̱taye̍ | hari̍-bhyām | yā̱hi̱ | oka̍ḥ | ā |
śrava̍t | śrut-ka̍rṇaḥ | ī̱ya̱te̱ | vasū̍nām | nu | ci̱t | na̱ḥ | ma̱rdhi̱ṣa̱t | gira̍ḥ |
sa̱dyaḥ | ci̱t | yaḥ | sa̱hasrā̍ṇi | śa̱tā | dada̍t | naki̍ḥ | ditsa̍ntam | ā | mi̱na̱t |
saḥ | vī̱raḥ | apra̍ti-skutaḥ | indre̍ṇa | śū̱śu̱ve̱ | nṛ-bhi̍ḥ |
yaḥ | te̱ | ga̱bhī̱rā | sava̍nāni | vṛ̱tra̱-ha̱n | su̱noti̍ | ā | ca̱ | dhāva̍ti |
bhava̍ | varū̍tham | ma̱gha̱-va̱n | ma̱ghonā̍m | yat | sa̱m-ajā̍si | śardha̍taḥ |
vi | tvā-ha̍tasya | veda̍nam | bha̱je̱ma̱hi̱ | ā | du̱ḥ-naśa̍ḥ | bha̱ra̱ | gaya̍m |
su̱nota̍ | so̱ma̱-pāvne̍ | soma̍m | indrā̍ya | va̱jriṇe̍ |
paca̍ta | pa̱ktīḥ | ava̍se | kṛ̱ṇu̱dhvam | it | pṛ̱ṇan | it | pṛ̱ṇa̱te | maya̍ḥ |
mā | sre̱dha̱ta̱ | so̱mi̱na̱ḥ | dakṣa̍ta | ma̱he | kṛ̱ṇu̱dhvam | rā̱ye | ā̱-tuje̍ |
ta̱raṇi̍ḥ | it | ja̱ya̱ti̱ | kṣeti̍ | puṣya̍ti | na | de̱vāsa̍ḥ | ka̱va̱tnave̍ |
naki̍ḥ | su̱-dāsa̍ḥ | ratha̍m | pari̍ | ā̱sa̱ | na | rī̱ra̱ma̱t |
indra̍ḥ | yasya̍ | a̱vi̱tā | yasya̍ | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | gama̍t | saḥ | go-ma̍ti | vra̱je |
gama̍t | vāja̍m | vā̱jaya̍n | i̱ndra̱ | martya̍ḥ | yasya̍ | tvam | a̱vi̱tā | bhuva̍ḥ |
a̱smāka̍m | bo̱dhi̱ | a̱vi̱tā | rathā̍nām | a̱smāka̍m | śū̱ra̱ | nṛ̱ṇām |
ut | it | nu | a̱sya̱ | ri̱cya̱te̱ | aṁśa̍ḥ | dhana̍m | na | ji̱gyuṣa̍ḥ |
yaḥ | indra̍ḥ | hari̍-vān | na | da̱bha̱nti̱ | tam | ripa̍ḥ | dakṣa̍m | da̱dhā̱ti̱ | so̱mini̍ |
mantra̍m | akha̍rvam | su-dhi̍tam | su̱-peśa̍sam | dadhā̍ta | ya̱jñiye̍ṣu | ā |

kaḥ | tam | i̱ndra̱ | tvā-va̍sum | ā | martya̍ḥ | da̱dha̱rṣa̱ti̱ |
śra̱ddhā | it | te̱ | ma̱gha̱-va̱n | pārye̍ | di̱vi | vā̱jī | vāja̍m | si̱sā̱sa̱ti̱ |
ma̱ghona̍ḥ | sma̱ | vṛ̱tra̱-hatye̍ṣu | co̱da̱ya̱ | ye | dada̍ti | pri̱yā | vasu̍ |
tava̍ | pra-nī̍tī | ha̱ri̱-a̱śva̱ | sū̱ri-bhi̍ḥ | viśvā̍ | ta̱re̱ma̱ | du̱ḥ-i̱tā |
tava̍ | it | i̱ndra̱ | a̱va̱mam | vasu̍ | tvam | pu̱ṣya̱si̱ | ma̱dhya̱mam |
sa̱trā | viśva̍sya | pa̱ra̱masya̍ | rā̱ja̱si̱ | naki̍ḥ | tvā̱ | goṣu̍ | vṛ̱ṇva̱te̱ |
tvam | viśva̍sya | dha̱na̱-dāḥ | a̱si̱ | śru̱taḥ | ye | ī̱m | bhava̍nti | ā̱jaya̍ḥ |
tava̍ | a̱yam | viśva̍ḥ | pu̱ru̱-hū̱ta̱ | pārthi̍vaḥ | a̱va̱syuḥ | nāma̍ | bhi̱kṣa̱te̱ |
yat | i̱ndra̱ | yāva̍taḥ | tvam | e̱tāva̍t | a̱ham | īśī̍ya |

ta̱raṇi̍ḥ | it | si̱sā̱sa̱ti̱ | vāja̍m | pura̍m-dhyā | yu̱jā |

na | du̱ḥ-stu̱tī | martya̍ḥ | vi̱nda̱te̱ | vasu̍ | na | sredha̍ntam | ra̱yiḥ | na̱śa̱t |
su̱-śakti̍ḥ | it | ma̱gha̱-va̱n | tubhya̍m | mā-va̍te | de̱ṣṇam | yat | pārye̍ | di̱vi |
a̱bhi | tvā̱ | śū̱ra̱ | no̱nu̱ma̱ḥ | adu̍gdhāḥ-iva | dhe̱nava̍ḥ |
īśā̍nam | a̱sya | jaga̍taḥ | sva̱ḥ-dṛśa̍m | īśā̍nam | i̱ndra̱ | ta̱sthuṣa̍ḥ |
na | tvā-vā̍n | a̱nyaḥ | di̱vyaḥ | na | pārthi̍vaḥ | na | jā̱taḥ | na | ja̱ni̱ṣya̱te̱ |

pu̱ru̱-vasu̍ḥ | hi | ma̱gha̱-va̱n | sa̱nāt | asi̍ | bhare̍-bhare | ca̱ | havya̍ḥ |
parā̍ | nu̱da̱sva̱ | ma̱gha̱-va̱n | a̱mitrā̍n | su̱-vedā̍ | na̱ḥ | vasu̍ | kṛ̱dhi̱ |
a̱smāka̍m | bo̱dhi̱ | a̱vi̱tā | ma̱hā̱-dha̱ne | bhava̍ | vṛ̱dhaḥ | sakhī̍nām |

mā | na̱ḥ | ajñā̍tāḥ | vṛ̱janā̍ḥ | du̱ḥ-ā̱dhya̍ḥ | mā | aśi̍vāsaḥ | ava̍ | kra̱mu̱ḥ |
tvayā̍ | va̱yam | pra̱-vata̍ḥ | śaśva̍tīḥ | a̱paḥ | ati̍ | śū̱ra̱ | ta̱rā̱ma̱si̱ |
śvi̱tyañca̍ḥ | mā | da̱kṣi̱ṇa̱taḥ-ka̍pardāḥ | dhi̱ya̱m-ji̱nvāsa̍ḥ | a̱bhi | hi | pra̱-ma̱nduḥ |
u̱t-tiṣṭha̍n | vo̱ce̱ | pari̍ | ba̱rhiṣa̍ḥ | nṝn | na | me̱ | dū̱rāt | avi̍tave | vasi̍ṣṭhāḥ |
dū̱rāt | indra̍m | a̱na̱ya̱n | ā | su̱tena̍ | ti̱raḥ | vai̱śa̱ntam | ati̍ | pānta̍m | u̱gram |
pāśa̍-dyumnasya | vā̱ya̱tasya̍ | somā̍t | su̱tāt | indra̍ḥ | a̱vṛ̱ṇī̱ta̱ | vasi̍ṣṭhān |
e̱va | it | nu | ka̱m | sindhu̍m | e̱bhi̱ḥ | ta̱tā̱ra̱ | e̱va | it | nu | ka̱m | bhe̱dam | e̱bhi̱ḥ | ja̱ghā̱na̱ |
e̱va | it | nu | ka̱m | dā̱śa̱-rā̱jñe | su̱-dāsa̍m | pra | ā̱va̱t | indra̍ḥ | brahma̍ṇā | va̱ḥ | va̱si̱ṣṭhā̱ḥ |
juṣṭī̍ | na̱ra̱ḥ | brahma̍ṇā | va̱ḥ | pi̱tṝ̱ṇām | akṣa̍m | a̱vya̱ya̱m | na | kila̍ | ri̱ṣā̱tha̱ |
yat | śakva̍rīṣu | bṛ̱ha̱tā | rave̍ṇa | indre̍ | śuṣma̍m | ada̍dhāta | va̱si̱ṣṭhā̱ḥ |
ut | dyām-i̍va | it | tṛ̱ṣṇa-ja̍ḥ | nā̱thi̱tāsa̍ḥ | adī̍dhayuḥ | dā̱śa̱-rā̱jñe | vṛ̱tāsa̍ḥ |
vasi̍ṣṭhasya | stu̱va̱taḥ | indra̍ḥ | a̱śro̱t | u̱rum | tṛtsu̍-bhyaḥ | a̱kṛ̱ṇo̱t | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | lo̱kam |
da̱ṇḍāḥ-i̍va | it | go̱-aja̍nāsaḥ | ā̱sa̱n | pari̍-chinnāḥ | bha̱ra̱tāḥ | a̱rbha̱kāsa̍ḥ |
abha̍vat | ca̱ | pu̱ra̱ḥ-e̱tā | vasi̍ṣṭhaḥ | āt | it | tṛtsū̍nām | viśa̍ḥ | a̱pra̱tha̱nta̱ |
traya̍ḥ | kṛ̱ṇva̱nti̱ | bhuva̍neṣu | reta̍ḥ | ti̱sraḥ | pra̱-jāḥ | āryā̍ḥ | jyoti̍ḥ-agrāḥ |
traya̍ḥ | gha̱rmāsa̍ḥ | u̱ṣasa̍m | sa̱ca̱nte̱ | sarvā̍n | it | tān | anu̍ | vi̱du̱ḥ | vasi̍ṣṭhāḥ |
sūrya̍sya-iva | va̱kṣatha̍ḥ | jyoti̍ḥ | e̱ṣā̱m | sa̱mu̱drasya̍-iva | ma̱hi̱mā | ga̱bhī̱raḥ |
vāta̍sya-iva | pra̱-ja̱vaḥ | na | a̱nyena̍ | stoma̍ḥ | va̱si̱ṣṭhā̱ḥ | anu̍-etave | va̱ḥ |
te | it | ni̱ṇyam | hṛda̍yasya | pra̱-ke̱taiḥ | sa̱hasra̍-valśam | a̱bhi | sam | ca̱ra̱nti̱ |
ya̱mena̍ | ta̱tam | pa̱ri̱-dhim | vaya̍ntaḥ | a̱psa̱rasa̍ḥ | upa̍ | se̱du̱ḥ | vasi̍ṣṭhāḥ |
vi̱-dyuta̍ḥ | jyoti̍ḥ | pari̍ | sa̱m-jihā̍nam | mi̱trāvaru̍ṇā | yat | apa̍śyatām | tvā̱ |
tat | te̱ | janma̍ | u̱ta | eka̍m | va̱si̱ṣṭha̱ | a̱gastya̍ḥ | yat | tvā̱ | vi̱śaḥ | ā̱-ja̱bhāra̍ |
u̱ta | a̱si̱ | mai̱trā̱va̱ru̱ṇaḥ | va̱si̱ṣṭha̱ | u̱rvaśyā̍ḥ | bra̱hma̱n | mana̍saḥ | adhi̍ | jā̱taḥ |
dra̱psam | ska̱nnam | brahma̍ṇā | daivye̍na | viśve̍ | de̱vāḥ | puṣka̍re | tvā̱ | a̱da̱da̱nta̱ |
saḥ | pra̱-ke̱taḥ | u̱bhaya̍sya | pra̱-vi̱dvān | sa̱hasra̍-dānaḥ | u̱ta | vā̱ | sa-dā̍naḥ |
ya̱mena̍ | ta̱tam | pa̱ri̱-dhim | va̱yi̱ṣyan | a̱psa̱rasa̍ḥ | pari̍ | ja̱jñe̱ | vasi̍ṣṭhaḥ |
sa̱tre | ha̱ | jā̱tau | i̱ṣi̱tā | nama̍ḥ-bhiḥ | ku̱mbhe | reta̍ḥ | si̱si̱ca̱tu̱ḥ | sa̱mā̱nam |
tata̍ḥ | ha̱ | māna̍ḥ | ut | i̱yā̱ya̱ | madhyā̍t | tata̍ḥ | jā̱tam | ṛṣi̍m | ā̱hu̱ḥ | vasi̍ṣṭham |
u̱ktha̱-bhṛta̍m | sā̱ma̱-bhṛta̍m | bi̱bha̱rti̱ | grāvā̍ṇam | bibhra̍t | pra | va̱dā̱ti̱ | agre̍ |
upa̍ | e̱na̱m | ā̱dhva̱m | su̱-ma̱na̱syamā̍nāḥ | ā | va̱ḥ | ga̱cchā̱ti̱ | pra̱-tṛ̱da̱ḥ | vasi̍ṣṭhaḥ |
pra | śu̱krā | e̱tu̱ | de̱vī | ma̱nī̱ṣā | a̱smat | su-ta̍ṣṭaḥ | ratha̍ḥ | na | vā̱jī |
vi̱duḥ | pṛ̱thi̱vyāḥ | di̱vaḥ | ja̱nitra̍m | śṛ̱ṇvanti̍ | āpa̍ḥ | adha̍ | kṣara̍ntīḥ |
āpa̍ḥ | ci̱t | a̱smai̱ | pinva̍nta | pṛ̱thvīḥ | vṛ̱treṣu̍ | śūrā̍ḥ | maṁsa̍nte | u̱grāḥ |
ā | dhū̱ḥ-su | a̱smai̱ | dadhā̍ta | aśvā̍n | indra̍ḥ | na | va̱jrī | hira̍ṇya-bāhuḥ |
a̱bhi | pra | sthā̱ta̱ | aha̍-iva | ya̱jñam | yātā̍-iva | patma̍n | tmanā̍ | hi̱no̱ta̱ |
tmanā̍ | sa̱mat-su̍ | hi̱nota̍ | ya̱jñam | dadhā̍ta | ke̱tum | janā̍ya | vī̱ram |
ut | a̱sya̱ | śuṣmā̍t | bhā̱nuḥ | na | ā̱rta̱ | bibha̍rti | bhā̱ram | pṛ̱thi̱vī | na | bhūma̍ |
hvayā̍mi | de̱vān | ayā̍tuḥ | a̱gne̱ | sādha̍n | ṛ̱tena̍ | dhiya̍m | da̱dhā̱mi̱ |
a̱bhi | va̱ḥ | de̱vīm | dhiya̍m | da̱dhi̱dhva̱m | pra | va̱ḥ | de̱va̱-trā | vāca̍m | kṛ̱ṇu̱dhva̱m |
ā | ca̱ṣṭe̱ | ā̱sā̱m | pātha̍ḥ | na̱dīnā̍m | varu̍ṇaḥ | u̱graḥ | sa̱hasra̍-cakṣāḥ |
rājā̍ | rā̱ṣṭrānā̍m | peśa̍ḥ | na̱dīnā̍m | anu̍ttam | a̱smai̱ | kṣa̱tram | vi̱śva-ā̍yu |
avi̍ṣṭo̱ iti̍ | a̱smān | viśvā̍su | vi̱kṣu | adyu̍m | kṛ̱ṇo̱ta̱ | śaṁsa̍m | ni̱ni̱tsoḥ |
vi | e̱tu̱ | di̱dyut | dvi̱ṣām | aśe̍vā | yu̱yota̍ | viṣva̍k | rapa̍ḥ | ta̱nūnā̍m |
avī̍t | na̱ḥ | a̱gniḥ | ha̱vya̱-at | nama̍ḥ-bhiḥ | preṣṭha̍ḥ | a̱smai̱ | a̱dhā̱yi̱ | stoma̍ḥ |
sa̱-jūḥ | de̱vebhi̍ḥ | a̱pām | napā̍tam | sakhā̍yam | kṛ̱dhva̱m | śi̱vaḥ | na̱ḥ | a̱stu̱ |
a̱p-jām | u̱kthaiḥ | ahi̍m | gṛ̱ṇī̱ṣe̱ | bu̱dhne | na̱dīnā̍m | raja̍ḥ-su | sīda̍n |
mā | na̱ḥ | ahi̍ḥ | bu̱dhnya̍ḥ | ri̱ṣe | dhā̱t | mā | ya̱jñaḥ | a̱sya̱ | sri̱dha̱t | ṛ̱ta̱-yoḥ |
u̱ta | na̱ḥ | e̱ṣu | nṛṣu̍ | śrava̍ḥ | dhu̱ḥ | pra | rā̱ye | ya̱ntu̱ | śardha̍ntaḥ | a̱ryaḥ |
tapa̍nti | śatru̍m | sva̍ḥ | na | bhūma̍ | ma̱hā-se̍nāsaḥ | ame̍bhiḥ | e̱ṣā̱m |
ā | yat | na̱ḥ | patnī̍ḥ | gama̍nti | accha̍ | tvaṣṭā̍ | su̱-pā̱ṇiḥ | dadhā̍tu | vī̱rān |
prati̍ | na̱ḥ | stoma̍m | tvaṣṭā̍ | ju̱ṣe̱ta̱ | syāt | a̱sme iti̍ | a̱rama̍tiḥ | va̱su̱-yuḥ |
tā | na̱ḥ | rā̱sa̱n | rā̱ti̱-sāca̍ḥ | vasū̍ni | ā | roda̍sī̱ iti̍ | va̱ru̱ṇā̱nī | śṛ̱ṇo̱tu̱ |
varū̍trībhiḥ | su̱-śa̱ra̱ṇaḥ | na̱ḥ | a̱stu̱ | tvaṣṭā̍ | su̱-datra̍ḥ | vi | da̱dhā̱tu̱ | rāya̍ḥ |
tat | na̱ḥ | rāya̍ḥ | parva̍tāḥ | tat | na̱ḥ | āpa̍ḥ | tat | rā̱ti̱-sāca̍ḥ | oṣa̍dhīḥ | u̱ta | dyauḥ |
vana̱spati̍-bhiḥ | pṛ̱thi̱vī | sa̱-joṣā̍ḥ | u̱bhe iti̍ | roda̍sī̱ iti̍ | pari̍ | pā̱sa̱ta̱ḥ | na̱ḥ |
anu̍ | tat | u̱rvī iti̍ | roda̍sī̱ iti̍ | ji̱hā̱tā̱m | anu̍ | dyu̱kṣaḥ | varu̍ṇaḥ | indra̍-sakhā |
anu̍ | viśve̍ | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | ye | sa̱hāsa̍ḥ | rā̱yaḥ | syā̱ma̱ | dha̱ruṇa̍m | dhi̱yadhyai̍ |
tat | na̱ḥ | indra̍ḥ | varu̍ṇaḥ | mi̱traḥ | a̱gniḥ | āpa̍ḥ | oṣa̍dhīḥ | va̱nina̍ḥ | ju̱ṣa̱nta̱ |
śarma̍n | syā̱ma̱ | ma̱rutā̍m | u̱pa-sthe̍ | yū̱yam | pā̱ta̱ | sva̱sti-bhi̍ḥ | sadā̍ | na̱ḥ |
śam | na̱ḥ | i̱ndrā̱gnī iti̍ | bha̱va̱tā̱m | ava̍ḥ-bhiḥ | śam | na̱ḥ | indrā̱varu̍ṇā | rā̱ta-ha̍vyā |
śam | indrā̱somā̍ | su̱vi̱tāya̍ | śam | yoḥ | śam | na̱ḥ | indrā̍pū̱ṣaṇā̍ | vāja̍-sātau |
śam | na̱ḥ | bhaga̍ḥ | śam | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | na̱ḥ | śaṁsa̍ḥ | a̱stu̱ | śam | na̱ḥ | pura̍m-dhiḥ | śam | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | sa̱ntu̱ | rāya̍ḥ |
śam | na̱ḥ | sa̱tyasya̍ | su̱-yama̍sya | śaṁsa̍ḥ | śam | na̱ḥ | a̱rya̱mā | pu̱ru̱-jā̱taḥ | a̱stu̱ |
śam | na̱ḥ | dhā̱tā | śam | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | dha̱rtā | na̱ḥ | a̱stu̱ | śam | na̱ḥ | u̱rū̱cī | bha̱va̱tu̱ | sva̱dhābhi̍ḥ |
śam | roda̍sī̱ iti̍ | bṛ̱ha̱tī iti̍ | śam | na̱ḥ | adri̍ḥ | śam | na̱ḥ | de̱vānā̍m | su̱-havā̍ni | sa̱ntu̱ |
śam | na̱ḥ | a̱gniḥ | jyoti̍ḥ-anīkaḥ | a̱stu̱ | śam | na̱ḥ | mi̱trāvaru̍ṇau | a̱śvinā̍ | śam |
śam | na̱ḥ | su̱-kṛtā̍m | su̱-kṛ̱tāni̍ | sa̱ntu̱ | śam | na̱ḥ | i̱ṣi̱raḥ | a̱bhi | vā̱tu̱ | vāta̍ḥ |
śam | na̱ḥ | dyāvā̍pṛthi̱vī iti̍ | pū̱rva-hū̍tau | śam | a̱ntari̍kṣam | dṛ̱śaye̍ | na̱ḥ | a̱stu̱ |
śam | na̱ḥ | oṣa̍dhīḥ | va̱nina̍ḥ | bha̱va̱ntu̱ | śam | na̱ḥ | raja̍saḥ | pati̍ḥ | a̱stu̱ | ji̱ṣṇuḥ |
śam | na̱ḥ | indra̍ḥ | vasu̍-bhiḥ | de̱vaḥ | a̱stu̱ | śam | ā̱di̱tyebhi̍ḥ | varu̍ṇaḥ | su̱-śaṁsa̍ḥ |
śam | na̱ḥ | ru̱draḥ | ru̱drebhi̍ḥ | jalā̍ṣaḥ | śam | na̱ḥ | tvaṣṭā̍ | gnābhi̍ḥ | i̱ha | śṛ̱ṇo̱tu̱ |
śam | na̱ḥ | soma̍ḥ | bha̱va̱tu̱ | brahma̍ | śam | na̱ḥ | śam | na̱ḥ | grāvā̍ṇaḥ | śam | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | sa̱ntu̱ | ya̱jñāḥ |
śam | na̱ḥ | svarū̍ṇām | mi̱taya̍ḥ | bha̱va̱ntu̱ | śam | na̱ḥ | pra̱-sva̍ḥ | śam | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | a̱stu̱ | vedi̍ḥ |
śam | na̱ḥ | sūrya̍ḥ | u̱ru̱-cakṣā̍ḥ | ut | e̱tu̱ | śam | na̱ḥ | cata̍sraḥ | pra̱-diśa̍ḥ | bha̱va̱ntu̱ |
śam | na̱ḥ | parva̍tāḥ | dhru̱vaya̍ḥ | bha̱va̱ntu̱ | śam | na̱ḥ | sindha̍vaḥ | śam | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | sa̱ntu̱ | āpa̍ḥ |
śam | na̱ḥ | adi̍tiḥ | bha̱va̱tu̱ | vra̱tebhi̍ḥ | śam | na̱ḥ | bha̱va̱ntu̱ | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | su̱-a̱rkāḥ |
śam | na̱ḥ | viṣṇu̍ḥ | śam | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | pū̱ṣā | na̱ḥ | a̱stu̱ | śam | na̱ḥ | bha̱vitra̍m | śam | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | a̱stu̱ | vā̱yuḥ |
śam | na̱ḥ | de̱vaḥ | sa̱vi̱tā | trāya̍māṇaḥ | śam | na̱ḥ | bha̱va̱ntu̱ | u̱ṣasa̍ḥ | vi̱-bhā̱tīḥ |
śam | na̱ḥ | pa̱rjanya̍ḥ | bha̱va̱tu̱ | pra̱-jābhya̍ḥ | śam | na̱ḥ | kṣetra̍sya | pati̍ḥ | a̱stu̱ | śa̱m-bhuḥ |
śam | na̱ḥ | de̱vāḥ | vi̱śva-de̍vāḥ | bha̱va̱ntu̱ | śam | sara̍svatī | sa̱ha | dhī̱bhiḥ | a̱stu̱ |
śam | a̱bhi̱-sāca̍ḥ | śam | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | rā̱ti̱-sāca̍ḥ | śam | na̱ḥ | di̱vyāḥ | pārthi̍vāḥ | śam | na̱ḥ | apyā̍ḥ |
śam | na̱ḥ | sa̱tyasya̍ | pata̍yaḥ | bha̱va̱ntu̱ | śam | na̱ḥ | arva̍ntaḥ | śam | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | sa̱ntu̱ | gāva̍ḥ |
śam | na̱ḥ | ṛ̱bhava̍ḥ | su̱-kṛta̍ḥ | su̱-hastā̍ḥ | śam | na̱ḥ | bha̱va̱ntu̱ | pi̱tara̍ḥ | have̍ṣu |
śam | na̱ḥ | a̱jaḥ | eka̍-pāt | de̱vaḥ | a̱stu̱ | śam | na̱ḥ | ahi̍ḥ | bu̱dhnya̍ḥ | śam | sa̱mu̱draḥ |
śam | na̱ḥ | a̱pām | napā̍t | pe̱ruḥ | a̱stu̱ | śam | na̱ḥ | pṛśni̍ḥ | bha̱va̱tu̱ | de̱va-go̍pā |
ā̱di̱tyāḥ | ru̱drāḥ | vasa̍vaḥ | ju̱ṣa̱nta̱ | i̱dam | brahma̍ | kri̱yamā̍ṇam | navī̍yaḥ |
śṛ̱ṇvantu̍ | na̱ḥ | di̱vyāḥ | pārthi̍vāsaḥ | go-jā̍tāḥ | u̱ta | ye | ya̱jñiyā̍saḥ |
ye | de̱vānā̍m | ya̱jñiyā̍ḥ | ya̱jñiyā̍nām | mano̍ḥ | yaja̍trāḥ | a̱mṛtā̍ḥ | ṛ̱ta̱-jñāḥ |
te | na̱ḥ | rā̱sa̱ntā̱m | u̱ru̱-gā̱yam | a̱dya | yū̱yam | pā̱ta̱ | sva̱sti-bhi̍ḥ | sadā̍ | na̱ḥ |
pra | brahma̍ | e̱tu̱ | sada̍nāt | ṛ̱tasya̍ | vi | ra̱śmi-bhi̍ḥ | sa̱sṛ̱je̱ | sūrya̍ḥ | gāḥ |
vi | sānu̍nā | pṛ̱thi̱vī | sa̱sre̱ | u̱rvī | pṛ̱thu | pratī̍kam | adhi̍ | ā | ī̱dhe̱ | a̱gniḥ |
i̱mām | vā̱m | mi̱trā̱va̱ru̱ṇā̱ | su̱-vṛ̱ktim | iṣa̍m | na | kṛ̱ṇve̱ | a̱su̱rā̱ | navī̍yaḥ |
i̱naḥ | vā̱m | a̱nyaḥ | pa̱da̱-vīḥ | ada̍bdhaḥ | jana̍m | ca̱ | mi̱traḥ | ya̱ta̱ti̱ | bru̱vā̱ṇaḥ |
ā | vāta̍sya | dhraja̍taḥ | ra̱nte̱ | i̱tyāḥ | apī̍payanta | dhe̱nava̍ḥ | na | sūdā̍ḥ |
ma̱haḥ | di̱vaḥ | sada̍ne | jāya̍mānaḥ | aci̍kradat | vṛ̱ṣa̱bhaḥ | sasmi̍n | ūdha̍n |
gi̱rā | yaḥ | e̱tā | yu̱naja̍t | harī̱ iti̍ | te̱ | indra̍ | pri̱yā | su̱-rathā̍ | śū̱ra̱ | dhā̱yū iti̍ |
pra | yaḥ | ma̱nyum | riri̍kṣataḥ | mi̱nāti̍ | ā | su̱-kratu̍m | a̱rya̱maṇa̍m | va̱vṛ̱tyā̱m |
yaja̍nte | a̱sya̱ | sa̱khyam | vaya̍ḥ | ca̱ | na̱ma̱svina̍ḥ | sve | ṛ̱tasya̍ | dhāma̍n |
vi | pṛkṣa̍ḥ | bā̱ba̱dhe̱ | nṛ-bhi̍ḥ | stavā̍naḥ | i̱dam | nama̍ḥ | ru̱drāya̍ | preṣṭha̍m |
ā | yat | sā̱kam | ya̱śasa̍ḥ | vā̱va̱śā̱nāḥ | sara̍svatī | sa̱ptathī̍ | sindhu̍-mātā |
yāḥ | su̱svaya̍nta | su̱-dughā̍ḥ | su̱-dhā̱rāḥ | a̱bhi | svena̍ | paya̍sā | pīpyā̍nāḥ |
u̱ta | tye | na̱ḥ | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | ma̱nda̱sā̱nāḥ | dhiya̍m | to̱kam | ca̱ | vā̱jina̍ḥ | a̱va̱ntu̱ |
mā | na̱ḥ | pari̍ | khya̱t | akṣa̍rā | cara̍ntī | avī̍vṛdhan | yujya̍m | te | ra̱yim | na̱ḥ |
pra | va̱ḥ | ma̱hīm | a̱rama̍tim | kṛ̱ṇu̱dhva̱m | pra | pū̱ṣaṇa̍m | vi̱da̱thya̍m | na | vī̱ram |
bhaga̍m | dhi̱yaḥ | a̱vi̱tāra̍m | na̱ḥ | a̱syāḥ | śā̱tau | vāja̍m | rā̱ti̱-sāca̍m | pura̍m-dhim |
accha̍ | a̱yam | va̱ḥ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | śloka̍ḥ | e̱tu̱ | accha̍ | viṣṇu̍m | ni̱si̱kta̱-pām | ava̍ḥ-bhiḥ |
u̱ta | pra̱-jāyai̍ | gṛ̱ṇa̱te | vaya̍ḥ | dhu̱ḥ | yū̱yam | pā̱ta̱ | sva̱sti-bhi̍ḥ | sadā̍ | na̱ḥ |
ā | va̱ḥ | vāhi̍ṣṭhaḥ | va̱ha̱tu̱ | sta̱vadhyai̍ | ratha̍ḥ | vā̱jā̱ḥ | ṛ̱bhu̱kṣa̱ṇa̱ḥ | amṛ̍ktaḥ |
a̱bhi | tri̱-pṛ̱ṣṭhaiḥ | sava̍neṣu | somai̍ḥ | made̍ | su̱-śi̱prā̱ḥ | ma̱ha-bhi̍ḥ | pṛ̱ṇa̱dhva̱m |
yū̱yam | ha̱ | ratna̍m | ma̱ghava̍t-su | dha̱ttha̱ | sva̱ḥ-dṛśa̍ḥ | ṛ̱bhu̱kṣa̱ṇa̱ḥ | amṛ̍ktam |
sam | ya̱jñeṣu̍ | sva̱dhā̱-va̱nta̱ḥ | pi̱ba̱dhva̱m | vi | na̱ḥ | rādhā̍ṁsi | ma̱ti-bhi̍ḥ | da̱ya̱dhva̱m |
u̱voci̍tha | hi | ma̱gha̱-va̱n | de̱ṣṇam | ma̱haḥ | arbha̍sya | vasu̍naḥ | vi̱-bhā̱ge |
u̱bhā | te̱ | pū̱rṇā | vasu̍nā | gabha̍stī̱ iti̍ | na | sū̱nṛtā̍ | ni | ya̱ma̱te̱ | va̱sa̱vyā̍ |
tvam | i̱ndra̱ | sva-ya̍śāḥ | ṛ̱bhu̱kṣāḥ | vāja̍ḥ | na | sā̱dhuḥ | asta̍m | e̱ṣi̱ | ṛkvā̍ |
va̱yam | nu | te̱ | dā̱śvāṁsa̍ḥ | syā̱ma̱ | brahma̍ | kṛ̱ṇvanta̍ḥ | ha̱ri̱-va̱ḥ | vasi̍ṣṭhāḥ |
sani̍tā | a̱si̱ | pra̱-vata̍ḥ | dā̱śuṣe̍ | ci̱t | yābhi̍ḥ | vive̍ṣaḥ | ha̱ri̱-a̱śva̱ | dhī̱bhiḥ |
va̱va̱nma | nu | te̱ | yujyā̍bhiḥ | ū̱tī | ka̱dā | na̱ḥ | i̱ndra̱ | rā̱yaḥ | ā | da̱śa̱sye̱ḥ |
vā̱saya̍si-iva | ve̱dhasa̍ḥ | tvam | na̱ḥ | ka̱dā | na̱ḥ | i̱ndra̱ | vaca̍saḥ | bu̱bo̱dha̱ḥ |
asta̍m | tā̱tyā | dhi̱yā | ra̱yim | su̱-vīra̍m | pṛ̱kṣaḥ | na̱ḥ | arvā̍ | ni | u̱hī̱ta̱ | vā̱jī |
a̱bhi | yam | de̱vī | niḥ-ṛ̍tiḥ | ci̱t | īśe̍ | nakṣa̍nte | indra̍m | śa̱rada̍ḥ | su̱-pṛkṣa̍ḥ |
upa̍ | tri̱-ba̱ndhu̱ḥ | ja̱rat-a̍ṣṭim | e̱ti̱ | asva̍-veśam | yam | kṛ̱ṇava̍nta | martā̍ḥ |
ā | na̱ḥ | rādhā̍ṁsi | sa̱vi̱ta̱riti̍ | sta̱vadhyai̍ | ā | rāya̍ḥ | ya̱ntu̱ | parva̍tasya | rā̱tau |
sadā̍ | na̱ḥ | di̱vyaḥ | pā̱yuḥ | si̱sa̱ktu̱ | yū̱yam | pā̱ta̱ | sva̱sti-bhi̍ḥ | sadā̍ | na̱ḥ |
ut | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | syaḥ | de̱vaḥ | sa̱vi̱tā | ya̱yā̱ma̱ | hi̱ra̱ṇyayī̍m | a̱mati̍m | yām | aśi̍śret |
nū̱nam | bhaga̍ḥ | havya̍ḥ | mānu̍ṣebhiḥ | vi | yaḥ | ratnā̍ | pu̱ru̱-vasu̍ḥ | dadhā̍ti |
ut | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | ti̱ṣṭha̱ | sa̱vi̱ta̱riti̍ | śru̱dhi̱ | a̱sya | hira̍ṇya-pāṇe | pra-bhṛ̍tau | ṛ̱tasya̍ |
vi | u̱rvīm | pṛ̱thvīm | a̱mati̍m | sṛ̱jā̱naḥ | ā | nṛ-bhya̍ḥ | ma̱rta̱-bhoja̍nam | su̱vā̱naḥ |
api̍ | stu̱taḥ | sa̱vi̱tā | de̱vaḥ | a̱stu̱ | yam | ā | ci̱t | viśve̍ | vasa̍vaḥ | gṛ̱ṇanti̍ |
saḥ | na̱ḥ | stomā̍n | na̱ma̱sya̍ḥ | cana̍ḥ | dhā̱t | viśve̍bhiḥ | pā̱tu̱ | pā̱yu-bhi̍ḥ | ni | sū̱rīn |
a̱bhi | yam | de̱vī | adi̍tiḥ | gṛ̱ṇāti̍ | sa̱vam | de̱vasya̍ | sa̱vi̱tuḥ | ju̱ṣā̱ṇā |
a̱bhi | sa̱m-rāja̍ḥ | varu̍ṇaḥ | gṛ̱ṇa̱nti̱ | a̱bhi | mi̱trāsa̍ḥ | a̱rya̱mā | sa̱-joṣā̍ḥ |
a̱bhi | ye | mi̱thaḥ | va̱nuṣa̍ḥ | sapa̍nte | rā̱tim | di̱vaḥ | rā̱ti̱-sāca̍ḥ | pṛ̱thi̱vyāḥ |
ahi̍ḥ | bu̱dhnya̍ḥ | u̱ta | na̱ḥ | śṛ̱ṇo̱tu̱ | varū̍trī | eka̍dhenu-bhiḥ | ni | pā̱tu̱ |
anu̍ | tat | na̱ḥ | jāḥpati̍ḥ | ma̱ṁsī̱ṣṭa̱ | ratna̍m | de̱vasya̍ | sa̱vi̱tuḥ | i̱yā̱naḥ |
bhaga̍m | u̱graḥ | ava̍se | joha̍vīti | bhaga̍m | anu̍graḥ | adha̍ | yā̱ti̱ | ratna̍m |
śam | na̱ḥ | bha̱va̱ntu̱ | vā̱jina̍ḥ | have̍ṣu | de̱va-tā̍tā | mi̱ta-dra̍vaḥ | su̱-a̱rkāḥ |
ja̱mbhaya̍ntaḥ | ahi̍m | vṛka̍m | rakṣā̍ṁsi | sane̍mi | a̱smat | yu̱ya̱va̱n | amī̍vāḥ |
vāje̍-vāje | a̱va̱ta̱ | vā̱ji̱na̱ḥ | na̱ḥ | dhane̍ṣu | vi̱prā̱ḥ | a̱mṛ̱tā̱ḥ | ṛ̱ta̱-jñā̱ḥ |
a̱sya | madhva̍ḥ | pi̱ba̱ta̱ | mā̱daya̍dhvam | tṛ̱ptāḥ | yā̱ta̱ | pa̱thi-bhi̍ḥ | de̱va̱-yānai̍ḥ |
ū̱rdhvaḥ | a̱gniḥ | su̱-ma̱tim | vasva̍ḥ | a̱śre̱t | pra̱tī̱cī | jū̱rṇiḥ | de̱va-tā̍tim | e̱ti̱ |
bhe̱jāte̱ iti̍ | adrī̱ iti̍ | ra̱thyā̍-iva | panthā̍m | ṛ̱tam | hotā̍ | na̱ḥ | i̱ṣi̱taḥ | ya̱jā̱ti̱ |
pra | va̱vṛje̱ | su̱-pra̱yāḥ | ba̱rhiḥ | e̱ṣā̱m | ā | vi̱śpatī̍ i̱veti̍ vi̱śpatī̍-iva | bīri̍ṭe | i̱yā̱te̱ iti̍ |
vi̱śām | a̱ktoḥ | u̱ṣasa̍ḥ | pū̱rva-hū̍tau | vā̱yuḥ | pū̱ṣā | sva̱staye̍ | ni̱yutvā̍n |
jma̱yāḥ | atra̍ | vasa̍vaḥ | ra̱nta̱ | de̱vāḥ | u̱rau | a̱ntari̍kṣe | ma̱rja̱ya̱nta̱ | śu̱bhrāḥ |
a̱rvāk | pa̱thaḥ | u̱ru̱-jra̱ya̱ḥ | kṛ̱ṇu̱dhva̱m | śrota̍ | dū̱tasya̍ | ja̱gmuṣa̍ḥ | na̱ḥ | a̱sya |
te | hi | ya̱jñeṣu̍ | ya̱jñiyā̍saḥ | ūmā̍ḥ | sa̱dha-stha̍m | viśve̍ | a̱bhi | santi̍ | de̱vāḥ |
tān | a̱dhva̱re | u̱śa̱taḥ | ya̱kṣi̱ | a̱gne̱ | śru̱ṣṭī | bhaga̍m | nāsa̍tyā | pura̍m-dhim |
ā | a̱gne̱ | gira̍ḥ | di̱vaḥ | ā | pṛ̱thi̱vyāḥ | mi̱tram | va̱ha̱ | varu̍ṇam | indra̍m | a̱gnim |
ā | a̱rya̱maṇa̍m | adi̍tim | viṣṇu̍m | e̱ṣā̱m | sara̍svatī | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | mā̱da̱ya̱ntā̱m |
ra̱re | ha̱vyam | ma̱ti-bhi̍ḥ | ya̱jñiyā̍nām | nakṣa̍t | kāma̍m | martyā̍nām | asi̍nvan |
dhāta̍ | ra̱yim | a̱vi̱-da̱syam | sa̱dā̱-sām | sa̱kṣī̱mahi̍ | yujye̍bhiḥ | nu | de̱vaiḥ |
nu | roda̍sī̱ iti̍ | a̱bhistu̍te̱ itya̱bhi-stu̍te | vasi̍ṣṭhaiḥ | ṛ̱ta-vā̍naḥ | varu̍ṇaḥ | mi̱traḥ | a̱gniḥ |
yaccha̍ntu | ca̱ndrāḥ | u̱pa̱-mam | na̱ḥ | a̱rkam | yū̱yam | pā̱ta̱ | sva̱sti-bhi̍ḥ | sadā̍ | na̱ḥ |
o iti̍ | śru̱ṣṭiḥ | vi̱da̱thyā̍ | sam | e̱tu̱ | prati̍ | stoma̍m | da̱dhī̱ma̱hi̱ | tu̱rāṇā̍m |
yat | a̱dya | de̱vaḥ | sa̱vi̱tā | su̱vāti̍ | syāma̍ | a̱sya̱ | ra̱tnina̍ḥ | vi̱-bhā̱ge |
mi̱traḥ | tat | na̱ḥ | varu̍ṇaḥ | roda̍sī̱ iti̍ | ca̱ | dyu-bha̍ktam | indra̍ḥ | a̱rya̱mā | da̱dā̱tu̱ |
dide̍ṣṭu | de̱vī | adi̍tiḥ | rekṇa̍ḥ | vā̱yuḥ | ca̱ | yat | ni̱yu̱vaite̱ iti̍ ni̱-yu̱vaite̍ | bhaga̍ḥ | ca̱ |
saḥ | it | u̱graḥ | a̱stu̱ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | saḥ | śu̱ṣmī | yam | martya̍m | pṛ̱ṣa̱t-a̱śvā̱ḥ | avā̍tha |
u̱ta | ī̱m | a̱gniḥ | sara̍svatī | ju̱nanti̍ | na | tasya̍ | rā̱yaḥ | pa̱ri̱-e̱tā | a̱sti̱ |
a̱yam | hi | ne̱tā | varu̍ṇaḥ | ṛ̱tasya̍ | mi̱traḥ | rājā̍naḥ | a̱rya̱mā | apa̍ḥ | dhuriti̱ dhuḥ |
su̱-havā̍ | de̱vī | adi̍tiḥ | a̱na̱rvā | te | na̱ḥ | aṁha̍ḥ | ati̍ | pa̱rṣa̱n | ari̍ṣṭān |
a̱sya | de̱vasya̍ | mī̱ḻhuṣa̍ḥ | va̱yāḥ | viṣṇo̍ḥ | e̱ṣasya̍ | pra̱-bhṛ̱the | ha̱viḥ-bhi̍ḥ |
vi̱de | hi | ru̱draḥ | ru̱driya̍m | ma̱hi̱-tvam | yā̱si̱ṣṭam | va̱rtiḥ | a̱śvi̱nau̱ | irā̍-vat |

ma̱ya̱ḥ-bhuva̍ḥ | na̱ḥ | arva̍ntaḥ | ni | pā̱ntu̱ | vṛ̱ṣṭim | pari̍-jmā | vāta̍ḥ | da̱dā̱tu̱ |
nu | roda̍sī̱ iti̍ | a̱bhistu̍te̱ itya̱bhi-stu̍te | vasi̍ṣṭhaiḥ | ṛ̱ta-vā̍naḥ | varu̍ṇaḥ | mi̱traḥ | a̱gniḥ |

prā̱taḥ | a̱gnim | prā̱taḥ | indra̍m | ha̱vā̱ma̱he̱ | prā̱taḥ | mi̱trāvaru̍ṇā | prā̱taḥ | a̱śvinā̍ |
prā̱taḥ | bhaga̍m | pū̱ṣaṇa̍m | brahma̍ṇaḥ | pati̍m | prā̱tariti̍ | soma̍m | u̱ta | ru̱dram | hu̱ve̱ma̱ |
prā̱ta̱ḥ-jita̍m | bhaga̍m | u̱gram | hu̱ve̱ma̱ | va̱yam | pu̱tram | adi̍teḥ | yaḥ | vi̱-dha̱rtā |
ā̱dhraḥ | ci̱t | yam | manya̍mānaḥ | tu̱raḥ | ci̱t | rājā̍ | ci̱t | yam | bhaga̍m | bha̱kṣi̱ | iti̍ | āha̍ |
bhaga̍ | prane̍ta̱riti̱ pra-ne̍taḥ | bhaga̍ | satya̍-rādhaḥ | bhaga̍ | i̱mām | dhiya̍m | ut | a̱va̱ | dada̍t | na̱ḥ |
bhaga̍ | pra | na̱ḥ | ja̱na̱ya̱ | gobhi̍ḥ | aśvai̍ḥ | bhaga̍ | pra | nṛ-bhi̍ḥ | nṛ̱-vanta̍ḥ | syā̱ma̱ |
uta̍ | i̱dānī̍m | bhaga̍-vantaḥ | syā̱ma̱ | u̱ta | pra̱-pi̱tve | u̱ta | madhye̍ | ahnā̍m |
u̱ta | ut-i̍tā | ma̱gha̱-va̱n | sūrya̍sya | va̱yam | de̱vānā̍m | su̱-ma̱tau | syā̱ma̱ |
bhaga̍ḥ | e̱va | bhaga̍-vān | a̱stu̱ | de̱vā̱ḥ | tena̍ | va̱yam | bhaga̍-vantaḥ | syā̱ma̱ |
tam | tvā̱ | bha̱ga̱ | sarva̍ḥ | it | jo̱ha̱vī̱ti̱ | saḥ | na̱ḥ | bha̱ga̱ | pu̱ra̱ḥ-e̱tā | bha̱va̱ | i̱ha |
sam | a̱dhva̱rāya̍ | u̱ṣasa̍ḥ | na̱ma̱nta̱ | da̱dhi̱krāvā̍-iva | śuca̍ye | pa̱dāya̍ |
a̱rvā̱cī̱nam | va̱su̱-vida̍m | bhaga̍m | na̱ḥ | ratha̍m-iva | aśvā̍ḥ | vā̱jina̍ḥ | ā | va̱ha̱ntu̱ |
aśva̍-vatīḥ | go-ma̍tīḥ | na̱ḥ | u̱ṣasa̍ḥ | vī̱ra-va̍tīḥ | sada̍m | u̱ccha̱ntu̱ | bha̱drāḥ |
ghṛ̱tam | duhā̍nāḥ | vi̱śvata̍ḥ | pra-pī̍tāḥ | yū̱yam | pā̱ta̱ | sva̱sti-bhi̍ḥ | sadā̍ | na̱ḥ |
pra | bra̱hmāṇa̍ḥ | aṅgi̍rasaḥ | na̱kṣa̱nta̱ | pra | kra̱nda̱nuḥ | na̱bha̱nya̍sya | ve̱tu̱ |
pra | dhe̱nava̍ḥ | u̱da̱-pruta̍ḥ | na̱va̱nta̱ | yu̱jyātā̍m | adrī̱ iti̍ | a̱dhva̱rasya̍ | peśa̍ḥ |

ā | naktā̍ | ba̱rhiḥ | sa̱da̱tā̱m | u̱ṣasā̍ | u̱śantā̍ | mi̱trāvaru̍ṇā | ya̱ja̱ | i̱ha |

pra | va̱ḥ | ya̱jñeṣu̍ | de̱va̱-yanta̍ḥ | a̱rca̱n | dyāvā̍ | nama̍ḥ-bhiḥ | pṛ̱thi̱vī iti̍ | i̱ṣadhyai̍ |

pra | ya̱jñaḥ | e̱tu̱ | hetva̍ḥ | na | sapti̍ḥ | ut | ya̱ccha̱dhva̱m | sa-ma̍nasaḥ | ghṛ̱tācī̍ḥ |
stṛ̱ṇī̱ta | ba̱rhiḥ | a̱dhva̱rāya̍ | sā̱dhu | ū̱rdhvā | śo̱cīṁṣi̍ | de̱va̱-yūni̍ | a̱sthu̱ḥ |
ā | pu̱trāsa̍ḥ | na | mā̱tara̍m | vi-bhṛ̍trāḥ | sānau̍ | de̱vāsa̍ḥ | ba̱rhiṣa̍ḥ | sa̱da̱ntu̱ |
ā | vi̱śvācī̍ | vi̱da̱thyā̍m | a̱na̱ktu̱ | agne̍ | mā | na̱ḥ | de̱va-tā̍tā | mṛdha̍ḥ | ka̱riti̍ kaḥ |
te | sī̱ṣa̱pa̱nta̱ | joṣa̍m | ā | yaja̍trāḥ | ṛ̱tasya̍ | dhārā̍ḥ | su̱-dughā̍ḥ | duhā̍nāḥ |
jyeṣṭha̍m | va̱ḥ | a̱dya | maha̍ḥ | ā | vasū̍nām | ā | ga̱nta̱na̱ | sa-ma̍nasaḥ | yati̍ | stha |
e̱va | na̱ḥ | a̱gne̱ | vi̱kṣu | ā | da̱śa̱sya̱ | tvayā̍ | va̱yam | sa̱ha̱sā̱-va̱n | āskrā̍ḥ |
rā̱yā | yu̱jā | sa̱dha̱-māda̍ḥ | ari̍ṣṭāḥ | yū̱yam | pā̱ta̱ | sva̱sti-bhi̍ḥ | sadā̍ | na̱ḥ |
da̱dhi̱-krām | va̱ḥ | pra̱tha̱mam | a̱śvinā̍ | u̱ṣasa̍m | a̱gnim | sam-i̍ddham | bhaga̍m | ū̱taye̍ | hu̱ve̱ |
indra̍m | viṣṇu̍m | pū̱ṣaṇa̍m | brahma̍ṇaḥ | pati̍m | ā̱di̱tyān | dyāvā̍pṛthi̱vī iti̍ | a̱paḥ | sva1̱̍riti̱ sva̍ḥ |
da̱dhi̱-krām | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | nama̍sā | bo̱dhaya̍ntaḥ | u̱t-īrā̍ṇāḥ | ya̱jñam | u̱pa̱-pra̱yanta̍ḥ |
iḻā̍m | de̱vīm | ba̱rhiṣi̍ | sā̱daya̍ntaḥ | a̱śvinā̍ | viprā̍ | su̱-havā̍ | hu̱ve̱ma̱ |
da̱dhi̱-krāvā̍ṇam | bu̱bu̱dhā̱naḥ | a̱gnim | upa̍ | bru̱ve̱ | u̱ṣasa̍m | sūrya̍m | gām |
bra̱dhnam | ma̱m̐śca̱toḥ | varu̍ṇasya | ba̱bhrum | te | viśvā̍ | a̱smat | du̱ḥ-i̱tā | ya̱va̱ya̱ntu̱ |
da̱dhi̱-krāvā̍ | pra̱tha̱maḥ | vā̱jī | arvā̍ | agre̍ | rathā̍nām | bha̱va̱ti̱ | pra̱-jā̱nan |
sa̱m-vi̱dā̱naḥ | u̱ṣasā̍ | sūrye̍ṇa | ā̱di̱tyebhi̍ḥ | vasu̍-bhiḥ | aṅgi̍raḥ-bhiḥ |
ā | na̱ḥ | da̱dhi̱-krāḥ | pa̱thyā̍m | a̱na̱ktu̱ | ṛ̱tasya̍ | panthā̍m | anu̍-e̱ta̱vai | ū̱m̐ iti̍ |
śṛ̱ṇotu̍ | na̱ḥ | daivya̍m | śardha̍ḥ | a̱gniḥ | śṛ̱ṇvantu̍ | viśve̍ | ma̱hi̱ṣāḥ | amū̍rāḥ |
ā | de̱vaḥ | yā̱tu̱ | sa̱vi̱tā | su̱-ratna̍ḥ | a̱nta̱ri̱kṣa̱-prāḥ | vaha̍mānaḥ | aśvai̍ḥ |
haste̍ | dadhā̍naḥ | naryā̍ | pu̱rūṇi̍ | ni̱-ve̱śaya̍n | ca̱ | pra̱-su̱van | ca̱ | bhūma̍ |
ut | a̱sya̱ | bā̱hū iti̍ | śi̱thi̱rā | bṛ̱hantā̍ | hi̱ra̱ṇyayā̍ | di̱vaḥ | antā̍n | a̱na̱ṣṭā̱m |
nū̱nam | saḥ | a̱sya̱ | ma̱hi̱mā | pa̱ni̱ṣṭa̱ | sūra̍ḥ | ci̱t | a̱smai̱ | anu̍ | dā̱t | a̱pa̱syām |
saḥ | gha̱ | na̱ḥ | de̱vaḥ | sa̱vi̱tā | sa̱ha-vā̍ | ā | sā̱vi̱ṣa̱t | vasu̍-patiḥ | vasū̍ni |
vi̱-śraya̍māṇaḥ | a̱mati̍m | u̱rū̱cīm | ma̱rta̱-bhoja̍nam | adha̍ | rā̱sa̱te̱ | na̱ḥ |
i̱māḥ | gira̍ḥ | sa̱vi̱tāra̍m | su̱-ji̱hvam | pū̱rṇa-ga̍bhastim | ī̱ḻa̱te̱ | su̱-pā̱ṇim |
ci̱tram | vaya̍ḥ | bṛ̱hat | a̱sme iti̍ | da̱dhā̱tu̱ | yū̱yam | pā̱ta̱ | sva̱sti-bhi̍ḥ | sadā̍ | na̱ḥ |
i̱māḥ | ru̱drāya̍ | sthi̱ra-dha̍nvane | gira̍ḥ | kṣi̱pra-i̍ṣave | de̱vāya̍ | sva̱dhā-vne̍ |
aṣā̍ḻhāya | saha̍mānāya | ve̱dhase̍ | ti̱gma-ā̍yudhāya | bha̱ra̱ta̱ | śṛ̱ṇotu̍ | na̱ḥ |
saḥ | hi | kṣaye̍ṇa | kṣamya̍sya | janma̍naḥ | sām-rā̍jyena | di̱vyasya̍ | ceta̍ti |
ava̍n | ava̍ntīḥ | upa̍ | na̱ḥ | dura̍ḥ | ca̱ra̱ | a̱na̱mī̱vaḥ | ru̱dra̱ | jāsu̍ | na̱ḥ | bha̱va̱ |
yā | te̱ | di̱dyut | ava̍-sṛṣṭā | di̱vaḥ | pari̍ | kṣma̱yā | cara̍ti | pari̍ | sā | vṛ̱ṇa̱ktu̱ | na̱ḥ |
sa̱hasra̍m | te̱ | su̱-a̱pi̱vā̱ta̱ | bhe̱ṣa̱jā | mā | na̱ḥ | to̱keṣu̍ | tana̍yeṣu | ri̱ri̱ṣa̱ḥ |
mā | na̱ḥ | va̱dhī̱ḥ | ru̱dra̱ | mā | parā̍ | dā̱ḥ | mā | te̱ | bhū̱ma̱ | pra-si̍tau | hī̱ḻi̱tasya̍ |
ā | na̱ḥ | bha̱ja̱ | ba̱rhiṣi̍ | jī̱va̱-śa̱ṁse | yū̱yam | pā̱ta̱ | sva̱sti-bhi̍ḥ | sadā̍ | na̱ḥ |
āpa̍ḥ | yam | va̱ḥ | pra̱tha̱mam | da̱va̱-yanta̍ḥ | i̱ndra̱-pāna̍m | ū̱rmim | akṛ̍ṇvata | i̱ḻaḥ |
tam | va̱ḥ | va̱yam | śuci̍m | a̱ri̱pram | a̱dya | ghṛ̱ta̱-pruṣa̍m | madhu̍-mantam | va̱ne̱ma̱ |
tam | ū̱rmim | ā̱pa̱ḥ | madhu̍mat-tamam | va̱ḥ | a̱pām | napā̍t | a̱va̱tu̱ | ā̱śu̱-hemā̍ |
yasmi̍n | indra̍ḥ | vasu̍-bhiḥ | mā̱dayā̍te | tam | a̱śyā̱ma̱ | de̱va̱-yanta̍ḥ | va̱ḥ | a̱dya |
śa̱ta-pa̍vitrāḥ | sva̱dhayā̍ | mada̍ntīḥ | de̱vīḥ | de̱vānā̍m | api̍ | ya̱nti̱ | pātha̍ḥ |
tāḥ | indra̍sya | na | mi̱na̱nti̱ | vra̱tāni̍ | sindhu̍-bhyaḥ | ha̱vyam | ghṛ̱ta-va̍t | ju̱ho̱ta̱ |
yāḥ | sūrya̍ḥ | ra̱śmi-bhi̍ḥ | ā̱-ta̱tāna̍ | yābhya̍ḥ | indra̍ḥ | ara̍dat | gā̱tum | ū̱rmim |
te | si̱ndha̱va̱ḥ | vari̍vaḥ | dhā̱ta̱na̱ | na̱ḥ | yū̱yam | pā̱ta̱ | sva̱sti-bhi̍ḥ | sadā̍ | na̱ḥ |
ṛbhu̍kṣaṇaḥ | vā̱jā̱ḥ | mā̱daya̍dhvam | a̱sme iti̍ | na̱ra̱ḥ | ma̱gha̱-vā̱na̱ḥ | su̱tasya̍ |
ā | va̱ḥ | a̱rvāca̍ḥ | krata̍vaḥ | na | yā̱tām | vi-bhva̍ḥ | ratha̍m | narya̍m | va̱rta̱ya̱ntu̱ |
ṛ̱bhuḥ | ṛ̱bhu-bhi̍ḥ | a̱bhi | va̱ḥ | syā̱ma̱ | vi-bhva̍ḥ | vi̱bhu-bhi̍ḥ | śava̍sā | śavā̍ṁsi |
vāja̍ḥ | a̱smān | a̱va̱tu̱ | vāja̍-sātau | indre̍ṇa | yu̱jā | ta̱ru̱ṣe̱ma̱ | vṛ̱tram |
te | ci̱t | hi | pū̱rvīḥ | a̱bhi | santi̍ | śā̱sā | viśvā̍n | a̱ryaḥ | u̱pa̱ra-tā̍ti | va̱nva̱n |
indra̍ḥ | vi-bhvā̍ | ṛ̱bhu̱kṣāḥ | vāja̍ḥ | a̱ryaḥ | śatro̍ḥ | mi̱tha̱tyā | kṛ̱ṇa̱va̱n | vi | nṛ̱mṇam |
nu | de̱vā̱sa̱ḥ | vari̍vaḥ | ka̱rta̱na̱ | na̱ḥ | bhū̱ta | na̱ḥ | viśve̍ | ava̍se | sa̱-joṣā̍ḥ |
sam | a̱sme iti̍ | iṣa̍m | vasa̍vaḥ | da̱dī̱ra̱n | yū̱yam | pā̱ta̱ | sva̱sti-bhi̍ḥ | sadā̍ | na̱ḥ |
sa̱mu̱dra-jye̍ṣṭhāḥ | sa̱li̱lasya̍ | madhyā̍t | pu̱nā̱nāḥ | ya̱nti̱ | ani̍-viśamānāḥ |
indra̍ḥ | yāḥ | va̱jrī | vṛ̱ṣa̱bhaḥ | ra̱rāda̍ | tāḥ | āpa̍ḥ | de̱vīḥ | i̱ha | mām | a̱va̱ntu̱ |
yāḥ | āpa̍ḥ | di̱vyāḥ | u̱ta | vā̱ | srava̍nti | kha̱nitri̍māḥ | u̱ta | vā̱ | yāḥ | sva̱ya̱m-jāḥ |
sa̱mu̱dra-a̍rthāḥ | yāḥ | śuca̍yaḥ | pā̱va̱kāḥ | tāḥ | āpa̍ḥ | de̱vīḥ | i̱ha | mām | a̱va̱ntu̱ |
yāsā̍m | rājā̍ | varu̍ṇaḥ | yāti̍ | madhye̍ | sa̱tyā̱nṛ̱te iti̍ | a̱va̱-paśya̍n | janā̍nām |
ma̱dhu̱-ścuta̍ḥ | śuca̍yaḥ | yāḥ | pā̱va̱kāḥ | tāḥ | āpa̍ḥ | de̱vīḥ | i̱ha | mām | a̱va̱ntu̱ |
yāsu̍ | rājā̍ | varu̍ṇaḥ | yāsu̍ | soma̍ḥ | viśve̍ | de̱vāḥ | yāsu̍ | ūrja̍m | mada̍nti |
vai̱śvā̱na̱raḥ | yāsu̍ | a̱gniḥ | pra-vi̍ṣṭaḥ | tāḥ | āpa̍ḥ | de̱vīḥ | i̱ha | mām | a̱va̱ntu̱ |
ā | mām | mi̱trā̱va̱ru̱ṇā̱ | i̱ha | ra̱kṣa̱ta̱m | ku̱lā̱yaya̍t | vi̱-śvaya̍t | mā | na̱ḥ | ā | ga̱n |
a̱ja̱kā̱-vam | du̱ḥ-dṛśī̍kam | ti̱raḥ | da̱dhe̱ | mā | mām | padye̍na | rapa̍sā | vi̱da̱t | tsaru̍ḥ |
yat | vi̱-jāma̍n | paru̍ṣi | vanda̍nam | bhuva̍t | a̱ṣṭhī̱vantau̍ | pari̍ | ku̱lphau | ca̱ | deha̍t |
a̱gniḥ | tat | śoca̍n | apa̍ | bā̱dha̱tā̱m | i̱taḥ | mā | mām | padye̍na | rapa̍sā | vi̱da̱t | tsaru̍ḥ |
yat | śa̱lma̱lau | bhava̍ti | yat | na̱dīṣu̍ | yat | oṣa̍dhībhyaḥ | pari̍ | jāya̍te | vi̱ṣam |
viśve̍ | de̱vāḥ | niḥ | i̱taḥ | tat | su̱va̱ntu̱ | mā | mām | padye̍na | rapa̍sā | vi̱da̱t | tsaru̍ḥ |
yāḥ | pra̱-vata̍ḥ | ni̱-vata̍ḥ | u̱t-vata̍ḥ | u̱da̱n-vatī̍ḥ | a̱nu̱da̱kāḥ | ca̱ | yāḥ |
tāḥ | a̱smabhya̍m | paya̍sā | pinva̍mānāḥ | śi̱vāḥ | de̱vīḥ | a̱śi̱pa̱dāḥ | bha̱va̱ntu̱ | sarvā̍ḥ | na̱dya̍ḥ | a̱śi̱mi̱dāḥ | bha̱va̱ntu̱ |
ā̱di̱tyānā̍m | ava̍sā | nūta̍nena | sa̱kṣī̱mahi̍ | śarma̍ṇā | śam-ta̍mena |
a̱nā̱gā̱ḥ-tve | a̱di̱ti̱-tve | tu̱rāsa̍ḥ | i̱mam | ya̱jñam | da̱dha̱tu̱ | śroṣa̍māṇāḥ |
ā̱di̱tyāsa̍ḥ | adi̍tiḥ | mā̱da̱ya̱ntā̱m | mi̱traḥ | a̱rya̱mā | varu̍ṇaḥ | raji̍ṣṭhāḥ |
a̱smāka̍m | sa̱ntu̱ | bhuva̍nasya | go̱pāḥ | piba̍ntu | soma̍m | ava̍se | na̱ḥ | a̱dya |
ā̱di̱tyāḥ | viśve̍ | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | ca̱ | viśve̍ | de̱vāḥ | ca̱ | viśve̍ | ṛ̱bhava̍ḥ | ca̱ | viśve̍ |
indra̍ḥ | a̱gniḥ | a̱śvinā̍ | tu̱stu̱vā̱nāḥ | yū̱yam | pā̱ta̱ | sva̱sti-bhi̍ḥ | sadā̍ | na̱ḥ |
ā̱di̱tyāsa̍ḥ | adi̍tayaḥ | syā̱ma̱ | pūḥ | de̱va̱-trā | va̱sa̱va̱ḥ | ma̱rtya̱-trā |
sane̍ma | mi̱trā̱va̱ru̱ṇā̱ | sana̍ntaḥ | bhave̍ma | dyā̱vā̱pṛ̱thi̱vī̱ iti̍ | bhava̍ntaḥ |
mi̱traḥ | tat | na̱ḥ | varu̍ṇaḥ | ma̱ma̱ha̱nta̱ | śarma̍ | to̱kāya̍ | tana̍yāya | go̱pāḥ |
mā | va̱ḥ | bhu̱je̱ma̱ | a̱nya-jā̍tam | ena̍ḥ | mā | tat | ka̱rma̱ | va̱sa̱va̱ḥ | yat | caya̍dhve |
tu̱ra̱ṇyava̍ḥ | aṅgi̍rasaḥ | na̱kṣa̱nta̱ | ratna̍m | de̱vasya̍ | sa̱vi̱tuḥ | i̱yā̱nāḥ |
pi̱tā | ca̱ | tat | na̱ḥ | ma̱hān | yaja̍traḥ | viśve̍ | de̱vāḥ | sa-ma̍nasaḥ | ju̱ṣa̱nta̱ |
pra | dyāvā̍ | ya̱jñaiḥ | pṛ̱thi̱vī iti̍ | nama̍ḥ-bhiḥ | sa̱-bādha̍ḥ | ī̱ḻe̱ | bṛ̱ha̱tī iti̍ | yaja̍tre̱ iti̍ |
te iti̍ | ci̱t | hi | pūrve̍ | ka̱vaya̍ḥ | gṛ̱ṇanta̍ḥ | pu̱raḥ | ma̱hī iti̍ | da̱dhi̱re | de̱vapu̍tre̱ iti̍ de̱va-pu̍tre |
pra | pū̱rva̱je iti̍ pū̱rva̱-je | pi̱tarā̍ | navya̍sībhiḥ | gī̱ḥ-bhiḥ | kṛ̱ṇu̱dhva̱m | sada̍ne̱ iti̍ | ṛ̱tasya̍ |
ā | na̱ḥ | dyā̱vā̱pṛ̱thi̱vī̱ iti̍ | daivye̍na | jane̍na | yā̱ta̱m | mahi̍ | vā̱m | varū̍tham |
u̱to iti̍ | hi | vā̱m | ra̱tna̱-dheyā̍ni | santi̍ | pu̱rūṇi̍ | dyā̱vā̱pṛ̱thi̱vī̱ iti̍ | su̱-dāse̍ |
a̱sme iti̍ | dha̱tta̱m | yat | asa̍t | askṛ̍dhoyu | yū̱yam | pā̱ta̱ | sva̱sti-bhi̍ḥ | sadā̍ | na̱ḥ |
vāsto̍ḥ | pa̱te̱ | prati̍ | jā̱nī̱hi̱ | a̱smān | su̱-ā̱ve̱śaḥ | a̱na̱mī̱vaḥ | bha̱va̱ | na̱ḥ |
yat | tvā̱ | īma̍he | prati̍ | tat | na̱ḥ | ju̱ṣa̱sva̱ | śam | na̱ḥ | bha̱va̱ | dvi̱-pade̍ | śam | catu̍ḥ-pade |
vāsto̍ḥ | pa̱te̱ | pra̱-tara̍ṇaḥ | na̱ḥ | e̱dhi̱ | ga̱ya̱-sphāna̍ḥ | gobhi̍ḥ | aśve̍bhiḥ | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ |
a̱jarā̍saḥ | te̱ | sa̱khye | syā̱ma̱ | pi̱tā-i̍va | pu̱trān | prati̍ | na̱ḥ | ju̱ṣa̱sva̱ |
vāsto̍ḥ | pa̱te̱ | śa̱gmayā̍ | sa̱m-sadā̍ | te̱ | sa̱kṣī̱mahi̍ | ra̱ṇvayā̍ | gā̱tu̱-matyā̍ |
pā̱hi | kṣeme̍ | u̱ta | yoge̍ | vara̍m | na̱ḥ | yū̱yam | pā̱ta̱ | sva̱sti-bhi̍ḥ | sadā̍ | na̱ḥ |
a̱mī̱va̱-hā | vā̱sto̱ḥ | pa̱te̱ | viśvā̍ | rū̱pāṇi̍ | ā̱-vi̱śan |
sakhā̍ | su̱-śeva̍ḥ | e̱dhi̱ | na̱ḥ |
yat | a̱rju̱na̱ | sā̱ra̱me̱ya̱ | da̱taḥ | pi̱śa̱ṅga̱ | yaccha̍se |
vi-i̍va | bhrā̱ja̱nte̱ | ṛ̱ṣṭaya̍ḥ | upa̍ | srakve̍ṣu | bapsa̍taḥ | ni | su | sva̱pa̱ |
ste̱nam | rā̱ya̱ | sā̱ra̱me̱ya̱ | taska̍ram | vā̱ | pu̱na̱ḥ-sa̱ra̱ |
sto̱tṝn | indra̍sya | rā̱ya̱si̱ | kim | a̱smān | du̱cchu̱na̱-ya̱se̱ | ni | su | sva̱pa̱ |
tvam | sū̱ka̱rasya̍ | da̱rdṛ̱hi̱ | tava̍ | da̱rda̱rtu̱ | sū̱ka̱raḥ |
sto̱tṝn | indra̍sya | rā̱ya̱si̱ | kim | a̱smān | du̱cchu̱na̱-ya̱se̱ | ni | su | sva̱pa̱ |
sastu̍ | mā̱tā | sastu̍ | pi̱tā | sastu̍ | śvā | sastu̍ | vi̱śpati̍ḥ |
sa̱santu̍ | sarve̍ | jñā̱taya̍ḥ | sastu̍ | a̱yam | a̱bhita̍ḥ | jana̍ḥ |
yaḥ | āste̍ | yaḥ | ca̱ | cara̍ti | yaḥ | ca̱ | paśya̍ti | na̱ḥ | jana̍ḥ |
teṣā̍m | sam | ha̱nma̱ḥ | a̱kṣāṇi̍ | yathā̍ | i̱dam | ha̱rmyam | tathā̍ |
sa̱hasra̍-śṛṅgaḥ | vṛ̱ṣa̱bhaḥ | yaḥ | sa̱mu̱drāt | u̱t-āca̍rat |
tena̍ | sa̱ha̱sye̍na | va̱yam | ni | janā̍n | svā̱pa̱yā̱ma̱si̱ |
pro̱ṣṭhe̱-śa̱yāḥ | va̱hye̱-śa̱yāḥ | nārī̍ḥ | yāḥ | ta̱lpa̱-śīva̍rīḥ |
striya̍ḥ | yāḥ | puṇya̍-gandhāḥ | tāḥ | sarvā̍ḥ | svā̱pa̱yā̱ma̱si̱ |
ke | ī̱m | vi-a̍ktāḥ | nara̍ḥ | sa-nī̍ḻāḥ | ru̱drasya̍ | maryā̍ḥ | adha̍ | su̱-aśvā̍ḥ |
naki̍ḥ | hi | e̱ṣā̱m | ja̱nūṁṣi̍ | vede̍ | te | a̱ṅga | vi̱dre̱ | mi̱thaḥ | ja̱nitra̍m |
a̱bhi | sva̱-pūbhi̍ḥ | mi̱thaḥ | va̱pa̱nta̱ | vāta̍-svanasaḥ | śye̱nāḥ | a̱spṛ̱dhra̱n |
e̱tāni̍ | dhīra̍ḥ | ni̱ṇyā | ci̱ke̱ta̱ | pṛśni̍ḥ | yat | ūdha̍ḥ | ma̱hī | ja̱bhāra̍ |
sā | viṭ | su̱-vīrā̍ | ma̱rut-bhi̍ḥ | a̱stu̱ | sa̱nāt | saha̍ntī | puṣya̍ntī | nṛ̱mṇam |
yāma̍m | yeṣṭhā̍ḥ | śu̱bhā | śobhi̍ṣṭhāḥ | śri̱yā | sam-mi̍ślāḥ | oja̍ḥ-bhiḥ | u̱grāḥ |
u̱gram | va̱ḥ | oja̍ḥ | sthi̱rā | śavā̍ṁsi | adha̍ | ma̱rut-bhi̍ḥ | ga̱ṇaḥ | tuvi̍ṣmān |
śu̱bhraḥ | va̱ḥ | śuṣma̍ḥ | krudhmī̍ | manā̍ṁsi | dhuni̍ḥ | muni̍ḥ-iva | śardha̍sya | dhṛ̱ṣṇoḥ |
sane̍mi | a̱smat | yu̱yota̍ | di̱dyum | mā | va̱ḥ | du̱ḥ-ma̱tiḥ | i̱ha | praṇa̍k | na̱ḥ |
pri̱yā | va̱ḥ | nāma̍ | hu̱ve̱ | tu̱rāṇā̍m | ā | yat | tṛ̱pat | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | vā̱va̱śā̱nāḥ |
su̱-ā̱yu̱dhāsa̍ḥ | i̱ṣmiṇa̍ḥ | su̱-ni̱ṣkāḥ | u̱ta | sva̱yam | ta̱nva̍ḥ | śumbha̍mānāḥ |
śucī̍ | va̱ḥ | ha̱vyā | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | śucī̍nām | śuci̍m | hi̱no̱mi̱ | a̱dhva̱ram | śuci̍-bhyaḥ |
ṛ̱tena̍ | sa̱tyam | ṛ̱ta̱-sāpa̍ḥ | ā̱ya̱n | śuci̍-janmānaḥ | śuca̍yaḥ | pā̱va̱kāḥ |
aṁse̍ṣu | ā | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | khā̱daya̍ḥ | va̱ḥ | vakṣa̍ḥ-su | ru̱kmāḥ | u̱pa̱-śi̱śri̱yā̱ṇāḥ |
vi | vi̱-dyuta̍ḥ | na | vṛ̱ṣṭi-bhi̍ḥ | ru̱cā̱nāḥ | anu̍ | sva̱dhām | āyu̍dhaiḥ | yaccha̍mānāḥ |
pra | bu̱dhnyā̍ | va̱ḥ | ī̱ra̱te̱ | mahā̍ṁsi | pra | nāmā̍ni | pra̱-ya̱jya̱va̱ḥ | ti̱ra̱dhva̱m |
sa̱ha̱sriya̍m | damya̍m | bhā̱gam | e̱tam | gṛ̱ha̱-me̱dhīya̍m | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | ju̱ṣa̱dhva̱m |
yadi̍ | stu̱tasya̍ | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | a̱dhi̱-i̱tha | i̱tthā | vipra̍sya | vā̱jina̍ḥ | havī̍man |
ma̱kṣu | rā̱yaḥ | su̱-vīrya̍sya | dā̱ta̱ | nu | ci̱t | yam | a̱nyaḥ | ā̱-dabha̍t | arā̍vā |
atyā̍saḥ | na | ye | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | su̱-añca̍ḥ | ya̱kṣa̱-dṛśa̍ḥ | na | śu̱bhaya̍nta | maryā̍ḥ |
te | ha̱rmye̱-sthāḥ | śiśa̍vaḥ | na | śu̱bhrāḥ | va̱tsāsa̍ḥ | na | pra̱-kī̱ḻina̍ḥ | pa̱ya̱ḥ-dhāḥ |
da̱śa̱syanta̍ḥ | na̱ḥ | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | mṛ̱ḻa̱ntu̱ | va̱ri̱va̱syanta̍ḥ | roda̍sī̱ iti̍ | su̱meke̱ iti̍ su̱-meke̍ |
ā̱re | go̱-hā | nṛ̱-hā | va̱dhaḥ | va̱ḥ | a̱stu̱ | su̱mrebhi̍ḥ | a̱sme iti̍ | va̱sa̱va̱ḥ | na̱ma̱dhva̱m |
ā | va̱ḥ | hotā̍ | jo̱ha̱vī̱ti̱ | sa̱ttaḥ | sa̱trācī̍m | rā̱tim | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | gṛ̱ṇā̱naḥ |
yaḥ | īva̍taḥ | vṛ̱ṣa̱ṇa̱ḥ | asti̍ | go̱pāḥ | saḥ | adva̍yāvī | ha̱va̱te̱ | va̱ḥ | u̱kthaiḥ |
i̱me | tu̱ram | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | ra̱ma̱ya̱nti̱ | i̱me | saha̍ḥ | saha̍saḥ | ā | na̱ma̱nti̱ |
i̱me | śaṁsa̍m | va̱nu̱ṣya̱taḥ | ni | pā̱nti̱ | gu̱ru | dveṣa̍ḥ | ara̍ruṣe | da̱dha̱nti̱ |
i̱me | ra̱dhram | ci̱t | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | ju̱na̱nti̱ | bhṛmi̍m | ci̱t | yathā̍ | vasa̍vaḥ | ju̱ṣanta̍ |
apa̍ | bā̱dha̱dhva̱m | vṛ̱ṣa̱ṇa̱ḥ | tamā̍ṁsi | dha̱tta | viśva̍m | tana̍yam | to̱kam | a̱sme iti̍ |
mā | va̱ḥ | dā̱trāt | ma̱ru̱ta̱ḥ | niḥ | a̱rā̱ma̱ | mā | pa̱ścāt | da̱dhma̱ | ra̱thya̱ḥ | vi̱-bhā̱ge |
ā | na̱ḥ | spā̱rhe | bha̱ja̱ta̱na̱ | va̱sa̱vye̍ | yat | ī̱m | su̱-jā̱tam | vṛ̱ṣa̱ṇa̱ḥ | va̱ḥ | asti̍ |
sam | yat | hana̍nta | ma̱nyu-bhi̍ḥ | janā̍saḥ | śūrā̍ḥ | ya̱hvīṣu̍ | oṣa̍dhīṣu | vi̱kṣu |
