parā̍ | vi-a̍ktaḥ | a̱ru̱ṣaḥ | di̱vaḥ | ka̱viḥ | vṛṣā̍ | tri̱-pṛ̱ṣṭhaḥ | a̱na̱vi̱ṣṭa̱ | gāḥ | a̱bhi |
sa̱hasra̍-nītiḥ | yati̍ḥ | pa̱rā̱-yati̍ḥ | re̱bhaḥ | na | pū̱rvīḥ | u̱ṣasa̍ḥ | vi | rā̱ja̱ti̱ |
tve̱ṣam | rū̱pam | kṛ̱ṇu̱te̱ | varṇa̍ḥ | a̱sya̱ | saḥ | yatra̍ | aśa̍yat | sam-ṛ̍tā | sedha̍ti | sri̱dhaḥ |
a̱psāḥ | yā̱ti̱ | sva̱dhayā̍ | daivya̍m | jana̍m | sam | su̱-stu̱tī | nasa̍te | sam | go-a̍grayā |
u̱kṣā-i̍va | yū̱thā | pa̱ri̱-yan | a̱rā̱vī̱t | adhi̍ | tviṣī̍ḥ | a̱dhi̱ta̱ | sūrya̍sya |
di̱vyaḥ | su̱-pa̱rṇaḥ | ava̍ | ca̱kṣa̱ta̱ | kṣām | soma̍ḥ | pari̍ | kratu̍nā | pa̱śya̱te̱ | jāḥ |
hari̍m | mṛ̱ja̱nti̱ | a̱ru̱ṣaḥ | na | yu̱jya̱te̱ | sam | dhe̱nu-bhi̍ḥ | ka̱laśe̍ | soma̍ḥ | a̱jya̱te̱ |
ut | vāca̍m | ī̱raya̍ti | hi̱nvate̍ | ma̱tī | pu̱ru̱-stu̱tasya̍ | kati̍ | ci̱t | pa̱ri̱-priya̍ḥ |
sā̱kam | va̱da̱nti̱ | ba̱hava̍ḥ | ma̱nī̱ṣiṇa̍ḥ | indra̍sya | soma̍m | ja̱ṭhare̍ | yat | ā̱-du̱huḥ |
yadi̍ | mṛ̱janti̍ | su-ga̍bhastayaḥ | nara̍ḥ | sa-nī̍ḻābhiḥ | da̱śa-bhi̍ḥ | kāmya̍m | madhu̍ |
ara̍mamāṇaḥ | ati̍ | e̱ti̱ | gāḥ | a̱bhi | sūrya̍sya | pri̱yam | du̱hi̱tuḥ | ti̱raḥ | rava̍m |
anu̍ | a̱smai̱ | joṣa̍m | a̱bha̱ra̱t | vi̱na̱m-gṛ̱saḥ | sam | dva̱yībhi̍ḥ | svasṛ̍-bhiḥ | kṣe̱ti̱ | jā̱mi-bhi̍ḥ |
nṛ-dhū̍taḥ | adri̍-sutaḥ | ba̱rhiṣi̍ | pri̱yaḥ | pati̍ḥ | gavā̍m | pra̱-diva̍ḥ | indu̍ḥ | ṛ̱tviya̍ḥ |
pura̍ndhi-vān | manu̍ṣaḥ | ya̱jña̱-sādha̍naḥ | śuci̍ḥ | dhi̱yā | pa̱va̱te̱ | soma̍ḥ | i̱ndra̱ | te̱ |
nṛbā̱hu-bhyā̍m | co̱di̱taḥ | dhāra̍yā | su̱taḥ | a̱nu̱-sva̱dham | pa̱va̱te̱ | soma̍ḥ | i̱ndra̱ | te̱ |
ā | a̱prā̱ḥ | kratū̍n | sam | a̱jai̱ḥ | a̱dhva̱re | ma̱tīḥ | veḥ | na | dru̱-sat | ca̱mvo̍ḥ | ā | a̱sa̱da̱t | hari̍ḥ |
a̱ṁśum | du̱ha̱nti̱ | sta̱naya̍ntam | akṣi̍tam | ka̱vim | ka̱vaya̍ḥ | a̱pasa̍ḥ | ma̱nī̱ṣiṇa̍ḥ |
sam | ī̱miti̍ | gāva̍ḥ | ma̱taya̍ḥ | ya̱nti̱ | sa̱m-yata̍ḥ | ṛ̱tasya̍ | yonā̍ | sada̍ne | pu̱na̱ḥ-bhuva̍ḥ |
nābhā̍ | pṛ̱thi̱vyāḥ | dha̱ruṇa̍ḥ | ma̱haḥ | di̱vaḥ | a̱pām | ū̱rmau | sindhu̍ṣu | a̱ntaḥ | u̱kṣi̱taḥ |
indra̍sya | vajra̍ḥ | vṛ̱ṣa̱bhaḥ | vi̱bhu-va̍suḥ | soma̍ḥ | hṛ̱de | pa̱va̱te̱ | cāru̍ | ma̱tsa̱raḥ |
saḥ | tu | pa̱va̱sva̱ | pari̍ | pārthi̍vam | raja̍ḥ | sto̱tre | śikṣa̍n | ā̱-dhū̱nva̱te | ca̱ | su̱kra̱to̱ iti̍ su-krato |
mā | na̱ḥ | niḥ | bhā̱k | vasu̍naḥ | sa̱da̱na̱-spṛśa̍ḥ | ra̱yim | pi̱śaṅga̍m | ba̱hu̱lam | va̱sī̱ma̱hi̱ |
ā | tu | na̱ḥ | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ | śa̱ta-dā̍tu | aśvya̍m | sa̱hasra̍-dātu | pa̱śu̱-mat | hira̍ṇya-vat |
upa̍ | mā̱sva̱ | bṛ̱ha̱tīḥ | re̱vatī̍ḥ | iṣa̍ḥ | adhi̍ | sto̱trasya̍ | pa̱va̱mā̱na̱ | na̱ḥ | ga̱hi̱ |
srakve̍ | dra̱psasya̍ | dhama̍taḥ | sam | a̱sva̱ra̱n | ṛ̱tasya̍ | yonā̍ | sam | a̱ra̱nta̱ | nābha̍yaḥ |
trīn | saḥ | mū̱rdhnaḥ | asu̍raḥ | ca̱kre̱ | ā̱-rabhe̍ | sa̱tyasya̍ | nāva̍ḥ | su̱-kṛta̍m | a̱pī̱pa̱ra̱n |
sa̱myak | sa̱myañca̍ḥ | ma̱hi̱ṣāḥ | a̱he̱ṣa̱ta̱ | sindho̍ḥ | ū̱rmau | adhi̍ | ve̱nāḥ | a̱vī̱vi̱pa̱n |
madho̍ḥ | dhārā̍bhiḥ | ja̱naya̍ntaḥ | a̱rkam | it | pri̱yām | indra̍sya | ta̱nva̍m | a̱vī̱vṛ̱dha̱n |
pa̱vitra̍-vantaḥ | pari̍ | vāca̍m | ā̱sa̱te̱ | pi̱tā | e̱ṣā̱m | pra̱tnaḥ | a̱bhi | ra̱kṣa̱ti̱ | vra̱tam |
ma̱haḥ | sa̱mu̱dram | varu̍ṇaḥ | ti̱raḥ | da̱dhe̱ | dhīrā̍ḥ | it | śe̱ku̱ḥ | dha̱ruṇe̍ṣu | ā̱-rabha̍m |
sa̱hasra̍-dhāre | ava̍ | te | sam | a̱sva̱ra̱n | di̱vaḥ | nāke̍ | madhu̍-jihvāḥ | a̱sa̱ścata̍ḥ |
asya̍ | spaśa̍ḥ | na | ni | mi̱ṣa̱nti̱ | bhūrṇa̍yaḥ | pa̱de-pa̍de | pā̱śina̍ḥ | sa̱nti̱ | seta̍vaḥ |
pi̱tuḥ | mā̱tuḥ | adhi̍ | ā | ye | sa̱m-asva̍ran | ṛ̱cā | śoca̍ntaḥ | sa̱m-daha̍ntaḥ | a̱vra̱tān |
indra̍-dviṣṭām | apa̍ | dha̱ma̱nti̱ | mā̱yayā̍ | tvaca̍m | asi̍knīm | bhūma̍naḥ | di̱vaḥ | pari̍ |
pra̱tnāt | mānā̍t | adhi̍ | ā | ye | sa̱m-asva̍ran | śloka̍-yantrāsaḥ | ra̱bha̱sasya̍ | manta̍vaḥ |
apa̍ | a̱na̱kṣāsa̍ḥ | ba̱dhi̱rāḥ | a̱hā̱sa̱ta̱ | ṛ̱tasya̍ | panthā̍m | na | ta̱ra̱nti̱ | du̱ḥ-kṛta̍ḥ |
sa̱hasra̍-dhāre | vi-ta̍te | pa̱vitre̍ | ā | vāca̍m | pu̱na̱nti̱ | ka̱vaya̍ḥ | ma̱nī̱ṣiṇa̍ḥ |
ru̱drāsa̍ḥ | e̱ṣā̱m | i̱ṣi̱rāsa̍ḥ | a̱druha̍ḥ | spaśa̍ḥ | su̱-añca̍ḥ | su̱-dṛśa̍ḥ | nṛ̱-cakṣa̍saḥ |
ṛ̱tasya̍ | go̱pāḥ | na | dabhā̍ya | su̱-kratu̍ḥ | trī | saḥ | pa̱vitrā̍ | hṛ̱di | a̱ntaḥ | ā | da̱dhe̱ |
vi̱dvān | saḥ | viśvā̍ | bhuva̍nā | a̱bhi | pa̱śya̱ti̱ | ava̍ | aju̍ṣṭān | vi̱dhya̱ti | ka̱rte | a̱vra̱tān |
ṛ̱tasya̍ | tantu̍ḥ | vi-ta̍taḥ | pa̱vitre̍ | ā | ji̱hvāyā̍ḥ | agre̍ | varu̍ṇasya | mā̱yayā̍ |
dhīrā̍ḥ | ci̱t | tat | sa̱m-ina̍kṣantaḥ | ā̱śa̱ta̱ | atra̍ | ka̱rtam | ava̍ | pa̱dā̱ti̱ | apra̍-bhuḥ |
śiśu̍ḥ | na | jā̱taḥ | ava̍ | ca̱kra̱da̱t | vane̍ | sva̍ḥ | yat | vā̱jī | a̱ru̱ṣaḥ | sisā̍sati |
di̱vaḥ | reta̍sā | sa̱ca̱te̱ | pa̱ya̱ḥ-vṛdhā̍ | tam | ī̱ma̱he̱ | su̱-ma̱tī | śarma̍ | sa̱-pratha̍ḥ |
di̱vaḥ | yaḥ | ska̱mbhaḥ | dha̱ruṇa̍ḥ | su-ā̍tataḥ | ā-pū̍rṇaḥ | a̱ṁśuḥ | pa̱ri̱-eti̍ | vi̱śvata̍ḥ |
saḥ | i̱me iti̍ | ma̱hī iti̍ | roda̍sī̱ iti̍ | ya̱kṣa̱t | ā̱-vṛtā̍ | sa̱mī̱cī̱ne iti̍ sa̱m-ī̱cī̱ne | dā̱hā̱ra̱ | sam | iṣa̍ḥ | ka̱viḥ |
mahi̍ | psara̍ḥ | su-kṛ̍tam | so̱myam | madhu̍ | u̱rvī | gavyū̍tiḥ | adi̍teḥ | ṛ̱tam | ya̱te |
īśe̍ | yaḥ | vṛ̱ṣṭeḥ | i̱taḥ | u̱sriya̍ḥ | vṛṣā̍ | a̱pām | ne̱tā | yaḥ | i̱taḥ-ū̍tiḥ | ṛ̱gmiya̍ḥ |
ā̱tma̱n-vat | nabha̍ḥ | du̱hya̱te̱ | ghṛ̱tam | paya̍ḥ | ṛ̱tasya̍ | nābhi̍ḥ | a̱mṛta̍m | vi | jā̱ya̱te̱ |
sa̱m-ī̱cī̱nāḥ | su̱-dāna̍vaḥ | prī̱ṇa̱nti̱ | tam | nara̍ḥ | hi̱tam | ava̍ | me̱ha̱nti̱ | pera̍vaḥ |
arā̍vīt | a̱ṁśuḥ | saca̍mānaḥ | ū̱rmiṇā̍ | de̱va̱-a̱vya̍m | manu̍ṣe | pi̱nva̱ti̱ | tvaca̍m |
dadhā̍ti | garbha̍m | adi̍teḥ | u̱pa-sthe̍ | ā | yena̍ | to̱kam | ca̱ | tana̍yam | ca̱ | dhāma̍he |
sa̱hasra̍-dhāre | ava̍ | tāḥ | a̱sa̱ścata̍ḥ | tṛ̱tīye̍ | sa̱ntu̱ | raja̍si | pra̱jā-va̍tīḥ |
cata̍sraḥ | nābha̍ḥ | ni-hi̍tāḥ | a̱vaḥ | di̱vaḥ | ha̱viḥ | bha̱ra̱nti̱ | a̱mṛta̍m | ghṛ̱ta̱-ścuta̍ḥ |
śve̱tam | rū̱pam | kṛ̱ṇu̱te̱ | yat | sisā̍sati | soma̍ḥ | mī̱ḍhvān | asu̍raḥ | ve̱da̱ | bhūma̍naḥ |
dhi̱yā | śamī̍ | sa̱ca̱te̱ | saḥ | ī̱m | a̱bhi | pra̱-vat | di̱vaḥ | kava̍ndham | ava̍ | da̱rṣa̱t | u̱driṇa̍m |
adha̍ | śve̱tam | ka̱laśa̍m | gobhi̍ḥ | a̱ktam | kārṣma̍n | ā | vā̱jī | a̱kra̱mī̱t | sa̱sa̱-vān |
ā | hi̱nvi̱re̱ | mana̍sā | de̱va̱-yanta̍ḥ | ka̱kṣīva̍te | śa̱ta-hi̍māya | gonā̍m |
a̱t-bhiḥ | so̱ma̱ | pa̱pṛ̱cā̱nasya̍ | te̱ | rasa̍ḥ | avya̍ḥ | vāra̍m | vi | pa̱va̱mā̱na̱ | dhā̱va̱ti̱ |
saḥ | mṛ̱jyamā̍naḥ | ka̱vi-bhi̍ḥ | ma̱di̱n-ta̱ma̱ | svada̍sva | indrā̍ya | pa̱va̱mā̱na̱ | pī̱taye̍ |
a̱bhi | pri̱yāṇi̍ | pa̱va̱te̱ | cana̍ḥ-hitaḥ | nāmā̍ni | ya̱hvaḥ | adhi̍ | yeṣu̍ | vardha̍te |
ā | sūrya̍sya | bṛ̱ha̱taḥ | bṛ̱han | adhi̍ | ratha̍m | viṣva̍ñcam | a̱ru̱ha̱t | vi̱-ca̱kṣa̱ṇaḥ |
ṛ̱tasya̍ | ji̱hvā | pa̱va̱te̱ | madhu̍ | pri̱yam | va̱ktā | pati̍ḥ | dhi̱yaḥ | a̱syāḥ | adā̍bhyaḥ |
dadhā̍ti | pu̱traḥ | pi̱troḥ | a̱pī̱cya̍m | nāma̍ | tṛ̱tīya̍m | adhi̍ | ro̱ca̱ne | di̱vaḥ |
ava̍ | dyu̱tā̱naḥ | ka̱laśā̍n | a̱ci̱kra̱da̱t | nṛ-bhi̍ḥ | ye̱mā̱naḥ | kośe̍ | ā | hi̱ra̱ṇyaye̍ |
a̱bhi | ī̱m | ṛ̱tasya̍ | do̱hanā̍ḥ | a̱nū̱ṣa̱ta̱ | adhi̍ | tri̱-pṛ̱ṣṭhaḥ | u̱ṣasa̍ḥ | vi | rā̱ja̱ti̱ |
adri̍-bhiḥ | su̱taḥ | ma̱ti-bhi̍ḥ | cana̍ḥ-hitaḥ | pra̱-ro̱caya̍n | roda̍sī̱ iti̍ | mā̱tarā̍ | śuci̍ḥ |
romā̍ṇi | avyā̍ | sa̱mayā̍ | vi | dhā̱va̱ti̱ | madho̍ḥ | dhārā̍ | pinva̍mānā | di̱ve-di̍ve |
pari̍ | so̱ma̱ | pra | dha̱nva̱ | sva̱staye̍ | nṛ-bhi̍ḥ | pu̱nā̱naḥ | a̱bhi | vā̱sa̱ya̱ | ā̱-śira̍m |
ye | te̱ | madā̍ḥ | ā̱ha̱nasa̍ḥ | vi-hā̍yasaḥ | tebhi̍ḥ | indra̍m | co̱da̱ya̱ | dāta̍ve | ma̱gham |
dha̱rtā | di̱vaḥ | pa̱va̱te̱ | kṛtvya̍ḥ | rasa̍ḥ | dakṣa̍ḥ | de̱vānā̍m | a̱nu̱-mādya̍ḥ | nṛ-bhi̍ḥ |
hari̍ḥ | sṛ̱jā̱naḥ | atya̍ḥ | na | satva̍-bhiḥ | vṛthā̍ | pājā̍ṁsi | kṛ̱ṇu̱te̱ | na̱dīṣu̍ | ā |
śūra̍ḥ | na | dha̱tte̱ | āyu̍dhā | gabha̍styoḥ | sva1̱̍riti̱ sva̍ḥ | sisā̍san | ra̱thi̱raḥ | go-i̍ṣṭiṣu |
indra̍sya | śuṣma̍m | ī̱raya̍n | a̱pa̱syu-bhi̍ḥ | indu̍ḥ | hi̱nvā̱naḥ | a̱jya̱te̱ | ma̱nī̱ṣi-bhi̍ḥ |
indra̍sya | so̱ma̱ | pava̍mānaḥ | ū̱rmiṇā̍ | ta̱vi̱ṣyamā̍ṇaḥ | ja̱ṭhare̍ṣu | ā | vi̱śa̱ |
pra | na̱ḥ | pi̱nva̱ | vi̱-dyut | a̱bhrā-i̍va | roda̍sī̱ iti̍ | dhi̱yā | na | vājā̍n | upa̍ | mā̱si̱ | śaśva̍taḥ |
viśva̍sya | rājā̍ | pa̱va̱te̱ | sva̱ḥ-dṛśa̍ḥ | ṛ̱tasya̍ | dhī̱tim | ṛ̱ṣi̱ṣāṭ | a̱vī̱va̱śa̱t |
yaḥ | sūrya̍sya | asi̍reṇa | mṛ̱jyate̍ | pi̱tā | ma̱tī̱nām | asa̍maṣṭa-kāvyaḥ |
vṛṣā̍-iva | yū̱thā | pari̍ | kośa̍m | a̱rṣa̱si̱ | a̱pām | u̱pa-sthe̍ | vṛ̱ṣa̱bhaḥ | kani̍kradat |
saḥ | indrā̍ya | pa̱va̱se̱ | ma̱tsa̱rin-ta̍maḥ | yathā̍ | jeṣā̍ma | sa̱m-i̱the | tvā-ū̍tayaḥ |
e̱ṣaḥ | pra | kośe̍ | madhu̍-mān | a̱ci̱kra̱da̱t | indra̍sya | vajra̍ḥ | vapu̍ṣaḥ | vapu̍ḥ-taraḥ |
a̱bhi | ī̱m | ṛ̱tasya̍ | su̱-dughā̍ḥ | ghṛ̱ta̱-ścuta̍ḥ | vā̱śrāḥ | a̱rṣa̱nti̱ | paya̍sā-iva | dhe̱nava̍ḥ |
saḥ | pū̱rvyaḥ | pa̱va̱te̱ | yam | di̱vaḥ | pari̍ | śye̱naḥ | ma̱thā̱yat | i̱ṣi̱taḥ | ti̱raḥ | raja̍ḥ |
saḥ | madhva̍ḥ | ā | yu̱va̱te̱ | vevi̍jānaḥ | it | kṛ̱śāno̍ḥ | astu̍ḥ | mana̍sā | aha̍ | bi̱bhyuṣā̍ |
te | na̱ḥ | pūrvā̍saḥ | upa̍rāsaḥ | inda̍vaḥ | ma̱he | vājā̍ya | dha̱nva̱ntu̱ | go-ma̍te |
ī̱kṣe̱ṇyā̍saḥ | a̱hya̍ḥ | na | cāra̍vaḥ | brahma̍-brahma | ye | ju̱ju̱ṣuḥ | ha̱viḥ-ha̍viḥ |
a̱yam | na̱ḥ | vi̱dvān | va̱na̱va̱t | va̱nu̱ṣya̱taḥ | indu̍ḥ | sa̱trācā̍ | mana̍sā | pu̱ru̱-stu̱taḥ |
i̱nasya̍ | yaḥ | sada̍ne | garbha̍m | ā̱-da̱dhe | gavā̍m | u̱ru̱bjam | a̱bhi | arṣa̍ti | vra̱jam |
cakri̍ḥ | di̱vaḥ | pa̱va̱te̱ | kṛtvya̍ḥ | rasa̍ḥ | ma̱hān | ada̍bdhaḥ | varu̍ṇaḥ | hu̱ruk | ya̱te |
asā̍vi | mi̱traḥ | vṛ̱jane̍ṣu | ya̱jñiya̍ḥ | atya̍ḥ | na | yū̱the | vṛ̱ṣa̱-yuḥ | kani̍kradat |
pra | rājā̍ | vāca̍m | ja̱naya̍n | a̱si̱sya̱da̱t | a̱paḥ | vasā̍naḥ | a̱bhi | gāḥ | i̱ya̱kṣa̱ti̱ |
gṛ̱bhṇāti̍ | ri̱pram | avi̍ḥ | a̱sya̱ | tānvā̍ | śu̱ddhaḥ | de̱vānā̍m | upa̍ | yā̱ti̱ | ni̱ḥ-kṛ̱tam |
indrā̍ya | so̱ma̱ | pari̍ | si̱cya̱se̱ | nṛ-bhi̍ḥ | nṛ̱-cakṣā̍ḥ | ū̱rmiḥ | ka̱viḥ | a̱jya̱se̱ | vane̍ |
pū̱rvīḥ | hi | te̱ | sru̱taya̍ḥ | santi̍ | yāta̍ve | sa̱hasra̍m | aśvā̍ḥ | hara̍yaḥ | ca̱mū̱-sada̍ḥ |
sa̱mu̱driyā̍ḥ | a̱psa̱rasa̍ḥ | ma̱nī̱ṣiṇa̍m | āsī̍nāḥ | a̱ntaḥ | a̱bhi | soma̍m | a̱kṣa̱ra̱n |
tāḥ | ī̱m | hi̱nva̱nti̱ | ha̱rmyasya̍ | sa̱kṣaṇi̍m | yāca̍nte | su̱mnam | pava̍mānam | akṣi̍tam |
go̱-jit | na̱ḥ | soma̍ḥ | ra̱tha̱-jit | hi̱ra̱ṇya̱-jit | sva̱ḥ-jit | a̱p-jit | pa̱va̱te̱ | sa̱ha̱sra̱-jit |
yam | de̱vāsa̍ḥ | ca̱kri̱re | pī̱taye̍ | mada̍m | svādi̍ṣṭham | dra̱psam | a̱ru̱ṇam | ma̱ya̱ḥ-bhuva̍m |
e̱tāni̍ | so̱ma̱ | pava̍mānaḥ | a̱sma̱-yuḥ | sa̱tyāni̍ | kṛ̱ṇvan | dravi̍ṇāni | a̱rṣa̱si̱ |
ja̱hi | śatru̍m | a̱nti̱ke | dū̱ra̱ke | ca̱ | yaḥ | u̱rvīm | gavyū̍tim | abha̍yam | ca̱ | na̱ḥ | kṛ̱dhi̱ |
a̱co̱dasa̍ḥ | na̱ḥ | dha̱nva̱ntu̱ | inda̍vaḥ | pra | su̱vā̱nāsa̍ḥ | bṛ̱hat-di̍veṣu | hara̍yaḥ |
vi | ca̱ | naśa̍n | na̱ḥ | i̱ṣaḥ | arā̍tayaḥ | a̱ryaḥ | na̱śa̱nta̱ | sani̍ṣanta | na̱ḥ | dhiya̍ḥ |
pra | na̱ḥ | dha̱nva̱ntu̱ | inda̍vaḥ | ma̱da̱-cyuta̍ḥ | dhanā̍ | vā̱ | yebhi̍ḥ | arva̍taḥ | ju̱nī̱masi̍ |
ti̱raḥ | marta̍sya | kasya̍ | ci̱t | pari̍-hvṛtim | va̱yam | dhanā̍ni | vi̱śvadhā̍ | bha̱re̱ma̱hi̱ |
u̱ta | svasyā̍ḥ | arā̍tyāḥ | a̱riḥ | hi | saḥ | u̱ta | a̱nyasyā̍ḥ | arā̍tyāḥ | vṛka̍ḥ | hi | saḥ |
dhanva̍n | na | tṛṣṇā̍ | sam | a̱rī̱ta̱ | tān | a̱bhi | soma̍ | ja̱hi | pa̱va̱mā̱na̱ | du̱ḥ-ā̱dhya̍ḥ |
di̱vi | te̱ | nābhā̍ | pa̱ra̱maḥ | yaḥ | ā̱-da̱de | pṛ̱thi̱vyāḥ | te̱ | ru̱ru̱hu̱ḥ | sāna̍vi | kṣipa̍ḥ |
adra̍yaḥ | tvā̱ | ba̱psa̱ti̱ | goḥ | adhi̍ | tva̱ci | a̱p-su | tvā̱ | hastai̍ḥ | du̱du̱hu̱ḥ | ma̱nī̱ṣiṇa̍ḥ |
e̱va | te̱ | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ | su̱-bhva̍m | su̱-peśa̍sam | rasa̍m | tu̱ñja̱nti̱ | pra̱tha̱māḥ | a̱bhi̱-śriya̍ḥ |
nida̍m-nidam | pa̱va̱mā̱na̱ | ni | tā̱ri̱ṣa̱ḥ | ā̱viḥ | te̱ | śuṣma̍ḥ | bha̱va̱tu̱ | pri̱yaḥ | mada̍ḥ |
soma̍sya | dhārā̍ | pa̱va̱te̱ | nṛ̱-cakṣa̍saḥ | ṛ̱tena̍ | de̱vān | ha̱va̱te̱ | di̱vaḥ | pari̍ |
bṛha̱spate̍ḥ | ra̱vathe̍na | vi | di̱dyu̱te̱ | sa̱mu̱drāsa̍ḥ | na | sava̍nāni | vi̱vya̱cu̱ḥ |
yam | tvā̱ | vā̱ji̱n | a̱ghnyāḥ | a̱bhi | anū̍ṣata | aya̍ḥ-hatam | yoni̍m | ā | ro̱ha̱si̱ | dyu̱-mān |
ma̱ghonā̍m | āyu̍ḥ | pra̱-ti̱ran | mahi̍ | śrava̍ḥ | indrā̍ya | so̱ma̱ | pa̱va̱se̱ | vṛṣā̍ | mada̍ḥ |
ā | indra̍sya | ku̱kṣā | pa̱va̱te̱ | ma̱din-ta̍maḥ | ūrja̍m | vasā̍naḥ | śrava̍se | su̱-ma̱ṅgala̍ḥ |
pra̱tyaṅ | saḥ | viśvā̍ | bhuva̍nā | a̱bhi | pa̱pra̱the̱ | krīḻa̍n | hari̍ḥ | atya̍ḥ | sya̱nda̱te̱ | vṛṣā̍ |
tam | tvā̱ | de̱vebhya̍ḥ | madhu̍mat-tamam | nara̍ḥ | sa̱hasra̍-dhāram | du̱ha̱te̱ | daśa̍ | kṣipa̍ḥ |
nṛ-bhi̍ḥ | so̱ma̱ | pra-cyu̍taḥ | grāva̍-bhiḥ | su̱taḥ | viśvā̍n | de̱vān | ā | pa̱va̱sva̱ | sa̱ha̱sra̱-ji̱t |
tam | tvā̱ | ha̱stina̍ḥ | madhu̍-mantam | adri̍-bhiḥ | du̱hanti̍ | a̱p-su | vṛ̱ṣa̱bham | daśa̍ | kṣipa̍ḥ |
indra̍m | so̱ma̱ | mā̱daya̍n | daivya̍m | jana̍m | sindho̍ḥ-iva | ū̱rmiḥ | pava̍mānaḥ | a̱rṣa̱si̱ |
pra | soma̍sya | pava̍mānasya | ū̱rmaya̍ḥ | indra̍sya | ya̱nti̱ | ja̱ṭhara̍m | su̱-peśa̍saḥ |
da̱dhnā | yat | ī̱m | ut-nī̍tāḥ | ya̱śasā̍ | gavā̍m | dā̱nāya̍ | śūra̍m | u̱t-ama̍ndiṣuḥ | su̱tāḥ |
accha̍ | hi | soma̍ḥ | ka̱laśā̍n | asi̍syadat | atya̍ḥ | na | voḻhā̍ | ra̱ghu-va̍rtaniḥ | vṛṣā̍ |
atha̍ | de̱vānā̍m | u̱bhaya̍sya | janma̍naḥ | vi̱dvān | a̱śno̱ti̱ | a̱muta̍ḥ | i̱taḥ | ca̱ | yat |
ā | na̱ḥ | so̱ma̱ | pava̍mānaḥ | ki̱ra̱ | vasu̍ | indo̱ iti̍ | bhava̍ | ma̱gha-vā̍ | rādha̍saḥ | ma̱haḥ |
śikṣa̍ | va̱ya̱ḥ-dha̱ḥ | vasa̍ve | su | ce̱tunā̍ | mā | na̱ḥ | gaya̍m | ā̱re | a̱smat | parā̍ | si̱ca̱ḥ |
ā | na̱ḥ | pū̱ṣā | pava̍mānaḥ | su̱-rā̱taya̍ḥ | mi̱traḥ | ga̱ccha̱ntu̱ | varu̍ṇaḥ | sa̱-joṣa̍saḥ |
bṛha̱spati̍ḥ | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | vā̱yuḥ | a̱śvinā̍ | tvaṣṭā̍ | sa̱vi̱tā | su̱-yamā̍ | sara̍svatī |
u̱bhe iti̍ | dyāvā̍pṛthi̱vī iti̍ | vi̱śva̱mi̱nve iti̍ vi̱śva̱m-i̱nve | a̱rya̱mā | de̱vaḥ | adi̍tiḥ | vi̱-dhā̱tā |
bhaga̍ḥ | nṛ-śaṁsa̍ḥ | u̱ru | a̱ntari̍kṣam | viśve̍ | de̱vāḥ | pava̍mānam | ju̱ṣa̱nta̱ |
asā̍vi | soma̍ḥ | a̱ru̱ṣaḥ | vṛṣā̍ | hari̍ḥ | rājā̍-iva | da̱smaḥ | a̱bhi | gāḥ | a̱ci̱kra̱da̱t |
pu̱nā̱naḥ | vāra̍m | pari̍ | e̱ti̱ | a̱vyaya̍m | śye̱naḥ | na | yoni̍m | ghṛ̱ta-va̍ntam | ā̱-sada̍m |
ka̱viḥ | ve̱dha̱syā | pari̍ | e̱ṣi̱ | māhi̍nam | atya̍ḥ | na | mṛ̱ṣṭaḥ | a̱bhi | vāja̍m | a̱rṣa̱si̱ |
a̱pa̱-sedha̍n | du̱ḥ-i̱tā | so̱ma̱ | mṛ̱ḻa̱ya̱ | ghṛ̱tam | vasā̍naḥ | pari̍ | yā̱si̱ | ni̱ḥ-nija̍m |
pa̱rjanya̍ḥ | pi̱tā | ma̱hi̱ṣasya̍ | pa̱rṇina̍ḥ | nābhā̍ | pṛ̱thi̱vyāḥ | gi̱riṣu̍ | kṣaya̍m | da̱dhe̱ |
svasā̍raḥ | āpa̍ḥ | a̱bhi | gāḥ | u̱ta | a̱sa̱ra̱n | sam | grāva̍-bhiḥ | na̱sa̱te̱ | vī̱te | a̱dhva̱re |
jā̱yā-i̍va | patyau̍ | adhi̍ | śeva̍ | ma̱ṁha̱se̱ | pajrā̍yāḥ | ga̱rbha̱ | śṛ̱ṇu̱hi | bravī̍mi | te̱ |
a̱ntaḥ | vāṇī̍ṣu | pra | ca̱ra̱ | su | jī̱vase̍ | a̱ni̱ndyaḥ | vṛ̱jane̍ | so̱ma̱ | jā̱gṛ̱hi̱ |
yathā̍ | pūrve̍bhyaḥ | śa̱ta̱-sāḥ | amṛ̍dhraḥ | sa̱ha̱sra̱-sāḥ | pa̱ri̱-ayā̍ḥ | vāja̍m | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ |
e̱va | pa̱va̱sva̱ | su̱vi̱tāya̍ | navya̍se | tava̍ | vra̱tam | anu̍ | āpa̍ḥ | sa̱ca̱nte̱ |
pa̱vitra̍m | te̱ | vi-ta̍tam | bra̱hma̱ṇa̱ḥ | pa̱te̱ | pra̱-bhuḥ | gātrā̍ṇi | pari̍ | e̱ṣi̱ | vi̱śvata̍ḥ |
ata̍pta-tanūḥ | na | tat | ā̱maḥ | a̱śnu̱te̱ | śṛ̱tāsa̍ḥ | it | vaha̍ntaḥ | tat | sam | ā̱śa̱ta̱ |
tapo̍ḥ | pa̱vitra̍m | vi-ta̍tam | di̱vaḥ | pa̱de | śoca̍ntaḥ | a̱sya̱ | tanta̍vaḥ | vi | a̱sthi̱ra̱n |
ava̍nti | a̱sya̱ | pa̱vi̱tāra̍m | ā̱śava̍ḥ | di̱vaḥ | pṛ̱ṣṭham | adhi̍ | ti̱ṣṭha̱nti̱ | ceta̍sā |
arū̍rucat | u̱ṣasa̍ḥ | pṛśni̍ḥ | a̱gri̱yaḥ | u̱kṣā | bi̱bha̱rti̱ | bhuva̍nāni | vā̱ja̱-yuḥ |
mā̱yā̱-vina̍ḥ | ma̱mi̱re̱ | a̱sya̱ | mā̱yayā̍ | nṛ̱-cakṣa̍saḥ | pi̱tara̍ḥ | garbha̍m | ā | da̱dhu̱ḥ |
ga̱ndha̱rvaḥ | i̱tthā | pa̱dam | a̱sya̱ | ra̱kṣa̱ti̱ | pāti̍ | de̱vānā̍m | jani̍māni | adbhu̍taḥ |
gṛ̱bhṇāti̍ | ri̱pum | ni̱-dhayā̍ | ni̱dhā-pa̍tiḥ | su̱kṛt-ta̍māḥ | madhu̍naḥ | bha̱kṣam | ā̱śa̱ta̱ |
ha̱viḥ | ha̱vi̱ṣma̱ḥ | mahi̍ | sadma̍ | daivya̍m | nabha̍ḥ | vasā̍naḥ | pari̍ | yā̱si̱ | a̱dhva̱ram |
rājā̍ | pa̱vitra̍-rathaḥ | vāja̍m | ā | a̱ru̱ha̱ḥ | sa̱hasra̍-bhṛṣṭiḥ | ja̱ya̱si̱ | śrava̍ḥ | bṛ̱hat |
pava̍sva | de̱va̱-māda̍naḥ | vi-ca̍rṣaṇiḥ | a̱psāḥ | indrā̍ya | varu̍ṇāya | vā̱yave̍ |
kṛ̱dhi | na̱ḥ | a̱dya | vari̍vaḥ | sva̱sti̱-mat | u̱ru̱-kṣi̱tau | gṛ̱ṇī̱hi̱ | daivya̍m | jana̍m |
ā | yaḥ | ta̱sthau | bhuva̍nāni | ama̍rtyaḥ | viśvā̍ni | soma̍ḥ | pari̍ | tāni̍ | a̱rṣa̱ti̱ |
kṛ̱ṇvan | sa̱m-cṛta̍m | vi̱-cṛta̍m | a̱bhiṣṭa̍ye | indu̍ḥ | si̱sa̱kti̱ | u̱ṣasa̍m | na | sūrya̍ḥ |
ā | yaḥ | gobhi̍ḥ | sṛ̱jyate̍ | oṣa̍dhīṣu | ā | de̱vānā̍m | su̱mne | i̱ṣaya̍n | upa̍-vasuḥ |
ā | vi̱-dyutā̍ | pa̱va̱te̱ | dhāra̍yā | su̱taḥ | indra̍m | soma̍ḥ | mā̱daya̍n | daivya̍m | jana̍m |
e̱ṣaḥ | syaḥ | soma̍ḥ | pa̱va̱te̱ | sa̱ha̱sra̱-jit | hi̱nvā̱naḥ | vāca̍m | i̱ṣi̱rām | u̱ṣa̱ḥ-budha̍m |
indu̍ḥ | sa̱mu̱dram | ut | i̱ya̱rti̱ | vā̱yu-bhi̍ḥ | ā | indra̍sya | hārdi̍ | ka̱laśe̍ṣu | sī̱da̱ti̱ |
a̱bhi | tyam | gāva̍ḥ | paya̍sā | pa̱ya̱ḥ-vṛdha̍m | soma̍m | śrī̱ṇa̱nti̱ | ma̱ti-bhi̍ḥ | sva̱ḥ-vida̍m |
dha̱na̱m-ja̱yaḥ | pa̱va̱te̱ | kṛtvya̍ḥ | rasa̍ḥ | vipra̍ḥ | ka̱viḥ | kāvye̍na | sva̍ḥ-canāḥ |
indrā̍ya | so̱ma̱ | su-su̍taḥ | pari̍ | sra̱va̱ | apa̍ | amī̍vā | bha̱va̱tu̱ | rakṣa̍sā | sa̱ha |
mā | te̱ | rasa̍sya | ma̱tsa̱ta̱ | dva̱yā̱vina̍ḥ | dravi̍ṇasvantaḥ | i̱ha | sa̱ntu̱ | inda̍vaḥ |
a̱smān | sa̱-ma̱rye | pa̱va̱mā̱na̱ | co̱da̱ya̱ | dakṣa̍ḥ | de̱vānā̍m | asi̍ | hi | pri̱yaḥ | mada̍ḥ |
ja̱hi | śatrū̍n | a̱bhi | ā | bha̱nda̱nā̱-ya̱taḥ | piba̍ | i̱ndra̱ | soma̍m | ava̍ | na̱ḥ | mṛdha̍ḥ | ja̱hi̱ |
ada̍bdhaḥ | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ | pa̱va̱se̱ | ma̱din-ta̍maḥ | ā̱tmā | indra̍sya | bha̱va̱si̱ | dhā̱siḥ | u̱t-ta̱maḥ |
a̱bhi | sva̱ra̱nti̱ | ba̱hava̍ḥ | ma̱nī̱ṣiṇa̍ḥ | rājā̍nam | a̱sya | bhuva̍nasya | ni̱ṁsa̱te̱ |
sa̱hasra̍-nīthaḥ | śa̱ta-dhā̍raḥ | adbhu̍taḥ | indrā̍ya | indu̍ḥ | pa̱va̱te̱ | kāmya̍m | madhu̍ |
jaya̍n | kṣetra̍m | a̱bhi | a̱rṣa̱ | jaya̍n | a̱paḥ | u̱rum | na̱ḥ | gā̱tum | kṛ̱ṇu̱ | so̱ma̱ | mī̱ḍhva̱ḥ |
kani̍kradat | ka̱laśe̍ | gobhi̍ḥ | a̱jya̱se̱ | vi | a̱vyaya̍m | sa̱mayā̍ | vāra̍m | a̱rṣa̱si̱ |
ma̱rmṛ̱jyamā̍naḥ | atya̍ḥ | na | sā̱na̱siḥ | indra̍sya | so̱ma̱ | ja̱ṭhare̍ | sam | a̱kṣa̱ra̱ḥ |
svā̱duḥ | pa̱va̱sva̱ | di̱vyāya̍ | janma̍ne | svā̱duḥ | indrā̍ya | su̱havī̍tu-nāmne |
svā̱duḥ | mi̱trāya̍ | varu̍ṇāya | vā̱yave̍ | bṛha̱spata̍ye | madhu̍-mān | adā̍bhyaḥ |
atya̍m | mṛ̱ja̱nti̱ | ka̱laśe̍ | daśa̍ | kṣipa̍ḥ | pra | viprā̍ṇām | ma̱taya̍ḥ | vāca̍ḥ | ī̱ra̱te̱ |
pava̍mānāḥ | a̱bhi | a̱rṣa̱nti̱ | su̱-stu̱tim | ā | indra̍m | vi̱śa̱nti̱ | ma̱di̱rāsa̍ḥ | inda̍vaḥ |
pava̍mānaḥ | a̱bhi | a̱rṣa̱ | su̱-vīrya̍m | u̱rvīm | gavyū̍tim | mahi̍ | śarma̍ | sa̱-pratha̍ḥ |
māki̍ḥ | na̱ḥ | a̱sya | pari̍-sūtiḥ | ī̱śa̱ta̱ | indo̱ iti̍ | jaye̍ma | tvayā̍ | dhana̍m-dhanam |
adhi̍ | dyām | a̱sthā̱t | vṛ̱ṣa̱bhaḥ | vi̱-ca̱kṣa̱ṇaḥ | arū̍rucat | vi | di̱vaḥ | ro̱ca̱nā | ka̱viḥ |
rājā̍ | pa̱vitra̍m | ati̍ | e̱ti̱ | roru̍vat | di̱vaḥ | pī̱yūṣa̍m | du̱ha̱te̱ | nṛ̱-cakṣa̍saḥ |
di̱vaḥ | nāke̍ | madhu̍-jihvāḥ | a̱sa̱ścata̍ḥ | ve̱nāḥ | du̱ha̱nti̱ | u̱kṣaṇa̍m | gi̱ri̱-sthām |
a̱p-su | dra̱psam | va̱vṛ̱dhā̱nam | sa̱mu̱dre | ā | sindho̍ḥ | ū̱rmā | madhu̍-mantam | pa̱vitre̍ | ā |
nāke̍ | su̱-pa̱rṇam | u̱pa̱pa̱pti̱-vāṁsa̍m | gira̍ḥ | ve̱nānā̍m | a̱kṛ̱pa̱nta̱ | pū̱rvīḥ |
śiśu̍m | ri̱ha̱nti̱ | ma̱taya̍ḥ | pani̍pnatam | hi̱ra̱ṇyaya̍m | śa̱ku̱nam | kṣāma̍ṇi | sthā̱m |
ū̱rdhvaḥ | ga̱ndha̱rvaḥ | adhi̍ | nāke̍ | a̱sthā̱t | viśvā̍ | rū̱pā | pra̱ti̱-cakṣā̍ṇaḥ | a̱sya̱ |
bhā̱nuḥ | śu̱kreṇa̍ | śo̱ciṣā̍ | vi | a̱dyau̱t | pra | a̱rū̱ru̱ca̱t | roda̍sī̱ iti̍ | mā̱tarā̍ | śuci̍ḥ |
pra | te̱ | ā̱śava̍ḥ | pa̱va̱mā̱na̱ | dhī̱-java̍ḥ | madā̍ḥ | a̱rṣa̱nti̱ | ra̱ghu̱jāḥ-i̍va | tmanā̍ |
di̱vyāḥ | su̱-pa̱rṇāḥ | madhu̍-mantaḥ | inda̍vaḥ | ma̱din-ta̍māsaḥ | pari̍ | kośa̍m | ā̱sa̱te̱ |
pra | te̱ | madā̍saḥ | ma̱di̱rāsa̍ḥ | ā̱śava̍ḥ | asṛ̍kṣata | rathyā̍saḥ | yathā̍ | pṛtha̍k |
dhe̱nuḥ | na | va̱tsam | paya̍sā | a̱bhi | va̱jriṇa̍m | indra̍m | inda̍vaḥ | madhu̍-mantaḥ | ū̱rmaya̍ḥ |
atya̍ḥ | na | hi̱yā̱naḥ | a̱bhi | vāja̍m | a̱rṣa̱ | sva̱ḥ-vit | kośa̍m | di̱vaḥ | adri̍-mātaram |
vṛṣā̍ | pa̱vitre̍ | adhi̍ | sānau̍ | a̱vyaye̍ | soma̍ḥ | pu̱nā̱naḥ | i̱ndri̱yāya̍ | dhāya̍se |
pra | te̱ | āśvi̍nīḥ | pa̱va̱mā̱na̱ | dhī̱-juva̍ḥ | di̱vyāḥ | a̱sṛ̱gra̱n | paya̍sā | dharī̍maṇi |
pra | a̱ntaḥ | ṛṣa̍yaḥ | sthāvi̍rīḥ | a̱sṛ̱kṣa̱ta̱ | ye | tvā̱ | mṛ̱janti̍ | ṛ̱ṣi̱-sā̱na̱ | ve̱dhasa̍ḥ |
viśvā̍ | dhāmā̍ni | vi̱śva̱-ca̱kṣa̱ḥ | ṛbhva̍saḥ | pra̱-bhoḥ | te̱ | sa̱taḥ | pari̍ | ya̱nti̱ | ke̱tava̍ḥ |
vi̱-ā̱na̱śiḥ | pa̱va̱se̱ | so̱ma̱ | dharma̍-bhiḥ | pati̍ḥ | viśva̍sya | bhuva̍nasya | rā̱ja̱si̱ |
u̱bha̱yata̍ḥ | pava̍mānasya | ra̱śmaya̍ḥ | dhru̱vasya̍ | sa̱taḥ | pari̍ | ya̱nti̱ | ke̱tava̍ḥ |
yadi̍ | pa̱vitre̍ | adhi̍ | mṛ̱jyate̍ | hari̍ḥ | sattā̍ | ni | yonā̍ | ka̱laśe̍ṣu | sī̱da̱ti̱ |
ya̱jñasya̍ | ke̱tuḥ | pa̱va̱te̱ | su̱-a̱dhva̱raḥ | soma̍ḥ | de̱vānā̍m | upa̍ | yā̱ti̱ | ni̱ḥ-kṛ̱tam |
sa̱hasra̍-dhāraḥ | pari̍ | kośa̍m | a̱rṣa̱ti̱ | vṛṣā̍ | pa̱vitra̍m | ati̍ | e̱ti̱ | roru̍vat |
rājā̍ | sa̱mu̱dram | na̱dya̍ḥ | vi | gā̱ha̱te̱ | a̱pām | ū̱rmim | sa̱ca̱te̱ | sindhu̍ṣu | śri̱taḥ |
adhi̍ | a̱sthā̱t | sānu̍ | pava̍mānaḥ | a̱vyaya̍m | nābhā̍ | pṛ̱thi̱vyāḥ | dha̱ruṇa̍ḥ | ma̱haḥ | di̱vaḥ |
di̱vaḥ | na | sānu̍ | sta̱naya̍n | a̱ci̱kra̱da̱t | dyauḥ | ca̱ | yasya̍ | pṛ̱thi̱vī | ca̱ | dharma̍-bhiḥ |
indra̍sya | sa̱khyam | pa̱va̱te̱ | vi̱-vevi̍dat | soma̍ḥ | pu̱nā̱naḥ | ka̱laśe̍ṣu | sī̱da̱ti̱ |
jyoti̍ḥ | ya̱jñasya̍ | pa̱va̱te̱ | madhu̍ | pri̱yam | pi̱tā | de̱vānā̍m | ja̱ni̱tā | vi̱bhu-va̍suḥ |
dadhā̍ti | ratna̍m | sva̱dhayo̍ḥ | a̱pī̱cya̍m | ma̱din-ta̍maḥ | ma̱tsa̱raḥ | i̱ndri̱yaḥ | rasa̍ḥ |
a̱bhi̱-kranda̍n | ka̱laśa̍m | vā̱jī | a̱rṣa̱ti̱ | pati̍ḥ | di̱vaḥ | śa̱ta-dhā̍raḥ | vi̱-ca̱kṣa̱ṇaḥ |
hari̍ḥ | mi̱trasya̍ | sada̍neṣu | sī̱da̱ti̱ | ma̱rmṛ̱jā̱naḥ | avi̍-bhiḥ | sindhu̍-bhiḥ | vṛṣā̍ |
agre̍ | sindhū̍nām | pava̍mānaḥ | a̱rṣa̱ti̱ | agre̍ | vā̱caḥ | a̱gri̱yaḥ | goṣu̍ | ga̱ccha̱ti̱ |
agre̍ | vāja̍sya | bha̱ja̱te̱ | ma̱hā̱-dha̱nam | su̱-ā̱yu̱dhaḥ | so̱tṛ-bhi̍ḥ | pū̱ya̱te̱ | vṛṣā̍ |
a̱yam | ma̱ta-vā̍n | śa̱ku̱naḥ | yathā̍ | hi̱taḥ | avye̍ | sa̱sā̱ra̱ | pava̍mānaḥ | ū̱rmiṇā̍ |
tava̍ | kratvā̍ | roda̍sī̱ iti̍ | a̱nta̱rā | ka̱ve̱ | śuci̍ḥ | dhi̱yā | pa̱va̱te̱ | soma̍ḥ | i̱ndra̱ | te̱ |
drā̱pim | vasā̍naḥ | ya̱ja̱taḥ | di̱vi̱-spṛśa̍m | a̱nta̱ri̱kṣa̱-prāḥ | bhuva̍neṣu | arpi̍taḥ |
sva̍ḥ | ja̱jñā̱naḥ | nabha̍sā | a̱bhi | a̱kra̱mī̱t | pra̱tnam | a̱sya̱ | pi̱tara̍m | ā | vi̱vā̱sa̱ti̱ |
saḥ | a̱sya̱ | vi̱śe | mahi̍ | śarma̍ | ya̱ccha̱ti̱ | yaḥ | a̱sya̱ | dhāma̍ | pra̱tha̱mam | vi̱-ā̱na̱śe |
pa̱dam | yat | a̱sya̱ | pa̱ra̱me | vi-o̍mani | ata̍ḥ | viśvā̍ḥ | a̱bhi | sam | yā̱ti̱ | sa̱m-yata̍ḥ |
pro iti̍ | a̱yā̱sī̱t | indu̍ḥ | indra̍sya | ni̱ḥ-kṛ̱tam | sakhā̍ | sakhyu̍ḥ | na | pra | mi̱nā̱ti̱ | sa̱m-gira̍m |
marya̍ḥ-iva | yu̱va̱ti-bhi̍ḥ | sam | a̱rṣa̱ti̱ | soma̍ḥ | ka̱laśe̍ | śa̱ta-yā̍mnā | pa̱thā |
pra | va̱ḥ | dhiya̍ḥ | ma̱ndra̱-yuva̍ḥ | vi̱pa̱nyuva̍ḥ | pa̱na̱syuva̍ḥ | sa̱m-vasa̍neṣu | a̱kra̱mu̱ḥ |
soma̍m | ma̱nī̱ṣāḥ | a̱bhi | a̱nū̱ṣa̱ta̱ | stubha̍ḥ | a̱bhi | dhe̱nava̍ḥ | paya̍sā | ī̱m | a̱śi̱śra̱yu̱ḥ |
ā | na̱ḥ | so̱ma̱ | sa̱m-yata̍m | pi̱pyuṣī̍m | iṣa̍m | indo̱ iti̍ | pava̍sva | pava̍mānaḥ | a̱sridha̍m |
yā | na̱ḥ | doha̍te | triḥ | aha̍n | asa̍ścuṣī | kṣu̱-mat | vāja̍-vat | madhu̍-mat | su̱-vīrya̍m |
vṛṣā̍ | ma̱tī̱nām | pa̱va̱te̱ | vi̱-ca̱kṣa̱ṇaḥ | soma̍ḥ | ahna̍ḥ | pra̱-ta̱rī̱tā | u̱ṣasa̍ḥ | di̱vaḥ |
krā̱ṇā | sindhū̍nām | ka̱laśā̍n | a̱vī̱va̱śa̱t | indra̍sya | hārdi̍ | ā̱-vi̱śan | ma̱nī̱ṣi-bhi̍ḥ |
ma̱nī̱ṣi-bhi̍ḥ | pa̱va̱te̱ | pū̱rvyaḥ | ka̱viḥ | nṛ-bhi̍ḥ | ya̱taḥ | pari̍ | kośā̍n | a̱ci̱kra̱da̱t |
tri̱tasya̍ | nāma̍ | ja̱naya̍n | madhu̍ | kṣa̱ra̱t | indra̍sya | vā̱yoḥ | sa̱khyāya̍ | karta̍ve |
a̱yam | pu̱nā̱naḥ | u̱ṣasa̍ḥ | vi | ro̱ca̱ya̱t | a̱yam | sindhu̍-bhyaḥ | a̱bha̱va̱t | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | lo̱ka̱-kṛt |
a̱yam | triḥ | sa̱pta | du̱du̱hā̱naḥ | ā̱-śira̍m | soma̍ḥ | hṛ̱de | pa̱va̱te̱ | cāru̍ | ma̱tsa̱raḥ |
pava̍sva | so̱ma̱ | di̱vyeṣu̍ | dhāma̍-su | sṛ̱jā̱naḥ | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ | ka̱laśe̍ | pa̱vitre̍ | ā |
sīda̍n | indra̍sya | ja̱ṭhare̍ | kani̍kradat | nṛ-bhi̍ḥ | ya̱taḥ | sūrya̍m | ā | a̱ro̱ha̱ya̱ḥ | di̱vi |
adri̍-bhiḥ | su̱taḥ | pa̱va̱se̱ | pa̱vitre̍ | ā | indo̱ iti̍ | indra̍sya | ja̱ṭhare̍ṣu | ā̱-vi̱śan |
tvam | nṛ̱-cakṣā̍ḥ | a̱bha̱va̱ḥ | vi̱-ca̱kṣa̱ṇa̱ | soma̍ | go̱tram | aṅgi̍raḥ-bhyaḥ | a̱vṛ̱ṇo̱ḥ | apa̍ |
tvām | so̱ma̱ | pava̍mānam | su̱-ā̱dhya̍ḥ | anu̍ | viprā̍saḥ | a̱ma̱da̱n | a̱va̱syava̍ḥ |
tvām | su̱-pa̱rṇaḥ | ā | a̱bha̱ra̱t | di̱vaḥ | pari̍ | indo̱ iti̍ | viśvā̍bhiḥ | ma̱ti-bhi̍ḥ | pari̍-kṛtam |
avye̍ | pu̱nā̱nam | pari̍ | vāre̍ | ū̱rmiṇā̍ | hari̍m | na̱va̱nte̱ | a̱bhi | sa̱pta | dhe̱nava̍ḥ |
a̱pām | u̱pa-sthe̍ | adhi̍ | ā̱yava̍ḥ | ka̱vim | ṛ̱tasya̍ | yonā̍ | ma̱hi̱ṣāḥ | a̱he̱ṣa̱ta̱ |
indu̍ḥ | pu̱nā̱naḥ | ati̍ | gā̱ha̱te̱ | mṛdha̍ḥ | viśvā̍ni | kṛ̱ṇvan | su̱-pathā̍ni | yajya̍ve |
gāḥ | kṛ̱ṇvā̱naḥ | ni̱ḥ-nija̍m | ha̱rya̱taḥ | ka̱viḥ | atya̍ḥ | na | krīḻa̍n | pari̍ | vāra̍m | a̱rṣa̱ti̱ |
a̱sa̱ścata̍ḥ | śa̱ta-dhā̍rāḥ | a̱bhi̱-śriya̍ḥ | hari̍m | na̱va̱nte̱ | ava̍ | tāḥ | u̱da̱nyuva̍ḥ |
kṣipa̍ḥ | mṛ̱ja̱nti̱ | pari̍ | gobhi̍ḥ | ā-vṛ̍tam | tṛ̱tīye̍ | pṛ̱ṣṭhe | adhi̍ | ro̱ca̱ne | di̱vaḥ |
tava̍ | i̱māḥ | pra̱-jāḥ | di̱vyasya̍ | reta̍saḥ | tvam | viśva̍sya | bhuva̍nasya | rā̱ja̱si̱ |
atha̍ | i̱dam | viśva̍m | pa̱va̱mā̱na̱ | te̱ | vaśe̍ | tvam | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ | pra̱tha̱maḥ | dhā̱ma̱-dhāḥ | a̱si̱ |
tvam | sa̱mu̱draḥ | a̱si̱ | vi̱śva̱-vit | ka̱ve̱ | tava̍ | i̱māḥ | pañca̍ | pra̱-diśa̍ḥ | vi-dha̍rmaṇi |
tvam | dyām | ca̱ | pṛ̱thi̱vīm | ca̱ | ati̍ | ja̱bhri̱ṣe̱ | tava̍ | jyotī̍ṁṣi | pa̱va̱mā̱na̱ | sūrya̍ḥ |
tvam | pa̱vitre̍ | raja̍saḥ | vi-dha̍rmaṇi | de̱vebhya̍ḥ | so̱ma̱ | pa̱va̱mā̱na̱ | pū̱ya̱se̱ |
tvām | u̱śija̍ḥ | pra̱tha̱māḥ | a̱gṛ̱bhṇa̱ta̱ | tubhya̍ | i̱mā | viśvā̍ | bhuva̍nāni | ye̱mi̱re̱ |
pra | re̱bhaḥ | e̱ti̱ | ati̍ | vāra̍m | a̱vyaya̍m | vṛṣā̍ | vane̍ṣu | ava̍ | ca̱kra̱da̱t | hari̍ḥ |
sam | dhī̱taya̍ḥ | vā̱va̱śā̱nāḥ | a̱nū̱ṣa̱ta̱ | śiśu̍m | ri̱ha̱nti̱ | ma̱taya̍ḥ | pani̍pnatam |
saḥ | sūrya̍sya | ra̱śmi-bhi̍ḥ | pari̍ | vya̱ta̱ | tantu̍m | ta̱nvā̱naḥ | tri̱-vṛta̍m | yathā̍ | vi̱de |
naya̍n | ṛ̱tasya̍ | pra̱-śiṣa̍ḥ | navī̍yasīḥ | pati̍ḥ | janī̍nām | upa̍ | yā̱ti̱ | ni̱ḥ-kṛ̱tam |
rājā̍ | sindhū̍nām | pa̱va̱te̱ | pati̍ḥ | di̱vaḥ | ṛ̱tasya̍ | yā̱ti̱ | pa̱thi-bhi̍ḥ | kani̍kradat |
sa̱hasra̍-dhāraḥ | pari̍ | si̱cya̱te̱ | hari̍ḥ | pu̱nā̱naḥ | vāca̍m | ja̱naya̍n | upa̍-vasuḥ |
pava̍māna | mahi̍ | arṇa̍ḥ | vi | dhā̱va̱si̱ | sūra̍ḥ | na | ci̱traḥ | avya̍yāni | pavya̍yā |
gabha̍sti-pūtaḥ | nṛ-bhi̍ḥ | adri̍-bhiḥ | su̱taḥ | ma̱he | vājā̍ya | dhanyā̍ya | dha̱nva̱si̱ |
iṣa̍m | ūrja̍m | pa̱va̱mā̱na̱ | a̱bhi | a̱rṣa̱si̱ | śye̱naḥ | na | vaṁsu̍ | ka̱laśe̍ṣu | sī̱da̱si̱ |
indrā̍ya | madvā̍ | madya̍ḥ | mada̍ḥ | su̱taḥ | di̱vaḥ | vi̱ṣṭa̱mbhaḥ | u̱pa̱-maḥ | vi̱-ca̱kṣa̱ṇaḥ |
sa̱pta | svasā̍raḥ | a̱bhi | mā̱tara̍ḥ | śiśu̍m | nava̍m | ja̱jñā̱nam | jenya̍m | vi̱pa̱ḥ-cita̍m |
a̱pām | ga̱ndha̱rvam | di̱vyam | nṛ̱-cakṣa̍sam | soma̍m | viśva̍sya | bhuva̍nasya | rā̱jase̍ |
ī̱śā̱naḥ | i̱mā | bhuva̍nāni | vi | ī̱ya̱se̱ | yu̱jā̱naḥ | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ | ha̱rita̍ḥ | su̱-pa̱rṇya̍ḥ |
tāḥ | te̱ | kṣa̱ra̱ntu̱ | madhu̍-mat | ghṛ̱tam | paya̍ḥ | tava̍ | vra̱te | so̱ma̱ | ti̱ṣṭha̱ntu̱ | kṛ̱ṣṭaya̍ḥ |
tvam | nṛ̱-cakṣā̍ḥ | a̱si̱ | so̱ma̱ | vi̱śvata̍ḥ | pava̍māna | vṛ̱ṣa̱bha̱ | tā | vi | dhā̱va̱si̱ |
saḥ | na̱ḥ | pa̱va̱sva̱ | vasu̍-mat | hira̍ṇya-vat | va̱yam | syā̱ma̱ | bhuva̍neṣu | jī̱vase̍ |
go̱-vit | pa̱va̱sva̱ | va̱su̱-vit | hi̱ra̱ṇya̱-vit | re̱ta̱ḥ-dhāḥ | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ | bhuva̍neṣu | arpi̍taḥ |
tvam | su̱-vīra̍ḥ | a̱si̱ | so̱ma̱ | vi̱śva̱-vit | tam | tvā̱ | viprā̍ḥ | upa̍ | gi̱rā | i̱me | ā̱sa̱te̱ |
ut | madhva̍ḥ | ū̱rmiḥ | va̱nanā̍ḥ | a̱ti̱sthi̱pa̱t | a̱paḥ | vasā̍naḥ | ma̱hi̱ṣaḥ | vi | gā̱ha̱te̱ |
rājā̍ | pa̱vitra̍-rathaḥ | vāja̍m | ā | a̱ru̱ha̱t | sa̱hasra̍-bhṛṣṭiḥ | ja̱ya̱ti̱ | śrava̍ḥ | bṛ̱hat |
saḥ | bha̱ndanā̍ḥ | ut | i̱ya̱rti̱ | pra̱jā-va̍tīḥ | vi̱śva-ā̍yuḥ | viśvā̍ḥ | su̱-bharā̍ḥ | aha̍ḥ-divi |
brahma̍ | pra̱jā-va̍t | ra̱yim | aśva̍-pastyam | pī̱taḥ | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ | indra̍m | a̱smabhya̍m | yā̱ca̱tā̱t |
saḥ | agre̍ | ahnā̍m | hari̍ḥ | ha̱rya̱taḥ | mada̍ḥ | pra | ceta̍sā | ce̱ta̱ya̱te̱ | anu̍ | dyu-bhi̍ḥ |
dvā | janā̍ | yā̱taya̍n | a̱ntaḥ | ī̱ya̱te̱ | narā̱śaṁsa̍m | ca̱ | daivya̍m | ca̱ | dha̱rtari̍ |
a̱ñjate̍ | vi | a̱ñja̱te̱ | sam | a̱ñja̱te̱ | kratu̍m | ri̱ha̱nti̱ | madhu̍nā | a̱bhi | a̱ñja̱te̱ |
sindho̍ḥ | u̱t-śvā̱se | pa̱taya̍ntam | u̱kṣaṇa̍m | hi̱ra̱ṇya̱-pā̱vāḥ | pa̱śum | ā̱su̱ | gṛ̱bhṇa̱te̱ |
vi̱pa̱ḥ-cite̍ | pava̍mānāya | gā̱ya̱ta̱ | ma̱hī | na | dhārā̍ | ati̍ | andha̍ḥ | a̱rṣa̱ti̱ |
ahi̍ḥ | na | jū̱ṇām | ati̍ | sa̱rpa̱ti̱ | tvaca̍m | atya̍ḥ | na | krīḻa̍n | a̱sa̱ra̱t | vṛṣā̍ | hari̍ḥ |
a̱gre̱-gaḥ | rājā̍ | apya̍ḥ | ta̱vi̱ṣya̱te̱ | vi̱-māna̍ḥ | ahnā̍m | bhuva̍neṣu | arpi̍taḥ |
hari̍ḥ | ghṛ̱ta-snu̍ḥ | su̱-dṛśī̍kaḥ | a̱rṇa̱vaḥ | jyo̱tiḥ-ra̍thaḥ | pa̱va̱te̱ | rā̱ye | o̱kya̍ḥ |
asa̍rji | ska̱mbhaḥ | di̱vaḥ | ut-ya̍taḥ | mada̍ḥ | pari̍ | tri̱-dhātu̍ḥ | bhuva̍nāni | a̱rṣa̱ti̱ |
a̱ṁśum | ri̱ha̱nti̱ | ma̱taya̍ḥ | pani̍pnatam | gi̱rā | yadi̍ | ni̱ḥ-nija̍m | ṛ̱gmiṇa̍ḥ | ya̱yuḥ |
pra | te̱ | dhārā̍ḥ | ati̍ | aṇvā̍ni | me̱ṣya̍ḥ | pu̱nā̱nasya̍ | sa̱m-yata̍ḥ | ya̱nti̱ | raṁha̍yaḥ |
yat | gobhi̍ḥ | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ | ca̱mvo̍ḥ | sa̱m-a̱jyase̍ | ā | su̱vā̱naḥ | so̱ma̱ | ka̱laśe̍ṣu | sī̱da̱si̱ |
pava̍sva | so̱ma̱ | kra̱tu̱-vit | na̱ḥ | u̱kthya̍ḥ | avya̍ḥ | vāre̍ | pari̍ | dhā̱va̱ | madhu̍ | pri̱yam |
ja̱hi | viśvā̍n | ra̱kṣasa̍ḥ | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ | a̱triṇa̍ḥ | bṛ̱hat | va̱de̱ma̱ | vi̱dathe̍ | su̱-vīrā̍ḥ |
pra | tu | dra̱va̱ | pari̍ | kośa̍m | ni | sī̱da̱ | nṛ-bhi̍ḥ | pu̱nā̱naḥ | a̱bhi | vāja̍m | a̱rṣa̱ |
aśva̍m | na | tvā̱ | vā̱jina̍m | ma̱rjaya̍ntaḥ | accha̍ | ba̱rhiḥ | ra̱śa̱nābhi̍ḥ | na̱ya̱nti̱ |
su̱-ā̱yu̱dhaḥ | pa̱va̱te̱ | de̱vaḥ | indu̍ḥ | a̱śa̱sti̱-hā | vṛ̱jana̍m | rakṣa̍māṇaḥ |
pi̱tā | de̱vānā̍m | ja̱ni̱tā | su̱-dakṣa̍ḥ | vi̱ṣṭa̱mbhaḥ | di̱vaḥ | dha̱ruṇa̍ḥ | pṛ̱thi̱vyāḥ |
ṛṣi̍ḥ | vipra̍ḥ | pu̱ra̱ḥ-e̱tā | janā̍nām | ṛ̱bhuḥ | dhīra̍ḥ | u̱śanā̍ | kāvye̍na |
saḥ | ci̱t | vi̱ve̱da̱ | ni-hi̍tam | yat | ā̱sā̱m | a̱pī̱cya̍m | guhya̍m | nāma̍ | gonā̍m |
e̱ṣaḥ | syaḥ | te̱ | madhu̍-mān | i̱ndra̱ | soma̍ḥ | vṛṣā̍ | vṛṣṇe̍ | pari̍ | pa̱vitre̍ | a̱kṣā̱riti̍ |
sa̱ha̱sra̱-sāḥ | śa̱ta̱-sāḥ | bhū̱ri̱-dāvā̍ | śa̱śva̱t-ta̱mam | ba̱rhiḥ | ā | vā̱jī | a̱sthā̱t |
e̱te | somā̍ḥ | a̱bhi | ga̱vyā | sa̱hasrā̍ | ma̱he | vājā̍ya | a̱mṛtā̍ya | śravā̍ṁsi |
pa̱vitre̍bhiḥ | pava̍mānāḥ | a̱sṛ̱gra̱n | śra̱va̱syava̍ḥ | na | pṛ̱ta̱nāja̍ḥ | atyā̍ḥ |
pari̍ | hi | sma̱ | pu̱ru̱-hū̱taḥ | janā̍nām | viśvā̍ | asa̍rat | bhoja̍nā | pū̱yamā̍naḥ |
atha̍ | ā | bha̱ra̱ | śye̱na̱-bhṛ̱ta̱ | prayā̍ṁsi | ra̱yim | tuñjā̍naḥ | a̱bhi | vāja̍m | a̱rṣa̱ |
e̱ṣaḥ | su̱vā̱naḥ | pari̍ | soma̍ḥ | pa̱vitre̍ | sarga̍ḥ | na | sṛ̱ṣṭaḥ | a̱da̱dhā̱va̱t | arvā̍ |
ti̱gme iti̍ | śiśā̍naḥ | ma̱hi̱ṣaḥ | na | śṛṅge̱ iti̍ | gāḥ | ga̱vyan | a̱bhi | śūra̍ḥ | na | satvā̍ |
e̱ṣā | ā | ya̱yau̱ | pa̱ra̱māt | a̱ntaḥ | adre̍ḥ | kū-ci̍t | sa̱tīḥ | ū̱rve | gāḥ | vi̱ve̱da̱ |
di̱vaḥ | na | vi̱-dyut | sta̱naya̍ntī | a̱bhraiḥ | soma̍sya | te̱ | pa̱va̱te̱ | i̱ndra̱ | dhārā̍ |
u̱ta | sma̱ | rā̱śim | pari̍ | yā̱si̱ | gonā̍m | indre̍ṇa | so̱ma̱ | sa̱-ratha̍m | pu̱nā̱naḥ |
pū̱rvīḥ | iṣa̍ḥ | bṛ̱ha̱tīḥ | jī̱ra̱dā̱no̱ iti̍ jīra-dāno | śikṣa̍ | śa̱cī̱-va̱ḥ | tava̍ | tāḥ | u̱pa̱-stut |
a̱yam | soma̍ḥ | i̱ndra̱ | tubhya̍m | su̱nve̱ | tubhya̍m | pa̱va̱te̱ | tvam | a̱sya̱ | pā̱hi̱ |
tvam | ha̱ | yam | ca̱kṛ̱ṣe | tvam | va̱vṛ̱ṣe | indu̍m | madā̍ya | yujyā̍ya | soma̍m |
saḥ | ī̱m | ratha̍ḥ | na | bhu̱ri̱ṣāṭ | a̱yo̱ji̱ | ma̱haḥ | pu̱rūṇi̍ | sā̱taye̍ | vasū̍ni |
āt | ī̱m | viśvā̍ | na̱hu̱ṣyā̍ṇi | jā̱tā | sva̍ḥ-sātā | vane̍ | ū̱rdhvā | na̱va̱nta̱ |
vā̱yuḥ | na | yaḥ | ni̱yutvā̍n | i̱ṣṭa-yā̍mā | nāsa̍tyā-iva | have̍ | ā | śam-bha̍viṣṭhaḥ |
vi̱śva-vā̍raḥ | dra̱vi̱ṇo̱dāḥ-i̍va | tman | pū̱ṣā-i̍va | dhī̱-java̍naḥ | a̱si̱ | so̱ma̱ |
indra̍ḥ | na | yaḥ | ma̱hā | karmā̍ṇi | cakri̍ḥ | ha̱ntā | vṛ̱trāṇā̍m | a̱si̱ | so̱ma̱ | pū̱ḥ-bhit |
pai̱dvaḥ | na | hi | tvam | ahi̍-nāmnām | ha̱ntā | viśva̍sya | a̱si̱ | so̱ma̱ | dasyo̍ḥ |
a̱gniḥ | na | yaḥ | vane̍ | ā | sṛ̱jyamā̍naḥ | vṛthā̍ | pājā̍ṁsi | kṛ̱ṇu̱te̱ | na̱dīṣu̍ |
jana̍ḥ | na | yudhvā̍ | ma̱ha̱taḥ | u̱pa̱bdiḥ | iya̍rti | soma̍ḥ | pava̍mānaḥ | ū̱rmim |
e̱te | somā̍ḥ | ati̍ | vārā̍ṇi | avyā̍ | di̱vyāḥ | na | kośā̍saḥ | a̱bhra-va̍rṣāḥ |
vṛthā̍ | sa̱mu̱dram | sindha̍vaḥ | na | nīcī̍ḥ | su̱tāsa̍ḥ | a̱bhi | ka̱laśā̍n | a̱sṛ̱gra̱n |
śu̱ṣmī | śardha̍ḥ | na | māru̍tam | pa̱va̱sva̱ | ana̍bhi-śastā | di̱vyā | yathā̍ | viṭ |
āpa̍ḥ | na | ma̱kṣu | su̱-ma̱tiḥ | bha̱va̱ | na̱ḥ | sa̱hasra̍-apsāḥ | pṛ̱ta̱nā̱ṣāṭ | na | ya̱jñaḥ |
rājña̍ḥ | nu | te̱ | varu̍ṇasya | vra̱tāni̍ | bṛ̱hat | ga̱bhī̱ram | tava̍ | so̱ma̱ | dhāma̍ |
śuci̍ḥ | tvam | a̱si̱ | pri̱yaḥ | na | mi̱traḥ | da̱kṣāyya̍ḥ | a̱rya̱mā-i̍va | a̱si̱ | so̱ma̱ |
pro iti̍ | syaḥ | vahni̍ḥ | pa̱thyā̍bhiḥ | a̱syā̱n | di̱vaḥ | na | vṛ̱ṣṭiḥ | pava̍mānaḥ | a̱kṣā̱riti̍ |
sa̱hasra̍-dhāraḥ | a̱sa̱da̱t | ni | a̱sme iti̍ | mā̱tuḥ | u̱pa-sthe̍ | vane̍ | ā | ca̱ | soma̍ḥ |
rājā̍ | sindhū̍nām | a̱va̱si̱ṣṭa̱ | vāsa̍ḥ | ṛ̱tasya̍ | nāva̍m | ā | a̱ru̱ha̱t | raji̍ṣṭhām |
a̱p-su | dra̱psaḥ | va̱vṛ̱dhe̱ | śye̱na-jū̍taḥ | du̱he | ī̱m | pi̱tā | du̱he | ī̱m | pi̱tuḥ | jām |
si̱ṁham | na̱sa̱nta̱ | madhva̍ḥ | a̱yāsa̍m | hari̍m | a̱ru̱ṣam | di̱vaḥ | a̱sya | pati̍m |
śūra̍ḥ | yu̱t-su | pra̱tha̱maḥ | pṛ̱ccha̱te̱ | gāḥ | asya̍ | cakṣa̍sā | pari̍ | pā̱ti̱ | u̱kṣā |
madhu̍-pṛṣṭham | gho̱ram | a̱yāsa̍m | aśva̍m | rathe̍ | yu̱ñja̱nti̱ | u̱ru̱-ca̱kre | ṛ̱ṣvam |
svasā̍raḥ | ī̱m | jā̱maya̍ḥ | ma̱rja̱ya̱nti̱ | sa-nā̍bhayaḥ | vā̱jina̍m | ū̱rja̱ya̱nti̱ |
cata̍sraḥ | ī̱m | ghṛ̱ta̱-duha̍ḥ | sa̱ca̱nte̱ | sa̱mā̱ne | a̱ntaḥ | dha̱ruṇe̍ | ni-sa̍ttāḥ |
tāḥ | ī̱m | a̱rṣa̱nti̱ | nama̍sā | pu̱nā̱nāḥ | tāḥ | ī̱m | vi̱śvata̍ḥ | pari̍ | sa̱nti̱ | pū̱rvīḥ |
vi̱ṣṭa̱mbhaḥ | di̱vaḥ | dha̱ruṇa̍ḥ | pṛ̱thi̱vyāḥ | viśvā̍ḥ | u̱ta | kṣi̱taya̍ḥ | haste̍ | a̱sya̱ |
asa̍t | te̱ | utsa̍ḥ | gṛ̱ṇa̱te | ni̱yutvā̍n | madhva̍ḥ | a̱ṁśuḥ | pa̱va̱te̱ | i̱ndri̱yāya̍ |
va̱nvan | avā̍taḥ | a̱bhi | de̱va-vī̍tim | indrā̍ya | so̱ma̱ | vṛ̱tra̱-hā | pa̱va̱sva̱ |
śa̱gdhi | ma̱haḥ | pu̱ru̱-ca̱ndrasya̍ | rā̱yaḥ | su̱-vīrya̍sya | pata̍yaḥ | syā̱ma̱ |
pra | hi̱nvā̱naḥ | ja̱ni̱tā | roda̍syoḥ | ratha̍ḥ | na | vāja̍m | sa̱ni̱ṣyan | a̱yā̱sī̱t |
indra̍m | gaccha̍n | āyu̍dhā | sa̱m-śiśā̍naḥ | viśvā̍ | vasu̍ | hasta̍yoḥ | ā̱-dadhā̍naḥ |
a̱bhi | tri̱-pṛ̱ṣṭham | vṛṣa̍ṇam | va̱ya̱ḥ-dhām | ā̱ṅgū̱ṣāṇā̍m | a̱vā̱va̱śa̱nta̱ | vāṇī̍ḥ |
vanā̍ | vasā̍naḥ | varu̍ṇaḥ | na | sindhū̍n | vi | ra̱tna̱-dhāḥ | da̱ya̱te̱ | vāryā̍ṇi |
śūra̍-grāmaḥ | sarva̍-vīraḥ | sahā̍vān | jetā̍ | pa̱va̱sva̱ | sani̍tā | dhanā̍ni |
ti̱gma-ā̍yudhaḥ | kṣi̱pra-dha̍nvā | sa̱mat-su̍ | aṣā̍ḻhaḥ | sa̱hvān | pṛta̍nāsu | śatrū̍n |
u̱ru-ga̍vyūtiḥ | abha̍yāni | kṛ̱ṇvan | sa̱mī̱cī̱ne iti̍ sa̱m-ī̱cī̱ne | ā | pa̱va̱sva̱ | pura̍ṁdhī̱ iti̱ pura̍m-dhī |
a̱paḥ | sisā̍san | u̱ṣasa̍ḥ | sva̍ḥ | gāḥ | sam | ci̱kra̱da̱ḥ | ma̱haḥ | a̱smabhya̍m | vājā̍n |
matsi̍ | so̱ma̱ | varu̍ṇam | matsi̍ | mi̱tram | matsi̍ | indra̍m | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ | pa̱va̱mā̱na̱ | viṣṇu̍m |
matsi̍ | śardha̍ḥ | māru̍tam | matsi̍ | de̱vān | matsi̍ | ma̱hām | indra̍m | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ | madā̍ya |
e̱va | rājā̍-iva | kratu̍-mān | ame̍na | viśvā̍ | ghani̍ghnat | du̱ḥ-i̱tā | pa̱va̱sva̱ |
indo̱ iti̍ | su̱-u̱ktāya̍ | vaca̍se | vaya̍ḥ | dhā̱ḥ | yū̱yam | pā̱ta̱ | sva̱sti-bhi̍ḥ | sadā̍ | na̱ḥ |
asa̍rji | vakvā̍ | rathye̍ | yathā̍ | ā̱jau | dhi̱yā | ma̱notā̍ | pra̱tha̱maḥ | ma̱nī̱ṣī |
daśa̍ | svasā̍raḥ | adhi̍ | sānau̍ | avye̍ | aja̍nti | vahni̍m | sada̍nāni | accha̍ |
vī̱tī | jana̍sya | di̱vyasya̍ | ka̱vyaiḥ | adhi̍ | su̱vā̱naḥ | na̱hu̱ṣye̍bhiḥ | indu̍ḥ |
pra | yaḥ | nṛ-bhi̍ḥ | a̱mṛta̍ḥ | martye̍bhiḥ | ma̱rmṛ̱jā̱naḥ | avi̍-bhiḥ | gobhi̍ḥ | a̱t-bhiḥ |
vṛṣā̍ | vṛṣṇe̍ | roru̍vat | a̱ṁśuḥ | a̱smai̱ | pava̍mānaḥ | ruśa̍t | ī̱rte̱ | paya̍ḥ | goḥ |
sa̱hasra̍m | ṛkvā̍ | pa̱thi-bhi̍ḥ | va̱ca̱ḥ-vit | a̱dhva̱sma-bhi̍ḥ | sūra̍ḥ | aṇva̍m | vi | yā̱ti̱ |
ru̱ja | dṛ̱ḻhā | ci̱t | ra̱kṣasa̍ḥ | sadā̍ṁsi | pu̱nā̱naḥ | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ | ū̱rṇu̱hi̱ | vi | vājā̍n |
vṛ̱śca | u̱pari̍ṣṭāt | tu̱ja̱tā | va̱dhena̍ | ye | anti̍ | dū̱rāt | u̱pa̱-nā̱yam | e̱ṣā̱m |
saḥ | pra̱tna̱-vat | navya̍se | vi̱śva̱-vā̱ra̱ | su̱-u̱ktāya̍ | pa̱thaḥ | kṛ̱ṇu̱hi̱ | prāca̍ḥ |
ye | du̱ḥ-sahā̍saḥ | va̱nuṣā̍ | bṛ̱hanta̍ḥ | tān | te̱ | a̱śyā̱ma̱ | pu̱ru̱-kṛ̱t | pu̱ru̱kṣo̱ iti̍ puru-kṣo |
e̱va | pu̱nā̱naḥ | a̱paḥ | sva̍ḥ | gāḥ | a̱smabhya̍m | to̱kā | tana̍yāni | bhūri̍ |
śam | na̱ḥ | kṣetra̍m | u̱ru | jyotī̍ṁṣi | so̱ma̱ | jyok | na̱ḥ | sūrya̍m | dṛ̱śaye̍ | ri̱rī̱hi̱ |
pari̍ | su̱vā̱naḥ | hari̍ḥ | a̱ṁśuḥ | pa̱vitre̍ | ratha̍ḥ | na | sa̱rji̱ | sa̱naye̍ | hi̱yā̱naḥ |
āpa̍t | śloka̍m | i̱ndri̱yam | pū̱yamā̍naḥ | prati̍ | de̱vān | a̱ju̱ṣa̱ta̱ | praya̍ḥ-bhiḥ |
accha̍ | nṛ̱-cakṣā̍ḥ | a̱sa̱ra̱t | pa̱vitre̍ | nāma̍ | dadhā̍naḥ | ka̱viḥ | a̱sya̱ | yonau̍ |
sīda̍n | hotā̍-iva | sada̍ne | ca̱mūṣu̍ | upa̍ | ī̱m | a̱gma̱n | ṛṣa̍yaḥ | sa̱pta | viprā̍ḥ |
pra | su̱-me̱dhāḥ | gā̱tu̱-vit | vi̱śva-de̍vaḥ | soma̍ḥ | pu̱nā̱naḥ | sada̍ḥ | e̱ti̱ | nitya̍m |
bhuva̍t | viśve̍ṣu | kāvye̍ṣu | rantā̍ | anu̍ | janā̍n | ya̱ta̱te̱ | pañca̍ | dhīra̍ḥ |
tava̍ | tye | so̱ma̱ | pa̱va̱mā̱na̱ | ni̱ṇye | viśve̍ | de̱vāḥ | traya̍ḥ | e̱kā̱da̱śāsa̍ḥ |
daśa̍ | sva̱dhābhi̍ḥ | adhi̍ | sānau̍ | avye̍ | mṛ̱janti̍ | tvā̱ | na̱dya̍ḥ | sa̱pta | ya̱hvīḥ |
tat | nu | sa̱tyam | pava̍mānasya | a̱stu̱ | yatra̍ | viśve̍ | kā̱rava̍ḥ | sa̱m-nasa̍nta |
jyoti̍ḥ | yat | ahne̍ | akṛ̍ṇot | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | lo̱kam | pra | ā̱va̱t | manu̍m | dasya̍ve | ka̱ḥ | a̱bhīka̍m |
pari̍ | sadma̍-iva | pa̱śu̱-manti̍ | hotā̍ | rājā̍ | na | sa̱tyaḥ | sam-i̍tīḥ | i̱yā̱naḥ |
soma̍ḥ | pu̱nā̱naḥ | ka̱laśā̍n | a̱yā̱sī̱t | sīda̍n | mṛ̱gaḥ | na | ma̱hi̱ṣaḥ | vane̍ṣu |
sā̱ka̱m-ukṣa̍ḥ | ma̱rja̱ya̱nta̱ | svasā̍raḥ | daśa̍ | dhīra̍sya | dhī̱taya̍ḥ | dhanu̍trīḥ |
hari̍ḥ | pari̍ | a̱dra̱va̱t | jāḥ | sūrya̍sya | droṇa̍m | na̱na̱kṣe̱ | atya̍ḥ | na | vā̱jī |
sam | mā̱tṛ-bhi̍ḥ | na | śiśu̍ḥ | vā̱va̱śā̱naḥ | vṛṣā̍ | da̱dha̱nve̱ | pu̱ru̱-vāra̍ḥ | a̱t-bhiḥ |
marya̍ḥ | na | yoṣā̍m | a̱bhi | ni̱ḥ-kṛ̱tam | yan | sam | ga̱ccha̱te̱ | ka̱laśe̍ | u̱sriyā̍bhiḥ |
u̱ta | pra | pi̱pye̱ | ūdha̍ḥ | aghnyā̍yāḥ | indu̍ḥ | dhārā̍bhiḥ | sa̱ca̱te̱ | su̱-me̱dhāḥ |
mū̱rdhāna̍m | gāva̍ḥ | paya̍sā | ca̱mūṣu̍ | a̱bhi | śrī̱ṇa̱nti̱ | vasu̍-bhiḥ | na | ni̱ktaiḥ |
saḥ | na̱ḥ | de̱vebhi̍ḥ | pa̱va̱mā̱na̱ | ra̱da̱ | indo̱ iti̍ | ra̱yim | a̱śvina̍m | vā̱va̱śā̱naḥ |
ra̱thi̱rā̱yatā̍m | u̱śa̱tī | pura̍m-dhiḥ | a̱sma̱drya̍k | ā | dā̱vane̍ | vasū̍nām |
nu | na̱ḥ | ra̱yim | upa̍ | mā̱sva̱ | nṛ̱-vanta̍m | pu̱nā̱naḥ | vā̱tāpya̍m | vi̱śva-ca̍ndram |
pra | va̱ndi̱tuḥ | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ | tā̱ri̱ | āyu̍ḥ | prā̱taḥ | ma̱kṣu | dhi̱yā-va̍suḥ | ja̱ga̱myā̱t |
adhi̍ | yat | a̱smi̱n | vā̱jini̍-iva | śubha̍ḥ | spardha̍nte | dhiya̍ḥ | sūrye̍ | na | viśa̍ḥ |
a̱paḥ | vṛ̱ṇā̱naḥ | pa̱va̱te̱ | ka̱vi̱-yan | vra̱jam | na | pa̱śu̱-vardha̍nāya | manma̍ |
dvi̱tā | vi̱-ū̱rṇvan | a̱mṛta̍sya | dhāma̍ | sva̱ḥ-vide̍ | bhuva̍nāni | pra̱tha̱nta̱ |
dhiya̍ḥ | pi̱nvā̱nāḥ | svasa̍re | na | gāva̍ḥ | ṛ̱ta̱-yantī̍ḥ | a̱bhi | vā̱va̱śre̱ | indu̍m |
pari̍ | yat | ka̱viḥ | kāvyā̍ | bhara̍te | śūra̍ḥ | na | ratha̍ḥ | bhuva̍nāni | viśvā̍ |
de̱veṣu̍ | yaśa̍ḥ | martā̍ya | bhūṣa̍n | dakṣā̍ya | rā̱yaḥ | pu̱ru̱-bhūṣu̍ | navya̍ḥ |
śri̱ye | jā̱taḥ | śri̱ye | ā | niḥ | i̱yā̱ya̱ | śriya̍m | vaya̍ḥ | ja̱ri̱tṛ-bhya̍ḥ | da̱dhā̱ti̱ |
śriya̍m | vasā̍nāḥ | a̱mṛ̱ta̱-tvam | ā̱ya̱n | bhava̍nti | sa̱tyā | sa̱m-i̱thā | mi̱ta-drau̍ |
iṣa̍m | ūrja̍m | a̱bhi | a̱rṣa̱ | aśva̍m | gām | u̱ru | jyoti̍ḥ | kṛ̱ṇu̱hi̱ | matsi̍ | de̱vān |
viśvā̍ni | hi | su̱-sahā̍ | tāni̍ | tubhya̍m | pava̍māna | bādha̍se | so̱ma̱ | śatrū̍n |
kani̍kranti | hari̍ḥ | ā | sṛ̱jyamā̍naḥ | sīda̍n | vana̍sya | ja̱ṭhare̍ | pu̱nā̱naḥ |
nṛ-bhi̍ḥ | ya̱taḥ | kṛ̱ṇu̱te̱ | ni̱ḥ-nija̍m | gāḥ | ata̍ḥ | ma̱tīḥ | ja̱na̱ya̱ta̱ | sva̱dhābhi̍ḥ |
hari̍ḥ | sṛ̱jā̱naḥ | pa̱thyā̍m | ṛ̱tasya̍ | iya̍rti | vāca̍m | a̱ri̱tā-i̍va | nāva̍m |
de̱vaḥ | de̱vānā̍m | guhyā̍ni | nāma̍ | ā̱viḥ | kṛ̱ṇo̱ti̱ | ba̱rhiṣi̍ | pra̱-vāce̍ |
a̱pām-i̍va | it | ū̱rmaya̍ḥ | tartu̍rāṇāḥ | pra | ma̱nī̱ṣāḥ | ī̱ra̱te̱ | soma̍m | accha̍ |
na̱ma̱syantī̍ḥ | upa̍ | ca̱ | yanti̍ | sam | ca̱ | ā | ca̱ | vi̱śa̱nti̱ | u̱śa̱tīḥ | u̱śanta̍m |
tam | ma̱rmṛ̱jā̱nam | ma̱hi̱ṣam | na | sānau̍ | a̱ṁśum | du̱ha̱nti̱ | u̱kṣaṇa̍m | gi̱ri̱-sthām |
tam | vā̱va̱śā̱nam | ma̱taya̍ḥ | sa̱ca̱nte̱ | tri̱taḥ | bi̱bha̱rti̱ | varu̍ṇam | sa̱mu̱dre |
iṣya̍n | vāca̍m | u̱pa̱va̱ktā-i̍va | hotu̍ḥ | pu̱nā̱naḥ | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ | vi | sya̱ | ma̱nī̱ṣām |
indra̍ḥ | ca̱ | yat | kṣaya̍thaḥ | saubha̍gāya | su̱-vīrya̍sya | pata̍yaḥ | syā̱ma̱ |
pra | se̱nā̱-nīḥ | śūra̍ḥ | agre̍ | rathā̍nām | ga̱vyan | e̱ti̱ | harṣa̍te | a̱sya̱ | senā̍ |
bha̱drān | kṛ̱ṇvan | i̱ndra̱-ha̱vān | sakhi̍-bhyaḥ | ā | soma̍ḥ | vastrā̍ | ra̱bha̱sāni̍ | da̱tte̱ |
sam | a̱sya̱ | hari̍m | hara̍yaḥ | mṛ̱ja̱nti̱ | a̱śva̱-ha̱yaiḥ | ani̍-śitam | nama̍ḥ-bhiḥ |
ā | ti̱ṣṭha̱ti̱ | ratha̍m | indra̍sya | sakhā̍ | vi̱dvān | e̱na̱ | su̱-ma̱tim | yā̱ti̱ | accha̍ |
saḥ | na̱ḥ | de̱va̱ | de̱va-tā̍te | pa̱va̱sva̱ | ma̱he | so̱ma̱ | psara̍se | i̱ndra̱-pāna̍ḥ |
kṛ̱ṇvan | a̱paḥ | va̱rṣaya̍n | dyām | u̱ta | i̱mām | u̱roḥ | ā | na̱ḥ | va̱ri̱va̱sya̱ | pu̱nā̱naḥ |
ajī̍taye | aha̍taye | pa̱va̱sva̱ | sva̱staye̍ | sa̱rva-tā̍taye | bṛ̱ha̱te |
tat | u̱śa̱nti̱ | viśve̍ | i̱me | sakhā̍yaḥ | tat | a̱ham | va̱śmi̱ | pa̱va̱mā̱na̱ | so̱ma̱ |
soma̍ḥ | pa̱va̱te̱ | ja̱ni̱tā | ma̱tī̱nām | ja̱ni̱tā | di̱vaḥ | ja̱ni̱tā | pṛ̱thi̱vyāḥ |
ja̱ni̱tā | a̱gneḥ | ja̱ni̱tā | sūrya̍sya | ja̱ni̱tā | indra̍sya | ja̱ni̱tā | u̱ta | viṣṇo̍ḥ |
bra̱hmā | de̱vānā̍m | pa̱da̱-vīḥ | ka̱vī̱nām | ṛṣi̍ḥ | viprā̍ṇām | ma̱hi̱ṣaḥ | mṛ̱gāṇā̍m |
śye̱naḥ | gṛdhrā̍ṇām | sva-dhi̍tiḥ | vanā̍nām | soma̍ḥ | pa̱vitra̍m | ati̍ | e̱ti̱ | rebha̍n |
pra | a̱vī̱vi̱pa̱t | vā̱caḥ | ū̱rmim | na | sindhu̍ḥ | gira̍ḥ | soma̍ḥ | pava̍mānaḥ | ma̱nī̱ṣāḥ |
a̱ntariti̍ | paśya̍n | vṛ̱janā̍ | i̱mā | ava̍rāṇi | ā | ti̱ṣṭha̱ti̱ | vṛ̱ṣa̱bhaḥ | goṣu̍ | jā̱nan |
saḥ | ma̱tsa̱raḥ | pṛ̱t-su | va̱nvan | avā̍taḥ | sa̱hasra̍-retāḥ | a̱bhi | vāja̍m | a̱rṣa̱ |
indrā̍ya | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ | pava̍mānaḥ | ma̱nī̱ṣī | a̱ṁśoḥ | ū̱rmim | ī̱ra̱ya̱ | gāḥ | i̱ṣa̱ṇyan |
pari̍ | pri̱yaḥ | ka̱laśe̍ | de̱va-vā̍taḥ | indrā̍ya | soma̍ḥ | raṇya̍ḥ | madā̍ya |
sa̱hasra̍-dhāraḥ | śa̱ta-vā̍jaḥ | indu̍ḥ | vā̱jī | na | sapti̍ḥ | sama̍nā | ji̱gā̱ti̱ |
saḥ | pū̱rvyaḥ | va̱su̱-vit | jāya̍mānaḥ | mṛ̱jā̱naḥ | a̱p-su | du̱du̱hā̱naḥ | adrau̍ |
a̱bhi̱śa̱sti̱-pāḥ | bhuva̍nasya | rājā̍ | vi̱dat | gā̱tum | brahma̍ṇe | pū̱yamā̍naḥ |
tvayā̍ | hi | na̱ḥ | pi̱tara̍ḥ | so̱ma̱ | pūrve̍ | karmā̍ṇi | ca̱kruḥ | pa̱va̱mā̱na̱ | dhīrā̍ḥ |
va̱nvan | avā̍taḥ | pa̱ri̱-dhīn | apa̍ | ū̱rṇu̱ | vī̱rebhi̍ḥ | aśvai̍ḥ | ma̱gha-vā̍ | bha̱va̱ | na̱ḥ |
yathā̍ | apa̍vathāḥ | mana̍ve | va̱ya̱ḥ-dhāḥ | a̱mi̱tra̱-hā | va̱ri̱va̱ḥ-vit | ha̱viṣmā̍n |
e̱va | pa̱va̱sva̱ | dravi̍ṇam | dadhā̍naḥ | indre̍ | sam | ti̱ṣṭha̱ | ja̱naya̍ | āyu̍dhāni |
pava̍sva | so̱ma̱ | madhu̍-mān | ṛ̱ta-vā̍ | a̱paḥ | vasā̍naḥ | adhi̍ | sānau̍ | avye̍ |
ava̍ | droṇā̍ni | ghṛ̱ta-va̍nti | sī̱da̱ | ma̱din-ta̍maḥ | ma̱tsa̱raḥ | i̱ndra̱-pāna̍ḥ |
vṛ̱ṣṭim | di̱vaḥ | śa̱ta-dhā̍raḥ | pa̱va̱sva̱ | sa̱ha̱sra̱-sāḥ | vā̱ja̱-yuḥ | de̱va-vī̍tau |
sam | sindhu̍-bhiḥ | ka̱laśe̍ | vā̱va̱śā̱naḥ | sam | u̱sriyā̍bhiḥ | pra̱-ti̱ran | na̱ḥ | āyu̍ḥ |
e̱ṣaḥ | syaḥ | soma̍ḥ | ma̱ti-bhi̍ḥ | pu̱nā̱naḥ | atya̍ḥ | na | vā̱jī | tara̍ti | it | arā̍tīḥ |
paya̍ḥ | na | du̱gdham | adi̍teḥ | i̱ṣi̱ram | u̱ru-i̍va | gā̱tuḥ | su̱-yama̍ḥ | na | voḻhā̍ |
su̱-ā̱yu̱dhaḥ | so̱tṛ-bhi̍ḥ | pū̱yamā̍naḥ | a̱bhi | a̱rṣa̱ | guhya̍m | cāru̍ | nāma̍ |
a̱bhi | vāja̍m | sapti̍ḥ-iva | śra̱va̱syā | a̱bhi | vā̱yum | a̱bhi | gāḥ | de̱va̱ | so̱ma̱ |
śiśu̍m | ja̱jñā̱nam | ha̱rya̱tam | mṛ̱ja̱nti̱ | śu̱mbhanti̍ | vahni̍m | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | ga̱ṇena̍ |
ka̱viḥ | gī̱ḥ-bhiḥ | kāvye̍na | ka̱viḥ | san | soma̍ḥ | pa̱vitra̍m | ati̍ | e̱ti̱ | rebha̍n |
ṛṣi̍-manāḥ | yaḥ | ṛ̱ṣi̱-kṛt | sva̱ḥ-sāḥ | sa̱hasra̍-nīthaḥ | pa̱da̱-vīḥ | ka̱vī̱nām |
tṛ̱tīya̍m | dhāma̍ | ma̱hi̱ṣaḥ | sisā̍san | soma̍ḥ | vi̱-rāja̍m | anu̍ | rā̱ja̱ti̱ | stup |
ca̱mū̱-sat | śye̱naḥ | śa̱ku̱naḥ | vi̱-bhṛtvā̍ | go̱-vi̱nduḥ | dra̱psaḥ | āyu̍dhāni | bibhra̍t |
a̱pām | ū̱rmim | saca̍mānaḥ | sa̱mu̱dram | tu̱rīya̍m | dhāma̍ | ma̱hi̱ṣaḥ | vi̱va̱kti̱ |
marya̍ḥ | na | śu̱bhraḥ | ta̱nva̍m | mṛ̱jā̱naḥ | atya̍ḥ | na | sṛtvā̍ | sa̱naye̍ | dhanā̍nām |
vṛṣā̍-iva | yū̱thā | pari̍ | kośa̍m | arṣa̍n | kani̍kradat | ca̱mvo̍ḥ | ā | vi̱ve̱śa̱ |
pava̍sva | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ | pava̍mānaḥ | maha̍ḥ-bhiḥ | kani̍kradat | pari̍ | vārā̍ṇi | a̱rṣa̱ |
krīḻa̍n | ca̱mvo̍ḥ | ā | vi̱śa̱ | pū̱yamā̍naḥ | indra̍m | te̱ | rasa̍ḥ | ma̱di̱raḥ | ma̱ma̱ttu̱ |
pra | a̱sya̱ | dhārā̍ḥ | bṛ̱ha̱tīḥ | a̱sṛ̱gra̱n | a̱ktaḥ | gobhi̍ḥ | ka̱laśā̍n | ā | vi̱ve̱śa̱ |
sāma̍ | kṛ̱ṇvan | sā̱ma̱nya̍ḥ | vi̱pa̱ḥ-cit | kranda̍n | e̱ti̱ | a̱bhi | sakhyu̍ḥ | na | jā̱mim |
a̱pa̱-ghnan | e̱ṣi̱ | pa̱va̱mā̱na̱ | śatrū̍n | pri̱yām | na | jā̱raḥ | a̱bhi-gī̍taḥ | indu̍ḥ |
sīda̍n | vane̍ṣu | śa̱ku̱naḥ | na | patvā̍ | soma̍ḥ | pu̱nā̱naḥ | ka̱laśe̍ṣu | sattā̍ |
ā | te̱ | ruca̍ḥ | pava̍mānasya | so̱ma̱ | yoṣā̍-iva | ya̱nti̱ | su̱-dughā̍ḥ | su̱-dhā̱rāḥ |
hari̍ḥ | ā-nī̍taḥ | pu̱ru̱-vāra̍ḥ | a̱p-su | aci̍kradat | ka̱laśe̍ | de̱va̱-yū̱nām |
a̱sya | pre̱ṣā | he̱manā̍ | pū̱yamā̍naḥ | de̱vaḥ | de̱vebhi̍ḥ | sam | a̱pṛ̱kta̱ | rasa̍m |
su̱taḥ | pa̱vitra̍m | pari̍ | e̱ti̱ | rebha̍n | mi̱tā-i̍va | sadma̍ | pa̱śu̱-manti̍ | hotā̍ |
bha̱drā | vastrā̍ | sa̱ma̱nyā̍ | vasā̍naḥ | ma̱hān | ka̱viḥ | ni̱-vaca̍nāni | śa̱ṁsa̱n |
ā | va̱cya̱sva̱ | ca̱mvo̍ḥ | pū̱yamā̍naḥ | vi̱-ca̱kṣa̱ṇaḥ | jāgṛ̍viḥ | de̱va-vī̍tau |
sam | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | pri̱yaḥ | mṛ̱jya̱te̱ | sānau̍ | avye̍ | ya̱śaḥ-ta̍raḥ | ya̱śasā̍m | kṣaita̍ḥ | a̱sme iti̍ |
a̱bhi | sva̱ra̱ | dhanva̍ | pū̱yamā̍naḥ | yū̱yam | pā̱ta̱ | sva̱sti-bhi̍ḥ | sadā̍ | na̱ḥ |
pra | gā̱ya̱ta̱ | a̱bhi | a̱rcā̱ma̱ | de̱vān | soma̍m | hi̱no̱ta̱ | ma̱ha̱te | dhanā̍ya |
svā̱duḥ | pa̱vā̱te̱ | ati̍ | vāra̍m | avya̍m | ā | sī̱dā̱ti̱ | ka̱laśa̍m | de̱va̱-yuḥ | na̱ḥ |
indu̍ḥ | de̱vānā̍m | upa̍ | sa̱khyam | ā̱-yan | sa̱hasra̍-dhāraḥ | pa̱va̱te̱ | madā̍ya |
nṛ-bhi̍ḥ | stavā̍naḥ | anu̍ | dhāma̍ | pūrva̍m | aga̍n | indra̍m | ma̱ha̱te | saubha̍gāya |
sto̱tre | rā̱ye | hari̍ḥ | a̱rṣa̱ | pu̱nā̱naḥ | indra̍m | mada̍ḥ | ga̱ccha̱tu̱ | te̱ | bharā̍ya |
de̱vaiḥ | yā̱hi̱ | sa̱-ratha̍m | rādha̍ḥ | accha̍ | yū̱yam | pā̱ta̱ | sva̱sti-bhi̍ḥ | sadā̍ | na̱ḥ |
pra | kāvya̍m | u̱śanā̍-iva | bru̱vā̱ṇaḥ | de̱vaḥ | de̱vānā̍m | jani̍ma | vi̱va̱kti̱ |
mahi̍-vrataḥ | śuci̍-bandhuḥ | pā̱va̱kaḥ | pa̱dā | va̱rā̱haḥ | a̱bhi | e̱ti̱ | rebha̍n |
pra | ha̱ṁsāsa̍ḥ | tṛ̱pala̍m | ma̱nyum | accha̍ | a̱māt | asta̍m | vṛṣa̍-gaṇāḥ | a̱yā̱su̱ḥ |
ā̱ṅgū̱ṣya̍m | pava̍mānam | sakhā̍yaḥ | du̱ḥ-marṣa̍m | sā̱kam | pra | va̱da̱nti̱ | vā̱ṇam |
saḥ | ra̱ṁha̱te̱ | u̱ru̱-gā̱yasya̍ | jū̱tim | vṛthā̍ | krīḻa̍ntam | mi̱ma̱te̱ | na | gāva̍ḥ |
pa̱rī̱ṇa̱sam | kṛ̱ṇu̱te̱ | ti̱gma-śṛ̍ṅgaḥ | divā̍ | hari̍ḥ | dadṛ̍śe | nakta̍m | ṛ̱jraḥ |
indu̍ḥ | vā̱jī | pa̱va̱te̱ | go-nyo̍ghāḥ | indre̍ | soma̍ḥ | saha̍ | inva̍n | madā̍ya |
hanti̍ | rakṣa̍ḥ | bādha̍te | pari̍ | arā̍tīḥ | vari̍vaḥ | kṛ̱ṇvan | vṛ̱jana̍sya | rājā̍ |
adha̍ | dhāra̍yā | madhvā̍ | pṛ̱cā̱naḥ | ti̱raḥ | roma̍ | pa̱va̱te̱ | adri̍-dugdhaḥ |
indu̍ḥ | indra̍sya | sa̱khyam | ju̱ṣā̱ṇaḥ | de̱vaḥ | de̱vasya̍ | ma̱tsa̱raḥ | madā̍ya |
a̱bhi | pri̱yāṇi̍ | pa̱va̱te̱ | pu̱nā̱naḥ | de̱vaḥ | de̱vān | svena̍ | rase̍na | pṛ̱ñcan |
indu̍ḥ | dharmā̍ṇi | ṛ̱tu̱-thā | vasā̍naḥ | daśa̍ | kṣipa̍ḥ | a̱vya̱ta̱ | sānau̍ | avye̍ |
vṛṣā̍ | śoṇa̍ḥ | a̱bhi̱-kani̍kradat | gāḥ | na̱daya̍n | e̱ti̱ | pṛ̱thi̱vīm | u̱ta | dyām |
indra̍sya-iva | va̱gnuḥ | ā | śṛ̱ṇve̱ | ā̱jau | pra̱-ce̱taya̍n | a̱rṣa̱ti̱ | vāca̍m | ā | i̱mām |
ra̱sāyya̍ḥ | paya̍sā | pinva̍mānaḥ | ī̱raya̍n | e̱ṣi̱ | madhu̍-mantam | a̱ṁśum |
pava̍mānaḥ | sa̱m-ta̱nim | e̱ṣi̱ | kṛ̱ṇvan | indrā̍ya | so̱ma̱ | pa̱ri̱-si̱cyamā̍naḥ |
e̱va | pa̱va̱sva̱ | ma̱di̱raḥ | madā̍ya | u̱da̱-grā̱bhasya̍ | na̱maya̍n | va̱dha̱-snaiḥ |
pari̍ | varṇa̍m | bhara̍māṇaḥ | ruśa̍ntam | ga̱vyuḥ | na̱ḥ | a̱rṣa̱ | pari̍ | so̱ma̱ | si̱ktaḥ |
ju̱ṣṭvī | na̱ḥ | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ | su̱-pathā̍ | su̱-gāni̍ | u̱rau | pa̱va̱sva̱ | vari̍vāṁsi | kṛ̱ṇvan |
gha̱nā-i̍va | viṣva̍k | du̱ḥ-i̱tāni̍ | vi̱-ghnan | adhi̍ | snunā̍ | dha̱nva̱ | sānau̍ | avye̍ |
vṛ̱ṣṭim | na̱ḥ | a̱rṣa̱ | di̱vyām | ji̱ga̱tnum | iḻā̍-vatīm | śa̱m-gayī̍m | jī̱ra-dā̍num |
stukā̍-iva | vī̱tā | dha̱nva̱ | vi̱-ci̱nvan | bandhū̍n | i̱mān | ava̍rān | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ | vā̱yūn |
gra̱nthim | na | vi | sya̱ | gra̱thi̱tam | pu̱nā̱naḥ | ṛ̱jum | ca̱ | gā̱tum | vṛ̱ji̱nam | ca̱ | so̱ma̱ |
atya̍ḥ | na | kra̱da̱ḥ | hari̍ḥ | ā | sṛ̱jā̱naḥ | marya̍ḥ | de̱va̱ | dha̱nva̱ | pa̱stya̍-vān |
juṣṭa̍ḥ | madā̍ya | de̱va-tā̍te | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ | pari̍ | snunā̍ | dha̱nva̱ | sānau̍ | avye̍ |
sa̱hasra̍-dhāraḥ | su̱ra̱bhiḥ | ada̍bdhaḥ | pari̍ | sra̱va̱ | vāja̍-sātau | nṛ̱-sahye̍ |
a̱ra̱śmāna̍ḥ | ye | a̱ra̱thāḥ | ayu̍ktāḥ | atyā̍saḥ | na | sa̱sṛ̱jā̱nāsa̍ḥ | ā̱jau |
e̱te | śu̱krāsa̍ḥ | dha̱nva̱nti̱ | somā̍ḥ | devā̍saḥ | tān | upa̍ | yā̱ta̱ | piba̍dhyai |
e̱va | na̱ḥ | i̱ndo̱ | a̱bhi | de̱va-vī̍tim | pari̍ | sra̱va̱ | nabha̍ḥ | arṇa̍ḥ | ca̱mūṣu̍ |
soma̍ḥ | a̱smabhya̍m | kāmya̍m | bṛ̱hanta̍m | ra̱yim | da̱dā̱tu̱ | vī̱ra-va̍ntam | u̱gram |
takṣa̍t | yadi̍ | mana̍saḥ | vena̍taḥ | vāk | jyeṣṭha̍sya | vā̱ | dharma̍ṇi | kṣoḥ | anī̍ke |
āt | ī̱m | ā̱ya̱n | vara̍m | ā | vā̱va̱śā̱nāḥ | juṣṭa̍m | pati̍m | ka̱laśe̍ | gāva̍ḥ | indu̍m |
pra | dā̱nu̱-daḥ | di̱vyaḥ | dā̱nu̱-pi̱nvaḥ | ṛ̱tam | ṛ̱tāya̍ | pa̱va̱te̱ | su̱-me̱dhāḥ |
dha̱rmā | bhu̱va̱t | vṛ̱ja̱nya̍sya | rājā̍ | pra | rā̱smi-bhi̍ḥ | da̱śa-bhi̍ḥ | bhā̱ri̱ | bhūma̍ |
pa̱vitre̍bhiḥ | pava̍mānaḥ | nṛ̱-cakṣā̍ḥ | rājā̍ | de̱vānā̍m | u̱ta | martyā̍nām |
dvi̱tā | bhu̱va̱t | ra̱yi̱-pati̍ḥ | ra̱yī̱ṇām | ṛ̱tam | bha̱ra̱t | su-bhṛ̍tam | cāru̍ | indu̍ḥ |
arvā̍n-iva | śrava̍se | sā̱tim | accha̍ | indra̍sya | vā̱yoḥ | a̱bhi | vī̱tim | a̱rṣa̱ |
saḥ | na̱ḥ | sa̱hasrā̍ | bṛ̱ha̱tīḥ | iṣa̍ḥ | dā̱ḥ | bhava̍ | so̱ma̱ | dra̱vi̱ṇa̱ḥ-vit | pu̱nā̱naḥ |
de̱va̱-a̱vya̍ḥ | na̱ḥ | pa̱ri̱-si̱cyamā̍nāḥ | kṣaya̍m | su̱-vīra̍m | dha̱nva̱ntu̱ | somā̍ḥ |
ā̱-ya̱jyava̍ḥ | su̱-ma̱tim | vi̱śva-vā̍rāḥ | hotā̍raḥ | na | di̱vi̱-yaja̍ḥ | ma̱ndra-ta̍māḥ |
e̱va | de̱va̱ | de̱va-tā̍te | pa̱va̱sva̱ | ma̱he | so̱ma̱ | psara̍se | de̱va̱-pāna̍ḥ |
ma̱haḥ | ci̱t | hi | smasi̍ | hi̱tāḥ | sa̱-ma̱rye | kṛ̱dhi | su̱sthā̱ne iti̍ su̱-sthā̱ne | roda̍sī̱ iti̍ | pu̱nā̱naḥ |
aśva̍ḥ | na | kra̱da̱ḥ | vṛṣa̍-bhiḥ | yu̱jā̱naḥ | si̱ṁhaḥ | na | bhī̱maḥ | mana̍saḥ | javī̍yān |
a̱rvā̱cīnai̍ḥ | pa̱thi-bhi̍ḥ | ye | raji̍ṣṭhāḥ | ā | pa̱va̱sva̱ | sau̱ma̱na̱sam | na̱ḥ | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ |
śa̱tam | dhārā̍ḥ | de̱va-jā̍tāḥ | a̱sṛ̱gra̱n | sa̱hasra̍m | e̱nā̱ḥ | ka̱vaya̍ḥ | mṛ̱ja̱nti̱ |
indo̱ iti̍ | sa̱nitra̍m | di̱vaḥ | ā | pa̱va̱sva̱ | pu̱ra̱ḥ-e̱tā | a̱si̱ | ma̱ha̱taḥ | dhana̍sya |
di̱vaḥ | na | sargā̍ḥ | a̱sa̱sṛ̱gra̱m | ahnā̍m | rājā̍ | na | mi̱tram | pra | mi̱nā̱ti̱ | dhīra̍ḥ |
pi̱tuḥ | na | pu̱traḥ | kratu̍-bhiḥ | ya̱tā̱naḥ | ā | pa̱va̱sva̱ | vi̱śe | a̱syai | ajī̍tim |
pra | te̱ | dhārā̍ḥ | madhu̍-matīḥ | a̱sṛ̱gra̱n | vārā̍n | yat | pū̱taḥ | a̱ti̱-eṣi̍ | avyā̍n |
pava̍māna | pava̍se | dhāma̍ | gonā̍m | ja̱jñā̱naḥ | sūrya̍m | a̱pi̱nva̱ḥ | a̱rkaiḥ |
kani̍kradat | anu̍ | panthā̍m | ṛ̱tasya̍ | śu̱kraḥ | vi | bhā̱si̱ | a̱mṛta̍sya | dhāma̍ |
saḥ | indrā̍ya | pa̱va̱se̱ | ma̱tsa̱ra-vā̍n | hi̱nvā̱naḥ | vāca̍m | ma̱ti-bhi̍ḥ | ka̱vī̱nām |
di̱vyaḥ | su̱-pa̱rṇaḥ | ava̍ | ca̱kṣi̱ | so̱ma̱ | pinva̍n | dhārā̍ḥ | karma̍ṇā | de̱va-vī̍tau |
ā | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ | vi̱śa̱ | ka̱laśa̍m | so̱ma̱-dhāna̍m | kranda̍n | i̱hi̱ | sūrya̍sya | upa̍ | ra̱śmim |
ti̱sraḥ | vāca̍ḥ | ī̱ra̱ya̱ti̱ | pra | vahni̍ḥ | ṛ̱tasya̍ | dhī̱tim | brahma̍ṇaḥ | ma̱nī̱ṣām |
gāva̍ḥ | ya̱nti̱ | go-pa̍tim | pṛ̱cchamā̍nāḥ | soma̍m | ya̱nti̱ | ma̱taya̍ḥ | vā̱va̱śā̱nāḥ |
soma̍m | gāva̍ḥ | dhe̱nava̍ḥ | vā̱va̱śā̱nāḥ | soma̍m | viprā̍ḥ | ma̱ti-bhi̍ḥ | pṛ̱cchamā̍nāḥ |
soma̍ḥ | su̱taḥ | pū̱ya̱te̱ | a̱jyamā̍naḥ | some̍ | a̱rkāḥ | tri̱-stubha̍ḥ | sam | na̱va̱nte̱ |
e̱va | na̱ḥ | so̱ma̱ | pa̱ri̱-si̱cyamā̍naḥ | ā | pa̱va̱sva̱ | pū̱yamā̍naḥ | sva̱sti |
indra̍m | ā | vi̱śa̱ | bṛ̱ha̱tā | rave̍ṇa | va̱rdhaya̍ | vāca̍m | ja̱naya̍ | pura̍m-dhim |
ā | jāgṛ̍viḥ | vipra̍ḥ | ṛ̱tā | ma̱tī̱nām | soma̍ḥ | pu̱nā̱naḥ | a̱sa̱da̱t | ca̱mūṣu̍ |
sapa̍nti | yam | mi̱thu̱nāsa̍ḥ | ni-kā̍māḥ | a̱dhva̱ryava̍ḥ | ra̱thi̱rāsa̍ḥ | su̱-hastā̍ḥ |
saḥ | pu̱nā̱naḥ | upa̍ | sūre̍ | na | dhātā̍ | ā | u̱bhe iti̍ | a̱prā̱ḥ | roda̍sī̱ iti̍ | vi | saḥ | ā̱va̱rityā̍vaḥ |
pri̱yā | ci̱t | yasya̍ | pri̱ya̱sāsa̍ḥ | ū̱tī | saḥ | tu | dhana̍m | kā̱riṇe̍ | na | pra | ya̱ṁsa̱t |
saḥ | va̱rdhi̱tā | vardha̍naḥ | pū̱yamā̍naḥ | soma̍ḥ | mī̱ḍhvān | a̱bhi | na̱ḥ | jyoti̍ṣā | ā̱vī̱t |
yena̍ | na̱ḥ | pūrve̍ | pi̱tara̍ḥ | pa̱da̱-jñāḥ | sva̱ḥ-vida̍ḥ | a̱bhi | gāḥ | adri̍m | u̱ṣṇan |
akrā̍n | sa̱mu̱draḥ | pra̱tha̱me | vi-dha̍rman | ja̱naya̍n | pra̱-jāḥ | bhuva̍nasya | rājā̍ |
vṛṣā̍ | pa̱vitre̍ | adhi̍ | sānau̍ | avye̍ | bṛ̱hat | soma̍ḥ | va̱vṛ̱dhe̱ | su̱vā̱naḥ | indu̍ḥ |
ma̱hat | tat | soma̍ḥ | ma̱hi̱ṣaḥ | ca̱kā̱ra̱ | a̱pām | yat | garbha̍ḥ | avṛ̍ṇīta | de̱vān |
ada̍dhāt | indre̍ | pava̍mānaḥ | oja̍ḥ | aja̍nayat | sūrye̍ | jyoti̍ḥ | indu̍ḥ |
matsi̍ | vā̱yum | i̱ṣṭaye̍ | rādha̍se | ca̱ | matsi̍ | mi̱trāvaru̍ṇā | pū̱yamā̍naḥ |
matsi̍ | śardha̍ḥ | māru̍tam | matsi̍ | de̱vān | matsi̍ | dyāvā̍pṛthi̱vī iti̍ | de̱va̱ | so̱ma̱ |
ṛ̱juḥ | pa̱va̱sva̱ | vṛ̱ji̱nasya̍ | ha̱ntā | apa̍ | amī̍vām | bādha̍mānaḥ | mṛdha̍ḥ | ca̱ |
a̱bhi̱-śrī̱ṇan | paya̍ḥ | paya̍sā | a̱bhi | gonā̍m | indra̍sya | tvam | tava̍ | va̱yam | sakhā̍yaḥ |
madhva̍ḥ | sūda̍m | pa̱va̱sva̱ | vasva̍ḥ | utsa̍m | vī̱ram | ca̱ | na̱ḥ | ā | pa̱va̱sva̱ | bhaga̍m | ca̱ |
svada̍sva | indrā̍ya | pava̍mānaḥ | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ | ra̱yim | ca̱ | na̱ḥ | ā | pa̱va̱sva̱ | sa̱mu̱drāt |
soma̍ḥ | su̱taḥ | dhāra̍yā | atya̍ḥ | na | hitvā̍ | sindhu̍ḥ | na | ni̱mnam | a̱bhi | vā̱jī | a̱kṣā̱riti̍ |
ā | yoni̍m | vanya̍m | a̱sa̱da̱t | pu̱nā̱naḥ | sam | indu̍ḥ | gobhi̍ḥ | a̱sa̱ra̱t | sam | a̱t-bhiḥ |
e̱ṣaḥ | syaḥ | te̱ | pa̱va̱te̱ | i̱ndra̱ | soma̍ḥ | ca̱mūṣu̍ | dhīra̍ḥ | u̱śa̱te | tava̍svān |
sva̍ḥ-cakṣāḥ | ra̱thi̱raḥ | sa̱tya-śu̍ṣmaḥ | kāma̍ḥ | na | yaḥ | de̱va̱-ya̱tām | asa̍rji |
e̱ṣaḥ | pra̱tnena̍ | vaya̍sā | pu̱nā̱naḥ | ti̱raḥ | varpā̍ṁsi | du̱hi̱tuḥ | dadhā̍naḥ |
vasā̍naḥ | śarma̍ | tri̱-varū̍tham | a̱p-su | hotā̍-iva | yā̱ti̱ | sama̍neṣu | rebha̍n |
nu | na̱ḥ | tvam | ra̱thi̱raḥ | de̱va̱ | so̱ma̱ | pari̍ | sra̱va̱ | ca̱mvo̍ḥ | pū̱yamā̍naḥ |
a̱p-su | svādi̍ṣṭhaḥ | madhu̍-mān | ṛ̱ta-vā̍ | de̱vaḥ | na | yaḥ | sa̱vi̱tā | sa̱tya-ma̍nmā |
a̱bhi | vā̱yum | vī̱tī | a̱rṣa̱ | gṛ̱ṇā̱naḥ | a̱bhi | mi̱trāvaru̍ṇā | pū̱yamā̍naḥ |
a̱bhi | nara̍m | dhī̱-java̍nam | ra̱the̱-sthām | a̱bhi | indra̍m | vṛṣa̍ṇam | vajra̍-bāhum |
a̱bhi | vastrā̍ | su̱-va̱sa̱nāni̍ | a̱rṣa̱ | a̱bhi | dhe̱nūḥ | su̱-dughā̍ḥ | pū̱yamā̍naḥ |
a̱bhi | ca̱ndrā | bharta̍ve | na̱ḥ | hira̍ṇyā | a̱bhi | aśvā̍n | ra̱thina̍ḥ | de̱va̱ | so̱ma̱ |
a̱bhi | na̱ḥ | a̱rṣa̱ | di̱vyā | vasū̍ni | a̱bhi | viśvā̍ | pārthi̍vā | pū̱yamā̍naḥ |
a̱bhi | yena̍ | dravi̍ṇam | a̱śnavā̍ma | a̱bhi | ā̱rṣe̱yam | ja̱ma̱da̱gni̱-vat | na̱ḥ |
a̱yā | pa̱vā | pa̱va̱sva̱ | e̱nā | vasū̍ni | mā̱m̐śca̱tve | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ | sara̍si | pra | dha̱nva̱ |
bra̱dhnaḥ | ci̱t | atra̍ | vāta̍ḥ | na | jū̱taḥ | pu̱ru̱-medha̍ḥ | ci̱t | taka̍ve | nara̍m | dā̱t |
u̱ta | na̱ḥ | e̱nā | pa̱va̱yā | pa̱va̱sva̱ | adhi̍ | śru̱te | śra̱vāyya̍sya | tī̱rthe |
ṣa̱ṣṭim | sa̱hasrā̍ | nai̱gu̱taḥ | vasū̍ni | vṛ̱kṣam | na | pa̱kvam | dhū̱na̱va̱t | raṇā̍ya |
mahi̍ | i̱me iti̍ | a̱sya̱ | vṛṣa̱nāma̍ | śū̱ṣe iti̍ | mām̐śca̍tve | vā̱ | pṛśa̍ne | vā̱ | vadha̍tre̱ iti̍ |
asvā̍payat | ni̱-guta̍ḥ | sne̱haya̍t | ca̱ | apa̍ | a̱mitrā̍n | apa̍ | a̱cita̍ḥ | a̱ca̱ | i̱taḥ |
sam | trī | pa̱vitrā̍ | vi-ta̍tāni | e̱ṣi̱ | anu̍ | eka̍m | dhā̱va̱si̱ | pū̱yamā̍naḥ |
asi̍ | bhaga̍ḥ | asi̍ | dā̱trasya̍ | dā̱tā | asi̍ | ma̱gha-vā̍ | ma̱ghava̍t-bhyaḥ | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ |
e̱ṣaḥ | vi̱śva̱-vit | pa̱va̱te̱ | ma̱nī̱ṣī | soma̍ḥ | viśva̍sya | bhuva̍nasya | rājā̍ |
dra̱psān | ī̱raya̍n | vi̱dathe̍ṣu | indu̍ḥ | vi | vāra̍m | avya̍m | sa̱mayā̍ | ati̍ | yā̱ti̱ |
indu̍m | ri̱ha̱nti̱ | ma̱hi̱ṣāḥ | ada̍bdhāḥ | pa̱de | re̱bha̱nti̱ | ka̱vaya̍ḥ | na | gṛdhrā̍ḥ |
hi̱nvanti̍ | dhīrā̍ḥ | da̱śa-bhi̍ḥ | kṣipā̍bhiḥ | sam | a̱ñja̱te̱ | rū̱pam | a̱pām | rase̍na |
tvayā̍ | va̱yam | pava̍mānena | so̱ma̱ | bhare̍ | kṛ̱tam | vi | ci̱nu̱yā̱ma̱ | śaśva̍t |
tat | na̱ḥ | mi̱traḥ | varu̍ṇaḥ | ma̱ma̱ha̱ntā̱m | adi̍tiḥ | sindhu̍ḥ | pṛ̱thi̱vī | u̱ta | dyauḥ |
a̱bhi | na̱ḥ | vā̱ja̱-sāta̍mam | ra̱yim | a̱rṣa̱ | pu̱ru̱-spṛha̍m |
indo̱ iti̍ | sa̱hasra̍-bharṇasam | tu̱vi̱-dyu̱mnam | vi̱bhva̱-saha̍m |
pari̍ | syaḥ | su̱vā̱naḥ | a̱vyaya̍m | rathe̍ | na | varma̍ | a̱vya̱ta̱ |
indu̍ḥ | a̱bhi | druṇā̍ | hi̱taḥ | hi̱yā̱naḥ | dhārā̍bhiḥ | a̱kṣā̱riti̍ |
pari̍ | syaḥ | su̱vā̱naḥ | a̱kṣā̱riti̍ | indu̍ḥ | avye̍ | mada̍-cyutaḥ |
dhārā̍ | yaḥ | ū̱rdhvaḥ | a̱dhva̱re | bhrā̱jā | na | eti̍ | ga̱vya̱-yuḥ |
saḥ | hi | tvam | de̱va̱ | śaśva̍te | vasu̍ | martā̍ya | dā̱śuṣe̍ |
indo̱ iti̍ | sa̱ha̱sriṇa̍m | ra̱yim | śa̱ta-ā̍tmānam | vi̱vā̱sa̱si̱ |
va̱yam | te̱ | a̱sya | vṛ̱tra̱-ha̱n | vaso̱ iti̍ | vasva̍ḥ | pu̱ru̱-spṛha̍ḥ |
ni | nedi̍ṣṭha-tamāḥ | i̱ṣaḥ | syāma̍ | su̱mnasya̍ | a̱dhri̱go̱ itya̍dhri-go |
dviḥ | yam | pañca̍ | sva-ya̍śasam | svasā̍raḥ | adri̍-saṁhatam |
pri̱yam | indra̍sya | kāmya̍m | pra̱-snā̱paya̍nti | ū̱rmiṇa̍m |
pari̍ | tyam | ha̱rya̱tam | hari̍m | ba̱bhrum | pu̱na̱nti̱ | vāre̍ṇa |
yaḥ | de̱vān | viśvā̍n | it | pari̍ | made̍na | sa̱ha | gaccha̍ti |
a̱sya | va̱ḥ | hi | ava̍sā | pānta̍ḥ | da̱kṣa̱-sādha̍nam |
yaḥ | sū̱riṣu̍ | śrava̍ḥ | bṛ̱hat | da̱dhe | sva̍ḥ | na | ha̱rya̱taḥ |
saḥ | vā̱m | ya̱jñeṣu̍ | mā̱na̱vī̱ iti̍ | indu̍ḥ | ja̱ni̱ṣṭa̱ | ro̱da̱sī̱ iti̍ |
de̱vaḥ | de̱vī̱ iti̍ | gi̱ri̱-sthāḥ | asre̍dhan | tam | tu̱vi̱-svani̍ |
indrā̍ya | so̱ma̱ | pāta̍ve | vṛ̱tra̱-ghne | pari̍ | si̱cya̱se̱ |
nare̍ | ca̱ | dakṣi̍ṇā-vate | de̱vāya̍ | sa̱da̱na̱-sade̍ |
te | pra̱tnāsa̍ḥ | vi-u̍ṣṭiṣu | somā̍ḥ | pa̱vitre̍ | a̱kṣa̱ra̱n |
a̱pa̱-protha̍ntaḥ | sa̱nu̱taḥ | hu̱ra̱ḥ-cita̍ḥ | prā̱tariti̍ | tān | apra̍-cetasaḥ |
tam | sa̱khā̱ya̱ḥ | pu̱ra̱ḥ-ruca̍m | yū̱yam | va̱yam | ca̱ | sū̱raya̍ḥ |
a̱śyāma̍ | vāja̍-gandhyam | sa̱nema̍ | vāja̍-pastyam |
ā | ha̱rya̱tāya̍ | dhṛ̱ṣṇave̍ | dhanu̍ḥ | ta̱nva̱nti̱ | pauṁsya̍m |
śu̱krām | va̱ya̱nti̱ | asu̍rāya | ni̱ḥ-nija̍m | vi̱pām | agre̍ | ma̱hī̱yuva̍ḥ |
adha̍ | kṣa̱pā | pari̍-kṛtaḥ | vājā̍n | a̱bhi | pra | gā̱ha̱te̱ |
yadi̍ | vi̱vasva̍taḥ | dhiya̍ḥ | hari̍m | hi̱nvanti̍ | yāta̍ve |
tam | a̱sya̱ | ma̱rja̱yā̱ma̱si̱ | mada̍ḥ | yaḥ | i̱ndra̱-pāta̍maḥ |
yam | gāva̍ḥ | ā̱sa-bhi̍ḥ | da̱dhuḥ | pu̱rā | nū̱nam | ca̱ | sū̱raya̍ḥ |
tam | gātha̍yā | pu̱rā̱ṇyā | pu̱nā̱nam | a̱bhi | a̱nū̱ṣa̱ta̱ |
u̱to iti̍ | kṛ̱pa̱nta̱ | dhī̱taya̍ḥ | de̱vānā̍m | nāma̍ | bibhra̍tīḥ |
tam | u̱kṣamā̍ṇam | a̱vyaye̍ | vāre̍ | pu̱na̱nti̱ | dha̱rṇa̱sim |
dū̱tam | na | pū̱rva-ci̍ttaye | ā | śā̱sa̱te̱ | ma̱nī̱ṣiṇa̍ḥ |
saḥ | pu̱nā̱naḥ | ma̱din-ta̍maḥ | soma̍ḥ | ca̱mūṣu̍ | sī̱da̱ti̱ |
pa̱śau | na | reta̍ḥ | ā̱-dadha̍t | pati̍ḥ | va̱ca̱sya̱te̱ | dhi̱yaḥ |
saḥ | mṛ̱jya̱te̱ | su̱karma̍-bhiḥ | de̱vaḥ | de̱vebhya̍ḥ | su̱taḥ |
vi̱de | yat | ā̱su̱ | sa̱m-da̱diḥ | ma̱hīḥ | a̱paḥ | vi | gā̱ha̱te̱ |
su̱taḥ | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ | pa̱vitre̍ | ā | nṛ-bhi̍ḥ | ya̱taḥ | vi | nī̱ya̱se̱ |
indrā̍ya | ma̱tsa̱rin-ta̍maḥ | ca̱mūṣu̍ | ā | ni | sī̱da̱si̱ |
a̱bhi | na̱va̱nte̱ | a̱druha̍ḥ | pri̱yam | indra̍sya | kāmya̍m |
va̱tsam | na | pūrve̍ | āyu̍ni | jā̱tam | ri̱ha̱nti̱ | mā̱tara̍ḥ |
pu̱nā̱naḥ | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ | ā | bha̱ra̱ | soma̍ | dvi̱-barha̍sam | ra̱yim |
tvam | vasū̍ni | pu̱ṣya̱si̱ | viśvā̍ni | dā̱śuṣa̍ḥ | gṛ̱he |
tvam | dhiya̍m | ma̱na̱ḥ-yuja̍m | sṛ̱ja | vṛ̱ṣṭim | na | ta̱nya̱tuḥ |
tvam | vasū̍ni | pārthi̍vā | di̱vyā | ca̱ | so̱ma̱ | pu̱ṣya̱si̱ |
pari̍ | te̱ | ji̱gyuṣa̍ḥ | ya̱thā̱ | dhārā̍ | su̱tasya̍ | dhā̱va̱ti̱ |
raṁha̍māṇā | vi | a̱vyaya̍m | vāra̍m | vā̱jī-i̍va | sā̱na̱siḥ |
kratve̍ | dakṣā̍ya | na̱ḥ | ka̱ve̱ | pava̍sva | so̱ma̱ | dhāra̍yā |
indrā̍ya | pāta̍ve | su̱taḥ | mi̱trāya̍ | varu̍ṇāya | ca̱ |
pava̍sva | vā̱ja̱-sāta̍maḥ | pa̱vitre̍ | dhāra̍yā | su̱taḥ |
indrā̍ya | so̱ma̱ | viṣṇa̍ve | de̱vebhya̍ḥ | madhu̍mat-tamaḥ |
tvām | ri̱ha̱nti̱ | mā̱tara̍ḥ | hari̍m | pa̱vitre̍ | a̱druha̍ḥ |
va̱tsam | jā̱tam | na | dhe̱nava̍ḥ | pava̍māna | vi-dha̍rmaṇi |
pava̍māna | mahi̍ | śrava̍ḥ | ci̱trebhi̍ḥ | yā̱si̱ | ra̱śmi-bhi̍ḥ |
śardha̍n | tamā̍ṁsi | ji̱ghna̱se̱ | viśvā̍ni | dā̱śuṣa̍ḥ | gṛ̱he |
tvam | dyām | ca̱ | ma̱hi̱-vra̱ta̱ | pṛ̱thi̱vīm | ca̱ | ati̍ | ja̱bhri̱ṣe̱ |
prati̍ | drā̱pim | a̱mu̱ñca̱thā̱ḥ | pava̍māna | ma̱hi̱-tva̱nā |
pu̱raḥ-ji̍tī | va̱ḥ | andha̍saḥ | su̱tāya̍ | mā̱da̱yi̱tnave̍ |
apa̍ | śvāna̍m | śna̱thi̱ṣṭa̱na̱ | sakhā̍yaḥ | dī̱rgha̱-ji̱hvya̍m |
yaḥ | dhāra̍yā | pā̱va̱kayā̍ | pa̱ri̱-pra̱syanda̍te | su̱taḥ |
indu̍ḥ | aśva̍ḥ | na | kṛtvya̍ḥ |
tam | du̱roṣa̍m | a̱bhi | nara̍ḥ | soma̍m | vi̱śvācyā̍ | dhi̱yā |
ya̱jñam | hi̱nva̱nti̱ | adri̍-bhiḥ |
su̱tāsa̍ḥ | madhu̍mat-tamāḥ | somā̍ḥ | indrā̍ya | ma̱ndina̍ḥ |
pa̱vitra̍-vantaḥ | a̱kṣa̱ra̱n | de̱vān | ga̱ccha̱ntu̱ | va̱ḥ | madā̍ḥ |
indu̍ḥ | indrā̍ya | pa̱va̱te̱ | iti̍ | de̱vāsa̍ḥ | a̱bru̱va̱n |
vā̱caḥ | pati̍ḥ | ma̱kha̱sya̱te̱ | viśva̍sya | īśā̍naḥ | oja̍sā |
sa̱hasra̍-dhāraḥ | pa̱va̱te̱ | sa̱mu̱draḥ | vā̱ca̱m-ī̱ṅkha̱yaḥ |
soma̍ḥ | pati̍ḥ | ra̱yī̱ṇām | sakhā̍ | indra̍sya | di̱ve-di̍ve |
a̱yam | pū̱ṣā | ra̱yiḥ | bhaga̍ḥ | soma̍ḥ | pu̱nā̱naḥ | a̱rṣa̱ti̱ |
pati̍ḥ | viśva̍sya | bhūma̍naḥ | vi | a̱khya̱t | roda̍sī̱ iti̍ | u̱bhe iti̍ |
sam | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | pri̱yāḥ | a̱nū̱ṣa̱ta̱ | gāva̍ḥ | madā̍ya | ghṛṣva̍yaḥ |
somā̍saḥ | kṛ̱ṇva̱te̱ | pa̱thaḥ | pava̍mānāsaḥ | inda̍vaḥ |
yaḥ | oji̍ṣṭhaḥ | tam | ā | bha̱ra̱ | pava̍māna | śra̱vāyya̍m |
yaḥ | pañca̍ | ca̱rṣa̱ṇīḥ | a̱bhi | ra̱yim | yena̍ | vanā̍mahai |
somā̍ḥ | pa̱va̱nte̱ | inda̍vaḥ | a̱smabhya̍m | gā̱tu̱vit-ta̍māḥ |
mi̱trāḥ | su̱vā̱nāḥ | a̱re̱pasa̍ḥ | su̱-ā̱dhya̍ḥ | sva̱ḥ-vida̍ḥ |
su̱svā̱ṇāsa̍ḥ | vi | adri̍-bhiḥ | citā̍nāḥ | goḥ | adhi̍ | tva̱ci |
iṣa̍m | a̱smabhya̍m | a̱bhita̍ḥ | sam | a̱sva̱ra̱n | va̱su̱-vida̍ḥ |
e̱te | pū̱tāḥ | vi̱pa̱ḥ-cita̍ḥ | somā̍saḥ | dadhi̍-āśiraḥ |
sūryā̍saḥ | na | da̱rśa̱tāsa̍ḥ | ji̱ga̱tnava̍ḥ | dhru̱vāḥ | ghṛ̱te |
pra | su̱nvā̱nasya̍ | andha̍saḥ | marta̍ḥ | na | vṛ̱ta̱ | tat | vaca̍ḥ |
apa̍ | śvāna̍m | a̱rā̱dhasa̍m | ha̱ta | ma̱kham | na | bhṛga̍vaḥ |
ā | jā̱miḥ | atke̍ | a̱vya̱ta̱ | bhu̱je | na | pu̱traḥ | o̱ṇyo̍ḥ |
sara̍t | jā̱raḥ | na | yoṣa̍ṇām | va̱raḥ | na | yoni̍m | ā̱-sada̍m |
saḥ | vī̱raḥ | da̱kṣa̱-sādha̍naḥ | vi | yaḥ | ta̱stambha̍ | roda̍sī̱ iti̍ |
hari̍ḥ | pa̱vitre̍ | a̱vya̱ta̱ | ve̱dhāḥ | na | yoni̍m | ā̱-sada̍m |
avya̍ḥ | vāre̍bhiḥ | pa̱va̱te̱ | soma̍ḥ | gavye̍ | adhi̍ | tva̱ci |
kani̍kradat | vṛṣā̍ | hari̍ḥ | indra̍sya | a̱bhi | e̱ti̱ | ni̱ḥ-kṛ̱tam |
krā̱ṇā | śiśu̍ḥ | ma̱hīnā̍m | hi̱nvan | ṛ̱tasya̍ | dīdhi̍tim |
viśvā̍ | pari̍ | pri̱yā | bhu̱va̱t | adha̍ | dvi̱tā |
upa̍ | tri̱tasya̍ | pā̱ṣyo̍ḥ | abha̍kta | yat | guhā̍ | pa̱dam |
ya̱jñasya̍ | sa̱pta | dhāma̍-bhiḥ | adha̍ | pri̱yam |
trīṇi̍ | tri̱tasya̍ | dhāra̍yā | pṛ̱ṣṭheṣu̍ | ā | ī̱ra̱ya̱ | ra̱yim |
mimī̍te | a̱sya̱ | yoja̍nā | vi | su̱-kratu̍ḥ |
ja̱jñā̱nam | sa̱pta | mā̱tara̍ḥ | ve̱dhām | a̱śā̱sa̱ta̱ | śri̱ye |
a̱yam | dhru̱vaḥ | ra̱yī̱ṇām | cike̍ta | yat |
a̱sya | vra̱te | sa̱-joṣa̍saḥ | viśve̍ | de̱vāsa̍ḥ | a̱druha̍ḥ |
spā̱rhāḥ | bha̱va̱nti̱ | ranta̍yaḥ | ju̱ṣanta̍ | yat |
yam | ī̱miti̍ | garbha̍m | ṛ̱ta̱-vṛdha̍ḥ | dṛ̱śe | cāru̍m | ajī̍janan |
ka̱vim | maṁhi̍ṣṭham | a̱dhva̱re | pu̱ru̱-spṛha̍m |
sa̱mī̱cī̱ne iti̍ sa̱m-ī̱cī̱ne | a̱bhi | tmanā̍ | ya̱hvī iti̍ | ṛ̱tasya̍ | mā̱tarā̍ |
ta̱nvā̱nāḥ | ya̱jñam | ā̱nu̱ṣak | yat | a̱ñja̱te |
kratvā̍ | śu̱krebhi̍ḥ | a̱kṣa-bhi̍ḥ | ṛ̱ṇoḥ | apa̍ | vra̱jam | di̱vaḥ |
hi̱nvan | ṛ̱tasya̍ | dīdi̍tim | pra | a̱dhva̱re |
pra | pu̱nā̱nāya̍ | ve̱dhase̍ | somā̍ya | vaca̍ḥ | ut-ya̍tam |
bhṛ̱tim | na | bha̱ra̱ | ma̱ti-bhi̍ḥ | jujo̍ṣate |
pari̍ | vārā̍ṇi | a̱vyayā̍ | gobhi̍ḥ | a̱ñjā̱naḥ | a̱rṣa̱ti̱ |
trī | sa̱dha-sthā̍ | pu̱nā̱naḥ | kṛ̱ṇu̱te̱ | hari̍ḥ |
pari̍ | kośa̍m | ma̱dhu̱-ścuta̍m | a̱vyaye̍ | vāre̍ | a̱rṣa̱ti̱ |
a̱bhi | vāṇī̍ḥ | ṛṣī̍ṇām | sa̱pta | nū̱ṣa̱ta̱ |
pari̍ | ne̱tā | ma̱tī̱nām | vi̱śva-de̍vaḥ | adā̍bhyaḥ |
soma̍ḥ | pu̱nā̱naḥ | ca̱mvo̍ḥ | vi̱śa̱t | hari̍ḥ |
pari̍ | daivī̍ḥ | anu̍ | sva̱dhāḥ | indre̍ṇa | yā̱hi̱ | sa̱-ratha̍m |
pu̱nā̱naḥ | vā̱ghat | vā̱ghat-bhi̍ḥ | ama̍rtyaḥ |
pari̍ | sapti̍ḥ | na | vā̱ja̱-yuḥ | de̱vaḥ | de̱vebhya̍ḥ | su̱taḥ |
vi̱-ā̱na̱śiḥ | pava̍mānaḥ | vi | dhā̱va̱ti̱ |
sakhā̍yaḥ | ā | ni | sī̱da̱ta̱ | pu̱nā̱nāya̍ | pra | gā̱ya̱ta̱ |
śiśu̍m | na | ya̱jñaiḥ | pari̍ | bhū̱ṣa̱ta̱ | śri̱ye |
sam | ī̱miti̍ | va̱tsam | na | mā̱tṛ-bhi̍ḥ | sṛ̱jata̍ | ga̱ya̱-sādha̍nam |
de̱va̱-a̱vya̍m | mada̍m | a̱bhi | dvi-śa̍vasam |
pu̱nāta̍ | da̱kṣa̱-sādha̍nam | yathā̍ | śardhā̍ya | vī̱taye̍ |
yathā̍ | mi̱trāya̍ | varu̍ṇāya | śam-ta̍maḥ |
a̱smabhya̍m | tvā̱ | va̱su̱-vida̍m | a̱bhi | vāṇī̍ḥ | a̱nū̱ṣa̱ta̱ |
gobhi̍ḥ | te̱ | varṇa̍m | a̱bhi | vā̱sa̱yā̱ma̱si̱ |
saḥ | na̱ḥ | ma̱dā̱nā̱m | pa̱te̱ | indo̱ iti̍ | de̱va-psa̍rāḥ | a̱si̱ |
sakhā̍-iva | sakhye̍ | gā̱tu̱vit-ta̍maḥ | bha̱va̱ |
sane̍mi | kṛ̱dhi | a̱smat | ā | ra̱kṣasa̍m | kam | ci̱t | a̱triṇa̍m |
apa̍ | ade̍vam | dva̱yum | aṁha̍ḥ | yu̱yo̱dhi̱ | na̱ḥ |
tam | va̱ḥ | sa̱khā̱ya̱ḥ | madā̍ya | pu̱nā̱nam | a̱bhi | gā̱ya̱ta̱ |
śiśu̍m | na | ya̱jñaiḥ | sva̱da̱ya̱nta̱ | gū̱rti-bhi̍ḥ |
sam | va̱tsaḥ-i̍va | mā̱tṛ-bhi̍ḥ | indu̍ḥ | hi̱nvā̱naḥ | a̱jya̱te̱ |
de̱va̱-a̱vīḥ | mada̍ḥ | ma̱ti-bhi̍ḥ | pari̍-kṛtaḥ |
a̱yam | dakṣā̍ya | sādha̍naḥ | a̱yam | śardhā̍ya | vī̱taye̍ |
a̱yam | de̱vebhya̍ḥ | madhu̍mat-tamaḥ | su̱taḥ |
go-ma̍t | na̱ḥ | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ | aśva̍-vat | su̱taḥ | su̱-da̱kṣa̱ | dha̱nva̱ |
śuci̍m | te̱ | varṇa̍m | adhi̍ | goṣu̍ | dī̱dha̱ra̱m |
saḥ | na̱ḥ | ha̱rī̱ṇā̱m | pa̱te̱ | indo̱ iti̍ | de̱vapsa̍raḥ-tamaḥ |
sakhā̍-iva | sakhye̍ | narya̍ḥ | ru̱ce | bha̱va̱ |
sane̍mi | tvam | a̱smat | ā | ade̍vam | kam | ci̱t | a̱triṇa̍m |
sā̱hvān | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ | pari̍ | bādha̍ḥ | apa̍ | dva̱yum |
indra̍m | accha̍ | su̱tāḥ | i̱me | vṛṣa̍ṇam | ya̱ntu̱ | hara̍yaḥ |
śru̱ṣṭī | jā̱tāsa̍ḥ | inda̍vaḥ | sva̱ḥ-vida̍ḥ |
a̱yam | bharā̍ya | sā̱na̱siḥ | indrā̍ya | pa̱va̱te̱ | su̱taḥ |
soma̍ḥ | jaitra̍sya | ce̱ta̱ti̱ | yathā̍ | vi̱de |
a̱sya | it | indra̍ḥ | made̍ṣu | ā | grā̱bham | gṛ̱bhṇī̱ta̱ | sā̱na̱sim |
vajra̍m | ca̱ | vṛṣa̍ṇam | bha̱ra̱t | sam | a̱psu̱-jit |
pra | dha̱nva̱ | so̱ma̱ | jāgṛ̍viḥ | indrā̍ya | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ | pari̍ | sra̱va̱ |
dyu̱-manta̍m | śuṣma̍m | ā | bha̱ra̱ | sva̱ḥ-vida̍m |
indrā̍ya | vṛṣa̍ṇam | mada̍m | pava̍sva | vi̱śva-da̍rśataḥ |
sa̱hasra̍-yāmā | pa̱thi̱-kṛt | vi̱-ca̱kṣa̱ṇaḥ |
a̱smabhya̍m | gā̱tu̱vit-ta̍maḥ | de̱vebhya̍ḥ | madhu̍mat-tamaḥ |
sa̱hasra̍m | yā̱hi̱ | pa̱thi-bhi̍ḥ | kani̍kradat |
pava̍sva | de̱va-vī̍taye | indo̱ iti̍ | dhārā̍bhiḥ | oja̍sā |
ā | ka̱laśa̍m | madhu̍-mān | so̱ma̱ | na̱ḥ | sa̱da̱ḥ |
tava̍ | dra̱psāḥ | u̱da̱-pruta̍ḥ | indra̍m | madā̍ya | va̱vṛ̱dhu̱ḥ |
tvām | de̱vāsa̍ḥ | a̱mṛtā̍ya | kam | pa̱pu̱ḥ |
ā | na̱ḥ | su̱tā̱sa̱ḥ | i̱nda̱va̱ḥ | pu̱nā̱nāḥ | dhā̱va̱ta̱ | ra̱yim |
vṛ̱ṣṭi-dyā̍vaḥ | rī̱ti̱-ā̱pa̱ḥ | sva̱ḥ-vida̍ḥ |
soma̍ḥ | pu̱nā̱naḥ | ū̱rmiṇā̍ | avya̍ḥ | vāra̍m | vi | dhā̱va̱ti̱ |
agre̍ | vā̱caḥ | pava̍mānaḥ | kani̍kradat |
dhī̱bhiḥ | hi̱nva̱nti̱ | vā̱jina̍m | vane̍ | krīḻa̍ntam | ati̍-avim |
a̱bhi | tri̱-pṛ̱ṣṭham | ma̱taya̍ḥ | sam | a̱sva̱ra̱n |
asa̍rji | ka̱laśā̍n | a̱bhi | mī̱ḻhe | sapti̍ḥ | na | vā̱ja̱-yuḥ |
pu̱nā̱naḥ | vāca̍m | ja̱naya̍n | a̱si̱sya̱da̱t |
pava̍te | ha̱rya̱taḥ | hari̍ḥ | ati̍ | hvarā̍ṁsi | raṁhyā̍ |
a̱bhi̱-arṣa̍n | sto̱tṛ-bhya̍ḥ | vī̱ra-va̍t | yaśa̍ḥ |
a̱yā | pa̱va̱sva̱ | de̱va̱-yuḥ | madho̍ḥ | dhārā̍ḥ | a̱sṛ̱kṣa̱ta̱ |
rebha̍n | pa̱vitra̍m | pari̍ | e̱ṣi̱ | vi̱śvata̍ḥ |
pari̍ | i̱taḥ | si̱ñca̱ta̱ | su̱tam | soma̍ḥ | yaḥ | u̱t-ta̱mam | ha̱viḥ |
da̱dha̱nvān | yaḥ | narya̍ḥ | a̱p-su | a̱ntaḥ | ā | su̱sāva̍ | soma̍m | adri̍-bhiḥ |
nū̱nam | pu̱nā̱naḥ | avi̍-bhiḥ | pari̍ | sra̱va̱ | ada̍bdhaḥ | su̱ra̱bhim-ta̍raḥ |
su̱te | ci̱t | tvā̱ | a̱p-su | mā̱dā̱ma̱ḥ | andha̍sā | śrī̱ṇanta̍ḥ | gobhi̍ḥ | ut-ta̍ram |
pari̍ | su̱vā̱naḥ | cakṣa̍se | de̱va̱-māda̍naḥ | kratu̍ḥ | indu̍ḥ | vi̱-ca̱kṣa̱ṇaḥ |
pu̱nā̱naḥ | so̱ma̱ | dhāra̍yā | a̱paḥ | vasā̍naḥ | a̱rṣa̱si̱ |
ā | ra̱tna̱-dhāḥ | yoni̍m | ṛ̱tasya̍ | sī̱da̱si̱ | utsa̍ḥ | de̱va̱ | hi̱ra̱ṇyaya̍ḥ |
du̱hā̱naḥ | ūdha̍ḥ | di̱vyam | madhu̍ | pri̱yam | pra̱tnam | sa̱dha-stha̍m | ā | a̱sa̱da̱t |
ā̱-pṛcchya̍m | dha̱ruṇa̍m | vā̱jī | a̱rṣa̱ti̱ | nṛ-bhi̍ḥ | dhū̱taḥ | vi̱-ca̱kṣa̱ṇaḥ |
pu̱nā̱naḥ | so̱ma̱ | jāgṛ̍viḥ | avya̍ḥ | vāre̍ | pari̍ | pri̱yaḥ |
tvam | vipra̍ḥ | a̱bha̱va̱ḥ | aṅgi̍raḥ-tamaḥ | madhvā̍ | ya̱jñam | mi̱mi̱kṣa̱ | na̱ḥ |
soma̍ḥ | mī̱ḍhvān | pa̱va̱te̱ | gā̱tu̱vit-ta̍maḥ | ṛṣi̍ḥ | vipra̍ḥ | vi̱-ca̱kṣa̱ṇaḥ |
tvam | ka̱viḥ | a̱bha̱va̱ḥ | de̱va̱-vīta̍maḥ | ā | sūrya̍m | ro̱ha̱ya̱ḥ | di̱vi |
soma̍ḥ | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | su̱vā̱naḥ | so̱tṛ-bhi̍ḥ | adhi̍ | snu-bhi̍ḥ | avī̍nām |
aśva̍yā-iva | ha̱ritā̍ | yā̱ti̱ | dhāra̍yā | ma̱ndrayā̍ | yā̱ti̱ | dhāra̍yā |
a̱nū̱pe | go-mā̍n | gobhi̍ḥ | a̱kṣā̱riti̍ | soma̍ḥ | du̱gdhābhi̍ḥ | a̱kṣā̱riti̍ |
sa̱mu̱dram | na | sa̱m-vara̍ṇāni | a̱gma̱n | ma̱ndī | madā̍ya | to̱śa̱te̱ |
ā | so̱ma̱ | su̱vā̱naḥ | adri̍-bhiḥ | ti̱raḥ | vārā̍ṇi | a̱vyayā̍ |
jana̍ḥ | na | pu̱ri | ca̱mvo̍ḥ | vi̱śa̱t | hari̍ḥ | sada̍ḥ | vane̍ṣu | da̱dhi̱ṣe̱ |
saḥ | ma̱mṛ̱je̱ | ti̱raḥ | aṇvā̍ni | me̱ṣya̍ḥ | mī̱ḻhe | sapti̍ḥ | na | vā̱ja̱-yuḥ |
a̱nu̱-mādya̍ḥ | pava̍mānaḥ | ma̱nī̱ṣi-bhi̍ḥ | soma̍ḥ | vipre̍bhiḥ | ṛkva̍-bhiḥ |
pra | so̱ma̱ | de̱va-vī̍taye | sindhu̍ḥ | na | pi̱pye̱ | arṇa̍sā |
a̱ṁśoḥ | paya̍sā | ma̱di̱raḥ | na | jāgṛ̍viḥ | accha̍ | kośa̍m | ma̱dhu̱-ścuta̍m |
ā | ha̱rya̱taḥ | arju̍ne | atke̍ | a̱vya̱ta̱ | pri̱yaḥ | sū̱nuḥ | na | marjya̍ḥ |
tam | ī̱m | hi̱nva̱nti̱ | a̱pasa̍ḥ | yathā̍ | ratha̍m | na̱dīṣu̍ | ā | gabha̍styoḥ |
a̱bhi | somā̍saḥ | ā̱yava̍ḥ | pava̍nte | madya̍m | mada̍m |
sa̱mu̱drasya̍ | adhi̍ | vi̱ṣṭapi̍ | ma̱nī̱ṣiṇa̍ḥ | ma̱tsa̱rāsa̍ḥ | sva̱ḥ-vida̍ḥ |
tara̍t | sa̱mu̱dram | pava̍mānaḥ | ū̱rmiṇā̍ | rājā̍ | de̱vaḥ | ṛ̱tam | bṛ̱hat |
arṣa̍t | mi̱trasya̍ | varu̍ṇasya | dharma̍ṇā | pra | hi̱nvā̱naḥ | ṛ̱tam | bṛ̱hat |
nṛ-bhi̍ḥ | ye̱mā̱naḥ | ha̱rya̱taḥ | vi̱-ca̱kṣa̱ṇaḥ | rājā̍ | de̱vaḥ | sa̱mu̱driya̍ḥ |
indrā̍ya | pa̱va̱te̱ | mada̍ḥ | soma̍ḥ | ma̱rutva̍te | su̱taḥ |
sa̱hasra̍-dhāraḥ | ati̍ | avya̍m | a̱rṣa̱ti̱ | tam | ī̱miti̍ | mṛ̱ja̱nti̱ | ā̱yava̍ḥ |
pu̱nā̱naḥ | ca̱mū iti̍ | ja̱naya̍n | ma̱tim | ka̱viḥ | soma̍ḥ | de̱veṣu̍ | ra̱ṇya̱ti̱ |
a̱paḥ | vasā̍naḥ | pari̍ | gobhi̍ḥ | ut-ta̍raḥ | sīda̍n | vane̍ṣu | a̱vya̱ta̱ |
tava̍ | a̱ham | so̱ma̱ | ra̱ra̱ṇa̱ | sa̱khye | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ | di̱ve-di̍ve |
pu̱rūṇi̍ | ba̱bhro̱ iti̍ | ni | ca̱ra̱nti̱ | mām | ava̍ | pa̱ri̱-dhīn | ati̍ | tān | i̱hi̱ |
u̱ta | a̱ham | nakta̍m | u̱ta | so̱ma̱ | te̱ | divā̍ | sa̱khyāya̍ | ba̱bhro̱ iti̍ | ūdha̍ni |
ghṛ̱ṇā | tapa̍ntam | ati̍ | sūrya̍m | pa̱raḥ | śa̱ku̱nāḥ-i̍va | pa̱pti̱ma̱ |
mṛ̱jyamā̍naḥ | su̱-ha̱stya̱ | sa̱mu̱dre | vāca̍m | i̱nva̱si̱ |
ra̱yim | pi̱śaṅga̍m | ba̱hu̱lam | pu̱ru̱-spṛha̍m | pava̍māna | a̱bhi | a̱rṣa̱si̱ |
mṛ̱jā̱naḥ | vāre̍ | pava̍mānaḥ | a̱vyaye̍ | vṛṣā̍ | ava̍ | ca̱kra̱da̱ḥ | vane̍ |
de̱vānā̍m | so̱ma̱ | pa̱va̱mā̱na̱ | ni̱ḥ-kṛ̱tam | gobhi̍ḥ | a̱ñjā̱naḥ | a̱rṣa̱si̱ |
pava̍sva | vāja̍-sātaye | a̱bhi | viśvā̍ni | kāvyā̍ |
tvam | sa̱mu̱dram | pra̱tha̱maḥ | vi | dhā̱ra̱ya̱ḥ | de̱vebhya̍ḥ | so̱ma̱ | ma̱tsa̱raḥ |
saḥ | tu | pa̱va̱sva̱ | pari̍ | pārthi̍vam | raja̍ḥ | di̱vyā | ca̱ | so̱ma̱ | dharma̍-bhiḥ |
tvām | viprā̍saḥ | ma̱ti-bhi̍ḥ | vi̱-ca̱kṣa̱ṇa̱ | śu̱bhram | hi̱nva̱nti̱ | dhī̱ti-bhi̍ḥ |
pava̍mānāḥ | a̱sṛ̱kṣa̱ta̱ | pa̱vitra̍m | ati̍ | dhāra̍yā |
ma̱rutva̍ntaḥ | ma̱tsa̱rāḥ | i̱ndri̱yāḥ | hayā̍ḥ | me̱dhām | a̱bhi | prayā̍ṁsi | ca̱ |
a̱paḥ | vasā̍naḥ | pari̍ | kośa̍m | a̱rṣa̱ti̱ | indu̍ḥ | hi̱yā̱naḥ | so̱tṛ-bhi̍ḥ |
ja̱naya̍n | jyoti̍ḥ | ma̱ndanā̍ḥ | a̱vī̱va̱śa̱t | gāḥ | kṛ̱ṇvā̱naḥ | na | ni̱ḥ-nija̍m |
pava̍sva | madhu̍mat-tamaḥ | indrā̍ya | so̱ma̱ | kra̱tu̱vit-ta̍maḥ | mada̍ḥ |
mahi̍ | dyu̱kṣa-ta̍maḥ | mada̍ḥ |
yasya̍ | te̱ | pī̱tvā | vṛ̱ṣa̱bhaḥ | vṛ̱ṣa̱-yate̍ | a̱sya | pī̱tā | sva̱ḥ-vida̍ḥ |
saḥ | su̱-prake̍taḥ | a̱bhi | a̱kra̱mī̱t | iṣa̍ḥ | accha̍ | vāja̍m | na | eta̍śaḥ |
tvam | hi | a̱ṅga | daivyā̍ | pava̍māna | jani̍māni | dyu̱mat-ta̍maḥ |
a̱mṛ̱ta̱-tvāya̍ | gho̱ṣaya̍ḥ |
yena̍ | nava̍-gvaḥ | da̱dhyaṅ | a̱pa̱-ū̱rṇu̱te | yena̍ | viprā̍saḥ | ā̱pi̱re |
de̱vānā̍m | su̱mne | a̱mṛta̍sya | cāru̍ṇaḥ | yena̍ | śravā̍ṁsi | ā̱na̱śuḥ |
e̱ṣaḥ | syaḥ | dhāra̍yā | su̱taḥ | avya̍ḥ | vāre̍bhiḥ | pa̱va̱te̱ | ma̱din-ta̍maḥ |
krīḻa̍n | ū̱rmiḥ | a̱pām-i̍va |
yaḥ | u̱sriyā̍ḥ | apyā̍ḥ | a̱ntaḥ | aśma̍naḥ | niḥ | gāḥ | akṛ̍ntat | oja̍sā |
a̱bhi | vra̱jam | ta̱tni̱ṣe̱ | gavya̍m | aśvya̍m | va̱rmī-i̍va | dhṛ̱ṣṇo̱ iti̍ | ā | ru̱ja̱ |
ā | so̱ta̱ | pari̍ | si̱ñca̱ta̱ | aśva̍m | na | stoma̍m | a̱p-tura̍m | ra̱ja̱ḥ-tura̍m |
va̱na̱-kra̱kṣam | u̱da̱-pruta̍m |
sa̱hasra̍-dhāram | vṛ̱ṣa̱bham | pa̱ya̱ḥ-vṛdha̍m | pri̱yam | de̱vāya̍ | janma̍ne |
ṛ̱tena̍ | yaḥ | ṛ̱ta-jā̍taḥ | vi̱-va̱vṛ̱dhe | rājā̍ | de̱vaḥ | ṛ̱tam | bṛ̱hat |
a̱bhi | dyu̱mnam | bṛ̱hat | yaśa̍ḥ | iṣa̍ḥ | pa̱te̱ | di̱dī̱hi | de̱va̱ | de̱va̱-yuḥ |
vi | kośa̍m | ma̱dhya̱mam | yu̱va̱ |
ā | va̱cya̱sva̱ | su̱-da̱kṣa̱ | ca̱mvo̍ḥ | su̱taḥ | vi̱śām | vahni̍ḥ | na | vi̱śpati̍ḥ |
vṛ̱ṣṭim | di̱vaḥ | pa̱va̱sva̱ | rī̱tim | a̱pām | jinva̍ | go-i̍ṣṭaye | dhiya̍ḥ |
e̱tam | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | tyam | ma̱da̱-cyuta̍m | sa̱hasra̍-dhāram | vṛ̱ṣa̱bham | diva̍ḥ | du̱hu̱ḥ |
viśvā̍ | vasū̍ni | bibhra̍tam |
vṛṣā̍ | vi | ja̱jñe̱ | ja̱naya̍n | ama̍rtyaḥ | pra̱-tapa̍n | jyoti̍ṣā | tama̍ḥ |
saḥ | su-stu̍taḥ | ka̱vi-bhi̍ḥ | ni̱ḥ-nija̍m | da̱dhe̱ | tri̱-dhātu̍ | a̱sya̱ | daṁsa̍sā |
saḥ | su̱nve̱ | yaḥ | vasū̍nām | yaḥ | rā̱yām | ā̱-ne̱tā | yaḥ | iḻā̍nām |
soma̍ḥ | yaḥ | su̱-kṣi̱tī̱nām |
yasya̍ | na̱ḥ | indra̍ḥ | pibā̍t | yasya̍ | ma̱ruta̍ḥ | yasya̍ | vā̱ | a̱rya̱maṇā̍ | bhaga̍ḥ |
ā | yena̍ | mi̱trāvaru̍ṇā | karā̍mahe | ā | indra̍m | ava̍se | ma̱he |
indrā̍ya | so̱ma̱ | pāta̍ve | nṛ-bhi̍ḥ | ya̱taḥ | su̱-ā̱yu̱dhaḥ | ma̱din-ta̍maḥ |
pava̍sva | madhu̍mat-tamaḥ |
indra̍sya | hārdi̍ | so̱ma̱-dhāna̍m | ā | vi̱śa̱ | sa̱mu̱dram-i̍va | sindha̍vaḥ |
juṣṭa̍ḥ | mi̱trāya̍ | varu̍ṇāya | vā̱yave̍ | di̱vaḥ | vi̱ṣṭa̱mbhaḥ | u̱t-ta̱maḥ |
pari̍ | pra | dha̱nva̱ | indrā̍ya | so̱ma̱ | svā̱duḥ | mi̱trāya̍ | pū̱ṣṇe | bhagā̍ya |
indra̍ḥ | te̱ | so̱ma̱ | su̱tasya̍ | pe̱yā̱ḥ | kratve̍ | dakṣā̍ya | viśve̍ | ca̱ | de̱vāḥ |
e̱va | a̱mṛtā̍ya | ma̱he | kṣayā̍ya | saḥ | śu̱kraḥ | a̱rṣa̱ | di̱vyaḥ | pī̱yūṣa̍ḥ |
pava̍sva | so̱ma̱ | ma̱hān | sa̱mu̱draḥ | pi̱tā | de̱vānā̍m | viśvā̍ | a̱bhi | dhāma̍ |
śu̱kraḥ | pa̱va̱sva̱ | de̱vebhya̍ḥ | so̱ma̱ | di̱ve | pṛ̱thi̱vyai | śam | ca̱ | pra̱-jāyai̍ |
di̱vaḥ | dha̱rtā | a̱si̱ | śu̱kraḥ | pī̱yūṣa̍ḥ | sa̱tye | vi-dha̍rman | vā̱jī | pa̱va̱sva̱ |
pava̍sva | so̱ma̱ | dyu̱mnī | su̱-dhā̱raḥ | ma̱hām | avī̍nām | anu̍ | pū̱rvyaḥ |
nṛ-bhi̍ḥ | ye̱mā̱naḥ | ja̱jñā̱naḥ | pū̱taḥ | kṣara̍t | viśvā̍ni | ma̱ndraḥ | sva̱ḥ-vit |
indu̍ḥ | pu̱nā̱naḥ | pra̱-jām | u̱rā̱ṇaḥ | ka̱ra̱t | viśvā̍ni | dravi̍ṇāni | na̱ḥ |
pava̍sva | so̱ma̱ | kratve̍ | dakṣā̍ya | aśva̍ḥ | na | ni̱ktaḥ | vā̱jī | dhanā̍ya |
tam | te̱ | so̱tāra̍ḥ | rasa̍m | madā̍ya | pu̱nanti̍ | soma̍m | ma̱he | dyu̱mnāya̍ |
śiśu̍m | ja̱jñā̱nam | hari̍m | mṛ̱ja̱nti̱ | pa̱vitre̍ | soma̍m | de̱vebhya̍ḥ | indu̍m |
indu̍ḥ | pa̱vi̱ṣṭa̱ | cāru̍ḥ | madā̍ya | a̱pām | u̱pa-sthe̍ | ka̱viḥ | bhagā̍ya |
bibha̍rti | cāru̍ | indra̍sya | nāma̍ | yena̍ | viśvā̍ni | vṛ̱trā | ja̱ghāna̍ |
piba̍nti | a̱sya̱ | viśve̍ | de̱vāsa̍ḥ | gobhi̍ḥ | śrī̱tasya̍ | nṛ-bhi̍ḥ | su̱tasya̍ |
pra | su̱vā̱naḥ | a̱kṣā̱riti̍ | sa̱hasra̍-dhāraḥ | ti̱raḥ | pa̱vitra̍m | vi | vāra̍m | avya̍m |
saḥ | vā̱jī | a̱kṣā̱riti̍ | sa̱hasra̍-retāḥ | a̱t-bhiḥ | mṛ̱jā̱naḥ | gobhi̍ḥ | śrī̱ṇā̱naḥ |
pra | so̱ma̱ | yā̱hi̱ | indra̍sya | ku̱kṣā | nṛ-bhi̍ḥ | ye̱mā̱naḥ | adri̍-bhiḥ | su̱taḥ |
asa̍rji | vā̱jī | ti̱raḥ | pa̱vitra̍m | indrā̍ya | soma̍ḥ | sa̱hasra̍-dhāraḥ |
a̱ñjanti̍ | e̱na̱m | madhva̍ḥ | rase̍na | indrā̍ya | vṛṣṇe̍ | indu̍m | madā̍ya |
de̱vebhya̍ḥ | tvā̱ | vṛthā̍ | pāja̍se | a̱paḥ | vasā̍nam | hari̍m | mṛ̱ja̱nti̱ |
indu̍ḥ | indrā̍ya | to̱śa̱te̱ | ni | to̱śa̱te̱ | śrī̱ṇan | u̱graḥ | ri̱ṇan | a̱paḥ |
pari̍ | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | su | pra | dha̱nva̱ | vāja̍-sātaye | pari̍ | vṛ̱trāṇi̍ | sa̱kṣaṇi̍ḥ |
dvi̱ṣaḥ | ta̱radhyai̍ | ṛ̱ṇa̱-yāḥ | na̱ḥ | ī̱ya̱se̱ |
anu̍ | hi | tvā̱ | su̱tam | so̱ma̱ | madā̍masi | ma̱he | sa̱ma̱rya̱-rājye̍ |
vājā̍n | a̱bhi | pa̱va̱mā̱na̱ | pra | gā̱ha̱se̱ |
ajī̍janaḥ | hi | pa̱va̱mā̱na̱ | sūrya̍m | vi̱-dhāre̍ | śakma̍nā | paya̍ḥ |
go-jī̍rayā | raṁha̍māṇaḥ | pura̍ndhyā |
ajī̍janaḥ | a̱mṛ̱ta̱ | martye̍ṣu | ā | ṛ̱tasya̍ | dharma̍n | a̱mṛta̍sya | cāru̍ṇaḥ |
sadā̍ | a̱sa̱ra̱ḥ | vāja̍m | accha̍ | sani̍syadat |
a̱bhi-a̍bhi | hi | śrava̍sā | ta̱tardi̍tha | utsa̍m | na | kam | ci̱t | ja̱na̱-pāna̍m | akṣi̍tam |
śaryā̍bhiḥ | na | bhara̍māṇaḥ | gabha̍styoḥ |
āt | ī̱m | ke | ci̱t | paśya̍mānāsaḥ | āpya̍m | va̱su̱-ruca̍ḥ | di̱vyāḥ | a̱bhi | a̱nū̱ṣa̱ta̱ |
vāra̍m | na | de̱vaḥ | sa̱vi̱tā | vi | ū̱rṇu̱te̱ |
tve iti̍ | so̱ma̱ | pra̱tha̱māḥ | vṛ̱kta-ba̍rhiṣaḥ | ma̱he | vājā̍ya | śrava̍se | dhiya̍m | da̱dhu̱ḥ |
saḥ | tvam | na̱ḥ | vī̱ra̱ | vī̱ryā̍ya | co̱da̱ya̱ |
di̱vaḥ | pī̱yūṣa̍m | pū̱rvyam | yat | u̱kthya̍m | ma̱haḥ | gā̱hāt | di̱vaḥ | ā | niḥ | a̱dhu̱kṣa̱ta̱ |
indra̍m | a̱bhi | jāya̍mānam | sam | a̱sva̱ra̱n |
adha̍ | yat | i̱me iti̍ | pa̱va̱mā̱na̱ | roda̍sī̱ iti̍ | i̱mā | ca̱ | viśvā̍ | bhuva̍nā | a̱bhi | ma̱jmanā̍ |
yū̱the | na | ni̱ḥ-sthāḥ | vṛ̱ṣa̱bhaḥ | vi | ti̱ṣṭha̱se̱ |
soma̍ḥ | pu̱nā̱naḥ | a̱vyaye̍ | vāre̍ | śiśu̍ḥ | na | krīḻa̍n | pava̍mānaḥ | a̱kṣā̱riti̍ |
sa̱hasra̍-dhāraḥ | śa̱ta-vā̍jaḥ | indu̍ḥ |
e̱ṣaḥ | pu̱nā̱naḥ | madhu̍-mān | ṛ̱ta-vā̍ | indrā̍ya | indu̍ḥ | pa̱va̱te̱ | svā̱duḥ | ū̱rmiḥ |
vā̱ja̱-sani̍ḥ | va̱ri̱va̱ḥ-vit | va̱ya̱ḥ-dhāḥ |
saḥ | pa̱va̱sva̱ | saha̍mānaḥ | pṛ̱ta̱nyūn | sedha̍n | rakṣā̍ṁsi | apa̍ | du̱ḥ-gahā̍ṇi |
su̱-ā̱yu̱dhaḥ | sa̱sa̱hvān | so̱ma̱ | śatrū̍n |
a̱yā | ru̱cā | hari̍ṇyā | pu̱nā̱naḥ | viśvā̍ | dveṣā̍ṁsi | ta̱ra̱ti̱ | sva̱yugva̍-bhiḥ | sūra̍ḥ | na | sva̱yugva̍-bhiḥ |
dhārā̍ | su̱tasya̍ | ro̱ca̱te̱ | pu̱nā̱naḥ | a̱ru̱ṣaḥ | hari̍ḥ |
viśvā̍ | yat | rū̱pā | pa̱ri̱-yāti̍ | ṛkva̍-bhiḥ | sa̱pta-ā̍syebhiḥ | ṛkva̍-bhiḥ |
tvam | tyat | pa̱ṇī̱nām | vi̱da̱ḥ | vasu̍ | sam | mā̱tṛ-bhi̍ḥ | ma̱rja̱ya̱si̱ | sve | ā | dame̍ | ṛ̱tasya̍ | dhī̱ti-bhi̍ḥ | dame̍ |
pa̱rā̱-vata̍ḥ | na | sāma̍ | tat | yatra̍ | raṇa̍nti | dhī̱taya̍ḥ |
tri̱dhātu̍-bhiḥ | aru̍ṣībhiḥ | vaya̍ḥ | da̱dhe̱ | roca̍mānaḥ | vaya̍ḥ | da̱dhe̱ |
pūrvā̍m | anu̍ | pra̱-diśa̍m | yā̱ti̱ | ceki̍tat | sam | ra̱śmi-bhi̍ḥ | ya̱ta̱te̱ | da̱rśa̱taḥ | ratha̍ḥ | daivya̍ḥ | da̱rśa̱taḥ | ratha̍ḥ |
agma̍n | u̱kthāni̍ | pauṁsyā̍ | indra̍m | jaitrā̍ya | ha̱rṣa̱ya̱n |
vajra̍ḥ | ca̱ | yat | bhava̍thaḥ | ana̍pa-cyutā | sa̱mat-su̍ | ana̍pa-cyutā |
nā̱nā̱nam | vai | ū̱m̐ iti̍ | na̱ḥ | dhiya̍ḥ | vi | vra̱tāni̍ | janā̍nām |
takṣā̍ | ri̱ṣṭam | ru̱tam | bhi̱ṣak | bra̱hmā | su̱nvanta̍m | i̱ccha̱ti̱ | indrā̍ya | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ | pari̍ | sra̱va̱ |
jara̍tībhiḥ | oṣa̍dhībhiḥ | pa̱rṇebhi̍ḥ | śa̱ku̱nānā̍m |
kā̱rmā̱raḥ | aśma̍-bhiḥ | dyu-bhi̍ḥ | hira̍ṇya-vantam | i̱ccha̱ti̱ | indrā̍ya | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ | pari̍ | sra̱va̱ |
kā̱ruḥ | a̱ham | ta̱taḥ | bhi̱ṣak | u̱pa̱la̱-pra̱kṣiṇī̍ | na̱nā |
nānā̍-dhiyaḥ | va̱su̱-yava̍ḥ | anu̍ | gāḥ-i̍va | ta̱sthi̱ma̱ | indrā̍ya | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ | pari̍ | sra̱va̱ |
aśva̍ḥ | voḻhā̍ | su̱-kham | ratha̍m | ha̱sa̱nām | u̱pa̱-ma̱ntriṇa̍ḥ |
śepa̍ḥ | roma̍ṇ-vantau | bhe̱dau | vāḥ | it | ma̱ṇḍūka̍ḥ | i̱ccha̱ti̱ | indrā̍ya | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ | pari̍ | sra̱va̱ |
śa̱rya̱ṇā-va̍ti | soma̍m | indra̍ḥ | pi̱ba̱tu̱ | vṛ̱tra̱-hā |
bala̍m | dadhā̍naḥ | ā̱tmani̍ | ka̱ri̱ṣyan | vī̱rya̍m | ma̱hat | indrā̍ya | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ | pari̍ | sra̱va̱ |
ā | pa̱va̱sva̱ | di̱śā̱m | pa̱te̱ | ā̱rjī̱kāt | soma̍ | mīḍhva̍ḥ |
ṛ̱ta̱-vā̱kena̍ | sa̱tyena̍ | śra̱ddhayā̍ | tapa̍sā | su̱taḥ | indrā̍ya | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ | pari̍ | sra̱va̱ |
pa̱rjanya̍-vṛddham | ma̱hi̱ṣam | tam | sūrya̍sya | du̱hi̱tā | ā | a̱bha̱ra̱t |
tam | ga̱ndha̱rvāḥ | prati̍ | a̱gṛ̱bhṇa̱n | tam | some̍ | rasa̍m | ā | a̱da̱dhu̱ḥ | indrā̍ya | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ | pari̍ | sra̱va̱ |
ṛ̱tam | vada̍n | ṛ̱ta̱-dyu̱mna̱ | sa̱tyam | vada̍n | sa̱tya̱-ka̱rma̱n |

sa̱tyam-u̍grasya | bṛ̱ha̱taḥ | sam | sra̱va̱nti̱ | sa̱m-sra̱vāḥ |
sam | ya̱nti̱ | ra̱sina̍ḥ | rasā̍ḥ | pu̱nā̱naḥ | brahma̍ṇā | ha̱re̱ | indrā̍ya | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ | pari̍ | sra̱va̱ |
yatra̍ | bra̱hmā | pa̱va̱mā̱na̱ | cha̱nda̱syā̍m | vāca̍m | vada̍n |
grāvṇā̍ | some̍ | ma̱hī̱yate̍ | some̍na | ā̱-na̱ndam | ja̱naya̍n | indrā̍ya | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ | pari̍ | sra̱va̱ |
yatra̍ | jyoti̍ḥ | aja̍sram | yasmi̍n | lo̱ke | sva̍ḥ | hi̱tam |
tasmi̍n | mām | dhe̱hi̱ | pa̱va̱mā̱na̱ | a̱mṛte̍ | lo̱ke | akṣi̍te | indrā̍ya | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ | pari̍ | sra̱va̱ |
yatra̍ | rājā̍ | vai̱va̱sva̱taḥ | yatra̍ | a̱va̱-rodha̍nam | di̱vaḥ |

sva̱dhā | ca̱ | yatra̍ | tṛpti̍ḥ | ca̱ | tatra̍ | mām | a̱mṛta̍m | kṛ̱dhi̱ | indrā̍ya | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ | pari̍ | sra̱va̱ |
yatra̍ | ā̱-na̱ndāḥ | ca̱ | modā̍ḥ | ca̱ | muda̍ḥ | pra̱-muda̍ḥ | āsa̍te |

yaḥ | indo̍ḥ | pava̍mānasya | anu̍ | dhāmā̍ni | akra̍mīt |
tam | ā̱hu̱ḥ | su̱-pra̱jāḥ | iti̍ | yaḥ | te̱ | so̱ma̱ | avi̍dhat | mana̍ḥ | indrā̍ya | i̱ndo̱ iti̍ | pari̍ | sra̱va̱ |
